2271  gak = cgi*sqcttf*(-gak1-gak2+gak3)
2272  else
2273  gak1 = sin(phit0-pcrest)*gis*(phit0k-phcrtk)
2274  gak = -cgi*sqcttf*gak1
2275  end if
2276  ! derivative of G0(Z) in relation with the equivalent k and the
2277  ! phase PHI
2278  if (phslip/=0.) then
2279  gic = cos(xcc*tilta2)
2280  gakp1 = dtilk*sin(phit0-pcrest)*gis/(phslip*phslip)
2281  gakp2 = cos(phit0-pcrest)*gis*(phit0k-phcrtk)/phslip
2282  gakp3 = dtilk*sin(phit0-pcrest)*xcc*gic/(2.*phslip*eqvl)
2283  gakp = cgi*sqcttf*(gakp1-gakp2-gakp3)
2284  else
2285  gakp1 = cos(phit0-pcrest)*gis*(phit0k-phcrtk)
2286  gakp = -cgi*sqcttf*gakp1
2287  end if
2288  ! INTEGRALS of HA0(Z) and HB0(Z)
2289  xint = 1./(bi*bi*bi*gi*gi*gi)
2290  phit1 = phit0 + xcc*phslip/(2.*eqvl)
2291  ! INTEGRALES DERIVE HA0(Z) HB0(Z) k0 ET PHI
2292  dha01 = sqcttf*cos(phit1-pcrest)*gap/((gi*gi-1.)**2.5)
2293  dha02 = sqcttf*cos(phit1-pcrest)*gi*gi*gap/((gi*gi-1.)**3.5)
2294  dhb01 = sqcttf*sin(phit1-pcrest)*gap/((gi*gi-1.)**2.5)
2295  dhb02 = sqcttf*sin(phit1-pcrest)*gi*gi*gap/((gi*gi-1.)**3.5)
2296  ! n=1
2297  yh10pk = yh10pk + t1(i)*xcc1*cgam10*(3.*dha01-15.*dha02)
2298  yh20pk = yh20pk + t1(i)*xcc1*cgam10*(3.*dhb01-15.*dhb02)
2299  ! Integrals of HA(Z) (multiplied by (ph1i-ph10)*(kmi-km0)
2300  hapi1 = sqcttf*cos(phit1-pcrest)*gap*gak/((gi*gi-1.)**2.5)
2301  hapi2 = sqcttf*cos(phit1-pcrest)*gi*gakp/((gi*gi-1.)**2.5)
2302  hapi3 = sqcttf*cos(phit1-pcrest)*gi*gi*gap*gak/((gi*gi-1.)**3.5)
2303  ! n=1
2304  yh11pk = yh11pk + t1(i)*xcc1*(-3.*hapi1-3.*hapi2+15.*hapi3)
2305  ! Integrals of HB(Z) (multiplied by (ph1i-ph10)*(kmi-km0)
2306  hbpi1 = sqcttf*sin(phit1-pcrest)*gap*gak/((gi*gi-1.)**2.5)
2307  hbpi2 = sqcttf*sin(phit1-pcrest)*gi*gakp/((gi*gi-1.)**2.5)
2308  hbpi3 = sqcttf*sin(phit1-pcrest)*gi*gi*gap*gak/((gi*gi-1.)**3.5)
2309  ! n=1
2310  yh21pk = yh21pk + t1(i)*xcc1*(-3.*hbpi1-3.*hbpi2+15.*hbpi3)
2311  end do
2312 200 continue
2313  ! Cosinus integrals
2314  yh10pk = yh10pk/2.*eqvl
2315  yh11pk = yh11pk/2.*eqvl
2316  ! Sinus integrals
2317  yh20pk = yh20pk/2.*eqvl
2318  yh21pk = yh21pk/2.*eqvl
2319  return
2320  end subroutine xtylpk
2326  subroutine xtypj(gami, saphi, qsc, dcg)
2327  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
2328  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
2329  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
2330  common /bedycp/phslip, eqvl, asdl, peqvl, pavph, xkp1, xkp2, aa, bb, &
2331  cc, dd, ee, pcrest, sqcttf
2332  common /typj/yfsk0, yfsk1, yfsk2, yfsp0, yfsp1, yfsp2, yfskc0, yfskc1, &
2333  yfskc2, yfsck0, yfsck1, yfsck2, yfscp0, yfscp1, yfscp2, yfs0, &
2334  yfs1, yfs2
2335  common /gaus17/h1(17), t1(17)
2336 
2337  fh0 = fh/vl
2338  ! valero 08/08/07
2339  ! omment CGI=ABS(QSC/XMAT)
2340  cgi = qsc/xmat
2341  ! *
2342  gam2 = gami**2
2343  beti = sqrt(1.-1./gam2)
2344  xk1 = fh0/beti
2345  dtilk = eqvl
2346  yfs0 = 0.
2347  yfs1 = 0.
2348  yfs2 = 0.
2349  yfskc0 = 0.
2350  yfskc1 = 0.
2351  yfskc2 = 0.
2352  yfsk0 = 0.
2353  yfsk1 = 0.
2354  yfsk2 = 0.
2355  yfsck0 = 0.
2356  yfsck1 = 0.
2357  yfsck2 = 0.
2358  yfscp0 = 0.
2359  yfscp1 = 0.
2360  yfscp2 = 0.
2361  yfsp0 = 0.
2362  yfsp1 = 0.
2363  yfsp2 = 0.
2364  tilta2 = phslip/(2.*eqvl)
2365  if (phslip/=0.) desy = phslip/sin(phslip/2.)
2366  if (phslip==0.) desy = 2.
2367  cgam10 = ((gami*gami-1.)**1.5)/fh0
2368  phcrtk = (t1k*sk-s1k*tk)/(tk*tk+sk*sk)
2369  do i = 1, 17
2370  xcc = eqvl*(1.+h1(i))/2.
2371  xcc1 = xcc + asdl
2372  if (xcc1>dcg) go to 200
2373  phit0 = saphi - phslip*(eqvl-xcc)/(2.*eqvl) + pavph
2374  ! Function GAMMA (Z)
2375  if (phslip/=0.) then
2376  git = cgi*sqcttf*cos(phit0-pcrest)/phslip
2377  gis = sin(xcc*tilta2)
2378  else
2379  git = cgi*sqcttf*cos(phit0-pcrest)
2380  gis = xcc/(2.*eqvl)
2381  end if
2382  gi = gami + git*gis
2383  bi = sqrt(1.-1./(gi*gi))
2384  ! Derivative of G0(Z) with regard to the average k
2385  phit0k = -dtilk*(1.-xcc/eqvl)/2.
2386  if (phslip/=0.) then
2387  gic = cos(xcc*tilta2)
2388  gak1 = dtilk*cos(phit0-pcrest)*gis/(phslip*phslip)
2389  gak2 = sin(phit0-pcrest)*gis*(phit0k-phcrtk)/phslip
2390  gak3 = dtilk*cos(phit0-pcrest)*xcc*gic/(2.*phslip*eqvl)
2391  gak = cgi*sqcttf*(-gak1-gak2+gak3)
2392  else
2393  gak1 = sin(phit0-pcrest)*gis*(phit0k-phcrtk)
2394  gak = -cgi*sqcttf*gak1
2395  end if
2396  phit1 = phit0 + xcc*phslip/(2.*eqvl)
2397  phtz0 = (xcc/eqvl-.5)*dtilk
2398  xint = (gi*gi+2.)/((gi*gi-1.)**2)
2399  xfk1 = 2.*gi*(1.-2.*(gi*gi+2.)/(gi*gi-1.))/((gi*gi-1.)**2)
2400  ha0 = cos(phit1-pcrest)
2401  hb0 = sin(phit1-pcrest)
2402  ! n=0
2403  yfs0 = yfs0 + t1(i)*ha0*ha0*xint
2404  yfskc0 = yfskc0 - t1(i)*ha0*ha0*xfk1*cgam10
2405  yfsk0 = yfsk0 + t1(i)*ha0*ha0*xfk1*gak
2406  yfsck0 = yfsck0 - 2.*t1(i)*ha0*hb0*xint*(phtz0-phcrtk)
2407  ! n=1
2408  yfs1 = yfs1 + t1(i)*ha0*ha0*xint*xcc
2409  yfskc1 = yfskc1 - t1(i)*ha0*ha0*xfk1*cgam10*xcc
2410  yfsk1 = yfsk1 + t1(i)*ha0*ha0*xfk1*gak*xcc
2411  yfsck1 = yfsck1 - 2.*t1(i)*ha0*hb0*xint*(phtz0-phcrtk)*xcc
2412  ! n=2
2413  yfs2 = yfs2 + t1(i)*ha0*ha0*xint*xcc*xcc
2414  yfskc2 = yfskc2 - t1(i)*ha0*ha0*xfk1*cgam10*xcc*xcc
2415  yfsk2 = yfsk2 + t1(i)*ha0*ha0*xfk1*gak*xcc*xcc
2416  yfsck2 = yfsck2 - 2.*t1(i)*ha0*hb0*xint*(phtz0-phcrtk)*xcc*xcc
2417  ! Derivative of G0(Z) with regard to PH01
2418  if (phslip/=0.) then
2419  gap = -cgi*sqcttf*sin(phit0-pcrest)*gis/phslip
2420  else
2421  gap = sin(phit0-pcrest)*gis
2422  gap = -cgi*sqcttf*gap
2423  end if
2424  ! n=0
2425  yfsp0 = yfsp0 + t1(i)*xfk1*gap*ha0*ha0
2426  yfscp0 = yfscp0 - 2.*t1(i)*xint*ha0*hb0
2427  ! n=1
2428  yfsp1 = yfsp1 + t1(i)*xfk1*gap*ha0*ha0*xcc
2429  yfscp1 = yfscp1 - 2.*t1(i)*xint*ha0*hb0*xcc
2430  ! n=2
2431  yfsp2 = yfsp2 + t1(i)*xfk1*gap*ha0*ha0*xcc*xcc
2432  yfscp2 = yfscp2 - 2.*t1(i)*xint*ha0*hb0*xcc*xcc
2433  end do
2434 200 continue
2435  ! IST=IAST
2436  yfs0 = yfs0/2.*eqvl
2437  yfs1 = yfs1/2.*eqvl
2438  yfs2 = yfs2/2.*eqvl
2439  yfskc0 = yfskc0/2.*eqvl
2440  yfskc1 = yfskc1/2.*eqvl
2441  yfskc2 = yfskc2/2.*eqvl
2442  yfsk0 = yfsk0/2.*eqvl
2443  yfsk1 = yfsk1/2.*eqvl
2444  yfsk2 = yfsk2/2.*eqvl
2445  yfsck0 = yfsck0/2.*eqvl
2446  yfsck1 = yfsck1/2.*eqvl
2447  yfsck2 = yfsck2/2.*eqvl
2448  yfscp0 = yfscp0/2.*eqvl
2449  yfscp1 = yfscp1/2.*eqvl
2450  yfscp2 = yfscp2/2.*eqvl
2451  yfsp0 = yfsp0/2.*eqvl
2452  yfsp1 = yfsp1/2.*eqvl
2453  yfsp2 = yfsp2/2.*eqvl
2454  return
2455  end subroutine xtypj
2461  subroutine xtypm(gami, saphi, qsc, dcg)
2462  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
2463  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
2464  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
2465  common /bedycp/phslip, eqvl, asdl, peqvl, pavph, xkp1, xkp2, aa, bb, &
2466  cc, dd, ee, pcrest, sqcttf
2467  common /typm/ynsk0, ynsk1, ynsk2, ynsp0, ynsp1, ynsp2, ynsk0c, ynsk1c, &
2468  ynsk2c, yns0, yns1, yns2
2469  common /gaus17/h1(17), t1(17)
2470 
2471  fh0 = fh/vl
2472  ! valero 08/08/07
2473  ! omment CGI=ABS(QSC/XMAT)
2474  cgi = qsc/xmat
2475  ! *
2476  dtilk = eqvl
2477  yns0 = 0.
2478  yns1 = 0.
2479  yns2 = 0.
2480  ynsk0c = 0.
2481  ynsk1c = 0.
2482  ynsk2c = 0.
2483  ynsk0 = 0.
2484  ynsk1 = 0.
2485  ynsk2 = 0.
2486  ynsp0 = 0.
2487  ynsp1 = 0.
2488  ynsp2 = 0.
2489  gam2 = gami**2
2490  beti = sqrt(1.-1./gam2)
2491  xk1 = fh0/beti
2492  tilta2 = phslip/(2.*eqvl)
2493  if (phslip/=0.) desy = phslip/sin(phslip/2.)
2494  if (phslip==0.) desy = 2.
2495  cgam10 = ((gami*gami-1.)**1.5)/fh0
2496  phcrtk = (t1k*sk-s1k*tk)/(tk*tk+sk*sk)
2497  do i = 1, 17
2498  xcc = eqvl*(1.+h1(i))/2.
2499  xcc1 = xcc + asdl
2500  if (xcc1>dcg) go to 200
2501  phit0 = saphi - phslip*(eqvl-xcc)/(2.*eqvl) + pavph
2502  ! Function GAMMA (Z)
2503  if (phslip/=0.) then
2504  git = cgi*sqcttf*cos(phit0-pcrest)/phslip
2505  gis = sin(xcc*tilta2)
2506  else
2507  git = cgi*sqcttf*cos(phit0-pcrest)
2508  gis = xcc/(2.*eqvl)
2509  end if
2510  gi = gami + git*gis
2511  bi = sqrt(1.-1./(gi*gi))
2512  ! Derivative of G0(Z) with regard to the average k
2513  phit0k = -dtilk*(1.-xcc/eqvl)/2.
2514  if (phslip/=0.) then
2515  gic = cos(xcc*tilta2)
2516  gak1 = dtilk*cos(phit0-pcrest)*gis/(phslip*phslip)
2517  gak2 = sin(phit0-pcrest)*gis*(phit0k-phcrtk)/phslip
2518  gak3 = dtilk*cos(phit0-pcrest)*xcc*gic/(2.*phslip*eqvl)
2519  gak = cgi*sqcttf*(-gak1-gak2+gak3)
2520  else
2521  gak1 = sin(phit0-pcrest)*gis*(phit0k-phcrtk)
2522  gak = -cgi*sqcttf*gak1
2523  end if
2524  xint = (gi*gi+2.)/((gi*gi-1.)**2)
2525  xnk1 = 2.*gi*(1.-2.*(gi*gi+2.)/(gi*gi-1.))/((gi*gi-1.)**2)
2526  ! n=0
2527  yns0 = yns0 + t1(i)*xint
2528  ynsk0c = ynsk0c - t1(i)*xnk1*cgam10
2529  ynsk0 = ynsk0 + t1(i)*xnk1*gak
2530  ! n=1
2531  yns1 = yns1 + t1(i)*xint*xcc
2532  ynsk1c = ynsk1c - t1(i)*xnk1*cgam10*xcc
2533  ynsk1 = ynsk1 + t1(i)*xnk1*gak*xcc
2534  ! n=2
2535  yns2 = yns2 + t1(i)*xint*xcc*xcc
2536  ynsk2c = ynsk2c - t1(i)*xnk1*cgam10*xcc*xcc
2537  ynsk2 = ynsk2 + t1(i)*xnk1*gak*xcc*xcc
2538  ! DERIVE G0(Z) RELATIF A PH01
2539  if (phslip/=0.) then
2540  gap = -cgi*sqcttf*sin(phit0-pcrest)*gis/phslip
2541  else
2542  gap = sin(phit0-pcrest)*gis
2543  gap = -cgi*sqcttf*gap
2544  end if
2545  ynsp0 = ynsp0 + t1(i)*xnk1*gap
2546  ynsp1 = ynsp1 + t1(i)*xnk1*gap*xcc
2547  ynsp2 = ynsp2 + t1(i)*xnk1*gap*xcc*xcc
2548  end do
2549 200 continue
2550  yns0 = yns0/2.*eqvl
2551  yns1 = yns1/2.*eqvl
2552  yns2 = yns2/2.*eqvl
2553  ynsk0c = ynsk0c/2.*eqvl
2554  ynsk1c = ynsk1c/2.*eqvl
2555  ynsk2c = ynsk2c/2.*eqvl
2556  ynsk0 = ynsk0/2.*eqvl
2557  ynsk1 = ynsk1/2.*eqvl
2558  ynsk2 = ynsk2/2.*eqvl
2559  ynsp0 = ynsp0/2.*eqvl
2560  ynsp1 = ynsp1/2.*eqvl
2561  ynsp2 = ynsp2/2.*eqvl
2562  return
2563  end subroutine xtypm
2571  function gamci(phi, pcresi, gami, ist, qsc)
2572  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
2573  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
2574  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
2575  common /bedycp/phslip, eqvl, asdl, peqvl, pavph, xkp1, xkp2, aa, bb, &
2576  cc, dd, ee, pcrest, sqcttf
2577  common /gaus17/h1(17), t1(17)
2578 
2579  gamci = 0.
2580  if (ist>17) return
2581  ! valero 08/08/07
2582  ! omment CGI=ABS(QSC/XMAT)
2583  cgi = qsc/xmat
2584  ! *
2585  tilta2 = phslip/(2.*eqvl)
2586  i = ist
2587  xcc = eqvl*(1.+h1(i))/2.
2588  phit0 = phi - phslip*(eqvl-xcc)/(2.*eqvl)
2589  ! Function GAMMA (Z)
2590  if (phslip/=0.) then
2591  git = cgi*sqcttf*cos(phit0-pcresi)/phslip
2592  gis = sin(xcc*tilta2)
2593  else
2594  git = cgi*sqcttf*cos(phit0-pcrest)
2595  gis = xcc/(2.*eqvl)
2596  end if
2597  gamci = gami + git*gis
2598  return
2599  end function gamci
2608  subroutine intga(npt, ireca)
2609  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
2610  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
2611  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
2612  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
2613  common /hermt/afxt(22), afyt(22), afzt(22)
2614  common /hermd/afxm(20), afym(20), afzm(20)
2615  common /hermr/afxr(20), afyr(20), afzr(20)
2616  common /hermrr/afxrr(20), afyrr(20), afzrr(20)
2617  common /sizr/xrms3, yrms3, zrms3, zcgr3
2618  common /degherm/nmaz, nmazr, nmaxy
2619  common /sizt/xrms, yrms, zrms
2620  common /sizp/xrms1, yrms1, zrms1, xrms2, yrms2, zrms2, imaxd
2621  common /elcg/xcgd, ycgd, zcgd, xcgr, ycgr, zcgr
2622  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
2623  common /intgrt/ex, ey, ez
2624  common /sc3/beamc, scdist, sce10, cplm, ect, apl, ichaes, iscsp
2625  common /part/xc(iptsz), yc(iptsz), zc(iptsz)
2626  common /twcst/epsilon
2627  common /ecor/const
2628  common /npart/imaxr
2629  common /macro/ratei
2630  logical ichaes
2631  dimension ui(6), wi(6)
2632  data (ui(j), j=1, 6)/.033765, .169395, .380690, .619310, .830605, &
2633  .966234/
2634  data (wi(j), j=1, 6)/.085662, .180381, .233957, .233957, .180381, &
2635  .085662/
2636 
2637  ! Initialize some constants and variables
2638  ! freq. in MHz
2639  freq = fh*0.5e-06/pi
2640  ! qmpart=coul , xrms=meters
2641  ! ireca=0 : first ellipsoid over nmaxy terms
2642  ! ireca=4 : one ellipsoid over the first term
2643  xrmsc = 0.
2644  yrmsc = 0.
2645  zrmsc = 0.
2646  xgc = 0.
2647  ygc = 0.
2648  zgc = 0.
2649  if (ireca==0 .or. ireca==4) then
2650  xrmsc = xrms1
2651  yrmsc = yrms1
2652  zrmsc = zrms1
2653  xgc = xcgd
2654  ygc = ycgd
2655  zgc = zcgd
2656  end if
2657  ! ireca=1 : second ellipsoid
2658  if (ireca==1) then
2659  xrmsc = xrms2
2660  yrmsc = yrms2
2661  zrmsc = zrms2
2662  xgc = xcgr
2663  ygc = ycgr
2664  zgc = zcgr
2665  end if
2666  ! ireca=2 : third elllipsoid
2667  if (ireca==2) then
2668  xrmsc = xrms3
2669  yrmsc = yrms3
2670  zrmsc = zrms3
2671  xgc = 0.
2672  ygc = 0.
2673  zgc = zcgr3
2674  end if
2675  qmpart = 1.0e-09*beamc/(float(imax)*freq)
2676  ! omment const=qmpart*xrmsc*yrmsc*zrmsc/(2.*epsilon)
2677  qmpart = qmpart*ratei
2678  const = qmpart/(2.*epsilon)
2679  dnorm = (xrmsc*yrmsc*zrmsc)**.333333333
2680  dsq = dnorm*dnorm
2681  xsq = (xc(npt)-xgc)*(xc(npt)-xgc)
2682  ysq = (yc(npt)-ygc)*(yc(npt)-ygc)
2683  zsq = (zc(npt)-zgc)*(zc(npt)-zgc)
2684  if (ireca==0) zc1 = zc(npt) - zgc
2685  if (ireca==1) zc2 = zc(npt) - zgc
2686  ex = 0.
2687  if (ireca==2) zc2 = zc(npt) - zgc
2688  ey = 0.
2689  ez = 0.
2690  ! initialize integrals to 0.
2691  ! integrate all 3 components (x,y,z)
2692  do j = 1, 6
2693  a1 = xrmsc*xrmsc - dsq + dsq/ui(j)
2694  a2 = yrmsc*yrmsc - dsq + dsq/ui(j)
2695  a3 = zrmsc*zrmsc - dsq + dsq/ui(j)
2696  t1 = xsq/a1
2697  t2 = ysq/a2
2698  t3 = zsq/a3
2699  txyz = sqrt(t1+t2+t3)
2700  ff1 = drxyz(nmaxy, txyz, ireca)/(ui(j)*ui(j)*sqrt(a1*a2*a3))
2701  fxn = ff1/a1
2702  fyn = ff1/a2
2703  fzn = ff1/a3
2704  ex = ex + wi(j)*fxn*dsq
2705  ey = ey + wi(j)*fyn*dsq
2706  ez = ez + wi(j)*fzn*dsq
2707  end do
2708  ! Field components are in Newton/Coulomb
2709  ex = ex*const*xc(npt)
2710  ey = ey*const*yc(npt)
2711  ez = ez*const*(zc(npt)-zgc)
2712  return
2713  end subroutine intga
2721  subroutine sizcor(ect, xrms, yrms, zrms, imaxd)
2722  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
2723  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
2724  common /part/xc(iptsz), yc(iptsz), zc(iptsz)
2725  common /cgrms/xsum, ysum, zsum
2726  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
2727 
2728  imaxf = 0
2729  imaxx = ngood
2730  xsum = 0.
2731  ysum = 0.
2732  zsum = 0.
2733  xrmsp = xrms
2734  yrmsp = yrms
2735  zrmsp = zrms
2736  xsqsum = 0.
2737  ysqsum = 0.
2738  zsqsum = 0.
2739  if (imaxd>0) imaxx = imaxd
2740  do i = 1, imaxx
2741  xcoup = abs(xc(i)/xrmsp)
2742  ycoup = abs(yc(i)/yrmsp)
2743  zcoup = abs(zc(i)/zrmsp)
2744  if (xcoup<=ect .and. ycoup<=ect .and. zcoup<=ect) then
2745  xsum = xsum + xc(i)
2746  ysum = ysum + yc(i)
2747  zsum = zsum + zc(i)
2748  xsqsum = xsqsum + xc(i)*xc(i)
2749  ysqsum = ysqsum + yc(i)*yc(i)
2750  zsqsum = zsqsum + zc(i)*zc(i)
2751  imaxf = imaxf + 1
2752  end if
2753  end do
2754  xsum = xsum/imaxf
2755  ysum = ysum/imaxf
2756  zsum = zsum/imaxf
2757  xsqsum = xsqsum/imaxf
2758  ysqsum = ysqsum/imaxf
2759  zsqsum = zsqsum/imaxf
2760  xrms = sqrt(xsqsum-xsum*xsum)
2761  yrms = sqrt(ysqsum-ysum*ysum)
2762  zrms = sqrt(zsqsum-zsum*zsum)
2763  return
2764  end subroutine sizcor
2771  subroutine sizrms(imaxd, xrms, yrms, zrms, zmin)
2772  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
2773  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
2774  common /part/xc(iptsz), yc(iptsz), zc(iptsz)
2775  common /cgrms/xsum, ysum, zsum
2776  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
2777 
2778  imaxx = ngood
2779  xsum = 0.
2780  ysum = 0.
2781  zsum = 0.
2782  if (imaxd>0) then
2783  do i = 1, imaxd
2784  zc(i) = zc(i) - zmin
2785  end do
2786  imaxx = imaxd
2787  end if
2788  xsqsum = 0.
2789  ysqsum = 0.
2790  zsqsum = 0.
2791  do i = 1, imaxx
2792  xsum = xsum + xc(i)
2793  ysum = ysum + yc(i)
2794  zsum = zsum + zc(i)
2795  xsqsum = xsqsum + xc(i)*xc(i)
2796  ysqsum = ysqsum + yc(i)*yc(i)
2797  zsqsum = zsqsum + zc(i)*zc(i)
2798  end do
2799  xsum = xsum/imaxx
2800  ysum = ysum/imaxx
2801  zsum = zsum/imaxx
2802  xsqsum = xsqsum/float(imaxx)
2803  ysqsum = ysqsum/float(imaxx)
2804  zsqsum = zsqsum/float(imaxx)
2805  xrms = sqrt(xsqsum-xsum*xsum)
2806  yrms = sqrt(ysqsum-ysum*ysum)
2807  zrms = sqrt(zsqsum-zsum*zsum)
2808  return
2809  end subroutine sizrms
2816  function snzt(cc, dd)
2817  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
2818  common /degherm/nmaz, nmazr, nmaxy
2819  common /sizt/xrms, yrms, zrms
2820  common /sizp/xrms1, yrms1, zrms1, xrms2, yrms2, zrms2, imaxd
2821  common /gaus17/h1(17), t1(17)
2822 
2823  snzt = 0.
2824  do i = 1, 17
2825  z = (cc+dd)/2. + (dd-cc)*h1(i)/2.
2826  denz = densz(nmaz, z, 0)
2827  if (denz<0.) denz = 0.
2828  snzt = snzt + t1(i)*denz
2829  end do
2830  snzt = snzt*(dd-cc)/2.
2831  return
2832  end function snzt
2839  function snzd(cc, dd)
2840  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
2841  common /degherm/nmaz, nmazr, nmaxy
2842  common /sizt/xrms, yrms, zrms
2843  common /sizp/xrms1, yrms1, zrms1, xrms2, yrms2, zrms2, imaxd
2844  common /gaus17/h1(17), t1(17)
2845 
2846  snzd = 0.
2847  do i = 1, 17
2848  z = (cc+dd)/2. + (dd-cc)*h1(i)/2.
2849  denz = densz(nmaz, z, 0)
2850  if (denz<0.) go to 13
2851  zz = (z-cc)
2852  snzd = snzd + t1(i)*denz
2853  end do
2854 13 continue
2855  snzd = snzd*(dd-cc)
2856  return
2857  end function snzd
2864  function vaprz(cc, dd)
2865  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
2866  common /degherm/nmaz, nmazr, nmaxy
2867  common /sizt/xrms, yrms, zrms
2868  common /sizp/xrms1, yrms1, zrms1, xrms2, yrms2, zrms2, imaxd
2869  common /gaus17/h1(17), t1(17)
2870 
2871  vaprz = 0.
2872  var1 = 0.
2873  var2 = 0.
2874  do i = 1, 17
2875  z = (cc+dd)/2. + (dd-cc)*h1(i)/2.
2876  denz = densz(nmaz, z, 0)
2877  if (denz<0.) go to 13
2878  zz = (z-cc)
2879  var1 = var1 + t1(i)*zz*zz*denz
2880  var2 = var2 + t1(i)*denz
2881  end do
2882 13 continue
2883  vaprz = var1/var2
2884  return
2885  end function vaprz
2892  function prinz(cc, dd, kap, zrmss1)
2893  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
2894  common /degherm/nmaz, nmazr, nmaxy
2895  common /sizt/xrms, yrms, zrms
2896  common /sizp/xrms1, yrms1, zrms1, xrms2, yrms2, zrms2, imaxd
2897  common /gaus17/h1(17), t1(17)
2898 
2899  prinz = 0.
2900  k = kap - 1
2901  do i = 1, 17
2902  denz = 0.
2903  z = (cc+dd)/2. + (dd-cc)*h1(i)/2.
2904  denz = densz(nmaz, z, 0)
2905  if (denz<0.) go to 13
2906  ! omment ZZ=(Z-CC)*ZRMS/ZRMSS1
2907  zz = (z-cc)/zrmss1
2908  prinz = prinz + t1(i)*herm(2*k, zz)*denz
2909  end do
2910 13 continue
2911  prinz = prinz*(dd-cc)/2.
2912  return
2913  end function prinz
2921  subroutine rchsom(zi, zf, nmaz)
2922  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
2923 
2924  xpz = abs((zf-zi))/400.
2925 1 continue
2926  ztest = abs(zf-zi)
2927  if (ztest<=xpz) return
2928  z1 = (zf+zi)/2.
2929  z2 = (z1+zi)/2.
2930  t1 = densz(nmaz, z1, 0)
2931  t2 = densz(nmaz, z2, 0)
2932  ! new interval: Z2,ZF
2933  if (t1>t2) zi = z2
2934  ! new interval : ZI,Z1
2935  if (t1<t2) zf = z1
2936  go to 1
2937  end subroutine rchsom
2945  subroutine rchsor(aa, bb, cc, dd, zs)
2946  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
2947 
2948  zi = aa
2949  zf = cc
2950  xpz = abs((zf-zi))/400.
2951 1 continue
2952  ztest = abs(zf-zi)
2953  if (ztest<=xpz) then
2954  zs = (zi+zf)/2.
2955  return
2956  end if
2957  z1 = (zf+zi)/2.
2958  z2 = (z1+zi)/2.
2959  t1 = dendif(z1, aa, bb, cc, dd)
2960  t2 = dendif(z2, aa, bb, cc, dd)
2961  ! NEW INTERVAL : Z2,ZF
2962  if (t1>t2) zi = z2
2963  ! NEW INTERVAL : ZI,Z1
2964  if (t1<t2) zf = z1
2965  go to 1
2966  end subroutine rchsor
2973  function herm(m, x)
2974  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
2975  dimension he(30)
2976 
2977  if (m==0) then
2978  herm = 1.
2979  return
2980  end if
2981  if (m==1) then
2982  herm = x
2983  return
2984  end if
2985  he(1) = 1.
2986  he(2) = x
2987  m1 = m - 1
2988  do k = 1, m1
2989  he(k+2) = x*he(k+1) - float(k)*he(k)
2990  end do
2991  herm = he(m+1)
2992  return
2993  end function herm
3001  function densz(m, z, ireca)
3002  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
3003  common /hermt/afxt(22), afyt(22), afzt(22)
3004  common /hermd/afxm(20), afym(20), afzm(20)
3005  common /hermr/afxr(20), afyr(20), afzr(20)
3006 
3007  densz = 0.
3008  do k = 1, m
3009  kap = k - 1
3010  if (ireca==0) densz = densz + exp(-z*z/2.)*afzt(k)*herm(kap, z)
3011  if (ireca==2) densz = densz + exp(-z*z/2.)*afzm(k)*herm(2*kap, z)
3012  if (ireca==3) densz = densz + exp(-z*z/2.)*afzr(k)*herm(2*kap, z)
3013  end do
3014  return
3015  end function densz
3022  function codsy(bb, cc, dd, ee, kap)
3023  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
3024  common /degherm/nmaz, nmazr, nmaxy
3025  common /sizt/xrms, yrms, zrms
3026  common /sizp/xrms1, yrms1, zrms1, xrms2, yrms2, zrms2, imaxd
3027  common /gaus13/h(13), t(13)
3028 
3029  codsy = 0.
3030  k = kap - 1
3031  ff = 2.*ee - cc
3032  do i = 1, 13
3033  dendifr = 0.
3034  z = (cc+ff)/2. + (cc-ff)*t(i)/2.
3035  if (z>=ff .and. z<ee) then
3036  zs = 2.*ee - z
3037  z1 = dd + bb - zs
3038  if (zs<bb) dendifr = densz(nmaz, zs, 0)
3039  if (zs>=bb) dendifr = densz(nmaz, zs, 0) - densz(nmaz, z1, 0)
3040  end if
3041  if (z>=ee) then
3042  if (z<bb) dendifr = densz(nmaz, z, 0)
3043  z1 = dd + bb - z
3044  if (z>=bb) dendifr = densz(nmaz, z, 0) - densz(nmaz, z1, 0)
3045  end if
3046  if (dendifr<0.) dendifr = 0.
3047  zz = z - ee
3048  ! ZRMS2(EFFECTIF)=ZRMS2(CALCULE)*ZRMS
3049  zz = zz/zrms2
3050  codsy = codsy + h(i)*herm(2*k, zz)*dendifr
3051  end do
3052  codsy = codsy*(cc-ff)/2.
3053  return
3054  end function codsy
3061  function codif(bb, cc, dd, ee, ee1, kap)
3062  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
3063  common /degherm/nmaz, nmazr, nmaxy
3064  common /sizt/xrms, yrms, zrms
3065  common /sizp/xrms1, yrms1, zrms1, xrms2, yrms2, zrms2, imaxd
3066  common /sizr/xrms3, yrms3, zrms3, zcgr3
3067  common /gaus13/h(13), t(13)
3068 
3069  codif = 0.
3070  k = kap - 1
3071  ff = 2.*ee1 - ee
3072  ff1 = 2.*ee - cc
3073  dendifr = 0.
3074  do i = 1, 13
3075  z = (ee+ff)/2. + (ee-ff)*t(i)/2.
3076  if (z<=ff1) dendifr = densz(nmaz, z, 0)
3077  if (z>=ff1) then
3078  zs = 2.*ee - z
3079  z1 = dd + bb - zs
3080  if (zs<bb) dendifr = densz(nmaz, zs, 0)
3081  if (zs>=bb) dendifr = densz(nmaz, zs, 0) - densz(nmaz, z1, 0)
3082  dendifr = densz(nmaz, z, 0) - dendifr
3083  end if
3084  if (z>0.) dendifr = 0.
3085  if (dendifr<0.) dendifr = 0.
3086  zz = z - ee1
3087  ! ZRMS2(EFFECTIF)=ZRMS2(CALCULE)*ZRMS
3088  zz = zz/zrms3
3089  codif = codif + h(i)*herm(2*k, zz)*dendifr
3090  end do
3091  codif = -codif*ff/2.
3092  return
3093  end function codif
3100  function varia(bb, cc, dd, ee)
3101  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
3102  common /degherm/nmaz, nmazr, nmaxy
3103  common /sizt/xrms, yrms, zrms
3104  common /sizp/xrms1, yrms1, zrms1, xrms2, yrms2, zrms2, imaxd
3105  common /gaus13/h(13), t(13)
3106 
3107  varia = 0.
3108  codi1 = 0.
3109  codi2 = 0.
3110  ff = 2.*ee - cc
3111  do i = 1, 13
3112  dendifr = 0.
3113  z = (cc+ff)/2. + (cc-ff)*t(i)/2.
3114  if (z>=ff .and. z<ee) then
3115  zs = 2.*ee - z
3116  z1 = dd + bb - zs
3117  if (zs<bb) dendifr = densz(nmaz, zs, 0)
3118  if (zs>=bb) dendifr = densz(nmaz, zs, 0) - densz(nmaz, z1, 0)
3119  end if
3120  if (z>=ee) then
3121  if (z<bb) dendifr = densz(nmaz, z, 0)
3122  z1 = dd + bb - z
3123  if (z>=bb) dendifr = densz(nmaz, z, 0) - densz(nmaz, z1, 0)
3124  end if
3125  zz = z - ee
3126  ! omment ZZ=ZZ*ZRMS/ZRMS2
3127  if (dendifr<0.) dendifr = 0.
3128  codi1 = codi1 + h(i)*zz*zz*dendifr
3129  codi2 = codi2 + h(i)*dendifr
3130  end do
3131  varia = codi1/codi2
3132  return
3133  end function varia
3140  function variz(bb, cc, dd, ee, ee1)
3141  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
3142  common /degherm/nmaz, nmazr, nmaxy
3143  common /sizt/xrms, yrms, zrms
3144  common /sizp/xrms1, yrms1, zrms1, xrms2, yrms2, zrms2, imaxd
3145  common /gaus13/h(13), t(13)
3146 
3147  variz = 0.
3148  codi1 = 0.
3149  codi2 = 0.
3150  ff = 2.*ee1 - ee
3151  ff1 = 2.*ee - cc
3152  do i = 1, 13
3153  dendifr = 0.
3154  z = (ee+ff)/2. + (ee-ff)*t(i)/2.
3155  if (z<=ff1) dendifr = densz(nmaz, z, 0)
3156  if (z>=ff1) then
3157  zs = 2.*ee - z
3158  z1 = dd + bb - zs
3159  if (zs<bb) dendifr = densz(nmaz, zs, 0)
3160  if (zs>=bb) dendifr = densz(nmaz, zs, 0) - densz(nmaz, z1, 0)
3161  dendifr = densz(nmaz, z, 0) - dendifr
3162  end if
3163  if (z>ee) dendifr = 0.
3164  if (dendifr<0.) dendifr = 0.
3165  zz = z - ee1
3166  codi1 = codi1 + h(i)*zz*zz*dendifr
3167  codi2 = codi2 + h(i)*dendifr
3168  end do
3169  variz = codi1/codi2
3170  return
3171  end function variz
3178  function grz(aa, bb, cc, dd, ee)
3179  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
3180  common /degherm/nmaz, nmazr, nmaxy
3181  common /sizt/xrms, yrms, zrms
3182  common /sizp/xrms1, yrms1, zrms1, xrms2, yrms2, zrms2, imaxd
3183  common /gaus13/h(13), t(13)
3184 
3185  grz = 0.
3186  gz = 0.
3187  gs = 0.
3188  do i = 1, 13
3189  z = (ee+aa)/2. + (ee-aa)*t(i)/2.
3190  dif = dendir(z, aa, bb, cc, dd, ee)
3191  if (dif<0.) dif = 0.
3192  gz = gz + h(i)*z*dif
3193  gs = gs + h(i)*dif
3194  end do
3195  if (gs<=0.) grz = 0.
3196  if (gs>0.) grz = gz/gs
3197  return
3198  end function grz
3206  function dendir(z, aa, bb, cc, dd, ee)
3207  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
3208  common /degherm/nmaz, nmazr, nmaxy
3209 
3210  dendir = 0.
3211  ff = 2.*ee - cc
3212  if (z<aa) dendir = 0.
3213  if (z>=aa .and. z<ff) dendir = densz(nmaz, z, 0)
3214  if (z>=ff .and. z<ee) then
3215  zs = 2.*ee - z
3216  z1 = dd + bb - zs
3217  dendifr = 0.
3218  if (zs<bb) dendifr = densz(nmaz, zs, 0)
3219  if (zs>=bb) dendifr = densz(nmaz, zs, 0) - densz(nmaz, z1, 0)
3220  dendir = densz(nmaz, z, 0) - dendifr
3221  end if
3222  if (z>=ee) dendir = 0.
3223  return
3224  end function dendir
3232  function dendif(z, aa, bb, cc, dd)
3233  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
3234  common /degherm/nmaz, nmazr, nmaxy
3235 
3236  dendif = 0.
3237  if (z<aa) dendif = 0.
3238  if (z>=aa .and. z<bb) dendif = densz(nmaz, z, 0)
3239  if (z>=bb .and. z<cc) then
3240  z1 = dd + bb - z
3241  dendif = densz(nmaz, z, 0) - densz(nmaz, z1, 0)
3242  end if
3243  if (z>=cc) dendif = 0.
3244  return
3245  end function dendif
3256  function drxyz(m, xyz, ireca)
3257  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
3258  common /hermt/afxt(22), afyt(22), afzt(22)
3259  common /hermd/afxm(20), afym(20), afzm(20)
3260  common /hermr/afxr(20), afyr(20), afzr(20)
3261  common /sizp/xrms1, yrms1, zrms1, xrms2, yrms2, zrms2, imaxd
3262  common /hermrr/afxrr(20), afyrr(20), afzrr(20)
3263  common /sizr/xrms3, yrms3, zrms3, zcgr3
3264  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
3265 
3266  deriv1 = 0.
3267  deriv2 = 0.
3268  if (abs(xyz)>13.) xyz = 13.
3269  fe = exp(-xyz*xyz/2.)
3270  axyz = abs(xyz)
3271  msto = m
3272  do k = 2, m
3273  kap = k - 1
3274  kah = 2*kap - 1
3275  if (ireca==0) then
3276  dxxyz = fe*float(kap)*afxm(k)*hers(kah, axyz)
3277  dyxyz = fe*float(kap)*afym(k)*hers(kah, axyz)
3278  dzxyz = fe*float(kap)*afzm(k)*hers(kah, axyz)
3279  deriv1 = deriv1 + (dxxyz+dyxyz+dzxyz)
3280  end if
3281  if (ireca==1) then
3282  dxxyz = fe*float(kap)*afxr(k)*hers(kah, axyz)
3283  dyxyz = fe*float(kap)*afyr(k)*hers(kah, axyz)
3284  dzxyz = fe*float(kap)*afzr(k)*hers(kah, axyz)
3285  deriv1 = deriv1 + (dxxyz+dyxyz+dzxyz)
3286  end if
3287  if (ireca==2) then
3288  dxxyz = fe*float(kap)*afxrr(k)*hers(kah, axyz)
3289  dyxyz = fe*float(kap)*afyrr(k)*hers(kah, axyz)
3290  dzxyz = fe*float(kap)*afzrr(k)*hers(kah, axyz)
3291  deriv1 = deriv1 + (dxxyz+dyxyz+dzxyz)
3292  end if
3293  end do
3294  do k = 1, m
3295  kap = 2*(k-1)
3296  if (ireca==0) then
3297  dxxyz = -fe*afxm(k)*herm(kap, xyz)
3298  dyxyz = -fe*afym(k)*herm(kap, xyz)
3299  dzxyz = -fe*afzm(k)*herm(kap, xyz)
3300  deriv2 = deriv2 + .5*(dxxyz+dyxyz+dzxyz)
3301  end if
3302  if (ireca==1) then
3303  dxxyz = -fe*afxr(k)*herm(kap, xyz)
3304  dyxyz = -fe*afyr(k)*herm(kap, xyz)
3305  dzxyz = -fe*afzr(k)*herm(kap, xyz)
3306  deriv2 = deriv2 + .5*(dxxyz+dyxyz+dzxyz)
3307  end if
3308  if (ireca==2) then
3309  dxxyz = -fe*afxrr(k)*herm(kap, xyz)
3310  dyxyz = -fe*afyrr(k)*herm(kap, xyz)
3311  dzxyz = -fe*afzrr(k)*herm(kap, xyz)
3312  deriv2 = deriv2 + .5*(dxxyz+dyxyz+dzxyz)
3313  end if
3314  end do
3315  drxyz = -(deriv1+deriv2)/(3.*pi)
3316  m = msto
3317  return
3318  end function drxyz
3325  function hers(m, x)
3326  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
3327  dimension he(30)
3328 
3329  if (m==1) then
3330  hers = 1.
3331  return
3332  end if
3333  if (m==3) then
3334  hers = x*x - 3.
3335  return
3336  end if
3337  he(1) = 1.
3338  he(2) = x*x - 3.
3339  xm1 = float((m+1)/2) + .01
3340  m1 = int(xm1) - 2
3341  do k = 1, m1
3342  he(k+2) = herm(2*(k+2)-2, abs(x)) - float(2*(k+2)-2)*he(k+1)
3343  end do
3344  hers = he(m1+2)
3345  return
3346  end function hers
3354  function densx(m, x, ireca)
3355  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
3356  common /hermt/afxt(22), afyt(22), afzt(22)
3357  common /hermd/afxm(20), afym(20), afzm(20)
3358  common /hermr/afxr(20), afyr(20), afzr(20)
3359 
3360  densx = 0.
3361  do k = 1, m
3362  kap = k - 1
3363  if (ireca==0) densx = densx + exp(-x*x/2.)*afxt(k)*herm(2*kap, abs &
3364  (x))
3365  if (ireca==1) densx = densx + exp(-x*x/2.)*afxm(k)*herm(2*kap, abs &
3366  (x))
3367  end do
3368  return
3369  end function densx
3377  function densy(m, y, ireca)
3378  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
3379  common /hermt/afxt(22), afyt(22), afzt(22)
3380  common /hermd/afxm(20), afym(20), afzm(20)
3381  common /hermr/afxr(20), afyr(20), afzr(20)
3382 
3383  densy = 0.
3384  do k = 1, m
3385  kap = k - 1
3386  if (ireca==0) densy = densy + exp(-y*y/2.)*afyt(k)*herm(2*kap, abs &
3387  (y))
3388  if (ireca==1) densy = densy + exp(-y*y/2.)*afym(k)*herm(2*kap, abs &
3389  (y))
3390  end do
3391  return
3392  end function densy
3401  function denrs(xyz)
3402  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
3403  common /degherm/nmaz, nmazr, nmaxy
3404 
3405  sp1 = (densx(nmaxy,xyz,0)+densy(nmaxy,xyz,0))/3.
3406  sp2 = (densx(nmaxy,xyz,1)+densy(nmaxy,xyz,1))/3.
3407  denrs = sp1 - sp2 + densz(nmazr, xyz, 3)/3.
3408  return
3409  end function denrs
3417  function scgx(xi, xf)
3418  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
3419  common /degherm/nmaz, nmazr, nmaxy
3420  common /gaus13/h(13), t(13)
3421 
3422  cgx = 0.
3423  cgxx = 0.
3424  do i = 1, 13
3425  x = (xi+xf)/2. + (xf-xi)*t(i)/2.
3426  dend = (densx(nmaxy,x,0)-densx(nmaxy,x,1))
3427  cgx = cgx + h(i)*dend
3428  cgxx = cgxx + h(i)*dend*x
3429  end do
3430  cgx = cgx*(xf-xi)/2.
3431  cgxx = cgxx*(xf-xi)/2.
3432  scgx = cgxx/cgx
3433  return
3434  end function scgx
3442  function scgy(xi, xf)
3443  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
3444  common /degherm/nmaz, nmazr, nmaxy
3445  common /gaus13/h(13), t(13)
3446 
3447  cgy = 0.
3448  cgyy = 0.
3449  do i = 1, 13
3450  y = (xi+xf)/2. + (xf-xi)*t(i)/2.
3451  dend = (densy(nmaxy,y,0)-densy(nmaxy,y,1))
3452  cgy = cgy + h(i)*dend
3453  cgyy = cgyy + h(i)*dend*y
3454  end do
3455  cgy = cgy*(xf-xi)/2.
3456  cgyy = cgyy*(xf-xi)/2.
3457  scgy = cgyy/cgy
3458  return
3459  end function scgy
3474  subroutine cdg(idch)
3475  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
3476  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
3477  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
3478  common /etcha1/dav2(maxcell1, 33), ichas(iptsz), chasit
3479  common /etcom/cog(8), exten(17), fd(iptsz)
3480  common /dyn/tref, vref
3481  logical chasit
3482 
3483  cog(1) = 0.
3484  cog(3) = 0.
3485  cog(4) = 0.
3486  cog(5) = 0.
3487  cog(6) = 0.
3488  cog(7) = 0.
3489  imaxf = 0
3490  if (idch==1.) then
3491  do i = 1, ngood
3492  if (ichas(i)==1) then
3493  cog(1) = cog(1) + f(7, i)
3494  cog(3) = cog(3) + f(6, i)
3495  cog(4) = cog(4) + f(2, i)
3496  cog(5) = cog(5) + f(3, i)
3497  cog(6) = cog(6) + f(4, i)
3498  cog(7) = cog(7) + f(5, i)
3499  imaxf = imaxf + 1
3500  end if
3501  end do
3502  else
3503  do i = 1, ngood
3504  cog(1) = cog(1) + f(7, i)
3505  cog(3) = cog(3) + f(6, i)
3506  cog(4) = cog(4) + f(2, i)
3507  cog(5) = cog(5) + f(3, i)
3508  cog(6) = cog(6) + f(4, i)
3509  cog(7) = cog(7) + f(5, i)
3510  imaxf = imaxf + 1
3511  end do
3512  end if
3513  cog(1) = cog(1)/imaxf
3514  cog(3) = cog(3)/imaxf
3515  cog(4) = cog(4)/imaxf
3516  cog(5) = cog(5)/imaxf
3517  cog(6) = cog(6)/imaxf
3518  cog(7) = cog(7)/imaxf
3519  return
3520  end subroutine cdg
3552  subroutine ext2d(idch)
3553  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
3554  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
3555  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
3556  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
3557  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
3558  common /qmoyen/qmoy
3559  common /dyn/tref, vref
3560  common /etcom/cog(8), exten(17), fd(iptsz)
3561  common /etcha1/dav2(maxcell1, 33), ichas(iptsz), chasit
3562  dimension ffd(iptsz)
3563  logical chasit
3564 
3565  exten(1) = 0.
3566  exten(2) = 0.
3567  exten(3) = 0.
3568  exten(4) = 0.
3569  exten(5) = 0.
3570  exten(6) = 0.
3571  exten(7) = 0.
3572  exten(8) = 0.
3573  exten(9) = 0.
3574  exten(12) = 0.
3575  exten(13) = 0.
3576  exten(14) = 0.
3577  exten(15) = 0.
3578  exten(16) = 0.
3579  exten(17) = 0.
3580  qmoy = 0.
3581  ! --- imaxf: particles keep in the bunch. With CHASE imaxf may be
3582  ! different from ngood(i.e. imaxf < ngood)
3583  imaxf = 0
3584  gcog = cog(1)/xmat
3585  bcog = sqrt(1.-1./(gcog*gcog))
3586  bref = vref/vl
3587  gref = 1./sqrt(1.-bref*bref)
3588  do i = 1, ngood
3589  gpai = f(7, i)/xmat
3590  bpai = sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
3591  fd(i) = (gpai*bpai)/(gref*bref)
3592  ffd(i) = (gpai*bpai)/(gcog*bcog)
3593  end do
3594  do i = 1, ngood
3595  fdpp = fd(i) - 1.
3596  ffdpp = ffd(i) - 1.
3597  fdp = f(7, i) - cog(1)
3598  trph1 = fh*(f(6,i)-cog(3))
3599  trxf = f(2, i) - cog(4)
3600  trtf = f(3, i) - cog(5)
3601  tryf = f(4, i) - cog(6)
3602  trpf = f(5, i) - cog(7)
3603  ! --- with CHASE
3604  if (idch==1 .and. ichas(i)==1) then
3605  exten(1) = exten(1) + fdp**2
3606  exten(2) = exten(2) + trph1*fdp
3607  exten(3) = exten(3) + trph1**2
3608  exten(4) = exten(4) + trxf**2
3609  exten(5) = exten(5) + trtf**2
3610  exten(6) = exten(6) + tryf**2
3611  exten(7) = exten(7) + trpf**2
3612  exten(8) = exten(8) + trxf*trtf
3613  exten(9) = exten(9) + tryf*trpf
3614  exten(12) = exten(12) + fdpp*trxf
3615  exten(13) = exten(13) + fdpp*tryf
3616  exten(14) = exten(14) + fddp**2
3617  exten(15) = exten(15) + ffdpp*trxf
3618  exten(16) = exten(16) + ffdpp*tryf
3619  exten(17) = exten(17) + ffddp**2
3620  qmoy = qmoy + f(9, i)
3621  imaxf = imaxf + 1
3622  end if
3623  ! --- without CHASE
3624  if (idch/=1) then
3625  exten(1) = exten(1) + fdp**2
3626  exten(2) = exten(2) + trph1*fdp
3627  exten(3) = exten(3) + trph1**2
3628  exten(4) = exten(4) + trxf**2
3629  exten(5) = exten(5) + trtf**2
3630  exten(6) = exten(6) + tryf**2
3631  exten(7) = exten(7) + trpf**2
3632  exten(8) = exten(8) + trxf*trtf
3633  exten(9) = exten(9) + tryf*trpf
3634  exten(12) = exten(12) + fdpp*trxf
3635  exten(13) = exten(13) + fdpp*tryf
3636  exten(14) = exten(14) + fddp**2
3637  exten(15) = exten(15) + ffdpp*trxf
3638  exten(16) = exten(16) + ffdpp*tryf
3639  exten(17) = exten(17) + ffddp**2
3640  qmoy = qmoy + f(9, i)
3641  imaxf = imaxf + 1
3642  end if
3643  end do
3644  do i = 1, 9
3645  exten(i) = exten(i)/float(imaxf)
3646  end do
3647  do i = 12, 17
3648  exten(i) = exten(i)/float(imaxf)
3649  end do
3650  qmoy = qmoy/float(imaxf)
3651  return
3652  end subroutine ext2d
3691  subroutine ext2(idch)
3692  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
3693  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
3694  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
3695  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
3696  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
3697  common /qmoyen/qmoy
3698  common /dyn/tref, vref
3699  common /etcom/cog(8), exten(17), fd(iptsz)
3700  common /etcha1/dav2(maxcell1, 33), ichas(iptsz), chasit
3701  dimension fdd(iptsz)
3702  logical chasit
3703  ! EXT2 looks for average extensions squared and returns them in
3704  ! exten(14)
3705  exten(1) = 0.
3706  exten(2) = 0.
3707  exten(3) = 0.
3708  exten(4) = 0.
3709  exten(5) = 0.
3710  exten(6) = 0.
3711  exten(7) = 0.
3712  exten(8) = 0.
3713  exten(9) = 0.
3714  exten(10) = 0.
3715  exten(11) = 0.
3716  exten(12) = 0.
3717  exten(13) = 0.
3718  exten(14) = 0.
3719  exten(15) = 0.
3720  exten(16) = 0.
3721  exten(17) = 0.
3722  qmoy = 0.
3723  imaxf = 0
3724  gcog = cog(1)/xmat
3725  bcog = sqrt(1.-1./(gcog*gcog))
3726  bref = vref/vl
3727  gref = 1./sqrt(1.-bref*bref)
3728  do i = 1, ngood
3729  gpai = f(7, i)/xmat
3730  bpai = sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
3731  fd(i) = (gpai*bpai)/(gcog*bcog)
3732  fdd(i) = (gpai*bpai)/(gref*bref)
3733  end do
3734  do i = 1, ngood
3735  fdp = fd(i) - 1.
3736  fddp = fdd(i) - 1.
3737  dener = f(7, i) - cog(1)
3738  trph1 = fh*(f(6,i)-cog(3))
3739  trxf = f(2, i) - cog(4)
3740  trtf = f(3, i) - cog(5)
3741  tryf = f(4, i) - cog(6)
3742  trpf = f(5, i) - cog(7)
3743  if (idch==1 .and. ichas(i)==1) then
3744  exten(1) = exten(1) + fdp**2
3745  exten(2) = exten(2) + trph1*fdp
3746  exten(3) = exten(3) + trph1**2
3747  exten(4) = exten(4) + trxf**2
3748  exten(5) = exten(5) + trtf**2
3749  exten(6) = exten(6) + tryf**2
3750  exten(7) = exten(7) + trpf**2
3751  exten(8) = exten(8) + trxf*trtf
3752  exten(9) = exten(9) + tryf*trpf
3753  exten(10) = exten(10) + dener*dener
3754  exten(11) = exten(11) + dener*trph1
3755  exten(12) = exten(12) + fddp*trxf
3756  exten(13) = exten(13) + fddp*tryf
3757  exten(14) = exten(14) + fddp**2
3758  exten(15) = exten(15) + fdp*trxf
3759  exten(16) = exten(16) + fdp*tryf
3760  exten(17) = exten(17) + fdp**2
3761  qmoy = qmoy + f(9, i)
3762  imaxf = imaxf + 1
3763  end if
3764  if (idch/=1) then
3765  exten(1) = exten(1) + fdp**2
3766  exten(2) = exten(2) + trph1*fdp
3767  exten(3) = exten(3) + trph1**2
3768  exten(4) = exten(4) + trxf**2
3769  exten(5) = exten(5) + trtf**2
3770  exten(6) = exten(6) + tryf**2
3771  exten(7) = exten(7) + trpf**2
3772  exten(8) = exten(8) + trxf*trtf
3773  exten(9) = exten(9) + tryf*trpf
3774  exten(10) = exten(10) + dener*dener
3775  exten(11) = exten(11) + dener*trph1
3776  exten(12) = exten(12) + fddp*trxf
3777  exten(13) = exten(13) + fddp*tryf
3778  exten(14) = exten(14) + fddp**2
3779  exten(15) = exten(15) + fdp*trxf
3780  exten(16) = exten(16) + fdp*tryf
3781  exten(17) = exten(17) + fdp**2
3782  qmoy = qmoy + f(9, i)
3783  imaxf = imaxf + 1
3784  end if
3785  end do
3786  do i = 1, 17
3787  exten(i) = exten(i)/float(imaxf)
3788  end do
3789  qmoy = qmoy/float(imaxf)
3790  return
3791  end subroutine ext2
3792  ! SUBROUTINE mfordre(rc,ra,rb)
3793  ! .................................................................
3794  ! Calculates RC=RA*RB
3795  ! .................................................................
3796  ! implicit real*8 (a-h,o-z)
3797  ! DIMENSION RA(6,6), RB(6,6), RC(6,6)
3798  ! DO I1 = 1, 6
3799  ! DO I2 = 1, 6
3800  ! GHOST = 0.0
3801  ! DO I3 = 1, 6
3802  ! GHOST = GHOST + RA(I1,I3)*RB(I3,I2)
3803  ! ENDDO
3804  ! RC(I1,I2) = GHOST
3805  ! ENDDO
3806  ! ENDDO
3807  ! RETURN
3808  ! END
3818  subroutine chrefe
3819  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
3820  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
3821  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
3822  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
3823  common /qmoyen/qmoy
3824  common /tapes/in, ifile, meta
3825 
3826  read (in, *) xc, yc, a
3827  a = a*pi/180.
3828  write (16, 100) xc, yc, a
3829  do i = 1, ngood
3830  x = f(2, i)
3831  xp = f(3, i)*0.001
3832  yp = f(5, i)*0.001
3833  y = f(4, i)
3834  x0 = x
3835  x = ((x-yc)*cos(xp)+xc*sin(xp))/cos(xp-a)
3836  xp = xp - a
3837  xl = xc - x*sin(a)
3838  yl = yc - x0 + x*cos(a)
3839  dl = sqrt(xl*xl+yl*yl)
3840  dl = sign(dl, xl)
3841  y = y + dl*tan(yp)
3842  f(2, i) = x
3843  f(3, i) = xp*1000.
3844  f(4, i) = y
3845  f(5, i) = yp*1000.
3846  end do
3847 100 format (' New reference frame XC =', f6.2, ' CM , YC =', f6.2, &
3848  ' CM , A =', f6.4, ' RADIAN', ///)
3849  return
3850  end subroutine chrefe
3865  subroutine etac
3866  use randlux
3867  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
3868  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
3869  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
3870  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
3871  common /qmoyen/qmoy
3872  common /tapes/in, ifile, meta
3873  common /mcs/imcs, ncstat, cstat(20)
3874  dimension charge(20), pcent(20), charm(20), pc(20), eoff(20), vecx(1)
3875  dimension foo(20, 9), ndp(20)
3876  character *80 myfile
3877 
3878  read (in, *) ncstat
3879  n = ncstat
3880  if (n>20) then
3881  write (16, 140) n
3882  stop
3883  end if
3884  imcs = 1
3885  if (n==0) then
3886  ! read charge state distribution from file
3887  ! et2010 open(56,file='dynac_cs_in.dst',status='unknown')
3888  read (in, 3333) myfile(1:80)
3889 3333 format (a80)
3890  write (16, *) 'Charge state distribution file: ', myfile(1:80)
3891  open (56, file=myfile, status='unknown')
3892  read (56, *) ntot
3893  write (16, *) 'Maximum number of particles:', imax
3894  write (16, *) 'Number of good particles:', ngood
3895  write (16, *) 'Number of particles in charge state file:', ntot
3896  if (ntot<ngood) then
3897  write (16, *) 'Not enough particles in charge state file'
3898  stop
3899  end if
3900  do j = 1, ntot
3901  read (56, *) chstate
3902  f(9, i) = chstate
3903  end do
3904  close (56)
3905  else
3906  ! generate charge state distribution
3907  pourc = 0.
3908  do i = 1, n
3909  ! for each charge state read charge, percentage and energy
3910  ! offset
3911  read (in, *) charm(i), pc(i), eoff(i)
3912  cstat(i) = charm(i)
3913  pourc = pourc + pc(i)
3914  if (pourc>100.) then
3915  write (16, 100) i, pourc
3916  stop
3917  end if
3918  end do
3919  pourc = 0.
3920  do i = 1, n
3921  ! WRITE(16,110) charm(I),PC(I),eoff(i)
3922  pourc = pourc + pc(i)
3923  end do
3924  if (pourc/=100.) then
3925  write (16, 120) pourc
3926  stop
3927  end if
3928  j = 1
3929 25 continue
3930  ts = 500.
3931  is = 1
3932  do i = 1, n
3933  if (ts>=charm(i)) then
3934  ts = charm(i)
3935  is = i
3936  end if
3937  end do
3938  charge(j) = ts
3939  pcent(j) = pc(is)
3940  charm(is) = 1000.
3941  j = j + 1
3942  if (j<=n) go to 25
3943  write (16, *) '**********************'
3944  ! for each charge state write charge, percentage and energy offset
3945  jjj = 0
3946  do i = 1, n
3947  write (16, 110) charge(i), pcent(i), eoff(i)
3948  if (charge(i)==qst) jjj = 1
3949  end do
3950  len = 1
3951  ! FIRST TRAJECTORY HAS CHARGE STATE AS DEFINED BY INPUT
3952  ! omment f(9,1)=Q
3953  ! et*2012*march*18 f(9,1)=qst
3954  pcent(1) = pcent(1)/100.
3955  do i = 2, n
3956  pcent(i) = pcent(i-1) + pcent(i)/100.
3957  end do
3958  ! et*2012*march*18 DO I=2,IMAX
3959  do i = 1, imax
3960  call rlux(vecx, len)
3961  xarpha = vecx(1)
3962  if (xarpha<=pcent(1)) then
3963  f(9, i) = charge(1)
3964  f(7, i) = f(7, i) + eoff(1)
3965  else
3966  do j = 1, n - 1
3967  if (xarpha>pcent(j) .and. xarpha<=pcent(j+1)) then
3968  f(7, i) = f(7, i) + eoff(j+1)
3969  f(9, i) = charge(j+1)
3970  end if
3971  end do
3972  end if
3973  end do
3974  end if
3975  ! *et*2012*March*02 print energy, boro for each charge state
3976  do k = 1, ncstat
3977  ndp(k) = 0
3978  do j = 2, 7
3979  foo(k, j) = 0.
3980  end do
3981  end do
3982  do i = 1, imax
3983  do k = 1, ncstat
3984  if (f(9,i)==cstat(k)) then
3985  ndp(k) = ndp(k) + 1
3986  do j = 2, 7
3987  foo(k, j) = foo(k, j) + f(j, i)
3988  end do
3989  end if
3990  end do
3991  end do
3992  do k = 1, ncstat
3993  do j = 2, 7
3994  foo(k, j) = foo(k, j)/float(ndp(k))
3995  end do
3996  end do
3997  do k = 1, ncstat
3998  gref = foo(k, 7)/xmat
3999  bref = sqrt(1.-1./(gref*gref))
4000  xe = (gref-1.)*xmat
4001  ! magnetic rigidity
4002  bor = 3.3356*xmat*bref*gref/cstat(k)
4003  write (16, *) ' Q: ', cstat(k), ' COG : energy ', xe, &
4004  ' MeV momentum ', bor, ' kG.cm'
4005  end do
4006 100 format (3x, ' WRONG PERCENTAGE IN CHARGE STATE DISTRIBUTION', /, 4x, &
4007  ' CHARGE STATE ', i3, ' PERCENTAGE ', e12.5)
4008 110 format (3x, ' CHARGE STATE ', f6.1, ' PERCENTAGE ', e12.5, ' %', 4x, &
4009  ' ENERGY OFFSET ', e12.5, ' MeV')
4010 120 format (3x, ' TOTAL PERCENTAGE OF ALL CHARGE STATES < 100 %', /, 4x, &
4011  ' PERCENTAGE ', e12.5)
4012 140 format (3x, ' NUMBER OF CHARGE STATES : ', i3, ' GREATER THAN 20')
4013  return
4014  end subroutine etac
4023  subroutine crest(betr, eqvl, xpos, bkcr, ffield)
4024  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
4025  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
4026  common /func/a(200), ylg, atte, ncel, nharm
4027  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
4028 
4029  xlhe = ylg
4030  itr = 0
4031  be1 = betr
4032  be2 = betr - 8.333e-03*betr
4033  xleq = xlhe
4034 456 continue
4035  itr = itr + 1
4036  xk1 = fh/(vl*be1)
4037  xk2 = fh/(vl*be2)
4038  t1 = tta0(be1)*ffield
4039  s1 = tsb0(be1)*ffield
4040  tp1 = tta1(be1)*ffield
4041  sp1 = tsb1(be1)*ffield
4042  t2 = tta0(be2)*ffield
4043  s2 = tsb0(be2)*ffield
4044  tp2 = tta1(be2)*ffield
4045  sp2 = tsb1(be2)*ffield
4046  dts = (t1*tp1+s1*sp1)/(t1*t1+s1*s1)
4047  a1k12 = (t1*tp1+s1*sp1)/(t2*tp2+s2*sp2)
4048  a2k12 = (t2*t2+s2*s2)/(t1*t1+s1*s1)
4049  ak12 = a1k12*a2k12
4050  ak12 = 1./ak12
4051  bk12 = (xk2-xk1)/(ak12-1.)
4052  bk12 = bk12*dts
4053  desy = -4.*atan(dts*3.2/xleq)
4054  ! improve DESYNCHRONISATION
4055  epsrd = 1.e-04
4056  if (abs(desy)>=epsrd) then
4057  ! omment write(6,*) ' desy ',itr,abs(desy)
4058  ! omment pause
4059  til2 = desy/2.
4060  do iii = 1, 3
4061  ftil = til2/tan(til2) - 1. - bk12
4062  dftil = -til2/(sin(til2)*sin(til2)) + 1./tan(til2)
4063  til2 = til2 - ftil/dftil
4064  end do
4065  desy = til2*2.
4066  end if
4067  if (abs(desy)<epsrd) then
4068  xpos = (t1*sp1-s1*tp1)/(t1*t1+s1*s1)
4069  bkcr = sqrt(t1*t1+s1*s1)
4070  eqvl = xleq
4071  return
4072  end if
4073  ! calculates the equivalent length
4074  xleq = desy*(ak12-1.)/(xk2-xk1)
4075  deltk = desy/xleq
4076  xkcrt = xk1 - deltk
4077  becrt = fh/(vl*xkcrt)
4078  be1 = becrt
4079  be2 = becrt - becrt/120.
4080  go to 456
4081  end subroutine crest
4097  subroutine gaus(r1, r2, z1, z2, opt, er, ez)
4098  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
4099  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
4100  dimension r(6), z(6), wr(6), wz(6), xx(3, 3), wx(3, 3)
4101  data ((xx(i,j),i=1,3), j=1, 3)/.2113248654, 0.0, 0.0, .06943184420, &
4102  .33000947820, 0.0, .03376524290, .16939530680, .3806904070/
4103  data ((wx(i,j),i=1,3), j=1, 3)/.50, 0.0, 0.0, .17392742260, &
4104  .32607257740, 0.0, .085662246190, .1803807865000, .2339569673000/
4105 
4106  cr = r2 - r1
4107  cz = z2 - z1
4108  ir = 1
4109  jz = 1
4110  m = 1
4111  if (opt<0.) go to 20
4112  ! ---determine number of integration points
4113  rat = abs(cz/cr)
4114  l = 0
4115  if (rat>=1.) go to 10
4116  rat = 1./rat
4117  l = 1
4118 10 if (rat>2.) m = 2
4119  if (rat>4.) m = 3
4120  if (l==0) jz = m
4121  if (l==1) ir = m
4122 20 do i = 1, ir
4123  k = 2*i - 1
4124  r(k) = r1 + cr*xx(i, ir)
4125  r(k+1) = r2 - cr*xx(i, ir)
4126  wr(k) = wx(i, ir)
4127  wr(k+1) = wx(i, ir)
4128  end do
4129  do j = 1, jz
4130  k = 2*j - 1
4131  z(k) = z1 + cz*xx(j, jz)
4132  z(k+1) = z2 - cz*xx(j, jz)
4133  wz(k) = wx(j, jz)
4134  wz(k+1) = wx(j, jz)
4135  end do
4136  ser = 0.
4137  sez = 0.
4138  kr = 2*ir
4139  kz = 2*jz
4140  do i = 1, kr
4141  do j = 1, kz
4142  call flds(r(i), z(j), er1, ez1)
4143  ser = ser + wr(i)*wz(j)*er1*r(i)
4144  sez = sez + wr(i)*wz(j)*ez1*r(i)
4145  end do
4146  end do
4147  er = cr*cz*ser
4148  ez = cr*cz*sez
4149  return
4150  end subroutine gaus
4157  subroutine flds(r, z, er, ez)
4158  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
4159  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
4160  common /fldcom/rp, zp, pl, opt, nip
4161  ! TEST*****
4162  r1 = rp
4163  z1 = zp
4164  ! **********************************
4165  d = z1 - z
4166  c = (r1-r)**2
4167  b = (r1+r)**2
4168  a = 4.0*r*r1/(b+d**2)
4169  call eint(a, ee, ek)
4170  er1 = 0.0
4171  a = sqrt(b+d**2)
4172  if (r1==0.) go to 10
4173  er1 = (ek-(r**2-r1**2+d**2)*ee/(c+d**2))/(2.0*r1*a)
4174 10 ez1 = d*ee/(a*(c+d**2))
4175  if (nip==0) go to 50
4176  do i = 1, nip
4177  xi = i
4178  do j = 1, 2
4179  d = z1 - (z+xi*pl)
4180  a = 4.0*r*r1/(b+d**2)
4181  call eint(a, ee, ek)
4182  a = sqrt(b+d**2)
4183  if (r1==0.) go to 20
4184  er1 = er1 + (ek-(r**2-r1**2+d**2)*ee/(c+d**2))/(2.0*r1*a)
4185 20 ez1 = ez1 + d*ee/(a*(c+d**2))
4186  xi = -xi
4187  end do
4188  end do
4189 50 er = er1
4190  ez = ez1
4191  return
4192  end subroutine flds
4199  subroutine eint(a, ee, ek)
4200  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
4201  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
4202 
4203  b = 1.0 - a
4204  c = log(b)
4205  ee = 1.0 + b*(.4630106-0.2452740*c+b*(0.1077857-0.04125321*c))
4206  ek = 1.38629436 - .5*c + b*(0.1119697-0.1213486*c+b*(.07253230- &
4207  .028874721*c))
4208  return
4209  end subroutine eint
4216  subroutine tiltz(tilta)
4217  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
4218  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
4219  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
4220  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
4221  common /qmoyen/qmoy
4222  common /rigid/boro
4223  common /dyn/tref, vref
4224  common /tapes/in, ifile, meta
4225  common /etcom/cog(8), exten(17), fd(iptsz)
4226 
4227  write (16, 1) tilta
4228 1 format (' tilt in the plane (x,z) around the c.o.g', ' ANGLE :', &
4229  e12.5, ' DEG', /)
4230  tilta = tilta*pi/180.
4231  tref = 0.
4232  vref = 0.
4233  do i = 1, imax
4234  gpai = f(7, i)/xmat
4235  vref = vref + vl*sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
4236  tref = tref + f(6, i)
4237  end do
4238  vref = vref/float(imax)
4239  tref = tref/float(imax)
4240  vref1 = 0.
4241  tref1 = 0.
4242  do i = 1, imax
4243  gpai = f(7, i)/xmat
4244  vpai = sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))*vl
4245  trot = (f(6,i)-tref)*cos(tilta) - sin(tilta)*f(2, i)/vpai
4246  xrot = (f(6,i)-tref)*sin(tilta)*vpai + cos(tilta)*f(2, i)
4247  f(6, i) = trot
4248  f(2, i) = xrot
4249  tref1 = tref1 + f(6, i)
4250  vref1 = vref1 + vpai
4251  end do
4252  tref = tref1/float(imax)
4253  vref = vref1/float(imax)
4254  return
4255  end subroutine tiltz
4271  subroutine rfq_o3
4272  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
4273  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
4274  common /rigid/boro
4275  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
4276  common /dyn/tref, vref
4277  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
4278  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
4279  common /tapes/in, ifile, meta
4280  common /davcom/dav1(maxcell1, 40), davtot, iitem(maxcell1), idav
4281  common /etcom/cog(8), exten(17), fd(iptsz)
4282  common /sc3/beamc, scdist, sce10, cplm, ect, apl, ichaes, iscsp
4283  common /fene/wdisp, wphas, wx, wy, rlim, ifw
4284  common /dcspa/iesp
4285  common /pltprf/sprfx(3000), sprfy(3000), sprfl(3000), sprfw(3000), &
4286  sprfp(3000), sprng(3000), iprf
4287  common /compt/nrres, nrtre, nrbunc, nrdbun
4288  common /shif/dtiph, shift
4289  common /femt/iemgrw, iemqesg
4290  common /posc/xpsc
4291  common /cgtof/charm(20), cgtdv(20), nbch(20), netac
4292  common /drfq/p(9)
4293  character *1 cr
4294  common /azlist/icont, iprin
4295  common /trfq/icour, ncell
4296  logical iesp, ichaes, shift, iemgrw, iflag
4297  common /itvole/itvol, imamin
4298  common /tofev/ttvols
4299  logical itvol, imamin
4300  ! allow for print out on terminal of gap# on one and the same line
4301  cr = char(13)
4302  ! omment WRITE(6,8254) NRTRE,NRRES,cr
4303  ! write(6,8254) nrtre,ncell,cr
4304  ! 8254 format('Transport element:',i5,
4305  ! * ' RFQ cell :',i5,a1,$)
4306  iflag = .false.
4307  radian = pi/180.
4308  ilost = 0
4309  twopi = 2.*pi
4310  ! convert vl in m
4311  vlm = vl/100.
4312  ! STATISTIQUES FOR PLOTS
4313  if (iprf==1) call stapl(davtot*10.)
4314  vorsq = p(1)
4315  av = p(2)
4316  cl = p(3)
4317  type = p(5)
4318  write (16, *) '*** cell :', ncell + 1, ' length (cm): ', cl*100.
4319  write (16, *) '*** V/r0**2 (kV/mm**2): ', vorsq/1000.
4320  write (16, *) '*** AV (kV): ', av*1000.
4321  if (type==0.) write (16, *) '*** no acceleration, standard cell '
4322  if (type==1.) write (16, *) '*** acceleration, standard cell '
4323  if (type==2.) write (16, *) &
4324  '*** no acceleration, fringing field region '
4325  if (type==3.) write (16, *) '*** acceleration, fringing field region '
4326  wavel = 2.*pi*vlm/fh
4327  er = xmat
4328  cay = pi/cl
4329  ns = 18
4330  xl = cl/float(ns)
4331  hl = .5*xl
4332  ! ---- scl: space charge length (in cm SCHEFF unit)
4333  scl = cl*100.
4334  ! ---- c.o.g of the bunch at the entrance of the cell
4335  tcog = 0.
4336  ecog = 0.
4337  ! old qcog=0.
4338  do i = 1, ngood
4339  tcog = tcog + f(6, i)
4340  ecog = ecog + f(7, i)
4341  ! old qcog=qcog+f(9,i)
4342  end do
4343  tcog = tcog/float(ngood)
4344  ecog = ecog/float(ngood)
4345  ! old qcog=qcog/float(ngood)
4346  gcog = ecog/er
4347  bcog = sqrt(1.-1./(gcog*gcog))
4348  wcog = ecog - er
4349  if (ncell==0) then
4350  ! ---- shift = .false. ==> synchronous particle coincide with cog
4351  ! in the cell ncell = 0
4352  if (.not. shift) then
4353  write (16, *) '*** ref. part. and cog coincide in ncell = 0'
4354  tref = tcog
4355  bref = bcog
4356  vref = bref*vl
4357  gref = gcog
4358  wref = wcog
4359  wrefi = wref
4360  else
4361  ! ---- shift = .true. ==> the reference particle and the cog
4362  ! are different at the entrance of the RFQ
4363  write (16, *) '*** ref. part. and cog separated in ncell = 0'
4364  bref = vref/vl
4365  gref = 1./sqrt(1.-bref*bref)
4366  wref = er*(gref-1.)
4367  wrefi = wref
4368  end if
4369  end if
4370  if (type>1.) then
4371  cay = .5*cay
4372  ns = int(36.*cl/(bref*wavel))
4373  end if
4374  write (16, 178)
4375 178 format (/, ' Dynamics at input', /, 5x, &
4376  ' BETA GAMMA ENERGY(MeV) ', &
4377  ' TOF(deg) TOF(sec)')
4378  write (16, 1788) bcog, gcog, wcog, tcog*fh*180./pi, tcog
4379 1788 format (' COG ', f7.5, 3x, e12.5, 1x, e12.5, 3x, e12.5, 3x, e12.5)
4380  write (16, 165) bref, gref, wref, tref*fh*180./pi, tref
4381 165 format (' REF ', f7.5, 3x, e12.5, 1x, e12.5, 3x, e12.5, 3x, e12.5)
4382  ! start prints in file 'short.data'
4383  idav = idav + 1
4384  iitem(idav) = 14
4385  dav1(idav, 1) = cl*1000.
4386  dav1(idav, 2) = vorsq/1000.
4387  dav1(idav, 3) = av*1000
4388  davtot = davtot + cl*100.
4389  dav1(idav, 4) = davtot*10.
4390  dav1(idav, 5) = type
4391  ! ---- phini: phase of the reference at input of the cell
4392  phini = -tref*fh + p(4)*radian
4393  ph0 = phini*180./pi
4394  write (16, 3945) ph0, p(4)
4395 3945 format ('phase offset at input : ', e12.5, ' deg phase shift: ', &
4396  e12.5, ' deg')
4397  ! --- the cell is divided in ns elements of length xl(m)
4398  z = 0.
4399  do n = 1, ns
4400  z = z + hl
4401  ! ---- change of synchronous particle over the half step hl = xl/2
4402  tref = tref + hl/(bref*vlm)
4403  if (itvol) ttvols = tref
4404  phref = tref*fh + phini
4405  skz = sin(cay*z)
4406  ckz = cos(cay*z)
4407  ! --- cell with fringing field (TYPE > 1)
4408  if (type>1.) then
4409  c3kz = cos(3.*cay*z)
4410  skz = .75*(skz+sin(3.*cay*z))
4411  end if
4412  ! ------ CHANGE OF ENERGY OVER STEP XL
4413  if (type/=0. .and. type/=2.) then
4414  sp = sin(phref)
4415  dwref = .5*qst*cay*av*skz*sp*xl
4416  wrefm = wref + 0.5*dwref
4417  grefm = wrefm/er + 1.
4418  brefm = sqrt(1.-1./(grefm*grefm))
4419  wref = wref + dwref
4420  gref = wref/er + 1.
4421  bref = sqrt(1.-1./(gref*gref))
4422  ! c dez=.5*qst*cay*av*skz*sp
4423  ! c dref=.5*(dez/er) * xl*xl/(brefm**3*grefm**3*vlm)
4424  end if
4425  ! start computations of particles
4426  do ip = 1, ngood
4427  ! convert in m and rad
4428  xi = f(2, ip)*1.e-02
4429  xpi = f(3, ip)*1.e-03
4430  yi = f(4, ip)*1.e-02
4431  ypi = f(5, ip)*1.e-03
4432  ww = f(7, ip) - er
4433  gi = ww/er + 1.
4434  bi = sqrt(1.-1./(gi*gi))
4435  bgi = bi*gi
4436  tim = f(6, ip) + hl/(bi*vlm)
4437  phi = phini + fh*tim
4438  qq = abs(f(9,ip))
4439  sp = sin(phi)
4440  cp = cos(phi)
4441  bav = bi
4442  gav = gi
4443  bgav = bgi
4444  bg = bgi
4445  beta = bi
4446  delt = 0.
4447  amort = 1.
4448  xm = xi + xpi*hl
4449  ym = yi + ypi*hl
4450  rm = sqrt(xm*xm+ym*ym)
4451  ! ---- the particle is lost if rm>rlim (rlim is the limit of
4452  ! REJECT)
4453  ! rlim is converted in m
4454  ! rlimm=rlim*1.e-02
4455  if (rm>rlimm) then
4456  f(8, ip) = 0.
4457  iflag = .true.
4458  ilost = ilost + 1
4459  write (16, 5556) ip, rm, rlimm
4460 5556 format (' § particle lost: ', i5, ' radius (m): ', e12.5, &
4461  ' barrier (m):', e12.5)
4462  go to 6525
4463  end if
4464  theta = 0.
4465  xml = xm
4466  yml = ym
4467  if (abs(xm)>1.e-10) theta = atan(ym/xm)
4468  if (abs(xm)<=1.e-10) then
4469  if (abs(ym)>1.e-10) then
4470  if (xm>=0. .and. ym>0.) theta = pi/2
4471  if (xm>=0. .and. ym<0.) theta = -pi/2
4472  if (xm<0. .and. ym<0.) theta = pi/2
4473  if (xm<0. .and. ym>0.) theta = -pi/2
4474  end if
4475  if (abs(ym)<=1.e-10) theta = 0.
4476  end if
4477  zrm = cay*rm
4478  ! ----- Bessel functions I0 and I1
4479  ! omment
4480  ! bi0=1.+zrm*zrm/4.+zrm**4/64.+zrm**6/2304.+zrm**8/1.47456e05
4481  bi0 = 1. + zrm*zrm/4. + zrm**4/64. + zrm**6/2304.
4482  bi1 = zrm/2. + zrm**3/16.
4483  ! transverse fields ex and ey
4484  erf = vorsq*cos(2.*theta)*2.*rm + cay*(av*bi1)*ckz
4485  erf = -erf/2.
4486  etf = vorsq*sin(theta)*2.*rm
4487  etf = etf/2.
4488  ex = erf*cos(theta) - etf*sin(theta)
4489  ey = erf*sin(theta) + etf*cos(theta)
4490  ! ---- change the energy over step xl
4491  if (type/=0. .and. type/=2.) then
4492  ! ---- energy at the middle of the element
4493  ! ------ standard cell
4494  if (type<2.) then
4495  ez = 0.5*(av*bi0)*skz*cay
4496  dw = qq*ez*sp*xl
4497  ! ------ fringe-field cell
4498  else
4499  dw = .5*qq*cay*avb*skz*sp*xl
4500  end if
4501  wav = ww + .5*dw
4502  ga = wav/er
4503  bgav = sqrt(ga*(2.+ga))
4504  gav = 1. + ga
4505  bav = bgav/gav
4506  ! ---- energy over the step xl
4507  ww = ww + dw
4508  ga = ww/er
4509  gam = 1. + ga
4510  bg = sqrt(ga*(2.+ga))
4511  beta = sqrt(1.-1/(gam*gam))
4512  ! calculate the jump of phase (in sec)
4513  if (type<2.) dez = qq*ez*sp
4514  if (type>2.) dez = .5*qq*cay*avb*skz*sp
4515  delt = .5*(dez/er)*xl*xl/(bav**3*gav**3*vlm)
4516  amort = bgi/bg
4517  end if
4518  bgfac = gav*bav**2
4519  ! ----- IF TYPE LT 2: standard cell
4520  if (type<2.) then
4521  cc = qq*xl*sp/(bgfac*er)
4522  signx = 1.
4523  signy = 1.
4524  if (theta>0.) then
4525  if (xm<0.) signx = -1.
4526  if (ym<0.) signy = -1.
4527  end if
4528  if (theta<0.) then
4529  if (xm<0.) signx = -1.
4530  if (ym>0.) signy = -1.
4531  end if
4532  if (theta==0.) then
4533  signx = 0.
4534  signy = 0.
4535  end if
4536  rr1 = cc*ex*signx
4537  rr2 = cc*ey*signy
4538  xpm = xpi*amort + rr1
4539  ypm = ypi*amort + rr2
4540  else
4541  ! ----- fringe-field cell (first order in transverse
4542  ! directions)
4543  ! ********************************************************
4544  !*
4545  ! C1 = (1/m**2) * (m) = (1/m)
4546  ! C2 = (1/m**2) * (m) = (1/m)
4547  ! RF1 = (MeV/(MeV*m**2)) = (1/m**2)
4548  ! RF2 = (MeV/MeV) * (1/m**2) = (1/m**2)
4549  ! *******************************************************
4550  rf1 = qq*vorb/er
4551  rf2 = .25*qq*cay*cay*avb/er
4552  c1 = rf1*sp*xl/bgfac
4553  c2 = rf2*ckz*sp*xl/bgfac
4554  c1 = c1*.75*(ckz+c3kz/3.)
4555  c2 = c2*.75*(ckz+3.*c3kz)
4556  rr1 = -(c1+c2)
4557  rr2 = (c1-c2)
4558  xpm = xpi*amort + rr1*xm
4559  ypm = ypi*amort + rr2*ym
4560  end if
4561  xf = xm + xpm*hl
4562  yf = ym + ypm*hl
4563  ! convert m->cm , rad->mrad
4564  f(2, ip) = xf*100.
4565  f(4, ip) = yf*100.
4566  f(3, ip) = xpm*1000.
4567  f(5, ip) = ypm*1000.
4568  ! tof over the length xl
4569  f(6, ip) = f(6, ip) + hl/(bi*vlm) + hl/(beta*vlm) + delt
4570  f(7, ip) = ww + er
4571  ! ----- print in file 49 coordinates of particle icont (not
4572  ! active)
4573  ! omment if(ip.eq.icont) then
4574  ! omment
4575  ! write(49,8888)n,icour,z,signx,signy,ex,ey,theta,xml,yml,rr1,
4576  !rr2
4577  ! omment icour=icour+1
4578  ! omment endif
4579  ! omment8888 format(2(2x,i5),10(2x,e12.5))
4580  ! ----
4581  ! ************************************************************
4582  !********
4583 6525 continue
4584  end do
4585  ! ----- reshuffle good particles
4586  if (iflag) then
4587  call shuffle
4588  iflag = .false.
4589  end if
4590  ! space charge at the middle of the cell (revoir pour fringe
4591  ! field cell)
4592  if (n==9) then
4593  if (ichaes) then
4594  ! Charge space
4595  iesp = .true.
4596  call cesp(scl)
4597  iesp = .false.
4598  end if
4599  end if
4600  tref = tref + hl/(bref*vlm) + dref
4601  if (itvol) ttvols = tref
4602  vref = bref*vl
4603  z = z + hl
4604  ! Change dp/p over the cell
4605  call disp
4606  end do
4607  ! --- kept in the bunch particles such that phase RF > 180 deg or
4608  ! phase RF < -180 deg
4609  do i = 1, ngood
4610  dtvl = (f(6,i)-tref)*fh
4611  if (dtvl>pi) f(6, i) = f(6, i) - 2.*pi/fh
4612  if (dtvl<-pi) f(6, i) = f(6, i) + 2.*pi/fh
4613  end do
4614  ! ---- c.o.g of the bunch at the output of the cell
4615  tcog = 0.
4616  ecog = 0.
4617  do i = 1, ngood
4618  tcog = tcog + f(6, i)
4619  ecog = ecog + f(7, i)
4620  end do
4621  tcog = tcog/float(ngood)
4622  ecog = ecog/float(ngood)
4623  gcog = ecog/er
4624  bcog = sqrt(1.-1./(gcog*gcog))
4625  wcog = ecog - er
4626  ! --- window control relative to the energy of the c.o.g of the bunch
4627  ! ---- ifw = 0 ===> wdisp = dW/W
4628  ! ---- ifw = 1 ===> wdisp = dW (MeV)
4629  ! ----- convert wdisp in dp/p
4630  if (ifw==0) dispr = gcog*gcog*wdisp/(gcog*(gcog+1.))
4631  if (ifw==1) dispr = gcog*gcog*wdisp/(gcog*(gcog+1.)*wcog)
4632  iflag = .false.
4633  do i = 1, ngood
4634  dese = abs(fd(i)-1.)
4635  if (dese>dispr) then
4636  ilost = ilost + 1
4637  f(8, i) = 0.
4638  write (16, *) '§ particle lost: ', i, ' dp/p: ', dese, &
4639  ' in window :', dispr
4640  iflag = .true.
4641  end if
4642  end do
4643  if (iflag) then
4644  call shuffle
4645  ! ---- c.o.g of the bunch after shuffle
4646  tcog = 0.
4647  ecog = 0.
4648  do i = 1, ngood
4649  tcog = tcog + f(6, i)
4650  ecog = ecog + f(7, i)
4651  end do
4652  tcog = tcog/float(ngood)
4653  ecog = ecog/float(ngood)
4654  gcog = ecog/er
4655  bcog = sqrt(1.-1./(gcog*gcog))
4656  wcog = ecog - er
4657  end if
4658  write (16, 179)
4659 179 format (/, ' Dynamics at the output', /, 5x, &
4660  ' BETA GAMMA ENERGY(MeV) ', &
4661  ' TOF(deg) TOF(sec)')
4662  write (16, 1788) bcog, gcog, wcog, tcog*fh*180./pi, tcog
4663  write (16, 165) bref, gref, wref, tref*fh*180./pi, tref
4664  write (16, *) ' time of flight: ', ttvols*fh*180./pi, ' deg'
4665 
4666  ! et2010s
4667  ! dphete,dav1(idav,16),dav1(idav,21) and dav1(idav,12) still to be
4668  ! assigned correct value
4669  dphete = 0.
4670  emns = 0.
4671  tofprt = fh*tcog*180./pi
4672  n2kp = int(tofprt/360.)
4673  tofprt = tofprt - float(n2kp)*360.
4674  if (tofprt>180.) tofprt = tofprt - 360.
4675  ! cavity number, transmission (%), synchronous phase (deg), time of
4676  ! flight (deg) (within 180 deg and 180 deg),
4677  ! COG relativistic beta (@ output), COG output energy (MeV), REF
4678  ! relativistic beta (@ output), REF output energy (MeV),
4679  ! horizontal emittance (mm.mrad, RMS normalized), vertical emittance
4680  ! (mm.mrad, RMS normalized),
4681  ! longitudinal emittance (RMS, ns.keV) <- still to be implemented
4682  ! (=emns)
4683  trnsms = 100.*float(ngood)/float(imax)
4684  if (ncell==1) write (50, *) '# rfq_o3.dmp'
4685  write (50, 7023) ncell, trnsms, p(4), tofprt, bcog, wccog, bets, wref, &
4686  0.25*dav1(idav, 16), 0.25*dav1(idav, 21), 0.25*emns
4687 7023 format (1x, i4, 1x, f6.2, 2(1x,f8.3), 2(1x,f7.5,1x,f11.4), &
4688  3(1x,f11.4))
4689  ! et2010e
4690 
4691  ! ---- new magnetic rigidity of the reference
4692  xmor = xmat*bref*gref
4693  boro = 33.356*xmor*1.e-01/qst
4694  dav1(idav, 6) = (gref-1.)*er - wrefi
4695  dav1(idav, 36) = ngood
4696  ! plots
4697  call stapl(davtot*10.)
4698  call emiprt(0)
4699  ncell = ncell + 1
4700  return
4701  end subroutine rfq_o3
4722  subroutine schfdyn
4723  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
4724  common /tapes/in, ifile, meta
4725  common /rcshef/sce(20)
4726 
4727  read (in, *) iread
4728  if (iread==0) then
4729  ! standard SCHEFF parameters
4730  sce(2) = 4.
4731  sce(3) = 4.
4732  sce(4) = 20
4733  sce(5) = 40
4734  sce(6) = 0
4735  sce(9) = 0.
4736  sce(7) = 0.
4737  else
4738  ! read SCHEFF parameters
4739  read (in, *) sce(2), sce(3), sce(4), sce(5), sce(6), sce(7), &
4740  sce(9)
4741  end if
4742  sce(3) = sce(3)*2.
4743  sce(8) = 0.
4744  call schefini
4745  return
4746  end subroutine schfdyn
4753  subroutine prbeam1
4754  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
4755  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
4756  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
4757  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
4758  common /etcha1/dav2(maxcell1, 33), ichas(iptsz), chasit
4759  common /sc3/beamc, scdist, sce10, cplm, ectt, apl, ichaes, iscsp
4760  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
4761  common /dyn/tref, vref
4762  common /mcs/imcs, ncstat, cstat(20)
4763  common /tapes/in, ifile, meta
4764  common /etcha3/ichxyz(iptsz)
4765  common /rec/irec
4766  common /etcom/cog(8), exten(17), fd(iptsz)
4767  logical chasit
4768  character *80 wfile
4769  entry compress(pib)
4770  ! Do so by shifting particles belonging to the same bunch outside the
4771  ! (+/-) pib window to
4772  ! inside the +/- pib window.
4773  pib = pib*pi/180
4774  do ite = 1, 3
4775  ! Find cog of bunch in time
4776  tcog = 0.
4777  do i = 1, ngood
4778  tcog = tcog + f(6, i)
4779  end do
4780  tcog = tcog/float(ngood)
4781  do i = 1, ngood
4782  drad = (f(6,i)-tcog)*fh
4783  if (drad>pib) then
4784  f(6, i) = (f(6,i)-2.*pi/fh)
4785  end if
4786  if (drad<-pib) then
4787  f(6, i) = (f(6,i)+2.*pi/fh)
4788  end if
4789  end do
4790  end do
4791  ! Find cog of bunch in time after shifting particles
4792  do i = 1, ngood
4793  tcog = tcog + f(6, i)
4794  end do
4795  tcog = tcog/float(ngood)
4796  write (16, 59) tcog*fh*180./pi
4797 59 format (' cog in time after shifting particles: ', e13.7, ' deg')
4798  return
4799  ! ****************************************
4800  entry prbeam(iflg, wfile)
4801  ! PRINT OF PARTICLE COORDINATES
4802  ecog = 0.
4803  tcog = 0.
4804  xav = 0.
4805  xpav = 0.
4806  yav = 0.
4807  ypav = 0.
4808  ! **********************************************
4809  ! cog of the bunch
4810  do i = 1, ngood
4811  ecog = ecog + f(7, i)
4812  tcog = tcog + f(6, i)
4813  xav = xav + f(2, i)
4814  xpav = xpav + f(3, i)
4815  yav = yav + f(4, i)
4816  ypav = ypav + f(5, i)
4817  end do
4818  ecog = ecog/float(ngood)
4819  tcog = tcog/float(ngood)
4820  xav = xav/float(ngood)
4821  xpav = xpav/float(ngood)
4822  yav = yav/float(ngood)
4823  ypav = ypav/float(ngood)
4824  ! write particle coordinates to files, phase in radian
4825  open (58, file=wfile, status='unknown')
4826  ! *et*2014-Apr-10 Change frequency from Hz to MHz
4827  write (58, *) ngood, beamc, fh/(2000000.*pi)
4828  if (chasit) then
4829  write (60, *) ngood, beamc, fh/(2000000.*pi)
4830  write (61, *) ngood, beamc, fh/(2000000.*pi)
4831  end if
4832  beref = vref/vl
4833  gamref = 1./sqrt(1.-(beref*beref))
4834  enref = xmat*gamref
4835  f2 = 0.
4836  f3 = 0.
4837  f4 = 0.
4838  f5 = 0.
4839  do i = 1, ngood
4840  ! *et*2010-12-12 match WRBEAM to RDBEAM
4841  if (irec==2) then
4842  ! coordinates relative to the reference
4843  eprt = f(7, i) - enref
4844  tprt = fh*(f(6,i)-tref)
4845  f2 = f(2, i)
4846  f3 = f(3, i)
4847  f4 = f(4, i)
4848  f5 = f(5, i)
4849  end if
4850  if (irec==1) then
4851  ! absolute values for phase and energy
4852  eprt = f(7, i) - xmat
4853  ! tprt=fh*f(6,i)
4854  ! ****sv to be compatible with the output files IMPACT
4855  ! tprt=fh*(f(6,i)-tref)
4856  tprt = fh*(f(6,i)-tcog)
4857  ! **********************************
4858  f2 = f(2, i)
4859  f3 = f(3, i)
4860  f4 = f(4, i)
4861  f5 = f(5, i)
4862  end if
4863  if (irec==0) then
4864  ! values for phase and energy relative to the COG
4865  tprt = fh*(f(6,i)-tcog)
4866  eprt = f(7, i) - ecog
4867  f2 = f(2, i) - xav
4868  f3 = f(3, i) - xpav
4869  f4 = f(4, i) - yav
4870  f5 = f(5, i) - ypav
4871  end if
4872  if (iflg==0) write (58, 100) f2, f3/1000., f4, f5/1000., tprt, &
4873  eprt
4874  if (iflg==1) write (58, 101) f2, f3/1000., f4, f5/1000., tprt, &
4875  eprt, f(1, i)
4876  if (iflg==2) write (58, 102) f2, f3/1000., f4, f5/1000., tprt, &
4877  eprt, f(9, i)
4878  if (iflg==3) write (58, 103) f2, f3/1000., f4, f5/1000., tprt, &
4879  eprt, f(9, i), f(1, i)
4880  if (iflg==10) write (58, 100) f2, f3/1000., f4, f5/1000., &
4881  1.e09*tprt/fh, eprt
4882  if (iflg==11) write (58, 101) f2, f3/1000., f4, f5/1000., &
4883  1.e09*tprt/fh, eprt, f(1, i)
4884  if (iflg==12) write (58, 102) f2, f3/1000., f4, f5/1000., &
4885  1.e09*tprt/fh, eprt, f(9, i)
4886  if (iflg==13) write (58, 103) f2, f3/1000., f4, f5/1000., &
4887  1.e09*tprt/fh, eprt, f(9, i), f(1, i)
4888  ! ************** only with CHASE, write to file particles removed
4889  if (chasit) then
4890  if (ichxyz(i)==0) then
4891  if (iflg==0) write (60, 100) f2, f3/1000., f4, f5/1000., &
4892  tprt, eprt
4893  if (iflg==10) write (60, 100) f2, f3/1000., f4, f5/1000., &
4894  1.e09*tprt/fh, eprt
4895  if (iflg==1) write (60, 101) f2, f3/1000., f4, f5/1000., &
4896  tprt, eprt, f(1, i)
4897  if (iflg==11) write (60, 102) f2, f3/1000., f4, f5/1000., &
4898  1.e09*tprt/fh, eprt, f(1, i)
4899  if (iflg==2) write (60, 101) f2, f3/1000., f4, f5/1000., &
4900  tprt, eprt, f(9, i)
4901  if (iflg==12) write (60, 102) f2, f3/1000., f4, f5/1000., &
4902  1.e09*tprt/fh, eprt, f(9, i)
4903  end if
4904  ! ************** only with CHASE, write to file particles kept
4905  if (ichxyz(i)==1) then
4906  if (iflg==0) write (61, 100) f2, f3/1000., f4, f5/1000., &
4907  tprt, eprt
4908  if (iflg==10) write (61, 100) f2, f3/1000., f4, f5/1000., &
4909  1.e09*tprt/fh, eprt
4910  if (iflg==1) write (61, 101) f2, f3/1000., f4, f5/1000., &
4911  tprt, eprt, f(1, i)
4912  if (iflg==11) write (61, 102) f2, f3/1000., f4, f5/1000., &
4913  1.e09*tprt/fh, eprt, f(1, i)
4914  if (iflg==2) write (61, 101) f2, f3/1000., f4, f5/1000., &
4915  tprt, eprt, f(9, i)
4916  if (iflg==12) write (61, 102) f2, f3/1000., f4, f5/1000., &
4917  1.e09*tprt/fh, eprt, f(9, i)
4918  end if
4919  end if
4920  end do
4921  close (58)
4922 100 format (6(e13.6,1x))
4923 101 format (7(e13.6,1x))
4924  ! omment101 format(7(F16.11,1x))
4925 102 format (7(e13.6,1x))
4926 103 format (8(e13.6,1x))
4927  ! 200 format(F4.0)
4928  return
4929  end subroutine prbeam1
4937  subroutine gausse
4938  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
4939  common /gauss1/absg(40), wg(40), igaus
4940  common /randu/ck(15), kmax
4941  dimension ui(40), u9(9), u10(10), u12(12)
4942  dimension w9(9), w10(10), w12(12)
4943  ! GAUSS n=9 de -1. a 1
4944  data (u9(j), j=1, 9)/ -.9681602, -.8360311, -.6133714, -.3242534, 0., &
4945  .3242534, .6133714, .8360311, .9681602/
4946  data (w9(j), j=1, 9)/.0812744, .1806482, .2606107, .3123471, .3302394, &
4947  .3123471, .2606107, .1806482, .0812744/
4948  ! GAUSS n=10 de -1. a 1
4949  data (u10(j), j=1, 10)/ -.9739065, -.8650634, -.6794096, -.4333954, &
4950  -.1488743, .1488743, .4333954, .6794096, .8650634, .9739065/
4951  data (w10(j), j=1, 10)/.0666713, .1494513, .2190864, .2692667, &
4952  .2955242, .2955242, .2692667, .2190864, .1494513, .0666713/
4953  ! GAUSS n=12 de -1. a 1
4954  data (u12(j), j=1, 12)/ -.9815606, -.9041173, -.7699027, -.5873180, &
4955  -.3678315, -.1252334, .1252334, .3678315, .5873180, .7699027, &
4956  .9041173, .9815606/
4957  data (w12(j), j=1, 12)/.0471753, .1069393, .1600783, .2031674, &
4958  .2334925, .2491470, .2491470, .2334925, .2031674, .1600783, &
4959  .1069393, .0471753/
4960  ! randu(j):contains the Chebitcheff coefficients Ck in table 20.
4961  ! kmax is the total number of these coefficients(from 1)
4962  data (ck(j), j=1, 7)/.98933556, -.68838689, .28191718, -.66389307e-01, &
4963  .87406854e-02, -.59534602e-03, .16300617e-04/
4964  ! xx data (ck(j),j=1,10)/.99927015,-.78398394,.44577741,
4965  ! xx * -.18252873,.51928922e-01,-.99821428e-02,
4966  ! xx * .1259644e-02,-.99460265e-04,.44427251e-05,
4967  ! xx * -.85528336e-07/
4968  ! xx data (ck(j),j=1,12)/.99989097,-.79469098,.48376369,
4969  ! xx * -.23183581,.85333907e-01,-.23354050e-01,
4970  ! xx * .46284273e-02,-.64840101e-03,.62211306e-04,
4971  ! xx * -.38752189e-05,.14087289e-06,-.22650639e-08/
4972  data kmax/7/
4973  ! built the abscissas from (-1,1) to (1,0)
4974  if (igaus==9) then
4975  do i = 1, igaus
4976  ui(i) = u9(i)
4977  wg(i) = w9(i)
4978  end do
4979  end if
4980  ! following options in case one wishes to use 10 or 12 steps
4981  if (igaus==10) then
4982  do i = 1, igaus
4983  ui(i) = u10(i)
4984  wg(i) = w10(i)
4985  end do
4986  end if
4987  if (igaus==12) then
4988  do i = 1, igaus
4989  ui(i) = u12(i)
4990  wg(i) = w12(i)
4991  end do
4992  end if
4993  do i = 1, igaus
4994  absg(i) = (1.+ui(i))/2.
4995  wg(i) = wg(i)/2.
4996  end do
4997  return
4998  end subroutine gausse
5008  subroutine table(lbmax, mbmax, nbmax)
5009  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
5010  common /gauss1/absg(40), wg(40), igaus
5011  common /circu/co(40, 50), sn(40, 50), blam(40, 100)
5012  common /expmod/ragp(40, 100), ragm1(40, 40)
5013  common /randu/ck(15), kmax
5014  common /hass/carg(100), sarg(100), argip(100)
5015  common /const/pi2, sqpi, pwtpi, sqpi2, sq2pi
5016  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
5017  common /factor/fpir(40, 40), fect(30)
5018  ! maximum of subscripts : ideg
5019  ! igaus: order of the Gauss integration ******
5020  ! maximum of lbmax,mmax,nbmax -->ideg
5021  ideg = nbmax
5022  if (lbmax>=ideg) ideg = lbmax
5023  if (mbmax>=ideg) ideg = mbmax
5024  ideg = ideg + 1
5025  idegp2 = ideg + 2
5026  ! arrays of the power of the circular functions fo the Gauss positions
5027  ! absg(i)
5028  ! the maximum power is ideg+2
5029  do i = 1, igaus
5030  co(i, 1) = 1.
5031  sn(i, 1) = 1.
5032  end do
5033  do i = 1, igaus
5034  aco = pi*absg(i)/2.
5035  cod = cos(aco)
5036  snd = sin(aco)
5037  do j = 2, idegp2
5038  co(i, j) = co(i, j-1)*cod
5039  sn(i, j) = sn(i, j-1)*snd
5040  end do
5041  end do
5042  ! arrays used in the integrals of tables 75 and 76
5043  ! absg(i)**2(t1+t2+t3+1)+1-->ragp(i,j) i: Gauss positions, j: is the
5044  ! power
5045  idgp = 3*ideg + kmax
5046  kemax = kmax/2
5047  do i = 1, igaus
5048  ragp(i, 1) = 1.
5049  ragm1(i, 1) = 1.
5050  absm2 = (1.-absg(i))*(1.-absg(i))
5051  do j = 2, idgp
5052  ragp(i, j) = ragp(i, j-1)*absg(i)
5053  end do
5054  ! storage of (absg(i)-1)**2*kemax -->ragm1
5055  do j = 2, kemax + 1
5056  ragm1(i, j) = ragm1(i, j-1)*absm2
5057  end do
5058  end do
5059  do i = 1, idgp + 1
5060  carg(i) = sqrt((4.*float(i-1)+1.)/2.)
5061  sarg(i) = sqrt((4.*float(i-1)+3.)/2.)
5062  argip(i) = sqrt(2.*float(i-1)+1.)
5063  end do
5064  ! store the factorials
5065  do i = 1, 40
5066  do j = 1, i
5067  fpir(i, j) = fper(i-1, j-1)
5068  end do
5069  end do
5070  fj = 1.
5071  fect(1) = 1.
5072  do i = 1, 23
5073  fi = float(i)
5074  fj = fj*fi
5075  fect(i+1) = fj
5076  end do
5077  return
5078  end subroutine table
5084  function fper(i, j)
5085  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
5086 
5087  faci = 1.
5088  facj = 1.
5089  fper = 1.
5090  if (i==0) return
5091  if (j==0) return
5092  do k = 1, j
5093  facj = facj*float(k)
5094  end do
5095  ii = i
5096  do k = 1, j
5097  faci = faci*float(ii)
5098  ii = ii - 1
5099  end do
5100  fper = faci/facj
5101  return
5102  end function fper
5109  function hermint(s, ihd)
5110  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
5111  dimension he(100)
5112 
5113  hermint = 0.
5114  if (ihd==0) then
5115  hermint = 1.
5116  return
5117  end if
5118  if (ihd==1) then
5119  hermint = s
5120  return
5121  end if
5122  he(1) = 1.
5123  he(2) = s
5124  m1 = ihd - 1
5125  do k = 1, m1
5126  he(k+2) = s*he(k+1) - float(k)*he(k)
5127  end do
5128  hermint = he(ihd+1)*exp(-s*s/2.)
5129  return
5130  end function hermint
5135  function fact(m)
5136  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
5137 
5138  fact = 1.
5139  if (m==0) return
5140  do k = 1, m
5141  fact = fact*float(k)
5142  end do
5143  return
5144  end function fact
5149  function factd(m)
5150  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
5151  dimension he(100)
5152 
5153  factd = 1.
5154  if (m==0) factd = 1.
5155  if (m==1) then
5156  factd = -1.
5157  return
5158  end if
5159  he(1) = 1.
5160  do k = 1, 2*m - 1, 2
5161  he(k+2) = -float(k)*he(k)
5162  end do
5163  factd = he(2*m+1)
5164  continue
5165  return
5166  end function factd
5176  subroutine bhdist
5177  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
5178  common /coef/a(30, 30, 30), xa, xb, xc
5179  common /ind/lmax, mmax, nmax
5180  common /indin/lmaxi, mmaxi, nmaxxi
5181  common /hcgrms/xcdg, ycdg, zcdg, ect, eps
5182  ! character iitime*30
5183  ! hermite degrees
5184  lmax = lmaxi
5185  mmax = mmaxi
5186  nmax = nmaxxi
5187  ect = 4.
5188  ! call mytime(iitime)
5189  ! write(16,*) 'PINTFAST started at ',iitime
5190  call pintfast
5191  ! call mytime(iitime)
5192  ! write(16,*) 'PINTFAST end, HCOEF started at ',iitime
5193  call hcoef
5194  ! call mytime(iitime)
5195  ! write(16,*) 'HCOEF ended at ',iitime
5196  return
5197  end subroutine bhdist
5209  subroutine trms(isucc)
5210  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
5211  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
5212  common /coef/a(30, 30, 30), xa, xb, xc
5213  common /ind/lmax, mmax, nmax
5214  ! lmax,mmax,nmax from zero
5215  common /rms/rms(3, 50), s1, s2, s3
5216  common /gauss1/absg(40), wg(40), igaus
5217  common /circu/co(40, 50), sn(40, 50), blam(40, 100)
5218  common /randu/ck(15), kmax
5219  ! minimum of the rms sizes xa,xb,xc
5220  rmin = xa
5221  if (rmin>xb) rmin = xb
5222  if (rmin>xc) rmin = xc
5223  ! order of the succession of the integrals
5224  if (rmin==xc) isucc = 3
5225  if (rmin==xb) isucc = 2
5226  if (rmin==xa) isucc = 1
5227  ! maximum of lmax,mmax,nmax
5228  maxi = lmax
5229  if (maxi<mmax) maxi = mmax
5230  if (maxi<nmax) maxi = nmax
5231  maxt = 2*(maxi+1) + 3
5232  x3 = 0.
5233  x2 = 0.
5234  x1 = 0.
5235  ! order of succession x->y->z
5236  if (isucc==1) then
5237  x3 = xa
5238  x2 = xb
5239  x1 = xc
5240  end if
5241  ! order of succession y->z->x
5242  if (isucc==2) then
5243  x3 = xb
5244  x2 = xc
5245  x1 = xa
5246  end if
5247  ! order of succession z->x->y
5248  if (isucc==3) then
5249  x3 = xc
5250  x2 = xa
5251  x1 = xb
5252  end if
5253  ! array rms(j,i) Powers of the rms sizes j=1,2,3, the value i is the
5254  ! power
5255  rms(3, 1) = 1.
5256  rms(2, 1) = 1.
5257  rms(1, 1) = 1.
5258  do i = 2, maxt
5259  rms(3, i) = rms(3, i-1)*x3
5260  rms(2, i) = rms(2, i-1)*x2
5261  rms(1, i) = rms(1, i-1)*x1
5262  end do
5263  j1 = kmax/2
5264  i1m = (lmax+1)/2
5265  i2m = (mmax+1)/2
5266  i3m = (nmax+1)/2
5267  im = i1m + i2m + i3m + j1 + 4
5268  if (im>=40) then
5269  write (16, *) ' overlap the array blam with im= ', im
5270  stop
5271  end if
5272  do i = 1, igaus
5273  blam(i, 1) = (rms(1,3)*co(i,3)+rms(2,3)*sn(i,3))/rms(3, 3)
5274  do ii = 2, im
5275  blam(i, ii) = blam(i, ii-1)*blam(i, 1)
5276  end do
5277  end do
5278  return
5279  end subroutine trms
5287  subroutine uvrms
5288  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
5289  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
5290  common /rms/rms(3, 50), s1, s2, s3
5291  common /gauss1/absg(40), wg(40), igaus
5292  common /circu/co(40, 50), sn(40, 50), blam(40, 100)
5293  common /uvtab/epsi1(40, 40), epsi2(40, 40), akpcc(40, 40), &
5294  akpcs(40, 40), akpsc(40, 40), akpss(40, 40)
5295  common /expmod/ragp(40, 100), ragm1(40, 40)
5296  common /cars3/exs3, exs2, exs1, as3, sgns3, s32, pwas3, pw3as3
5297  common /ind/lmax, mmax, nmax
5298  common /indttal/lmnt
5299  common /randu/ck(15), kmax
5300  common /const/pi2, sqpi, pwtpi, sqpi2, sq2pi
5301  ! pi2=pi*pi, sqpi=(pi/2)**3/2
5302  common /comtab/hsint(40, 2, 60), sqblam(40), s3pw(15)
5303  common /herfun/hs1(60), hs2(60), hs3(60)
5304 
5305  s32 = s3*s3
5306  s22 = s2*s2
5307  s12 = s1*s1
5308  exs3 = exp(-s32/2.)
5309  exs2 = exp(-s22/2.)
5310  exs1 = exp(-s12/2.)
5311  as3 = abs(s3)
5312  sgns3 = 1.
5313  if (s3<0.) sgns3 = -1.
5314  as31 = as3*s1
5315  as32 = as3*s2
5316  s1rms = s1*rms(1, 2)
5317  s2rms = s2*rms(2, 2)
5318  ! power of as3, used in the functions spii,......
5319  s3pw(1) = 1.
5320  do i = 2, kmax
5321  s3pw(i) = s3pw(i-1)*as3
5322  end do
5323  ! memory array hsint(ig,arg,indice) for functions sipp,...
5324  do ig = 1, igaus
5325  wgpi = wg(ig)*pi/2.
