5326  sqblam(ig) = sqrt(blam(ig,1))
5327  xlblam = sqblam(ig)*rms(3, 2)
5328  do iarg = 1, 2
5329  arghm1 = s1rms*co(ig, 2)/xlblam
5330  arghm2 = s2rms*sn(ig, 2)/xlblam
5331  if (iarg==1) then
5332  arg = arghm1 + arghm2
5333  earg = exp(-arg*arg/2.)
5334  end if
5335  if (iarg==2) then
5336  arg = arghm1 - arghm2
5337  earg = exp(-arg*arg/2.)
5338  end if
5339  hsint(ig, iarg, 1) = 1.*earg*wgpi
5340  hsint(ig, iarg, 2) = arg*earg*wgpi
5341  do inhs = 3, lmnt
5342  hsint(ig, iarg, inhs) = arg*hsint(ig, iarg, inhs-1) - &
5343  float(inhs-2)*hsint(ig, iarg, inhs-2)
5344  end do
5345  end do
5346  end do
5347  r13 = rms(1, 2)/rms(3, 2)
5348  r23 = rms(2, 2)/rms(3, 2)
5349  do j = 1, igaus
5350  do i = 1, igaus
5351  aeps1 = ragp(i, 3)*(blam(j,1)-1.)/2.
5352  aeps1 = s32*(aeps1+ragp(i,2))
5353  aeps2 = ragp(i, 3)*blam(j, 1)/2.
5354  aeps2 = aeps2*s32
5355  akc1 = ragp(i, 2)*r13*co(j, 2)*as31
5356  akc2 = ragp(i, 2)*r23*sn(j, 2)*as32
5357  aks1 = ragp(i, 2)*r13*co(j, 2)*as31
5358  aks2 = ragp(i, 2)*r23*sn(j, 2)*as32
5359  epsi1(i, j) = exp(-aeps1)*wg(i)
5360  epsi2(i, j) = exp(-aeps2)*wg(i)
5361  akpcc(i, j) = cos(akc1)*cos(akc2)
5362  akpcs(i, j) = cos(akc1)*sin(akc2)
5363  akpsc(i, j) = sin(akc1)*cos(akc2)
5364  akpss(i, j) = sin(akc1)*sin(akc2)
5365  end do
5366  end do
5367  ! Hermite functions
5368  hs1(1) = exs1
5369  hs2(1) = exs2
5370  hs3(1) = exs3
5371  hs1(2) = s1*exs1
5372  hs2(2) = s2*exs2
5373  hs3(2) = s3*exs3
5374  do ihe = 3, lmnt
5375  hs1(ihe) = s1*hs1(ihe-1) - float(ihe-2)*hs1(ihe-2)
5376  hs2(ihe) = s2*hs2(ihe-1) - float(ihe-2)*hs2(ihe-2)
5377  hs3(ihe) = s3*hs3(ihe-1) - float(ihe-2)*hs3(ihe-2)
5378  end do
5379  return
5380  end subroutine uvrms
5381  subroutine pintfast
5382  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
5383  ! ....................................................................
5384  !..........
5385  ! Particles too far from the C. of G. of the bunch are eliminated
5386  ! for the Almn computations with HERSC
5387  ! ....................................................................
5388  !..........
5389  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
5390  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
5391  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
5392  common /dyn/tref, vref
5393  common /sc3/beamc, scdist, sce10, cplm, ectt, apl, ichaes, iscsp
5394  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
5395  common /part/xc(iptsz), yc(iptsz), zc(iptsz)
5396  common /dimens/zcp(iptsz), xcp(iptsz), ycp(iptsz)
5397  common /nume/nuelm
5398  common /vpintim/gcg, bcg
5399  common /coef/a(30, 30, 30), xrmsz, yrmsz, zrmsz
5400  common /macro/ratei
5401 
5402  nuelm = nuelm + 1
5403  write (16, *) ' space charge with HERSC call number: ', nuelm
5404  trmoy = 0.
5405  wcg = 0.
5406  xcg = 0.
5407  xcg = 0.
5408  ycg = 0.
5409  do i = 1, ngood
5410  trmoy = trmoy + f(6, i)
5411  wcg = wcg + f(7, i)
5412  xcg = xcg + f(2, i)
5413  ycg = ycg + f(4, i)
5414  end do
5415  trmoy = trmoy/float(ngood)
5416  wcg = wcg/float(ngood)
5417  gcg = wcg/xmat
5418  bcg = sqrt(1.-1./(gcg*gcg))
5419  xcg = xcg/float(ngood)
5420  ycg = ycg/float(ngood)
5421  zcg = trmoy*fh
5422  ! Isochronism correction in bending magnet
5423  ! apl is the angle due to the lack of isochronicity in the plane (x,z)
5424  ! (see : A modified space charge routine for high intensity bunched
5425  ! beam,P.Lapostolle and 5 authors,NIM A Vol.379,pp21-40,
5426  ! September 1996)
5427  ! does not work with SCHEFF method (iscsp=3)
5428  apl = 0.
5429  if (iscsp<=2) then
5430  xb2x = 0.
5431  xb2z = 0.
5432  xbxz = 0.
5433  imaxx = 0
5434  do np = 1, ngood
5435  gnp = f(7, np)/xmat
5436  bnp = sqrt(1.-1./(gnp*gnp))
5437  zc(np) = (trmoy-f(6,np))*bnp*vl/100.
5438  ! * correct. relativiste
5439  ! omment zc(np)=zc(np)*gcg
5440  ! *
5441  xc(np) = (f(2,np)-xcg)/100.
5442  xb2z = xb2z + zc(np)*zc(np)
5443  xb2x = xb2x + xc(np)*xc(np)
5444  xbxz = xbxz + zc(np)*xc(np)
5445  imaxx = imaxx + 1
5446  end do
5447  xb2z = xb2z/float(imaxx)
5448  xb2x = xb2x/float(imaxx)
5449  xbxz = xbxz/float(imaxx)
5450  apl = atan(-2.*xbxz/(xb2x-xb2z))/2.
5451  end if
5452  write (16, *) '*slope of the bunch in plane(Oz,Ox):', apl, ' radian'
5453  ! bunch at the space charge position
5454  xbar = 0.
5455  ybar = 0.
5456  zbar = 0.
5457  imaxx = 0
5458  ! Divide by 100. to convert from centimeters to meters
5459  do np = 1, ngood
5460  gnp = f(7, np)/xmat
5461  bnp = sqrt(1.-1./(gnp*gnp))
5462  znp = (trmoy-f(6,np))*bnp*vl
5463  ! * correct. relativiste valero
5464  ! omment znp=znp*gcg
5465  ! *
5466  xnp = f(2, np)
5467  zc(np) = znp*cos(apl) + xnp*sin(apl)
5468  xnp = xnp*cos(apl) - znp*sin(apl)
5469  ! convert from mrad to rad
5470  f3 = f(3, np)*1.e-03
5471  f5 = f(5, np)*1.e-03
5472  ! convert from cm to m
5473  xc(np) = (xnp+zc(np)*f3)/100.
5474  yc(np) = (f(4,np)+zc(np)*f5)/100.
5475  zc(np) = zc(np)/100.
5476  ! evaluate xbar , ybar , zbar
5477  xbar = xbar + xc(np)
5478  ybar = ybar + yc(np)
5479  zbar = zbar + zc(np)
5480  end do
5481  eng = float(ngood)
5482  xbar = xbar/eng
5483  ybar = ybar/eng
5484  zbar = zbar/eng
5485  do np = 1, ngood
5486  xc(np) = xc(np) - xbar
5487  yc(np) = yc(np) - ybar
5488  zc(np) = zc(np) - zbar
5489  end do
5490  return
5491  end subroutine pintfast
5496  subroutine hcoef
5497  use randlux
5498  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
5499  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
5500  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
5501  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
5502  common /const/pi2, sqpi, pwtpi, sqpi2, sq2pi
5503  common /hcgrms/xcdg, ycdg, zcdg, ect, eps
5504  common /ind/lmax, mmax, nmax
5505  common /indttal/lmnt
5506  common /randu/ck(15), kmax
5507  common /coef/a(30, 30, 30), xrmsz, yrmsz, zrmsz
5508  common /part/xc(iptsz), yc(iptsz), zc(iptsz)
5509  common /isoch/apl
5510  common /dimens/zcp(iptsz), xcp(iptsz), ycp(iptsz)
5511  common /nume/nuelm
5512  common /macro/ratei
5513  common /facrms/fxrms, fyrms, fzrms
5514  common /rcoef/rdcf
5515  common /factor/fpir(40, 40), fect(30)
5516  dimension hx(30), hy(30), hz(30), tran(1)
5517  ! calculation of Hermite coefficients on the principal axis in x,y,z
5518  do i = 1, ngood
5519  zcp(i) = zc(i)
5520  xcp(i) = xc(i)
5521  ycp(i) = yc(i)
5522  end do
5523  do kn = 1, nmax
5524  do km = 1, mmax
5525  do kl = 1, lmax
5526  a(kl, km, kn) = 0.
5527  end do
5528  end do
5529  end do
5530  zcg = 0.
5531  xcg = 0.
5532  ycg = 0.
5533  do i = 1, ngood
5534  zcg = zcg + zc(i)
5535  xcg = xcg + xc(i)
5536  ycg = ycg + yc(i)
5537  end do
5538  xcg = xcg/float(ngood)
5539  ycg = ycg/float(ngood)
5540  zcg = zcg/float(ngood)
5541  xsqsum = 0.
5542  ysqsum = 0.
5543  zsqsum = 0.
5544  ! evaluate the rms sizes
5545  do j = 1, ngood
5546  xcj = xc(j) - xcg
5547  ycj = yc(j) - ycg
5548  zcj = zc(j) - zcg
5549  xsqsum = xsqsum + xcj*xcj
5550  ysqsum = ysqsum + ycj*ycj
5551  zsqsum = zsqsum + zcj*zcj
5552  end do
5553  xrmsz = xsqsum/float(ngood)
5554  yrmsz = ysqsum/float(ngood)
5555  zrmsz = zsqsum/float(ngood)
5556  xrmsz = sqrt(xrmsz)
5557  yrmsz = sqrt(yrmsz)
5558  zrmsz = sqrt(zrmsz)
5559  write (16, *) '*RMS of the bunch (m): ', xrmsz, yrmsz, zrmsz
5560  ! omment write(17,25) nuelm,xrmsz,yrmsz,zrmsz
5561  ! omment25 format(2x,i5,3(2x,e12.5))
5562  ! ***TEST control s.c.
5563  ! omment rewind(19)
5564  ! omment irep=0
5565  ! omment rewind(21)
5566  ! omment write(21,*) ' x(cm) y(cm) z(cm)'
5567  ! coordinates of the bunch x, y, z
5568  ! omment do j=1,ngood
5569  ! omment xcoup=(xcp(j)-xcg)/xrmsz
5570  ! omment ycoup=(ycp(j)-ycg)/yrmsz
5571  ! omment zcoup=(zcp(j)-zcg)/zrmsz
5572  ! omment write(21,1188) xcoup,ycoup,zcoup
5573  ! omment
5574  ! if((abs(xcoup).lt.fxrms).and.(abs(ycoup).lt.fyrms).and.
5575  ! omment * (abs(zcoup).lt.fzrms)) then
5576  ! omment write(19,1188) xcoup,ycoup,zcoup
5577  ! omment irep=irep+1
5578  ! omment endif
5579  ! omment enddo
5580  ! omment1188 format(3(2x,e12.5))
5581  ! ***END TEST control s.c.
5582  if (rdcf>=1.) then
5583  hz(1) = 1.
5584  hy(1) = 1.
5585  hx(1) = 1.
5586  irct = 0
5587  do j = 1, ngood
5588  xc(j) = (xcp(j)-xcg)/xrmsz
5589  yc(j) = (ycp(j)-ycg)/yrmsz
5590  zc(j) = (zcp(j)-zcg)/zrmsz
5591  if ((abs(xc(j))<fxrms) .and. (abs(yc(j))<fyrms) .and. (abs( &
5592  zc(j))<fzrms)) then
5593  irct = irct + 1
5594  ach = abs(f(9,j))
5595  hz(2) = zc(j)
5596  hy(2) = yc(j)
5597  hx(2) = xc(j)
5598  do kn = 1, nmax
5599  if (kn>2) hz(kn) = zc(j)*hz(kn-1) - &
5600  float(kn-2)*hz(kn-2)
5601  do km = 1, mmax
5602  if (km>2) hy(km) = yc(j)*hy(km-1) - &
5603  float(km-2)*hy(km-2)
5604  do kl = 1, lmax
5605  if (kl>2) hx(kl) = xc(j)*hx(kl-1) - &
5606  float(kl-2)*hx(kl-2)
5607  xherm = hx(kl)*hy(km)*hz(kn)/ &
5608  (fect(kl)*fect(km)*fect(kn))
5609  a(kl, km, kn) = a(kl, km, kn) + &
5610  xherm/pwtpi*ach
5611  end do
5612  end do
5613  end do
5614  end if
5615  end do
5616  rate = float(ngood)/float(irct)
5617  ! write(16,*) ' particles kept in Almn computation: ',irct
5618  do kn = 1, nmax
5619  do km = 1, mmax
5620  do kl = 1, lmax
5621  a(kl, km, kn) = a(kl, km, kn)*rate
5622  end do
5623  end do
5624  end do
5625  end if
5626  ! *********************************
5627  if (rdcf<1.) then
5628  rdcfc = rdcf*float(imax)/float(ngood)
5629  if (rdcfc>1.) rdcfc = 1.
5630  len = 1
5631  irct = 0
5632  hz(1) = 1.
5633  hy(1) = 1.
5634  hx(1) = 1.
5635  do j = 1, ngood
5636  call rlux(tran, len)
5637  if (tran(1)<=rdcfc) then
5638  xc(j) = (xcp(j)-xcg)/xrmsz
5639  yc(j) = (ycp(j)-ycg)/yrmsz
5640  zc(j) = (zcp(j)-zcg)/zrmsz
5641  if ((abs(xc(j))<fxrms) .and. (abs( &
5642  yc(j))<=fyrms) .and. (abs(zc(j))<fzrms)) then
5643  ach = abs(f(9,j))
5644  irct = irct + 1
5645  hz(2) = zc(j)
5646  hy(2) = yc(j)
5647  hx(2) = xc(j)
5648  do kn = 1, nmax
5649  if (kn>2) hz(kn) = zc(j)*hz(kn-1) - &
5650  float(kn-2)*hz(kn-2)
5651  do km = 1, mmax
5652  if (km>2) hy(km) = yc(j)*hy(km-1) - &
5653  float(km-2)*hy(km-2)
5654  do kl = 1, lmax
5655  if (kl>2) hx(kl) = xc(j)*hx(kl-1) - &
5656  float(kl-2)*hx(kl-2)
5657  xherm = hx(kl)*hy(km)*hz(kn)/ &
5658  (fect(kl)*fect(km)*fect(kn))
5659  a(kl, km, kn) = a(kl, km, kn) + &
5660  xherm/pwtpi*ach
5661  end do
5662  end do
5663  end do
5664  end if
5665  end if
5666  end do
5667  rate = float(ngood)/float(irct)
5668  write (16, *) ' particles kept in Almn: ', irct
5669  do kn = 1, nmax
5670  do km = 1, mmax
5671  do kl = 1, lmax
5672  a(kl, km, kn) = a(kl, km, kn)*rate
5673  end do
5674  end do
5675  end do
5676  end if
5677  ! 118 format(3(2x,e12.5))
5678  ! * cesaro transformation
5679  lsup = lmax
5680  msup = mmax
5681  nsup = nmax
5682  do kn = 1, nsup
5683  do km = 1, msup
5684  do kl = 1, lsup
5685  cesl = (1.-float(kl-1)/float(lsup))
5686  cesm = (1.-float(km-1)/float(msup))
5687  cesn = (1.-float(kn-1)/float(nsup))
5688  ces = cesl*cesm*cesn
5689  ! esaro force a(kl,km,kn)=a(kl,km,kn)*ces*ces
5690  a(kl, km, kn) = a(kl, km, kn)*ces
5691  end do
5692  end do
5693  end do
5694  ! *
5695  ! select the significant coefficients
5696  ! 999 continue
5697  fond = abs(a(1,1,1))
5698  itot = 0
5699  iret = 0
5700  do kn = 1, nmax
5701  n = kn - 1
5702  ipar = n - 2*int(n/2)
5703  if (ipar==0) zz = 0.
5704  if (ipar/=0) then
5705  if (n==1) zz = 1.
5706  if (n==3) zz = .75
5707  if (n==5) zz = .625
5708  if (n>5 .and. n<=11) zz = 0.50
5709  if (n>11) zz = 0.375
5710  end if
5711  do km = 1, mmax
5712  m = km - 1
5713  ipar = m - 2*int(m/2)
5714  if (ipar==0) yy = 0.
5715  if (ipar/=0) then
5716  if (m==1) yy = 1.
5717  if (m==3) yy = .75
5718  if (m==5) yy = .625
5719  if (m>5 .and. m<=11) yy = 0.50
5720  if (m>11) yy = 0.375
5721  end if
5722  do kl = 1, lmax
5723  l = kl - 1
5724  ipar = l - 2*int(l/2)
5725  if (ipar==0) xx = 0.
5726  if (ipar/=0) then
5727  if (l==1) xx = 1.
5728  if (l==3) xx = .75
5729  if (l==5) xx = .625
5730  if (l>5 .and. l<=11) xx = 0.50
5731  if (l>11) xx = 0.375
5732  end if
5733  itot = itot + 1
5734  xherm = hermint(xx, l)*hermint(yy, m)*hermint(zz, n)
5735  ab = abs(a(kl,km,kn)*xherm)/fond
5736  if (ab>=eps) then
5737  iret = iret + 1
5738  else
5739  a(kl, km, kn) = 0.
5740  end if
5741  end do
5742  end do
5743  end do
5744  rpeps = float(iret)/float(itot)
5745  write (16, *) '*significant terms in Hermite series expansion: ', &
5746  iret, ' total of terms :', itot
5747  if (rpeps>=.3) then
5748  write (16, *) ' problem in space charge : rpeps gt .3 ', rpeps
5749  stop
5750  end if
5751  ! select the maximum values l, m and n for the significant
5752  ! coefficients
5753  lsup = 0
5754  msup = 0
5755  nsup = 0
5756  lmnt = 0
5757  do kn = 1, nmax
5758  do km = 1, mmax
5759  do kl = 1, lmax
5760  if (a(kl,km,kn)/=0.) then
5761  itm = kl + km + kn - 3
5762  if (itm>=lmnt) lmnt = itm
5763  if (lsup<=kl) lsup = kl
5764  if (msup<=km) msup = km
5765  if (nsup<=kn) nsup = kn
5766  end if
5767  end do
5768  end do
5769  end do
5770  lmnt = lmnt + kmax + 4 + 3
5771  write (16, *) ' maximum of n m l for the significants terms ', &
5772  nsup - 1, msup - 1, lsup - 1
5773  write (16, *) ' maximun of (t) for the significants terms ', lmnt
5774  ! * cesaro transformation
5775  ! cc do kn=1,nsup
5776  ! cc do km=1,msup
5777  ! cc do kl=1,lsup
5778  ! cc cesl=(1.-float(kl-1)/float(lsup))
5779  ! cc cesm=(1.-float(km-1)/float(msup))
5780  ! cc cesn=(1.-float(kn-1)/float(nsup))
5781  ! cc ces=cesl*cesm*cesn
5782  ! cc a(kl,km,kn)=a(kl,km,kn)*ces
5783  ! cc enddo
5784  ! cc enddo
5785  ! cc enddo
5786  ! *
5787  return
5788  end subroutine hcoef
5795  subroutine hersc(ini)
5796  use selffields
5797  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
5798  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
5799  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
5800  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
5801  common /sc3/beamc, scdist, sce10, cplm, ectt, apl, ichaes, iscsp
5802  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
5803  common /cdek/dwp(iptsz)
5804  common /part/xc(iptsz), yc(iptsz), zc(iptsz)
5805  common /coef/a(30, 30, 30), xrmsz, yrmsz, zrmsz
5806  common /hcgrms/xcdg, ycdg, zcdg, ect, eps
5807  common /ind/lmax, mmax, nmax
5808  common /indin/lmaxi, mmaxi, nmaxxi
5809  common /indttal/lmnt
5810  common /rms/rms(3, 50), s1, s2, s3
5811  common /randu/ck(15), kmax
5812  common /circu/co(40, 50), sn(40, 50), blam(40, 100)
5813  common /gauss1/absg(40), wg(40), igaus
5814  common /field/ex, ey, ez
5815  common /expmod/ragp(40, 100), ragm1(40, 40)
5816  common /const/pi2, sqpi, pwtpi, sqpi2, sq2pi
5817  common /facrms/fxrms, fyrms, fzrms
5818  common /dimens/zcp(iptsz), xcp(iptsz), ycp(iptsz)
5819  common /beamsa/fs(7, iptsz)
5820  common /dcspa/iesp
5821  common /cmpte/iell
5822  common /npart/imaxr
5823  common /compt/nrres, nrtre, nrbunc, nrdbun
5824  common /rcoef/rdcf
5825  common /macro/ratei
5826  common /tapes/in, ifile, meta
5827  common /posc/xpsc
5828  logical ichaes, iesp
5829  dimension exk(15, 15, 30), eyk(15, 15, 30), ezk(15, 15, 30)
5830  ! pi2=pi*pi, sqpi=(pi/2)**3/2 , pwtpi=(2*pi)**3/2 ,sqpi2=sqrt(pi/2.)
5831  data pi2, sqpi, pwtpi, sqpi2/9.86960440, 1.96870124, 15.74960995, &
5832  1.25331414/
5833  data lbmax, mbmax, nbmax/23, 23, 23/
5834  ! ini = 0 :initialisation of the routine
5835  if (ini<=0) then
5836  sq2pi = sqrt(2.*pi)
5837  ! input parameters
5838  igaus = 9
5839  ! eps allows to select the significant terms in the HERMITE series
5840  ! expansion
5841  eps = 8.e-03
5842  ! maximun of the upper limits in the HERMITE series expansion
5843  lmaxi = 11
5844  mmaxi = 11
5845  nmaxxi = 11
5846  ! The HERMITE coefficients Almn are computed with the particles
5847  ! include in a cube
5848  ! with regard to the RMS of the bunch. The sizes of the cube
5849  ! are:RMSx*fxrms, ........
5850  fxrms = 2.5
5851  fyrms = 2.5
5852  fzrms = 2.5
5853  if (ini<0) then
5854  read (in, *) lmaxi, mmaxi, nmaxxi
5855  write (16, *) 'upper limits ', lmaxi, mmaxi, nmaxxi
5856  read (in, *) fxrms, fyrms, fzrms
5857  write (16, *) ' rms factors', fxrms, fyrms, fzrms
5858  read (in, *) eps
5859  write (16, *) ' select the Hermite cefficients with: ', eps
5860  end if
5861  ! MESH**********
5862  ! limits in (+-) RMS
5863  rx = 4.
5864  ry = 4.
5865  rz = 4.
5866  ! number of nodes in each direction
5867  nx = 8
5868  ny = 8
5869  nz = 8
5870  ! rdcf : in %/100 , allows to select a reduced number of
5871  ! particles for the Almn.
5872  call shuffle
5873  call gausse
5874  read (in, *) rdcf
5875  if (rdcf>1.) rdcf = 1.
5876  if (rdcf<=0.) then
5877  if (ngood>15000) then
5878  rdcf = 15000./float(ngood)
5879  else
5880  rdcf = 1.
5881  end if
5882  end if
5883  call table(lbmax, mbmax, nbmax)
5884  return
5885  end if
5886  ! ********************************************************************
5887  !**
5888  if (ini==1) then
5889  ! ................................................................
5890  !.................
5891  ! seeks: the significant coefficients in the Hermite series
5892  ! expansions
5893  ! ---> storage array a(l,m,n)
5894  ! maximum values of l,m and n of the significants a(l,m,n)
5895  ! --->lmax,mmax,nmax
5896  ! RMS of the bunch ---> xa,xb and xc
5897  ! order of the succesives integrals
5898  ! isucc=1: xa<xb,xc , rms(3,2)=xa, rms(2,2)=xb, rms(1,2)=xc
5899  ! rms(3,k)=xa**(k-1), ..........
5900  ! isucc=2: xb<xa,xc , rms(3,2)=xb, rms(2,2)=xc, rms(1,2)=xa
5901  ! isucc=1: xc<xa,xb , rms(3,2)=xc, rms(2,2)=xa, rms(1,2)=xb
5902  ! compute the array blam(i,j)
5903  ! blam(i,j): FUNCTION beta**2 in the fifth relation in table 31
5904  ! blam(i,j)=beta**2j,j=1,...,im=(lmax+mmax+nmax+kmax)/2+2
5905  ! i is given from the i-Gauss position in absg(i)
5906  ! ................................................................
5907  !..................
5908  call bhdist
5909  call trms(isucc)
5910  sta = a(1, 1, 1)
5911  icoa = 0
5912  do ican = 1, nmax
5913  do icam = 1, mmax
5914  do ical = 1, lmax
5915  if (a(ican,icam,ical)/=0.) icoa = icoa + 1
5916  end do
5917  end do
5918  end do
5919  return
5920  end if
5921  ! ********************************************************************
5922  !**
5923  ! beam self-fields
5924  if (ini==2) then
5925  ! limits of the mesch : rx ry rz
5926  ! length of the steps
5927  delx = 2.*rx/float(nx)
5928  dely = 2.*ry/float(ny)
5929  delz = 2.*rz/float(nz)
5930  ! Initialize constants
5931  ! xmass-Kg,wavel=cm,charge=coul.
5932  ! clight=cm/sec MHz/Hz ,freq=Mhz ,xmat=MeV
5933  ! freq. in MHz
5934  freq = fh*0.5e-06/pi
5935  epsilon = 8.854189586e-12
5936  const3 = 1.e-06
5937  const2 = 1.e-06/xmat
5938  dxp = 0.
5939  dyp = 0.
5940  dw = 0.
5941  dz = scdist/100.
5942  dz1 = dz
5943  zsot1 = 0.
5944  ! qmpart=macro-charge
5945  qmpart = 1.0e-9*beamc/(float(imax)*freq)
5946  if (ratei<=0.) then
5947  write (16, *) ' all the particles are lost '
5948  stop
5949  end if
5950  qmpart = qmpart*ratei
5951  vrms = xrmsz*yrmsz*zrmsz
5952  cmacro = qmpart/(epsilon*vrms)
5953  wcg = 0.
5954  do i = 1, ngood
5955  wcg = wcg + f(7, i)
5956  end do
5957  wcg = wcg/float(ngood)
5958  gcg = wcg/xmat
5959  gmoy = gcg
5960  bcg = sqrt(1.-1./(gcg*gcg))
5961  bmoy = bcg
5962  ! relativistic correction
5963  cmacro = cmacro/gmoy
5964 
5965  cmacrxy = cmacro/(bmoy*bmoy*gmoy*gmoy)
5966  ! beam self-fields at the nodes of the mesh
5967  imail = 0
5968  rcy = -ry
5969  do j = 1, ny
5970  rcx = -rx
5971  do i = 1, nx
5972  rcz = -rz
5973  do k = 1, nz
5974  if (isucc==1) then
5975  s3 = rcx
5976  s2 = rcy
5977  s1 = rcz
5978  ax = pwtpi*rms(3, 2)
5979  ay = pwtpi*rms(2, 2)
5980  az = pwtpi*rms(1, 2)
5981  rrx = rms(3, 2)
5982  rry = rms(2, 2)
5983  rrz = rms(1, 2)
5984  end if
5985  if (isucc==2) then
5986  s3 = rcy
5987  s2 = rcz
5988  s1 = rcx
5989  ax = pwtpi*rms(1, 2)
5990  ay = pwtpi*rms(3, 2)
5991  az = pwtpi*rms(2, 2)
5992  rrx = rms(1, 2)
5993  rry = rms(3, 2)
5994  rrz = rms(2, 2)
5995  end if
5996  if (isucc==3) then
5997  s3 = rcz
5998  s2 = rcx
5999  s1 = rcy
6000  ax = pwtpi*rms(2, 2)
6001  ay = pwtpi*rms(1, 2)
6002  az = pwtpi*rms(3, 2)
6003  rrx = rms(2, 2)
6004  rry = rms(1, 2)
6005  rrz = rms(3, 2)
6006  end if
6007  call uvrms
6008  ! fields
6009  ! loop over the l,m and n
6010  exk(i, j, k) = 0.
6011  eyk(i, j, k) = 0.
6012  ezk(i, j, k) = 0.
6013  do jn = 1, nmax
6014  jn1 = jn - 1
6015  do jm = 1, mmax
6016  jm1 = jm - 1
6017  do jl = 1, lmax
6018  jl1 = jl - 1
6019  if (a(jl,jm,jn)/=0.) then
6020  call fielde(jl1, jm1, jn1, isucc)
6021  ! the beam self-fields are in tables
6022  ! 67-a to 67-h
6023  exk(i, j, k) = a(jl, jm, jn)/ax*ex + &
6024  exk(i, j, k)
6025  eyk(i, j, k) = a(jl, jm, jn)/ay*ey + &
6026  eyk(i, j, k)
6027  ezk(i, j, k) = a(jl, jm, jn)/az*ez + &
6028  ezk(i, j, k)
6029  end if
6030  end do
6031  end do
6032  end do
6033  rcz = rcz + delz
6034  imail = imail + 1
6035  end do
6036  rcx = rcx + delx
6037  end do
6038  rcy = rcy + dely
6039  end do
6040  ! xi in Amps, ibeam in mA
6041  dxp = 0.
6042  dyp = 0.
6043  dw = 0.
6044  ! save the particles coordinates
6045  do i = 1, ngood
6046  xc(i) = xcp(i)
6047  yc(i) = ycp(i)
6048  zc(i) = zcp(i)
6049  end do
6050  ! Do integration to determine Ex,Ey,Ez for each macro particle
6051  nprint = 1
6052  insd = 0
6053  iout = 0
6054  ickl = 0
6055  do ic = 1, ngood
6056  ! position in the mesh
6057  ickl = ickl + 1
6058  ! * valero
6059  u = xc(ic)/xrmsz
6060  v = yc(ic)/yrmsz
6061  w = zc(ic)/zrmsz
6062  ! omment u=xc(ic)/rrx
6063  ! omment v=yc(ic)/rry
6064  ! omment w=zc(ic)/rrz
6065  i = int((u+rx)/delx) + 1
6066  j = int((v+ry)/dely) + 1
6067  k = int((w+rz)/delz) + 1
6068  ! the particle is in the mesh
6069  if (i>0 .and. i<=nx .and. j>0 .and. j<=ny .and. k>0 .and. &
6070  k<=nz) then
6071  xnd1 = -rx + float(i-1)*delx
6072  ynd1 = -ry + float(j-1)*dely
6073  znd1 = -rz + float(k-1)*delz
6074  delu = u - xnd1
6075  delv = v - ynd1
6076  delw = w - znd1
6077  delux = delu/delx
6078  delvy = delv/dely
6079  delwz = delw/delz
6080  ! *******interpollation for particle inside a cube
6081  ! %%%%%% in plane 1:
6082  ! node 1: (i,j,k) node 2:(i+1,j,k) node 3:(i+1,j,k+1)
6083  ! node 4:(i,j,k+1)
6084  ! axis (nd1,nd2)
6085  ex12 = (exk(i+1,j,k)-exk(i,j,k))*delux + exk(i, j, k)
6086  ! axis (nd4,nd3)
6087  ex43 = (exk(i+1,j,k+1)-exk(i,j,k+1))*delux + &
6088  exk(i, j, k+1)
6089  ! plane 1
6090  exp1 = (ex43-ex12)*delwz + ex12
6091  ! %%%%%%% in plane 3:
6092  ! node 5:(i,j+1,k) node 6:(i+1,j+1,k) node 7:(i+1,j+1,k+1)
6093  ! node 8:(i,j+1,k+1)
6094  ! axis(nd5,nd6)
6095  ex56 = (exk(i+1,j+1,k)-exk(i,j+1,k))*delux + &
6096  exk(i, j+1, k)
6097  ! axis(nd8,nd7)
6098  ex87 = (exk(i+1,j+1,k+1)-exk(i,j+1,k+1))*delux + &
6099  exk(i, j+1, k+1)
6100  ! plane 3
6101  exp3 = (ex87-ex56)*delwz + ex56
6102  ! $$$$$ plane1+plane3
6103  exp13 = (exp3-exp1)*delvy + exp1
6104  ! %%%%% in plane 2:
6105  ! node 1: (i,j,k) node 2:(i+1,j,k) node 5:(i,j+1,k) node
6106  ! 6:(i+1,j+1,k)
6107  ! axis (nd1,nd2) : ex12
6108  ! axis (nd5,nd6) : ex56
6109  ! plane 2
6110  exp2 = (ex56-ex12)*delvy + ex12
6111  ! %%%%%% in plane 5
6112  ! node 4:(i,j,k+1) node 3:(i+1,j,k+1) node 8:(i,j+1,k+1)
6113  ! node 7:(i+1,j+1,k+1)
6114  ! axis(nd4,nd3)
6115  ex43 = (exk(i+1,j,k+1)-exk(i,j,k+1))*delux + &
6116  exk(i, j, k+1)
6117  ! axis(nd8,nd7)
6118  ex87 = (exk(i+1,j+1,k+1)-exk(i,j+1,k+1))*delux + &
6119  exk(i, j+1, k+1)
6120  ! plane 5
6121  exp5 = (ex87-ex43)*delvy + ex43
6122  ! $$$$ plane2+plane5
6123  exp25 = (exp5-exp2)*delwz + exp2
6124  ! &&&& (plane1+plane3)+(plane2+plane5) --> field Ex(u,v,w)
6125  ext = (exp13+exp25)/2.
6126  ! ******* field component Ey
6127  ! %%%%%% in plane 2:
6128  ! node 1: (i,j,k) node 2:(i+1,j,k) node 5:(i,j+1,k) node
6129  ! 6:(i+1,j+1,k)
6130  ! axis(nd1,nd5)
6131  ey15 = (eyk(i,j+1,k)-eyk(i,j,k))*delvy + eyk(i, j, k)
6132  ! axis (nd2,nd6)
6133  ey26 = (eyk(i+1,j+1,k)-eyk(i+1,j,k))*delvy + &
6134  eyk(i+1, j, k)
6135  ! plane 2
6136  eyp2 = (ey26-ey15)*delu/delx + ey15
6137  ! %%%%%% in plane 5:
6138  ! node 4:(i,j,k+1) node 3:(i+1,j,k+1) node 8:(i,j+1,k+1)
6139  ! node 7:(i+1,j+1,k+1)
6140  ! axis(nd4,nd8)
6141  ey48 = (eyk(i,j+1,k+1)-eyk(i,j,k+1))*delvy + &
6142  eyk(i, j, k+1)
6143  ! axis(nd3,nd7)
6144  ey37 = (eyk(i+1,j+1,k+1)-eyk(i+1,j,k+1))*delvy + &
6145  eyk(i+1, j, k+1)
6146  ! plane 5
6147  eyp5 = (ey37-ey48)*delux + ey48
6148  ! $$$$$$ plane2+plane5
6149  eyp25 = (eyp5-eyp2)*delwz + eyp2
6150  ! %%%%%% in plane 6:
6151  ! node 1:(i,j,k) node 5:(i,j+1,k) node 4:(i,j,k+1) node
6152  ! 8:(i,j+1,k+1)
6153  ! axis(nd1,nd5): ey15
6154  ! axis(nd4,nd8): ey48
6155  ! plane 6
6156  eyp6 = (ey48-ey15)*delwz + ey15
6157  ! %%%%%% in plane 4:
6158  ! node 2:(i+1,j,k) node 3:(i+1,j,k+1) node 6:(i+1,j+1,k)
6159  ! node 7:(i+1,j+1,k+1)
6160  ! axis(nd2,nd6): ey26
6161  ! axis(nd3,nd7): ey37
6162  ! plane 4
6163  eyp4 = (ey37-ey26)*delwz + ey26
6164  ! $$$$plane6+plane4
6165  eyp46 = (eyp4-eyp6)*delux + eyp6
6166  ! £££ (plane2+plane5)+(plane4+plane6)--> field Ez(u,v,w)
6167  eyt = (eyp25+eyp46)/2.
6168  ! *******interpollation of the field component Ez
6169  ! %%%%%% in plane 1:
6170  ! node 1:(i,j,k) node 2:(i+1,j,k) node 3:(i+1,j,k+1) node
6171  ! 4:(i,j,k+1)
6172  ! axis(nd1,nd4)
6173  ez14 = (ezk(i,j,k+1)-ezk(i,j,k))*delwz + ezk(i, j, k)
6174  ! axis(nd2,nd3)
6175  ez23 = (ezk(i+1,j,k+1)-ezk(i+1,j,k))*delwz + &
6176  ezk(i+1, j, k)
6177  ! plane 1
6178  ezp1 = (ez23-ez14)*delux + ez14
6179  ! %%%%%% in plane 3:
6180  ! node 5:(i,j+1,k) node 6:(i+1,j+1,k) node 7:(i+1,j+1,k+1)
6181  ! node 8:(i,j+1,k+1)
6182  ! axis (nd5,nd8)
6183  ez58 = (ezk(i,j+1,k+1)-ezk(i,j+1,k))*delwz + &
6184  ezk(i, j+1, k)
6185  ! axis (nd6,nd7)
6186  ez67 = (ezk(i+1,j+1,k+1)-ezk(i+1,j+1,k))*delwz + &
6187  ezk(i+1, j+1, k)
6188  ! plane 3
6189  ezp3 = (ez67-ez58)*delux + ez58
6190  ! $$$$$$ plane1+plane3
6191  ezp13 = (ezp3-ezp1)*delvy + ezp1
6192  ! %%%%%% in plane 6:
6193  ! node 1:(i,j,k) node 5:(i,j+1,k) node 4:(i,j,k+1) node
6194  ! 8:(i,j+1,k+1)
6195  ! axis (nd1,nd4)
6196  ez14 = (ezk(i,j,k+1)-ezk(i,j,k))*delwz + ezk(i, j, k)
6197  ! axis (nd5,nd8)
6198  ez58 = (ezk(i,j+1,k+1)-ezk(i,j+1,k))*delwz + &
6199  ezk(i, j+1, k)
6200  ! plane 6
6201  ezp6 = (ez58-ez14)*delvy + ez14
6202  ! %%%%%% in plane 4:
6203  ! node 2:(i+1,j,k) node 3:(i+1,j,k+1) node 6:(i+1,j+1,k)
6204  ! node 7:(i+1,j+1,k+1)
6205  ! axis(nd2,nd3)
6206  ez23 = (ezk(i+1,j,k+1)-ezk(i+1,j,k))*delwz + &
6207  ezk(i+1, j, k)
6208  ! axis(nd6,nd7)
6209  ez67 = (ezk(i+1,j+1,k+1)-ezk(i+1,j+1,k))*delwz + &
6210  ezk(i+1, j+1, k)
6211  ! plane 4
6212  ezp4 = (ez67-ez23)*delvy + ez23
6213  ! $$$$$$ plane6+plane4
6214  ezp64 = (ezp4-ezp6)*delux + ezp6
6215  ! £££££££ (P1+P3)+(P6+P4)----> Ez(u,v,w)
6216  ezt = (ezp13+ezp64)/2.
6217  insd = insd + 1
6218  ! calculate kicks in x',y' and z' (energy)
6219  eztp = ezt*cos(apl) - ext*sin(apl)
6220  extp = ezt*sin(apl) + ext*cos(apl)
6221  ezt = eztp
6222  ext = extp
6223  gsc = f(7, ic)/xmat
6224  bsc = sqrt(1.-1./(gsc*gsc))
6225  ! omment
6226  ! cmacrxy=cmacro/(bmoy*bmoy*gmoy*gmoy*gmoy)
6227  ! omment cmacrxy=cmacro/(bsc*bsc*gsc*gsc)
6228  dxp = const2*ext*dz*cmacrxy*abs(f(9,ic))
6229  dyp = const2*eyt*dz*cmacrxy*abs(f(9,ic))
6230  dw = const3*ezt*dz*cmacro*abs(f(9,ic))
6231  ! ****test************************************
6232  ! omment dw=dw/gmoy
6233  ! ****************************************
6234  if (.not. iesp) then
6235  ! load the entrance beam parameters for cavities or
6236  ! gaps
6237  do js = 1, 7
6238  f(js, ic) = fs(js, ic)
6239  end do
6240  f(3, ic) = f(3, ic) + dxp*1000.
6241  f(5, ic) = f(5, ic) + dyp*1000.
6242  f(2, ic) = f(2, ic) - dz1*dxp*100.*xpsc
6243  f(4, ic) = f(4, ic) - dz1*dyp*100.*xpsc
6244  ! omment f(2,ic)=f(2,ic)-dz1*dxp*100.
6245  ! omment f(4,ic)=f(4,ic)-dz1*dyp*100.
6246  dwp(ic) = dw
6247  else
6248  f(3, ic) = f(3, ic) + dxp*1000.
6249  f(5, ic) = f(5, ic) + dyp*1000.
6250  f(7, ic) = f(7, ic) + dw
6251  end if
6252  else
6253  ! the particle is not in the mesh
6254  ! computed the beam self-fields as made at the nodes
6255  ax = 0.
6256  ay = 0.
6257  az = 0.
6258  if (isucc==1) then
6259  s3 = xc(ic)/rms(3, 2)
6260  s2 = yc(ic)/rms(2, 2)
6261  s1 = zc(ic)/rms(1, 2)
6262  ax = pwtpi*rms(3, 2)
6263  ay = pwtpi*rms(2, 2)
6264  az = pwtpi*rms(1, 2)
6265  rrx = rms(3, 2)
6266  rry = rms(2, 2)
6267  rrz = rms(1, 2)
6268  end if
6269  if (isucc==2) then
6270  s3 = yc(ic)/rms(3, 2)
6271  s2 = zc(ic)/rms(2, 2)
6272  s1 = xc(ic)/rms(1, 2)
6273  ax = pwtpi*rms(1, 2)
6274  ay = pwtpi*rms(3, 2)
6275  az = pwtpi*rms(2, 2)
6276  rrx = rms(1, 2)
6277  rry = rms(3, 2)
6278  rrz = rms(2, 2)
6279  end if
6280  if (isucc==3) then
6281  s3 = zc(ic)/rms(3, 2)
6282  s2 = xc(ic)/rms(2, 2)
6283  s1 = yc(ic)/rms(1, 2)
6284  ax = pwtpi*rms(2, 2)
6285  ay = pwtpi*rms(1, 2)
6286  az = pwtpi*rms(3, 2)
6287  rrx = rms(2, 2)
6288  rry = rms(1, 2)
6289  rrz = rms(3, 2)
6290  end if
6291  ! storage arrays of the functions in the integrals in
6292  ! tables 75 and 76
6293  ! these values given in table 73 are independent of l, m
6294  ! and n
6295  ! They are stored in: epsi1(i,j),epsi2(i,j), akpc1(i,j),
6296  ! akpc2(i,j),
6297  ! akps1(i,j), akps2(i,j) where i,j are the Gauss positions
6298  call uvrms
6299  ! field computation
6300  ! loop over the l,m and n
6301  ext = 0.
6302  eyt = 0.
6303  ezt = 0.
6304  do jn = 1, nmax
6305  jn1 = jn - 1
6306  do jm = 1, mmax
6307  jm1 = jm - 1
6308  do jl = 1, lmax
6309  jl1 = jl - 1
6310  if (a(jl,jm,jn)/=0.) then
6311  ! in output the SUBROUTINE field returns
6312  ! the values of the FUNCTION E*(l,m,n)
6313  ! shown in tables 77-a-1 to 77-b-2 in x,y
6314  ! and z-directions-->ex,ey,ez
6315  call fielde(jl1, jm1, jn1, isucc)
6316  ! the corresonding field components are
6317  ! obtained from tables 67-a to 67-h
6318  ext = a(jl, jm, jn)/ax*ex + ext
6319  eyt = a(jl, jm, jn)/ay*ey + eyt
6320  ezt = a(jl, jm, jn)/az*ez + ezt
6321  end if
6322  end do
6323  end do
6324  end do
6325  iout = iout + 1
6326  ! kicks
6327  ! kicks computation
6328  ! calculate kick in x',y' and z' (energy)
6329  ! isochronism correction
6330  eztp = ezt*cos(apl) - ext*sin(apl)
6331  extp = ezt*sin(apl) + ext*cos(apl)
6332  ezt = eztp
6333  ext = extp
6334  gsc = f(7, ic)/xmat
6335  bsc = sqrt(1.-1./(gsc*gsc))
6336  ! omment cmacrxy=cmacro/(bmoy*bmoy*gmoy*gmoy)
6337  ! omment cmacrxy=cmacro/(bsc*bsc*gsc*gsc)
6338  dxp = const2*ext*dz*cmacrxy*abs(f(9,ic))
6339  dyp = const2*eyt*dz*cmacrxy*abs(f(9,ic))
6340  dw = const3*ezt*dz*cmacro*abs(f(9,ic))
6341  if (.not. iesp) then
6342  ! load the beam at the input at cavities or gaps
6343  do js = 1, 7
6344  f(js, ic) = fs(js, ic)
6345  end do
6346  f(3, ic) = f(3, ic) + dxp*1000.
6347  f(5, ic) = f(5, ic) + dyp*1000.
6348  f(2, ic) = f(2, ic) - dz1*dxp*100.*xpsc
6349  f(4, ic) = f(4, ic) - dz1*dyp*100.*xpsc
6350  ! omment f(2,ic)=f(2,ic)-dz1*dxp*100.
6351  ! omment f(4,ic)=f(4,ic)-dz1*dyp*100.
6352  dwp(ic) = dw
6353  else
6354  f(3, ic) = f(3, ic) + dxp*1000.
6355  f(5, ic) = f(5, ic) + dyp*1000.
6356  f(7, ic) = f(7, ic) + dw
6357  end if
6358  end if
6359  ! end of if particle not in mesh
6360  nprint = nprint + 1
6361  ! end of the loop ic
6362  end do
6363  write (16, *) ' particles in the mesh:', insd, ' outside: ', iout
6364  ! end of if when ini=2
6365  end if
6366  ! 1000 format(4(2x,e12.5))
6367  return
6368  end subroutine hersc
6379  subroutine xtypl1(gami, saphi, qsc, dcg)
6380  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
6381  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
6382  common /posi/ist
6383  common /jacob/gaks, gaps
6384  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
6385  common /bedycp/phslip, eqvl, asdl, peqvl, pavph, xkp1, xkp2, aa, bb, &
6386  cc, dd, ee, pcrest, sqcttf
6387  common /typl1/yh1k0, yh1k1, yp1k1, yp1k2, yh1k00, yh1k01, yp1k01, &
6388  yp1k02, yh10, yh11, yp11, yp12
6389  common /typl2/yh2k0, yh2k1, yp2k1, yp2k2, yh2k00, yh2k01, yp2k01, &
6390  yp2k02, yh20, yh21, yp21, yp22
6391  ! TRANSVERSAL dE(z)/dt
6392  common /typi1/ye1k0, ye1k1, ye1k2, ye1kc0, ye1kc1, ye1kc2, ye10, ye11, &
6393  ye12
6394  common /typi2/ye2k0, ye2k1, ye2k2, ye2kc0, ye2kc1, ye2kc2, ye20, ye21, &
6395  ye22
6396  dimension h(17), t(17)
6397  data t/ -.990575473, -.950675522, -.880239154, -.781514004, &
6398  -.657671159, -.512690537, -.351231763, -.178484181, 0., &
6399  .178484181, .351231763, .512690537, .657671159, .781514004, &
6400  .880239154, .950675522, .990575473/
6401  data h/.024148303, .055459529, .085036148, .111883847, .135136368, &
6402  .154045761, .168004102, .176562705, .179446470, .176562705, &
6403  .168004102, .154045761, .135136368, .111883847, .085036148, &
6404  .055459529, .024148303/
6405 
6406  fh0 = fh/vl
6407  ! valero 08/08/07
6408  ! omment CGI=ABS(QSC/XMAT)
6409  cgi = qsc/xmat
6410  ! *
6411  ! Circular cosinus functions
6412  ! In longitudinal direction
6413  yh1k0 = 0.
6414  yh1k1 = 0.
6415  yp1k1 = 0.
6416  yp1k2 = 0.
6417  yh1k00 = 0.
6418  yh1k01 = 0.
6419  yp1k01 = 0.
6420  yp1k02 = 0.
6421  yh10 = 0.
6422  yh11 = 0.
6423  yp11 = 0.
6424  yp12 = 0.
6425  ! In transverse direction ( dE(z)/dt )
6426  ye1k0 = 0.
6427  ye1k1 = 0.
6428  ye1k2 = 0.
6429  ye1kc0 = 0.
6430  ye1kc1 = 0.
6431  ye1kc2 = 0.
6432  ye10 = 0.
6433  ye11 = 0.
6434  ye12 = 0.
6435  ! Circular sinus functions
6436  ! In longitudinal direction
6437  yh2k0 = 0.
6438  yh2k1 = 0.
6439  yp2k1 = 0.
6440  yp2k2 = 0.
6441  yh2k00 = 0.
6442  yh2k01 = 0.
6443  yp2k01 = 0.
6444  yp2k02 = 0.
6445  yh20 = 0.
6446  yh21 = 0.
6447  yp21 = 0.
6448  yp22 = 0.
6449  ! In transverse direction ( dE(z)/dt )
6450  ye2k0 = 0.
6451  ye2k1 = 0.
6452  ye2k2 = 0.
6453  ye2kc0 = 0.
6454  ye2kc1 = 0.
6455  ye2kc2 = 0.
6456  ye20 = 0.
6457  ye21 = 0.
6458  ye22 = 0.
6459  ! Calculates the integrals
6460  dtilk = eqvl
6461  gam2 = gami**2
6462  beti = sqrt(1.-1./gam2)
6463  xk1 = fh0/beti
6464  tilta2 = phslip/(2.*eqvl)
6465  cgam10 = ((gami*gami-1.)**1.5)/fh0
6466  phcrtk = (t1k*sk-s1k*tk)/(tk*tk+sk*sk)
6467  ist = 0
6468  do i = 1, 17
6469  ist = ist + 1
6470  xcc = eqvl*(1.+t(i))/2.
6471  xcc1 = xcc + asdl
6472  if (xcc1>dcg) go to 200
6473  phit0 = saphi - phslip*(eqvl-xcc)/(2.*eqvl) + pavph
6474  ! FONCTION GAMMA (Z)
6475  if (phslip/=0.) then
6476  git = cgi*sqcttf*cos(phit0-pcrest)/phslip
6477  gis = sin(xcc*tilta2)
6478  else
6479  git = cgi*sqcttf*cos(phit0-pcrest)
6480  gis = xcc/(2.*eqvl)
6481  end if
6482  gi = gami + git*gis
6483  bi = sqrt(1.-1./(gi*gi))
6484  ! Derivative of G0(Z) relative to the equivalent k
6485  phit0k = -dtilk*(1.-xcc/eqvl)/2.
6486  if (phslip/=0.) then
6487  gic = cos(xcc*tilta2)
6488  gak1 = dtilk*cos(phit0-pcrest)*gis/(phslip*phslip)
6489  gak2 = sin(phit0-pcrest)*gis*(phit0k-phcrtk)/phslip
6490  gak3 = dtilk*cos(phit0-pcrest)*xcc*gic/(2.*phslip*eqvl)
6491  gak = cgi*sqcttf*(-gak1-gak2+gak3)
6492  else
6493  gak1 = sin(phit0-pcrest)*gis*(phit0k-phcrtk)
6494  gak = -cgi*sqcttf*gak1
6495  end if
6496  if (i==17) gaks = gak
6497  ! Calculate the integrals of HA0(Z) and HB0(Z)
6498  xint = 1./(bi*bi*bi*gi*gi*gi)
6499  phit1 = phit0 + xcc*phslip/(2.*eqvl)
6500  phtz0 = (xcc/eqvl-.5)*dtilk
6501  ha0 = 2.*sqcttf*cos(phit1-pcrest)*xint
6502  hb0 = 2.*sqcttf*sin(phit1-pcrest)*xint
6503  ! n=0
6504  ! Longitudinal direction
6505  yh10 = yh10 + h(i)*ha0
6506  yh20 = yh20 + h(i)*hb0
6507  ! Transverse direction
6508  ye10 = yh20
6509  ye20 = yh10
6510  ! n=1
6511  ! Longitudinal direction
6512  yh11 = yh11 + h(i)*ha0*xcc1
6513  yh21 = yh21 + h(i)*hb0*xcc1
6514  ! Transverse direction
6515  ye11 = ye11 + h(i)*hb0*xcc
6516  ye21 = ye21 + h(i)*ha0*xcc
6517  ! n=2
6518  ye12 = ye12 + h(i)*hb0*xcc*xcc
6519  ye22 = ye22 + h(i)*ha0*xcc*xcc
6520  ! Calculate the integrals of the derivative of HA0(Z)
6521  dha01 = sqcttf*cos(phit1-pcrest)*gi/((gi*gi-1.)**2.5)
6522  dha02 = sqcttf*cos(phit1-pcrest)*gi*gak/((gi*gi-1.)**2.5)
6523  dha03 = sqcttf*sin(phit1-pcrest)/((gi*gi-1.)**1.5)
6524  ! n=0
6525  ! Longitudinal direction
6526  yh1k00 = yh1k00 + h(i)*dha01*6.*cgam10
6527  yh1k0 = yh1k0 + h(i)*(-6.*dha02+2.*(phcrtk-phtz0)*dha03)
6528  ! Transverse direction
6529  ye2kc0 = yh1k00
6530  ye2k0 = yh1k0
6531  ! n=1
6532  ! Longitudinal direction
6533  yh1k01 = yh1k01 + h(i)*dha01*xcc1*6.*cgam10
6534  yh1k1 = yh1k1 + h(i)*xcc1*(-6.*dha02+2.*(phcrtk-phtz0)*dha03)
6535  ! Transverse direction
6536  ye2kc1 = ye2kc1 + h(i)*dha01*xcc*6.*cgam10
6537  ye2k1 = ye2k1 + h(i)*xcc*(-6.*dha02-2.*(phcrtk-phtz0)*dha03)
6538  ! n=2
6539  ye2kc2 = ye2kc2 + h(i)*dha01*xcc*xcc*6.*cgam10
6540  ye2k2 = ye2k2 + h(i)*xcc*xcc*(-6.*dha02-2.*(phcrtk-phtz0)*dha03)
6541  ! INTEGRALS Of HB0(Z)
6542  dhb01 = sqcttf*sin(phit1-pcrest)*gi/((gi*gi-1.)**2.5)
6543  dhb02 = sqcttf*sin(phit1-pcrest)*gi*gak/((gi*gi-1.)**2.5)
6544  dhb03 = sqcttf*cos(phit1-pcrest)/((gi*gi-1.)**1.5)
6545  ! n=0
6546  ! LONGITUDINAL
6547  yh2k00 = yh2k00 + h(i)*dhb01*6.*cgam10
6548  yh2k0 = yh2k0 + h(i)*(-6.*dhb02-2.*(phcrtk-phtz0)*dhb03)
6549  ! TRANSVERSE
6550  ye1kc0 = yh2k00
6551  ye1k0 = yh2k0
6552  ! n=1
6553  ! LONGITUDINAL
6554  yh2k01 = yh2k01 + h(i)*dhb01*xcc1*6.*cgam10
6555  yh2k1 = yh2k1 + h(i)*xcc1*(-6.*dhb02-2.*(phcrtk-phtz0)*dhb03)
6556  ! TRANSVERSE
6557  ye1kc1 = ye1kc1 + h(i)*dhb01*xcc*6.*cgam10
6558  ye1k1 = ye1k1 + h(i)*xcc*(-6.*dhb02-2.*(phcrtk-phtz0)*dhb03)
6559  ! n=2
6560  ye1kc2 = ye1kc2 + h(i)*dhb01*xcc*xcc*6.*cgam10
6561  ye1k2 = ye1k2 + h(i)*xcc*xcc*(-6.*dhb02-2.*(phcrtk-phtz0)*dhb03)
6562  ! Calculate the integrals of PA0(Z) et PB0(Z)
6563  pa0 = 2.*sqcttf*cos(phit1-pcrest)*xint*xint
6564  pb0 = 2.*sqcttf*sin(phit1-pcrest)*xint*xint
6565  ! n=1
6566  yp11 = yp11 + h(i)*pa0*xcc1
6567  yp21 = yp21 + h(i)*pb0*xcc1
6568  ! n=2
6569  yp12 = yp12 + h(i)*pa0*xcc1*xcc1
6570  yp22 = yp22 + h(i)*pb0*xcc1*xcc1
6571  ! Calculate the integrals of the derivatives of PA0(Z)
6572  dpa01 = sqcttf*cos(phit1-pcrest)*gi/((gi*gi-1.)**4)
6573  dpa02 = sqcttf*cos(phit1-pcrest)*gi*gak/((gi*gi-1.)**4)
6574  dpa03 = sqcttf*sin(phit1-pcrest)/((gi*gi-1.)**3)
6575  ! n=1
6576  yp1k01 = yp1k01 + h(i)*dpa01*12.*cgam10*xcc1
6577  yp1k1 = yp1k1 + h(i)*xcc1*(-12.*dpa02+2.*(phcrtk-phtz0)*dpa03)
6578  ! n=2
6579  yp1k02 = yp1k02 + h(i)*dpa01*12.*cgam10*xcc1*xcc1
6580  yp1k2 = yp1k2 + h(i)*xcc1*xcc1*(-12.*dpa02+2.*(phcrtk-phtz0)*dpa03 &
6581  )
6582  ! INTEGRALES DERIVES PB0(Z)
6583  dpb01 = sqcttf*sin(phit1-pcrest)*gi/((gi*gi-1.)**4)
6584  dpb02 = sqcttf*sin(phit1-pcrest)*gi*gak/((gi*gi-1.)**4)
6585  dpb02 = dpb02
6586  dpb03 = sqcttf*cos(phit1-pcrest)/((gi*gi-1.)**3)
6587  ! n=1
6588  yp2k01 = yp2k01 + h(i)*dpb01*12.*cgam10*xcc1
6589  yp2k1 = yp2k1 + h(i)*xcc1*(-12.*dpb02-2.*(phcrtk-phtz0)*dpb03)
6590  ! n=2
6591  yp2k02 = yp2k02 + h(i)*dpb01*12.*cgam10*xcc1*xcc1
6592  yp2k2 = yp2k2 + h(i)*xcc1*xcc1*(-12.*dpb02-2.*(phcrtk-phtz0)*dpb03 &
6593  )
6594  end do
6595 200 continue
6596  ! in COS
6597  ! LONGITUDINAL INTEGRALS
6598  yh1k00 = yh1k00/2.*eqvl
6599  yh1k01 = yh1k01/2.*eqvl
6600  yh1k0 = yh1k0/2.*eqvl
6601  yh1k1 = yh1k1/2.*eqvl
6602  yp1k1 = yp1k1/2.*eqvl
6603  yp1k2 = yp1k2/2.*eqvl
6604  yp1k01 = yp1k01/2.*eqvl
6605  yp1k02 = yp1k02/2.*eqvl
6606  yh10 = yh10*eqvl/2.
6607  yh11 = yh11*eqvl/2.
6608  yp11 = yp11*eqvl/2.
6609  yp12 = yp12*eqvl/2.
6610  ! Transverse integrals
6611  ye1k0 = ye1k0/2.*eqvl
6612  ye1kc0 = ye1kc0/2.*eqvl
6613  ye1k1 = ye1k1/2.*eqvl
6614  ye1kc1 = ye1kc1/2.*eqvl
6615  ye1k2 = ye1k2/2.*eqvl
6616  ye1kc2 = ye1kc2/2.*eqvl
6617  ye10 = ye10*eqvl/2.
6618  ye11 = ye11*eqvl/2.
6619  ye12 = ye12*eqvl/2.
6620  ! in SIN
6621  ! LONGITUDINAL INTEGRALS
6622  yh2k00 = yh2k00/2.*eqvl
6623  yh2k01 = yh2k01/2.*eqvl
6624  yh2k0 = yh2k0/2.*eqvl
6625  yh2k1 = yh2k1/2.*eqvl
6626  yp2k1 = yp2k1/2.*eqvl
6627  yp2k2 = yp2k2/2.*eqvl
6628  yp2k01 = yp2k01/2.*eqvl
6629  yp2k02 = yp2k02/2.*eqvl
6630  yh20 = yh20*eqvl/2.
6631  yh21 = yh21*eqvl/2.
6632  yp21 = yp21*eqvl/2.
6633  yp22 = yp22*eqvl/2.
6634  ! TRANSVERSE INTEGRALS
6635  ye2k0 = ye2k0/2.*eqvl
6636  ye2kc0 = ye2kc0/2.*eqvl
6637  ye2k1 = ye2k1/2.*eqvl
6638  ye2kc1 = ye2kc1/2.*eqvl
6639  ye2k2 = ye2k2/2.*eqvl
6640  ye2kc2 = ye2kc2/2.*eqvl
6641  ye20 = ye20*eqvl/2.
6642  ye21 = ye21*eqvl/2.
6643  ye22 = ye22*eqvl/2.
6644  ! 100 CONTINUE
6645  return
6646  end subroutine xtypl1
6654  subroutine chasel
6655  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
6656  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
6657  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
6658  common /fene/wdisp, wphas, wx, wy, rlim, ifw
6659  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
6660  common /qmoyen/qmoy
6661  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
6662  common /tapes/in, ifile, meta
6663  common /etcha1/dav2(maxcell1, 33), ichas(iptsz), chasit
6664  logical chasit
6665  common /etchas/fractx, fracty, fractl
6666  common /etcom/cog(8), exten(17), fd(iptsz)
6667  common /pool/zl(iptsz), ipin(iptsz)
6668 
6669  if (fractl>=1.) return
6670  do i = 1, ngood
6671  ichas(i) = 1
6672  zl(i) = 0.
6673  ipin(i) = 1
6674  end do
6675  nl = int(float(ngood)*fractl)
6676  inz = 0
6677  imaxf = ngood
6678  inx = 0
6679  ! ellipsoid of concentration (phase-dispersion)
6680  tx2 = 0.
6681  txp2 = 0.
6682  txxp = 0.
6683  do i = 1, ngood
6684  tx2 = tx2 + f(6, i)*f(6, i)
6685  txp2 = txp2 + fd(i)*fd(i)
6686  txxp = txxp + f(6, i)*fd(i)
6687  end do
6688  tx2 = tx2/float(ngood)
6689  txp2 = txp2/float(ngood)
6690  txxp = txxp/float(ngood)
6691  delxxp = tx2*txp2 - txxp*txxp
6692  ikept = 0
6693  do i = 1, ngood
6694  theta = pi/2.
6695  if (fd(i)/=0.) theta = atan(f(6,i)/fd(i))
6696  rpart = f(6, i)*f(6, i) + fd(i)*fd(i)
6697  cos2 = cos(theta)*cos(theta)
6698  sin2 = sin(theta)*sin(theta)
6699  denom = tx2*cos2 + txp2*sin2 - 2.*txxp*cos(theta)*sin(theta)
6700  relpse = 2.5*delxxp/denom
6701  if (fractl>=.97) then
6702  relpse = 3.5*delxxp/denom
6703  else
6704  if (fractl>=.95) relpse = 3.*delxxp/denom
6705  end if
6706  if (rpart<=relpse) then
6707  ipin(i) = 0
6708  ikept = ikept + 1
6709  end if
6710  end do
6711  write (16, *) ' CHASEL:', fractl, ' % over: ', ngood - ikept, &
6712  ' particles'
6713  do j = 1, ngood
6714  if (ipin(j)==1) then
6715  inz = inz + 1
6716  if (imaxf<=nl) go to 9990
6717  imaxx = 0
6718  tx = 0.
6719  txp = 0.
6720  txxp = 0.
6721  tx2 = 0.
6722  txp2 = 0.
6723  do i = 1, ngood
6724  if (ichas(i)==1) then
6725  tx = f(6, i) + tx
6726  txp = fd(i) + txp
6727  tx2 = tx2 + f(6, i)*f(6, i)
6728  txp2 = txp2 + fd(i)*fd(i)
6729  txxp = txxp + f(6, i)*fd(i)
6730  imaxx = imaxx + 1
6731  end if
6732  end do
6733  tx = tx/float(imaxx)
6734  txp = txp/float(imaxx)
6735  tx2 = tx2/float(imaxx)
6736  txp2 = txp2/float(imaxx)
6737  txxp = txxp/float(imaxx)
6738  xcg = tx
6739  zcg = txp
6740  ! betatron parameters
6741  xxl = tx2 - tx*tx
6742  zzl = txp2 - txp*txp
6743  xzl = txxp - tx*txp
6744  if (inz==1) go to 8880
6745  flcrit = 2.*fl2rms*log(2.*imaxx)
6746  if (zlma<flcrit) go to 7770
6747 8880 emil = sqrt(xxl*zzl-xzl*xzl)
6748  if (emil==0.) then
6749  al = 0.
6750  bl = 0.
6751  cl = 0.
6752  else
6753  bl = sqrt(xxl/emil)
6754  cl = 1./bl
6755  al = -xzl/emil
6756  end if
6757  tlx0 = tx
6758  tlz0 = txp
6759 7770 fl2rms = (1.+al*al)*xxl/bl + 2.*al*xzl + bl*zzl
6760  zlma = 0.
6761  do i = 1, ngood
6762  zl(i) = 0.
6763  if (ichas(i)==1) then
6764  psx = f(6, i) - tlx0
6765  psz = fd(i) - tlz0
6766  zl(i) = psx*psx*cl*cl + (psx*al/bl+psz*bl)**2
6767  if (zlma<zl(i)) then
6768  zlma = zl(i)
6769  izlma = i
6770  end if
6771  end if
6772  end do
6773  ! particle is eliminated
6774  imaxf = 0
6775  if (zlma==0.) zlma = 1.e10
6776  do i = 1, ngood
6777  if (ichas(i)==1 .and. zl(i)<zlma) then
6778  imaxf = imaxf + 1
6779  else
6780  ichas(i) = 0
6781  end if
6782  end do
6783  end if
6784  end do
6785 9990 continue
6786  return
6787  end subroutine chasel
6795  subroutine chasex
6796  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
6797  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
6798  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
6799  common /fene/wdisp, wphas, wx, wy, rlim, ifw
6800  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
6801  common /qmoyen/qmoy
6802  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
6803  common /tapes/in, ifile, meta
6804  common /etcha1/dav2(maxcell1, 33), ichas(iptsz), chasit
6805  logical chasit
6806  common /etchas/fractx, fracty, fractl
6807  common /pool/zl(iptsz), ipin(iptsz)
6808 
6809  if (fractx>=1.) return
6810  do i = 1, ngood
6811  ichas(i) = 1
6812  zl(i) = 0.
6813  ipin(i) = 1
6814  end do
6815  nl = int(float(ngood)*fractx)
6816  inz = 0
6817  imaxf = ngood
6818  inx = 0
6819  ! ellipsoid of concentration (x-xp)
6820  tx2 = 0.
6821  txp2 = 0.
6822  txxp = 0.
6823  do i = 1, ngood
6824  f2 = f(2, i)*1.e-02
6825  f3 = f(3, i)*1.e-03
6826  tx2 = tx2 + f2*f2
6827  txp2 = txp2 + f3*f3
6828  txxp = txxp + f2*f3
6829  end do
6830  tx2 = tx2/float(ngood)
6831  txp2 = txp2/float(ngood)
6832  txxp = txxp/float(ngood)
6833  delxxp = tx2*txp2 - txxp*txxp
6834  ikept = 0
6835  do i = 1, ngood
6836  theta = pi/2.
6837  f2 = f(2, i)*1.e-02
6838  f3 = f(3, i)*1.e-03
6839  if (f3/=0.) theta = atan(f2/f3)
6840  rpart = f2*f2 + f3*f3
6841  cos2 = cos(theta)*cos(theta)
6842  sin2 = sin(theta)*sin(theta)
6843  denom = tx2*cos2 + txp2*sin2 - 2.*txxp*cos(theta)*sin(theta)
6844  relpse = 2.5*delxxp/denom
6845  if (fractx>=.97) then
6846  relpse = 3.5*delxxp/denom
6847  else
6848  if (fractx>=.95) relpse = 3.*delxxp/denom
6849  end if
6850  if (rpart<=relpse) then
6851  ipin(i) = 0
6852  ikept = ikept + 1
6853  end if
6854  end do
6855  write (16, *) ' CHASEX:', fractx, ' % over: ', ngood - ikept, &
6856  ' particles'
6857  do j = 1, ngood
6858  if (ipin(j)==1) then
6859  inz = inz + 1
6860  if (imaxf<=nl) go to 9990
6861  imaxx = 0
6862  tx = 0.
6863  txp = 0.
6864  txxp = 0.
6865  tx2 = 0.
6866  txp2 = 0.
6867  do i = 1, ngood
6868  if (ichas(i)==1) then
6869  tx = f(2, i) + tx
6870  txp = f(3, i) + txp
6871  tx2 = tx2 + f(2, i)*f(2, i)
6872  txp2 = txp2 + f(3, i)*f(3, i)
6873  txxp = txxp + f(2, i)*f(3, i)
6874  imaxx = imaxx + 1
6875  end if
6876  end do
6877  tx = tx/float(imaxx)
6878  txp = txp/float(imaxx)
6879  tx2 = tx2/float(imaxx)
6880  txp2 = txp2/float(imaxx)
6881  txxp = txxp/float(imaxx)
6882  xcg = tx
6883  zcg = txp
6884  ! betatron parameters
6885  xxl = tx2 - tx*tx
6886  zzl = txp2 - txp*txp
6887  xzl = txxp - tx*txp
6888  if (inz==1) go to 8880
6889  flcrit = 2.*fl2rms*log(2.*imaxx)
6890  if (zlma<flcrit) go to 7770
6891 8880 emil = sqrt(xxl*zzl-xzl*xzl)
6892  if (emil==0.) then
6893  al = 0.
6894  bl = 0.
6895  cl = 0.
6896  else
6897  bl = sqrt(xxl/emil)
6898  cl = 1./bl
6899  al = -xzl/emil
6900  end if
6901  tlx0 = tx
6902  tlz0 = txp
6903 7770 fl2rms = (1.+al*al)*xxl/bl + 2.*al*xzl + bl*zzl
6904  zlma = 0.
6905  do i = 1, ngood
6906  zl(i) = 0.
6907  if (ichas(i)==1) then
6908  psx = f(2, i) - tlx0
6909  psz = f(3, i) - tlz0
6910  zl(i) = psx*psx*cl*cl + (psx*al/bl+psz*bl)**2
6911  if (zlma<zl(i)) then
6912  zlma = zl(i)
6913  izlma = i
6914  end if
6915  end if
6916  end do
6917  ! particle is eliminated
6918  imaxf = 0
6919  if (zlma==0.) zlma = 1.e10
6920  do i = 1, ngood
6921  if (ichas(i)==1 .and. zl(i)<zlma) then
6922  imaxf = imaxf + 1
6923  else
6924  ichas(i) = 0
6925  end if
6926  end do
6927  end if
6928  end do
6929 9990 continue
6930  return
6931  end subroutine chasex
6939  subroutine chase
6940  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
6941  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
6942  common /tapes/in, ifile, meta
6943  common /etchas/fractx, fracty, fractl
6944  common /etcha1/dav2(maxcell1, 33), ichas(iptsz), chasit
6945  logical chasit
6946 
6947  read (in, *) fractx, fracty, fractl
6948  write (16, 1) fractx*100., fracty*100., fractl*100.
6949 1 format (' ARE KEPT IN THE BUNCH ', /, ' (x,xp) : ', f7.3, &
6950  ' %', /, ' (y,yp) : ', f7.3, ' % ', /, &
6951  ' (w,phase):', f7.3, ' %')
6952 
6953  chasit = .false.
6954  if (fractx<1.) chasit = .true.
6955  if (fracty<1.) chasit = .true.
6956  if (fractl<1.) chasit = .true.
6957  return
6958  end subroutine chase
6966  subroutine chasey
6967  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
6968  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
6969  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
6970  common /fene/wdisp, wphas, wx, wy, rlim, ifw
6971  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
6972  common /qmoyen/qmoy
6973  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
6974  common /tapes/in, ifile, meta
6975  common /etcha1/dav2(maxcell1, 33), ichas(iptsz), chasit
6976  logical chasit
6977  common /etchas/fractx, fracty, fractl
6978  common /pool/zl(iptsz), ipin(iptsz)
6979 
6980  if (fracty>=1.) return
6981  do i = 1, ngood
6982  ichas(i) = 1
6983  zl(i) = 0.
6984  ipin(i) = 1
6985  end do
6986  ! ellipsoid of concentration (y-yp)
6987  ty2 = 0.
6988  typ2 = 0.
6989  tyyp = 0.
6990  do i = 1, ngood
6991  f4 = f(4, i)*1.e-02
6992  f5 = f(5, i)*1.e-03
6993  ty2 = ty2 + f4*f4
6994  typ2 = typ2 + f5*f5
6995  tyyp = tyyp + f4*f5
6996  end do
6997  ty2 = ty2/float(ngood)
6998  typ2 = typ2/float(ngood)
6999  tyyp = tyyp/float(ngood)
7000  delyyp = ty2*typ2 - tyyp*tyyp
7001  ikept = 0
7002  do i = 1, ngood
7003  f4 = f(4, i)*1.e-02
7004  f5 = f(5, i)*1.e-03
7005  theta = pi/2.
7006  if (f5/=0.) theta = atan(f4/f5)
7007  rpart = f4*f4 + f5*f5
7008  cos2 = cos(theta)*cos(theta)
7009  sin2 = sin(theta)*sin(theta)
7010  denom = ty2*cos2 + typ2*sin2 - 2.*tyyp*cos(theta)*sin(theta)
7011  relpse = 2.5*delyyp/denom
7012  if (fracty>=.97) then
7013  relpse = 3.5*delyyp/denom
7014  else
7015  if (fracty>=.95) relpse = 3.*delyyp/denom
7016  end if
7017  if (rpart<=relpse) then
7018  ipin(i) = 0
7019  ikept = ikept + 1
7020  end if
7021  end do
7022  write (16, *) ' CHASEY:', fracty, ' % over: ', ngood - ikept, &
7023  ' particles'
7024  imaxf = ngood
7025  nl = int(float(ngood)*fracty)
7026  inz = 0
7027  do j = 1, ngood
7028  if (ipin(j)==1) then
7029  inz = inz + 1
7030  if (imaxf<=nl) go to 9990
7031  imaxx = 0
7032  ty = 0.
7033  typ = 0.
7034  tyyp = 0.
7035  ty2 = 0.
7036  typ2 = 0.
7037  do i = 1, ngood
7038  if (ichas(i)==1) then
7039  ty = f(4, i) + ty
7040  typ = f(5, i) + typ
7041  ty2 = ty2 + f(4, i)*f(4, i)
7042  typ2 = typ2 + f(5, i)*f(5, i)
7043  tyyp = tyyp + f(4, i)*f(5, i)
7044  imaxx = imaxx + 1
7045  end if
7046  end do
7047  ty = ty/float(imaxx)
7048  typ = typ/float(imaxx)
7049  ty2 = ty2/float(imaxx)
7050  typ2 = typ2/float(imaxx)
7051  tyyp = tyyp/float(imaxx)
7052  xcg = ty
7053  zcg = typ
7054  ! betatron parameters
7055  xxl = ty2 - ty*ty
7056  zzl = typ2 - typ*typ
7057  xzl = tyyp - ty*typ
7058  if (inz==1) go to 8880
7059  flcrit = 2.*fl2rms*log(2.*imaxx)
7060  if (zlma<flcrit) go to 7770
7061 8880 emil = sqrt(xxl*zzl-xzl*xzl)
7062  if (emil==0.) then
7063  al = 0.
7064  bl = 0.
7065  cl = 0.
7066  else
7067  bl = sqrt(xxl/emil)
7068  cl = 1./bl
7069  al = -xzl/emil
7070  end if
7071  tlx0 = ty
7072  tlz0 = typ
7073 7770 fl2rms = (1.+al*al)*xxl/bl + 2.*al*xzl + bl*zzl
7074  zlma = 0.
7075  do i = 1, ngood
7076  zl(i) = 0.
7077  if (ichas(i)==1) then
7078  psx = f(4, i) - tlx0
7079  psz = f(5, i) - tlz0
7080  zl(i) = psx*psx*cl*cl + (psx*al/bl+psz*bl)**2
7081  if (zlma<zl(i)) then
7082  zlma = zl(i)
7083  izlma = i
7084  end if
7085  end if
7086  end do
7087  ! particle is eliminated
7088  imaxf = 0
7089  if (zlma==0.) zlma = 1.e10
7090  do i = 1, ngood
7091  if (ichas(i)==1 .and. zl(i)<zlma) then
7092  imaxf = imaxf + 1
7093  else
7094  ichas(i) = 0
7095  end if
7096  end do
7097  end if
7098  end do
7099 9990 continue
7100  return
7101  end subroutine chasey
7106  subroutine corre(n, nall)
7107  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
7108  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
7109  common /com4/cord(iptsz, 6)
7110  dimension a(6, 6), b(6, 6), c(6, 6), d(6), e(6), f(6), g(6)
7111 
7112  do i = 1, 6
7113  d(i) = 0.0
7114  e(i) = 0.0
7115  f(i) = 0.0
7116  g(i) = 0.0
7117  do j = 1, 6
7118  a(i, j) = 0.0
7119  b(i, j) = 0.0
7120  c(i, j) = 0.0
7121  end do
7122  end do
7123  do j = 1, 6
7124  do i = 1, n
7125  d(j) = d(j) + cord(i, j)
7126  end do
7127  d(j) = d(j)/n
7128  end do
7129  do j = 1, 6
7130  do i = 1, nall
7131  cord(i, j) = cord(i, j) - d(j)
7132  end do
7133  end do
7134  do j = 1, 6
7135  do k = 1, j
7136  do i = 1, n
7137  a(j, k) = a(j, k) + cord(i, j)*cord(i, k)
7138  end do
7139  a(j, k) = a(j, k)/n
7140  end do
7141  end do
7142  ! WE MAKE MATRIX A=B*BT WHERE B,BT ARE TRIANGULAR
7143  do i = 1, 6
7144  do j = 1, i
7145  h = a(i, j)
7146  j1 = j - 1
7147  if (j==1) go to 8
7148  do k = 1, j1
7149  h = h - a(i, k)*a(j, k)
7150  end do
7151 8 if (i==j) go to 10
7152  a(i, j) = h/a(j, j)
7153  go to 7
7154 10 a(i, j) = sqrt(h)
7155 7 b(i, j) = a(i, j)
7156  end do
7157  end do
7158  ! WE INVERT B TO GIVE AN UPDATED B
7159  e(1) = 1.0/b(1, 1)
7160  do i = 2, 6
7161  e(i) = 1.0/b(i, i)
7162  j1 = i - 1
7163  do jj = 1, j1
7164  j = i - jj
7165  j3 = j + 1
7166  s = 0.0
7167  if (jj==1) go to 13
7168  do k = j3, j1
7169  s = s - b(k, i)*b(k, j)
7170  end do
7171 13 b(j, i) = (s-b(i,j)*e(i))/b(j, j)
7172  end do
7173  end do
7174  do i = 1, 6
7175  b(i, i) = e(i)
7176  end do
7177  do i = 1, 6
7178  do j = 1, i
7179  dum = b(i, j)
7180  b(i, j) = b(j, i)
7181  b(j, i) = dum
7182  end do
7183  end do
7184  ! WE CONVERT CORD(**) SO THAT ITS SIGMA MATRIX IS UNITY
7185  do i = 1, nall
7186  do k = 1, 6
7187  f(k) = 0.0
7188  do j = 1, k
7189  f(k) = f(k) + b(k, j)*cord(i, j)
7190  end do
7191  end do
7192  do k = 1, 6
7193  cord(i, k) = f(k)
7194  end do
7195  end do
7196  ! WE TEST THE MEANS AND SIGMA MATRIX
7197  do j = 1, 6
7198  do i = 1, n
7199  g(j) = g(j) + cord(i, j)
7200  end do
7201  g(j) = g(j)/n
7202  end do
7203  do j = 1, 6
7204  do i = 1, n
7205  cord(i, j) = cord(i, j) - g(j)
7206  end do
7207  end do
7208  do j = 1, 6
7209  do k = 1, 6
7210  do i = 1, n
7211  c(j, k) = c(j, k) + cord(i, j)*cord(i, k)
7212  end do
7213  c(j, k) = c(j, k)/n
7214  end do
7215  end do
7216  return
7217  end subroutine corre
7225  subroutine pintim
7226  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
7227  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
7228  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
7229  common /qmoyen/qmoy
7230  common /part/xc(iptsz), yc(iptsz), zc(iptsz)
7231  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
7232  common /sc3/beamc, scdist, sce10, cplm, ect, apl, ichaes, iscsp
7233  common /azlist/icont, iprin
7234 
7235  grmoy = 0.
7236  trmoy = 0.
7237  xbax = 0.
7238  do i = 1, ngood
7239  grmoy = grmoy + f(7, i)/xmat
7240  trmoy = trmoy + f(6, i)
7241  xbax = xbax + f(2, i)
7242  end do
7243  trmoy = trmoy/float(ngood)
7244  grmoy = grmoy/float(ngood)
7245  brmoy = sqrt(1.-1./(grmoy*grmoy))
7246  xbax = xbax/float(ngood)
7247  apl = 0.
7248  ! Isochronism correction (bending magnet) only with SCHERM
7249  ! does not work with with SCHEFF (iscsp=3)
7250  if (iscsp==2) then
7251  xb2x = 0.
7252  xb2z = 0.
7253  xbxz = 0.
7254  do np = 1, ngood
7255  gpai = f(7, np)/xmat
7256  bpai = sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
7257  zc(np) = (trmoy-f(6,np))*bpai*vl/100.
7258  xc(np) = (f(2,np)-xbax)/100.
7259  xb2z = xb2z + zc(np)*zc(np)
7260  xb2x = xb2x + xc(np)*xc(np)
7261  xbxz = xbxz + zc(np)*xc(np)
7262  end do
7263  xb2z = xb2z/float(ngood)
7264  xb2x = xb2x/float(ngood)
7265  xbxz = xbxz/float(ngood)
7266  apl = atan(-2.*xbxz/(xb2x-xb2z))/2.
7267  write (16, *) 'slope of the bunch in plane(Oz,Ox):', apl, &
7268  ' radian'
7269  end if
7270  do np = 1, ngood
7271  gpai = f(7, np)/xmat
7272  bpai = sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
7273  ! iscsp = 3 Lorentz transformation (only with scheff)
7274  ! omment if(iscsp.eq.3) znp=(trmoy-f(6,np))*bpai*vl*grmoy
7275  ! omment if(iscsp.eq.2) znp=(trmoy-f(6,np))*bpai*vl
7276  znp = (trmoy-f(6,np))*bpai*vl
7277  xnp = f(2, np)
7278  zc(np) = znp*cos(apl) + xnp*sin(apl)
7279  xnp = xnp*cos(apl) - znp*sin(apl)
7280  ! convert from mrad to rad
7281  f3 = f(3, np)*1.e-03
7282  f5 = f(5, np)*1.e-03
7283  ! convert from cm to m
7284  xc(np) = (xnp+zc(np)*f3)/100.
7285  yc(np) = (f(4,np)+zc(np)*f5)/100.
7286  zc(np) = zc(np)/100.
7287  end do
7288  xbar = 0.
7289  ybar = 0.
7290  zbar = 0.
7291  do np = 1, ngood
7292  ! evaluate xbar , ybar , zbar
7293  xbar = xbar + xc(np)
7294  ybar = ybar + yc(np)
7295  zbar = zbar + zc(np)
7296  end do
7297  xbar = xbar/float(ngood)
7298  ybar = ybar/float(ngood)
7299  zbar = zbar/float(ngood)
7300  ! Translate distribution by center of mass coordinates to shift
7301  ! coordinate origin to (0,0,0)
7302  do np = 1, ngood
7303  xc(np) = xc(np) - xbar
7304  yc(np) = yc(np) - ybar
7305  zc(np) = zc(np) - zbar
7306  end do
7307  return
7308  end subroutine pintim
7309  subroutine schermi1
7310  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
7311  ! ..................................................................
7312  ! Called by SCHERMI when the bunch can be represented
7313  ! by a simple ellipse in the longitudinal direction
7314  ! ..................................................................
7315  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
7316  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
7317  common /hermt/afxt(22), afyt(22), afzt(22)
7318  common /hermd/afxm(20), afym(20), afzm(20)
7319  common /hermr/afxr(20), afyr(20), afzr(20)
7320  common /sizt/xrms, yrms, zrms
7321  common /sizp/xrms1, yrms1, zrms1, xrms2, yrms2, zrms2, imaxd
7322  common /elcg/xcgd, ycgd, zcgd, xcgr, ycgr, zcgr
7323  common /intgrt/ex, ey, ez
7324  common /degherm/nmaz, nmazr, nmaxy
7325  common /cdek/dwp(iptsz)
7326  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
7327  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
7328  common /sc3/beamc, scdist, sce10, cplm, ect, apl, ichaes, iscsp
7329  common /npart/imaxr
7330  common /part/xc(iptsz), yc(iptsz), zc(iptsz)
7331  common /twcst/epsilon
7332  common /beamsa/fs(7, iptsz)
7333  common /dcspa/iesp
7334  common /cmpte/iell
7335  common /cgrms/xsum, ysum, zsum
7336  common /compt/nrres, nrtre, nrbunc, nrdbun
7337  common /dimens/zcp(iptsz), xcp(iptsz), ycp(iptsz)
7338  common /posc/xpsc
7339  logical ichaes, iesp
7340  dimension afx(20), afy(20)
7341 
7342  if (beamc==0. .or. scdist==0.) return
7343  iell = iell + 1
7344  imaxf = ngood
7345  wavel = 2.*pi*vl/fh
7346  xmass = xmat*1.78267581e-30
7347  nmaxy = 5
7348  dxp = 0.
7349  dyp = 0.
7350  dw = 0.
7351  dz = scdist/100.
7352  dz1 = dz
7353  if (ngood==0) then
7354  write (16, *) ' all the particles are lost '
7355  stop
7356  end if
7357  ! xi in Amps, beamc in mA
7358  ! epsilon =(coul*coul)/nt*(m*m)
7359  epsilon = 8.854189586e-12
7360  c1 = 1./(3.*pi*sqrt(5.))
7361  cl = vl/100.
7362  ! charge per macro particle
7363  ! omment const1=c1*xi*xi*wavel*wavel/(10000.*imaxf*xmass*
7364  ! * epsilon*cl*cl*cl*cl)
7365  const3 = 1.e-06
7366  const2 = 1.e-06/xmat
7367  ! calculate rms beam size for beam in one point in time
7368  call sizrms(0, xrms, yrms, zrms, zz)
7369  ! 6875 format(2x,e12.5,2x,e12.5,2x,e12.5)
7370  xrmsp = xrms
7371  yrmsp = yrms
7372  zrmsp = zrms
7373  call sizcor(ect, xrms, yrms, zrms, 0)
7374  xrmsc = xrms
7375  yrmsc = yrms
7376  zrmsc = zrms
7377  xrms1 = xrmsp
7378  yrms1 = yrmsp
7379  zrms1 = zrmsp
7380  xrms = xrmsp
7381  yrms = yrmsp
7382  zrms = zrmsp
7383  xcgd = xsum
7384  ycgd = ysum
7385  zcgd = zsum
7386  do i = 1, ngood
7387  zcp(i) = zc(i)
7388  xcp(i) = xc(i)
7389  ycp(i) = yc(i)
7390  end do
7391  ! limits in z-direction
7392  zmat = 0.
7393  zmit = 1000.
7394  do i = 1, ngood
7395  if (zcp(i)>=zmat) zmat = zcp(i)
7396  if (zcp(i)<zmit) zmit = zcp(i)
7397  end do
7398  zmat = zmat/zrms
7399  zmit = zmit/zrms
7400  ! extends zmat
7401  zmat = zmat + zmat*.50
7402  zmit = zmit + zmit*.50
7403  if (zmat>ect) zmat = ect
7404  if (abs(zmit)>ect) zmit = -ect
7405  ! Hermite coefficients in x and y-direction
7406  nmaz = 0
7407  ! 6876 format(2x,i3,2x,i3)
7408  do k = 1, 20
7409  afzt(k) = 0.
7410  afxt(k) = 0.
7411  afyt(k) = 0.
7412  afzm(k) = 0.
7413  afxm(k) = 0.
7414  afym(k) = 0.
7415  end do
7416  do k = 1, nmaxy
7417  kap = k - 1
7418  do j = 1, ngood
7419  xcoup = abs(xcp(j)/xrms)
7420  ycoup = abs(ycp(j)/yrms)
7421  zcoup = abs(zcp(j)/zrms)
7422  if (xcoup<=ect .and. ycoup<=ect .and. zcoup<=ect) then
7423  xc(j) = xcp(j)/xrmsc
7424  yc(j) = ycp(j)/yrmsc
7425  zc(j) = zcp(j)/zrmsc
7426  afxm(k) = afxm(k) + herm(2*kap, xc(j))
7427  afym(k) = afym(k) + herm(2*kap, yc(j))
7428  afzm(k) = afzm(k) + herm(2*kap, zc(j))
7429  end if
7430  end do
7431  afxm(k) = afxm(k)/(fact(2*kap)*sqrt(2.*pi))
7432  afym(k) = afym(k)/(fact(2*kap)*sqrt(2.*pi))
7433  afzm(k) = afzm(k)/(fact(2*kap)*sqrt(2.*pi))
7434  end do
7435  nmaz = 10
7436  ! Hermite coefficients in z-direction
7437  zcdg = 0.
7438  imaxx = 0
7439  do j = 1, ngood
7440  xcoup = abs(xcp(j)/xrms)
7441  ycoup = abs(ycp(j)/yrms)
7442  zcoup = abs(zcp(j)/zrms)
7443  if (xcoup<=ect .and. ycoup<=ect .and. zcoup<=ect) then
7444  zcdg = zcdg + zcp(j)
7445  imaxx = imaxx + 1
7446  end if
7447  end do
7448  zcdg = zcdg/float(imaxx)
7449  zsqsum = 0.
7450  zcub = 0.
7451  zcub1 = 0.
7452  do j = 1, ngood
7453  xcoup = abs(xcp(j)/xrms)
7454  ycoup = abs(ycp(j)/yrms)
7455  zcoup = abs(zcp(j)/zrms)
7456  if (xcoup<=ect .and. ycoup<=ect .and. zcoup<=ect) then
7457  zc(j) = zcp(j) - zcdg
7458  zsqsum = zsqsum + zc(j)*zc(j)
7459  zcub = zcub + zc(j)*zc(j)*zc(j)
7460  zcub1 = zcub1 + zc(j)
7461  end if
7462  end do
7463  zrmsz = zsqsum/float(imaxx)
7464  zrmsz = sqrt(zrmsz)
7465  zcub3 = zcub
7466  zcub = zcub/(zrmsz*zrmsz*zrmsz) - 3.*zcub1/zrmsz
7467  zcub = zcub/(6.*sqrt(2.*pi))
7468  do k = 1, nmaz
7469  afzt(k) = 0.
7470  afx(k) = 0.
7471  afy(k) = 0.
7472  kap = k - 1
7473  do j = 1, ngood
7474  xcoup = abs(xcp(j)/xrms)
7475  ycoup = abs(ycp(j)/yrms)
7476  zcoup = abs(zcp(j)/zrms)
7477  if (xcoup<=ect .and. ycoup<=ect .and. zcoup<=ect) then
7478  zc(j) = zcp(j)/zrmsc
7479  xc(j) = xcp(j)/xrmsc
7480  yc(j) = ycp(j)/yrmsc
7481  afzt(k) = afzt(k) + herm(kap, zc(j))
7482  afx(k) = afx(k) + herm(kap, xc(j))
7483  afy(k) = afy(k) + herm(kap, yc(j))
7484  end if
7485  end do
7486  afzt(k) = afzt(k)/(fact(kap)*sqrt(2.*pi))
7487  afx(k) = afx(k)/(fact(kap)*sqrt(2.*pi))
7488  afy(k) = afy(k)/(fact(kap)*sqrt(2.*pi))
7489  end do
7490  ! Do Hermite integration to determine Ex,Ey,Ez for each macro particle
7491  ! and apply space charge kick. Field components are passed through the
7492  ! common INTGRT in units Newton/Coulomb
7493  do i = 1, ngood
7494  ! reprise coordonnees spaciales pour calcul des champs
7495  xc(i) = xcp(i)
7496  yc(i) = ycp(i)
7497  zc(i) = zcp(i)
7498  call intga(i, 0)
7499  ext = ex
7500  eyt = ey
7501  ezt = ez
7502  ! calculate kick in x',y' and z' (energy)
7503  ! calculate kick in x',y' and z' (energy)
7504  ! isochronism correction
7505  eztp = ezt*cos(apl) - ext*sin(apl)
7506  extp = ezt*sin(apl) + ext*cos(apl)
7507  ezt = eztp
7508  ext = extp
7509  gsc = f(7, i)/xmat
7510  bsc = sqrt(1.-1./(gsc*gsc))
7511  ! * valero
7512  dxp = const2*ext*dz/(bsc*bsc*gsc*gsc*gsc)*abs(f(9,i))
7513  dyp = const2*eyt*dz/(bsc*bsc*gsc*gsc*gsc)*abs(f(9,i))
7514  dw = const3*ezt*dz*abs(f(9,i))/gsc
7515  ! *
7516  if (.not. iesp) then
7517  ! load the entrance beam in cavities or gaps
7518  do js = 1, 7
7519  f(js, i) = fs(js, i)
7520  end do
7521  f(3, i) = f(3, i) + dxp*1000.
7522  f(5, i) = f(5, i) + dyp*1000.
7523  f(2, i) = f(2, i) - dz1*dxp*100.*xpsc
7524  f(4, i) = f(4, i) - dz1*dyp*100.*xpsc
7525  dwp(i) = dw
7526  else
7527  f(3, i) = f(3, i) + dxp*1000.
7528  f(5, i) = f(5, i) + dyp*1000.
7529  f(7, i) = f(7, i) + dw
7530  end if
7531  end do
7532  return
7533  end subroutine schermi1
7539  subroutine schermi
7540  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
7541  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
7542  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
7543  common /hermt/afxt(22), afyt(22), afzt(22)
7544  common /hermd/afxm(20), afym(20), afzm(20)
7545  common /hermr/afxr(20), afyr(20), afzr(20)
7546  common /hermrr/afxrr(20), afyrr(20), afzrr(20)
7547  common /sizr/xrms3, yrms3, zrms3, zcgr3
7548  common /sizt/xrms, yrms, zrms
7549  common /sizp/xrms1, yrms1, zrms1, xrms2, yrms2, zrms2, imaxd
7550  common /elcg/xcgd, ycgd, zcgd, xcgr, ycgr, zcgr
7551  common /intgrt/ex, ey, ez
7552  common /degherm/nmaz, nmazr, nmaxy
7553  common /cdek/dwp(iptsz)
7554  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
7555  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
7556  common /sc3/beamc, scdist, sce10, cplm, ect, apl, ichaes, iscsp
7557  common /npart/imaxr
7558  common /part/xc(iptsz), yc(iptsz), zc(iptsz)
7559  common /twcst/epsilon
7560  common /beamsa/fs(7, iptsz)
7561  common /dcspa/iesp
7562  common /cmpte/iell
7563  common /champ/fxrms(10, 15), fyrms(10, 15), fzrms(10, 15), nchamp(10), &
7564  nccham(10), nchpas, jcham, itye
7565  common /compt/nrres, nrtre, nrbunc, nrdbun
7566  common /posc/xpsc
7567  logical ichaes, iesp
7568  ! *************************************************
7569  ! nquad : number of quad in the transport line
7570  common /chqua/icqd, nquad
7571  logical icqd
7572  ! *************************************************
7573  common /dimens/zcp(iptsz), xcp(iptsz), ycp(iptsz)
7574 
7575  if (beamc==0. .or. scdist==0.) return
7576  ! dummy: in order to have the same entry that HERSC and SCHEFF
7577  ! Initialize some constants and variables c wavel in cm
7578  ect = 4.
7579  call shuffle
7580  call pintim
7581  iell = iell + 1
7582  imaxf = ngood
7583  wavel = 2.*pi*vl/fh
7584  xmass = xmat*1.78267581e-30
7585  nmaz = 14
7586  nmazr = 8
7587  nmaxy = 4
7588  dxp = 0.
7589  dyp = 0.
7590  dw = 0.
7591  dz = scdist/100.
7592  dz1 = dz
7593  zsot1 = 0.
7594  if (ngood==0) then
7595  write (16, *) ' all the particles are lost '
7596  stop
7597  end if
7598  write (16, *) ' call SCHERM N: ', iell
7599  ! xi in Amps, beamc in mA
7600  ! epsilon =(coul*coul)/nt*(m*m)
7601  epsilon = 8.854189586e-12
7602  c1 = 1./(3.*pi*sqrt(5.))
7603  cl = vl/100.
7604  ! charge per macro particle
7605  const3 = 1.e-06
7606  const2 = 1.e-06/xmat
7607  ! normalized emittances(normalized) in m.radian
7608  ! calculate rms beam size for beam in one point in time
7609  call sizrms(0, xrms, yrms, zrms, zz)
7610  xrmsp = xrms
7611  yrmsp = yrms
7612  zrmsp = zrms
7613  call sizcor(ect, xrms, yrms, zrms, 0)
7614  write (16, *) ' bunch RMS(m): ', xrms, yrms, zrms
7615  ! 6875 format(2x,e12.5,2x,e12.5,2x,e12.5)
7616  xrmsc = xrms
7617  yrmsc = yrms
7618  zrmsc = zrms
7619  xrms = xrmsp
7620  yrms = yrmsp
7621  zrms = zrmsp
7622  ! Total bunch charge densities in x,y,z
7623  ! calculation of Hermite coefficients
7624  do i = 1, ngood
7625  zcp(i) = zc(i)
7626  xcp(i) = xc(i)
7627  ycp(i) = yc(i)
7628  end do
7629  ! limits in z-direction
7630  zmat = 0.
7631  zmit = 1000.
7632  do i = 1, ngood
7633  if (zcp(i)>=zmat) zmat = zcp(i)
7634  if (zcp(i)<zmit) zmit = zcp(i)
7635  end do
7636  zmat = zmat/zrms
7637  zmit = zmit/zrms
7638  ! extend zmat
7639  zmat = zmat + zmat*.50
7640  zmit = zmit + zmit*.50
7641  ! (xmat,ymat,zmat) >0
7642  if (zmat>ect) zmat = ect
7643  if (abs(zmit)>ect) zmat = -ect
7644  ! Hermite coefficients
7645  do k = 1, nmaxy
7646  afxt(k) = 0.
7647  afyt(k) = 0.
7648  kap = k - 1
7649  do j = 1, ngood
7650  xcoup = abs(xcp(j)/xrms)
7651  ycoup = abs(ycp(j)/yrms)
7652  zcoup = abs(zcp(j)/zrms)
7653  if (xcoup<=ect .and. ycoup<=ect .and. zcoup<=ect) then
7654  xc(j) = xcp(j)/xrmsc
7655  yc(j) = ycp(j)/yrmsc
7656  afxt(k) = afxt(k) + herm(2*kap, xc(j))
7657  afyt(k) = afyt(k) + herm(2*kap, yc(j))
7658  end if
7659  end do
7660  afxt(k) = afxt(k)/(fact(2*kap)*sqrt(2.*pi))
7661  afyt(k) = afyt(k)/(fact(2*kap)*sqrt(2.*pi))
7662  end do
7663  ! 6876 format(2x,i5,3x,e12.5,3x,e12.5)
7664  do k = 1, nmaz
7665  afzt(k) = 0.
7666  kap = k - 1
7667  do j = 1, ngood
7668  xcoup = abs(xcp(j)/xrms)
7669  ycoup = abs(ycp(j)/yrms)
7670  zcoup = abs(zcp(j)/zrms)
7671  if (xcoup<=ect .and. ycoup<=ect .and. zcoup<=ect) then
7672  zc(j) = zcp(j)/zrms
7673  afzt(k) = afzt(k) + herm(kap, zc(j))
7674  end if
7675  end do
7676  afzt(k) = afzt(k)/(fact(kap)*sqrt(2.*pi))
7677  end do
7678  ! 6877 format(3x,e12.5)
7679  ! Seek for surface of the bunch
7680  szbt = snzt(zmit, zmat)
7681  ! Seek for the vertex of the distribution n(z)
7682  ! between 0 and zmat/2
7683  zf = zmat/2.
7684  zi = 0.
7685  call rchsom(zi, zf, nmaz)
7686  zsot = (zi+zf)/2.
7687  ! 9999 CONTINUE
7688  zcgd = zsot*zrms
7689  ! Main ellipsoid (in the right of the vertex)
7690  imaxd = 1
7691  do i = 1, ngood
7692  if (zcp(i)>=zcgd) then
7693  xc(imaxd) = xcp(i)
7694  yc(imaxd) = ycp(i)
7695  zc(imaxd) = zcp(i)
7696  imaxd = imaxd + 1
7697  end if
7698  end do
7699  imaxd = imaxd - 1
7700  imaxr = ngood - 2*imaxd
7701  if (imaxr<0) then
7702  ! if imaxr<0 => use one ellips only, rather than 2
7703  pcent1 = float(2*imaxd)/float(ngood)
7704  pcent2 = float(imaxr)/float(ngood)
7705  if (icqd) nquad = nquad - 1
7706  iell = iell - 1
7707  write (16, *) ' one ellipsoid in z-direction '
7708  call pintim
7709  call schermi1
7710  return
7711  end if
7712  if (25*imaxr<imaxf .or. imaxr<=30) then
7713  pcent1 = float(2*imaxd)/float(ngood)
7714  pcent2 = float(imaxr)/float(ngood)
7715  iell = iell - 1
7716  if (icqd) nquad = nquad - 1
7717  ! if imaxr<.04*imaxf => use one ellips only, rather than 2
7718  write (16, *) 'one ellipsoid in z-direction '
7719  call pintim
7720  call schermi1
7721  if (12*imaxr<ngood) write (16, *) 'one ellipsoid in z-direction '
7722  if (imaxr<=40) write (16, *) ' one ellipsoid in z-direction '
7723  return
7724  end if
7725  i1elli = 0
7726  ! C.O.G. of the principal ellipsoid (in cm)
7727  ! longitudinal RMS of the pricipal ellipsoid
7728  zrmss1 = sqrt(vaprz(zsot,zmat))
7729  zrms1 = zrmss1*zrms
7730  ! RMS in the transverse directions
7731  xrms1 = xrms
7732  yrms1 = yrms
7733  ! surface n(z)
7734  szbd = snzd(zsot, zmat)
7735  rsnz = szbd/szbt
7736  ! coefficients Hermite en x,y,z sur partie droite en z
7737  ! principal ellipsoid
7738  do k = 1, nmaxy
7739  kap = k - 1
7740  afxm(k) = afxt(k)*rsnz
7741  afym(k) = afyt(k)*rsnz
7742  afzm(k) = prinz(zsot, zmat, k, zrmss1)
7743  afzm(k) = 2.*afzm(k)/(fact(2*kap)*sqrt(2.*pi))
7744  end do
7745  ! limits in x,y,z of the principal ellipsoid
7746  do i = 1, imaxd
7747  xc(i) = xc(i)/xrms
7748  yc(i) = yc(i)/yrms
7749  zc(i) = zc(i)/zrms
7750  end do
7751  xmam = xc(1)
7752  ymam = yc(1)
7753  zmam = zc(1)
7754  do i = 1, imaxd
7755  if (xc(i)>=xmam) xmam = xc(i)
7756  if (yc(i)>=ymam) ymam = yc(i)
7757  if (zc(i)>=zmam) zmam = zc(i)
7758  end do
7759  if (abs(xmam)>=ect) xmam = ect
7760  if (abs(ymam)>=ect) ymam = ect
7761  if (abs(zmam)>=ect) zmam = ect
7762  xmim = xmam
7763  ymim = ymam
7764  zmim = zmam
7765  do i = 1, imaxd
7766  if (xc(i)<xmim) xmim = xc(i)
7767  if (yc(i)<ymim) ymim = yc(i)
7768  if (zc(i)<zmim) zmim = zc(i)
7769  end do
7770  if (abs(xmim)>=ect) xmim = -ect
7771  if (abs(ymim)>=ect) ymim = -ect
7772  if (abs(zmim)>=ect) zmim = -ect
7773  ! partition commune @ x,y,z
7774  xymam = ymam
7775  xymim = ymim
7776  if (xmam>=xymam) xymam = xmam
7777  if (zmam>=xymam) xymam = zmam
7778  if (xmim<xymim) xymim = xmim
7779  if (zmim<xymim) xymim = zmim
7780  ! symmetrisation de l'intervalle
7781  if (abs(xymim)>=xymam) then
7782  xymam = abs(xymim)
7783  else
7784  xymim = -xymam
7785  end if
7786  ! vertex of the second ellipsoid
7787  aa = zmit
7788  bb = 2.*zsot - zmat
7789  cc = zsot
7790  dd = zmat
7791  call rchsor(aa, bb, cc, dd, ee)
7792  ! second ellipsoid around ee
7793  ! sz2e : surface
7794  zrms2 = varia(bb, cc, dd, ee)
7795  zrms2 = sqrt(zrms2)
7796  zcgr = ee*zrms
7797  sz2e = codsy(bb, cc, dd, ee, 1)
7798  afzr(1) = sz2e/sqrt(2.*pi)
7799  stm12 = abs(afzt(1)-afzm(1)-afzr(1))
7800  rs2e = sz2e/szbt
7801  xrms2 = xrms
7802  yrms2 = yrms
7803  do k = 1, nmaxy
7804  kap = k - 1
7805  afxr(k) = afxt(k)*rs2e
7806  afyr(k) = afyt(k)*rs2e
7807  afzr(k) = codsy(bb, cc, dd, ee, k)
7808  afzr(k) = afzr(k)/(fact(2*kap)*sqrt(2.*pi))
7809  end do
7810  ! two ellipsoids:
7811  if (stm12*10<=afzr(1)) inint = 2
7812  if (stm12*10>afzr(1)) then
7813  ! 3 ellipsoids;the principal ellipsoid,the second ellipsoid is
7814  ! symmetrized
7815  ! the third ellipsoid is defined around the c. of g. of the residu
7816  ee1 = grz(aa, bb, cc, dd, ee)
7817  if (ee1>ee) then
7818  inint = 2
7819  go to 1968
7820  end if
7821  zrms3 = variz(bb, cc, dd, ee, ee1)
7822  zrms3 = sqrt(zrms3)
7823  xrms3 = xrms
7824  yrms3 = yrms
7825  zcgr3 = ee1*zrms
7826  ! C.O.G. of the second ellipsoid
7827  ! on suppose xcgr et ycgr nuls pour le residu
7828  xcgr = 0.
7829  ycgr = 0.
7830  sz3e = codif(bb, cc, dd, ee, ee1, 1)
7831  rs3e = sz3e/szbt
7832  ! correction complementaire
7833  srtot = sz3e/sqrt(2.*pi) + afzr(1) + afzm(1)
7834  srtot = srtot - afzt(1)
7835  ! HErMITE coefficients over the residual ellips
7836  do k = 1, nmaxy
7837  kap = k - 1
7838  afxrr(k) = afxt(k)*rs3e
7839  afyrr(k) = afyt(k)*rs3e
7840  afzrr(k) = codif(bb, cc, dd, ee, ee1, k)
7841  afzrr(k) = afzrr(k)/(fact(2*kap)*sqrt(2.*pi))
7842  if (k==1) then
7843  tzrr = afzrr(k) - srtot
7844  if (tzrr>=0. .and. abs(tzrr)>=(afzrr(k)/10.)) then
7845  afxrr(k) = afxrr(k) - srtot
7846  afyrr(k) = afyrr(k) - srtot
7847  afzrr(k) = afzrr(k) - srtot
7848  end if
7849  end if
7850  end do
7851  ! end of calculus of 2nd ellips
7852  inint = 3
7853  end if
7854  zrms3 = zrms3*zrms
7855 1968 continue
7856  zrms2 = zrms2*zrms
7857  ! surface of the ellipsoids in pourcent
7858  write (16, *) ' surface of the ellipsoids in % of the bunch:'
7859  if (inint==2) then
7860  pcent1 = afzm(1)/afzt(1)
7861  pcent2 = afzr(1)/afzt(1)
7862  write (16, 7777) iell, pcent1, pcent2
7863  end if
7864  if (inint==3) then
7865  pcent1 = afzm(1)/afzt(1)
7866  pcent2 = afzr(1)/afzt(1)
7867  pcent3 = afzrr(1)/afzt(1)
7868  write (16, 7778) iell, pcent1, pcent2, pcent3
7869  end if
7870 7777 format (2x, i4, 2x, f7.4, 2x, f7.4)
7871 7778 format (2x, i4, 2x, f7.4, 2x, f7.4, 2x, f7.4)
7872  ! Do Hermite integration to determine Ex,Ey,Ez for each macro particle
7873  ! and apply space charge kick. Field components are passed through the
7874  ! common INTGRT in units Newton/Coulomb
7875  ! gsct introduit pour calcul specifique impulsion
7876  gsct = 0.
7877  igsct = 0
7878  do i = 1, ngood
7879  ! reprise coordonnees spaciales pour calcul des champs
7880  xc(i) = xcp(i)
7881  yc(i) = ycp(i)
7882  zc(i) = zcp(i)
7883  ! principal ellipsoid
7884  call intga(i, 0)
7885  ext = ex
7886  eyt = ey
7887  ezt = ez
7888  ! second ellipsoid
7889  call intga(i, 1)
7890  ext = ext + ex
7891  eyt = eyt + ey
7892  ezt = ezt + ez
7893  ! third ellipsoid
7894  if (inint==3) then
7895  call intga(i, 2)
7896  ext = ext + ex
7897  eyt = eyt + ey
7898  ezt = ezt + ez
7899  end if
7900  ! calculate kick in x',y' and z' (energy)
7901  ! isochronism correction
7902  eztp = ezt*cos(apl) - ext*sin(apl)
7903  extp = ezt*sin(apl) + ext*cos(apl)
7904  ezt = eztp
7905  ext = extp
7906  gsc = f(7, i)/xmat
7907  gsct = gsct + gsc
7908  igsct = igsct + 1
7909  bsc = sqrt(1.-1./(gsc*gsc))
7910  dxp = const2*ext*dz/(bsc*bsc*gsc*gsc*gsc)*abs(f(9,i))
7911  dyp = const2*eyt*dz/(bsc*bsc*gsc*gsc*gsc)*abs(f(9,i))
7912  dw = const3*ezt*dz/gsc
7913  if (.not. iesp) then
7914  ! load the entrance beam parameters for cavities or gaps
7915  do js = 1, 7
7916  f(js, i) = fs(js, i)
7917  end do
7918  f(3, i) = f(3, i) + dxp*1000.
7919  f(5, i) = f(5, i) + dyp*1000.
7920  f(2, i) = f(2, i) - dz1*dxp*100.*xpsc
7921  f(4, i) = f(4, i) - dz1*dyp*100.*xpsc
7922  ! omment f(2,i)=f(2,i)-dz1*dxp*100.
7923  ! omment f(4,i)=f(4,i)-dz1*dyp*100.
7924  dwp(i) = dw
7925  else
7926  f(3, i) = f(3, i) + dxp*1000.
7927  f(5, i) = f(5, i) + dyp*1000.
7928  f(7, i) = f(7, i) + dw
7929  end if
7930  end do
7931  return
7932  end subroutine schermi
7951  subroutine entre
7952  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
7953  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
7954  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
7955  common /speda/dave, idave
7956  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
7957  common /dyn/tref, vref
7958  common /dyni/vrefi, trefi, fhinit
7959  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
7960  common /objet/fo(9, iptsz), imaxo
7961  common /histo/centre(6)
7962  common /qmoyen/qmoy
7963  common /rigid/boro
7964  common /mastrp/xma(2, 2), xmb(2, 2), xmc(2, 2)
7965  common /stis/suryth, surzph, enedep, ecogde, testca
7966  common /etcom/cog(8), exten(17), fd(iptsz)
7967  common /tapes/in, ifile, meta
7968  common /davcom/dav1(maxcell1, 40), davtot, iitem(maxcell1), idav
7969  common /tilt/tipha, tix, tiy, shifw, shifp
7970  common /newtlt/twissa(3), itwiss
7971  common /tof/tofini
7972  common /strip/atm, qs, atms, ths, qop, sqst(6), anp, nqst
7973  common /mcs/imcs, ncstat, cstat(20)
7974  logical dave
7975  ! dimension foo(9)
7976  dave = .false.
7977  read (in, *) uem, atm, qst
7978  if (ncstat==1) cstat(1) = qst
7979  ! input energy(MeV) and initial time of flight(deg)
7980  read (in, *) enedep, tofini
7981  ! 19/03/2009 read(in,*) idave
7982  ! 19/03/2009 read(in,*)idum
7983  ! 19/03/2009 if icog=0 reference (vref,tref) is not cog
7984  ! 19/03/2009 if icog=1 reference (vref,tref) is cog
7985  ! --- xmat= rest mass
7986  xmat = uem*atm
7987  write (16, 101) uem, atm, xmat, qst
7988 101 format (' **** unit mass: ', e12.5, ' MeV mass units: ', f5.1, &
7989  ' rest mass: ', e12.5, ' MeV charge ', f4.1)
7990  write (16, 102) enedep, tofini
7991 102 format (' **** energy: ', e12.5, ' MeV initial tof: ', e12.5, ' deg')
7992  tofini = tofini*pi/(180.*fh)
7993  gdep = enedep/xmat + 1.
7994  bdep = sqrt(1.-1./(gdep*gdep))
7995  ! fo(index,i), index=1 initial particle # ,
7996  ! index=2 x
7997  ! index=3 xp
7998  ! index=4 y
7999  ! index=5 yp
8000  ! index=6 time of flight (tof)
8001  ! index=7 energy
8002  ! index=8 if = 0 , then particle is lost
8003  ! index=9 charge
8004  ! i= particle #
8005  do i = 1, ngood
8006  ! if itwiss=1, apply tofini in tiltbm routine
8007  if (itwiss/=1) fo(6, i) = fo(6, i) + tofini
8008  fo(9, i) = qst
8009  fo(7, i) = enedep + fo(1, i) + xmat
8010  ! 17/08/2009
8011  if (fo(7,i)<xmat) fo(7, i) = xmat
8012  fo(1, i) = float(i)
8013  end do
8014  ! --- the reference particle and the cog coincide
8015  bref = 0.
8016  tref = 0.
8017  encog = 0.
8018  do i = 1, ngood
8019  encog = encog + fo(7, i)
8020  gai = fo(7, i)/xmat
8021  bref = bref + sqrt(1.-1/(gai*gai))
8022  tref = tref + fo(6, i)
8023  end do
8024  encog = encog/float(ngood)
8025  bref = bref/float(ngood)
8026  vref = bref*vl
8027  tref = tref/float(ngood)
8028  vrefi = vref
8029  trefi = tref
8030  ! pack the table f(,) of the current beam
8031  do i = 1, ngood
8032  do j = 1, 9
8033  f(j, i) = fo(j, i)
8034  end do
8035  end do
8036  ! momentum of the reference (i.e. the c.o.g.)
8037  gcog = 1./sqrt(1.-bref*bref)
8038  boro = 3.3356*xmat*bref*gcog/abs(qst)
8039  write (16, 3450) boro
8040 3450 format (' **** momentum of c.o.g. (kG.cm): ', e12.5)
8041  ! omment write(16,*)'before TILT fh,
8042  ! TREF=',fh,tref,tref*fh*180./pi
8043  if (itwiss==1) then
8044  ! Beam was defined in MCOBJET with Twiss parameters
8045  ! call TILTBM to apply Twiss alpha
8046  tipha = twissa(3)
8047  tix = twissa(1)
8048  tiy = twissa(2)
8049  shifw = .000000
8050  shifp = .000000
8051  icg = 1
8052  call tiltbm(icg)
8053  ! write the input beam in file 'input.beam'
8054  dum = 0.
8055  write (11, *) ngood, dum, fh/(2000000.*pi)
8056  do i = 1, ngood
8057  f(2, i) = f(2, i) + centre(2)
8058  f(3, i) = f(3, i) + centre(3)
8059  f(4, i) = f(4, i) + centre(4)
8060  f(5, i) = f(5, i) + centre(5)
8061  f(6, i) = f(6, i) + centre(6)
8062  f(7, i) = f(7, i) + centre(1)
8063  etphas = fh*(f(6,i)-tref)
8064  etener = f(7, i) - xmat
8065  write (11, 777) f(2, i), f(3, i)/1000., f(4, i), &
8066  f(5, i)/1000., etphas, etener
8067  end do
8068 777 format (6(f13.8,1x))
8069  else
8070  ! in case of itwiss.ne.1 apply CENTRE and write input beam in
8071  ! TILTBM
8072  tipha = 0.
8073  tix = 0.
8074  tiy = 0.
8075  shifw = .000000
8076  shifp = .000000
8077  icg = 1
8078  call tiltbm(icg)
8079  end if
8080  call emiprt(0)
8081  return
8082  end subroutine entre
8089  subroutine adjrfq
8090  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
8091  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
8092  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
8093  common /davcom/dav1(maxcell1, 40), davtot, iitem(maxcell1), idav
8094  common /speda/dave, idave
8095  common /dyn/tref, vref
