8096  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
8097  common /objet/fo(9, iptsz), imaxo
8098  common /qmoyen/qmoy
8099  common /rigid/boro
8100  common /sc3/beamc, scdist, sce10, cplm, ect, apl, ichaes, iscsp
8101  common /etcom/cog(8), exten(17), fd(iptsz)
8102  common /tapes/in, ifile, meta
8103  common /isxpyp/iflag
8104  common /mcs/imcs, ncstat, cstat(20)
8105  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
8106  common /dyni/vrefi, trefi, fhinit
8107  common /strip/atm, qs, atms, ths, qop, sqst(6), anp, nqst
8108  logical dave
8109 
8110  read (in, *) iflag
8111  if (iflag==0) write (16, *) 'Standard file, phase in rad'
8112  if (iflag==1) write (16, *) 'File with charge state and rest ', &
8113  'mass, phase in rad'
8114  if (iflag==2) write (16, *) 'File with several charge states', &
8115  ', phase in rad'
8116  if (iflag==10) write (16, *) 'Standard file, phase in ns'
8117  if (iflag==11) write (16, *) 'File with charge state and rest', &
8118  ' mass, phase in ns'
8119  if (iflag==12) write (16, *) 'File with several charge states', &
8120  ', phase in ns'
8121  ! --- input: freq.(MHertz) tofini: phase offset (deg) to be applied
8122  ! both to the reference and the beam
8123  read (in, *) freq, tofini
8124  write (16, *) 'Frequency [MHz]:', freq
8125  fh = 2.*pi*freq*1.e06
8126  fhinit = fh
8127  read (in, *) uem, atm
8128  xmat = uem*atm
8129  ! --- reference:
8130  ! enedep:energy(MeV), qst: charge of the reference
8131  ! when iflag =0 or iflag = 1 qst is the charge of the beam
8132  read (in, *) enedep, qst
8133  tofini = tofini*pi/(180.*fh)
8134  gdep = enedep/xmat + 1.
8135  bdep = sqrt(1.-1./(gdep*gdep))
8136  vref = bdep*vl
8137  tref = tofini
8138  ncstat = 1
8139  ! *et*2012*March*02 use reference to define boro
8140  boro = 3.3356*xmat*bdep*gdep/qst
8141  ! write(16,111) uem,atm,enedep,qst,tofini
8142  ! 111 format(' **** mass unit: ',e12.5,'MeV, mass unit: ',f6.1,/,
8143  ! * ' **** reference : energy ',e12.5,' Mev charge ',f4.1,
8144  ! * ' time of flight ',e12.5,' sec')
8145  write (16, 101) uem, atm, qst, tofini, enedep, boro
8146 101 format (' **** unit mass: ', e12.5, ' MeV, mass units: ', f6.1, /, &
8147  ' **** reference charge ', f4.1, ' time of flight ', e12.5, &
8148  ' sec', /, ' **** reference : energy ', e12.5, ' MeV momentum ', &
8149  e12.5, ' kG.cm')
8150 
8151  read (55, *) imax, dum, dum
8152  if (imax+2>iptsz) then
8153  write (16, *) 'too many particles '
8154  stop
8155  end if
8156  ! iflag = 0 standard file:f(1,)=x, f(2,)=xp, f(3,)=y, f(4,)=yp,
8157  ! f(5,)=phase, f(6,)=kinetic energy
8158  if (iflag==0 .or. iflag==10) read (55, *)((f(i,j),i=1,6), j=1, imax)
8159  ! iflag = 1 File with rest mass: f(1,)=x, f(2,)=xp, f(3,)=y,
8160  ! f(4,)=yp, f(5,)=phase, f(6,)=kinetic energy, dum1, dum2
8161  if (iflag==1 .or. iflag==11) read (55, *)((f(i, &
8162  j),i=1,6), dum1, dum2, j=1, imax)
8163  ! iflag = 2 beam with different charges: f(7,) = charge; figure out
8164  ! how many different ones there are and store them
8165  ! *ets*13/12/2010
8166  if (ncstat==1) cstat(1) = qst
8167  if (iflag==2 .or. iflag==12) then
8168  ncstat = 1
8169  read (55, *)(f(i,1), i=1, 7)
8170  cstat(1) = f(7, 1)
8171  do j = 2, imax
8172  read (55, *)(f(i,j), i=1, 7)
8173  mcstat = 0
8174  do k = 1, ncstat
8175  ! *ets*23/12/2010
8176  if (f(7,j)==cstat(k)) then
8177  mcstat = 1
8178  end if
8179  end do
8180  if (mcstat==0) then
8181  ! *ete*23/12/2010
8182  ncstat = ncstat + 1
8183  cstat(ncstat) = f(7, j)
8184  end if
8185  end do
8186  write (16, *) 'Number of charge states: ', ncstat
8187  write (16, *) 'Charge states: ', (cstat(j), j=1, ncstat)
8188  if (ncstat>1) imcs = 1
8189  end if
8190  call intfac(tofini)
8191  return
8192  end subroutine adjrfq
8199  subroutine intfac(tofini)
8200  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
8201  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
8202  common /etcom/cog(8), exten(17), fd(iptsz)
8203  common /shif/dtiph, shift
8204  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
8205  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
8206  common /objet/fo(9, iptsz), imaxo
8207  common /qmoyen/qmoy
8208  common /rigid/boro
8209  common /dyn/tref, vref
8210  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
8211  common /tapes/in, ifile, meta
8212  common /etcha1/dav2(maxcell1, 33), ichas(iptsz), chasit
8213  common /davcom/dav1(maxcell1, 40), davtot, iitem(maxcell1), idav
8214  common /sc3/beamc, scdist, sce10, cplm, ect, apl, ichaes, iscsp
8215  common /speda/dave, idave
8216  common /isxpyp/iflag
8217  common /mcs/imcs, ncstat, cstat(20)
8218  dimension foo(20, 9), ndp(20)
8219  logical shift, chasit, dave
8220  ! FH :INITIAL FREQENCY (hertz)
8221  ! Use frequency from part. dist. file to calculate f(6,i)
8222  ! 19/03/2009 dave=.true.
8223  ! iflag = 0 : standard file, phase in rad
8224  ! iflag = 1 : special file, phase in rad
8225  ! iflag = 2 : several charge states, phase in rad
8226  ! iflag = 10 : standard file, phase in ns
8227  ! iflag = 11 : special file, phase in ns
8228  ! iflag = 12 : several charge states, phase in ns
8229  imcs = 0
8230  if (iflag==2 .or. iflag==12) imcs = 1
8231  qmoy = qst
8232  j = 1
8233  ! the table fo(,) is built from the input beam stored in the table
8234  ! f(,)
8235  if (iflag<=2) then
8236  do i = 1, imax
8237  fo(7, i) = f(6, j) + xmat
8238  if (iflag<=1) fo(9, i) = qst
8239  if (iflag==2) fo(9, i) = f(7, i)
8240  ichas(i) = 1
8241  fo(8, i) = 1.
8242  fo(1, i) = float(j+1)
8243  fo(2, i) = f(1, j)
8244  fo(3, i) = f(2, j)*1000.
8245  fo(4, i) = f(3, j)
8246  fo(5, i) = f(4, j)*1000.
8247  fo(6, i) = tofini + f(5, j)/fh
8248  j = j + 1
8249  end do
8250  else
8251  do i = 1, imax
8252  fo(7, i) = f(6, j) + xmat
8253  if (iflag<=11) fo(9, i) = qst
8254  if (iflag==12) fo(9, i) = f(7, i)
8255  ichas(i) = 1
8256  fo(8, i) = 1.
8257  fo(1, i) = float(j+1)
8258  fo(2, i) = f(1, j)
8259  fo(3, i) = f(2, j)*1000.
8260  fo(4, i) = f(3, j)
8261  fo(5, i) = f(4, j)*1000.
8262  fo(6, i) = tofini + f(5, j)*1.e-09
8263  j = j + 1
8264  end do
8265  end if
8266  ! cog of the beam
8267  ! *et*2012*March*02 changed foo(9) to foo(2,9)
8268  if (iflag==0 .or. iflag==1 .or. iflag==10 .or. iflag==11) then
8269  ! single charge state
8270  ndp(1) = imax
8271  do j = 2, 7
8272  foo(1, j) = 0.
8273  end do
8274  do i = 1, imax
8275  do j = 2, 7
8276  foo(1, j) = foo(1, j) + fo(j, i)
8277  end do
8278  end do
8279  else
8280  ! multi charge state
8281  do k = 1, ncstat
8282  ndp(k) = 0
8283  do j = 2, 7
8284  foo(k, j) = 0.
8285  end do
8286  end do
8287  do i = 1, imax
8288  do k = 1, ncstat
8289  if (fo(9,i)==cstat(k)) then
8290  ndp(k) = ndp(k) + 1
8291  do j = 2, 7
8292  foo(k, j) = foo(k, j) + fo(j, i)
8293  end do
8294  end if
8295  end do
8296  end do
8297  end if
8298  do k = 1, ncstat
8299  do j = 2, 7
8300  foo(k, j) = foo(k, j)/float(ndp(k))
8301  end do
8302  end do
8303  ngood = imax
8304  if (iflag==0 .or. iflag==1 .or. iflag==10 .or. iflag==11) then
8305  ! --- COG
8306  gref = foo(1, 7)/xmat
8307  bref = sqrt(1.-1./(gref*gref))
8308  xe = (gref-1.)*xmat
8309  ! magnetic rigidity
8310  bor = 3.3356*xmat*bref*gref/qst
8311  write (16, *) '**** COG : energy ', xe, ' MeV momentum ', boro, &
8312  ' kG.cm'
8313  else
8314  do k = 1, ncstat
8315  gref = foo(k, 7)/xmat
8316  bref = sqrt(1.-1./(gref*gref))
8317  xe = (gref-1.)*xmat
8318  ! magnetic rigidity
8319  bor = 3.3356*xmat*bref*gref/cstat(k)
8320  write (16, *) ' Q: ', cstat(k), ' COG : energy ', xe, &
8321  ' MeV momentum ', bor, ' kG.cm'
8322  end do
8323  end if
8324  ! add the last particle equal to the center of gravity
8325  ! cor 12/1/09
8326  ! *et*2012*March*02 suppress the imax+1 particle
8327  ! ngood=imax+1
8328  ! fo(1,ngood)=float(ngood)
8329  ! fo(8,ngood)=1
8330  ! fo(9,ngood)=qst
8331  ! ichas(ngood)=1
8332  ! do j=2,7
8333  ! fo(j,ngood)=foo(j)/float(imax)
8334  ! enddo
8335  ! do j=2,7
8336  ! fo(j,ngood)=foo(j)/float(imax)
8337  ! enddo
8338  ! imax=imax+1
8339  vrefi = vref
8340  trefi = tref
8341  ! TEST sv
8342  ! first particle forced to x=xp=y=yp=0,tref,vref
8343  ! cc fo(1,1)=1.
8344  ! cc ichas(1)=1
8345  ! cc do j=2,5
8346  ! cc fo(j,1)=0.
8347  ! cc enddo
8348  ! cc fo(6,1)=tref
8349  ! cc fo(7,1)=enedep+xmat
8350  ! **************************************************
8351  ! now save data back to f
8352  do i = 1, ngood
8353  do k = 1, 9
8354  f(k, i) = fo(k, i)
8355  end do
8356  end do
8357  ! 9999 format(6(2x,e12.5))
8358  imaxo = ngood
8359  call emiprt(0)
8360  return
8361  end subroutine intfac
8362  subroutine stapl(zpos)
8363  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
8364  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
8365  common /pltprf/sprfx(3000), sprfy(3000), sprfl(3000), sprfw(3000), &
8366  sprfp(3000), sprng(3000), iprf
8367  common /pltprf1/sprww(3000), eprfw(3000), eprnx(3000), eprny(3000), &
8368  sprfz(3000)
8369  common /pltprf2/sxmn(3000), sxmx(3000), symn(3000), symx(3000), &
8370  stmn(3000), stmx(3000), spmn(3000), spmx(3000), swmn(3000), &
8371  swmx(3000), disprx(3000), dispry(3000), dispcx(3000), dispcy(3000)
8372  common /etcom/cog(8), exten(17), fd(iptsz)
8373  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
8374  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
8375  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
8376  common /grot/rzot, izrot
8377  logical izrot
8378  ! ********************************************************************
8379  !*****************
8380  ! the statistics in EXT2
8381 
8382  ! sprfx(cm): 2.*sqrt( sum(x*x) )
8383  ! sprfy(cm): 2.*sqrt( sum(y*y) )
8384  ! sprfw: 2.*sqrt( sum(dp/p * dp/p) )*beta*beta = (energy
8385  ! spread)/(energy of c.o.g)
8386  ! sprfp(deg):2.*sqrt( sum(dphi * dphi) )
8387  ! sprfz(cm) : sqrt( sum(dt * dt) )
8388  ! sprfl(m) : t.o.f of the reference
8389  ! sprww(MeV):kinetic energy of the c.o.g
8390  ! eprfw(ns.keV) : longitudinal emittance
8391  ! eprnx(mm.mrad): normalized emittance in x-direction
8392  ! eprny(mm.mrad): normalized emittance in y-direction
8393  ! ********************************************************************
8394  !*****************
8395  ! iprf: pointer
8396  ! cor 08/01/2009
8397  ! omment iprf=iprf+1
8398  ! izrot: logical flag set as .true. in the routine ZROTA
8399  if (izrot) call zrotap(-rzot)
8400  iarg = 0
8401  call cdg(iarg)
8402  encog = cog(1)
8403  gcog = encog/xmat
8404  bcog = sqrt(1.-1./(gcog*gcog))
8405  tcog = cog(3)
8406  call ext2(iarg)
8407  qdisp = 2.*sqrt(exten(1))
8408  qmd = exten(1)*exten(3) - exten(2)*exten(2)
8409  delw = encog*encog*bcog**4
8410  qmdv = qmd*delw
8411  sqmdv = 4.*pi*sqrt(qmdv)
8412  eprfw(iprf) = sqmdv*1.e12/(pi*fh)
8413  sprfx(iprf) = 2.*sqrt(exten(4))
8414  sprfy(iprf) = 2.*sqrt(exten(6))
8415  trqtx = exten(4)*exten(5) - exten(8)*exten(8)
8416  trqpy = exten(6)*exten(7) - exten(9)*exten(9)
8417  surxth = 4.*pi*sqrt(trqtx)
8418  suryph = 4.*pi*sqrt(trqpy)
8419  eprnx(iprf) = bcog*surxth*10./(pi*sqrt(1.-bcog*bcog))
8420  eprny(iprf) = bcog*suryph*10./(pi*sqrt(1.-bcog*bcog))
8421  ! horizontal and vertical dispersion in meter (w.r.t. reference)
8422  ! disprx(iprf)=0.01*exten(12)/exten(14)
8423  ! dispry(iprf)=0.01*exten(13)/exten(14)
8424  ! horizontal and vertical dispersion in meter (w.r.t. COG)
8425  dispcx(iprf) = 0.01*exten(15)/exten(17)
8426  dispcy(iprf) = 0.01*exten(16)/exten(17)
8427  trqfi = 0.
8428  tof = 0.
8429  chxmx = f(2, 1)
8430  chxmn = f(2, 1)
8431  chymx = f(4, 1)
8432  chymn = f(4, 1)
8433  chpmx = f(6, 1) - tcog
8434  chpmn = f(6, 1) - tcog
8435  chwmx = f(7, 1) - encog
8436  chwmn = f(7, 1) - encog
8437  do i = 1, ngood
8438  gpai = f(7, i)/xmat
8439  bpai = sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
8440  fdp = (gpai*bpai)/(gcog*bcog) - 1.
8441  trqfi = trqfi + fdp*fdp
8442  tf = (tcog-f(6,i))*bpai*vl
8443  tof = tof + tf*tf
8444  if (f(2,i)>chxmx) chxmx = f(2, i)
8445  if (f(2,i)<chxmn) chxmn = f(2, i)
8446  if (f(4,i)>chymx) chymx = f(4, i)
8447  if (f(4,i)<chymn) chymn = f(4, i)
8448  if (f(6,i)-tcog>chpmx) then
8449  chpmx = f(6, i) - tcog
8450  chdmx = chpmx*fh*180./pi
8451  end if
8452  if (f(6,i)-tcog<chpmn) then
8453  chpmn = f(6, i) - tcog
8454  chdmn = chpmn*fh*180./pi
8455  end if
8456  if (f(7,i)-encog>chwmx) chwmx = f(7, i) - encog
8457  if (f(7,i)-encog<chwmn) chwmn = f(7, i) - encog
8458  end do
8459  trqfi = trqfi/float(ngood)
8460  tof = tof/float(ngood)
8461  sprfz(iprf) = sqrt(tof)
8462  cmult = (gcog+1.)/gcog
8463  sprfw(iprf) = 2.*sqrt(trqfi)*cmult
8464  ! v29/06/2010 sprfw(iprf)=2.*sqrt(trqfi)*bcog*bcog
8465  sprfp(iprf) = 2.*sqrt(exten(3))*180./pi
8466  sprww(iprf) = cog(1) - xmat
8467  ! t.o.f of the reference in m
8468  sprfl(iprf) = zpos/1000.
8469  ! *et*2013-Aug-21 set up ngood particle counter for dynac.print file
8470  sprng(iprf) = ngood
8471  ! *et*2014-Sep-25 Add recording of min. and max. positions in x,y and
8472  ! z,z'
8473  sxmx(iprf) = chxmx*10.
8474  sxmn(iprf) = chxmn*10.
8475  symx(iprf) = chymx*10.
8476  symn(iprf) = chymn*10.
8477  stmx(iprf) = chpmx
8478  stmn(iprf) = chpmn
8479  spmx(iprf) = chdmx
8480  spmn(iprf) = chdmn
8481  swmx(iprf) = chwmx
8482  swmn(iprf) = chwmn
8483  ! evolve pointer iprf (cor. 08/01/2009)
8484  iprf = iprf + 1
8485  if (izrot) call zrotap(-rzot)
8486  return
8487  end subroutine stapl
8488  subroutine eugwrt
8489  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
8490  common /pltprf/sprfx(3000), sprfy(3000), sprfl(3000), sprfw(3000), &
8491  sprfp(3000), sprng(3000), iprf
8492  common /pltprf1/sprww(3000), eprfw(3000), eprnx(3000), eprny(3000), &
8493  sprfz(3000)
8494  common /pltprf2/sxmn(3000), sxmx(3000), symn(3000), symx(3000), &
8495  stmn(3000), stmx(3000), spmn(3000), spmx(3000), swmn(3000), &
8496  swmx(3000), disprx(3000), dispry(3000), dispcx(3000), dispcy(3000)
8497  ! l(m) x(mm) y(mm) z(deg) z(mm) Ex(mm.mrd) Ey(mm.mrd) Ez(KeV.ns)
8498  ! Wcog(MeV) xmin(mm) xmax(mm) ymin(mm) ymax(mm)
8499  ! tmin(ns) tmax(ns) pmin(deg) pmax(deg) wmin(MeV) wmax(MeV) Dxref(m)
8500  ! Dyref(m) Dxcog(m) Dycog(m)
8501  write (71, 99)
8502 99 format (1x, '# l(m) ', 1x, ' x(mm) ', 1x, ' y(mm) ', 3x, &
8503  ' z(deg) ', 1x, ' z(mm) ', 2x, 'emx(mm.mrd)', 2x, &
8504  'emy(mm.mrd) ', 1x, 'emz(KeV.ns)', 2x, 'energy(MeV) ', 1x, &
8505  '#particles', 2x, 'xmin(mm)', 5x, 'xmax(mm)', 5x, 'ymin(mm)', 5x, &
8506  'ymax(mm)', 5x, 'tmin(s)', 6x, 'tmax(s)', 5x, 'phmin(deg)', 4x, &
8507  'phmax(deg)', 3x, 'Wmin(MeV)', 4x, 'Wmax(MeV)', 4x, 'Dx(m)', 8x, &
8508  'Dy(m)')
8509  ! * 4x,'Drx(m)',8x,'Dry(m)',4x,'Dcx(m)',8x,'Dcy(m)')
8510  iprf1 = iprf - 1
8511  do i = 1, iprf1
8512  ! x and y: cm-->mm
8513  sprx = sprfx(i)*10./2.
8514  spry = sprfy(i)*10./2.
8515  sprp = sprfp(i)/2.
8516  sprz = sprfz(i)*10.
8517  write (71, 100) sprfl(i), sprx, spry, sprp, sprz, eprnx(i)/4., &
8518  eprny(i)/4., eprfw(i), sprww(i), int(sprng(i)), sxmn(i), &
8519  sxmx(i), symn(i), symx(i), stmn(i), stmx(i), spmn(i), spmx(i), &
8520  swmn(i), swmx(i), dispcx(i), dispcy(i)
8521  ! * disprx(i),dispry(i),dispcx(i),dispcy(i)
8522  end do
8523 100 format (9(1x,e12.5), 1x, i7, 3x, 12(1x,e12.5))
8524  ! 100 format(9(1x,e12.5),1x,i7,3x,14(1x,e12.5))
8525  return
8526  end subroutine eugwrt
8540  subroutine etgap
8541  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
8542  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
8543  common /ttfs/dynt(maxcell), dyntp(maxcell), dyntpp(maxcell), &
8544  dyne0(maxcell), dynph(maxcell), dynlg(maxcell), fhpar, nc
8545  common /posi/ist
8546  common /midgap/enmil, vapmi
8547  common /azmtch/dlg, xmcph, xmce
8548  common /azlist/icont, iprin
8549  common /itvole/itvol, imamin
8550  common /func/a(200), ylg, atte, ncel, nharm
8551  ! TRANSIT TIME COEFFICIENTS
8552  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
8553  common /ttfc1/t3k, t4k, s3k, s4k
8554  common /bedycp/phslip, eqvl, asdl, peqvl, pavph, xkp1, xkp2, aa, bb, &
8555  cc, dd, ee, pcrest, sqcttf
8556  common /jacob/gaks, gaps
8557  common /iter1/dxdki, dphii, phi, dkmske, dkmsphi, retph, xkmi, xkm, &
8558  dxk00, tke, t1ke, ske, s1ke, phiwc, xk1i, xk1ii, xk2ii
8559  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
8560  common /qmoyen/qmoy
8561  common /rigid/boro
8562  common /cdek/dwp(iptsz)
8563  common /sc3/beamc, scdist, sce10, cplm, ect, apl, ichaes, iscsp
8564  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
8565  common /dyn/tref, vref
8566  common /compt/nrres, nrtre, nrbunc, nrdbun
8567  common /compt1/ndtl, ncavmc, ncavnm
8568  common /fene/wdisp, wphas, wx, wy, rlim, ifw
8569  common /tapes/in, ifile, meta
8570  common /ranec1/dummy(6)
8571  common /etcom/cog(8), exten(17), fd(iptsz)
8572  common /speda/dave, idave
8573  common /shif/dtiph, shift
8574  common /davcom/dav1(maxcell1, 40), davtot, iitem(maxcell1), idav
8575  common /etcha1/dav2(maxcell1, 33), ichas(iptsz), chasit
8576  common /dcspa/iesp
8577  common /fct/fakt
8578  common /mode/eflvl, rflvl
8579  common /pltprf/sprfx(3000), sprfy(3000), sprfl(3000), sprfw(3000), &
8580  sprfp(3000), sprng(3000), iprf
8581  common /appel/irstay, ilost, iavp, ispcel
8582  common /posc/xpsc
8583  common /femt/iemgrw, iemqesg
8584  common /aerp/vphase, vfield, ierpf
8585  common /tofev/ttvols
8586  ! *bugfix*2010_07_03 : next line was missing; caused z=0 in envelope
8587  ! plot
8588  common /pstpla/tstp
8589  ! --- synchronous particle:
8590  ! ***** DWRFS(MeV): energy gain
8591  ! ***** SPHRFS(rad): phase jump
8592  ! ***** PHRFS(rad):phase RF
8593  ! ***** common/parmrf/DWRFS,SPHRFS,PHRFS,ngdrf
8594  logical iesp, irstay, iavp, ispcel, iemgrw
8595  character *1 cr
8596  ! SHIFT =TRUE: cog and synchronous particle are independent
8597  ! SHIFT =FALSE: cog and synchronous particle are coinciding
8598  logical shift, chasit, itvol, imamin, dave, ichaes
8599  dimension etcell(maxcell)
8600  ! --- iesp, irstay, ispcel logical flags used in the routines of space
8601  ! sharge computations
8602  ! iesp=false: accelerating element
8603  ! ispcel = .true.: space charge computation
8604  iesp = .false.
8605  irstay = .false.
8606  ispcel = .true.
8607  ilost = 0
8608  fact = 1.
8609  ndtl = ndtl + 1
8610  ! *bugfix*2010_07_03 : next line was missing; caused # of accelerating
8611  ! elements to be zero
8612  nrres = nrres + 1
8613  ! allow for print out on terminal of gap# on one and the same line
8614  cr = char(13)
8615  write (6, 8254) nrtre, ndtl, cr
8616 8254 format ('Transport element:', i5, ' Accelerating gap :', i5, &
8617  a1, $)
8618  write (16, *) 'ACCELERATING GAP N :', ndtl
8619  read (in, *)(etcell(iet), iet=1, 16)
8620  fh = etcell(15)
8621  fakt = etcell(16)
8622  if (fakt==0.) fakt = 1.e-12
8623  fh = fh*2.*pi*1000000.
8624  ! --- YLG : CELL LENGTH (cm)
8625  ! --- YE0 : ELECTRIC FIELD (MV/cm)
8626  ylg = etcell(4)
8627  scdist = ylg
8628  ye0 = etcell(11)/100.
8629  ! TRANSIT TIME COEFFICIENTS (at the middle OF THE CELL)
8630  t0 = etcell(5)*ylg*ye0
8631  tp0 = -etcell(6)*ylg*ylg*ye0
8632  tpp0 = -etcell(14)*ylg*ylg*ylg*ye0
8633  ! TRANSIT TIME factors at the ENTRANCE OF THE CELL
8634  ! with kg=2*PI/ylg:
8635  ! TK0=T0*COS(kg*ylg/2) = -T0
8636  ! SK0=T0*SIN(kg*ylg/2) = 0
8637  ! TPK0=d(TK0)/dk
8638  ! SPK0=d(SK0)/dk
8639  ! TPPK0=d(TPK0)/dk
8640  ! SPPK0=d(SPK0)/dk
8641  tk0 = -t0
8642  sk0 = 0.
8643  tpk0 = -tp0
8644  spk0 = -ylg*t0/2.
8645  tppk0 = ylg*ylg*t0/4. - tpp0
8646  sppk0 = -ylg*tp0/2.
8647  tk = tk0
8648  t1k = tpk0
8649  t2k = tppk0
8650  sk = sk0
8651  s1k = spk0
8652  s2k = sppk0
8653  tp3k0 = 0.
8654  tp4k0 = 0.
8655  sp3k0 = 0.
8656  sp4k0 = 0.
8657  ! MULTIPLY TRANSIT TIME factors WITH FAKT
8658  t0 = t0*fakt
8659  tp0 = tp0*fakt
8660  tpp0 = tpp0*fakt
8661  tk0 = -t0
8662  tpk0 = -tp0
8663  spk0 = -ylg*t0/2.
8664  tppk0 = ylg*ylg*t0/4. - tpp0
8665  sppk0 = -ylg*tp0/2.
8666  tk = tk0
8667  t1k = tpk0
8668  t2k = tppk0
8669  sk = sk0
8670  s1k = spk0
8671  s2k = sppk0
8672  ! IPOINR=IPOINR+1
8673  ! print in file: 'short.data'
8674  ! --- ylg : CELL LENGTH (cm) ==> (mm)
8675  ! --- ye0 : ELECTRIC FIELD (MV/cm) ==> (Kv/mm)
8676  ! --- davtot (mm)
8677  idav = idav + 1
8678  iitem(idav) = 17
8679  dav1(idav, 1) = ylg*10.
8680  dav1(idav, 2) = ye0*100.
8681  ! *bugfix*2010_07_03 : next line was missing; caused z=0 in envelope
8682  ! plot
8683  tstp = (davtot+ylg*xpsc)*10.
8684  davtot = davtot + ylg
8685  dav1(idav, 24) = davtot*10.
8686  ! 21.11.09 dav1(idav,40)=fh
8687  fh0 = fh/vl
8688  ! STATISTICS FOR PLOT
8689  if (iprf==1) call stapl(dav1(idav,24))
8690  ! reference particle
8691  iarg = 1
8692  call cdg(iarg)
8693  ecog = cog(1)
8694  enold = ecog
8695  gcog = ecog/xmat
8696  bcog = sqrt(1.-1./(gcog*gcog))
8697  tcog = cog(3)
8698  if (shift) then
8699  ! reference particle and cog are independent
8700  beref = vref/vl
8701  gamref = 1./sqrt(1.-(beref*beref))
8702  enref = xmat*gamref
8703  trefdg = tref*fh*180./pi
8704  tcogdg = tcog*fh*180./pi
8705  dav1(idav, 3) = 1.
8706  else
8707  ! reference and c.o.g. are coinciding
8708  vref = bcog*vl
8709  tref = tcog
8710  gamref = gcog
8711  beref = bcog
8712  enref = cog(1)
8713  trefdg = tref*fh*180./pi
8714  tcogdg = tcog*fh*180./pi
8715  dav1(idav, 3) = 0.
8716  end if
8717  ! --- ttvol: time of flight at entrance (sec)
8718  ttvol = 0.
8719  if (itvol) ttvol = ttvols*fh
8720  ! ***** reference is placed in the position ngdrf=ngood+1 in array
8721  ! f(10,i)
8722  ! ***** ngdrf=ngood+1
8723  ! ***** BEREF=VREF/VL
8724  ! ***** GAMREF=1./SQRT(1.-(BEREF*BEREF))
8725  ! ***** ENREF=XMAT*GAMREF
8726  ! **** f(1,ngdrf)=ngdrf
8727  ! **** f(2,ngdrf)=0.
8728  ! **** f(3,ngdrf)=0.
8729  ! **** f(4,ngdrf)=0.
8730  ! **** f(5,ngdrf)=0.
8731  ! **** f(6,ngdrf)=tref
8732  ! **** f(7,ngdrf)=enref
8733  ! **** f(8,ngdrf)=1.
8734  ! **** f(9,ngdrf)=qst
8735  ! **** f(10,ngdrf)=0.
8736  if (dav1(idav,3)==1.) write (16, *) &
8737  ' ****reference and cog are different'
8738  if (dav1(idav,3)==0.) write (16, *) &
8739  ' **** reference and cog coincide '
8740  write (16, 178)
8741 178 format (/, ' DYNAMICS AT THE INPUT ', /, 5x, &
8742  ' BETA GAMMA ENERGY(MeV) ', &
8743  ' TOF(deg) TOF(sec)')
8744  write (16, 1788) bcog, gcog, ecog - xmat, tcogdg, tcog
8745 1788 format (' COG ', f7.5, 3x, e12.5, 1x, e12.5, 3x, e12.5, 3x, e12.5)
8746  write (16, 165) beref, gamref, enref - xmat, trefdg, tref
8747 165 format (' REF ', f7.5, 3x, e12.5, 1x, e12.5, 3x, e12.5, 3x, e12.5)
8748  tofprt = tref
8749  ! iprint=1: full print ( in case of pbmes)
8750  iprint = 0
8751  call statis
8752  xk1 = fh/vref
8753  ! --- predictor of the average beta:BEMY.
8754  beref = vref/vl
8755  gamref = 1./sqrt(1.-(beref*beref))
8756  ! DPHASE : PHASE AT THE MIDDLE OF THE CELL (rad)
8757  dphete = etcell(12)
8758  dphase = etcell(12)*pi/180.
8759  ! 15/12/09 dpherd=dphase
8760  ! 15/12/09 ttvol=0.
8761  ! --- The option TOF is passive in the DTL
8762  ! t.o.f. at the middle of the cell
8763  ! 15/12/09 if(itvol) then
8764  ! 15/12/09 tvolm=ylg/(2.*vref)
8765  ! 15/12/09 ttvol=(ttvols+tvolm)
8766  ! 15/12/09 endif
8767  ! 15/12/09 adjust the phase of RF w.r.t. TOF
8768  ! 15/12/09 if(itvol.and.imamin) then
8769  ! 15/12/09 odphase=dphase
8770  ! 15/12/09 ottvol=fh*ttvol*180./pi
8771  ! 15/12/09 attvol=ottvol
8772  ! 15/12/09 xkpi=ottvol/360.
8773  ! 15/12/09 ixkpi=int(xkpi)
8774  ! 15/12/09 xkpi=(xkpi-float(ixkpi))*360.
8775  ! 15/12/09 dphase=dphase-xkpi*pi/180.
8776  ! 15/12/09 endif
8777  aqst = abs(qst)
8778  ddw = aqst*t0*cos(dphase)
8779  enrefs = enref + ddw
8780  gams = enrefs/xmat
8781  bets = sqrt(1.-1./(gams*gams))
8782  xk2 = fh/(bets*vl)
8783  bemy = (gams*bets+gamref*beref)/(gams+gamref)
8784  xkm = fh/(bemy*vl)
8785  xkg = 2.*pi/ylg
8786  ! --- average phase of RF at entrance
8787  saphi = dphase
8788  sapho = saphi
8789  eqvl = ylg
8790  dkg = (xkm-xkg)
8791  dts = tp0/t0
8792  fk1 = 2.*dts
8793  fpk0 = (tp0*tp0+t0*tpp0)/(t0*t0)
8794  fpk1 = 2.*tp0**2/(t0*t0)
8795  fpk = 2.*(fpk0-fpk1)
8796  pcrest = atan(-sk/tk)
8797  ddw = aqst*(tk*cos(pcrest)-sk*sin(pcrest))/2.
8798  if (ddw<0.) pcrest = pcrest + pi
8799  peqvl = ylg/2.
8800  sclen = ylg
8801  ! 15/12/09 if(.not.imamin) then
8802  write (16, 1555) fh/(2.*pi), ylg, dphase*180./pi
8803 1555 format (4x, 'FREQENCY :', e12.5, ' Hertz', /, 4x, 'GAP LENGTH :', &
8804  e12.5, ' cm', /, 4x, 'PHASE of RF (middle of the gap) :', e12.5, &
8805  'deg', /)
8806  ! 15/12/09 else
8807  ! 15/12/09 WRITE(16,1556)FH/(2.*pi),YLG,DPHASE*180./PI,odphase
8808  ! 15/12/09 1556 FORMAT(4X,'FREQENCY :',E12.5,' Hertz',/,4x,
8809  ! 15/12/09 x 'GAP LENGTH :',e12.5,' cm',/,4x,
8810  ! 15/12/09 x 'phase of RF after
8811  ! adjustement:',e12.5,'deg',/,4x,
8812  ! 15/12/09 * 'phase of RF before adjustment',e12.5,'deg')
8813  ! 15/12/09 endif
8814  ! --- Follow ITERATIONS giving:
8815  ! The equivalent field length (cm)
8816  ! The asociated drift length (cm)
8817  ! The slip of phase (rd)
8818  ! The energy gain (MeV)
8819  ! The phase jump (rd)
8820  ! The average k (cm-1)
8821  ! The transit time coefficients (MeV,cm)
8822  ! The phase crest (rad)
8823  ! The phase offset at entrance (rad)
8824  eqvl = ylg
8825  dkg = (xkm-xkg)
8826  fpk = 2.*(fpk0-fpk1)
8827  til2 = 0.
8828  do it = 1, 3
8829  ! slip of phase and equivalent field length
8830  if (it==1) phslip = -4.*atan(3.2*dts/eqvl)
8831  if (phslip/=0.) then
8832  til2 = phslip/2.
8833  do iiii = 1, 4
8834  gx = 1./tan(til2) - 1./til2
8835  gpx = -1./(sin(til2)*sin(til2)) + 1./(til2*til2)
8836  gppx = 2.*cos(til2)/(sin(til2)**3) - 2./(til2*til2*til2)
8837  hx = gpx/(gx*gx) - 2.*fpk/(fk1**2)
8838  dhx = -(2.*gx*gpx*gpx-gx*gx*gppx)/(gx**4)
8839  til2 = til2 - hx/dhx
8840  eqvl = sqrt(abs(2.*fpk/gpx))
8841  if (abs(hx)<=1.e-05) go to 556
8842  end do
8843 556 continue
8844  phslip = til2*2.
8845  end if
8846  peqvl = ylg/2.
8847  asdl = peqvl - eqvl/2.
8848  ! ENERGY GAIN AND PHASE JUMP (i.e. DELPHR)
8849  ! saphi=sapho-pcrest+ttvol*fh
8850  saphi = sapho - pcrest + ttvol
8851  ! TESTsv05.05.2011 saphi=sapho-pcrest
8852  f0 = xitl0(gamref, gams, bemy, saphi, aqst)
8853  delwrm = (f0-gamref)*xmat
8854  enrs = enref + delwrm
8855  gams = enrs/xmat
8856  bets = sqrt(1.-1./(gams*gams))
8857  xk2 = fh0/bets
8858  coeph = fh*aqst/(vl*xmat)
8859  f2 = xitl2(gamref, gams, bemy, saphi, aqst)
8860  delphr = coeph*f2
8861  xkm = delphr/eqvl + xk2*(1.+asdl/eqvl) - xk1*asdl/eqvl
8862  bemy = fh0/xkm
8863  ! TRANSIT TIME FACTORS
8864  dkg = (xkm-xkg)
8865  tk = tk0 + dkg*tpk0 + dkg*dkg*tppk0/2. + dkg**3*tp3k0/6. + &
8866  dkg**4*tp4k0/24.
8867  t1k = tpk0 + dkg*tppk0 + dkg*dkg*tp3k0/2. + dkg**3*tp4k0/6.
8868  t2k = tppk0 + dkg*tp3k0 + dkg*dkg*tp4k0/2.
8869  t3k = tp3k0 + dkg*tp4k0
8870  t4k = tp4k0
8871  sk = sk0 + dkg*spk0 + dkg*dkg*sppk0/2. + dkg**3*sp3k0/6. + &
8872  dkg**4*sp4k0/24.
8873  s1k = spk0 + dkg*sppk0 + dkg*dkg*sp3k0/2. + dkg**3*sp4k0/6.
8874  s2k = sppk0 + dkg*sp3k0 + dkg*dkg*sp4k0/2.
8875  s3k = sp3k0 + dkg*sp4k0
8876  s4k = sp4k0
8877  ! PHASE CREST
8878  pcrest = atan(-sk/tk)
8879  ddw = aqst*(tk*cos(pcrest)-sk*sin(pcrest))/2.
8880  if (ddw<0.) pcrest = pcrest + pi
8881  end do
8882  ! CREST VALUE = SQCTTF*(PHSLIP/2)/SIN(PHSLIP/2)
8883  sqcttf = til2*sqrt(tk*tk+sk*sk)/sin(til2)*2.
8884  ! THE synchronous particle IS BASED ON CHARGE STATE : QMOY =AQST
8885  cfh = fh/(vl*2.*xmat)
8886  ckh = qmoy*qmoy/(4.*xmat*xmat)
8887  ! ******--- save the energy and the T.O.F of the reference before the
8888  ! routine:GAP
8889  ! ***** enri=f(7,ngdrf)
8890  ! ***** trefi=f(6,ngdrf)
8891  call gap(gamref, saphi, gams, delphr)
8892  ! *****--- trefs and enrs: T.O.F. and energy of the reference at
8893  ! output of the acc. element
8894  ! **** trefs=f(6,ngdrf)
8895  ! ****** enrs=f(7,ngdrf)
8896  ! ***** grefs=f(7,ngdrf)/xmat
8897  ! ***** bets=sqrt(grefs*grefs-1.)/grefs
8898  ! ****** delwrm=enrs-enri
8899  ! output of the element
8900  ! new PHARES,TREFS to be in accordance with GENAC
8901  phares = saphi + fh*ylg/vref + delphr
8902  trefs = tref + ylg/(bets*vl) + delphr/fh
8903  phared = (phares-saphi)*180./pi
8904  tredg = fh*trefs*180./pi
8905  write (16, *) ' PARAMETERS RELATING TO THE REFERENCE PARTICLE '
8906  write (16, *) '************************************************'
8907  write (16, *) ' ENERGY GAIN(MeV): ', delwrm, ' TOF(DEG) ', tredg
8908  ! write(16,*) ' PHASE JUMP(DEG): ',sphrfs*180./PI
8909  write (16, *) ' CREST PHASE OF RF (DG): ', pcrest*180./pi
8910  write (16, *) ' PHASE OF RF AT THE MIDDLE (DG): ', sapho*180./pi
8911  write (16, *) ' PHASE OF RF AT THE ENTRANCE (DG): ', saphi*180./pi
8912  write (16, *) ' AVERAGE k (cm-1) (freq./velocity): ', xkm
8913  write (16, *) ' TRANSIT TIME FACTORS (MeV-cm):'
8914  write (16, *) ' T dT/dk d2T/dk2 ', tk, t1k, t2k
8915  write (16, *) ' S dS/dk d2S/dk2 ', sk, s1k, s2k
8916  write (16, *) ' PHASE SLIP(DEG) ', phslip*180./pi
8917  write (16, *)
8918  write (16, *) ' PARAMETERS RELATING TO THE EQUIVALENT FIELD '
8919  write (16, *) '************************************************'
8920  write (16, 171) eqvl
8921 171 format (' length :', e12.5, ' cm ')
8922  write (16, *) ' Associated drift length: ', asdl, ' cm'
8923  write (16, *) ' magnitude: ', sqcttf, ' MV/cm'
8924  iarg = 1
8925  call cdg(iarg)
8926  encog = cog(1)
8927  gcog = encog/xmat
8928  bcog = sqrt(1.-1./(gcog*gcog))
8929  tcog = cog(3)
8930  call ext2d(1)
8931  ! sup phnew=-(int(tcog*fh/pi+0.5)-tcog*fh/pi)*180.
8932  ! sup dav1(idav,7)=phnew
8933  dav1(idav, 37) = saphi*180./pi
8934  ! 15/12/09 if(itvol) then
8935  ! 15/12/09 dav1(idav,38)=dphete
8936  ! 15/12/09 dav1(idav,39)=dphase*180./pi
8937  ! 15/12/09 else
8938  dav1(idav, 38) = dphete
8939  ! 15/12/09 endif
8940  ! end print in the file: 'short.data'
8941  write (16, 3777)
8942 3777 format (/, 3x, 3('*'), ' DYNAMICS AT THE OUTPUT: ', /, 5x, &
8943  ' BETA dW(MeV) ENERGY(MeV) ', ' TOF(deg) TOF(sec)')
8944  write (16, 3473) bets, delwrm, enrs - xmat, fh*trefs*180./pi, trefs
8945 3473 format (' REF ', f7.5, 3x, f10.6, 3x, f8.3, 3x, e12.5, 3x, e12.5)
8946  write (16, 1789) bcog, encog - enold, encog - xmat, tcog*fh*180./pi, &
8947  tcog
8948 1789 format (' COG ', f7.5, 3x, f10.6, 3x, f8.3, 3x, e12.5, 3x, e12.5)
8949  testca = exten(1)*exten(2)*exten(3)
8950  epsil = 1.e-40
8951  if (abs(testca)>epsil) then
8952  qdisp = 2.*sqrt(exten(1))
8953  qmd = exten(1)*exten(3) - exten(2)**2
8954  sqmdv = 4.*pi*sqrt(qmd)
8955  surm = 4.*pi*sqrt(qmd)*180./pi
8956  qdp = 2.*sqrt(exten(3))
8957  cor12 = exten(2)/sqrt(exten(1)*exten(3))
8958  qdpde = qdp*180./pi
8959  else
8960  qdisp = 0.
8961  qmd = 0.
8962  sqmdv = 0.
8963  surm = 0.
8964  qdp = 0.
8965  cor12 = 0.
8966  pent12 = 0.
8967  pent21 = 0.
8968  qdpde = 0.
8969  end if
8970  trqtx = exten(4)*exten(5) - exten(8)**2
8971  trqpy = exten(6)*exten(7) - exten(9)**2
8972  qditax = 2.*sqrt(exten(4))
8973  qdiant = 2.*sqrt(exten(5))
8974  qditay = 2.*sqrt(exten(6))
8975  qdianp = 2.*sqrt(exten(7))
8976  surxth = 4.*pi*sqrt(trqtx)
8977  suryph = 4.*pi*sqrt(trqpy)
8978  if (shift) then
8979  vref = bets*vl
8980  tref = trefs
8981  else
8982  vref = bcog*vl
8983  tref = tcog
8984  end if
8985  if (itvol) then
8986  ttvols = tref
8987  ! 15/12/09 attvol=fh*ttvols*180./pi
8988  ! 15/12/09 write(16,7456) ottvol,attvol
8989  end if
8990  ! 15/12/09 7456 format(2x,'***tof at input: ',e12.5,' deg',/,
8991  ! 15/12/09 * 2x,'***tof at output: ',e12.5,' deg')
8992  call statis
8993  ! PROFIL (plot)
8994  call stapl(dav1(idav,24))
8995  dltaw = qdisp*xmat*bcog*bcog/sqrt(1.-bcog*bcog)
8996  ! sup WRITE(16,9998) SQMDV
8997  ! sup9998 FORMAT(2X,' EMITTANCE (norm): ',
8998  ! sup * E12.5,' PI*MEV*RAD')
8999  ! print in the file: 'dynac.dmp':
9000  ! gap number, phase offset(deg), relativistic beta, energy(MeV), horz.
9001  ! emit.(mm*mrd,norm), vert. emit.(mm*mrd,norm),long. emit(keV*sec)
9002  ! dav1(idav,16): Emittance(norm) x-xp (mm*mrad)
9003  dav1(idav, 16) = bcog*surxth*10./(pi*sqrt(1.-bcog*bcog))
9004  ! dav1(idav,21): Emittance(norm) y-yp (mm*mrad)
9005  dav1(idav, 21) = bcog*suryph*10./(pi*sqrt(1.-bcog*bcog))
9006  dav1(idav, 25) = ndtl
9007  emns = 1.e12*sqmdv/(pi*fh)
9008  ! et2010s
9009  trfprt = fh*tref*180./pi
9010  tcgprt = fh*tcog*180./pi
9011  ! n2kp=int(tofprt/360.)
9012  ! tofprt=tofprt-float(n2kp)*360.
9013  ! if(tofprt.gt.180.) tofprt=tofprt-360.
9014  ! cavity number, z(m), transmission (%), synchronous phase (deg), time
9015  ! of flight (deg) (cog), COG relativistic beta (@ output)
9016  ! COG output energy (MeV), time of flight (deg) (REF), REF
9017  ! relativistic beta (@ output), REF output energy (MeV),
9018  ! horizontal emittance (mm.mrad, RMS normalized), vertical emittance
9019  ! (mm.mrad, RMS normalized),
9020  ! longitudinal emittance (RMS, ns.keV)
9021  trnsms = 100.*float(ngood)/float(imax)
9022  if (ndtl==1) write (50, *) '# gap.dmp'
9023  if (ndtl==1) write (50, *) '# gap Z trans ', &
9024  'PHIs TOF(COG) COG Wcog TOF(REF) ', &
9025  ' REF Wref Ex,RMS,n Ey,RMS,n El,RMS'
9026  if (ndtl==1) write (50, *) '# # (m) (%) ', &
9027  '(deg) (deg) beta (MeV) (deg) ', &
9028  ' beta (MeV) (mm.mrad) (mm.mrad) (ns.keV)'
9029  write (50, 7023) ndtl, 0.01*davtot, trnsms, dphete, tcgprt, bcog, &
9030  encog - xmat, trfprt, bets, enrs - xmat, 0.25*dav1(idav, 16), &
9031  0.25*dav1(idav, 21), 0.25*emns
9032 7023 format (1x, i4, 1x, e12.5, 1x, f6.2, 1x, f7.2, 1x, &
9033  2(e14.7,1x,f7.5,1x,e14.7,1x), 3(e12.5,1x))
9034  ! et2010e
9035  ! RIGIDITY of the ref. prtcle
9036  gref = 1./sqrt(1.-bets*bets)
9037  xmor = xmat*bets*gref
9038  boro = 33.356*xmor*1.e-01/qst
9039  write (16, *) ilost, ' particles are lost in element ', ndtl
9040  write (16, *)
9041  call emiprt(0)
9042  return
9043  end subroutine etgap
9051  subroutine gap(gamref, saphi, gams, delphr)
9052  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
9053  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
9054  common /ttfs/dynt(maxcell), dyntp(maxcell), dyntpp(maxcell), &
9055  dyne0(maxcell), dynph(maxcell), dynlg(maxcell), fhpar, nc
9056  common /posi/ist
9057  common /midgap/enmil, vapmi
9058  common /azmtch/dlg, xmcph, xmce
9059  common /azlist/icont, iprin
9060  common /itvole/itvol, imamin
9061  common /func/a(200), ylg, atte, ncel, nharm
9062  ! TRANSIT TIME COEFFICIENTS
9063  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
9064  ! ***************************************************************
9065  common /bedycp/phslip, eqvl, asdl, peqvl, pavph, xkp1, xkp2, aa, bb, &
9066  cc, dd, ee, pcrest, sqcttf
9067  common /jacob/gaks, gaps
9068  common /iter1/dxdki, dphii, phi, dkmske, dkmsphi, retph, xkmi, xkm, &
9069  dxk00, tke, t1ke, ske, s1ke, phiwc, xk1i, xk1ii, xk2ii
9070  ! functions in COS(DXDPT)
9071  common /iterco/yh11t, yh1k1t, yh1k01t, yh10pkt, yh11pkt, yh1p1t, &
9072  h1akit, h1akimt, h1akmt, hapit, happit
9073  ! functions in SIN(DXDPT)
9074  common /itersi/yh21t, yh2k1t, yh2k01t, yh2p1t, yh20pkt, yh21pkt, &
9075  h1bkit, h1bkimt, h1bkmt, hbpit, hbppit
9076  common /tranrs/sa11, sa12, sa21, sa22, sact11, sact12, sact21, sact22
9077  ! --- routine XTYPL1
9078  common /typl1/yh1k0, yh1k1, yp1k1, yp1k2, yh1k00, yh1k01, yp1k01, &
9079  yp1k02, yh10, yh11, yp11, yp12
9080  common /typl2/yh2k0, yh2k1, yp2k1, yp2k2, yh2k00, yh2k01, yp2k01, &
9081  yp2k02, yh20, yh21, yp21, yp22
9082  common /typi1/ye1k0, ye1k1, ye1k2, ye1kc0, ye1kc1, ye1kc2, ye10, ye11, &
9083  ye12
9084  common /typi2/ye2k0, ye2k1, ye2k2, ye2kc0, ye2kc1, ye2kc2, ye20, ye21, &
9085  ye22
9086  common /thad2/h0aki, h0akim, h0akm, h0bki, h0bkim, h0bkm, h1aki, &
9087  h1akim, h1akm, h1bki, h1bkim, h1bkm
9088  ! --- routine XTYPLP1
9089  common /typlp1/yh1p1, yh2p1, hapi, hbpi
9090  ! --- routine XTYPL2
9091  common /typlp2/happi, hbppi
9092  ! --- routine XTYLPK
9093  common /typlpk/yh10pk, yh11pk, yh20pk, yh21pk
9094  ! Integrals of E(z)**2
9095  ! --- routine XTYPJ
9096  common /typj/yfsk0, yfsk1, yfsk2, yfsp0, yfsp1, yfsp2, yfskc0, yfskc1, &
9097  yfskc2, yfsck0, yfsck1, yfsck2, yfscp0, yfscp1, yfscp2, yfs0, &
9098  yfs1, yfs2
9099  ! --- routine XTYPM
9100  common /typm/ynsk0, ynsk1, ynsk2, ynsp0, ynsp1, ynsp2, ynsk0c, ynsk1c, &
9101  ynsk2c, yns0, yns1, yns2
9102  ! ********************************************************************
9103  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
9104  common /qmoyen/qmoy
9105  common /rigid/boro
9106  common /beamsa/fs(7, iptsz)
9107  common /cdek/dwp(iptsz)
9108  common /sc3/beamc, scdist, sce10, cplm, ect, apl, ichaes, iscsp
9109  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
9110  common /dyn/tref, vref
9111  common /tapes/in, ifile, meta
9112  common /etcom/cog(8), exten(17), fd(iptsz)
9113  common /speda/dave, idave
9114  common /shif/dtiph, shift
9115  common /davcom/dav1(maxcell1, 40), davtot, iitem(maxcell1), idav
9116  common /etcha1/dav2(maxcell1, 33), ichas(iptsz), chasit
9117  common /dcspa/iesp
9118  common /fene/wdisp, wphas, wx, wy, rlim, ifw
9119  common /appel/irstay, ilost, iavp, ispcel
9120  common /posc/xpsc
9121  common /pstpla/tstp
9122  common /rander/ialin
9123  common /cgtof/charm(20), cgtdv(20), nbch(20), netac
9124  logical iesp, ichaes, irstay, iavp, ispcel, ialin
9125  logical shift, chasit, itvol, imamin, dave
9126  ! ***** DWRFS(MeV): gain of energy of the fictitious reference
9127  ! ***** SPHRFS(rad): phase jump
9128  ! ***** PHRFS(rad): phase
9129  ! ***** NGDRF: position of the reference in the array f(10,iptsz)
9130  ! **** common/parmrf/DWRFS,SPHRFS,PHRFS,ngdrf
9131  ! CHARACTER*1 CHOPT
9132  fh0 = fh/vl
9133  ! iesp is used in s.c. routines : iesp=.false. == > accel. element
9134  iesp = .false.
9135  iavp = .true.
9136  ipas = 2
9137  dcum = ylg
9138  ! random errors in alignment
9139  if (ialin) call randali
9140  ! Random variation on the phase for each particle
9141  varpha = 0.
9142  ! INTEGRALS REQUIRED BY THE EXPANSIONS IN LONGITUDINAL MOTION (ALL THE
9143  ! ELEMENT)
9144  ! ( computations of the average k and slip of phase from which are
9145  ! computed deltk delphi,..)
9146  ! * valero 08/08/07
9147  aqmoy = abs(qst)
9148  ! omment aqmoy=qst
9149  ! *
9150  call xtypl1(gamref, saphi, aqmoy, dcum)
9151  ! see here equations 88 and 106 of Part. Acc. 1994 vol44 pp215-255
9152  cxlg = aqmoy/(4.*xmat*eqvl)
9153  gami = gamref
9154  dkmp = (gami*gami-1.)**(1.5)*(gams*gams-1.)**(-1.5)
9155  dkms = dkmp*(1.+asdl/eqvl) + yh1k01*fh0*cxlg/eqvl - asdl/eqvl
9156  dkm1 = -gaks*(gams*gams-1.)**(-1.5)*fh0*(1.+asdl/eqvl)
9157  ! DKMSKE :(eq.106, see article of Part.Acc.)
9158  dkmske = dkms/(1.-yh1k1*cxlg*fh0/eqvl-dkm1)
9159  call xtypl2(gamref, saphi, aqmoy, dcum)
9160  call xtyplp1(gamref, saphi, aqmoy, dcum)
9161  call xtylpk(gamref, saphi, aqmoy, dcum)
9162  dphsph1 = (yh1p1-yh21)*cxlg*fh0
9163  dkmsphi = -fh0*(gams*gams-1.)**(-1.5)*gaps*(1.+asdl/eqvl) + &
9164  dphsph1/eqvl
9165  ! These integrals are saved
9166  gakst = gaks
9167  gapst = gaps
9168  ! functions in COS(DXDPT)
9169  yh11t = yh11
9170  yh1k1t = yh1k1
9171  yh1k01t = yh1k01
9172  yh10pkt = yh10pk
9173  yh11pkt = yh11pk
9174  yh1p1t = yh1p1
9175  h1akit = h1aki
9176  h1akimt = h1akim
9177  h1akmt = h1akm
9178  hapit = hapi
9179  happit = happi
9180  ! functions in SIN(DXDPT)
9181  yh21t = yh21
9182  yh2k1t = yh2k1
9183  yh2k01t = yh2k01
9184  yh2p1t = yh2p1
9185  yh20pkt = yh20pk
9186  yh21pkt = yh21pk
9187  h1bkit = h1bki
9188  h1bkimt = h1bkim
9189  h1bkmt = h1bkm
9190  hbpit = hbpi
9191  hbppit = hbppi
9192  if (ichaes .and. ispcel) then
9193  ipas = 1
9194  write (16, *) ' SPACE CHARGE ACTING ON LENGTH: ', scdist, ' CM'
9195  dcum = ylg*xpsc
9196  write (16, *) ' POSITION OF S.C. COMPUTATION: ', dcum, ' CM'
9197  ! computation of the integrals in the middle of the cavity
9198  ! INTEGRALS E(z)*(BG)**-3 *z**n n=0,1
9199  ! INTEGRALS dE(z)/dt*(BG)**-3 *z**n n=0,1,2
9200  call xtypl1(gamref, saphi, aqmoy, dcum)
9201  istm = ist - 1
9202  ! INTEGRALS ON SECOND DERIVATIVES k HA0(Z) & HB0(Z)
9203  call xtypl2(gamref, saphi, aqmoy, dcum)
9204  ! 1st,2nd,3rd DERIVATIVES ON PHASE,HA0(Z) & HB0(Z)
9205  call xtyplp1(gamref, saphi, aqmoy, dcum)
9206  ! DERIVATIVES COUPLED ON PHASE, K FUNCTIONS HA0(Z) & HB0(Z)
9207  call xtylpk(gamref, saphi, aqmoy, dcum)
9208  ! TRANSVERSE INTEGRALS TYPE J & M
9209  call xtypj(gamref, saphi, aqmoy, dcum)
9210  call xtypm(gamref, saphi, aqmoy, dcum)
9211  end if
9212 1026 continue
9213  if (ipas==2) then
9214  dcum = ylg
9215  gaks = gakst
9216  gaps = gapst
9217  ! --- COS(DXDPT)
9218  yh11 = yh11t
9219  yh1k1 = yh1k1t
9220  yh1k01 = yh1k01t
9221  yh10pk = yh10pkt
9222  yh11pk = yh11pkt
9223  yh1p1 = yh1p1t
9224  h1aki = h1akit
9225  h1akim = h1akimt
9226  h1akm = h1akmt
9227  hapi = hapit
9228  happi = happit
9229  ! --- SIN(DXDPT)
9230  yh21 = yh21t
9231  yh2k1 = yh2k1t
9232  yh2k01 = yh2k01t
9233  yh2p1 = yh2p1t
9234  yh20pk = yh20pkt
9235  yh21pk = yh21pkt
9236  h1bki = h1bkit
9237  h1bkim = h1bkimt
9238  h1bkm = h1bkmt
9239  hbpi = hbpit
9240  hbppi = hbppit
9241  call xtypl1(gamref, saphi, aqmoy, dcum)
9242  ! INTEGRALS ON SECOND DERIVATIVES k HA0(Z) & HB0(Z)
9243  call xtypl2(gamref, saphi, aqmoy, dcum)
9244  ! 1st,2nd,3rd DERIVATIVES ON PHASE,HA0(Z) & HB0(Z)
9245  call xtyplp1(gamref, saphi, aqmoy, dcum)
9246  ! DERIVATIVES COUPLED ON PHASE, K FUNCTIONS HA0(Z) & HB0(Z)
9247  call xtylpk(gamref, saphi, aqmoy, dcum)
9248  ! TRANSVERSE INTEGRALS TYPE J & M
9249  call xtypj(gamref, saphi, aqmoy, dcum)
9250  call xtypm(gamref, saphi, aqmoy, dcum)
9251  end if
9252  sa11 = 1.
9253  sa12 = 0.
9254  sa21 = 0.
9255  sa22 = 1.
9256  sact11 = 1.
9257  sact12 = 0.
9258  sact21 = 0.
9259  sact22 = 1.
9260  ! SAVE BEAM
9261  do is = 1, ngood
9262  do js = 1, 7
9263  fs(js, is) = f(js, is)
9264  end do
9265  end do
9266  ! 1055 CONTINUE
9267  call boucle(ipas, gamref, saphi, dcum, delphr)
9268  ! Reshuffles f(i,j) array after boucle
9269  call shuffle
9270  if (ipas==1) then
9271  ! compute the space charge on the beam (except the reference)
9272  ! call stapl at the position of space charge computation
9273  ! *et*26-Jul-2014 call stapl(tstp)
9274  if (iscsp==1) then
9275  ini = 1
9276  call hersc(ini)
9277  ini = 2
9278  call hersc(ini)
9279  end if
9280  if (iscsp==2) call schermi
9281  if (iscsp==3) call scheff1(1)
9282  ! ----- window control
9283  write (16, *) 'Checking for lost particles'
9284  call reject(ilost)
9285  ! Reshuffles f(i,j) array after window (now done in 'reject')
9286  ! call shuffle
9287  ! second step of the gap
9288  ipas = 2
9289  iavp = .false.
9290  go to 1026
9291  ! end of space charge computation
9292  end if
9293  ! charateristics of the beam
9294  ! 18/03/2009 if (dave) then
9295  ! 18/03/2009 gimax=f(7,ngood)/xmat
9296  ! 18/03/2009 bimax=sqrt(1.-1./(gimax*gimax))
9297  ! 18/03/2009 dav1(idav,3)=bimax
9298  ! 18/03/2009 dav1(idav,4)=f(7,ngood)-xmat
9299  ! 18/03/2009 dav1(idav,5)=-(INT(f(6,ngood)*FH/PI+0.5)-
9300  ! 18/03/2009 * f(6,ngood)*FH/PI)*180.
9301  ! 18/03/2009 dav1(idav,38)=dphase*180./pi
9302  ! 18/03/2009 endif
9303  ! ---- WINDOW CONTROL
9304  call reject(ilost)
9305  ! Reshuffles f(i,j) array after window (now done in 'reject')
9306  ! call shuffle
9307  return
9308  end subroutine gap
9310  subroutine cogetc
9311  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
9312  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
9313  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
9314  common /cgtof/charm(20), cgtdv(20), nbch(20), netac
9315 
9316  itot = 0
9317  n = 1
9318  do i = 1, 20
9319  nbch(i) = 0
9320  end do
9321  charm(n) = f(9, 1)
9322 100 continue
9323  do i = 1, ngood
9324  if (f(9,i)==charm(n)) nbch(n) = nbch(n) + 1
9325  end do
9326  ! the following charge states
9327  itot = itot + nbch(n)
9328  if (itot>=ngood) go to 110
9329  do i = 1, ngood
9330  do j = 1, n
9331  if (f(9,i)==charm(j)) go to 120
9332  end do
9333  if (f(9,i)/=charm(n)) then
9334  n = n + 1
9335  charm(n) = f(9, i)
9336  go to 100
9337  end if
9338 120 continue
9339  end do
9340 110 continue
9341  ! compute the cog of TOF for each charge state
9342  do i = 1, n
9343  cgtdv(i) = 0.
9344  do j = 1, ngood
9345  if (f(9,j)==charm(i)) cgtdv(i) = cgtdv(i) + f(6, j)
9346  end do
9347  cgtdv(i) = cgtdv(i)/float(nbch(i))
9348  ! write(16,*)'i,nch,cgtdv=',i,nbch(i),cgtdv(i),charm(i)
9349  end do
9350  netac = n
9351  return
9352  end subroutine cogetc
9358  subroutine boucle(ipas, gamref, saphi, dcum, delphr)
9359  use randlux
9360  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
9361  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
9362  common /posi/ist
9363  common /midgap/enmil, vapmi
9364  common /azmtch/dlg, xmcph, xmce
9365  common /azlist/icont, iprin
9366  common /itvole/itvol, imamin
9367  common /iter1/dxdki, dphii, phi, dkmske, dkmsphi, retph, xkmi, xkm, &
9368  dxk00, tke, t1ke, ske, s1ke, phiwc, xk1i, xk1ii, xk2ii
9369  common /tranrs/sa11, sa12, sa21, sa22, sact11, sact12, sact21, sact22
9370  common /func/a(200), ylg, atte, ncel, nharm
9371  common /blvl/bflvl
9372  ! TRANSIT TIME COEFFICIENTS
9373  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
9374  common /ttfcb/t3k, t4k, s3k, s4k
9375  common /bedycp/phslip, eqvl, asdl, peqvl, pavph, xkp1, xkp2, aa, bb, &
9376  cc, dd, ee, pcrest, sqcttf
9377  common /jacob/gaks, gaps
9378  common /typl1/yh1k0, yh1k1, yp1k1, yp1k2, yh1k00, yh1k01, yp1k01, &
9379  yp1k02, yh10, yh11, yp11, yp12
9380  common /typl2/yh2k0, yh2k1, yp2k1, yp2k2, yh2k00, yh2k01, yp2k01, &
9381  yp2k02, yh20, yh21, yp21, yp22
9382  common /typi1/ye1k0, ye1k1, ye1k2, ye1kc0, ye1kc1, ye1kc2, ye10, ye11, &
9383  ye12
9384  common /typi2/ye2k0, ye2k1, ye2k2, ye2kc0, ye2kc1, ye2kc2, ye20, ye21, &
9385  ye22
9386  common /thad2/h0aki, h0akim, h0akm, h0bki, h0bkim, h0bkm, h1aki, &
9387  h1akim, h1akm, h1bki, h1bkim, h1bkm
9388  ! --- routine XTYPLP1
9389  common /typlp1/yh1p1, yh2p1, hapi, hbpi
9390  ! --- routine XTYPL2
9391  common /typlp2/happi, hbppi
9392  ! --- routine XTYLPK
9393  common /typlpk/yh10pk, yh11pk, yh20pk, yh21pk
9394  ! integrals of E(z)**2
9395  ! --- routine XTYPJ
9396  common /typj/yfsk0, yfsk1, yfsk2, yfsp0, yfsp1, yfsp2, yfskc0, yfskc1, &
9397  yfskc2, yfsck0, yfsck1, yfsck2, yfscp0, yfscp1, yfscp2, yfs0, &
9398  yfs1, yfs2
9399  ! E(z)**2 INTEGRALS (COMPLEMENTARY ELECTRIC FIELD)
9400  ! --- routine XTYPM
9401  common /typm/ynsk0, ynsk1, ynsk2, ynsp0, ynsp1, ynsp2, ynsk0c, ynsk1c, &
9402  ynsk2c, yns0, yns1, yns2
9403  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
9404  common /beamsa/fs(7, iptsz)
9405  common /cdek/dwp(iptsz)
9406  common /sc3/beamc, scdist, sce10, cplm, ect, apl, ichaes, iscsp
9407  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
9408  common /dyn/tref, vref
9409  common /fene/wdisp, wphas, wx, wy, rlim, ifw
9410  common /tapes/in, ifile, meta
9411  common /dcspa/iesp
9412  common /tcav/sv1p(iptsz), sv2p(iptsz), sxv1p(iptsz), sxv2p(iptsz), &
9413  dwcis(iptsz), beini1(iptsz), phip(iptsz), teglp(iptsz), &
9414  dxdpip(iptsz), dxdkip(iptsz), dxdptp(iptsz), dxk00p(iptsz), &
9415  dphiip(iptsz), sauphcs(iptsz)
9416  common /iterco/yh11t, yh1k1t, yh1k01t, yh10pkt, yh11pkt, yh1p1t, &
9417  h1akit, h1akimt, h1akmt, hapit, happit
9418  common /itersi/yh21t, yh2k1t, yh2k01t, yh2p1t, yh20pkt, yh21pkt, &
9419  h1bkit, h1bkimt, h1bkmt, hbpit, hbppit
9420  common /appel/irstay, ilost, iavp, ispcel
9421  common /etcom/cog(8), exten(17), fd(iptsz)
9422  common /cgtof/charm(20), cgtdv(20), nbch(20), netac
9423  common /tofev/ttvols
9424  common /aerp/vphase, vfield, ierpf
9425  ! ***** DWRFS(MeV): gain of energy of the fictitious reference
9426  ! ***** SPHRFS(rad):phase jump
9427  ! ***** PHRFS(rad):phase
9428  ! ***** NGDRF: position of the reference in the array f(10,iptsz)
9429  ! ***** common/parmrf/DWRFS,SPHRFS,PHRFS,ngdrf
9430  logical itvol, imamin, ispcel
9431  logical iesp, iavp, ichaes, irstay
9432  dimension vecx(1)
9433  ! CHARACTER*1 CHOPT
9434  ttvol = ttvols*fh
9435  fh0 = fh/vl
9436  beref = sqrt(1.-1./(gamref*gamref))
9437  call cogetc
9438  tcog = 0.
9439  gcog = 0.
9440  do i = 1, ngood
9441  gcog = gcog + f(7, i)/xmat
9442  tcog = tcog + f(6, i)
9443  end do
9444  tcog = tcog/float(ngood)
9445  gcog = gcog/float(ngood)
9446  bcog = sqrt(1.-1./(gcog*gcog))
9447  wcg = (gcog-1.)*xmat
9448  ! ----- convert wdisp in dp/p (window control)
9449  ! ---- ifw = 0 ===> wdisp = dW/W
9450  ! ---- ifw = 1 ===> wdisp = dW (MeV)
9451  ! ----- convert wdisp in dp/p
9452  if (ifw==0) dispr = gcog*gcog*wdisp/(gcog*(gcog+1.))
9453  if (ifw==1) dispr = gcog*gcog*wdisp/(gcog*(gcog+1.)*wcg)
9454  do i = 1, ngood
9455  if (i==icont) then
9456  write (16, *) '******************************************'
9457  write (16, *) '*** FOLLOWED PARTICLE NUMBER: ', i
9458  if (ipas==1) write (16, *) ' AT SPACE CHARGE POSITION'
9459  if (ipas==2) write (16, *) ' AT OUTPUT '
9460  write (16, *) '******************************************'
9461  end if
9462  if (iavp) then
9463  gini = f(7, i)/xmat
9464  beini = sqrt(1.-1./(gini*gini))
9465  fd(i) = (gini*beini)/(gcog*bcog)
9466  f6i = 0.
9467  do istc = 1, netac
9468  if (f(9,i)==charm(istc)) f6i = f(6, i) - cgtdv(istc)
9469  end do
9470  ! LONGITUDINAL WINDOW CONTROL
9471  if (fh*abs(f6i)>=wphas) f(8, i) = 0.
9472  if (abs(fd(i)-1.)>=dispr) f(8, i) = 0.
9473  ! TRANSVERSE WINDOW CONTROL
9474  radiu = sqrt(f(2,i)*f(2,i)+f(4,i)*f(4,i))
9475  if (radiu>=rlim) f(8, i) = 0.
9476  if (abs(f(2,i))>wx) f(8, i) = 0.
9477  if (abs(f(4,i))>wy) f(8, i) = 0.
9478  if (f(8,i)==0) then
9479  write (16, 3928) i, int(f(1,i)), f(2, i), f(3, i), &
9480  f(4, i), f(5, i), f6i*fh*180./pi, f(7, i) - xmat, &
9481  int(f(9,i))
9482 3928 format (' # ', i5, 1x, i5, 1x, 6(f10.2,1x), 1x, i2)
9483  ilost = ilost + 1
9484  if (ilost>=ngood) stop
9485  go to 19
9486  end if
9487  ! COMPUTATION OF AVERAGE K AND JUMP OF PHASE FOR THE CELL
9488  ! START IF BLOCK on ICONT
9489  if (i==icont) then
9490  write (16, 558) f(2, i), f(3, i), f(4, i), f(5, i)
9491 558 format (1x, '* INPUT OF THE ELEMENT: ', /, 1x, '* X :', &
9492  e12.5, ' CM XP :', e12.5, ' MRD', /, 1x, '* Y :', &
9493  e12.5, ' CM YP: ', e12.5, ' MRD', /, 1x, '*')
9494  f6dg = fh*f(6, i)*180./pi
9495  write (16, *) ' Tof(deg): ', f6dg, ' ENER(MeV) ', &
9496  f(7, i) - xmat
9497  end if
9498  radiu = sqrt(f(2,i)*f(2,i)+f(4,i)*f(4,i))
9499  if (radiu<1.e-06) then
9500  dradiu = .001*sqrt(f(3,i)*f(3,i)+f(5,i)*f(5,i))
9501  else
9502  dradiu = f(3, i)*.001*f(2, i)/radiu + &
9503  f(4, i)*f(5, i)*.001/radiu
9504  end if
9505  ! 335 CONTINUE
9506  ! --- retph: phase delay between the actual particle and the
9507  ! reference
9508  retph = fh*(f(6,i)-tref)
9509  ! --- systematic or random defaults on the phase RF (not for
9510  ! the reference)
9511  if (ierpf/=0) then
9512  vphasi = vphase*pi/180.
9513  ! --- systematic default on the phase offset
9514  if (ierpf==1) retph = retph + vphasi
9515  ! --- random error on phase offset
9516  if (ierpf>1) then
9517  len = 1
9518  call rlux(vecx, len)
9519  r1 = (2.*vecx(1)-1.)*vphasi
9520  retph = retph + r1
9521  end if
9522  end if
9523  phi = saphi + retph
9524  if (i==icont) write (16, *) &
9525  '* PHASE DELAY RELATIVE TO REFERENCE ', retph*180./pi, &
9526  ' DEG'
9527  ! --- the TTF are the ones of the reference particle based on
9528  ! the charge state qst (input)
9529  ! --- They are corrected in order to take into account the
9530  ! charge state of the current particle
9531  ! **** cort=-(1.-(qst/f(9,i)))
9532  cort = 0.
9533  tkc = tk*cort + tk
9534  t1kc = t1k*cort + t1k
9535  t2kc = t2k*cort + t2k
9536  t3kc = t3k*cort + t3k
9537  t4kc = t4k*cort + t4k
9538  skc = sk*cort + sk
9539  s1kc = s1k*cort + s1k
9540  s2kc = s2k*cort + s2k
9541  s3kc = s3k*cort + s3k
9542  s4kc = s4k*cort + s4k
9543  ! cort1=qst/f(9,i)
9544  cort1 = 1.
9545  ! ************************************
9546  ! Predictor
9547  phase = phi
9548  ! DXKI0 : difference of energy betwen the reference and the
9549  ! actual particle
9550  dxki0 = fh0*(1./beini-1./beref)
9551  dxdte = dxki0
9552  tke = tkc + dxdte*t1kc + dxdte*dxdte*t2kc/2. + &
9553  dxdte**3*t3kc/6. + dxdte**4*t4kc/24.
9554  ske = skc + dxdte*s1kc + dxdte*dxdte*s2kc/2. + &
9555  dxdte**3*s3kc/6. + dxdte**4*s4kc/24.
9556  ! TEST*******
9557  ! cc TKE=TKC
9558  ! cc SKE=SKC
9559  ! ******************************************
9560  ! --- systematic or random defaults on the field level (not
9561  ! for the reference)
9562  if (ierpf/=0) then
9563  if (ierpf==1) then
9564  tke = tke*(1.+vfield)
9565  ske = ske*(1.+vfield)
9566  end if
9567  if (ierpf>1) then
9568  len = 1
9569  call rlux(vecx, len)
9570  r1 = (2.*vecx(1)-1.)*vfield
9571  tke = tke*(1.+r1)
9572  ske = ske*(1.+r1)
9573  end if
9574  end if
9575  phiwc = phi + pavph
9576  ! TEST***********
9577  ! ccc PHIWC=PHI
9578  ! *****************************************************
9579  ddwp = abs(f(9,i))*(tke*cos(phiwc)-ske*sin(phiwc))
9580  enpmt = f(7, i) + ddwp
9581  gamps = enpmt/xmat
9582  if (gamps<=1.) f(8, i) = 0.
9583  if (f(8,i)==0.) then
9584  ilost = ilost + 1
9585  if (ilost>=ngood) stop
9586  go to 19
9587  end if
9588  betps = sqrt(1.-1./(gamps*gamps))
9589  xk1ii = fh0/beini
9590  xk2ii = fh0/betps
9591  xkmi = xk2ii + (xk2ii-xk1ii)*asdl/eqvl + delphr/eqvl
9592  xk1i = xk1ii - xkmi
9593  xk2i = xk2ii - xkmi
9594  bempy = fh0/xkmi
9595  sauphc = delphr
9596  dxdki = xkmi - xkm
9597  dphii = (xk1ii-xk2ii)*eqvl/10. + (xkp1+xkp2)/120.*eqvl**2 + &
9598  xk1i*asdl
9599  do ijk = 1, 3
9600  ! --- boucle IJK to improve TTF
9601  tke = tkc + dxdki*t1kc + dxdki*dxdki*t2kc/2. + &
9602  dxdki**3*t3kc/6. + dxdki**4*t4kc/24.
9603  t1ke = t1kc + dxdki*t2kc + dxdki*dxdki*t3kc/2. + &
9604  dxdki**3*t4kc/6.
9605  ske = skc + dxdki*s1kc + dxdki*dxdki*s2kc/2. + &
9606  dxdki**3*s3kc/6. + dxdki**4*s4kc/24.
9607  s1ke = s1kc + dxdki*s2kc + dxdki*dxdki*s3kc/2. + &
9608  dxdki**3*s4kc/6.
9609  ! TEST*********
9610  ! cc TKE=TKC
9611  ! cc T1KE=T1KC
9612  ! cc SKE=SKC
9613  ! cc S1KE=S1KC
9614  ! ********************************************************
9615  !**
9616  ! --- systematic or random defaults on the field level
9617  ! (not for the reference)
9618  if (ierpf==1) then
9619  tke = tke*(1.+vfield)
9620  ske = ske*(1.+vfield)
9621  t1ke = t1ke*(1.+vfield)
9622  s1ke = s1ke*(1.+vfield)
9623  end if
9624  if (ierpf>1) then
9625  len = 1
9626  call rlux(vecx, len)
9627  r1 = (2.*vecx(1)-1.)*vfield
9628  tke = tke*(1.+r1)
9629  ske = ske*(1.+r1)
9630  t1ke = t1ke*(1.+r1)
9631  s1ke = s1ke*(1.+r1)
9632  end if
9633  pcresi = 0.
9634  dphci0 = 0.
9635  ! if(f(9,i).ne.qst) then
9636  ! --- new crest phase is PCRESI
9637  ! cc PCRESI=ATAN(-SKE/TKE)
9638  ! cc
9639  ! DDWC=abs(f(9,i))*(TKE*COS(PCRESI)-SKE*SIN(PCRESI))
9640  ! cc IF(DDWC.LT.0.) PCRESI=PCRESI+PI
9641  ! --- DPHCI0 is the difference between the previous crest
9642  ! phase and the present one
9643  ! cc DPHCI0=PCREST-PCRESI
9644  ! endif
9645  ! **************************************
9646  ! cc PHIWC=PHI+DPHII-DPHCI0
9647  ! TEST********
9648  phiwc = phi + dphii
9649  ! ***********************************
9650  ! **** PHIWC=PHI+DPHII
9651  dwci = abs(f(9,i))*(tke*cos(phiwc)-ske*sin(phiwc))
9652  enrc = f(7, i) + dwci
9653  gacr = enrc/xmat
9654  becr = sqrt(1.-1./(gacr*gacr))
9655  xk2ii = fh0/becr
9656  cxlg = abs(f(9,i))/(4.*xmat*eqvl)
9657  dxdpi = retph - dphci0
9658  ! --- see Part. Acc., 1994, vol 44., pp. 215-255
9659  ! ---- relation 86
9660  dxdpt = dxdpi + dxk00*(1.-dkmske)*asdl - &
9661  dxdpi*dkmsphi*asdl
9662  dxk00 = fh0*(1./beini-1./beref)
9663  xlh11 = (yh11t+dxk00*(dkmske*yh1k1t+yh1k01t))*cos(dxdpt)
9664  xlh11 = xlh11 + dxdpi*yh1p1t*cos(dxdpt)
9665  ! second derivative of Ha0(Z) (division by 2 has been
9666  ! made)
9667  xlh112 = dxk00*dxk00*(h1akit+h1akimt*dkmske+h1akmt*dkmske* &
9668  dkmske)*cos(dxdpt)
9669  xlh112 = xlh112 + dxdpi*dxdpi*hapit*cos(dxdpt)
9670  xlh112 = xlh112 + dxdpi*dxk00*(yh10pkt+dkmske*yh11pkt)*cos &
9671  (dxdpt)
9672  ! third derivative of Ha0(Z)
9673  xlh113 = (dxdpi**3)/3.*happit*cos(dxdpt)
9674  xlh11 = xlh11 + xlh112 + xlh113
9675  ! first derivative of Hb0(Z)
9676  xlh21 = (yh21t+dxk00*(dkmske*yh2k1t+yh2k01t))*sin(dxdpt)
9677  xlh21 = xlh21 + dxdpi*yh2p1t*sin(dxdpt)
9678  ! second derivative of Hb0(Z) (division by 2 has been
9679  ! made)
9680  xlh212 = dxk00*dxk00*(h1bkit+h1bkimt*dkmske+h1bkmt*dkmske &
9681  **2)*sin(dxdpt)
9682  xlh212 = xlh212 + dxdpi*dxdpi*hbpit*sin(dxdpt)
9683  xlh212 = xlh212 + dxdpi*dxk00*(yh20pkt+dkmske*yh21pkt)*sin &
9684  (dxdpt)
9685  ! third derivative of of Hb0(Z)
9686  xlh213 = (dxdpi**3)/3.*hbppit*sin(dxdpt)
9687  xlh21 = xlh21 + xlh212 + xlh213
9688  xlh1i = cxlg*(xlh11-xlh21)
9689  ! --- SAUPHC is the jump of phase
9690  sauphc = fh0*xlh1i
9691  ! --- XKMI: AVERAGE factor k (k = frequency/velovity)
9692  xkmi = xk2ii + sauphc/eqvl + (xk2ii-xk1ii)*asdl/eqvl
9693  bempy = fh0/xkmi
9694  xk1i = xk1ii - xkmi
9695  dxdki = xkmi - xkm
9696  dphii = (xk1ii-xk2ii)*eqvl/10. + &
9697  (xkp1+xkp2)/120.*eqvl**2 + xk1i*asdl
9698  end do
9699  ! TEST**** ENDDO IJK=1,3
9700  ! Compute the shift of phase: PHSLIL
9701  dts = (tke*t1ke+ske*s1ke)/(tke*tke+ske*ske)
9702  tiltal = -4.*atan(dts*3.2/eqvl)
9703  if (tiltal/=0.) then
9704  til2 = tiltal/2.
9705  xlrei = eqvl
9706  do iiii = 1, 4
9707  ftil = 1./tan(til2) - 1./til2 - dts*2./xlrei
9708  dftil = -1./(sin(til2)*sin(til2)) + 1./(til2*til2)
9709  if (dftil/=6.*0.) then
9710  til2 = til2 - ftil/dftil
9711  gx = 1./tan(til2) - 1./til2
9712  xlrei = 2.*dts/gx
9713  end if
9714  end do
9715  tiltal = til2*2.
9716  end if
9717  phslil = tiltal
9718  tegl1 = phslil*phslil/(sin(phslil/2.)*sin(phslil/2.))
9719  tegl2 = (tke*tke+ske*ske)
9720  tegl = tegl1*tegl2/(eqvl*32.)
9721  tegl = tegl/eqvl
9722  ! --- Transverse motion (field E(z)**2)
9723  phitti = phiwc + xk1i*asdl - phslip/2.
9724  phitsi = phiwc + xk2i*asdl + phslip/2.
9725  cetf1 = f(9, i)*f(9, i)/(16.*xmat*xmat*eqvl*eqvl)
9726  ! TESTsv ***************************
9727  ! OLD**** CETF1=CETF1*cort1*cort1
9728  ! **************************
9729  cfv1 = (gini*gini+2.)/((gini*gini-1.)**2)
9730  cfv2 = (gacr*gacr+2.)/((gacr*gacr-1.)**2)
9731  sv1 = cfv1*(tke*cos(phitti)-ske*sin(phitti))**2
9732  sv1 = cetf1*sv1*(phslil/sin(phslil/2.))**2
9733  sv2 = cfv2*(tke*cos(phitsi)-ske*sin(phitsi))**2
9734  sv2 = cetf1*sv2*(phslil/sin(phslil/2.))**2
9735  ! Transverse motion (field dE(z)/dt)
9736  ceti = fh0*abs(f(9,i))/(4.*xmat*eqvl)
9737  ! TESTsv ***************************
9738  ! OLD**** CETI=CETI*cort1
9739  ! **************************
9740  cxv1 = (gini*gini-1.)**1.5
9741  cxv2 = (gacr*gacr-1.)**1.5
9742  sxv1 = (tke*sin(phitti)+ske*cos(phitti))*phslil/sin(phslil/2.)
9743  sxv1 = -ceti*sxv1/cxv1
9744  sxv2 = (tke*sin(phitsi)+ske*cos(phitsi))*phslil/sin(phslil/2.)
9745  sxv2 = -ceti*sxv2/cxv2
9746  ! --- save all parameters
9747  sv1p(i) = sv1
9748  sv2p(i) = sv2
9749  sxv1p(i) = sxv1
9750  sxv2p(i) = sxv2
9751  dwcis(i) = dwci
9752  sauphcs(i) = sauphc
9753  beini1(i) = beini
9754  phip(i) = phi
9755  teglp(i) = tegl
9756  dxdpip(i) = dxdpi
9757  dxdkip(i) = dxdki
9758  dxdptp(i) = dxdpt
9759  dxk00p(i) = dxk00
9760  dphiip(i) = dphii
9761  ! END IF BLOCK on APV
9762  end if
9763  ! --- ipas = 2: the dynamics is computed over all the element
9764  if (ipas==2) then
9765  ! Recover all previous parameters
9766  sauphc = sauphcs(i)
9767  xlh1i = sauphc/fh0
9768  dwci = dwcis(i)
9769  sv1 = sv1p(i)
9770  sv2 = sv2p(i)
9771  sxv1 = sxv1p(i)
9772  sxv2 = sxv2p(i)
9773  beini = beini1(i)
9774  gini = 1./sqrt(1.-beini*beini)
9775  phi = phip(i)
9776  tegl = teglp(i)
9777  dxdpi = dxdpip(i)
9778  dxdki = dxdkip(i)
9779  dxdpt = dxdptp(i)
9780  dxk00 = dxk00p(i)
9781  dphii = dphiip(i)
9782  go to 5678
9783  end if
9784  ! compute the jump of phase at position of space charge
9785  ! computation
9786  cxlg = abs(f(9,i))/(4.*xmat*eqvl)
9787  ! FUNCTION Ha0(Z)
9788  xlh11 = (yh11+dxk00*(dkmske*yh1k1+yh1k01))*cos(dxdpt)
9789  xlh11 = xlh11 + dxdpi*yh1p1*cos(dxdpt)
9790  ! SECOND DERIVATIVES OF Ha0(Z) (division by 2 has been made)
9791  xlh112 = dxk00*dxk00*(h1aki+h1akim*dkmske+h1akm*dkmske*dkmske)* &
9792  cos(dxdpt)
9793  xlh112 = xlh112 + dxdpi*dxdpi*hapi*cos(dxdpt)
9794  xlh112 = xlh112 + dxdpi*dxk00*(yh10pk+dkmske*yh11pk)*cos(dxdpt)
9795  ! THIRD DERIVATIVE of Ha0(Z)
9796  xlh113 = (dxdpi**3)/3.*happi*cos(dxdpt)
9797  xlh11 = xlh11 + xlh112 + xlh113
9798  ! FUNCTION Hb0(Z)
9799  xlh21 = (yh21+dxk00*(dkmske*yh2k1+yh2k01))*sin(dxdpt)
9800  xlh21 = xlh21 + dxdpi*yh2p1*sin(dxdpt)
9801  ! SECOND DERIVATIVE OF Hb0(Z) (division by 2 has been made)
9802  xlh212 = dxk00*dxk00*(h1bki+h1bkim*dkmske+h1bkm*dkmske**2)* &
9803  sin(dxdpt)
9804  xlh212 = xlh212 + dxdpi*dxdpi*hbpi*sin(dxdpt)
9805  xlh212 = xlh212 + dxdpi*dxk00*(yh20pk+dkmske*yh21pk)*sin(dxdpt)
9806  ! THIRD DERIVATIVE OF Hb0(Z)
9807  xlh213 = (dxdpi**3)/3.*hbppi*sin(dxdpt)
9808  xlh21 = xlh21 + xlh212 + xlh213
9809  xlh1i = cxlg*(xlh11-xlh21)
9810  sauphc = fh0*xlh1i
9811 5678 continue
9812  cxlg = abs(f(9,i))/(4.*xmat*eqvl)
9813  xlh01 = (yh10+dxdki*yh1k0+dxk00*yh1k00)*cos(dxdpt)
9814  xlh02 = (yh20+dxdki*yh2k0+dxk00*yh2k00)*sin(dxdpt)
9815  xlh0i = cxlg*(xlh01-xlh02)
9816  ! -- COUPLING INTEGRALS
9817  xlp11 = (yp11+dxdki*yp1k1+dxk00*yp1k01)*cos(dxdpt)
9818  xlp21 = (yp21+dxdki*yp2k1+dxk00*yp2k01)*sin(dxdpt)
9819  xlp1i = cxlg*(xlp11-xlp21)
9820  xlp12 = (yp12+dxdki*yp1k2+dxk00*yp1k02)*cos(dxdpt)
9821  xlp22 = (yp22+dxdki*yp2k2+dxk00*yp2k02)*sin(dxdpt)
9822  xlp2i = cxlg*(xlp12-xlp22)
9823  radiu = sqrt(f(2,i)*f(2,i)+f(4,i)*f(4,i))
9824  if (radiu<1.e-06) then
9825  dradiu = .001*sqrt(f(3,i)*f(3,i)+f(5,i)*f(5,i))
9826  else
9827  dradiu = f(3, i)*.001*f(2, i)/radiu + &
9828  f(4, i)*f(5, i)*.001/radiu
9829  end if
9830  rp = radiu
9831  rpp = dradiu
9832  ! Picht coordinates
9833  rrp = rp*sqrt(beini*gini)
9834  rrpp = rpp*sqrt(beini*gini)
9835  ! --- ipas = 1: the dynamics is computed until the position of
9836  ! space charge computation
9837  ! gain of energy at the position of space charge computation (not
9838  ! for the reference)
9839  if (ipas==1) then
9840  ! ***** PHIWC=PHI+DPHII-DPHCI0
9841  phiwc = phi + dphii
9842  ! istm: flag ==> the energy is compute at the position of
9843  ! space charge computation
9844  istm = ist - 1
9845  gacr = gamci(phiwc, pcresi, gini, istm, abs(f(9,i)))
9846  dwci = (gacr-gini)*xmat
9847  end if
9848  dwpi = dwci + xmat*fh0*fh0*rrp*rrp/4.*xlh0i + &
9849  xmat*rrp*rrpp*fh0*fh0/2.*xlh1i
9850  ! PHASE JUMP
9851  delphi = sauphc + fh0**3*rrp*rrp/4.*xlp1i + &
9852  fh0**3*rrp*rrpp/2.*xlp2i
9853  if (ipas==2) then
9854  ! kicks of energy from space charge effects are in dwp(i)
9855  if (ichaes) then
9856  f(7, i) = f(7, i) + dwpi + dwp(i)
9857  gamsor = f(7, i)/xmat
9858  if (gamsor<=1.) f(8, i) = 0.
9859  ! particle is lost
9860  if (f(8,i)==0.) go to 19
9861  besor = sqrt(1.-1./(gamsor*gamsor))
9862  ! phase jump resulting from space charge
9863  delgam = dwp(i)/xmat
9864  gamkk0 = f(7, i)/xmat
9865  bekk0 = sqrt(1.-1./(gamkk0*gamkk0))
9866  dbek21 = delgam/(bekk0**3*gamkk0**3)
9867  delsc = fh0*scdist*dbek21/2.
9868  delphi = delphi + delsc
9869  ditemp = ylg/(besor*vl) + delphi/fh
9870  f(6, i) = fs(6, i) + ditemp
9871  else
9872  f(7, i) = f(7, i) + dwpi
9873  gamsor = f(7, i)/xmat
9874  if (gamsor<=1.) f(8, i) = 0.
9875  ! particle is lost
9876  if (f(8,i)==0.) then
9877  f6i = f(6, i) - tcog
9878  write (16, 3928) i, int(f(1,i)), f(2, i), f(3, i), &
9879  f(4, i), f(5, i), f6i*fh*180./pi, f(7, i) - xmat, &
9880  int(f(9,i))
9881  if (ilost>=ngood) stop
9882  ilost = ilost + 1
9883  go to 19
9884  end if
9885  besor = sqrt(1.-1./(gamsor*gamsor))
9886  ditemp = ylg/(besor*vl) + delphi/fh
9887  f(6, i) = f(6, i) + ditemp
9888  end if
9889  end if
9890  if (ipas==1) then
9891  f(7, i) = f(7, i) + dwpi
9892  gamsor = f(7, i)/xmat
9893  if (gamsor<=1.) f(8, i) = 0.
9894  if (f(8,i)==0.) then
9895  write (16, 3928) i, int(f(1,i)), f(2, i), f(3, i), &
9896  f(4, i), f(5, i), f(6, i)*fh*180./pi, f(7, i) - xmat, &
9897  int(f(9,i))
9898  if (ilost>=ngood) stop
9899  ilost = ilost + 1
9900  go to 19
9901  end if
9902  besor = sqrt(1.-1./(gamsor*gamsor))
9903  ! TEST******
9904  ! DITEMP=YLG/(BESOR*VL)+DELPHI/FH
9905  ditemp = ylg/(2.*besor*vl) + delphi/fh
9906  ! 2014-Aug-08 DITEMP=ylg/(BESOR*VL)+DELPHI/FH
9907  ! cc DITEMP=(2.*XK1II*ASDL+XKMI*(EQVL-ASDL)+
9908  ! cc x XK2II*(YLG-(EQVL+ASDL)))/FH+DELPHI/FH
9909  ! ****************************
9910  f(6, i) = f(6, i) + ditemp
9911  end if
9912  if (i==icont) then
9913  if (ipas==2) then
9914  write (16, *) '* DYNAMICS AT THE OUTPUT :'
9915  write (16, 994) delphi*180./pi, delsc*180./pi, dwp(i)
9916 994 format (1x, '* PHASE JUMP ', e12.5, &
9917  ' DEG CORRECTED BY :', e12.5, ' DEG ', &
9918  ' SC KICK(MEV) ', e12.5)
9919  enrprin = f(7, i) - xmat
9920  write (16, 88) dwpi, enrprin, besor, f(9, i), ditemp
9921 88 format (1x, '* ENERGY GAIN : ', e14.7, ' MEV', &
9922  ' ENERGY :', e14.7, ' MEV', /, 1x, '* BETA :', &
9923  e12.5, /, 1x, '* CHARGE :', f5.0, ' TRANSIT TIME :', &
9924  e12.5, ' SEC', /, 1x, '*')
9925  write (16, *) 'TK TKE ', tk, tke
9926  write (16, *) 'SK SKE ', sk, ske
9927  write (16, *) 'PCREST PCRESI', pcrest, pcresi
9928  end if
9929  if (ipas==1) then
9930  write (16, *) &
9931  '* DYNAMICS AT THE POSITION OF SPACE CHARGE :'
9932  enrprin = f(7, i) - xmat
9933  write (16, 9944) delphi*180./pi, dwpi, enrprin, ditemp
9934 9944 format (1x, '* PHASE JUMP ', e12.5, ' DEG ', &
9935  ' ENERGY GAIN : ', e14.7, ' MeV', ' ENERGY :', e14.7, &
9936  ' MEV', /, ' TRANSIT TIME :', e12.5, ' SEC', /, 1x, &
9937  '*')
9938  end if
9939  end if
9940  amort = sqrt(beini*gini/(besor*gamsor))
9941  ! INTEGRALS OF THE TRANSVERSE MOTION (not computed for the
9942  ! reference)
9943  ! ******************
9944  ! ****** if(i.ne.ngdrf) then
9945  ! ---- integrals of E(Z)**2
9946  ! ---- (G**2+2/(G**2-1)**2)*E(z)**2
9947  cetf = f(9, i)*f(9, i)*sqcttf*sqcttf/(16.*xmat*xmat*eqvl*eqvl)
9948  ! TESTsv ********
9949  ! OLD**** CETF=CETF*cort1*cort1
9950  ! *************************************
9951  xjf0i = yfs0 + dxdki*(yfsk0+yfsck0) + dxdpi*(yfsp0+yfscp0) + &
9952  dxk00*yfskc0
9953  xjf0i = xjf0i*cetf
9954  xjf1i = yfs1 + dxk00*dkmske*(yfsk1+yfsck1) + &
9955  dxdpi*(yfsp1+yfscp1) + dxk00*yfskc1
9956  xjf1i = xjf1i*cetf
9957  xjf2i = yfs2 + dxk00*dkmske*(yfsk2+yfsck2) + &
9958  dxdpi*(yfsp2+yfscp2) + dxk00*yfskc2
9959  xjf2i = xjf2i*cetf
9960  v1 = sv1
9961  v2 = sv2
9962  ! ---- (G**2+2/(G**2-1)**2)
9963  cetm = f(9, i)*f(9, i)*tegl/(xmat*xmat)
9964  ! TESTsv ********
9965  ! OLD**** CETM=CETM*cort1*cort1
9966  ! *************************************
9967  xmn0i = yns0 + dxdki*ynsk0 + dxdpi*ynsp0 + dxk00*ynsk0c
9968  xmn0i = xmn0i*cetm
9969  xmn1i = yns1 + dxk00*dkmske*ynsk1 + dxdpi*ynsp1 + dxk00*ynsk1c
9970  xmn1i = xmn1i*cetm
9971  xmn2i = yns2 + dxk00*dkmske*ynsk2 + dxdpi*ynsp2 + dxk00*ynsk2c
9972  xmn2i = xmn2i*cetm
9973  f0 = xjf0i + xmn0i
9974  f1 = xjf1i + xmn1i
9975  f2 = xjf2i + xmn2i
9976  ! --- 1/(B*G)**3 *dE(z)/dt
9977  ceti = fh0*abs(f(9,i))/(8.*xmat*eqvl)
9978  ! TESTsv ***************************
9979  ! OLD**** CETI=CETI*cort1
9980  ! **************************
9981  xie01 = (ye10+dxdki*ye1k0+dxk00*ye1kc0)*cos(dxdpt)
9982  xie02 = (ye20+dxdki*ye2k0+dxk00*ye2kc0)*sin(dxdpt)
9983  xie0i = -ceti*(xie01+xie02)
9984  xie11 = (ye11+dxdki*ye1k1+dxk00*ye1kc1)*cos(dxdpt)
9985  xie12 = (ye21+dxdki*ye2k1+dxk00*ye2kc1)*sin(dxdpt)
9986  xie1i = -ceti*(xie11+xie12)
9987  xie21 = (ye12+dxdki*ye1k2+dxk00*ye1kc2)*cos(dxdpt)
9988  xie22 = (ye22+dxdki*ye2k2+dxk00*ye2kc2)*sin(dxdpt)
9989  xie2i = -ceti*(xie21+xie22)
9990  xv1 = sxv1
9991  xv2 = sxv2
9992  xi0 = xie0i
9993  xi1 = xie1i
9994  xi2 = xie2i
9995  ! Transport matrix in 'PICHT' coordonates
9996  xq0 = xi0 - f0
9997  xq1 = xi1 - f1
9998  xq2 = xi2 - f2
9999  xq01 = (xq1+asdl*xq0)
10000  xq12 = (xq2+asdl*xq1)
10001  v1 = xv1 - v1
10002  v2 = xv2 - v2
10003  a11 = -xq01*(1.+(v1+v2)*eqvl*eqvl/120.)
10004  a12 = -(xq2+2.*asdl*xq1+asdl*asdl*xq0+eqvl*eqvl*((v1+ &
10005  v2)/120.+eqvl*v2/120.)*xq01)
10006  za = -(xq12/eqvl+v2*eqvl*eqvl*xq01/120.)
10007  zb = -((eqvl+asdl)*xq12/eqvl-eqvl*xq01/10.+v2*(eqvl+asdl)*eqvl* &
10008  eqvl*xq01/120.)
10009  a21 = xq0*(1.+(v1+v2)*eqvl*eqvl/120.)
10010  a22 = xq1 + xq0*(asdl+asdl*eqvl*eqvl*(v1+v2)/120.+eqvl**3*v2/120.)
10011  zc = xq1/eqvl + v2*eqvl*eqvl*xq0/120.
10012  zd = (asdl+eqvl)*xq1/eqvl - (eqvl/10.+v2*(eqvl+asdl)*eqvl*eqvl/ &
10013  120.)*xq0
10014 
10015  tma = 1./(1.-za-zc*zb/(1.-zd))
10016  t11 = (a11+zb*a21/(1.-zd))*tma
10017  t12 = (a12+zb*a22/(1.-zd))*tma
10018  t21 = (a21+zc*t11)/(1.-zd)
10019  t22 = (a22+zc*t12)/(1.-zd)
10020  vr11 = (1.+t11+dcum*t21)
10021  vr12 = (t12+dcum*(1.+t22))
10022  vr21 = t21
10023  vr22 = 1. + t22
10024  if (i==icont) then
10025  detre = vr11*vr22 - vr12*vr21
10026  write (16, 8921) vr11, vr12, vr21, vr22, detre
10027 8921 format (2x, ' TRANSVERSE CANONICAL MATRIX:(cm,radian) ', /, &
10028  2x, ' VR11:', e12.5, ' VR12:', e12.5, /, 2x, ' VR21:', &
10029  e12.5, ' VR22:', e12.5, /, 2x, ' DETERMINANT :', &
10030  e12.5, //)
10031  end if
10032  ! REAL MATRIX
10033  a11 = vr11*amort
10034  a12 = vr12*amort
10035  a21 = vr21*amort
10036  a22 = vr22*amort
10037  ! omment ** cumulative matrix (particle 1)
10038  ! omment tables R(,) ET T(,,,)
10039  ! omment IF (I .EQ. 1.AND.IPAS.EQ.2) THEN
10040  ! omment STA11=VR11*SA11+VR12*SA21
10041  ! omment STA12=VR11*SA12+VR12*SA22
10042  ! omment STA21=VR21*SA11+VR22*SA21
10043  ! omment STA22=VR21*SA12+VR22*SA22
10044  ! omment SA11=STA11
10045  ! omment SA12=STA12
10046  ! omment SA21=STA21
10047  ! omment SA22=STA22
10048  ! omment SAA11=SA11*AMORT
10049  ! omment SAA12=SA12*AMORT
10050  ! omment SAA21=SA21*AMORT
10051  ! omment SAA22=SA22*AMORT
10052  ! omment RS(1,1) =SAA11
10053  ! omment RS(1,2) =SAA12
10054  ! omment RS(2,1) =SAA21
10055  ! omment RS(2,2) =SAA22
10056  ! omment RS(3,3) =SAA11
10057  ! omment RS(3,4) =SAA12
10058  ! omment RS(4,3) =SAA21
10059  ! omment RS(4,4) =SAA22
10060  ! omment DO IA=1,6
10061  ! omment DO IB=1,6
10062  ! omment R(IA,IB)=RCUL(IA,IB)
10063  ! omment ENDDO
10064  ! omment ENDDO
10065  ! omment CALL MFORDRE(RCUL,RS,R)
10066  ! omment ENDIF
10067  ! BEAM COORDINATES
10068  fxt1 = a11*f(2, i) + a12*f(3, i)*1.e-03
10069  fxt2 = a21*f(2, i) + a22*f(3, i)*1.e-03
10070  fxt3 = a11*f(4, i) + a12*f(5, i)*1.e-03
10071  fxt4 = a21*f(4, i) + a22*f(5, i)*1.e-03
10072  f(2, i) = fxt1
10073  f(3, i) = fxt2*1.e03
10074  f(4, i) = fxt3
10075  f(5, i) = fxt4*1.e03
10076  if (i==icont) then
10077  ! ** CURRENT MATRIX
10078  stta11 = vr11*sact11 + vr12*sact21
10079  stta12 = vr11*sact12 + vr12*sact22
10080  stta21 = vr21*sact11 + vr22*sact21
10081  stta22 = vr21*sact12 + vr22*sact22
10082  sact11 = stta11
10083  sact12 = stta12
10084  sact21 = stta21
10085  sact22 = stta22
10086  saa11 = sact11*amort
10087  saa12 = sact12*amort
10088  saa21 = sact21*amort
10089  saa22 = sact22*amort
10090  det = a11*a22 - a12*a21
10091  write (16, 992) a11, a12*1.e-3, a21*1.e3, a22, det, amort
10092 992 format (1x, '* TRANSVERSE MATRIX (cm,mrd)', /, 1x, '*', &
10093  e12.5, 3x, e12.5, /, 1x, '*', e12.5, 3x, e12.5, /, 1x, &
10094  '* DETERMINANT :', e12.5, ' DUMPING OF ENERGY :', e12.5)
10095  write (16, *) '*'
10096  write (16, 559) f(2, i), f(3, i), f(4, i), f(5, i)
10097 559 format (' * TRANVERSE COORDINATES AT OUTPUT ', /, 1x, &
10098  '* X :', e12.5, ' CM XP :', e12.5, ' MRD ', /, 1x, &
10099  '* Y :', e12.5, ' CM YP :', e12.5, ' MRD')
10100  if (ipas==2) write (16, *) &
10101  '********** END OF FOLLOWED PARTICLE ********'
10102  end if
10103  ! ***** endif
10104 19 end do
10105  return
10106  end subroutine boucle
10111  subroutine bunparm(v, dp, harm, prlim)
10112  use randlux
10113  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
10114  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
10115  common /rigid/boro
10116  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
10117  common /dyn/tref, vref
10118  common /davcom/dav1(maxcell1, 40), davtot, iitem(maxcell1), idav
10119  common /etcha1/dav2(maxcell1, 33), ichas(iptsz), chasit
10120  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
10121  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
10122  common /etcom/cog(8), exten(17), fd(iptsz)
10123  common /fene/wdisp, wphas, wx, wy, rlim, ifw
10124  common /corec/tref1
10125  common /qmoyen/qmoy
10126  common /aerp/vphase, vfield, ierpf
10127  common /itvole/itvol, imamin
10128  common /compt/nrres, nrtre, nrbunc, nrdbun
10129  common /shif/dtiph, shift
10130  common /tofev/ttvols
10131  common /fcont/ifcont
10132  logical ifcont
10133  character *1 cr
10134  dimension vecx(1)
10135  logical chasit, itvol, imamin, shift
10136  ! ENVELOPE
10137  call stapl(davtot*10.)
10138  ! xx ilost=0
10139  twopi = 2.*pi
10140  freq = fh/twopi
10141  wavel = vl/freq
10142  fcpi = fh*180./pi
10143  ! print out on terminal of transport element # on one and the same
10144  ! line
10145  nrbunc = nrbunc + 1
10146  cr = char(13)
10147  write (6, 8254) nrtre, nrbunc, cr
10148 8254 format ('Transport element:', i5, ' Buncher :', i5, &
10149  a1, $)
10150  if (harm<=0.) harm = 1.
10151  rhs = prlim*prlim
10152  ! test window
10153  call reject(ilost)
10154  ! Reshuffles f(i,j) array after window (now done in 'reject')
10155  ! call shuffle
10156  tcog = 0.
10157  bcog = 0.
10158  do np = 1, ngood
10159  tcog = tcog + f(6, np)
10160  gpa = f(7, np)/xmat
10161  bcog = sqrt(1.-1./(gpa*gpa)) + bcog
10162  end do
10163  tcog = tcog/float(ngood)
10164  bcog = bcog/float(ngood)
10165  gcog = 1./sqrt(1.-bcog*bcog)
10166  encog = xmat*gcog - xmat
10167  ! adjustement of the phase of RF w.r.t. the T.O.F.
10168  xkpi = 0.
10169  if (imamin) then
10170  ttvpi = harm*ttvols*fcpi
10171  xkpi = ttvpi/360.
10172  ixkpi = int(xkpi)
10173  xkpi = (xkpi-float(ixkpi))*360.
10174  write (16, *) ' *** TOF correction:', -xkpi, ' deg'
10175  dp = dp - xkpi*pi/180.
10176  write (16, *) ' ***phase of RF adjusted : ', dp*180./pi, ' deg'
10177  end if
10178  ! 20/08/2009 delay of phase of the reference at input w.r.t. the
10179  ! synchronous phase
10180  ! 20/08/2009 ttvpi=harm*ttvols*fcpi
10181  ! 20/08/2009 xkpi=ttvpi/180.
10182  ! 20/08/2009 ixkpi=xkpi+0.5
10183  ! 20/08/2009 ixkpi=ixkpi*180
10184  ! 20/08/2009 xkpc=cos(ixkpi*pi/180.)
10185  ! 20/08/2009 xkpi=ttvpi-float(ixkpi)
10186  ! 20/08/2009 if(itvol.and.imamin)
10187  ! 20/08/2009 * write(16,8975) dp*180./pi,xkpi
10188  ! 20/08/2009 8975 format('***previous phase offset: ',e12.5,'
10189  ! deg',/,
10190  ! 20/08/2009 * '***new phase offset: ',e12.5,' deg')
10191  ! start of write to file '.short' for buncher
10192  idav = idav + 1
10193  iitem(idav) = 8
10194  dav1(idav, 1) = v
10195  dav1(idav, 2) = dp*180./pi
10196  dav1(idav, 3) = prlim
10197  dav1(idav, 4) = davtot*10.
10198  if (itvol) dav1(idav, 5) = -xkpi
10199  ! end
10200  write (16, 178)
10201 178 format (/, ' Dynamics at the input', /, 5x, &
10202  ' BETA GAMMA ENERGY(MeV) ', &
10203  ' TOF(deg) TOF(sec)')
10204  write (16, 1788) bcog, gcog, encog, tcog*fcpi, tcog
10205 1788 format (' COG ', f7.5, 3x, e12.5, 1x, e12.5, 3x, e12.5, 3x, e12.5)
10206  e0t = harm*v/(bcog*wavel)
10207  ! random or systematic error on RF level
10208  if (ierpf>0) then
10209  ! systematic error on RF level
10210  if (ierpf==1) e0t = e0t*(1.+vfield)
10211  ! random error on RF level
10212  if (ierpf>=2) then
10213  len = 1
10214  call rlux(vecx, len)
10215  r1 = (2.*vecx(1)-1.)*vfield
10216  e0t = e0t*(1.+r1)
10217  end if
10218  end if
10219  cay = harm*twopi/(bcog*gcog*wavel)
10220  caysq = cay**2
10221  con = twopi*e0t*qmoy/xmat
10222  rad = pi/180.
10223  ! systematic error on phase
10224  if (ierpf==1) dp = dp + vphase*rad
10225  ! random error on phase
10226  if (ierpf>=2) then
10227  len = 1
10228  call rlux(vecx, len)
10229  r1 = (2.*vecx(1)-1.)*vphase*rad
10230  dp = dp + r1
10231  end if
10232  ! shift=true => reference and COG seperated, otherwise reference=COG
10233  ! --- save the reference
10234  ovref = vref
10235  otref = tref
10236  ! --- shift = false: the reference particle is the cog
10237  if (shift) then
10238  ovref = vref
10239  beref = vref/vl
10240  gamref = 1./sqrt(1.-beref*beref)
10241  older = xmat*gamref
10242  else
10243  tref = tcog
10244  vref = bcog*vl
10245  ovref = vref
10246  beref = bcog
10247  gamref = 1./sqrt(1.-beref*beref)
10248  older = xmat*gamref
10249  end if
10250  ! --- if imamin = false: phase setting has been forced equal to dp,
10251  ! otherwise phase setting has been adjusted
10252  dgr = v*cos(harm*ttvols*fh+dp)*qmoy
10253  ewer = older + dgr
10254  gor = ewer/xmat
10255  vref = vl*sqrt(1.-1./(gor*gor))
10256  enrprin = older - xmat
10257  write (16, 165) beref, gamref, enrprin, tref*fh*180./pi, tref
10258 165 format (' REF ', f7.5, 3x, e12.5, 1x, e12.5, 3x, e12.5, 3x, e12.5)
10259  wsync = 0.
10260  bcour = 0.
10261  tcog = 0.
10262  do np = 1, ngood
10263  rs = f(2, np)**2 + f(4, np)**2
10264  a = harm*(f(6,np)-tref+ttvols)*fh + dp
10265  rs = rs*1.e-04
10266  ! 20/08/2009 s=sin(a)*xkpc
10267  s = sin(a)
10268  w = f(7, np) - xmat
10269  bg = sqrt(w/xmat*(2.+w/xmat))
10270  ! conversion cm-->m and mrd--->rd
10271  f2 = f(2, np)
10272  f4 = f(4, np)
10273  f3 = f(3, np)*1.e-03
10274  f5 = f(5, np)*1.e-03
10275  bgx = f3*bg
10276  bgy = f5*bg
10277  cayrsq = caysq*rs
10278  arg = cayrsq/4.
10279  xi0 = 1. + arg*(1.+arg*(.25+arg/36.))
10280  ! dw=v*cos(a)*xi0*qmoy
10281  dw = v*cos(a)*xi0*f(9, np)
10282  ! 20/08/2009 dw=dw*xkpc
10283  wb = w + .5*dw
10284  bgav = sqrt(wb/xmat*(2.+wb/xmat))
10285  gav = 1. + wb/xmat
10286  bav = bgav/gav
10287  bcour = bcour + bav
10288  wf = w + dw
10289  bgf = sqrt(wf/xmat*(2.+wf/xmat))
10290  xi1okr = .5 + .25*arg + arg**2/24.
10291  del = -con*s*(1.-bav*bcog)*xi1okr/bav
10292  tcog = tcog + f(6, np)
10293  f3 = (bgx+del*f2)/bgf
10294  f(3, np) = f3*1.e03
10295  f5 = (bgy+del*f4)/bgf
10296  f(5, np) = f5*1.e03
10297  f(7, np) = wf + xmat
10298  wsync = wsync + wf
10299  end do
10300  wsync = wsync/float(ngood)
10301  bcour = bcour/float(ngood)
10302  tcog = tcog/float(ngood)
10303  ! Test window
10304  call reject(ilost)
10305  ! Reshuffles f(i,j) array after window (now done in 'reject')
10306  ! call shuffle
10307  ! new output
10308  ! shift=true => reference and COG seperated, otherwise reference=COG
10309  engain = wsync - encog
10310  if (shift) then
10311  beref = vref/vl
10312  gamref = 1./sqrt(1.-beref*beref)
10313  enref = ewer - xmat
10314  else
10315  tref = tcog
10316  vref = bcour*vl
10317  beref = bcour
10318  enref = wsync
10319  dgr = engain
10320  end if
10321  if (itvol) ttvols = tref
10322  write (16, 3777)
10323 3777 format (/, ' Dynamics at the output', /, 5x, &
10324  ' BETA dW(MeV) ENERGY(MeV) ', ' TOF(deg) TOF(sec)')
10325  write (16, 3473) beref, dgr, enref, fh*tref*180./pi, tref
10326 3473 format (' REF ', f7.5, 3x, f10.6, 3x, f8.3, 3x, e12.5, 3x, e12.5)
10327  write (16, 1789) bcour, engain, wsync, tcog*fh*180./pi, tcog
10328 1789 format (' COG ', f7.5, 3x, f10.6, 3x, f8.3, 3x, e12.5, 3x, e12.5)
10329  ! dave start for buncher
10330  dav1(idav, 36) = ngood
10331  ! as beam passed through buncher, assume bunched beam
10332  ifcont = .false.
10333  write (16, *) 'After buncher, bunched beam assumed'
10334  call emiprt(0)
10335  ! dave end
10336  ! xx3928 FORMAT(' # ',i5,1x,7(f10.2,1x))
10337  return
10338  end subroutine bunparm
10345  subroutine refer
10346  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
10347  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
10348  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
10349  common /dyn/tref, vref
10350  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
10351  common /qmoyen/qmoy
10352  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
10353  common /newref/dephas, dewref, iref, irefw
10354  common /tapes/in, ifile, meta
10355  common /itvole/itvol, imamin
10356  common /tofev/ttvols
10357  logical itvol, imamin
10358  ! ********************************************************************
10359  !*****************************
10360  ! ---- IREF =0 and IREFW = 0: dewref is dW/W where W is the kinetic
10361  ! energy of the old reference
10362  ! ---- IREF =0 and IREFW = 1: dewref is dW (MeV) relative to the
10363  ! kinetic energy of the old reference
10364  ! ---- IREF =0 and IREFW = 2: dewref is dW (MeV) is new reference
10365  ! energy and dbref new reference phase (deg) in abs. units
10366  ! ---- IREF =1 and IREFW = 0: dewref is dW/W where W is the kinetic
10367  ! energy of the c.o.g
