10368  ! ---- IREF =1 and IREFW = 1: dewref is dW (MeV) relative to the
10369  ! kinetic energy of the c.o.g.
10370  ! ********************************************************************
10371  !*****************************
10372  ! ---- save reference
10373  avref = vref
10374  atref = tref
10375  attvols = ttvols
10376  if (irefw==2) then
10377  wnref = dewref
10378  gnref = wnref/xmat + 1.
10379  bref = sqrt(gnref*gnref-1.)/gnref
10380  ! ---- set tref in sec based on dephas (deg)
10381  delt = dephas*pi/(fh*180.)
10382  ! ------ the new reference is:
10383  tref = delt
10384  vref = bref*vl
10385  if (itvol) ttvols = tref
10386  end if
10387  if (iref==0) then
10388  if (irefw==0) then
10389  bref = vref/vl
10390  gref = 1./sqrt(1-bref*bref)
10391  dbref = bref*dewref/(gref*(gref+1.))
10392  ! ---- change dephas (deg) in delt (sec)
10393  delt = dephas*pi/(fh*180.)
10394  ! ------ the new reference is:
10395  tref = tref + delt
10396  vref = vref + dbref*vl
10397  if (itvol) ttvols = tref
10398  end if
10399  if (irefw==1) then
10400  bref = vref/vl
10401  gref = 1./sqrt(1.-bref*bref)
10402  wref = (gref-1.)*xmat
10403  wnref = wref + dewref
10404  gnref = wnref/xmat + 1.
10405  bref = sqrt(gnref*gnref-1.)/gnref
10406  ! ---- change dephas (deg) in delt (sec)
10407  delt = dephas*pi/(fh*180.)
10408  ! ------ the new reference is:
10409  tref = tref + delt
10410  vref = bref*vl
10411  if (itvol) ttvols = tref
10412  end if
10413  end if
10414  if (iref==1) then
10415  ! ----- c.o.g. of the bunch is the new reference
10416  tcog = 0.
10417  bcog = 0.
10418  do i = 1, ngood
10419  tcog = tcog + f(6, i)
10420  gpai = f(7, i)/xmat
10421  ! -bugfix-R10-2013-11-12
10422  ! bcog=bbref+sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
10423  bcog = bcog + sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
10424  end do
10425  tcog = tcog/float(ngood)
10426  bcog = bcog/float(ngood)
10427  gcog = 1./sqrt(1-bcog*bcog)
10428  wcog = (gcog-1.)*xmat
10429  ! ---- change dephas (deg) in delt (sec)
10430  delt = dephas*pi/(fh*180.)
10431  if (irefw==0) then
10432  ! -bugfix-R10-2013-11-12
10433  ! dbcog=bcog*dewref/(gcog*(gcog+1.))
10434  wrefn = wcog + wcog*dewref/100.
10435  ! ------ the new reference is:
10436  tref = tcog + delt
10437  ! -bugfix-R10-2013-11-12
10438  ! vref=(bcog+dbcog)*vl
10439  grefn = wrefn/xmat + 1.
10440  vref = vl*sqrt(grefn*grefn-1.)/grefn
10441  if (itvol) ttvols = tref
10442  end if
10443  if (irefw==1) then
10444  wncog = wcog + dewref
10445  gncog = wncog/xmat + 1.
10446  bcog = sqrt(gncog*gncog-1.)/gncog
10447  ! ------ the new reference is:
10448  tref = tcog + delt
10449  vref = bcog*vl
10450  if (itvol) ttvols = tref
10451  end if
10452  end if
10453  baref = avref/vl
10454  garef = 1./sqrt(1.-baref*baref)
10455  waref = (garef-1.)*xmat
10456  bnref = vref/vl
10457  gnref = 1./sqrt(1.-bnref*bnref)
10458  wnref = (gnref-1.)*xmat
10459  fcpi = fh*180/pi
10460  write (16, 20) atref*fcpi, attvols*fcpi, waref
10461 20 format (3x, '**before NREF', /, 5x, 'tof of the reference: ', e12.5, &
10462  ' deg tof for adjustments: ', e12.5, ' deg energy of reference: ', &
10463  e12.5, ' MeV')
10464  write (16, 21) tref*fcpi, ttvols*fcpi, wnref
10465 21 format (3x, '**after NREF', /, 5x, 'tof of the reference: ', e12.5, &
10466  ' deg tof for adjustments: ', e12.5, ' deg energy of reference: ', &
10467  e12.5, ' MeV')
10468  return
10469  end subroutine refer
10470  subroutine steer(fld, nvf)
10471  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
10472  ! ---- TRANSFORM BEAM THRU THIN STEERER
10473  ! 4/15/14 - Daniel Alt: Added electrostatic steerers.
10474  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
10475  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
10476  common /dyn/tref, vref
10477  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
10478  common /rigid/boro
10479  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
10480  common /etcom/cog(8), exten(17), fd(iptsz)
10481  common /qmoyen/qmoy
10482  common /dcspa/iesp
10483  common /sc3/beamc, scdist, sce10, cplm, ect, apl, ichaes, iscsp
10484  common /tapes/in, ifile, meta
10485  common /pltprf/sprfx(3000), sprfy(3000), sprfl(3000), sprfw(3000), &
10486  sprfp(3000), sprng(3000), iprf
10487  common /davcom/dav1(maxcell1, 40), davtot, iitem(maxcell1), idav
10488  common /compt/nrres, nrtre, nrbunc, nrdbun
10489  character *1 cr
10490  logical iesp, ichaes
10491  ! ---- MAGNETIC STEERER
10492  ! ---- PARAMETERS: fld (Tm), nvf
10493  ! where fld is the integrated field
10494  ! if nvf=0, horizontal magnetic steerer
10495  ! if nvf=1, vertical magnetic steerer
10496 
10497  ! ---- ELECTROSTATIC STEERER
10498  ! This is a zero length element: the length shown below is
10499  ! ONLY used for kick calculation.
10500  ! ---- PARAMETERS: fld (kV*m/m), nvf
10501  ! where fld is Plate Voltage * plate length/plate separation.
10502  ! if nvf=2, horziontal electrostatic steerer
10503  ! if nvf=3, vertical electrostatic steerer
10504 
10505  ! -----ANGULAR DISPLACEMENTS DUE TO STEERING
10506  ! print out on terminal of transport element # on one and the same
10507  ! line
10508  nrtre = nrtre + 1
10509  cr = char(13)
10510  write (6, 8254) nrtre, nrres, cr
10511 8254 format ('Transport element:', i5, ' Accelerating element:', i5, &
10512  a1, $)
10513  if (nvf==0) then
10514  ! horizontal magnetic steerer
10515  write (16, *) 'Horizontal magnetic steerer: ', fld, ' Tm'
10516  do i = 1, ngood
10517  const = xmat*1.e8/(f(9,i)*vl)
10518  gpai = f(7, i)/xmat
10519  bpai = sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
10520  dispx = fld/(const*gpai*bpai)*1000.
10521  f(3, i) = f(3, i) + dispx
10522  end do
10523  else if (nvf==1) then
10524  ! vertical magnetic steerer
10525  write (16, *) 'Vertical magnetic steerer: ', fld, ' Tm'
10526  do i = 1, ngood
10527  const = xmat*1.e8/(f(9,i)*vl)
10528  gpai = f(7, i)/xmat
10529  bpai = sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
10530  dispy = fld/(const*gpai*bpai)*1000.
10531  f(5, i) = f(5, i) + dispy
10532  end do
10533  else if (nvf==2) then
10534  ! horizontal electrostatic steerer
10535  write (16, *) 'Horizontal electrostatic steerer: ', fld, ' kV*m/m'
10536  do i = 1, ngood
10537  gpai = f(7, i)/xmat
10538  const = (gpai/(gpai*gpai-1.))*f(9, i)
10539  dispx = const*fld/xmat
10540  f(3, i) = f(3, i) + dispx
10541  end do
10542  else if (nvf==3) then
10543  ! vertical electrostatic steerer
10544  write (16, *) 'Vertical electrostatic steerer: ', fld, ' kV*m/m'
10545  do i = 1, ngood
10546  gpai = f(7, i)/xmat
10547  const = (gpai*gpai/(gpai*gpai-1.))*f(9, i)
10548  dispy = const*fld/xmat
10549  f(5, i) = f(5, i) + dispy
10550  end do
10551  else
10552  ! error on input
10553  write (16, *) 'Wrong value for NVF in STEERER'
10554  stop
10555  end if
10556  return
10557  end subroutine steer
10588  subroutine emiprt(l)
10589  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
10590  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
10591  common /etchas/fractx, fracty, fractl
10592  common /dyn/tref, vref
10593  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
10594  common /davcom/dav1(maxcell1, 40), davtot, iitem(maxcell1), idav
10595  common /davprt/shortl
10596  common /qmoyen/qmoy
10597  common /etcom/cog(8), exten(17), fd(iptsz)
10598  common /etcha1/dav2(maxcell1, 33), ichas(iptsz), chasit
10599  common /etcha3/ichxyz(iptsz)
10600  common /speda/dave, idave
10601  common /cptemit/xltot(maxcell1), nbemit
10602  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
10603  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
10604  common /mcs/imcs, ncstat, cstat(20)
10605  common /strip/atm, qs, atms, ths, qop, sqst(6), anp, nqst
10606  common /shortl/davprt
10607  logical dave, chasit
10608  dimension foo(20, 9), ndp(20)
10609  character *80 davprt(maxcell1), shortl
10610 
10611  nbemit = nbemit + 1
10612  do i = 1, ngood
10613  ichxyz(i) = 1
10614  end do
10615  xltot(nbemit) = davtot
10616  idav = idav + 1
10617  iitem(idav) = 3
10618  dav1(idav, 40) = fh
10619  do i = 1, ngood
10620  ichas(i) = 1
10621  end do
10622  iarg = 1
10623  if (l==1) davprt(idav) = shortl
10624  call cdg(iarg)
10625  encog = cog(1)
10626  gcog = encog/xmat
10627  bcog = sqrt(1.-1./(gcog*gcog))
10628  tcog = cog(3)
10629  call ext2d(1)
10630  ! --- qdisp : average dispersion (MeV)
10631  ! --- sqmdv: emittance (MeV*rad)
10632  qdisp = 2.*sqrt(exten(1))
10633  qmdv = exten(1)*exten(3) - exten(2)*exten(2)
10634  sqmdv = 4.*pi*sqrt(qmdv)
10635  ! --- qdp : average extension in phase (rad)
10636  qdp = 2.*sqrt(exten(3))
10637  ! --- cor12: coefficient of correlation in (dE, dPHI)
10638  cor12 = exten(2)/sqrt(exten(1)*exten(3))
10639  ! sup pent12=sqrt(exten(1)/exten(3))/cor12
10640  ! sup pent21=sqrt(exten(1)/exten(3))*cor12
10641  ! sup qdpde=qdp*180./pi
10642  ! --- particle reference
10643  ! dav1(idav,3): relativistic beta
10644  ! dav1(idav,4): Kinetic energy (MeV)
10645  ! dav1(idav,5): phase (in deg. w.r.t. k*pi)
10646  beref = vref/vl
10647  gref = 1./sqrt(1.-beref*beref)
10648  dav1(idav, 3) = beref
10649  dav1(idav, 4) = xmat*(gref-1.)
10650  dav1(idav, 5) = -(int(tref*fh/pi+0.5)-tref*fh/pi)*180.
10651  ! *et*2013*change to print out absolute TOF
10652  dav1(idav, 5) = (tref*fh/pi)*180.
10653  ! --- c.o.g of the bunch
10654  ! dav1(idav,6): Kinetic energy (MeV)
10655  ! dav1(idav,7): phase (in deg. w.r.t. k*pi)
10656  phnw = -(int(tcog*fh/pi+0.5)-tcog*fh/pi)*180.
10657  ! *et*2013*change to print out absolute TOF
10658  phnw = (tcog*fh/pi)*180.
10659  dav1(idav, 6) = encog - xmat
10660  dav1(idav, 7) = phnw
10661  ! ---- deviation between the fictious reference and the c.o.g. of the
10662  ! bunch
10663  ! dav1(idav,8) : deviation in energy (MeV)
10664  ! dav1(idav,9) : deviation of phase (deg)
10665  dav1(idav, 8) = encog - xmat - dav1(idav, 4)
10666  dav1(idav, 9) = phnw - dav1(idav, 5)
10667  ! ---- statistics in z-zp
10668  ! --- dav1(idav,10) : extension dPHI (deg)
10669  ! --- dav1(idav,11) : dispersion dE (MeV)
10670  ! --- dav1(idav,12) : emittance (MeV*rad)
10671  ! --- dav1(idav,23) : correlation in between dE an dPHI
10672  dav1(idav, 10) = qdp*180./pi
10673  dav1(idav, 11) = qdisp
10674  dav1(idav, 12) = sqmdv/pi
10675  dav1(idav, 23) = cor12
10676  ! sup dav1(idav,39)=sqmdv*180./(pi*pi)
10677  ! sup Ez(ns.keV)
10678  ! sup dav1(idav,12)=sqmdv*(1.E09)/(pi*fh)
10679  ! ---- statistics in x-xp and y-yp
10680  trqtx = exten(4)*exten(5) - exten(8)*exten(8)
10681  trqpy = exten(6)*exten(7) - exten(9)*exten(9)
10682  surxth = 4.*pi*sqrt(trqtx)
10683  suryph = 4.*pi*sqrt(trqpy)
10684  qditax = 2.*sqrt(exten(4))
10685  qdiant = 2.*sqrt(exten(5))
10686  qditay = 2.*sqrt(exten(6))
10687  qdianp = 2.*sqrt(exten(7))
10688  ! dav1(idav,13): extension in x (mm)
10689  ! dav1(idav,14): extension in xp (mrad)
10690  ! --- dav1(idav,15): correlation between x and xp
10691  dav1(idav, 13) = qditax*10.
10692  dav1(idav, 14) = qdiant
10693  dav1(idav, 15) = 0.
10694  if (exten(4)/=0. .and. exten(5)/=0.) dav1(idav, 15) = exten(8)/ &
10695  sqrt(exten(4)*exten(5))
10696  ! Emittance(norm) x-xp (mm*mrad)
10697  dav1(idav, 16) = bcog*surxth*10./(pi*sqrt(1.-bcog*bcog))
10698  ! Emittance(non norm) x-xp (mm*mrad)
10699  dav1(idav, 17) = surxth*10./pi
10700  ! --- dav1(idav,18): y-extension (mm)
10701  ! --- dav1(idav,19): yp-extension (mrad)
10702  ! --- dav1(idav,20): correlation between y and yp
10703  dav1(idav, 20) = 0.
10704  if (exten(6)/=0. .and. exten(7)/=0.) dav1(idav, 20) = exten(9)/ &
10705  sqrt(exten(6)*exten(7))
10706  dav1(idav, 18) = qditay*10.
10707  dav1(idav, 19) = qdianp
10708  ! dav1(idav,21) : Emittance(norm) y-yp (pi*mm*mrad)
10709  dav1(idav, 21) = bcog*suryph*10./(pi*sqrt(1.-bcog*bcog))
10710  ! dav1(idav,22) : Emittance(non norm) y-yp (mm*mrad)
10711  dav1(idav, 22) = suryph*10./pi
10712  dav1(idav, 30) = float(ngood)
10713  dav1(idav, 31) = cog(4)*10.
10714  dav1(idav, 32) = cog(5)
10715  dav1(idav, 33) = cog(6)*10.
10716  dav1(idav, 34) = cog(7)
10717  ! next card to indicate no chase
10718  dav1(idav, 26) = 0.
10719  ! --- statistics with chase
10720  if (chasit) then
10721  dav2(idav, 31) = fractx
10722  dav2(idav, 32) = fracty
10723  dav2(idav, 33) = fractl
10724  ! longitudinal direction
10725  call chasel
10726  do i = 1, ngood
10727  ichxyz(i) = ichas(i)
10728  end do
10729  iarg = 1
10730  call cdg(iarg)
10731  encog = cog(1)
10732  gcog = encog/xmat
10733  bcog = sqrt(1.-1./(gcog*gcog))
10734  enprt = encog - xmat
10735  call ext2d(1)
10736  ! qdisp : average dispersion dE (MeV)
10737  ! sqmdv: longitudinal emittance (MeV*rad)
10738  qdisp = 2.*sqrt(exten(1))
10739  qmdv = exten(1)*exten(3) - exten(2)*exten(2)
10740  sqmdv = 4.*pi*sqrt(qmdv)
10741  ! qdp : average extension dPHI (rad)
10742  qdp = 2.*sqrt(exten(3))
10743  ! cor12: coefficient of correlation in (dE, dPHI)
10744  cor12 = exten(2)/sqrt(exten(1)*exten(3))
10745  ! sup pent12=sqrt(exten(1)/exten(3))/cor12
10746  ! sup pent21=sqrt(exten(1)/exten(3))*cor12
10747  ! sup qdpde=qdp*180./pi
10748  ! --- fictitious reference
10749  ! dav2(idav,3): relativistic beta
10750  ! dav2(idav,4): Kinetic energy (MeV)
10751  ! dav2(idav,5): phase (in deg. w.r.t. k*pi)
10752  beref = vref/vl
10753  gref = 1./sqrt(1.-beref*beref)
10754  dav2(idav, 3) = beref
10755  dav2(idav, 4) = xmat*(gref-1.)
10756  dav2(idav, 5) = (int(tref*fh/pi+0.5)-tref*fh/pi)*180.
10757  ! --- c.o.g of the bunch
10758  ! dav2(idav,6): Kinetic energy (MeV)
10759  ! dav2(idav,7): phase (in deg. w.r.t. k*pi)
10760  phnw = -(int(tcog*fh/pi+0.5)-tcog*fh/pi)*180.
10761  dav2(idav, 6) = encog - xmat
10762  dav2(idav, 7) = phnw
10763  ! ---- deviation between fictitious reference and c.o.g.
10764  ! dav2(idav,8) : deviation in energy (MeV)
10765  ! dav2(idav,9) : deviation of phase (deg)
10766  dav2(idav, 8) = encog - xmat - dav2(idav, 4)
10767  dav2(idav, 9) = phnw - dav2(idav, 5)
10768  ! ---- caracteristics of the bunch in longitudinal plane (dE,
10769  ! dPHI)
10770  ! dav2(idav,10) : dPHI extension (deg)
10771  ! dav2(idav,11) : dispersion dE (MeV)
10772  ! dav2(idav,12) : emittance (MeV*rad)
10773  ! dav2(idav,23) : coefficient of correlation in (dE, dPHI)
10774  dav2(idav, 10) = qdp*180./pi
10775  dav2(idav, 11) = qdisp
10776  dav2(idav, 12) = sqmdv/pi
10777  dav2(idav, 23) = cor12
10778  ! sup dav2(idav,39)=sqmdv*180./(pi*pi)
10779  ! sup Ez(ns.keV)
10780  ! sup dav2(idav,12)=sqmdv*(1.E09)/(pi*fh)
10781  ! --- chase in x-xp
10782  call chasex
10783  do i = 1, ngood
10784  ichxyz(i) = ichas(i)*ichxyz(i)
10785  end do
10786  iarg = 1
10787  call cdg(iarg)
10788  encog = cog(1)
10789  gcog = encog/xmat
10790  bcog = sqrt(1.-1/(gcog*gcog))
10791  dav2(idav, 26) = cog(4)*10.
10792  dav2(idav, 27) = cog(5)
10793  call ext2d(1)
10794  trqty = exten(4)*exten(5) - exten(8)*exten(8)
10795  surxth = 4.*pi*sqrt(trqty)
10796  qditax = 2.*sqrt(exten(4))
10797  qdiant = 2.*sqrt(exten(5))
10798  ! cc below for fourth line of EMIT output
10799  ! ---- caracteristics of the bunch in x-direction
10800  ! dav2(idav,13): x-extension (mm)
10801  ! dav2(idav,14): xp-extension (mrad)
10802  ! dav2(idav,15): coefficient of correlation in plane (x, xp)
10803  dav2(idav, 13) = qditax*10.
10804  dav2(idav, 14) = qdiant
10805  dav2(idav, 15) = 0.
10806  if (exten(4)/=0. .and. exten(5)/=0.) dav1(idav, 15) = exten(8)/ &
10807  sqrt(exten(4)*exten(5))
10808  ! Emittance(norm) x-xp (pi*mm*mrad)
10809  dav2(idav, 16) = bcog*surxth*10./(pi*sqrt(1.-bcog*bcog))
10810  ! Emittance(non norm) in x-xp (mm*mrad)
10811  dav2(idav, 17) = surxth*10./pi
10812  ! cc below for fourth line of EMIT output
10813  ! --- chase in x-xp
10814  call chasey
10815  do i = 1, ngood
10816  ichxyz(i) = ichas(i)*ichxyz(i)
10817  end do
10818  iarg = 1
10819  call cdg(iarg)
10820  encog = cog(1)
10821  gcog = encog/xmat
10822  bcog = sqrt(1.-1./(gcog*gcog))
10823  dav2(idav, 28) = cog(6)*10.
10824  dav2(idav, 29) = cog(7)
10825  call ext2d(1)
10826  trqpz = exten(6)*exten(7) - exten(9)*exten(9)
10827  suryph = 4.*pi*sqrt(trqpz)
10828  qditay = 2.*sqrt(exten(6))
10829  qdianp = 2.*sqrt(exten(7))
10830  ! dav2(idav,18): y-extension (mm)
10831  ! dav2(idav,19): yp-extension (mrad)
10832  ! dav2(idav,20): coefficient of correlation in the plane (y, yp)
10833  dav2(idav, 20) = 0.
10834  if (exten(6)/=0. .and. exten(7)/=0.) dav2(idav, 20) = exten(9)/ &
10835  sqrt(exten(6)*exten(7))
10836  dav2(idav, 18) = qditay*10.
10837  dav2(idav, 19) = qdianp
10838  ! dav2(idav,21) : Emittance(norm) in y-yp (mm*mrad)
10839  dav2(idav, 21) = bcog*suryph*10./(pi*sqrt(1.-bcog*bcog))
10840  ! dav1(idav,22) : Emittance(non norm) in y-yp (mm*mrad)
10841  dav2(idav, 22) = suryph*10./pi
10842  ! next card to indicate chase
10843  dav1(idav, 26) = 1.
10844  do i = 1, ngood
10845  ichas(i) = 1
10846  end do
10847  end if
10848  ! *et*2012*March*02 print energy, boro etc for each charge state in
10849  ! long
10850  if (ncstat>1) then
10851  write (16, '(1x,a4)') 'EMIT'
10852  do k = 1, ncstat
10853  ndp(k) = 0
10854  do j = 2, 7
10855  foo(k, j) = 0.
10856  end do
10857  end do
10858  do i = 1, imax
10859  if (f(8,i)==1) then
10860  do k = 1, ncstat
10861  if (f(9,i)==cstat(k)) then
10862  ndp(k) = ndp(k) + 1
10863  do j = 2, 7
10864  foo(k, j) = foo(k, j) + f(j, i)
10865  end do
10866  end if
10867  end do
10868  end if
10869  end do
10870  do k = 1, ncstat
10871  do j = 2, 7
10872  foo(k, j) = foo(k, j)/float(ndp(k))
10873  end do
10874  end do
10875  write (16, *) ' Q Particles beta Wcog(MeV)', &
10876  ' Wcog(MeV/u) Pcog(kG.cm) TOF(deg) TOF(sec) ', &
10877  ' X_avg(cm) Xp_avg(mrad) ', &
10878  'Y_avg(cm) Yp_avg(mrad)'
10879  do k = 1, ncstat
10880  gref = foo(k, 7)/xmat
10881  bref = sqrt(1.-1./(gref*gref))
10882  xe = (gref-1.)*xmat
10883  ! magnetic rigidity
10884  bor = 3.3356*xmat*bref*gref/cstat(k)
10885  write (16, '(2x,f5.2,3x,I5,5x,F9.7, &
10886  & 5(1x,E12.5),1x,4(F12.5,2x))') &
10887  cstat(k), ndp(k), bref, xe, xe/atm, bor, &
10888  foo(k, 6)*180.*fh/pi, foo(k, 6), foo(k, 2), foo(k, 3), &
10889  foo(k, 4), foo(k, 5)
10890  end do
10891  write (16, *)
10892  end if
10893  return
10894  end subroutine emiprt
10911  subroutine statis
10912  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
10913  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
10914  common /dyn/tref, vref
10915  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
10916  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
10917  common /qmoyen/qmoy
10918  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
10919  common /stis/surxth, suryph, enedep, ecogde, testca
10920  common /etcom/cog(8), exten(17), fd(iptsz)
10921  ! EXT2D looks for average extensions squared and returns them in EXTEN
10922  iarg = 1
10923  call cdg(iarg)
10924  encog = cog(1)
10925  gcog = encog/xmat
10926  bcog = sqrt(1.-1./(gcog*gcog))
10927  tcog = cog(3)
10928  bref = vref/vl
10929  gref = 1./sqrt(1.-bref*bref)
10930  enref = xmat*gref
10931  ccgp = (tcog-tref)*fh*180./pi
10932  ccgd = encog - enref
10933  do i = 1, ngood
10934  gpai = f(7, i)/xmat
10935  bpai = sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
10936  fd(i) = bpai/bcog*gpai/gcog
10937  end do
10938  call ext2d(1)
10939  testca = exten(1)*exten(2)*exten(3)
10940  if (abs(testca)>1.e-40) then
10941  qdisp = 2.*sqrt(exten(1))
10942  qmd = exten(1)*exten(3) - exten(2)*exten(2)
10943  surm = 4.*pi*sqrt(qmd)*180./pi
10944  qdp = 2.*sqrt(exten(3))
10945  cor12 = exten(2)/sqrt(exten(1)*exten(3))
10946  ! sup PENT12=SQRT(exten(1)/exten(3))/COR12
10947  ! sup PENT21=SQRT(exten(1)/exten(3))*COR12
10948  qdpde = qdp*180./pi
10949  else
10950  qdisp = 0.
10951  qmd = 0.
10952  surm = 0.
10953  qdp = 0.
10954  cor12 = 0.
10955  pent12 = 0.
10956  pent21 = 0.
10957  qdpde = 0.
10958  end if
10959  trqtx = exten(4)*exten(5) - exten(8)*exten(8)
10960  trqpy = exten(6)*exten(7) - exten(9)*exten(9)
10961  qditax = 2.*sqrt(exten(4))
10962  qdiant = 2.*sqrt(exten(5))
10963  qditay = 2.*sqrt(exten(6))
10964  qdianp = 2.*sqrt(exten(7))
10965  surxth = 4.*pi*sqrt(trqtx)
10966  suryph = 4.*pi*sqrt(trqpy)
10967  sqmdv = 4.*pi*sqrt(qmd)
10968  write (16, 52) imax, ngood
10969 52 format (4x, ' TOTAL NUMBER OF PARTICLES :', i5, &
10970  ' NUMBER OF PARTICLES CONSIDERED :', i6, /)
10971  write (16, 1557)
10972 1557 format (5x, ' *** TRANSVERSE AND LONGITUDINAL STATISTICS')
10973  write (16, 1553) cog(4), cog(5)
10974 1553 format (4x, ' COG COORD X : ', e12.5, ' CM XP :', e12.5, ' MRD')
10975  write (16, 1556) cog(6), cog(7)
10976 1556 format (4x, ' COG COORD Y : ', e12.5, ' CM YP :', e12.5, ' MRD')
10977  write (16, 14) ccgp, ccgd
10978 14 format (4x, ' COG COORD dPHI: ', e12.5, ' deg dW :', e12.5, ' MeV')
10979  write (16, 1552) qditax, qdiant, surxth/pi
10980 1552 format (4x, ' X :', e12.5, ' CM XP :', e12.5, ' MRD EMITTANCE :', &
10981  e15.8, ' CM.MRD')
10982  write (16, 1555) qditay, qdianp, suryph/pi
10983 1555 format (4x, ' Y :', e12.5, ' CM YP :', e12.5, ' MRD EMITTANCE :', &
10984  e15.8, ' CM.MRD')
10985  write (16, 154) qdpde, qdisp, sqmdv*180./(pi*pi)
10986 154 format (4x, ' dPHI : ', f7.3, ' deg dW :', 3x, f7.3, 3x, &
10987  'MeV EMITTANCE :', e15.8, ' MeV.deg', /)
10988  ! sup write(16,*) ' *** ellips (dE,dPHI) '
10989  ! sup write(16,19) surm,qdp,qdisp,cor12
10990  ! sup19 format(' area: ',e12.5,' MeV*deg half phase extent:
10991  ! ',e12.5,
10992  ! sup * ' deg half energy extend: ',e12.5,' MeV',/,
10993  ! sup * ' correlation coef: ',e12.5)
10994  ! sup *
10995  return
10996  end subroutine statis
11003  subroutine tiltbm(icg)
11004  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
11005  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
11006  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
11007  common /davcom/dav1(maxcell1, 40), davtot, iitem(maxcell1), idav
11008  common /tilt/tipha, tix, tiy, shifw, shifp
11009  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
11010  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
11011  common /objet/fo(9, iptsz), imaxo
11012  common /qmoyen/qmoy
11013  common /rigid/boro
11014  common /dyn/tref, vref
11015  common /stis/suryth, surzph, enedep, ecogde, testca
11016  common /newtlt/twissa(3), itwiss
11017  common /histo/centre(6)
11018  common /shif/dtiph, shift
11019  common /tof/tofini
11020  logical shift
11021  common /tapes/in, ifile, meta
11022  common /etcom/cog(8), exten(17), fd(iptsz)
11023  ! TIPHA : Shift on the phase axis(DEG)
11024  ! TIX : Shift in the x-direction (CM)
11025  ! TIY : Shift in the y-direction (CM)
11026  ! SHIFW : Change the energy position of the c.o.g.(MeV)
11027  ! SHIFP : Change the phase position of the c.o.g.(deg)
11028  ! DTIPH : Change the position of the phase (radian)
11029  ! ICG : = 0 VREF and TREF are the ones of sync. particle
11030  ! ICG :. NE. 0 VREF ET TREF are the ones of the c. of g.
11031  write (16, 1) tipha, tix, tiy, shifw, shifp
11032 1 format (' Shift the position of the bunch', /, &
11033  ' in the z-direction :', e12.5, ' DEG', /, &
11034  ' in the x-direction :', e12.5, ' CM ', /, &
11035  ' in the y-direction :', e12.5, ' CM ', /, &
11036  ' shift the energy of the cog with :', e12.5, ' MeV', /, &
11037  ' shift the phase of the cog with :', e12.5, ' deg', /)
11038  tipha = tipha*pi/180.
11039  shifp = shifp*pi/180.
11040  deg = fh*180./pi
11041  iarg = 1
11042  call cdg(iarg)
11043  encog = cog(1)
11044  tcog = cog(3)
11045  gcog = encog/xmat
11046  bcog = sqrt(1.-1./(gcog*gcog))
11047  ! --- this routine is call by the routine ENTRE with icg = 1
11048  ! the reference particle is the cog of the bunch
11049  if (icg/=0) then
11050  tref = tcog
11051  vref = vl*bcog
11052  vcour = vref
11053  gcour = gcog
11054  bcour = bcog
11055  write (16, *) '*** Before tilt and shift '
11056  write (16, 24) bcog, tref, tref*deg, encog - xmat
11057 24 format (2x, '*** the reference particle is the cog:', /, &
11058  ' REF AND COG: BETA :', e12.5, 2x, 'TOF :', e12.5, &
11059  ' SEC OR: ', e12.5, ' deg', 2x, ' ENERGY :', e12.5, ' MeV', /)
11060  end if
11061  if (icg==0) then
11062  vcour = vl*bcog
11063  bcour = bcog
11064  gcour = gcog
11065  bvref = vref/vl
11066  gamref = 1./sqrt(1.-bvref*bvref)
11067  wvref = (gamref-1.)*xmat
11068  write (16, *) '*** Before tilt and shift '
11069  write (16, *) ' the reference particle and cog are distinct'
11070  write (16, 16) bvref, tref, tref*deg, wvref, bcog, tcog, tcog*deg, &
11071  encog - xmat
11072 16 format (2x, ' REF: BETA ', e12.5, ' T.O.F. ', e12.5, ' SEC OR ', &
11073  e12.5, ' DG', ' ENERGY ', e12.5, ' MeV', //, 2x, &
11074  ' COG: BETA ', e12.5, ' T.O.F. ', e12.5, ' SEC OR ', e12.5, &
11075  ' DG', ' ENERGY ', e12.5, ' MeV', /)
11076  end if
11077  do i = 1, ngood
11078  gapi = f(7, i)/xmat
11079  bepi = sqrt(1.-1./(gapi*gapi))
11080  fd(i) = bepi/bcour*gapi/gcour
11081  end do
11082  call ext2(1)
11083  ! shift of the ellipse in the longitudinal plane with regard to the
11084  ! cog (TILT)
11085  ! the slip of phase is : TIPHA
11086  ! the ellipsoid generated by GEBEAM and INPUT is upright
11087  ! qdispw=dispersion in energy
11088  qdispw = 2.*sqrt(exten(10))
11089  encrt = encog + qdispw
11090  gamcrt = encrt/xmat
11091  bcrt = sqrt(1.-1./(gamcrt*gamcrt))
11092  vcrt = bcrt*vl
11093  delv = vcrt - vcour
11094  ! shift of the ellipse in the transverse planes with regard to the cog
11095  ! DELTH ET DELPH: slips in xp and yp (mrd)
11096  ! horizontal plane
11097  delxp = 2.*sqrt(exten(5))
11098  ! vertical plane
11099  delyp = 2.*sqrt(exten(7))
11100  write (16, 22) qdispw, delxp, delyp
11101 22 format (' half size in energy ', e12.5, ' MeV', /, &
11102  ' half size in xp ', e12.5, ' mrd', /, ' half size in yp ', e12.5, &
11103  ' mrd')
11104  ! Shift of the ellipses in the phase spaces
11105  tcrt = 0.
11106  do i = 1, ngood
11107  gapi = f(7, i)/xmat
11108  bpai = sqrt(1.-1./(gapi*gapi))
11109  vpai = vl*bpai
11110  dv = (vpai-vcour)*tipha/(delv*fh)
11111  f(6, i) = f(6, i) - dv
11112  tcrt = tcrt + f(6, i)
11113  dlx = 0.
11114  dly = 0.
11115  if (delxp/=0.) dlx = f(3, i)*tix/delxp
11116  if (delyp/=0.) dly = f(5, i)*tiy/delyp
11117  f(2, i) = f(2, i) + dlx
11118  f(4, i) = f(4, i) + dly
11119  end do
11120  tcrt = tcrt/float(ngood)
11121  dtiph = 0.
11122  if (shifw/=0. .or. shifp/=0.) then
11123  shtref = shifp/fh
11124  enshift = encog + shifw
11125  gshift = enshift/xmat
11126  bshift = sqrt(1.-1./(gshift*gshift))
11127  eshift = enshift - xmat
11128  vshift = vl*bshift
11129  tshift = tcrt + shtref
11130  deltav = vshift - vcour
11131  deltat = tshift - tcog
11132  end if
11133  if (shifw==0. .and. shifp==0.) then
11134  enshift = encog
11135  eshift = enshift - xmat
11136  gshift = gcour
11137  vshift = vcour
11138  bshift = vshift/vl
11139  tshift = tcrt
11140  shtref = 0.
11141  deltav = 0.
11142  deltat = 0.
11143  end if
11144  do i = 1, ngood
11145  f(7, i) = f(7, i) + shifw
11146  gpai = f(7, i)/xmat
11147  bpai = sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
11148  f(6, i) = f(6, i) + shtref
11149  vapi = vl*bpai
11150  end do
11151  if (itwiss==1) tref = tref + tofini
11152  write (16, *) ' ***After tilt and shift '
11153  bvref = vref/vl
11154  gamref = 1./sqrt(1.-bvref*bvref)
11155  wvref = (gamref-1.)*xmat
11156  write (16, 16) bvref, tref, tref*deg, wvref, bshift, tshift, &
11157  tshift*deg, eshift
11158  do i = 1, ngood
11159  fo(7, i) = f(7, i)
11160  fo(2, i) = f(2, i)
11161  fo(3, i) = f(3, i)
11162  fo(4, i) = f(4, i)
11163  fo(5, i) = f(5, i)
11164  fo(6, i) = f(6, i)
11165  end do
11166  if (itwiss/=1) then
11167  dum = 0.
11168  write (11, *) ngood, dum, fh/(2000000.*pi)
11169  do i = 1, ngood
11170  f(2, i) = f(2, i) + centre(2)
11171  f(3, i) = f(3, i) + centre(3)
11172  f(4, i) = f(4, i) + centre(4)
11173  f(5, i) = f(5, i) + centre(5)
11174  f(6, i) = f(6, i) + centre(6)
11175  f(7, i) = f(7, i) + centre(1)
11176  etphas = fh*(f(6,i)-tcog)
11177  ! option etener=f(7,i)-encog
11178  etener = f(7, i) - xmat
11179  write (11, 777) f(2, i), f(3, i)/1000., f(4, i), &
11180  f(5, i)/1000., etphas, etener
11181  end do
11182 777 format (6(f13.8,1x))
11183  end if
11184  ! ENVELOPE
11185  call stapl(davtot*10.)
11186  return
11187  end subroutine tiltbm
11192  subroutine accept
11193  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
11194  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
11195  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
11196  common /tapes/in, ifile, meta
11197  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
11198  common /etcom/cog(8), exten(17), fd(iptsz)
11199  common /dyn/tref, vref
11200  common /dyni/vrefi, trefi, fhinit
11201  common /qmoyen/qmoy
11202  common /objet/fo(9, iptsz), imaxo
11203  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
11204  common /etcha1/dav2(maxcell1, 33), ichas(iptsz), chasit
11205  dimension back(9, iptsz)
11206  logical chasit
11207  common /mcs/imcs, ncstat, cstat(20)
11208  ! make statistics on initial beam using IEX at the point where
11209  ! the ACCEPT card has been placed
11210  write (16, *)
11211  write (16, *) 'Physical acceptance has:'
11212  write (16, *) imaxo, ' particles at origin'
11213  iprint = 1
11214  savfh = fh
11215  satref = tref
11216  savref = vref
11217  ! recall initial frequency
11218  fh = fhinit
11219  tref = trefi
11220  vref = vrefi
11221  ! save current beam
11222  do i = 1, 9
11223  do j = 1, ngood
11224  back(i, j) = f(i, j)
11225  end do
11226  end do
11227  ! original particle number is in f(1,j)
11228  ! F (I,8): =1 the particle is good, =0 the particle is lost
11229  ! recuperate original particle numbers and their coordinates
11230  ! next loop for graphics and file of good particles
11231  do j = 1, imax
11232  tprt = fh*fo(6, j)
11233  eprt = fo(7, j) - xmat
11234  f2 = fo(2, j)
11235  f3 = fo(3, j)/1000.
11236  f4 = fo(4, j)
11237  f5 = fo(5, j)/1000.
11238  nold = int(f(1,j))
11239  end do
11240  open (23, file='input_kept.dst', status='unknown')
11241  dummy = 0.
11242  write (23, *) ngood, dummy, fh/(2000000.*pi)
11243  do j = 1, ngood
11244  nold = int(f(1,j))
11245  do jj = 1, 9
11246  f(jj, j) = fo(jj, nold)
11247  end do
11248  tprt = fh*f(6, j)
11249  eprt = f(7, j) - xmat
11250  f2 = f(2, j)
11251  f3 = f(3, j)
11252  f4 = f(4, j)
11253  f5 = f(5, j)
11254  if (ncstat>1) then
11255  write (23, 101) f2, f3/1000., f4, f5/1000., tprt, eprt, &
11256  f(9, j)
11257  else
11258  write (23, 100) f2, f3/1000., f4, f5/1000., tprt, eprt
11259  end if
11260  end do
11261  close (23)
11262  ! now make graphics
11263  write (16, *) 'Starting good particles graphics for ACCEPT card'
11264  igrprm = 0
11265  call ytzp
11266  ! print out beam statistics
11267  call emiprt(0)
11268  ! next loop for graphics and file of lost particles
11269  open (23, file='input_lost.dst', status='unknown')
11270  dummy = 0.
11271  write (23, *) imax - ngood, dummy, fh/(2000000.*pi)
11272  j = 1
11273  ngd = ngood
11274  do k = ngood + 1, imax
11275  nold = int(f(1,k))
11276  do jj = 1, 9
11277  f(jj, j) = fo(jj, nold)
11278  end do
11279  tprt = fh*f(6, j)
11280  eprt = f(7, j) - xmat
11281  f2 = f(2, j)
11282  f3 = f(3, j)
11283  f4 = f(4, j)
11284  f5 = f(5, j)
11285  if (ncstat>1) then
11286  write (23, 101) f2, f3/1000., f4, f5/1000., tprt, eprt, &
11287  f(9, j)
11288  else
11289  write (23, 100) f2, f3/1000., f4, f5/1000., tprt, eprt
11290  end if
11291  j = j + 1
11292  end do
11293  ngood = imax - ngood
11294 100 format (6(f15.8,1x))
11295 101 format (7(f15.8,1x))
11296  close (23)
11297  ! now make graphics
11298  write (16, *) 'Starting lost particles graphics for ACCEPT card'
11299  igrprm = 0
11300  call ytzp
11301  ! print out beam statistics
11302  call emiprt(0)
11303  ! recall original coordinates
11304  ngood = ngd
11305  do i = 1, 9
11306  do j = 1, ngood
11307  f(i, j) = back(i, j)
11308  end do
11309  end do
11310  tref = satref
11311  vref = savref
11312  fh = savfh
11313  return
11314  end subroutine accept
11319  subroutine ytzp
11320  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
11321  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
11322  character *80 text, patitl
11323  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
11324  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
11325  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
11326  common /stis/suryth, surzph, enedep, ecogde, testca
11327  common /fene/wdisp, wphas, wx, wy, rlim, ifw
11328  common /dyn/tref, vref
11329  common /tapes/in, ifile, meta
11330  common /etcom/cog(8), exten(17), fd(iptsz)
11331  common /etcha1/dav2(maxcell1, 33), ichas(iptsz), chasit
11332  common /grparm/glim(4, 2), glim1(4, 2), glim2(4, 2), patitl, &
11333  ngraphs(100), idwdp, igrprm, ngrafs
11334  common /mcs/imcs, ncstat, cstat(20)
11335  common /zones/frms(6), nzone
11336  logical chasit
11337  dimension oldcog(7), slim(4, 2)
11338  ! real*4 xx(iptsz),yy(iptsz),cs(iptsz),axx,ayy
11339  dimension xx(iptsz), yy(iptsz), cs(iptsz)
11340 
11341  satref = tref
11342  savref = vref
11343  init = 0
11344  call area(init)
11345  if (igrprm==0) then
11346  ! READ GRAPH TITLE
11347  read (in, 20) text
11348 20 format (a)
11349  ! idwdp=0 cog=ref in ZZ' plot (for instance for Alvarez structure)
11350  ! idwdp=1 cog<>ref in ZZ' plot (for instance for IH structrure)
11351  read (in, *) idwdp, rmsmtp
11352  ! READ GRAPH LIMITS INTO GLIM(J,K), J=GRAPH NUMBER
11353  ! K=1 HOR. LIMIT , K=2 VERT. LIMIT
11354  read (in, *)((glim(j,k),k=1,2), j=1, 4)
11355  end if
11356  if (igrprm==1) then
11357  text = patitl
11358  end if
11359  if (igrprm==2) then
11360  text = patitl
11361  ! save limits in GLIM(j,k)
11362  do j = 1, 4
11363  do k = 1, 2
11364  slim(j, k) = glim(j, k)
11365  glim(j, k) = glim1(j, k)
11366  end do
11367  end do
11368  end if
11369  if (igrprm==3) then
11370  text = patitl
11371  ! save limits in GLIM(j,k)
11372  do j = 1, 4
11373  do k = 1, 2
11374  slim(j, k) = glim(j, k)
11375  glim(j, k) = glim2(j, k)
11376  end do
11377  end do
11378  end if
11379  do i = 1, ngood
11380  ichas(i) = 1
11381  end do
11382  iarg = 1
11383  call cdg(iarg)
11384  encog = cog(1)
11385  gcog = encog/xmat
11386  bcog = sqrt(1.-1./(gcog*gcog))
11387  tcog = cog(3)
11388  oldcog(1) = cog(4)
11389  oldcog(2) = cog(5)
11390  oldcog(3) = cog(6)
11391  oldcog(4) = cog(7)
11392  oldcog(5) = cog(3)
11393  oldcog(6) = cog(8)
11394  oldcog(7) = cog(1)
11395  enprt = encog - xmat
11396  teps = 1.e-08
11397  rmssz = sqrt(rmsmtp)
11398  iarg = 1
11399  call ext2(iarg)
11400  qdisp = rmssz*sqrt(exten(1))
11401  qmd = exten(1)*exten(3) - exten(2)*exten(2)
11402  qmdw = exten(10)*exten(3) - exten(11)*exten(11)
11403  surm = rmsmtp*180.*sqrt(qmd)
11404  qdp = rmssz*sqrt(exten(3))
11405  cor12 = exten(2)/sqrt(exten(1)*exten(3))
11406  pent12 = sqrt(exten(1)/exten(3))/cor12
11407  pent21 = sqrt(exten(1)/exten(3))*cor12
11408  qdpde = qdp*180./pi
11409  trqty = exten(4)*exten(5) - exten(8)*exten(8)
11410  trqpz = exten(6)*exten(7) - exten(9)*exten(9)
11411  suryth = rmsmtp*pi*sqrt(trqty)
11412  surzph = rmsmtp*pi*sqrt(trqpz)
11413  qditay = rmssz*sqrt(exten(4))
11414  qdiant = rmssz*sqrt(exten(5))
11415  qdita = rmssz*sqrt(exten(6))
11416  qdianp = rmssz*sqrt(exten(7))
11417  write (16, *) ' *** PLOT Ellips for ', rmsmtp, ' RMS'
11418  write (16, '(a)') text
11419  write (16, 1557) imax, ngood
11420 1557 format (1x, ' *** GRAPH, TOTAL NUMBER OF PARTICLES : ', i6, &
11421  ' PARTICLES KEPT : ', i6, //, ' *** HORIZONTAL phase plane ', /)
11422  write (16, 1553) cog(4), cog(5)
11423 1553 format (4x, ' C.O.G. :', 5x, ' X : ', e12.5, ' CM XP :', e12.5, &
11424  ' MRD', /)
11425  if (rmsmtp>teps) then
11426  write (16, 1552) qditay, qdiant, suryth
11427 1552 format (4x, ' 1/2 EXTENSION X : ', e12.5, ' CM', /, 4x, &
11428  ' 1/2 EXTENSION XP : ', e12.5, ' MRD', 4x, ' SURFACE : ', &
11429  e15.8, ' CM.MRD', /)
11430  end if
11431  write (16, 1554)
11432 1554 format (' *** VERTICAL phase plane ', /)
11433  write (16, 1556) cog(6), cog(7)
11434 1556 format (4x, ' C.O.G :', 5x, ' Y : ', e12.5, ' CM YP :', e12.5, &
11435  ' MRD', /)
11436  if (rmsmtp>teps) then
11437  write (16, 1555) qdita, qdianp, surzph
11438 1555 format (4x, ' 1/2 EXTENSION Y : ', e12.5, ' CM', /, 4x, &
11439  ' 1/2 EXTENSION YP : ', e12.5, ' MRD', 4x, ' SURFACE : ', &
11440  e15.8, ' CM.MRD', /)
11441  end if
11442  ! Store header and particle coordinates in binary file for
11443  ! graphics post-processor
11444 
11445  ! igrtyp is type of graph
11446  ! igrtyp=1 for ytzp emittance plots
11447  ! igrtyp=6 for ytzp emittance plots for multi-charge state beam
11448  ! igrtyp=11 for ytzp emittance plots with ZONES card
11449 
11450  igrtyp = 1
11451  if (nzone/=0) igrtyp = 11
11452  if (imcs==1) igrtyp = 6
11453  write (66, *) igrtyp
11454  if (igrtyp==6) then
11455  write (66, *) ncstat
11456  write (66, *)(cstat(j), j=1, ncstat)
11457  end if
11458  if (igrtyp==11) then
11459  write (66, *) nzone
11460  write (66, *)(frms(j), j=2, nzone), ' 0.'
11461  end if
11462  write (66, *) text
11463  xx(1) = glim(1, 1)
11464  yy(1) = glim(1, 2)
11465  write (66, *) - xx(1), xx(1), -yy(1), yy(1)
11466  ! first store ellips coordinates XX'
11467  step = qdiant/50.
11468  tta = exten(5)
11469  do i = 1, 101
11470  xii = -qdiant + step*float(i-1)
11471  yy(i) = xii + cog(5)
11472  yy(202-i) = yy(i)
11473  ttb = exten(8)*xii
11474  ttc = exten(4)*xii**2 - trqty*rmsmtp
11475  ttcb = ttb**2 - ttc*tta
11476  if (ttcb<=0.) ttcb = 0.
11477  if (tta==0.) then
11478  yi = 0.
11479  yii = 0.
11480  else
11481  quot = ttcb/tta**2
11482  yi = ttb/tta - sqrt(quot)
11483  yii = ttb/tta + sqrt(quot)
11484  end if
11485  xx(i) = yi + cog(4)
11486  xx(202-i) = yii + cog(4)
11487  end do
11488  do i = 1, 201
11489  write (66, *) xx(i), yy(i)
11490  end do
11491  do i = 1, ngood
11492  xx(i) = f(2, i)
11493  yy(i) = f(3, i)
11494  end do
11495  if (imcs==1) then
11496  do i = 1, ngood
11497  cs(i) = f(9, i)
11498  end do
11499  end if
11500  ! write particle coordinates to graphics file
11501  write (66, *) ngood
11502  if (imcs==0) then
11503  if (nzone==0) then
11504  do i = 1, ngood
11505  write (66, *) xx(i), yy(i)
11506  end do
11507  else
11508  do i = 1, ngood
11509  write (66, *) xx(i), yy(i), f(10, i)
11510  end do
11511  end if
11512  else
11513  do i = 1, ngood
11514  write (66, *) xx(i), yy(i), cs(i)
11515  end do
11516  end if
11517  ! YY' next
11518  xx(1) = glim(2, 1)
11519  yy(1) = glim(2, 2)
11520  write (66, *) - xx(1), xx(1), -yy(1), yy(1)
11521  ! first write ellips coordinates
11522  step = qdianp/50.
11523  tta = exten(7)
11524  do i = 1, 101
11525  xii = -qdianp + step*float(i-1)
11526  yy(i) = xii + cog(7)
11527  yy(202-i) = yy(i)
11528  ttb = exten(9)*xii
11529  ! TTC=exten(6)*XII**2-TRQPZ*4.
11530  ttc = exten(6)*xii**2 - trqpz*rmsmtp
11531  ttcb = ttb**2 - ttc*tta
11532  if (ttcb<=0.) ttcb = 0.
11533  if (tta==0.) then
11534  yi = 0.
11535  yii = 0.
11536  else
11537  quot = ttcb/tta**2
11538  yi = ttb/tta - sqrt(quot)
11539  yii = ttb/tta + sqrt(quot)
11540  end if
11541  xx(i) = yi + cog(6)
11542  xx(202-i) = yii + cog(6)
11543  end do
11544  do i = 1, 201
11545  write (66, *) xx(i), yy(i)
11546  end do
11547  do i = 1, ngood
11548  xx(i) = f(4, i)
11549  yy(i) = f(5, i)
11550  end do
11551  ! write particle coordinates to graphics file
11552  write (66, *) ngood
11553  if (imcs==0) then
11554  if (nzone==0) then
11555  do i = 1, ngood
11556  write (66, *) xx(i), yy(i)
11557  end do
11558  else
11559  do i = 1, ngood
11560  write (66, *) xx(i), yy(i), f(10, i)
11561  end do
11562  end if
11563  else
11564  do i = 1, ngood
11565  write (66, *) xx(i), yy(i), cs(i)
11566  end do
11567  end if
11568 
11569  ! 1400 CONTINUE
11570  ! TRACE GRAPHE ZZ'
11571  xx(1) = glim(3, 1)
11572  yy(1) = glim(3, 2)
11573  write (66, *) - xx(1), xx(1), -yy(1), yy(1)
11574 
11575  xx(1) = glim(4, 1)
11576  yy(1) = glim(4, 2)
11577  write (66, *) - xx(1), xx(1), -yy(1), yy(1)
11578  ! TRACE DE L ELLIPSE DE CONCENTRATION
11579  bref = vref/vl
11580  gref = 1./sqrt(1.-bref*bref)
11581  wref = xmat*(gref-1.)
11582  gcog = 1./sqrt(1.-bcog*bcog)
11583  wcog = xmat*(gcog-1.)
11584  write (16, 22) wref, tref, wcog, tcog
11585 22 format (' *** LONGITUDINAL phase plane ', /, 6x, ' REFERENCE : ', &
11586  ' ENERGY: ', e15.8, ' (MeV), TOF: ', e15.8, ' (SEC)', /, 6x, &
11587  ' COG : ', ' ENERGY: ', e15.8, ' (MeV), TOF: ', e15.8, &
11588  ' (SEC)', /)
11589  write (16, 167) qmd, surm, qdp, qdpde, qdisp, cor12, pent12, pent21
11590 167 format (3x, ' ***', ' 2nd ORDER MOMENTS :', e12.5, ' (RD DP/P)**2', &
11591  ' SURFACE : ', e12.5, ' (DEG DP/P)', /, 6x, &
11592  ' 1/2 EXTENSION PHASE : ', e12.5, ' RD ', ' OR ', e12.5, ' DEG', &
11593  /, 6x, ' 1/2 EXTENSION DISPERSION : ', e15.8, ' IN DP/P ', /, 6x, &
11594  ' CORRELATION COEF : ', e15.8, /, 6x, ' DISPERSION SLOPE: ', &
11595  e15.8, ' (DP/P)/RD ', /, 6x, ' PHASE SLOPE : ', e15.8, &
11596  ' (DP/P)/RD ')
11597  ! GRAPHE DE L ELLIPSE
11598  step = qdpde/50.
11599  tta = exten(3)*180.*180./(pi*pi)
11600  do i = 1, 101
11601  xii = -qdpde + step*float(i-1)
11602  xx(i) = xii
11603  xx(202-i) = xx(i)
11604  ttb = exten(11)*xii*180./pi
11605  ttc = exten(10)*xii**2 - qmdw*rmsmtp*180.*180./(pi*pi)
11606  ttcb = ttb**2 - ttc*tta
11607  if (ttcb<=0.) ttcb = 0.
11608  if (tta==0.) then
11609  yi = 0.
11610  yii = 0.
11611  else
11612  quot = ttcb/tta**2
11613  yi = ttb/tta - sqrt(quot)
11614  yii = ttb/tta + sqrt(quot)
11615  end if
11616  yy(i) = yi
11617  yy(202-i) = yii
11618  end do
11619  enihrf = 0.
11620  if (idwdp==0) then
11621  ! Alvarez
11622  do i = 1, 201
11623  write (66, *) xx(i), yy(i)
11624  end do
11625  else
11626  ! IH
11627  bref = vref/vl
11628  gref = 1./sqrt(1.-bref*bref)
11629  enihrf = xmat*(gref-1.)
11630  phihrf = fh*(tcog-tref)*180./pi
11631  do i = 1, 201
11632  axx = phihrf
11633  ayy = encog - enihrf - xmat
11634  write (66, *) xx(i) + axx, yy(i) + ayy
11635  end do
11636  end if
11637  ! write particle coordinates to graphics file
11638  do i = 1, ngood
11639  if (idwdp==0) then
11640  ! Alvarez like
11641  xx(i) = fh*(f(6,i)-tcog)*180./pi
11642  yy(i) = f(7, i) - encog
11643  if (imcs==1) cs(i) = f(9, i)
11644  end if
11645  if (idwdp==1) then
11646  ! IH like
11647  xx(i) = fh*(f(6,i)-tref)*180./pi
11648  yy(i) = f(7, i) - enihrf - xmat
11649  if (imcs==1) cs(i) = f(9, i)
11650  end if
11651  end do
11652  ! write particle coordinates to graphics file
11653  write (66, *) ngood
11654  if (imcs==0) then
11655  if (nzone==0) then
11656  do i = 1, ngood
11657  write (66, *) xx(i), yy(i)
11658  end do
11659  else
11660  do i = 1, ngood
11661  write (66, *) xx(i), yy(i), f(10, i)
11662  end do
11663  end if
11664  else
11665  do i = 1, ngood
11666  write (66, *) xx(i), yy(i), cs(i)
11667  end do
11668  end if
11669  ! plot emittance with chase (if applicable)
11670  ! if (chasit) call ytzprc(glim,oldcog,idwdp)
11671  if (igrprm==2 .or. igrprm==3) then
11672  ! restore limits in GLIM(j,k)
11673  do j = 1, 4
11674  do k = 1, 2
11675  glim(j, k) = slim(j, k)
11676  end do
11677  end do
11678  end if
11679  tref = satref
11680  vref = savref
11681  return
11682  end subroutine ytzp
11687  subroutine grcomp(text, iskale)
11688  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
11689  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
11690  character *80 text, patitl
11691  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
11692  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
11693  common /stis/suryth, surzph, enedep, ecogde, testca
11694  common /fene/wdisp, wphas, wx, wy, rlim, ifw
11695  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
11696  common /dyn/tref, vref
11697  common /tapes/in, ifile, meta
11698  common /etcom/cog(8), exten(17), fd(iptsz)
11699  common /etcha1/dav2(maxcell1, 33), ichas(iptsz), chasit
11700  common /grparm/glim(4, 2), glim1(4, 2), glim2(4, 2), patitl, &
11701  ngraphs(100), idwdp, igrprm, ngrafs
11702  common /mcs/imcs, ncstat, cstat(20)
11703  common /zones/frms(6), nzone
11704  common /hist/xpos(200), xn(200), ypos(200), yn(200), zpos(200), &
11705  zn(200), ixt, iyt, izt
11706  common /hist1/xps(200), xpn(200), yps(200), ypn(200), zps(200), &
11707  zpn(200), ixpt, iypt, izpt
11708  logical chasit
11709  ! real*4 xx(iptsz),yy(iptsz),cs(iptsz)
11710  dimension xx(iptsz), yy(iptsz), cs(iptsz)
11711  dimension slim(4, 2)
11712 
11713  tcog = 0.
11714  do i = 1, ngood
11715  tcog = f(6, i) + tcog
11716  end do
11717  tcog = tcog/float(ngood)
11718  if (igrprm==1) then
11719  text = patitl
11720  end if
11721  if (igrprm==2) then
11722  text = patitl
11723  ! save limits in GLIM(j,k)
11724  do j = 1, 4
11725  do k = 1, 2
11726  slim(j, k) = glim(j, k)
11727  glim(j, k) = glim1(j, k)
11728  end do
11729  end do
11730  end if
11731  if (igrprm==3) then
11732  text = patitl
11733  ! save limits in GLIM(j,k)
11734  do j = 1, 4
11735  do k = 1, 2
11736  slim(j, k) = glim(j, k)
11737  glim(j, k) = glim2(j, k)
11738  end do
11739  end do
11740  end if
11741  write (16, *)
11742  write (16, *) 'LIMITS', ((glim(j,k),k=1,2), j=1, 4)
11743  ! X-Z start
11744  xyliz = glim(4, 1)*vref*pi/(180.*fh)
11745  zlix = xyliz
11746  xlix = glim(3, 1)
11747  dstrly = glim(4, 2)
11748 
11749  ! Store header and particle coordinates in binary file for
11750  ! graphics post-processor
11751 
11752  ! igrtyp is type of graph
11753  ! igrtyp=2 for grcomp extra plots
11754  ! igrtyp=7 for grcomp extra plots with multi charge state beam
11755  ! igrtyp=12 for grcomp extra plots with ZONES card
11756  igrtyp = 2
11757  if (nzone/=0) igrtyp = 12
11758  if (imcs==1) igrtyp = 7
11759  ! igrtyp=2,7,12 --> normal scale in envelopes
11760  ! igrtyp=17,22,27 --> log scale in envelopes
11761  if (iskale==1) then
11762  write (66, *) igrtyp + 15
11763  write (66, *) dstrly
11764  else
11765  write (66, *) igrtyp
11766  end if
11767  if (igrtyp==7) then
11768  write (66, *) ncstat
11769  write (66, *)(cstat(j), j=1, ncstat)
11770  end if
11771  if (igrtyp==12) then
11772  write (66, *) nzone
11773  write (66, *)(frms(j), j=2, nzone), ' 0.'
11774  end if
11775  write (66, *) text
11776  ! new
11777  xx(1) = zlix
11778  yy(1) = xlix
11779  write (66, *) - xx(1), xx(1), -yy(1), yy(1)
11780  ! 120 CONTINUE
11781  if (imcs==1) then
11782  do i = 1, ngood
11783  cs(i) = f(9, i)
11784  end do
11785  end if
11786  if (idwdp==0) then
11787  ! Alvarez type (plot w.r.t. reference)
11788  do i = 1, ngood
11789  gpai = f(7, i)/xmat
11790  bpai = sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
11791  xx(i) = (tcog-f(6,i))*vl*bpai
11792  yy(i) = f(2, i)
11793  end do
11794  else
11795  ! IH type (plot w.r.t. centre of gravity)
11796  do i = 1, ngood
11797  gpai = f(7, i)/xmat
11798  bpai = sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
11799  xx(i) = (tref-f(6,i))*vl*bpai
11800  yy(i) = f(2, i)
11801  end do
11802  end if
11803  ! write particle coordinates to graphics file
11804  write (66, *) ngood
11805  if (imcs==0) then
11806  if (nzone==0) then
11807  do i = 1, ngood
11808  write (66, *) xx(i), yy(i)
11809  end do
11810  else
11811  do i = 1, ngood
11812  write (66, *) xx(i), yy(i), f(10, i)
11813  end do
11814  end if
11815  else
11816  do i = 1, ngood
11817  write (66, *) xx(i), yy(i), cs(i)
11818  end do
11819  end if
11820  ! Y-Z start
11821  zliy = xyliz
11822  zliy = glim(3, 2)
11823  xx(1) = zlix
11824  yy(1) = zliy
11825  write (66, *) - xx(1), xx(1), -yy(1), yy(1)
11826  ! 1200 CONTINUE
11827  if (idwdp==0) then
11828  ! Alvarez type (plot w.r.t. reference)
11829  do i = 1, ngood
11830  gpai = f(7, i)/xmat
11831  bpai = sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
11832  xx(i) = (tcog-f(6,i))*vl*bpai
11833  yy(i) = f(4, i)
11834  end do
11835  else
11836  ! IH type (plot w.r.t. centre of gravity)
11837  do i = 1, ngood
11838  gpai = f(7, i)/xmat
11839  bpai = sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
11840  xx(i) = (tref-f(6,i))*vl*bpai
11841  yy(i) = f(4, i)
11842  end do
11843  end if
11844  ! write particle coordinates to graphics file
11845  write (66, *) ngood
11846  if (imcs==0) then
11847  if (nzone==0) then
11848  do i = 1, ngood
11849  write (66, *) xx(i), yy(i)
11850  end do
11851  else
11852  do i = 1, ngood
11853  write (66, *) xx(i), yy(i), f(10, i)
11854  end do
11855  end if
11856  else
11857  do i = 1, ngood
11858  write (66, *) xx(i), yy(i), cs(i)
11859  end do
11860  end if
11861  ! 1400 CONTINUE
11862  ! beam profile plots for X,Y & Z
11863  call histgrm
11864  write (66, *) ixt
11865  do i = 1, ixt
11866  write (66, *) xpos(i), xn(i)
11867  end do
11868  write (66, *) iyt
11869  do i = 1, iyt
11870  write (66, *) ypos(i), yn(i)
11871  end do
11872  write (66, *) izt
11873  do i = 1, izt
11874  write (66, *) zpos(i), zn(i)
11875  end do
11876  ! beam profile plots for Xp,Yp & Zp
11877  write (66, *) ixpt
11878  do i = 1, ixpt
11879  write (66, *) xps(i), xpn(i)
11880  end do
11881  write (66, *) iypt
11882  do i = 1, iypt
11883  write (66, *) yps(i), ypn(i)
11884  end do
11885  write (66, *) izpt
11886  do i = 1, izpt
11887  write (66, *) zps(i), zpn(i)
11888  end do
11889  if (igrprm==2 .or. igrprm==3) then
11890  ! restore limits in GLIM(j,k)
11891  do j = 1, 4
11892  do k = 1, 2
11893  glim(j, k) = slim(j, k)
11894  end do
11895  end do
11896  end if
11897  return
11898  end subroutine grcomp
11908  subroutine restay
11909  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
11910  ! ****************************************************
11911  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
11912  common /ttfs/dynt(maxcell), dyntp(maxcell), dyntpp(maxcell), &
11913  dyne0(maxcell), dynph(maxcell), dynlg(maxcell), fhpar, nc
11914  common /posi/ist
11915  common /midgap/enmil, vapmi
11916  common /azmtch/dlg, xmcph, xmce
11917  common /azlist/icont, iprin
11918  common /itvole/itvol, imamin
11919  common /func/a(200), ylg, atte, ncel, nharm
11920  ! TRANSIT TIME COEFFICIENTS
11921  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
11922  common /ttfcb/t3k, t4k, s3k, s4k
11923  common /bedycp/phslip, eqvl, asdl, peqvl, pavph, xkp1, xkp2, aa, bb, &
11924  cc, dd, ee, pcrest, sqcttf
11925  common /jacob/gaks, gaps
11926  common /iter1/dxdki, dphii, phi, dkmske, dkmsphi, retph, xkmi, xkm, &
11927  dxk00, tke, t1ke, ske, s1ke, phiwc, xk1i, xk1ii, xk2ii
11928  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
11929  common /cell/yf(10000), xf(10000), xlim(15), flength, fhc, att, &
11930  npoint(15), ncell
11931  common /rfield/ifield
11932  common /qmoyen/qmoy
11933  common /rigid/boro
11934  common /cdek/dwp(iptsz)
11935  common /sc3/beamc, scdist, sce10, cplm, ect, apl, ichaes, iscsp
11936  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
11937  common /dyn/tref, vref
11938  common /compt/nrres, nrtre, nrbunc, nrdbun
11939  common /compt1/ndtl, ncavmc, ncavnm
11940  common /fene/wdisp, wphas, wx, wy, rlim, ifw
11941  common /tapes/in, ifile, meta
11942  common /ranec1/dummy(6)
11943  common /etcom/cog(8), exten(17), fd(iptsz)
11944  common /speda/dave, idave
11945  common /shif/dtiph, shift
11946  common /davcom/dav1(maxcell1, 40), davtot, iitem(maxcell1), idav
11947  common /etcha1/dav2(maxcell1, 33), ichas(iptsz), chasit
11948  common /dcspa/iesp
11949  common /pltprf/sprfx(3000), sprfy(3000), sprfl(3000), sprfw(3000), &
11950  sprfp(3000), sprng(3000), iprf
11951  common /appel/irstay, ilost, iavp, ispcel
11952  common /posc/xpsc
11953  common /pstpla/tstp
11954  common /femt/iemgrw, iemqesg
11955  common /mode/eflvl, rflvl
11956  common /aerp/vphase, vfield, ierpf
11957  common /tofev/ttvols
11958  ! **** reference
11959  ! **** DWRFS(MeV): energy gain
11960  ! **** SPHRFS(rad):phase jump
11961  ! **** PHRFS(rad):phase
11962  ! **** common/parmrf/DWRFS,SPHRFS,PHRFS,ngdrf
11963  logical iesp, ichaes, irstay, iavp, ispcel, ifield, iemgrw
11964  logical shift, chasit, itvol, imamin, dave
11965  character *1 cr
11966  ! ************************************************************
11967  ! XESLN : NEGATIVE LENGHT OF THE DRIFT FOLLOWING THE GAP
11968  ! IF XESLN N.E.0 THEN THE CHARGE SPACE EFFECT IMPLIES THE
11969  ! LENGTH (YLG-XESLN)
11970  nrres = nrres + 1
11971  ncavmc = ncavmc + 1
11972  ! allow for print out on terminal of gap# on one and the same line
11973  cr = char(13)
11974  write (6, 8254) nrtre, nrres, cr
11975 8254 format ('Transport element:', i5, ' Accelerating element:', i5, &
11976  a1, $)
11977  write (16, *) ' CAVITY N :', nrres
11978  ilost = 0
11979  aqst = abs(qst)
11980  qmoy = aqst
11981  ! --- the frequency fh may be changed with delfh
11982  oldfh = fh
11983  ! IDUM : dummy variable (indicate in input file the number of the
11984  ! cavity)
11985  read (in, *) idum
11986 
11987  ! --- XESLN (cm): difference between the length of the field YLG and
11988  ! the physical length of the cavity
11989  ! (The space charge is acting on the length (YLG-XESLN) )
11990  ! dphase (deg): phase offset from the phase crest (giving the maximum
11991  ! of energy gain)
11992  ! FFIELD : in percent;
11993  ! (electric field)=(initial electric field)*(1.+FFIELD/100)
11994  ! isec: flag
11995  ! isec = 0 : The crest phase (or the valley) is adjusted at the
11996  ! entrance of the accelerating element
11997  ! isec = 1 : The crest phase (or the valley)is adjusted at the middle
11998  ! of the accelerating element
11999 
12000  ! idum is for compatability with CAVNUM
12001  read (in, *) xesln, dphase, ffield, isec, idum
12002  ffield = 1. + ffield/100.
12003  if (ifield) then
12004  ! --- The field is read on the disk in file 'field.txt' in the
12005  ! form:
12006  ! z (cm) E(z) MV/cm
12007  ! fhc: frequency of the cavity (Hertz) (read in the file
12008  ! 'field.txt' )
12009  fh = fhc*2.*pi
12010  ncel = ncell
12011  atte = att
12012  ye0 = atte
12013  ! flength : length of the field (cm)
12014  ylg = flength
12015  scdist = ylg - abs(xesln)
12016  else
12017  ! --- The field is read in the input list in the form of a Fourier
12018  ! series
12019  oldfh = fh
12020  ! atte: factor acting on the amplitude of the field (read in the
12021  ! input list)
12022  ye0 = atte
12023  scdist = ylg - abs(xesln)
12024  end if
12025  dphete = dphase
12026  if (itvol .and. imamin) then
12027  ! --- adjustment of the phase offset w.r.t. the t.o.f. (deg)
12028  ottvol = fh*ttvols*180./pi
12029  attvol = ottvol
12030  xkpi = ottvol/360.
12031  ixkpi = int(xkpi)
12032  xkpi = (xkpi-float(ixkpi))*360.
12033  dphase = dphase - xkpi
12034  end if
12035  ! --- iesp, irstay and ispcel: logical flags for space charge
12036  ! computations
12037  iesp = .false.
12038  irstay = .true.
12039  ispcel = .true.
12040  ! --- dwp(*): array reserved to space charge computations
12041  do i = 1, iptsz
12042  dwp(i) = 0.
12043  end do
12044  write (16, 150) fh/(2.*pi), ylg, atte, ffield, ncel
12045 150 format (4x, 'FREQUENCY :', e12.5, ' Hertz', /, 4x, 'FIELD LENGTH :', &
12046  e12.5, ' cm', /, 4x, 'FIELD FACTOR (UNITS CONVERSION) :', e12.5, &
12047  /, 4x, 'FIELD FACTOR (ATTENUATION) :', f12.6, /, 4x, &
12048  'FIELD DIVIDED IN: ', i4, ' SECTIONS ')
12049  if (.not. imamin) write (16, *) ' PHASE OFFSET: ', dphete, ' DEG'
12050  if (imamin) write (16, 1501) dphete, dphase, xkpi
12051 1501 format (4x, 'PHASE OFFSET (before adjustment): ', e12.5, ' deg', /, &
12052  4x, 'PHASE OFFSET (after adjustment): ', e12.5, ' deg', /, 4x, &
12053  'ADJUSTMENT ON THE PHASE OFFSET: ', e12.5, ' deg')
12054  beref = vref/vl
12055  fh0 = fh/vl
12056  ! --- prediction of transit time factors TK and SK based on the
12057  ! velocity at the entrance
12058  tk = tta0(beref)/2.*ffield
12059  sk = tsb0(beref)/2.*ffield
12060  ! --- prediction of PCREST (phase of RF giving the maximum of energy
12061  ! gain in the cavity)
12062  pcrest = atan(-sk/tk)
12063  ddwc = aqst*(tk*cos(pcrest)-sk*sin(pcrest))
12064  if (ddwc<0.) pcrest = pcrest + pi
12065  ! --- ttvol: time of flight at entrance (sec)
12066  ttvol = 0.
12067  if (itvol) ttvol = ttvols*fh
12068  ! start file 'short.data'
12069  ! --- dav1(idav,3)=0: the particle reference and the cog coincide at
12070  ! the input
12071  ! --- dav1(idav,3)=1: the particle reference and the cog are
12072  ! independent
12073  dav1(idav, 3) = 0.
12074  idav = idav + 1
12075  iitem(idav) = 1
12076  dav1(idav, 1) = ylg*10.
12077  dav1(idav, 2) = ye0*100.
12078  tstp = (davtot+ylg*xpsc)*10.
12079  davtot = davtot + ylg
12080  dav1(idav, 24) = davtot*10.
12081  dav1(idav, 40) = fh
12082  if (iprf==1) call stapl(dav1(idav,24))
12083  iarg = 1
12084  call cdg(iarg)
12085  enold = cog(1)
12086  encog = enold
12087  gcog = enold/xmat
12088  bcog = sqrt(1.-1./(gcog*gcog))
12089  tcog = cog(3)
12090  if (shift) then
12091  ! --- the reference particle and the cog are independent
12092  beref = vref/vl
12093  gamref = 1./sqrt(1.-(beref*beref))
12094  enref = xmat*gamref
12095  trefdg = tref*fh*180./pi
12096  dav1(idav, 3) = 1.
12097  else
12098  ! --- the reference particle and the cog are coinciding
12099  beref = bcog
12100  vref = bcog*vl
12101  tref = tcog
12102  gamref = gcog
12103  enref = cog(1)
12104  dav1(idav, 3) = 0.
12105  end if
12106  ! --- the reference particle is put in the array f(10,iptsz) at the
12107  ! position ngdrf = ngood + 1
12108  ! **** ngdrf=ngood+1
12109  ! **** BEREF=VREF/VL
12110  ! **** GAMREF=1./SQRT(1.-(BEREF*BEREF))
12111  ! **** ENREF=XMAT*GAMREF
12112  ! **** f(1,ngdrf)=ngdrf
12113  ! **** f(2,ngdrf)=0.
12114  ! **** f(3,ngdrf)=0.
12115  ! **** f(4,ngdrf)=0.
12116  ! **** f(5,ngdrf)=0.
12117  ! **** f(6,ngdrf)=tref
12118  ! **** f(7,ngdrf)=enref
12119  ! **** f(8,ngdrf)=1.
12120  ! **** f(9,ngdrf)=qst
12121  ! **** f(10,ngdrf)=0.
12122  if (dav1(idav,3)==1.) write (16, *) &
12123  ' ****reference and cog evolve independently'
12124  if (dav1(idav,3)==0.) write (16, *) ' **** the reference is the cog '
12125  write (16, 178)
12126 178 format (/, ' Dynamics at the input', /, 5x, &
12127  ' BETA GAMMA ENERGY(MeV) ', &
12128  ' TOF(deg) TOF(sec)')
12129  write (16, 1788) bcog, gcog, encog - xmat, tcog*fh*180./pi, tcog
12130 1788 format (' COG ', f7.5, 3x, e12.5, 1x, e12.5, 3x, e12.5, 3x, e12.5)
12131  enrprin = enref - xmat
12132  write (16, 165) beref, gamref, enrprin, tref*fh*180./pi, tref
12133 165 format (' REF ', f7.5, 3x, e12.5, 1x, e12.5, 3x, e12.5, 3x, e12.5)
12134  tofprt = tref
12135  iprint = 0
12136  call statis
12137  xk1 = fh/vref
12138  ! --- prediction of transit time factors based on an average value of
12139  ! velocity
12140  ddw = aqst*(tk*cos(pcrest)-sk*sin(pcrest))
12141  enrefs = enref + ddw
12142  gams = enrefs/xmat
12143  bets = sqrt(1.-1./(gams*gams))
12144  bemy = (gams+gamref)/(gams*bets+gamref*beref)
12145  bemy = 1./bemy
12146  tk0 = tta0(bemy)/2.*ffield
12147  tpk0 = tta1(bemy)/2.*ffield
12148  tppk0 = tta2(bemy)/2.*ffield
12149  tp3k0 = tta3(bemy)/2.*ffield
12150  tp4k0 = tta4(bemy)/2.*ffield
12151  sk0 = tsb0(bemy)/2.*ffield
12152  spk0 = tsb1(bemy)/2.*ffield
12153  sppk0 = tsb2(bemy)/2.*ffield
12154  sp3k0 = tsb3(bemy)/2.*ffield
12155  sp4k0 = tsb4(bemy)/2.*ffield
12156  tk = tk0
12157  t1k = tpk0
12158  t2k = tppk0
12159  t3k = tp3k0
12160  t4k = tp4k0
12161  sk = sk0
12162  s1k = spk0
12163  s2k = sppk0
12164  s3k = sp3k0
12165  s4k = sp4k0
12166  ! ---- prediction of PCREST (crest phase) based on the actual
12167  ! coefficients factors T and S
12168  pcrest = atan(-sk0/tk0)
12169  ddwc = aqst*(tk*cos(pcrest)-sk*sin(pcrest))
12170  if (ddwc<0.) pcrest = pcrest + pi
12171  ! --- the routine crest is computing the equivalent field lenght: EQVL
12172  call crest(bemy, eqvl, xpos, sqcttf, ffield)
12173  ! --- follow computations of the parameters:
12174  ! equivalent field length (cm)
12175  ! asociated drift length (cm)
12176  ! slip of phase (rad)
12177  ! energy gain (MeV)
12178  ! phase jump (rad)
12179  ! average k (=frequency/velocity) (cm-1)
12180  ! transit time coefficients (MeV,cm)
12181  ! crest phase (rd)
12182  ! phase of RF at entrance (rd)
12183  saphi = pcrest
12184  ! --- start iterations: improve the average velocity and the transit
12185  ! time factors
12186  do it = 1, 3
12187  dts = (tk*t1k+sk*s1k)/(tk*tk+sk*sk)
12188  fk1 = 2.*dts
12189  eqvlp = eqvl
12190  ! --- computation of the phase slip: PHSLIP
12191  phslip = -4.*atan(3.2*dts/eqvl)
12192  if (phslip/=0.) then
12193  til2 = phslip/2.
12194  do iiii = 1, 4
12195  gx = 1./tan(til2) - 1./til2 - fk1/eqvlp
12196  gpx = -1./(sin(til2)*sin(til2)) + 1./(til2*til2)
12197  til2 = til2 - gx/gpx
12198  hx = 1./tan(til2) - 1./til2
12199  eqvlp = fk1/hx
12200  end do
12201  phslip = til2*2.
12202  end if
12203  peqvl = xpos
12204  asdl = peqvl - eqvl/2.
12205  f0 = xitl0(gamref, gams, bemy, saphi, aqst)
12206  delwrm = (f0-gamref)*xmat
12207  enrs = enref + delwrm
12208  gams = enrs/xmat
12209  bets = sqrt(1.-1./(gams*gams))
12210  ! --- computation of the jump of phase:DELPHR
12211  coeph = fh*aqst/(vl*xmat)
12212  f3 = xitl3(gamref, gams, bemy, it, saphi, aqst)
12213  delphr = coeph*f3
12214  xk2 = fh0/bets
12215  xkm = delphr/eqvl + xk2*(1.+asdl/eqvl) - xk1*asdl/eqvl
12216  bemy = fh0/xkm
12217  ! --- computations of transit time factors
12218  tk = tta0(bemy)/2.*ffield
12219  t1k = tta1(bemy)/2.*ffield
12220  sk = tsb0(bemy)/2.*ffield
12221  s1k = tsb1(bemy)/2.*ffield
12222  end do
12223  ! --- crest phase PCREST (after iterations)
12224  pcrest = atan(-sk/tk)
12225  ddwc = aqst*(tk*cos(pcrest)-sk*sin(pcrest))
12226  if (ddwc<0.) pcrest = pcrest + pi
12227  dcemd = 0.
12228  ! --- isec = 0: the phase offset is given relative to the entrance of
12229  ! the cavity
12230  ! --- isec = 1: the phase offset is given relative to the middle of
12231  ! the cavity
12232  ! --- (vapmi has been computed in the function XITL3 (in deg) )
12233  if (isec/=0) then
12234  imedi = int(vapmi/360.+.4)
12235  dcemd = vapmi - 360.*imedi
12236  write (16, 773) nrres, enmil, vapmi, dcemd
12237 773 format (2x, ' AT THE MIDDLE OF THE CAVITY:', i4, /, 2x, &
12238  ' *ENERGY :', e12.5, ' MEV *PHASE :', e12.5, ' DEG', 2x, &
12239  ' *SLIP OF PHASE :', e12.5, ' deg', /)
12240  dcemd = dcemd*pi/180.
12241  end if
12242  ! SAPHI: phase of RF w.r.t. the phase offset
12243  dphase = dphase*pi/180.
12244  saphi = pcrest + dphase + ttvol - dcemd
12245  ddw = aqst*(tk0*cos(saphi)-sk0*sin(saphi))
12246  enrs = enref + ddw
12247  gams = enrs/xmat
12248  ! --- start new iterations to improve:
12249  ! transit time factors
12250  ! phase slip
12251  ! jump of phase
12252  ! crest phase
12253  ! phase of RF
12254 
12255  sapho = saphi
12256  do it = 1, 3
12257  dts = (tk*t1k+sk*s1k)/(tk*tk+sk*sk)
12258  fk1 = 2.*dts
12259  eqvlp = eqvl
12260  phslip = -4.*atan(3.2*dts/eqvl)
12261  if (phslip/=0.) then
12262  til2 = phslip/2.
12263  do iiii = 1, 3
12264  gx = 1./tan(til2) - 1./til2 - fk1/eqvlp
12265  gpx = -1./(sin(til2)*sin(til2)) + 1./(til2*til2)
12266  til2 = til2 - gx/gpx
12267  hx = 1./tan(til2) - 1./til2
12268  eqvlp = fk1/hx
12269  end do
12270  phslip = til2*2.
12271  end if
12272  peqvl = xpos
12273  asdl = peqvl - eqvl/2.
12274  ! --- ENERGY GAIN AND PHASE JUMP
12275  f0 = xitl0(gamref, gams, bemy, saphi, aqst)
12276  delwrm = (f0-gamref)*xmat
12277  enrs = enref + delwrm
12278  gams = enrs/xmat
12279  bets = sqrt(1.-1./(gams*gams))
12280  xk2 = fh0/bets
12281  ! --- DELPHR: jump of phase
12282  coeph = fh*aqst/(vl*xmat)
12283  f2 = xitl3(gamref, gams, bemy, it, saphi, aqst)
12284  delphr = coeph*f2
12285  ! --- XKM: average k = frequency/velocity)
12286  xkm = delphr/eqvl + xk2*(1.+asdl/eqvl) - xk1*asdl/eqvl
12287  bemy = fh0/xkm
12288  ! --- TRANSIT TIME FACTORS (based on the velocity BEMY)
12289  tk = tta0(bemy)/2.*ffield
12290  t1k = tta1(bemy)/2.*ffield
12291  t2k = tta2(bemy)/2.*ffield
12292  t3k = tta3(bemy)/2.*ffield
12293  t4k = tta4(bemy)/2.*ffield
12294  sk = tsb0(bemy)/2.*ffield
12295  s1k = tsb1(bemy)/2.*ffield
12296  s2k = tsb2(bemy)/2.*ffield
12297  s3k = tsb3(bemy)/2.*ffield
12298  s4k = tsb4(bemy)/2.*ffield
12299  pcrest = atan(-sk/tk)
12300  ddwc = aqst*(tk*cos(pcrest)-sk*sin(pcrest))
12301  if (ddwc<0.) pcrest = pcrest + pi
12302  dphii = (xk1-xk2)*eqvl/10. + (xkp1+xkp2)/120.*eqvl*eqvl + &
12303  (xk1-xkm)*asdl
12304  ! --- phase of RF
12305  ! *2011*July*16 DPHII sign
12306  ! *2011 SV SAPHI=PCREST+DPHASE+TTVOL-DCEMD+DPHII
12307  ! *2011 ET SAPHI=PCREST+DPHASE+TTVOL-DCEMD-DPHII
12308  saphi = pcrest + dphase + ttvol - dcemd + dphii
12309  end do
12310  savph = saphi*180./pi
12311  ! REFERENCE PARTICLE BASED ON CHARGE STATE: QMOY = ABS(QST)
12312  cfh = fh/(vl*2.*xmat)
12313  ckh = qmoy*qmoy/(4.*xmat*xmat)
12314  dphii = (xk1-xk2)*eqvl/10. + (xkp1+xkp2)/120.*eqvl*eqvl + &
12315  (xk1-xkm)*asdl
12316  phares = saphi + xk2*ylg + delphr
12317  ! ***** TEST
12318  ! DITEMP=(2.*XK1*ASDL+XKM*(EQVL-ASDL)+
12319  ! x XK2*(YLG-(EQVL+ASDL)))/FH+DELPHR/FH
12320  ! cc DITEMP=(XK1*ASDL+XKM*(EQVL)+
12321  ! cc x XK2*(YLG-(EQVL+ASDL)))/FH+DELPHR/FH
12322  trefs = tref + (xk2*ylg+delphr)/fh
12323  ! cc TREFS1=TREF+DITEMP
12324  ! cc write(6,*) 'trefs trefs1 ',trefs,trefs1
12325  ! cc pause
12326  ! ****************************
12327  phared = (phares-saphi)*180./pi
12328  tredg = fh*trefs*180./pi
12329  ! ****** REFERENCE BASED ON THE AVERAGE CHARGE STATE QMOY (if several
12330  ! charges state)
12331  ! ******* CFH=FH/(VL*2.*XMAT)
12332  ! ****** CKH=QMOY*QMOY/(4.*XMAT*XMAT)
12333  ! ****** save the energy and the T.O.F of the particle reference at
12334  ! the input of the cavity
12335  ! ****** enri=f(7,ngdrf)
12336  ! ***** trefi=f(6,ngdrf)
12337  ! ***** call gap(gamref,saphi,gams,delphr)
12338  ! ***** trefs and enrs: time of flight and energy of the reference and
12339  ! the output of the cavity
12340  ! ***** trefs=f(6,ngdrf)
12341  ! ***** enrs=f(7,ngdrf)
12342  ! ***** grefs=f(7,ngdrf)/xmat
12343  ! ***** bets=sqrt(grefs*grefs-1.)/grefs
12344  ! ***** dwrfs=enrs-enri
12345  ! ***** PHARES=SAPHI+XK2*YLG+DELPHR
12346  ! ***** TREFS=TREF+(XK2*YLG+DELPHR)/FH
12347  ! ***** TREDG=fh*TREFS *180./PI
12348  write (16, *) ' PARAMETERS RELATING TO THE REFERENCE PARTICLE '
12349  write (16, *) '***********************************************'
12350  write (16, *) ' ENERGY GAIN(MeV) ', delwrm, ' TOF ', tredg, ' DEG'
12351  write (16, *) ' PHASE JUMP(DG) ', delphr*180./pi
12352  write (16, *) ' SLIP OF PHASE AT THE INPUT(DG) ', sapho*180./pi
12353  write (16, *) ' PHASE OF RF AT ENTRANCE(DG) ', savph
12354  write (16, *) ' AVERAGE k (cm-1) (freq./velocity): ', xkm
12355  write (16, *) ' Associated drift length ', asdl, ' (cm)'
12356  write (16, *) ' Equivalent field length ', eqvl, ' cm center at ', &
12357  xpos, ' cm'
12358  write (16, *) ' TRANSIT TIME FACTORS AND DERIVATIVES (MeV,cm):'
12359  write (16, *) ' T ', tk, t1k, t2k, t3k, t4k
12360  write (16, *) ' S ', sk, s1k, s2k, s3k, s4k
12361  write (16, *) ' PHASE SLIP(DEG) ', phslip*180./pi
12362  write (16, *) ' CREST PHASE OF RF (DEG) ', pcrest*180./pi
12363  write (16, *) ' MAGNITUDE ', sqcttf, ' MV/cm'
12364  t0s = sqrt(tk*tk+sk*sk)
12365  write (16, *) ' T0 ', t0s
12366  ! ********************************************************************
12367  !*****
12368  call gap(gamref, saphi, gams, delphr)
12369  iarg = 1
12370  call cdg(iarg)
12371  encog = cog(1)
12372  gcog = encog/xmat
12373  bcog = sqrt(1.-1./(gcog*gcog))
12374  tcog = cog(3)
12375  call ext2d(1)
12376  ! print in file 'short.data'
12377  ! 3.12.09 phnew=-(int(tcog*fh/pi+0.5)-tcog*fh/pi)*180.
12378  ! 3.12.09 dav1(idav,6)=encog-xmat
12379  ! 3.12.09 dav1(idav,7)=phnew
12380  if (itvol) then
12381  dav1(idav, 38) = dphete
12382  dav1(idav, 39) = dphase*180./pi
12383  else
12384  dav1(idav, 38) = dphete
12385  end if
12386  write (16, 3777)
12387 3777 format (/, ' Dynamics at the output', /, 5x, &
12388  ' BETA dW(MeV) ENERGY(MeV) ', ' TOF(deg) TOF(sec)' &
12389  )
12390  engain = encog - enold
12391  write (16, 3473) bets, delwrm, enrs - xmat, fh*trefs*180./pi, trefs
12392 3473 format (' REF ', f7.5, 3x, f10.6, 3x, e12.5, 3x, e12.5, 3x, e12.5)
12393  write (16, 1789) bcog, engain, encog - xmat, tcog*fh*180./pi, tcog
12394 1789 format (' COG ', f7.5, 3x, f10.6, 3x, e12.5, 3x, e12.5, 3x, e12.5)
12395  testca = exten(1)*exten(2)*exten(3)
12396  ! epsil=1.E-20
12397  epsil = 1.e-40
12398  if (abs(testca)>epsil) then
12399  qdisp = 2.*sqrt(exten(1))
12400  qmd = exten(1)*exten(3) - exten(2)**2
12401  sqmdv = 4.*pi*sqrt(qmd)
12402  surm = 4.*pi*sqrt(qmd)*180./pi
12403  qdp = 2.*sqrt(exten(3))
12404  cor12 = exten(2)/sqrt(exten(1)*exten(3))
12405  ! omment PENT12=SQRT(exten(1)/exten(3))/COR12
12406  ! omment PENT21=SQRT(exten(1)/exten(3))*COR12
12407  qdpde = qdp*180./pi
12408  else
12409  qdisp = 0.
12410  qmd = 0.
12411  sqmdv = 0.
12412  surm = 0.
12413  qdp = 0.
12414  cor12 = 0.
12415  pent12 = 0.
12416  pent21 = 0.
12417  qdpde = 0.
12418  end if
12419  trqtx = exten(4)*exten(5) - exten(8)**2
12420  trqpy = exten(6)*exten(7) - exten(9)**2
12421  qditax = 2.*sqrt(exten(4))
12422  qdiant = 2.*sqrt(exten(5))
12423  qditay = 2.*sqrt(exten(6))
12424  qdianp = 2.*sqrt(exten(7))
12425  surxth = 4.*pi*sqrt(trqtx)
12426  suryph = 4.*pi*sqrt(trqpy)
12427  if (shift) then
12428  vref = bets*vl
12429  tref = trefs
12430  else
12431  vref = bcog*vl
12432  tref = tcog
12433  end if
12434  if (itvol) then
12435  ttvols = tref
12436  ! omment dphete=dgphr
12437  ! omment attvol=fh*ttvols*180./pi
12438  ! omment write(16,7456) ottvol,attvol
12439  end if
12440  ! omment 7456 format(2x,'***tof at the input: ',e12.5,' deg',/,
12441  ! omment * 2x,'***tof at the output: ',e12.5,' deg')
12442  call statis
12443  ! ENVEL
12444  call stapl(dav1(idav,24))
12445  ! omment WRITE(16,9998) SQMDV
12446  ! omment9998 FORMAT(2X,' EMITTANCE (norm): ',
12447  ! omment * E12.5,' PI*MEV*RAD')
12448  dav1(idav, 16) = bcog*surxth*10./(pi*sqrt(1.-bcog*bcog))
12449  ! 3.12.09 dav1(idav,17)=surxth*10./pi
12450 
12451  dav1(idav, 21) = bcog*suryph*10./(pi*sqrt(1.-bcog*bcog))
12452  dav1(idav, 25) = nrres
12453  dav1(idav, 30) = ngood
12454 
12455  ! print in the file: 'dynac.dmp':
12456  ! gap number, phase offset(deg), relativistic beta, energy(MeV), horz.
12457  ! emit.(mm*mrd,norm), vert. emit.(mm*mrd,norm),long. emit(keV*sec)
12458 
12459  ! --- dav1(idav,16): Emittance(norm) x-xp (mm*mrad)
12460  ! --- dav1(idav,21): Emittance(norm) y-yp (mm*mrad)
12461  emns = 1.e12*sqmdv/(pi*fh)
12462  ! et2010s
12463  tcgprt = fh*tcog*180./pi
12464  trfprt = fh*tref*180./pi
12465  ! cavity number, z (m), transmission (%), synchronous phase (deg),
12466  ! time of flight (deg) (reference),
12467  ! COG relativistic beta (@ output), COG output energy (MeV), REF
12468  ! relativistic beta (@ output), REF output energy (MeV),
12469  ! horizontal emittance (mm.mrad, RMS normalized), vertical emittance
12470  ! (mm.mrad, RMS normalized),
12471  ! longitudinal emittance (RMS, ns.keV)
12472  trnsms = 100.*float(ngood)/float(imax)
12473  if (ncavmc==1) write (50, *) '# cavmc.dmp'
12474  if (ncavmc==1) write (50, *) '# cav Z trans ', &
12475  'PHIs TOF(COG) COG Wcog TOF(REF) ', &
12476  ' REF Wref Ex,RMS,n Ey,RMS,n El,RMS'
12477  if (ncavmc==1) write (50, *) '# # (m) (%) ', &
12478  '(deg) (deg) beta (MeV) (deg) ', &
12479  ' beta (MeV) (mm.mrad) (mm.mrad) (ns.keV)'
12480  write (50, 7023) nrres, 0.001*dav1(idav, 24), trnsms, dphete, tcgprt, &
12481  bcog, encog - xmat, trfprt, bets, enrs - xmat, &
12482  0.25*dav1(idav, 16), 0.25*dav1(idav, 21), 0.25*emns
12483 7023 format (1x, i4, 1x, e12.5, 1x, f6.2, 1x, f7.2, 1x, &
12484  2(e14.7,1x,f7.5,1x,e14.7,1x), 3(e12.5,1x))
12485  ! et2010e
12486  fh = oldfh
12487  ! new magnetic rigidity of the reference
12488  gref = 1./sqrt(1.-bets*bets)
12489  xmor = xmat*bets*gref
12490  boro = 33.356*xmor*1.e-01/aqst
12491  write (16, *) ilost, ' particles lost in cavity ', nrres
12492  call emiprt(0)
12493  return
12494  end subroutine restay
12503  subroutine fieldcav(atte)
12504  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
12505  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
12506  common /rfield/ifield
12507  common /cell/yf(10000), xf(10000), xlim(15), flength, fhc, att, &
12508  npoint(15), ncell
12509  common /spl/xspl(4000), yspl(4000), s(5000), p(5000), q(5000)
12510  common /mode/eflvl, rflvl
12511  common /cavnum1/xnh, xpas, ffield, npt
12512  logical ifield
12513 
12514  part = 1.
12515  ifield = .true.
12516  read (20, *) fhc
12517  ! nov02 att=att*(1.+eflvl)
12518  att = atte
12519  read (20, *) xspl(1), yspl(1)
12520  yspl(1) = yspl(1)*att
12521  xspl(1) = xspl(1)*100.
12522  npt = 2
12523  do i = 2, 4000
12524  read (20, *) xspl(i), yspl(i)
12525  if (xspl(i)==0.) go to 10
12526  xspl(i) = xspl(i)*100.
12527  yspl(i) = yspl(i)*att
12528  npt = npt + 1
12529  end do
12530 10 continue
12531  npt = npt - 1
12532  call deriv2(npt)
12533  xpas = (xspl(3)-xspl(2))/part
12534  xcour = xspl(1)
12535  nfpt = 1
12536  do i = 1, 10000
12537  if (xcour>xspl(npt)) go to 20
12538  yf(i) = spline(npt, xcour)
12539  xf(i) = xcour
12540  xcour = xcour + xpas
12541  nfpt = nfpt + 1
12542  end do
12543 20 continue
12544  ! * valero mars 2006
12545  xlimf = xspl(npt)
12546  xf(nfpt) = 0.
12547  ! omment yf(nfpt)=0.
12548  ! look for the number of cells,the limits of the cells, the number of
12549  ! coordinates in each cell
12550  do i = 1, 15
12551  npoint(i) = 0
12552  end do
12553  ncell = 1
12554  xlim(ncell) = xf(1)
12555  do i = 2, nfpt
12556  if (xf(i)==0.) then
12557  ncell = ncell + 1
12558  ! * valero mars 2006
12559  ! omment xlim(ncell)=xf(i-1)
12560  xlim(ncell) = xlimf
12561  go to 30
12562  end if
12563  if (yf(i)*yf(i-1)<0.) then
12564  ncell = ncell + 1
12565  xlim(ncell) = xf(i)
12566  else
12567  npoint(ncell) = npoint(ncell) + 1
12568  end if
12569  end do
12570 30 continue
12571  flength = xlim(ncell)
12572  ncell = ncell - 1
12573  ! write(16,*) ' ******Read the field of the cavity************'
12574  write (16, 100) ncell, flength, att, fhc
12575 100 format (' Number of cells: ', i3, ' field length: ', e12.5, 'cm', &
12576  ' field factor: ', e12.5, ' frequency: ', e12.5, ' Hz')
12577  do i = 1, ncell
12578  write (16, 200) i, xlim(i), xlim(i+1)
12579  end do
12580 200 format (' Cell number ', i3, ' lower limit ', e12.5, ' cm ', &
12581  ' upper limit ', e12.5, ' cm')
12582  return
12583  end subroutine fieldcav
12590  function fcav(xc, nrc)
12591  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
12592  common /cell/yf(10000), xf(10000), xlim(15), flength, fhc, att, &
12593  npoint(15), ncell
12594 
12595  fcav = 0.
12596  if (nrc==1) j = 1
12597  do k = 1, npoint(nrc)
12598  tk = xc - xf(j)
12599  if (tk==0.) then
12600  fcav = yf(j)
12601  go to 10
12602  end if
12603  if (tk<0.) then
12604  a = (xc-xf(j-1))/(xf(j)-xf(j-1))
12605  b = (xf(j)-xc)/(xf(j)-xf(j-1))
12606  fcav = b*yf(j-1) + a*yf(j)
12607  go to 10
12608  end if
12609  j = j + 1
12610  end do
12611 10 continue
12612  return
12613  end function fcav
12620  function ta0(betr, nrc)
12621  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
12622  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
12623  common /cell/yf(10000), xf(10000), xlim(15), flength, fhc, att, &
12624  npoint(15), ncell
12625  common /gaus13/h(13), t(13)
12626  common /gaus17/h1(17), t1(17)
12627 
12628  xk = fhc*2.*pi/(betr*vl)
12629  ar = 0.
12630  xc1 = xlim(nrc)
12631  xc2 = xlim(nrc+1)
12632  do i = 1, 17
12633  xc = (xc2+xc1)/2. + (xc2-xc1)*h1(i)/2.
12634  rfonc = fcav(xc, nrc)
12635  ar = ar + t1(i)*rfonc*cos(xk*xc)
12636  end do
12637  ta0 = ar*(xc2-xc1)
12638  return
12639  end function ta0
12646  function tta0(betr)
12647  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
12648  common /cell/yf(10000), xf(10000), xlim(15), flength, fhc, att, &
12649  npoint(15), ncell
12650  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
12651  common /func/a(200), ylg, atte, ncel, nharm
12652  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
12653  common /rfield/ifield
12654  common /gaus13/h(13), t(13)
12655  dimension xmin(15)
12656  logical ifield
12657 
12658  if (ifield) then
12659  tta0 = 0.
12660  do i = 1, ncell
12661  tta0 = tta0 + ta0(betr, i)
12662  end do
12663  return
12664  else
12665  xk = fh/(betr*vl)
12666  xmin(1) = 0.
12667  do i = 2, ncel + 2
12668  xmin(i) = 0.
12669  end do
12670  do i = 2, ncel + 1
12671  xmin(i) = ylg*(i-1)/ncel
12672  end do
12673  ipas = 1
12674  tta0 = 0.
12675  ar = 0.
12676 101 continue
12677  if (xmin(ipas+1)==0 .or. ipas>(ncel+2)) return
12678  do i = 1, 13
12679  xc1 = xmin(ipas)
12680  xc2 = xmin(ipas+1)
12681  xc = (xc2+xc1)/2. + (xc2-xc1)*t(i)/2.
12682  rfonc = fone(xc)
12683  ar = ar + h(i)*rfonc*cos(xk*xc)
12684  end do
12685  ar = ar*(xc2-xc1)
12686  tta0 = tta0 + ar
12687  ar = 0.
12688  ipas = ipas + 1
12689  go to 101
12690  end if
12691  end function tta0
12698  function ta1(betr, nrc)
12699  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
12700  common /cell/yf(10000), xf(10000), xlim(15), flength, fhc, att, &
12701  npoint(15), ncell
12702  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
12703  common /gaus13/h(13), t(13)
12704  common /gaus17/h1(17), t1(17)
12705 
12706  xk = fhc*2.*pi/(betr*vl)
12707  ar = 0.
12708  xc1 = xlim(nrc)
12709  xc2 = xlim(nrc+1)
12710  do i = 1, 17
12711  xc = (xc2+xc1)/2. + (xc2-xc1)*h1(i)/2.
12712  rfonc = fcav(xc, nrc)
12713  ar = ar - t1(i)*xc*rfonc*sin(xk*xc)
12714  end do
12715  ta1 = ar*(xc2-xc1)
12716  return
12717  end function ta1
12724  function tta1(betr)
12725  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
12726  common /cell/yf(10000), xf(10000), xlim(15), flength, fhc, att, &
12727  npoint(15), ncell
12728  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
12729  common /func/a(200), ylg, atte, ncel, nharm
12730  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
12731  common /rfield/ifield
12732  common /gaus13/h(13), t(13)
12733  dimension xmin(15)
12734  logical ifield
12735 
12736  if (ifield) then
12737  tta1 = 0.
12738  do i = 1, ncell
12739  tta1 = tta1 + ta1(betr, i)
12740  end do
12741  return
12742  else
12743  xk = fh/(betr*vl)
12744  xmin(1) = 0.
12745  do i = 2, ncel + 2
12746  xmin(i) = 0.
12747  end do
12748  do i = 2, ncel + 1
12749  xmin(i) = ylg*(i-1)/ncel
12750  end do
12751  ipas = 1
12752  tta1 = 0.
12753  ar = 0.
12754 101 continue
12755  if (xmin(ipas+1)==0 .or. ipas>(ncel+2)) return
12756  do i = 1, 13
12757  xc1 = xmin(ipas)
12758  xc2 = xmin(ipas+1)
12759  xc = (xc2+xc1)/2. + (xc2-xc1)*t(i)/2.
12760  rfonc = fone(xc)
12761  ar = ar - h(i)*xc*rfonc*sin(xk*xc)
12762  end do
12763  ar = ar*(xc2-xc1)
12764  tta1 = tta1 + ar
12765  ar = 0.
12766  ipas = ipas + 1
12767  go to 101
12768  end if
12769  end function tta1
12776  function ta2(betr, nrc)
12777  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
12778  common /cell/yf(10000), xf(10000), xlim(15), flength, fhc, att, &
12779  npoint(15), ncell
12780  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
12781  common /gaus13/h(13), t(13)
12782  common /gaus17/h1(17), t1(17)
12783 
12784  xk = fhc*2.*pi/(betr*vl)
12785  ar = 0.
12786  xc1 = xlim(nrc)
12787  xc2 = xlim(nrc+1)
12788  do i = 1, 17
12789  xc = (xc2+xc1)/2. + (xc2-xc1)*h1(i)/2.
12790  rfonc = fcav(xc, nrc)
12791  ar = ar - t1(i)*xc*xc*rfonc*cos(xk*xc)
12792  end do
12793  ta2 = ar*(xc2-xc1)
12794  return
12795  end function ta2

12840  end do

12880  function tta3(betr)

12918  end do

12921  ar = 0.
12922  ipas = ipas + 1
12923  go to 101

12932  function ta4(betr, nrc)
12933  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
12934  common /cell/yf(10000), xf(10000), xlim(15), flength, fhc, att, &
12935  npoint(15), ncell
12936  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
12937  common /gaus13/h(13), t(13)
12938  common /gaus17/h1(17), t1(17)
12939 
12940  xk = fhc*2.*pi/(betr*vl)
12941  ar = 0.
12942  xc1 = xlim(nrc)
12943  xc2 = xlim(nrc+1)
12944  do i = 1, 17
12945  xc = (xc2+xc1)/2. + (xc2-xc1)*h1(i)/2.
12946  rfonc = fcav(xc, nrc)
12947  ar = ar + t1(i)*xc**4*rfonc*cos(xk*xc)
12948  end do
12949  ta4 = ar*(xc2-xc1)
12950  return
12951  end function ta4
12958  function tta4(betr)
12959  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
12960  common /cell/yf(10000), xf(10000), xlim(15), flength, fhc, att, &
12961  npoint(15), ncell
12962  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
12963  common /func/a(200), ylg, atte, ncel, nharm
12964  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh

12967  dimension xmin(15)

12969

12973  tta4 = tta4 + ta4(betr, i)
12974  end do
12975  return
12976  else

12978  xmin(1) = 0.
12979  do i = 2, ncel + 2

12981  end do

12983  xmin(i) = ylg*(i-1)/ncel
12984  end do

12987  ar = 0.
12988 101 continue
