12991  xc1 = xmin(ipas)
12992  xc2 = xmin(ipas+1)
12993  xc = (xc2+xc1)/2. + (xc2-xc1)*t(i)/2.
12994  rfonc = fone(xc)
12995  ar = ar + h(i)*xc**4*rfonc*cos(xk*xc)
12996  end do
12997  ar = ar*(xc2-xc1)
12998  tta4 = tta4 + ar
12999  ar = 0.
13000  ipas = ipas + 1
13001  go to 101
13002  end if
13003  end function tta4
13010  function ta5(betr, nrc)
13011  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
13012  common /cell/yf(10000), xf(10000), xlim(15), flength, fhc, att, &
13013  npoint(15), ncell
13014  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst

13016  common /gaus17/h1(17), t1(17)
13017

13019  ar = 0.
13020  xc1 = xlim(nrc)
13021  xc2 = xlim(nrc+1)
13022  do i = 1, 17
13023  xc = (xc2+xc1)/2. + (xc2-xc1)*h1(i)/2.
13024  rfonc = fcav(xc, nrc)
13025  ar = ar - t1(i)*xc**5*rfonc*sin(xk*xc)
13026  end do
13027  ta5 = ar*(xc2-xc1)
13028  return
13029  end function ta5
13036  function sb0(betr, nrc)
13037  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
13038  common /cell/yf(10000), xf(10000), xlim(15), flength, fhc, att, &
13039  npoint(15), ncell
13040  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
13041  common /gaus13/h(13), t(13)
13042  common /gaus17/h1(17), t1(17)
13043 
13044  xk = fhc*2.*pi/(betr*vl)
13045  xc1 = xlim(nrc)
13046  xc2 = xlim(nrc+1)
13047  br = 0.
13048  do i = 1, 17
13049  xc = (xc2+xc1)/2. + (xc2-xc1)*h1(i)/2.
13050  rfonc = fcav(xc, nrc)
13051  br = br + t1(i)*rfonc*sin(xk*xc)
13052  end do
13053  sb0 = br*(xc2-xc1)
13054  return
13055  end function sb0
13062  function tsb0(betr)
13063  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
13064  common /cell/yf(10000), xf(10000), xlim(15), flength, fhc, att, &
13065  npoint(15), ncell
13066  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
13067  common /func/a(200), ylg, atte, ncel, nharm

13078  end do
13079  return

13085  end do

13088  end do

13099  br = br + h(i)*rfonc*sin(xk*xc)
13100  end do

13103  br = 0.
13104  ipas = ipas + 1

13106  end if

13130  end do

13140  function tsb1(betr)

13151

13156  end do
13157  return
13158  else

13160  xmin(1) = 0.
13161  do i = 2, ncel + 2

13163  end do

13166  end do

13175  xc = (xc2+xc1)/2. + (xc2-xc1)*t(i)/2.
13176  rfonc = fone(xc)
13177  br = br + h(i)*xc*rfonc*cos(xk*xc)
13178  end do
13179  br = br*(xc2-xc1)
13180  tsb1 = tsb1 + br
13181  br = 0.
13182  ipas = ipas + 1
13183  go to 101
13184  end if
13185  end function tsb1

13208  end do

13256  end do

13270  function sb3(betr, nrc)
13271  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
13272  common /cell/yf(10000), xf(10000), xlim(15), flength, fhc, att, &
13273  npoint(15), ncell
13274  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
13275  common /gaus13/h(13), t(13)
13276  common /gaus17/h1(17), t1(17)
13277 
13278  xk = fhc*2.*pi/(betr*vl)
13279  xc1 = xlim(nrc)
13280  xc2 = xlim(nrc+1)
13281  br = 0.
13282  do i = 1, 17
13283  xc = (xc2+xc1)/2. + (xc2-xc1)*h1(i)/2.
13284  rfonc = fcav(xc, nrc)
13285  br = br - t1(i)*xc*xc*xc*rfonc*cos(xk*xc)
13286  end do
13287  sb3 = br*(xc2-xc1)
13288  return
13289  end function sb3
13296  function tsb3(betr)
13297  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
13298  common /cell/yf(10000), xf(10000), xlim(15), flength, fhc, att, &
13299  npoint(15), ncell
13300  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
13301  common /func/a(200), ylg, atte, ncel, nharm
13302  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
13303  common /rfield/ifield
13304  common /gaus13/h(13), t(13)
13305  dimension xmin(15)
13306  logical ifield
13307 
13308  if (ifield) then
13309  tsb3 = 0.
13310  do i = 1, ncell
13311  tsb3 = tsb3 + sb3(betr, i)
13312  end do
13313  return
13314  else
13315  xk = fh/(betr*vl)
13316  xmin(1) = 0.
13317  do i = 2, ncel + 2
13318  xmin(i) = 0.
13319  end do
13320  do i = 2, ncel + 1
13321  xmin(i) = ylg*(i-1)/ncel
13322  end do
13323  ipas = 1
13324  tsb3 = 0.
13325  br = 0.
13326 101 continue
13327  if (xmin(ipas+1)==0 .or. ipas>(ncel+2)) return
13328  do i = 1, 13
13329  xc1 = xmin(ipas)
13330  xc2 = xmin(ipas+1)
13331  xc = (xc2+xc1)/2. + (xc2-xc1)*t(i)/2.
13332  rfonc = fone(xc)
13333  br = br - h(i)*xc*xc*xc*rfonc*cos(xk*xc)
13334  end do
13335  br = br*(xc2-xc1)
13336  tsb3 = tsb3 + br
13337  br = 0.
13338  ipas = ipas + 1
13339  go to 101
13340  end if
13341  end function tsb3
13348  function sb4(betr, nrc)
13349  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
13350  common /cell/yf(10000), xf(10000), xlim(15), flength, fhc, att, &
13351  npoint(15), ncell
13352  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
13353  common /gaus13/h(13), t(13)
13354  common /gaus17/h1(17), t1(17)
13355 
13356  xk = fhc*2.*pi/(betr*vl)
13357  xc1 = xlim(nrc)
13358  xc2 = xlim(nrc+1)
13359  br = 0.
13360  do i = 1, 17
13361  xc = (xc2+xc1)/2. + (xc2-xc1)*h1(i)/2.
13362  rfonc = fcav(xc, nrc)
13363  br = br + t1(i)*xc**4*rfonc*sin(xk*xc)
13364  end do
13365  sb4 = br*(xc2-xc1)
13366  return
13367  end function sb4
13374  function tsb4(betr)
13375  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
13376  common /cell/yf(10000), xf(10000), xlim(15), flength, fhc, att, &
13377  npoint(15), ncell
13378  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
13379  common /func/a(200), ylg, atte, ncel, nharm
13380  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
13381  common /rfield/ifield
13382  common /gaus13/h(13), t(13)
13383  dimension xmin(15)
13384  logical ifield
13385 
13386  if (ifield) then
13387  tsb4 = 0.
13388  do i = 1, ncell
13389  tsb4 = tsb4 + sb4(betr, i)
13390  end do
13391  return
13392  else
13393  xk = fh/(betr*vl)
13394  xmin(1) = 0.
13395  do i = 2, ncel + 2
13396  xmin(i) = 0.
13397  end do
13398  do i = 2, ncel + 1
13399  xmin(i) = ylg*(i-1)/ncel
13400  end do
13401  ipas = 1
13402  tsb4 = 0.
13403  br = 0.
13404 101 continue
13405  if (xmin(ipas+1)==0 .or. ipas>(ncel+2)) return
13406  do i = 1, 13
13407  xc1 = xmin(ipas)
13408  xc2 = xmin(ipas+1)
13409  xc = (xc2+xc1)/2. + (xc2-xc1)*t(i)/2.
13410  rfonc = fone(xc)
13411  br = br + h(i)*xc**4*rfonc*sin(xk*xc)
13412  end do
13413  br = br*(xc2-xc1)
13414  tsb4 = tsb4 + br
13415  br = 0.
13416  ipas = ipas + 1
13417  go to 101
13418  end if
13419  end function tsb4
13426  function sb5(betr, nrc)
13427  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
13428  common /cell/yf(10000), xf(10000), xlim(15), flength, fhc, att, &
13429  npoint(15), ncell
13430  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
13431  common /gaus13/h(13), t(13)
13432  common /gaus17/h1(17), t1(17)
13433 
13434  xk = fhc*2.*pi/(betr*vl)
13435  xc1 = xlim(nrc)
13436  xc2 = xlim(nrc+1)
13437  br = 0.
13438  do i = 1, 17
13439  xc = (xc2+xc1)/2. + (xc2-xc1)*h1(i)/2.
13440  rfonc = fcav(xc, nrc)
13441  br = br + t1(i)*xc**5*rfonc*cos(xk*xc)
13442  end do
13443  sb5 = br*(xc2-xc1)
13444  return
13445  end function sb5
13453  function fone(z)
13454  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
13455  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
13456  common /func/a(200), ylg, atte, ncel, nharm
13457  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
13458 
13459  fone = 0.
13460  do j = 1, nharm
13461  xl = pi*(j-1)/ylg
13462  fone = fone + a(j)*cos(xl*z)
13463  end do
13464  return
13465  end function fone
13470  subroutine rharm
13471  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
13472  common /func/a(200), ylg, atte, ncel, nharm
13473  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
13474  common /tapes/in, ifile, meta
13475  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
13476  common /rfield/ifield
13477  common /mode/eflvl, rflvl
13478  logical ifield
13479 
13480  ifield = .false.
13481  ! ylg: length of the field (cm)
13482  ! fh: frequency (hertz)
13483  ! atte: field factor
13484  ! ncel: number of cells in the cavity
13485  read (in, *) ylg, fh, atte, ncel
13486  read (in, *) nharm
13487  read (in, *)(a(i), i=1, nharm)
13488  write (16, 100) ncel, ylg, fh, atte
13489 100 format (' number of cells in the cavity: ', i3, /, ' field length: ', &
13490  e12.5, 'cm', /, ' freq. ', e12.5, ' Hertz', ' field factor ', &
13491  e12.5)
13492  write (16, *) ' number of harmonics: ', nharm
13493  write (16, 200)(a(i), i=1, nharm)
13494 200 format (3(2x,e12.5))
13495  do i = 1, nharm
13496  a(i) = a(i)*atte
13497  end do
13498  fh = fh*2.*pi
13499  return
13500  end subroutine rharm
13506  subroutine profil
13507  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
13508  ! et2010May*start
13509  common /dplt/zdeb, zfin, ywmax, ypmax, rmsn
13510  common /tapes/in, ifile, meta
13511 
13512  call plprf1
13513  call plprf2
13514  return
13515  end subroutine profil
13528  subroutine plprf1
13529  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
13530  dimension xx(3000), yy(3000)
13531  ! RMSN :envelope size in multiples of RMS size
13532  ! ZDEB : Starting position of the plot
13533  ! ZFIN : End of the plot
13534  character *80 car, text
13535  common /dplt/zdeb, zfin, ywmax, ypmax, rmsn
13536  common /pltprf/sprfy(3000), sprfz(3000), sprfl(3000), sprfw(3000), &
13537  sprfp(3000), sprng(3000), iprf
13538  common /tapes/in, ifile, meta
13539  common /prof/car
13540 
13541  read (in, 69) car(1:80)
13542 69 format (a80)
13543  read (in, *) rmsn
13544  read (in, *) zdeb, zfin
13545  read (in, *) xxmax, xymax, ywmax, ypmax
13546  iprf = iprf - 1
13547  ideb = 1
13548  ifin = iprf
13549  if (zfin>sprfl(iprf)) zfin = sprfl(iprf)
13550  write (16, *) ' ******* PROFIL ***************** '
13551  write (16, *) ' IPRF ZFIN ', iprf, zfin
13552  do i = 2, iprf
13553  if ((zdeb>sprfl(i-1)) .and. (zdeb<=sprfl(i))) ideb = i
13554  if ((zfin>=sprfl(i-1)) .and. (zfin<sprfl(i))) ifin = i - 1
13555  end do
13556  if (xxmax<=0.) then
13557  xxmax = 0.
13558  do i = ideb, ifin
13559  if (0.5*sprfy(i)*rmsn>xxmax) xxmax = 0.5*sprfy(i)*rmsn
13560  end do
13561  end if
13562  if (xymax<=0.) then
13563  xymax = 0.
13564  do i = ideb, ifin
13565  if (0.5*sprfz(i)*rmsn>xymax) xymax = 0.5*sprfz(i)*rmsn
13566  end do
13567  end if
13568  ! Store header and envelopes in binary file for
13569  ! graphics post-processor
13570 
13571  ! igrtyp is type of graph (igrtyp=3 for x,y envelope plots)
13572  igrtyp = 3
13573  text = 'X and Y envelopes '
13574  text(21:80) = car(1:60)
13575  write (66, *) igrtyp
13576  write (66, *) text
13577  xx(1) = zdeb
13578  xx(2) = zfin
13579  yy(1) = -xymax
13580  yy(2) = xxmax
13581  write (16, *) ' XMAX YMAX ', xxmax, xymax
13582  write (66, *) xx(1), xx(2), yy(1), yy(2)
13583  ! GRADX=XXMAX/3.
13584  ! YFAXE=XXMAX
13585  icnt = 0
13586  do i = ideb, ifin
13587  icnt = icnt + 1
13588  xx(icnt) = sprfl(i)
13589  yy(icnt) = 0.5*sprfy(i)*rmsn
13590  end do
13591  ! write envelope coordinates to graphics file
13592  write (66, *) icnt
13593  do i = 1, icnt
13594  write (66, *) xx(i), yy(i)
13595  end do
13596  icnt = 0
13597  do i = ideb, ifin
13598  icnt = icnt + 1
13599  xx(icnt) = sprfl(i)
13600  yy(icnt) = -0.5*sprfz(i)*rmsn
13601  end do
13602  ! write envelope coordinates to graphics file
13603  write (66, *) icnt
13604  do i = 1, icnt
13605  write (66, *) xx(i), yy(i)
13606  end do
13607  return
13608  end subroutine plprf1
13609  subroutine plprf2
13610  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
13611  dimension xx(3000), yy(3000)
13612  character *80 car, text
13613  common /prof/car
13614  common /dplt/zdeb, zfin, ywmax, ypmax, rmsn
13615  common /pltprf/sprfy(3000), sprfz(3000), sprfl(3000), sprfw(3000), &
13616  sprfp(3000), sprng(3000), iprf
13617 
13618  ideb = 1
13619  ifin = iprf
13620  do i = 2, iprf
13621  if ((zdeb>sprfl(i-1)) .and. (zdeb<=sprfl(i))) ideb = i
13622  if ((zfin>=sprfl(i-1)) .and. (zfin<sprfl(i))) ifin = i - 1
13623  end do
13624  xxmax = ywmax/1000.
13625  xymax = ypmax
13626  if (xxmax<=0.) then
13627  xxmax = 0.
13628  do i = ideb, ifin
13629  if (0.5*sprfw(i)*rmsn>xxmax) xxmax = 0.5*sprfw(i)*rmsn
13630  end do
13631  end if
13632  if (xymax<=0.) then
13633  xymax = 0.
13634  do i = ideb, ifin
13635  if (0.5*sprfp(i)*rmsn>xymax) xymax = 0.5*sprfp(i)*rmsn
13636  end do
13637  end if
13638  ! et2010May*end
13639  ! Store header and envelopes in binary file for
13640  ! graphics post-processor
13641 
13642  ! igrtyp is type of graph (igrtyp=4 for dW/W envelope plots)
13643  igrtyp = 4
13644  text = 'dW/W envelope '
13645  text(21:80) = car(1:60)
13646  write (66, *) igrtyp
13647  write (66, *) text
13648  xx(1) = zdeb
13649  xx(2) = zfin
13650  yy(1) = 0.
13651  yy(2) = xxmax*1000.
13652  write (66, *) xx(1), xx(2), yy(1), yy(2)
13653  icnt = 0
13654  do i = ideb, ifin
13655  icnt = icnt + 1
13656  xx(icnt) = sprfl(i)
13657  yy(icnt) = 0.5*sprfw(i)*1000.*rmsn
13658  end do
13659  ! write envelope coordinates to graphics file
13660  write (66, *) icnt
13661  do i = 1, icnt
13662  write (66, *) xx(i), yy(i)
13663  end do
13664  ! Store header and envelopes in binary file for
13665  ! graphics post-processor
13666 
13667  ! igrtyp is type of graph (igrtyp=5 for dPHI envelope plots)
13668  igrtyp = 5
13669  text = 'dPHI envelope '
13670  text(21:80) = car(1:60)
13671  write (66, *) igrtyp
13672  write (66, *) text
13673  xx(1) = zdeb
13674  xx(2) = zfin
13675  ! 14/08/2009 yy(1)=-xymax
13676  yy(1) = 0.
13677  yy(2) = xymax
13678  write (16, *) ' dW/WMAX dPhiMAX ', xxmax, xymax
13679  write (66, *) xx(1), xx(2), yy(1), yy(2)
13680  icnt = 0
13681  do i = ideb, ifin
13682  icnt = icnt + 1
13683  xx(icnt) = sprfl(i)
13684  yy(icnt) = 0.5*sprfp(i)*rmsn
13685  end do
13686  ! write envelope coordinates to graphics file
13687  write (66, *) icnt
13688  do i = 1, icnt
13689  write (66, *) xx(i), yy(i)
13690  end do
13691  iprf = iprf + 1
13692  return
13693  end subroutine plprf2
13698  function slope(n, xv)
13699  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
13700  common /spl/x(4000), y(4000), s(5000), p(5000), q(5000)
13701 
13702  do i = 2, n
13703  xtvi = xv - x(i)
13704  if (xtvi>0.) go to 4
13705  if (xtvi<0.) go to 2
13706  if (xtvi==0.00) go to 3
13707 4 continue
13708  end do
13709 3 i = i - 1
13710  avx = x(i+1) - x(i)
13711  slope = s(i+1)*avx/3. + s(i)*avx/6. + (y(i+1)-y(i))/avx
13712  return
13713 2 i = i - 1
13714  dgx = xv - x(i)
13715  ddx = x(i+1) - xv
13716  avx = x(i+1) - x(i)
13717  slope = -(s(i)*ddx*ddx)/(2.*avx) + (s(i+1)*dgx*dgx)/(2.*avx) + ((y(i+ &
13718  1)-y(i))/avx) - (avx*(s(i+1)-s(i))/6.)
13719  return
13720  end function slope
13725  function spline(n, xv)
13726  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
13727  common /spl/x(4000), y(4000), s(5000), p(5000), q(5000)
13728 
13729  spline = y(1)
13730  xtv1 = xv - x(1)
13731  if (xtv1<0.) then
13732  spline = y(1) + ((y(2)-y(1))/(x(2)-x(1))-s(2)*(x(2)-x(1))/6.)*(xv- &
13733  x(1))
13734  return
13735  end if
13736  if (xtv1==0.00) then
13737  spline = y(1)
13738  return
13739  end if
13740  if (xtv1>0.) then
13741  xtvn = xv - x(n)
13742  if (xtvn==0.00) then
13743  spline = y(n)
13744  return
13745  end if
13746  if (xtvn>0.) then
13747  spline = y(n) + ((y(n)-y(n-1))/(x(n)-x(n-1))+s(n-1)*(x(n)-x(n- &
13748  1))/6.)*(xv-x(n))
13749  return
13750  end if
13751  if (xtvn<0.) then
13752  do i = 2, n
13753  xtvi = xv - x(i)
13754  if (xtvi>0.) go to 11
13755  if (xtvi<0.) go to 2
13756  if (xtvi==0.) go to 3
13757 11 continue
13758  end do
13759 3 spline = y(i)
13760  return
13761 2 i = i - 1
13762  dgx = xv - x(i)
13763  ddx = x(i+1) - xv
13764  avx = x(i+1) - x(i)
13765  spline = s(i)*ddx**3/(6.*avx) + s(i+1)*dgx**3/(6.*avx) + &
13766  (y(i+1)/avx-s(i+1)*avx/6.)*dgx + &
13767  (y(i)/avx-s(i)*avx/6.)*ddx
13768  return
13769  end if
13770  end if
13771  end function spline
13776  subroutine deriv2(n)
13777  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
13778  common /spl/x(4000), y(4000), s(5000), p(5000), q(5000)
13779 
13780  avxn = x(n) - x(n-1)
13781  avvxn = x(n-1) - x(n-2)
13782  avyn = y(n) - y(n-1)
13783  avvyn = y(n-1) - y(n-2)
13784  f = avxn - (avvxn**2)/avxn
13785  p(n-1) = 1.
13786  q(n-1) = 0.
13787  if (f/=0.) then
13788  p(n-1) = (-2.*avxn-3.*avvxn-avvxn**2/avxn)/f
13789  q(n-1) = 6.*(avyn/avxn-avvyn/avvxn)/f
13790  end if
13791  nm1 = n - 1
13792  do j = 2, nm1
13793  i = n - j
13794  avx = x(i+1) - x(i)
13795  avvx = x(i+2) - x(i+1)
13796  avy = y(i+1) - y(i)
13797  avvy = y(i+2) - y(i+1)
13798  d = 2.*(avx+avvx) + avvx*p(i+1)
13799  p(i) = -avx/d
13800  q(i) = (6.*(avvy/avvx-avy/avx)-avvx*q(i+1))/d
13801  end do
13802  avx1 = x(2) - x(1)
13803  avvx1 = x(3) - x(2)
13804  g1 = (avvx1/avx1) + 1. - p(2) - (q(2)/q(1))
13805  g2 = (avvx1/(avx1*p(1))) - (avvx1/avx1) - 1. + p(2)
13806  s(1) = (q(1)*g1)/(p(1)*g2)
13807  do i = 1, nm1
13808  s(i+1) = p(i)*s(i) + q(i)
13809  end do
13810  return
13811  end subroutine deriv2
13816  subroutine derif2(n)
13817  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
13818  common /spff/x(400), y(400), s(500), p(500), q(500)
13819 
13820  avxn = x(n) - x(n-1)
13821  avvxn = x(n-1) - x(n-2)
13822  avyn = y(n) - y(n-1)
13823  avvyn = y(n-1) - y(n-2)
13824  f = avxn - (avvxn**2)/avxn
13825  p(n-1) = 1.
13826  q(n-1) = 0.
13827  if (f/=0.) then
13828  p(n-1) = (-2.*avxn-3.*avvxn-avvxn**2/avxn)/f
13829  q(n-1) = 6.*(avyn/avxn-avvyn/avvxn)/f
13830  end if
13831  nm1 = n - 1
13832  do j = 2, nm1
13833  i = n - j
13834  avx = x(i+1) - x(i)
13835  avvx = x(i+2) - x(i+1)
13836  avy = y(i+1) - y(i)
13837  avvy = y(i+2) - y(i+1)
13838  d = 2.*(avx+avvx) + avvx*p(i+1)
13839  p(i) = -avx/d
13840  q(i) = (6.*(avvy/avvx-avy/avx)-avvx*q(i+1))/d
13841  end do
13842  avx1 = x(2) - x(1)
13843  avvx1 = x(3) - x(2)
13844  g1 = (avvx1/avx1) + 1. - p(2) - (q(2)/q(1))
13845  g2 = (avvx1/(avx1*p(1))) - (avvx1/avx1) - 1. + p(2)
13846  s(1) = (q(1)*g1)/(p(1)*g2)
13847  do i = 1, nm1
13848  s(i+1) = p(i)*s(i) + q(i)
13849  end do
13850  return
13851  end subroutine derif2
13856  function splinf(n, xv)
13857  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
13858  common /spff/x(400), y(400), s(500), p(500), q(500)
13859 
13860  splinf = y(1)
13861  xtv1 = xv - x(1)
13862  if (xtv1<0.) then
13863  splinf = y(1) + ((y(2)-y(1))/(x(2)-x(1))-s(2)*(x(2)-x(1))/6.)*(xv- &
13864  x(1))
13865  return
13866  end if
13867  if (xtv1==0.00) then
13868  splinf = y(1)
13869  return
13870  end if
13871  if (xtv1>0.) then
13872  xtvn = xv - x(n)
13873  if (xtvn==0.00) then
13874  splinf = y(n)
13875  return
13876  end if
13877  if (xtvn>0.) then
13878  splinf = y(n) + ((y(n)-y(n-1))/(x(n)-x(n-1))+s(n-1)*(x(n)-x(n- &
13879  1))/6.)*(xv-x(n))
13880  return
13881  end if
13882  if (xtvn<0.) then
13883  do i = 2, n
13884  xtvi = xv - x(i)
13885  if (xtvi>0.) go to 11
13886  if (xtvi<0.) go to 2
13887  if (xtvi==0.) go to 3
13888 11 continue
13889  end do
13890 3 splinf = y(i)
13891  return
13892 2 i = i - 1
13893  dgx = xv - x(i)
13894  ddx = x(i+1) - xv
13895  avx = x(i+1) - x(i)
13896  splinf = s(i)*ddx**3/(6.*avx) + s(i+1)*dgx**3/(6.*avx) + &
13897  (y(i+1)/avx-s(i+1)*avx/6.)*dgx + &
13898  (y(i)/avx-s(i)*avx/6.)*ddx
13899  return
13900  end if
13901  end if
13902  end function splinf
13907  function slopf(n, xv)
13908  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
13909  common /spff/x(400), y(400), s(500), p(500), q(500)
13910 
13911  do i = 2, n
13912  xtvi = xv - x(i)
13913  if (xtvi>0.) go to 4
13914  if (xtvi<0.) go to 2
13915  if (xtvi==0.00) go to 3
13916 4 continue
13917  end do
13918 3 i = i - 1
13919  avx = x(i+1) - x(i)
13920  slopf = s(i+1)*avx/3. + s(i)*avx/6. + (y(i+1)-y(i))/avx
13921  return
13922 2 i = i - 1
13923  dgx = xv - x(i)
13924  ddx = x(i+1) - xv
13925  avx = x(i+1) - x(i)
13926  slopf = -(s(i)*ddx*ddx)/(2.*avx) + (s(i+1)*dgx*dgx)/(2.*avx) + ((y(i+ &
13927  1)-y(i))/avx) - (avx*(s(i+1)-s(i))/6.)
13928  return
13929  end function slopf
13930  subroutine area(init)
13931  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
13932  ! ....................................................................
13933  !..........
13934  ! selection of the regions in the space x/a, y/b and z/c. The values
13935  ! a,b and c
13936  ! are the RMS of the bunch in the space x, y, and z
13937  ! The particles lying in a region are affected with the same color.
13938  ! ....................................................................
13939  !..........
13940  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
13941  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
13942  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
13943  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
13944  common /part/xc(iptsz), yc(iptsz), zc(iptsz)
13945  common /tapes/in, ifile, meta
13946  common /zones/frms(6), nzone
13947  dimension inzonn(6)
13948 
13949  if (init==1) then
13950  ! set to -1. the last column of the table f(10,iptsz)
13951  do i = 1, ngood
13952  f(10, i) = -1.
13953  end do
13954  ! read: ityp and nzone; the number of regions
13955  ! ityp=0, the zones are defined in the 3-d space (x/a,y/b,x/c)
13956  ! ityp=1, the zones are defined in the plane (x/a,y/b)
13957  read (in, *) ityp, nzone
13958  write (16, *) 'Number of zones selected:', nzone
13959  if (nzone>5) then
13960  write (16, *) 'Number of zones is greater than 5 ', nzone
13961  stop
13962  end if
13963  ! The regions are selected in the space x/xrms,y/yrms and z/zrms
13964  ! limits of the zones ; read the upper limits of the regions
13965  frms(1) = 0.
13966  read (in, *)(frms(i), i=2, nzone)
13967  frms(nzone+1) = 100.
13968  do i = 1, nzone
13969  write (16, *) 'Zone: ', i, ' lower limit: ', frms(i), &
13970  ' upper limit:', frms(i+1)
13971  end do
13972  end if
13973  trmoy = 0.
13974  do i = 1, ngood
13975  trmoy = trmoy + f(6, i)
13976  end do
13977  trmoy = trmoy/float(ngood)
13978  xbar = 0.
13979  ybar = 0.
13980  zbar = 0.
13981  imaxx = 0
13982  ! Divide by 100. to convert from centimeters to meters
13983  do np = 1, ngood
13984  gnp = f(7, np)/xmat
13985  vnp = vl*sqrt(1.-1./(gnp*gnp))
13986  zc(np) = (trmoy-f(6,np))*vnp
13987  ! convert from mrad to rad
13988  f3 = f(3, np)*1.e-03
13989  f5 = f(5, np)*1.e-03
13990  ! convert from cm to m
13991  xc(np) = (f(2,np)+zc(np)*f3)/100.
13992  yc(np) = (f(4,np)+zc(np)*f5)/100.
13993  zc(np) = zc(np)/100.
13994  ! evaluate xbar , ybar , zbar
13995  xbar = xbar + xc(np)
13996  ybar = ybar + yc(np)
13997  zbar = zbar + zc(np)
13998  end do
13999  eng = float(ngood)
14000  xbar = xbar/eng
14001  ybar = ybar/eng
14002  zbar = zbar/eng
14003  do np = 1, ngood
14004  xc(np) = xc(np) - xbar
14005  yc(np) = yc(np) - ybar
14006  zc(np) = zc(np) - zbar
14007  end do
14008  ! evaluate the rms sizes
14009  xsqsum = 0.
14010  ysqsum = 0.
14011  zsqsum = 0.
14012  do j = 1, ngood
14013  xcj = xc(j)
14014  ycj = yc(j)
14015  zcj = zc(j)
14016  xsqsum = xsqsum + xcj*xcj
14017  ysqsum = ysqsum + ycj*ycj
14018  zsqsum = zsqsum + zcj*zcj
14019  end do
14020  xrmsz = xsqsum/float(ngood)
14021  yrmsz = ysqsum/float(ngood)
14022  zrmsz = zsqsum/float(ngood)
14023  xrmsz = sqrt(xrmsz)
14024  yrmsz = sqrt(yrmsz)
14025  zrmsz = sqrt(zrmsz)
14026  ! select the particles in the regions and count them
14027  if (ityp==0) then
14028  ! ityp=0, the zones are defined in the 3-d space (x/a,y/b,x/c)
14029  do i = 1, nzone
14030  inzonn(i) = 0
14031  do j = 1, ngood
14032  xcp = xc(j)/xrmsz
14033  ycp = yc(j)/yrmsz
14034  zcp = zc(j)/zrmsz
14035  rxyz = sqrt((xcp*xcp+ycp*ycp+zcp*zcp)/3.)
14036  if (rxyz<frms(i+1) .and. rxyz>=frms(i)) then
14037  inzonn(i) = inzonn(i) + 1
14038  if (init==1) f(10, j) = frms(i+1)
14039  end if
14040  if (f(10,j)==100. .and. init==1) f(10, j) = 0.
14041  end do
14042  if (init==1) then
14043  write (16, *) inzonn(i), ' particles initially in zone ', &
14044  i
14045  else
14046  write (16, *) inzonn(i), ' particles in zone ', i
14047  end if
14048  end do
14049  else
14050  ! ityp=1, the zones are defined in the plane (x/a,y/b)
14051  do i = 1, nzone
14052  inzonn(i) = 0
14053  do j = 1, ngood
14054  xcp = xc(j)/xrmsz
14055  ycp = yc(j)/yrmsz
14056  zcp = zc(j)/zrmsz
14057  rxyz = sqrt((xcp*xcp+ycp*ycp)/2.)
14058  if (rxyz<frms(i+1) .and. rxyz>=frms(i)) then
14059  inzonn(i) = inzonn(i) + 1
14060  if (init==1) f(10, j) = frms(i+1)
14061  end if
14062  if (f(10,j)==100. .and. init==1) f(10, j) = 0.
14063  end do
14064  if (init==1) then
14065  write (16, *) inzonn(i), ' particles initially in zone ', &
14066  i
14067  else
14068  write (16, *) inzonn(i), ' particles in zone ', i
14069  end if
14070  end do
14071  end if
14072  return
14073  end subroutine area
14074  subroutine histgrm
14075  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
14076  parameter(iptsz=100002)
14077  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
14078  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
14079  common /tapes/in, ifile, meta
14080  common /dyn/tref, vref
14081  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
14082  common /part/xc(iptsz), yc(iptsz), zc(iptsz)
14083  common /hist/xpos(200), xn(200), ypos(200), yn(200), zpos(200), &
14084  zn(200), ixt, iyt, izt
14085  common /hist1/xps(200), xpn(200), yps(200), ypn(200), zps(200), &
14086  zpn(200), ixpt, iypt, izpt
14087 
14088  trmoy = 0.
14089  wcg = 0.
14090  xcg = 0.
14091  xcg = 0.
14092  ycg = 0.
14093  fnstp = 100.
14094  do i = 1, ngood
14095  trmoy = trmoy + f(6, i)
14096  wcg = wcg + f(7, i)
14097  xcg = xcg + f(2, i)
14098  ycg = ycg + f(4, i)
14099  end do
14100  trmoy = trmoy/float(ngood)
14101  wcg = wcg/float(ngood)
14102  xcg = xcg/float(ngood)
14103  ycg = ycg/float(ngood)
14104  zcg = trmoy*fh
14105  ! Isochronism correction (in case the bunch is not erect)
14106  xb2x = 0.
14107  xb2z = 0.
14108  xbxz = 0.
14109  imaxx = 0
14110  do np = 1, ngood
14111  gnp = f(7, np)/xmat
14112  vnp = vl*sqrt(1.-1./(gnp*gnp))
14113  zc(np) = (trmoy-f(6,np))*vnp/100.
14114  xc(np) = (f(2,np)-xcg)/100.
14115  xb2z = xb2z + zc(np)*zc(np)
14116  xb2x = xb2x + xc(np)*xc(np)
14117  xbxz = xbxz + zc(np)*xc(np)
14118  imaxx = imaxx + 1
14119  end do
14120  xb2z = xb2z/float(imaxx)
14121  xb2x = xb2x/float(imaxx)
14122  xbxz = xbxz/float(imaxx)
14123  apl = atan(-2.*xbxz/(xb2x-xb2z))/2.
14124  ! coordinates of the particles at the point of time position
14125  xbar = 0.
14126  ybar = 0.
14127  zbar = 0.
14128  imaxx = 0
14129  ! Divide by 100. to convert from centimeters to meters
14130  do np = 1, ngood
14131  gnp = f(7, np)/xmat
14132  vnp = vl*sqrt(1.-1./(gnp*gnp))
14133  znp = (trmoy-f(6,np))*vnp
14134  xnp = f(2, np)
14135  zc(np) = znp*cos(apl) + xnp*sin(apl)
14136  xnp = xnp*cos(apl) - znp*sin(apl)
14137  ! convert from mrad to rad
14138  f3 = f(3, np)*1.e-03
14139  f5 = f(5, np)*1.e-03
14140  ! convert from cm to m
14141  xc(np) = (xnp+zc(np)*f3)/100.
14142  yc(np) = (f(4,np)+zc(np)*f5)/100.
14143  zc(np) = zc(np)/100.
14144  ! evaluate xbar , ybar , zbar
14145  xbar = xbar + xc(np)
14146  ybar = ybar + yc(np)
14147  zbar = zbar + zc(np)
14148  end do
14149  eng = float(ngood)
14150  xbar = xbar/eng
14151  ybar = ybar/eng
14152  zbar = zbar/eng
14153  do np = 1, ngood
14154  xc(np) = xc(np) - xbar
14155  yc(np) = yc(np) - ybar
14156  zc(np) = zc(np) - zbar
14157  end do
14158  ! evaluate the rms sizes
14159  xsqsum = 0.
14160  ysqsum = 0.
14161  zsqsum = 0.
14162  do j = 1, ngood
14163  xsqsum = xsqsum + xc(j)*xc(j)
14164  ysqsum = ysqsum + yc(j)*yc(j)
14165  zsqsum = zsqsum + zc(j)*zc(j)
14166  end do
14167  xrmsz = xsqsum/float(ngood)
14168  yrmsz = ysqsum/float(ngood)
14169  zrmsz = zsqsum/float(ngood)
14170  xrmsz = sqrt(xrmsz)
14171  yrmsz = sqrt(yrmsz)
14172  zrmsz = sqrt(zrmsz)
14173  ! normalize the coordinates x, y and z
14174  do j = 1, ngood
14175  xc(j) = xc(j)/xrmsz
14176  yc(j) = yc(j)/yrmsz
14177  zc(j) = zc(j)/zrmsz
14178  end do
14179  ! look for the limits of the cloud of particles in the plane (x/a,
14180  ! y/b, z/c)
14181  ! these limits are assumed included within at most +/- 5 RMS
14182  fract = 5.
14183  xinf = 0.
14184  yinf = 0.
14185  zinf = 0.
14186  ! lower limits
14187  do i = 1, ngood
14188  if ((abs(xc(i))<=fract) .and. (abs(yc(i))<=fract) .and. (abs( &
14189  zc(i))<=fract)) then
14190  if (xinf>xc(i)) xinf = xc(i)
14191  if (yinf>yc(i)) yinf = yc(i)
14192  if (zinf>zc(i)) zinf = zc(i)
14193  end if
14194  end do
14195  ! upper limits
14196  xsup = xinf
14197  ysup = yinf
14198  zsup = zinf
14199  do i = 1, ngood
14200  if ((abs(xc(i))<=fract) .and. (abs(yc(i))<=fract) .and. (abs( &
14201  zc(i))<=fract)) then
14202  if (xsup<xc(i)) xsup = xc(i)
14203  if (ysup<yc(i)) ysup = yc(i)
14204  if (zsup<zc(i)) zsup = zc(i)
14205  end if
14206  end do
14207  ! maximal sizes in x, y, and z-directions
14208  pax = (xsup-xinf)
14209  pay = (ysup-yinf)
14210  paz = (zsup-zinf)
14211  ! histogram in x-direction,the step (stepx) is: pax/50
14212  stepx = pax/fnstp
14213  do i = 1, 200
14214  xn(i) = 0.
14215  end do
14216  xtot = 0.
14217  x0 = xinf - stepx
14218  x1 = x0 + stepx
14219  j = 1
14220 150 continue
14221  ! xpos(j): position of the elementary cylinder j
14222  ! xn(j) : number of particles in the elementary cylinder j
14223  ! xtot : total number of particles in x-direction
14224  if (x1>xsup+stepx) go to 160
14225  do i = 1, ngood
14226  if (xc(i)>x0 .and. xc(i)<=x1) xn(j) = xn(j) + 1.
14227  end do
14228  xtot = xtot + xn(j)
14229  xpos(j) = x0 + stepx/2.
14230  j = j + 1
14231  sta = x1
14232  x1 = x1 + stepx
14233  x0 = sta
14234  go to 150
14235 160 continue
14236  ! normalize the number of particles in each step with regard to
14237  ! max.(xn(j))
14238  j = j - 1
14239  ixt = j
14240  xnor = 0.
14241  do i = 1, j
14242  if (xnor<xn(i)) xnor = xn(i)
14243  end do
14244  do i = 1, j
14245  xn(i) = xn(i)/xnor
14246  end do
14247  ! histogram in y-direction,the step (stepy) is: pay/50
14248  stepy = pay/fnstp
14249  do i = 1, 200
14250  yn(i) = 0.
14251  end do
14252  ytot = 0.
14253  y0 = yinf - stepy
14254  y1 = y0 + stepy
14255  j = 1
14256  ! ypos(j): position of the step j
14257  ! yn(j) : number of particles lying in the j
14258  ! ytot : total number of particles in y-direction
14259 151 continue
14260  if (y1>ysup+stepy) go to 161
14261  do i = 1, ngood
14262  if (yc(i)>y0 .and. yc(i)<=y1) yn(j) = yn(j) + 1.
14263  end do
14264  ytot = ytot + yn(j)
14265  ypos(j) = y0 + stepy/2.
14266  j = j + 1
14267  sta = y1
14268  y1 = y1 + stepy
14269  y0 = sta
14270  go to 151
14271 161 continue
14272  j = j - 1
14273  iyt = j
14274  y0 = yinf
14275  ! normalize the number of particles in step with regard to max(yn(j))
14276  ynor = 0.
14277  do i = 1, j
14278  if (ynor<yn(i)) ynor = yn(i)
14279  end do
14280  do i = 1, j
14281  yn(i) = yn(i)/ynor
14282  end do
14283  ! histogram in z-direction,the step (stepz) is: paz/50
14284  do i = 1, 200
14285  zn(i) = 0.
14286  end do
14287  stepz = paz/fnstp
14288  ztot = 0.
14289  z0 = zinf - stepz
14290  z1 = z0 + stepz
14291  j = 1
14292  ! of length :stepz and radius:ray
14293  ! zpos(j): position of the step j
14294  ! zn(j) : number of particles in the step j
14295  ! ztot : total number of particles in z-direction
14296 152 continue
14297  if (z1>zsup+2.*stepz) go to 162
14298  do i = 1, ngood
14299  if (zc(i)>z0 .and. zc(i)<=z1) zn(j) = zn(j) + 1.
14300  end do
14301  ztot = ztot + zn(j)
14302  zpos(j) = z0 + stepz/2.
14303  j = j + 1
14304  sta = z1
14305  z1 = z1 + stepz
14306  z0 = sta
14307  go to 152
14308 162 continue
14309  j = j - 1
14310  izt = j
14311  ! *et*2011 added next line
14312  z0 = zinf
14313  ! normalize the number of particles in each step with regard to
14314  ! max(zn(j))
14315  znor = 0.
14316  do i = 1, j
14317  if (znor<zn(i)) znor = zn(i)
14318  end do
14319  do i = 1, j
14320  zn(i) = zn(i)/znor
14321  end do
14322  ! look for the limits of xp, yp, zp
14323  xpinf = f(3, 1)
14324  ypinf = f(5, 1)
14325  zpinf = f(6, 1) - trmoy
14326  ! lower limits
14327  do i = 1, ngood
14328  f3 = f(3, i)
14329  f5 = f(5, i)
14330  f6 = f(6, i) - trmoy
14331  if (xpinf>f3) xpinf = f3
14332  if (ypinf>f5) ypinf = f5
14333  if (zpinf>f6) zpinf = f6
14334  end do
14335  ! upper limits
14336  xpsup = xpinf
14337  ypsup = ypinf
14338  zpsup = zpinf
14339  do i = 1, ngood
14340  f3 = f(3, i)
14341  f5 = f(5, i)
14342  f6 = f(6, i) - trmoy
14343  if (xpsup<f3) xpsup = f3
14344  if (ypsup<f5) ypsup = f5
14345  if (zpsup<f6) zpsup = f6
14346  end do
14347  ! maximal sizes in xp, yp, and zp-directions
14348  paxp = (xpsup-xpinf)
14349  payp = (ypsup-ypinf)
14350  pazp = (zpsup-zpinf)
14351  ! evaluate the rms sizes in xp, yp, zp
14352  xpsum = 0.
14353  ypsum = 0.
14354  zpsum = 0.
14355  do i = 1, ngood
14356  f3 = f(3, i)
14357  f5 = f(5, i)
14358  f6 = f(6, i) - trmoy
14359  xpsum = xpsum + f3*f3
14360  ypsum = ypsum + f5*f5
14361  zpsum = zpsum + f6*f6
14362  end do
14363  xpsum = xpsum/float(ngood)
14364  ypsum = ypsum/float(ngood)
14365  zpsum = zpsum/float(ngood)
14366  xpsum = sqrt(xpsum)
14367  ypsum = sqrt(ypsum)
14368  zpsum = sqrt(zpsum)
14369  ! histogram in xp-direction,the step (stxp) is: paxp/50
14370  stpx = paxp/fnstp
14371  do i = 1, 200
14372  xpn(i) = 0.
14373  end do
14374  xp0 = xpinf - stpx
14375  xp1 = xp0 + stpx
14376  j = 1
14377 250 continue
14378  ! xps(j): position of the step j
14379  ! xpn(j): number of particles lying in the step j
14380  if (xp1>xpsup+stpx) go to 260
14381  do i = 1, ngood
14382  if (f(3,i)>xp0 .and. f(3,i)<=xp1) xpn(j) = xpn(j) + 1.
14383  end do
14384  xps(j) = xp0 + stpx/2.
14385  j = j + 1
14386  sta = xp1
14387  xp1 = xp1 + stpx
14388  xp0 = sta
14389  go to 250
14390 260 continue
14391  ! normalize the number of particles in each step with regard to
14392  ! max.(xpn(j))
14393  j = j - 1
14394  ixpt = j
14395  xnor = 0.
14396  do i = 1, j
14397  if (xnor<xpn(i)) xnor = xpn(i)
14398  end do
14399  do i = 1, j
14400  xpn(i) = xpn(i)/xnor
14401  xps(i) = xps(i)/xpsum
14402  end do
14403  ! histogram in yp-direction,the step (stpy) is: payp/50
14404  stpy = payp/fnstp
14405  do i = 1, 200
14406  ypn(i) = 0.
14407  end do
14408  yp0 = ypinf - stpy
14409  yp1 = yp0 + stpy
14410  j = 1
14411  ! yps(j): position of the step j in mrd
14412  ! ypn(j) : number of particles lying in the j
14413 251 continue
14414  if (yp1>ypsup+stpy) go to 261
14415  do i = 1, ngood
14416  if (f(5,i)>yp0 .and. f(5,i)<=yp1) ypn(j) = ypn(j) + 1.
14417  end do
14418  yps(j) = yp0 + stpy/2.
14419  j = j + 1
14420  sta = yp1
14421  yp1 = yp1 + stpy
14422  yp0 = sta
14423  go to 251
14424 261 continue
14425  j = j - 1
14426  iypt = j
14427  yp0 = ypinf
14428  ! normalize the number of particles in step with regard to max(ypn(j))
14429  ynor = 0.
14430  do i = 1, j
14431  if (ynor<ypn(i)) ynor = ypn(i)
14432  end do
14433  do i = 1, j
14434  ypn(i) = ypn(i)/ynor
14435  yps(i) = yps(i)/ypsum
14436  end do
14437  ! histogram in zp-direction,the step (stpz) is: pazp/50
14438  do i = 1, 200
14439  zpn(i) = 0.
14440  end do
14441  stpz = pazp/fnstp
14442  zp0 = zpinf - stpz
14443  zp1 = zp0 + stpz
14444  j = 1
14445  ! of length :stepz and radius:ray
14446  ! zps(j): position of the step j (deg)
14447  ! zpn(j) : number of particles in the step j
14448 252 continue
14449  if (zp1>zpsup+2.*stpz) go to 262
14450  do i = 1, ngood
14451  f6 = f(6, i) - trmoy
14452  if (f6>zp0 .and. f6<=zp1) zpn(j) = zpn(j) + 1.
14453  end do
14454  zps(j) = zp0 + stpz/2.
14455  j = j + 1
14456  sta = zp1
14457  zp1 = zp1 + stpz
14458  zp0 = sta
14459  go to 252
14460 262 continue
14461  ! normalize the number of particles in each step with regard to
14462  ! max(zn(j))
14463  j = j - 1
14464  izpt = j
14465  zpnor = 0.
14466  do i = 1, j
14467  if (zpnor<zpn(i)) zpnor = zpn(i)
14468  end do
14469  do i = 1, j
14470  zpn(i) = zpn(i)/zpnor
14471  zps(i) = zps(i)/zpsum
14472  end do
14473  return
14474  end subroutine histgrm
14507  subroutine daves
14508  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
14509  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
14510  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
14511  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
14512  common /speda/dave, idave
14513  common /davcom/dav1(maxcell1, 40), davtot, iitem(maxcell1), idav
14514  common /etcha1/dav2(maxcell1, 33), ichas(iptsz), chasit
14515  common /etcom/cog(8), exten(17), fd(iptsz)
14516  common /sc3/beamc, scdist, sce10, cplm, ect, apl, ichaes, iscsp
14517  common /cptemit/xltot(maxcell1), nbemit
14518  common /poro/irot1, irot2
14519  logical irot1, irot2
14520  common /secdr/iseor
14521  common /itvole/itvol, imamin
14522  common /dyni/vrefi, trefi, fhinit
14523  common /qfkd/ityq
14524  common /shortl/davprt
14525  logical iseor
14526  logical dave, chasit, ichaes, itvol, imamin, ityq
14527  character *80 davprt(maxcell1)
14528  ! dave end
14529  write (12, 3334)
14530 3334 format ('*****************************************************')
14531  ! 34 FORMAT(10A8)
14532  ! ********************************************************************
14533  write (12, *) ' Energies are in [MeV], phases in [deg]', &
14534  ' lengths in [mm] ,tof in [deg]'
14535  write (12, *) ' ** For lenses followed by :', &
14536  ' Cummulative length, element type, length '
14537 
14538  write (12, *) ' ** For emit followed by'
14539  write (12, *) ' * Line 1:', ' Particle reference: beta, energy, tof ' &
14540  , ' COG: energy, tof, energy offset, tof offset'
14541  write (12, *) ' * Line 2:', &
14542  ' COG coordinates for x xp y yp (mm and mrad)'
14543  write (12, *) ' * Line 3:', &
14544  ' alpha-x beta-x(mm/mrad) alpha-y beta-y(mm/mrad)', &
14545  ' alpha-z beta-z(ns/keV)'
14546  write (12, *) ' * Line 4:', &
14547  ' alpha-z beta-z(deg/keV) emit-z(non norm.,keV.deg) f(MHz)'
14548  write (12, *) ' * Line 5:', &
14549  ' dPHI(deg) dW(keV) r12 long. emittance', &
14550  ' (keV.ns) particles left'
14551  write (12, *) ' * Line 6:', &
14552  ' x(mm) xp(mrad) r12 hor. emittance', &
14553  ' (norm & non norm, mm.mrad)'
14554  write (12, *) ' * Line 7:', &
14555  ' y(mm) yp(mrad) r12 vert. emittance', &
14556  ' (norm & non norm, mm.mrad)'
14557  ! ********************************************************************
14558  write (12, 3334)
14559  write (12, *) ' Simulation with ', imax, ' particles'
14560  if (iseor) then
14561  write (12, *) ' Second order transport matrix '
14562  else
14563  write (12, *) ' First order transport matrix '
14564  end if
14565  if (ichaes) then
14566  write (12, *) ' Beam intensity ', beamc, ' mA'
14567  if (iscsp==1) write (12, *) &
14568  ' Space charge calculations with HERSC '
14569  if (iscsp==2) write (12, *) &
14570  ' Space charge calculations with SCHERM '
14571  if (iscsp==3 .or. iscsp==4) write (12, *) &
14572  ' Space charge calculations with SCHEFF '
14573  if (sce10==1) write (12, *) 'Space charge calculated &
14574  &for all relevant elements, but &
14575  &not at drifts'
14576  if (sce10==2) write (12, *) &
14577  'Space charge calculated for accelerating elements only'
14578  if (sce10==3) write (12, *) &
14579  'Space charge calculated for all relevant elements'
14580  end if
14581  if (itvol) write (12, *) &
14582  ' TOF is operational in accelerating elements '
14583  if (imamin) write (12, *) &
14584  'Phase adjustments for accelerating elements active'
14585  write (12, 3334)
14586  ifirst = 1
14587  iit6 = 0
14588  nemit = 0
14589  do i = 1, idav
14590  if (davprt(i)/='') write (12, '(A)') davprt(i)
14591  if (iitem(i)==1) then
14592  ! cavity
14593  n = int(dav1(i,25)+.5)
14594  if (itvol .and. imamin) then
14595  write (12, 1000) dav1(i, 24), n, dav1(i, 1), dav1(i, 38), &
14596  dav1(i, 39)
14597 1000 format (f9.2, ' mm Cavity ', i3, ' length ', f7.2, ' mm', &
14598  /, ' phase offset: before adjustement ', e12.5, &
14599  ' deg', ' after adjustement ', e14.7, ' deg')
14600  else
14601  write (12, 2789) dav1(i, 24), n, dav1(i, 1), dav1(i, 38)
14602  end if
14603 2789 format (f9.2, ' mm Cavity ', i3, ' length ', f7.2, ' mm', &
14604  ' phase offset: ', e12.5, ' deg')
14605  end if
14606 
14607  if (iitem(i)==2) then
14608  ! quadrupole (magnetic)
14609  write (12, 1010) dav1(i, 4), dav1(i, 1), dav1(i, 7), &
14610  dav1(i, 2), dav1(i, 3), dav1(i, 5), dav1(i, 6), &
14611  dav1(i, 36)
14612 1010 format (f9.2, ' mm Quadrupole: length = ', e12.5, ' mm', &
14613  ' aperture radius = ', e12.5, ' mm', /, ' field = ', &
14614  e12.5, ' kG K2 = ', e12.5, ' cm-2 gradient = ', e12.5, &
14615  ' kG/cm', /, ' momentum = ', e12.5, &
14616  ' kG.cm particles left ', f7.0)
14617  write (12, *)
14618  end if
14619 
14620  if (iitem(i)==3) then
14621  ! emiprt
14622  write (12, 305)
14623 305 format ('********** beam (emit card) ', &
14624  '**********')
14625  nemit = nemit + 1
14626  ! omment write(13,556)
14627  ! nemit,xltot(nemit)/100.,dav1(i,12)*1000.,
14628  ! omment * dav1(i,6),dav1(i,30)
14629  ! omment write(14,557)
14630  ! nemit,xltot(nemit)/100.,dav1(i,16),dav1(i,21)
14631  ! omment556 format(2x,i3,3(3x,f8.3),3x,f6.0)
14632  ! omment557 format(2x,i3,3(3x,f8.3))
14633  ! ****************************************
14634  write (12, 1001)(dav1(i,j), j=3, 9)
14635 1001 format (2x, f7.5, 4(1x,e14.7), 2(2x,e12.5), ' MeV-deg')
14636  write (12, 2003)(dav1(i,j), j=31, 34)
14637 2003 format (4(2x,f7.3), ' mm and mrad ')
14638  ! --- following lines describe Courant-Snyder parameters
14639  fh = dav1(i, 40)
14640  ! 1) alpz betz
14641 
14642  ! 1-a) emz: emittance (keV*deg) betz(deg/keV) gamz(keV/deg)
14643  emz = dav1(i, 12)*1000.*(180./pi)
14644  betz = 0.
14645  if (emz>1.e-10) betz = dav1(i, 10)*dav1(i, 10)/emz
14646  dez = dav1(i, 11)*1000.
14647  gamz = 0.
14648  if (emz>1.e-10) gamz = dez*dez/emz
14649  alpz = 0.
14650  if (betz*gamz>=1.) alpz = sqrt(betz*gamz-1.)
14651  if (dav1(i,23)>0.) alpz = -alpz
14652 
14653  ! 1-b) emzz: emittance dE-dphi (keV*ns) betzz(ns/keV)
14654  ! gamzz(keV/ns)
14655  emzz = 1.e12*dav1(i, 12)/fh
14656  dphizz = 1.e09*dav1(i, 10)/fh*(pi/180.)
14657  betzz = 0.
14658  if (emzz>1.e-10) betzz = dphizz*dphizz/emzz
14659  gamzz = 0.
14660  if (emzz>1.e-10) gamzz = dez*dez/emzz
14661  alpzz = 0.
14662  if (betzz*gamzz>=1.) alpzz = sqrt(betzz*gamzz-1.)
14663  if (dav1(i,23)>0.) alpzz = -alpzz
14664 
14665  ! 2) alpx btx
14666  ! betx(mm/mrad) gamx (mrad/mm)
14667  betx = 0.
14668  emx = dav1(i, 17)
14669  if (emx>1e-10) betx = dav1(i, 13)*dav1(i, 13)/emx
14670  gamx = 0.
14671  if (emx>1e-10) gamx = dav1(i, 14)*dav1(i, 14)/emx
14672  alpx = 0.
14673  if (betx*gamx>=1.) alpx = sqrt(betx*gamx-1.)
14674  if (dav1(i,15)>0.) alpx = -alpx
14675 
14676  ! 3) alpy bety
14677  ! bety(mm/mrad) gamy (mrad/mm)
14678  bety = 0.
14679  emy = dav1(i, 22)
14680  if (emy>1e-10) bety = dav1(i, 18)*dav1(i, 18)/emy
14681  gamy = 0.
14682  if (emy>1e-10) gamy = dav1(i, 19)*dav1(i, 19)/emy
14683  alpy = 0.
14684  if (bety*gamy>=1.) alpy = sqrt(bety*gamy-1.)
14685  if (dav1(i,20)>0.) alpy = -alpy
14686 
14687  ! betzz: ns/keV
14688  write (12, 3213) alpx, betx, alpy, bety, alpzz, betzz
14689 3213 format (3(2x,e12.5,2x,e12.5), 2x, e12.5)
14690  ! emittance (keV*deg) betz(deg/keV)
14691  write (12, 597) alpz, betz, emz, fh/(2.*pi*1.e6)
14692 597 format (2x, f8.4, 2x, e13.6, 2x, e13.6, ' keV.deg', 2x, f8.3, &
14693  ' MHz')
14694  if (emzz>1000.) then
14695  ! ns.MeV
14696  write (12, 6332) dav1(i, 10), dez, dav1(i, 23), &
14697  emzz/1000., dav1(i, 30)
14698 6332 format (2x, f7.3, 1x, f10.2, 2x, f8.4, 3x, f8.3, &
14699  ' ns.MeV ', f7.0, ' particles left')
14700  else
14701  ! ns.keV
14702  write (12, 1002) dav1(i, 10), dez, dav1(i, 23), emzz, &
14703  dav1(i, 30)
14704 1002 format (2x, e12.5, 2x, f7.2, 2x, f8.4, 2x, f7.3, &
14705  ' ns.keV ', f7.0, ' particles left')
14706  end if
14707  write (12, 1003)(dav1(i,j), j=13, 22)
14708 1003 format (2(2x,f7.3,3x,f8.3,2x,f8.4,2x,e12.5,' mm.mrad (norm)', &
14709  2x,f7.3,' (non norm)',/))
14710  write (12, *)
14711  if (dav1(i,26)==1.) then
14712  write (12, 8333)(dav2(i,j), j=31, 33)
14713 8333 format ('********** With chase', 3(1x,f6.4), &
14714  ' **********')
14715  write (12, 1001)(dav1(i,j), j=3, 9)
14716  write (12, 2003)(dav2(i,j), j=26, 29)
14717  ! following lines describe Courant-Snyder parameters
14718  ! 1) alpz betz
14719 
14720  ! 1-a) emz: emittance (keV*deg) betz(deg/keV)
14721  ! gamz(keV/deg)
14722  emz = dav2(i, 12)*1000.*(180./pi)
14723  betz = 0.
14724  if (emz>1.e-10) betz = dav2(i, 10)*dav2(i, 10)/emz
14725  dez = dav2(i, 11)*1000.
14726  gamz = 0.
14727  if (emz>1.e-10) gamz = dez*dez/emz
14728  alpz = 0.
14729  if (betz*gamz>=1.) alpz = sqrt(betz*gamz-1.)
14730  if (dav2(i,23)>0.) alpz = -alpz
14731 
14732  ! 1-b) emzz: emittance dE-dphi (keV*ns) betzz(ns/keV)
14733  ! gamzz(keV/ns)
14734  emzz = 1.e12*dav2(i, 12)/fh
14735  dphizz = 1.e09*dav2(i, 10)/fh*(pi/180.)
14736  betzz = 0.
14737  if (emzz>1.e-10) betzz = dphizz*dphizz/emzz
14738  gamzz = 0.
14739  if (emzz>1.e-10) gamzz = dez*dez/emzz
14740  alpzz = 0.
14741  if (betzz*gamzz>=1.) alpzz = sqrt(betzz*gamzz-1.)
14742  if (dav2(i,23)>0.) alpzz = -alpzz
14743 
14744  ! 2) alpx btx
14745  ! betx(mm/mrad) gamx (mrad/mm)
14746  betx = 0.
14747  emx = dav1(i, 17)
14748  if (emx>1e-10) betx = dav2(i, 13)*dav2(i, 13)/emx
14749  gamx = 0.
14750  if (emx>1e-10) gamx = dav2(i, 14)*dav2(i, 14)/emx
14751  alpx = 0.
14752  if (betx*gamx>=1.) alpx = sqrt(betx*gamx-1.)
14753  if (dav2(i,15)>0.) alpx = -alpx
14754 
14755  ! 3) alpy bety
14756  ! bety(mm/mrad) gamy (mrad/mm)
14757  bety = 0.
14758  emy = dav2(i, 22)
14759  if (emy>1e-10) bety = dav2(i, 18)*dav2(i, 18)/emy
14760  gamy = 0.
14761  if (emy>1e-10) gamy = dav2(i, 19)*dav2(i, 19)/emy
14762  alpy = 0.
14763  if (bety*gamy>=1.) alpy = sqrt(bety*gamy-1.)
14764  if (dav2(i,20)>0.) alpy = -alpy
14765 
14766  ! betzz: ns/keV
14767  write (12, 3213) alpx, betx, alpy, bety, alpzz, betzz
14768  if (emzz>1000.) then
14769  ! ns.MeV
14770  write (12, 6332) dav2(i, 10), dez, dav2(i, 23), &
14771  emzz/1000., dav2(i, 30)
14772  else
14773  ! ns.keV
14774  write (12, 1002) dav2(i, 10), dez, dav2(i, 23), emzz, &
14775  dav2(i, 30)
14776  end if
14777  ifirst = 0
14778  ! omment write(15,1556)
14779  ! nemit,xltot(nemit)/100.,dav2(i,12)*1000.
14780  ! omment1556 format(2x,i3,2(3x,f8.3))
14781  ! omment write(18,1557)
14782  ! nemit,xltot(nemit)/100.,dav2(i,16),dav2(i,21)
14783  ! omment1557 format(2x,i3,3(3x,f8.3))
14784  ! omment656 format(2x,i3,3x,f7.3)
14785  write (12, 1003)(dav2(i,j), j=13, 22)
14786  write (12, *)
14787  end if
14788  end if
14789  if (iitem(i)==4) then
14790  ! bending magnet
14791  write (12, 1025) dav1(i, 4), dav1(i, 1), dav1(i, 2), &
14792  dav1(i, 3)
14793 1025 format (f9.2, ' mm bending magnet: central trajectory: ', &
14794  f8.2, ' mm', /, ' bend angle: ', f7.3, &
14795  ' deg bending radius: ', e12.5, ' mm')
14796  write (12, 1029) dav1(i, 16), dav1(i, 14), dav1(i, 15)
14797 1029 format (' field: ', f7.3, ' T n: ', f8.3, ' beta: ', &
14798  f8.3)
14799  write (12, 1026) dav1(i, 6), dav1(i, 9), dav1(i, 7), &
14800  dav1(i, 8), dav1(i, 5)
14801 1026 format (' *Entrance ', /, ' pole-face rotation:', f8.3, &
14802  ' deg curvature: ', f8.3, ' mm', /, &
14803  ' fringe field corrections: K1 ', f8.3, ' K2 ', f8.3, &
14804  /, ' vertical half-aperture: ', f8.3, ' mm')
14805  write (12, 1027) dav1(i, 10), dav1(i, 13), dav1(i, 11), &
14806  dav1(i, 12), dav1(i, 17)
14807 1027 format (' *Exit ', /, ' pole-face rotation :', f8.3, &
14808  ' deg curvature: ', f8.3, ' mm', /, &
14809  ' fringe field correction: K1 ', f7.3, ' K2 ', f7.3, &
14810  /, ' vertical half-aperture: ', f8.3, ' mm')
14811  write (12, 1028) dav1(i, 37)
14812 1028 format (' particles left ', f7.0)
14813  write (12, *)
14814  end if
14815  if (iitem(i)==5) then
14816  ! solenoid
14817  write (12, 5010) dav1(i, 4), dav1(i, 1), dav1(i, 2), &
14818  dav1(i, 3), dav1(i, 5), dav1(i, 36)
14819 5010 format (f9.2, ' mm Solenoid: length = ', f8.3, ' mm', &
14820  ' field = ', e12.5, ' kG K = ', e12.5, ' cm-1', /, &
14821  ' momentum = ', e12.5, ' kG.cm particles left ', &
14822  f7.0)
14823  write (12, *)
14824  end if
14825  if (iitem(i)==6) then
14826  ! From adjust or from entre(not yet introduced) input beam
14827  ! reference
14828  write (12, 303)
14829 303 format ('********** INITIAL BEAM **********')
14830  write (12, 2003)(dav1(i,j), j=31, 34)
14831  ! 1) alpz betz
14832 
14833  ! 1-a) emz: emittance (keV*deg) betz(deg/keV) gamz(keV/deg)
14834  emz = dav1(i, 12)*1000.*(180./pi)
14835  betz = 0.
14836  if (emz>1.e-10) betz = dav1(i, 10)*dav1(i, 10)/emz
14837  dez = dav1(i, 11)*1000.
14838  gamz = 0.
14839  if (emz>1.e-10) gamz = dez*dez/emz
14840  alpz = 0.
14841  if (betz*gamz>=1.) alpz = sqrt(betz*gamz-1.)
14842 
14843  ! 1-b) emzz: emittance dE-dphi (keV*ns) betzz(ns/keV)
14844  ! gamzz(keV/ns)
14845  emzz = 1.e12*dav1(i, 12)/fhinit
14846  dphizz = 1.e09*dav1(i, 10)/fhinit*(pi/180.)
14847  betzz = 0.
14848  if (emzz>1.e-10) betzz = dphizz*dphizz/emzz
14849  gamzz = 0.
14850  if (emzz>1.e-10) gamzz = dez*dez/emzz
14851  alpzz = 0.
14852  if (betzz*gamzz>=1.) alpzz = sqrt(betzz*gamzz-1.)
14853 
14854  ! 2) alpx btx
14855  ! betx(mm/mrad) gamx (mrad/mm)
14856  betx = 0.
14857  emx = dav1(i, 17)
14858  if (emx>1e-10) betx = dav1(i, 13)*dav1(i, 13)/emx
14859  gamx = 0.
14860  if (emx>1e-10) gamx = dav1(i, 14)*dav1(i, 14)/emx
14861  alpx = 0.
14862  if (betx*gamx>=1.) alpx = sqrt(betx*gamx-1.)
14863 
14864  ! 3) alpy bety
14865  ! bety(mm/mrad) gamy (mrad/mm)
14866  bety = 0.
14867  emy = dav1(i, 22)
14868  if (emy>1e-10) bety = dav1(i, 18)*dav1(i, 18)/emy
14869  gamy = 0.
14870  if (emy>1e-10) gamy = dav1(i, 19)*dav1(i, 19)/emy
14871  alpy = 0.
14872  if (bety*gamy>=1.) alpy = sqrt(bety*gamy-1.)
14873 
14874  ! betzz: ns/keV
14875  write (12, 3213) alpx, betx, alpy, bety, alpzz, betzz
14876  fh = dav1(i, 40)
14877  ! emittance (keV*deg) betz(deg/keV)
14878  write (12, 597) alpz, betz, emz, fh/(2.*pi*1.e6)
14879  if (emzz>1000.) then
14880  ! ns.MeV
14881  write (12, 6332) dav1(i, 10), dez, dav1(i, 23), &
14882  emzz/1000., dav1(i, 30)
14883  else
14884  ! ns.keV
14885  write (12, 1002) dav1(i, 10), dez, dav1(i, 23), emzz, &
14886  dav1(i, 30)
14887  end if
14888  write (12, 1003)(dav1(i,j), j=13, 22)
14889  iit6 = 1
14890  write (12, 304)
14891 304 format ('********** With chase ', &
14892  '**********')
14893  write (12, 2003)(dav2(i,j), j=26, 29)
14894  ! 1) alpz betz
14895 
14896  ! 1-a) emz: emittance (keV*deg) betz(deg/keV) gamz(keV/deg)
14897  emz = dav2(i, 12)*1000.*(180./pi)
14898  betz = 0.
14899  if (emz>1.e-10) betz = dav2(i, 10)*dav2(i, 10)/emz
14900  dez = dav2(i, 11)*1000.
14901  gamz = 0.
14902  if (emz>1.e-10) gamz = dez*dez/emz
14903  alpz = 0.
14904  if (betz*gamz>=1.) alpz = sqrt(betz*gamz-1.)
14905 
14906  ! 1-b) emzz: emittance dE-dphi (keV*ns) betzz(ns/keV)
14907  ! gamzz(keV/ns)
14908  emzz = 1.e12*dav2(i, 12)/fh
14909  dphizz = 1.e09*dav2(i, 10)/fh*(pi/180.)
14910  betzz = 0.
14911  if (emzz>1.e-10) betzz = dphizz*dphizz/emzz
14912  gamzz = 0.
14913  if (emzz>1.e-10) gamzz = dez*dez/emzz
14914  alpzz = 0.
14915  if (betzz*gamzz>=1.) alpzz = sqrt(betzz*gamzz-1.)
14916 
14917  ! 2) alpx btx
14918  ! betx(mm/mrad) gamx (mrad/mm)
14919  betx = 0.
14920  emx = dav1(i, 17)
14921  if (emx>1e-10) betx = dav2(i, 13)*dav2(i, 13)/emx
14922  gamx = 0.
14923  if (emx>1e-10) gamx = dav2(i, 14)*dav2(i, 14)/emx
14924  alpx = 0.
14925  if (betx*gamx>=1.) alpx = sqrt(betx*gamx-1.)
14926 
14927  ! 3) alpy bety
14928 
14929  ! bety(mm/mrad) gamy (mrad/mm)
14930  bety = 0.
14931  emy = dav2(i, 22)
14932  if (emy>1e-10) bety = dav2(i, 18)*dav2(i, 18)/emy
14933  gamy = 0.
14934  if (emy>1e-10) gamy = dav2(i, 19)*dav2(i, 19)/emy
14935  alpy = 0.
14936  if (bety*gamy>=1.) alpy = sqrt(bety*gamy-1.)
14937 
14938  ! betzz: ns/keV
14939  write (12, 3213) alpx, betx, alpy, bety, alpzz, betzz
14940  if (emzz>1000.) then
14941  ! ns.MeV
14942  write (12, 6332) dav2(i, 10), dez, dav2(i, 23), &
14943  emzz/1000., dav2(i, 30)
14944  else
14945  ! ns.keV
14946  write (12, 1002) dav2(i, 10), dez, dav2(i, 23), emzz, &
14947  dav2(i, 30)
14948  end if
14949  ifirst = 0
14950  write (12, 1003)(dav2(i,j), j=13, 22)
14951  write (12, *)
14952  end if
14953  if (iitem(i)==7) then
14954  ! drift
14955  write (12, 7010) dav1(i, 4), dav1(i, 1), dav1(i, 36)
14956 7010 format (f9.2, ' mm Drift: length ', f10.3, ' mm ', /, &
14957  ' particles left ', f7.0)
14958  write (12, *)
14959  end if
14960  if (iitem(i)==8) then
14961  ! buncher
14962  if (.not. imamin) write (12, 8010) dav1(i, 4), dav1(i, 1), &
14963  dav1(i, 2), dav1(i, 3), dav1(i, 36)
14964 8010 format (f9.2, ' mm Buncher ', f9.3, ' MV ', ' RF Phase ', &
14965  f9.3, ' deg Aperture radius', f5.1, ' cm', /, &
14966  ' particles left ', f7.0)
14967  if (imamin) write (12, 8110) dav1(i, 4), dav1(i, 1), &
14968  dav1(i, 2), dav1(i, 5), dav1(i, 3), dav1(i, 36)
14969 8110 format (f9.2, ' mm Buncher ', f9.3, ' MV ', ' RF Phase ', &
14970  f9.3, ' deg correction ', f9.3, ' deg', &
14971  ' Aperture radius', f5.1, ' cm', /, &
14972  ' particles left ', f7.0)
14973  write (12, *)
14974  end if
14975  if (iitem(i)==9) then
14976  ! steerer
14977  if (dav1(i,2)==0.) then
14978  write (12, 8020) dav1(i, 3), dav1(i, 1)
14979 8020 format (f9.2, ' mm Hor. Mag. Steerer ', e12.5, ' Tm ')
14980  else if (dav1(i,2)==1.) then
14981  write (12, 8021) dav1(i, 3), dav1(i, 1)
14982 8021 format (f9.2, ' mm Ver. Mag. Steerer ', f12.5, ' Tm ')
14983  else if (dav1(i,2)==2.) then
14984  write (12, 8022) dav1(i, 3), dav1(i, 1)
14985 8022 format (f9.2, ' mm Hor. El. Steerer ', e12.5, ' kVm/m ')
14986  else if (dav1(i,2)==3.) then
14987  write (12, 8023) dav1(i, 3), dav1(i, 1)
14988 8023 format (f9.2, ' mm Ver. El. Steerer ', e12.5, ' kVm/m ')
14989  end if
14990  write (12, *)
14991  end if
14992  if (iitem(i)==10) then
14993  ! sextupole
14994  write (12, 1011) dav1(i, 4), dav1(i, 1), dav1(i, 6), &
14995  dav1(i, 3), dav1(i, 5), dav1(i, 2), dav1(i, 7), &
14996  dav1(i, 36)
14997 1011 format (f9.2, ' mm Sextupole: length = ', f7.3, ' mm', &
14998  ' aperture radius = ', e12.5, ' cm', /, ' field = ', &
14999  e12.5, ' kG KS2 = ', e12.5, ' cm-3', ' gradient = ', &
15000  e12.5, ' kG/cm2', /, ' momentum = ', e12.5, &
15001  ' kG.cm particles left ', f7.0)
15002  write (12, *)
15003  end if
15004  if (iitem(i)==11) then
15005  ! solenoid+quadrupole
15006  write (12, 5011) dav1(i, 4), dav1(i, 1), dav1(i, 7), &
15007  dav1(i, 2), dav1(i, 6), dav1(i, 3), dav1(i, 5), &
15008  dav1(i, 8), dav1(i, 36)
15009 5011 format (f9.2, ' mm Sol+Quad: length = ', f7.3, &
15010  ' mm aperture radius= ', e12.5, ' mm', /, &
15011  ' Solenoid: field = ', e12.5, ' kG K = ', e12.5, ' cm-1', &
15012  /, ' Quadrupole: field ', e12.5, ' kG K2 = ', e12.5, &
15013  ' cm-2', /, ' momentum = ', e12.5, &
15014  ' kG.cm particles left ', f7.0)
15015  write (12, *)
15016  end if
15017  if (iitem(i)==12) then
15018  ! quadrupole + sextupole
15019  write (12, 5021) dav1(i, 4), dav1(i, 1), dav1(i, 6), &
15020  dav1(i, 2), dav1(i, 3), dav1(i, 7), dav1(i, 8), &
15021  dav1(i, 10), dav1(i, 36)
15022 5021 format (f9.2, ' mm Quad+Sext: length = ', e12.5, ' mm ', &
15023  ' aperture radius = ', e12.5, ' mm', /, &
15024  ' Quadrupole: B = ', e12.5, ' kG K2 = ', e12.5, ' cm-2', &
15025  /, ' Sextupole: B = ', e12.5, ' kG K2 = ', e12.5, &
15026  ' cm-3', /, ' momentum = ', e12.5, &
15027  ' kG.cm particles left ', f7.0)
15028  write (12, *)
15029  end if
15030  if (iitem(i)==13) then
15031  ! electron gun
15032  write (12, 5031) dav1(i, 4), dav1(i, 1), dav1(i, 2), &
15033  dav1(i, 3), dav1(i, 6), dav1(i, 36)
15034 5031 format (f9.2, ' mm DC egun length:', f7.3, ' mm', /, &
15035  ' Crest field:', f8.3, ' MV/m', 3x, ' field stength:', &
15036  f8.3, ' kV', /, ' beta ( output):', e12.5, &
15037  ' particles left ', f7.0)
15038  ! 14/01/2010 write(12,5032) dav1(i,5),dav1(i,7)
15039  ! 14/10/2010 5032 format(' beam (emit card) at ',e12.5,
15040  ! 14/10/2010 * ' mm from the cathode, field
15041  ! (MV/m) ',e12.5)
15042  write (12, *)
15043  end if
15044  ! rfqcl (RFQ cell)
15045  if (iitem(i)==14) then
15046  ncell = int(dav1(i,7))
15047  write (12, 5041) dav1(i, 4), ncell, dav1(i, 1), dav1(i, 2), &
15048  dav1(i, 3), dav1(i, 5), dav1(i, 6), dav1(i, 36)
15049 5041 format (f9.2, ' mm rfq cell:', i5, ' length: ', f7.3, ' mm', &
15050  /, ' V/r02: ', e12.5, ' kV/mm**2 AV:', e12.5, ' kV ', &
15051  ' type: ', f3.0, /, ' energy(output): ', e12.5, ' MeV ', &
15052  ' particles left ', f7.0)
15053  write (12, *)
15054  end if
15055  ! rfqptq (RFQ)
15056  if (iitem(i)==15) then
15057  ncell = int(dav1(i,7))
15058  write (12, 5042) dav1(i, 4), ncell, dav1(i, 5), dav1(i, 9), &
15059  dav1(i, 8), dav1(i, 6), dav1(i, 36)
15060 5042 format (f9.2, ' mm rfq: number of cells:', i5, &
15061  ' total length: ', e12.5, ' mm', /, &
15062  ' intervane voltage (reference): ', e12.5, ' kV', /, &
15063  ' intervane voltage (bunch): ', e12.5, ' kV', /, &
15064  ' energy (output): ', e12.5, ' MeV', /, &
15065  ' particles left ', f7.0)
15066  write (12, *)
15067  end if
15068  ! stipper foils
15069  if (iitem(i)==16) then
15070  write (12, 5043) dav1(i, 4), dav1(i, 1), dav1(i, 2), &
15071  dav1(i, 3), dav1(i, 5), dav1(i, 6), dav1(i, 36)
15072 5043 format (f9.2, ' mm stripper: atomic number: ', f4.0, &
15073  ' atomic mass : ', f4.0, ' thickness :', e12.5, &
15074  ' g/cm**2', /, 4x, 'particles charge : ', f4.0, 2x, &
15075  'energy loss: ', e12.5, ' MeV', /, ' particles left ', &
15076  f7.0)
15077  write (12, *)
15078  end if
15079  ! accelerating gap
15080  if (iitem(i)==17) then
15081  n = int(dav1(i,25)+.5)
15082  ! 16/12/09 if(itvol.and.imamin) then
15083  ! 16/12/09 write(12,1009)
15084  ! dav1(i,24),n,dav1(i,1),dav1(i,2),
15085  ! 16/12/09 * dav1(i,38),dav1(i,39)
15086  ! 16/12/09 1009 format(f9.2,' mm Ac. gap ',i3,' length
15087  ! ',f7.2,
15088  ! 16/12/09 * 'mm field ',e12.5,' kV/mm',/,
15089  ! 16/12/09 * ' phase offset adjusted with TOF',/,
15090  ! 16/12/09 * ' before adjustement ',e12.5,' deg',
15091  ! 16/12/09 * ' after adjustement ',e14.7,' deg')
15092  ! 16/12/09 else
15093  write (12, 1008) dav1(i, 24), n, dav1(i, 1), dav1(i, 2), &
15094  dav1(i, 38)
15095  ! 16/12/09 endif
15096 1008 format (f9.2, ' mm Ac. gap ', i3, ' length ', f7.2, &
15097  ' mm field ', e12.5, ' kV/mm phase of RF (middle): ', &
15098  e12.5, ' deg')
15099  write (12, *)
15100  end if
15101  ! QUAELEC electric quadrupole
15102  if (iitem(i)==18) then
15103  write (12, 2010) dav1(i, 4), dav1(i, 1), dav1(i, 7), &
15104  dav1(i, 2), dav1(i, 6), dav1(i, 5), dav1(i, 3), &
15105  dav1(i, 36)
15106 2010 format (f9.2, ' mm Quadrupole (electric): length = ', e12.5, &
15107  ' mm aperture radius = ', e12.5, ' mm', /, ' voltage = ', &
15108  f8.3, ' kV K2 = ', e12.5, ' cm-2 gradient = ', e12.5, &
15109  ' kV/(cm*cm) ', /, ' momentum = ', e12.5, &
15110  ' kV particles left ', f7.0)
15111  write (12, *)
15112  end if
15113  ! QUAFK quadrupole(magnetic or electric)
15114  if (iitem(i)==19) then
15115  ! electric quadrupole
15116  if (ityq) then
15117  write (12, 2110) dav1(i, 4), dav1(i, 1), dav1(i, 7), &
15118  dav1(i, 2), dav1(i, 6), dav1(i, 5), dav1(i, 3), &
15119  dav1(i, 36)
15120 2110 format (f9.2, ' mm Quadrupole (electric): length = ', &
15121  e12.5, ' mm aperture radius = ', e12.5, ' mm', /, &
15122  ' voltage = ', e12.5, ' kV K2 = ', e12.5, &
15123  ' cm-2 gradient = ', e12.5, ' kV/cm2', /, &
15124  ' momentum = ', e12.5, ' kV particles left ', f7.0)
15125  else
15126  ! magnetic quadrupole
15127  write (12, 2111) dav1(i, 4), dav1(i, 1), dav1(i, 7), &
15128  dav1(i, 2), dav1(i, 6), dav1(i, 5), dav1(i, 3), &
15129  dav1(i, 36)
15130 2111 format (f9.2, ' mm Quadrupole (magnetic): length = ', &
15131  e12.5, ' mm aperture radius= ', e12.5, ' mm', /, &
15132  ' field = ', e12.5, ' kG K2 = ', e12.5, &
15133  ' cm-2 gradient = ', e12.5, ' kG/cm', /, &
15134  ' momentum = ', e12.5, ' kG.cm particles left ', &
15135  f7.0)
15136  end if
15137  write (12, *)
15138  end if
15139  if (iitem(i)==20) then
15140  ! rotating the transverse coordinates about the z axis
15141  write (12, 2112) dav1(i, 1)
15142 2112 format (9x, 'rotating the transverse coordinates', &
15143  ' about the z-axis by an angle: ', e12.5, ' deg')
15144  write (12, *)
15145  end if
15146  ! EDFLEC electric deflector
15147  if (iitem(i)==21) then
15148  write (12, 3010) dav1(i, 4), dav1(i, 1), dav1(i, 2), &
15149  dav1(i, 3), dav1(i, 5), dav1(i, 6), dav1(i, 7), &
15150  dav1(i, 8), dav1(i, 36)
15151 3010 format (f9.2, ' mm Deflector (electric): length = ', e12.5, &
15152  ' mm bend angle = ', e12.5, ' deg', /, ' bend radius = ', &
15153  e12.5, ' mm radii = ', e12.5, ' field index = ', e12.5, &
15154  /, ' rigidity = ', e12.5, ' kV field = ', e12.5, &
15155  ' kV/mm', ' particles left ', f7.0)
15156  write (12, *)
15157  end if
15158  ! end (big boucle)
15159  end do
15160  return
15161  end subroutine daves
15168  subroutine secord
15169  implicit real *8(a-z)
15170  ! -- POLE FACE ROTATION
15171  common /bloc21/be, apb(2), layl, layx, rabt
15172  common /bloc23/h, devi, nb, bdb, l
15173  common /bloc11/r(6, 6), t(6, 6, 6)
15174  common /secdr/iseor
15175  logical iseor
15176  ! H : INVERSE OF THE MAGNET RADIUS (1./CM)
15177  ! NB : DIMENSIONLESS TRANSPORT n coefficient
15178  ! BDB : TRANSPORT beta coefficient
15179  ! APB( ) : HALF GAP (CM)
15180  ! L : LENGTH OF THE MAGNET (CM)
15181  ! BE : ANGLE OF INLINATION (RAD)
15182  ! LAYL : K1 TRANSPORT COEFFICIENT
15183  ! LAYX : K2 TRANSPORT COEFFICIENT
15184  ! RABT : INVERSE OF THE RADIUS OF CURVATURE (1/CM)
15185 
15186  ! ENTRANCE OR EXIT OF THE BENDING MAGNET, MATRIX R AND T ARE IN (M,RD)
15187  entry pofar1(gap)
15188  ! SAVE H, GAP AND RABT BEFORE CONVERSION IN M UNITS
15189  sah = h
15190  sarabt = rabt
15191  sagap = gap
15192  h = h*100.
15193  gap = gap*1.e-02
15194  rabt = rabt*100.
15195  tb = tan(be)
15196  cb = cos(be)
15197  sb = (1.0+sin(be)**2)/cb
15198  tcor = 2.0*h*gap*layl
15199  be1 = be - tcor*sb*(1.-layx*tcor*tb)
15200  tb1 = tan(be1)
15201  tb2 = tb**2
15202  r(2, 1) = h*tb
15203  r(4, 3) = -h*tb1
15204  if (.not. iseor) go to 3333
15205  sb = 1./cb
15206  sb2 = sb**2
15207  sb3 = sb2*sb
15208  t(1, 1, 1) = -0.5*h*tb2
15209  t(1, 3, 3) = 0.5*h*sb2
15210  t(2, 1, 1) = 0.5*h*rabt*sb3 - tb*nb*h**2
15211  t(2, 1, 2) = h*tb2
15212  t(2, 1, 6) = -h*tb
15213  t(2, 3, 3) = h**2*(nb+0.5+tb2)*tb - 0.5*h*rabt*sb3
15214  t(2, 3, 4) = -h*tb2
15215  t(3, 1, 3) = h*tb2
15216  t(4, 1, 3) = -h*rabt*sb3 + 2.*h**2*nb*tb
15217  t(4, 1, 4) = -h*tb2
15218  t(4, 2, 3) = -h*sb2
15219  sec2 = cos(be1)*cos(be1)
15220  sec2 = 1./sec2
15221  t(4, 3, 6) = h*tb - h*tcor*sec2
15222 3333 continue
15223  ! RESTORE H , RABT, APB(2)
15224  h = sah
15225  rabt = sarabt
15226  gap = sagap
15227  return
15228  ! ***************************
15229  entry pofar2(gap)
15230  ! SAVE H, GAP AND RABT BEFORE CONVERSION IN M UNITY
15231  sah = h
15232  sarabt = rabt
15233  sagap = gap
15234  h = h*100.
15235  gap = gap*1.e-02
15236  rabt = rabt*100.
15237  tb = tan(be)
15238  cb = cos(be)
15239  sb = (1.0+sin(be)**2)/cb
15240  tcor = 2.0*h*gap*layl
15241  be1 = be - tcor*sb*(1.-layx*tcor*tb)
15242  tb1 = tan(be1)
15243  tb2 = tb**2
15244  r(2, 1) = h*tb
15245  r(4, 3) = -h*tb1
15246  if (.not. iseor) go to 4444
15247  sb = 1./cb
15248  sb2 = sb**2
15249  sb3 = sb2*sb
15250  t(1, 1, 1) = 0.5*h*tb2
15251  t(1, 3, 3) = -0.5*h*sb2
15252  t(2, 1, 1) = 0.5*h*rabt*sb3 - tb*(nb+0.5*tb2)*h**2
15253  t(2, 1, 2) = -h*tb2
15254  t(2, 1, 6) = -h*tb
15255  t(2, 3, 3) = h**2*(nb-0.5*tb2)*tb - 0.5*h*rabt*sb3
15256  t(2, 3, 4) = h*tb2
15257  t(3, 1, 3) = -h*tb2
15258  t(4, 1, 3) = -h*rabt*sb3 + h**2*(2.*nb+sb2)*tb
15259  t(4, 1, 4) = h*tb2
15260  t(4, 2, 3) = h*sb2
15261  sec2 = cos(be1)*cos(be1)
15262  sec2 = 1./sec2
15263  t(4, 3, 6) = h*tb - h*tcor*sec2
15264 4444 continue
15265  ! RESTORE H , RABT, APB(2)
15266  h = sah
15267  rabt = sarabt
15268  gap = sagap
15269  return
15270  ! *******************************
15271  ! IDEAL MAGNET, MATRIX R AND T ARE IN (M,RD)
15272  ! *et*2013*Apr*1
15273  entry benmag(sbet, fdtot)
15274  ! sbet is relativistic beta of the charge state of interest
15275  sgam2 = 1./(1.-sbet*sbet)
15276  ! SAVE H BEFORE CONVERSION IN m
15277  sah = h
15278  h = h*100.
15279  fieldn = nb
15280  beta = bdb
15281  al = l*1.e-02
15282  rad = 1.0/h
15283  h2 = h*h
15284  h3 = h2*h
15285  h4 = h3*h
15286  h5 = h4*h
15287  h6 = h5*h
15288  kx2 = (1.0-fieldn)*h2
15289  ky2 = fieldn*h2
15290  kx = sqrt(abs(kx2))
15291  ky = sqrt(abs(ky2))
15292  kx3 = kx2*kx
15293  argx = kx*al
15294  argy = ky*al
15295  sinx = sin(argx)
15296  shx = sinh(argx)
15297  al2 = al*al
15298  al3 = al2*al
15299  cx = 0.
15300  sx = 0.
15301  dx = 0.
15302  j1xl = 0.
15303  if (kx2<6.*0) then
15304  cx = cosh(argx)
15305  sx = sinh(argx)/kx
15306  dx = h*(1.0-cx)/kx2
15307  j1xl = (argx-shx)/kx3
15308  end if
15309  if (kx2==6.*0) then
15310  cx = 1
15311  sx = al
15312  dx = h*al2/2.0
15313  j1xl = al3/6.0
15314  end if
15315  if (kx2>6.*0) then
15316  cx = cos(argx)
15317  sx = sin(argx)/kx
15318  dx = h*(1.0-cx)/kx2
15319  j1xl = (argx-sinx)/kx3
15320  end if
15321  cpx = -kx2*sx
15322  spx = cx
15323  dpx = h*sx
15324  cy = 0.
15325  sy = 0.
15326  if (ky2<6.*0) then
15327  cy = cosh(argy)
15328  sy = sinh(argy)/ky
15329  end if
15330  if (ky2==6.*0) then
15331  cy = 1.0
15332  sy = al
15333  end if
15334  if (ky2>6.*0) then
15335  cy = cos(argy)
15336  sy = sin(argy)/ky
15337  end if
15338  cpy = -ky2*sy
15339  spy = cy
15340  ! First order Matrix R
15341  r(1, 1) = cx
15342  r(1, 2) = sx
15343  r(1, 6) = dx
15344  r(2, 1) = cpx
15345  r(2, 2) = spx
15346  r(2, 6) = dpx
15347  r(3, 3) = cy
15348  r(3, 4) = sy
15349  r(4, 3) = cpy
15350  r(4, 4) = spy
15351  r(5, 1) = h*sx
15352  r(5, 2) = dx
15353  r(5, 6) = h2*j1xl
15354  ! Carey eq.2.41 p 34
15355  ! R(5,6)=R(5,6)-AL/sgam2
15356  r(5, 6) = r(5, 6) - al*fdtot/sgam2
15357  ! *et*2013*Apr*1
15358  ! *et*2013*Apr*1 New term definition based on TRACE3D matrix
15359  ! original R(5,6)=H2*J1XL
15360  ! R(5,6)=-(H2/KX2)*(AL*sbet*sbet-SX)+(AL/(sgam2))*(1-H2/KX2)
15361  ! R(5,6)=H2*(ARGX*sbet*sbet-KX*SX)/KX3+(AL/(sgam2))*(1-H2/KX2)
15362  ! ****test
15363  ! *et*2013*May*19 Sign definition changed for next 3 lines
15364  ! originally next 3 lines commented out;
15365  ! R(5,1)=-R(5,1)
15366  ! R(5,2)=-R(5,2)
15367  ! R(5,6)=-R(5,6)
15368  ! ************************
15369  if (.not. iseor) go to 3334
15370  ! Second order Matrix T
15371  cosx = cos(argx)
15372  chx = cosh(argx)
15373  kx4 = kx2*kx2
15374  kx6 = kx4*kx2
15375  argy = ky*al
15376  siny = sin(argy)
15377  cosy = cos(argy)
15378  shy = sinh(argy)
15379  chy = cosh(argy)
15380  ky3 = ky2*ky
15381  ky4 = ky2*ky2
15382  targx = argx + argx
15383  sin2x = sin(targx)
15384  cos2x = cos(targx)
15385  sh2x = sinh(targx)
15386  ch2x = cosh(targx)
15387  kx3 = kx*kx2
15388  kx5 = kx3*kx2
15389  kx7 = kx5*kx2
15390  targy = argy + argy
15391  sin2y = sin(targy)
15392  cos2y = cos(targy)
15393  sh2y = sinh(targy)
15394  ch2y = cosh(targy)
15395  al4 = al3*al
15396  al5 = al4*al
15397  al6 = al5*al
15398  al7 = al6*al
15399  c = 1.0/(kx2-4.0*ky2)
15400  j1l = 0.
15401  j2l = 0.
15402  j3l = 0.
15403  j2xl = 0.
15404  j3xl = 0.
15405  j4xl = 0.
15406  j5xl = 0.
15407  j7xl = 0.
15408  j9xl = 0.
15409  j10xl = 0.
15410  j11xl = 0.
15411  j12xl = 0.
15412  j13xl = 0.
15413  j14xl = 0.
15414  j15xl = 0.
15415  j16xl = 0.
15416  j17xl = 0.
15417  if (kx2>6.*0) then
15418  cx = dcos(kx*al)
15419  sx = dsin(kx*al)/kx
15420  dx = h*(1.0d0-cx)/kx2
15421  j1xl = (argx-sinx)/kx3
15422  j2xl = (1.0-cosx-.5*argx*sinx)/kx4
15423  j3xl = .5*(sinx-argx*cosx)/kx3
15424  j4xl = (.5*argx-2.0*sinx/3.0+sin2x/12.)/kx5
15425  j5xl = (.25d0-cosx/3.0+cos2x/12.0)/kx4
15426  j10xl = (argx-1.5*sinx+.5*argx*cosx)/kx5
15427  j11xl = (-2.0*argx+3.0*sinx-argx*cosx)/kx5
15428  j12xl = (4.0*argx-5.5*sinx+1.5*argx*cosx)/kx3
15429  j13xl = (.75-2.0*cosx/3.0-cos2x/12.0-.5*argx*sinx)/kx6
15430  j14xl = (1.5-4.0*cosx/3.0-cos2x/6.0-argx*sinx)/kx6
15431  j15xl = (-1.75+4.0*cosx/3.0+5.0*cos2x/12.0+1.5*argx*sinx)/kx4
15432  j16xl = (1.5*argx-7.0*sinx/3.0-sin2x/12.0+argx*cosx)/kx7
15433  j17xl = (-1.75*argx+17.0*sinx/6.0+5.0*sin2x/24.0-1.5*argx*cosx)/ &
15434  kx5
15435  j1l = (.5*argx-.25*sin2x)/kx3
15436  j2l = (.5*argx+.25*sin2x)/kx
15437  j3l = .25*(1.0-cos2x)/kx2
15438  if (ky2<6.*0) then
15439  j7xl = .5*(argx-sinx+kx2*c*(sinx-.5*kx*sh2y/ky))/(kx3*ky2)
15440  j9xl = c*((cosx-1.0)/kx2+(1.0-ch2y)/(4.0*ky2))
15441  end if
15442  if (ky2==6.*0) then
15443  j7xl = (2.0*(sinx-argx)/kx3+al3/3.0)/kx2
15444  j9xl = al2/(2.0*kx2) + (cosx-1.0)/kx4
15445  end if
15446  if (ky2>6.*0) then
15447  j7xl = .5*(argx-sinx+kx2*c*(sinx-.5*kx*sin2y/ky))/(kx3*ky2)
15448  j9xl = c*((cosx-1.0)/kx2+(1.0-cos2y)/(4.0*ky2))
15449  end if
15450  ! endif kx2.gt.0.
15451  end if
15452  if (kx2<6.*0) then
15453  cx = cosh(kx*al)
15454  sx = sinh(kx*al)/kx
15455  dx = h*(1.0-cx)/kx2
15456  j1xl = (argx-shx)/kx3
15457  j2xl = (1.0-chx+.5*argx*shx)/kx4
15458  j3xl = .5*(shx-argx*chx)/kx3
15459  j4xl = (.5*argx-2.0*shx/3.0+sh2x/12.0)/kx5
15460  j5xl = (.25-chx/3.0+ch2x/12.0)/kx4
15461  j10xl = (argx-1.5*shx+.5*argx*chx)/kx5
15462  j11xl = (-2.0*argx+3.0*shx-argx*chx)/kx5
15463  j12xl = (4.0*argx-5.5*shx+1.5*argx*chx)/kx3
15464  j13xl = (.75-2.0*chx/3.0-ch2x/12.0+.5*argx*shx)/kx6
15465  j14xl = (1.5-4.0*chx/3.0-ch2x/6.0+argx*shx)/kx6
15466  j15xl = (-1.75+4.0*chx/3.0+5.0*ch2x/12.0-1.5*argx*shx)/kx4
15467  j16xl = (1.5*argx-7.0*shx/3.0-sh2x/12.0+argx*chx)/kx7
15468  j17xl = (-1.75*argx+17.0*shx/6.0+5.0*sh2x/24.0-1.5*argx*chx)/kx5
15469  j1l = (.5*argx-.25*sh2x)/kx3
15470  j2l = (.5*argx+.25*sh2x)/kx
15471  j3l = .25*(1.0-ch2x)/kx2
15472  if (ky2<6.*0) then
15473  j7xl = .5*(argx-shx+kx2*c*(shx-.5*kx*sh2y/ky))/(kx3*ky2)
15474  j9xl = c*((chx-1)/kx2+(1.0d0-ch2y)/(4.0d0*ky2))
15475  end if
15476  if (ky2==6.*0) then
15477  j7xl = (2.0*(sinx-argx)/kx3+al3/3.0d0)/kx2
15478  j9xl = al2/(2.0d0*kx2) + (chx-1.0d0)/kx4
15479  end if
15480  if (ky2>6.*0) then
15481  j7xl = .5*(argx-shx+kx2*c*(shx-.5d0*kx*sin2y/ky))/(kx3*ky2)
15482  j9xl = c*((chx-1.0)/kx2+(1.0-cos2y)/(4.0*ky2))
15483  end if
15484  ! end kx2.lt.0.
15485  end if
15486  if (kx2==6.*0) then
15487  cx = 1
15488  sx = al
15489  dx = h*al*al/2.0
15490  j1xl = al3/6.0
15491  j2xl = al4/24.0
15492  j3xl = al3/6.0
15493  j4xl = al5/60.0
15494  j5xl = al4/24.0
15495  j7xl = (al3/12.0-al/(8.0*ky2)-sin2y/(16.0*ky3))/ky2
15496  j10xl = -al5/24.0
15497  j11xl = -al5/60.0
15498  j12xl = al3/6.0
15499  j9xl = al2/(8.0*ky2) - (1.0-cos2y)/(16.0*ky4)
15500  j13xl = al6/240.0
15501  j14xl = al6/1080.0
15502  j15xl = al4/12.0
15503  j16xl = al7/840.0
15504  j17xl = al5/60.0
15505  j1l = al3/3.0
15506  j2l = al
15507  j3l = al2/2.0
15508  ! end kx2.eq.0.
15509  end if
15510  cpx = -kx2*sx
15511  spx = cx
15512  dpx = h*sx
15513  j4l = 0.
15514  j5l = 0.
15515  j6l = 0.
15516  if (ky2<6.*0) then
15517  cy = cosh(ky*al)
15518  sy = sinh(ky*al)/ky
15519  j4l = (.5*argy-.25*sh2y)/ky3
15520  j5l = (.5*argy+.25*sh2y)/ky
15521  j6l = .25*(1.0-ch2y)/ky2
15522  end if
15523  if (ky2==6.*0) then
15524  cy = 1.0
15525  sy = al
15526  j4l = al3/3.0
15527  j5l = al
15528  j6l = al2/2.0
15529  end if
15530  if (ky2>6.*0) then
15531  cy = cos(ky*al)
15532  sy = sin(ky*al)/ky
15533  j4l = (.5*argy-.25*sin2y)/ky3
15534  j5l = (.5*argy+.25*sin2y)/ky
15535  j6l = .25*(1.0-cos2y)/ky2
15536  end if
15537  cpy = -ky2*sy
15538  spy = cy
15539  sy2 = sy*sy
15540  a = 2.0*fieldn - 1.0 - beta
15541  b = (2.0-fieldn)
15542  bn1 = 2.0*fieldn - 1.0 - beta
15543  bn2 = 2.5*fieldn - beta - 1.5
15544  bn3 = 2.0*beta - fieldn
15545  ! tabulation of the integrals (notations TRANSPORT SLAC R-75 table
15546  ! VIb)
15547  i10 = dx/h
15548  i11 = 0.5*al*sx
15549  i111 = 1.0*(sx**2+dx*rad)/3.0
15550  i112 = sx*dx*rad/3.0
15551  i133 = dx/h - (ky2/(kx2-4.0*ky2))*(sy2-2.0*dx*rad)
15552  i134 = c*(sy*cy-sx)
15553  i144 = (sy2-2.0*dx*rad)*c
15554  i20 = sx
15555  i21 = (sx+al*cx)/2.0
15556  i22 = i11
15557  i211 = sx*(1.0+2.0*cx)/3.0
15558  i212 = (2.0*sx**2-dx/h)/3.0
15559  i222 = 2.0*sx*dx*rad/3.0
15560  i233 = sx - 2.0*ky2*(sy*cy-sx)*c
15561  i234 = (kx2*dx*rad-2.0*ky2*sy2)*c
15562  i244 = 2.0*c*(sy*cy-sx)
15563  i33 = 0.5*al*sy
15564  if (ky2==6.*0) i34 = al3/6.0
15565  if (ky2/=6.*0) i34 = 0.5*(sy-al*cy)/ky2
15566  i314 = (2.0*sx*cy-sy*(1.0+cx))*c
15567  i324 = c*(2.0*cy*dx*rad-sx*sy)
15568  i43 = 0.5*(sy+al*cy)
15569  i44 = i33
15570  i413 = c*((kx2-2.0*ky2)*sx*cy-ky2*sy*(1.0+cx))
15571  i414 = c*((kx2-2.0*ky2)*sx*sy-cy*(1.0-cx))
15572  i424 = c*(cy*sx-cx*sy-2.0*ky2*sy*dx*rad)
15573  i12 = (sx-al*cx)*0.5/kx2
15574  i27 = (dx*rad-.5*al*sx)/kx2
15575  i313 = c*(kx2*cy*dx*rad-2.0*sx*sy*ky2)
15576  i314 = (2.0*sx*cy-sy*(1.0+cx))*c
15577  i324 = c*(2.0*cy*dx*rad-sx*sy)
15578  i43 = 0.5*(sy+al*cy)
15579  i44 = i33
15580  i413 = c*((kx2-2.0*ky2)*sx*cy-ky2*sy*(1.0+cx))
15581  i414 = c*((kx2-2.0*ky2)*sx*sy-cy*(1.0-cx))
15582  i424 = c*(cy*sx-cx*sy-2.0*ky2*sy*dx*rad)
15583  if (kx/=6.*0) then
15584  i12 = (sx-al*cx)*0.5/kx2
15585  i27 = (dx*rad-.5*al*sx)/kx2
15586  i116 = (0.5*al*sx-(sx**2+dx/h)/3.0)*h/kx2
15587  i122 = (2.0*dx/h-sx**2)/3.0/kx2
15588  i126 = h*(sx+2.0*sx*cx-3.0*al*cx)/6.0/kx2**2
15589  i166 = h2*(4.0*dx*rad/3.0+sx**2/3.0-al*sx)/kx2**2
15590  i216 = h*(al*cx/2.0+sx/6.0-2.0*sx*cx/3.0)/kx2
15591  i226 = h*(0.5*al*sx-2.0*sx**2/3.0+dx*rad/3.0)/kx2
15592  i266 = h2*(sx/3.0+2.0*sx*cx/3.0-al*cx)/kx2**2
15593  i323 = c*(2.0*ky2*sy*(1.0+cx)/kx2-sx*cy) + sy/kx2
15594  i336 = h*(0.5*al*sy-c*(cy*(1.0-cx)-2.0*ky2*sx*sy))/kx2
15595  i346 = h*(i34-c*(2.0*sx*cy-sy*(1.0+cx)))/kx2
15596  i423 = c*(2.0*ky2*cy*(1.0+cx)/kx2-cx*cy-ky2*sx*sy) + cy/kx2
15597  i436 = h*(0.5*al*cy+0.5*sy+c*(ky2*sy*(1.0+ &
15598  cx)-(kx2-2.0*ky2)*sx*cy))/kx2
15599  i446 = h*(al*sy*0.5-c*((kx2-2.0*ky2)*sx*sy-cy*(1.0-cx)))/kx2
15600  i26 = i12*h
15601  else
15602  i12 = al3/6.0
15603  i27 = al4/12.0
15604  i116 = h*al4/24.0
15605  i122 = al4/12.0
15606  i126 = h*al5/40.0
15607  i166 = h2*al2/120.0
15608  i216 = h*al3/6.0
15609  i226 = h*al4/8.0
15610  i266 = h2*al5/20.0
15611  i323 = al2*sy/4.0
15612  i336 = h*al*(al2*sy/12.0+(al*cy-sy)/(ky2*8.0))
15613  i346 = h*al2*(sy/(ky2*8.0)-al*cy/(ky2*12.0))
15614  i423 = (al2*cy+al*sy)/4.0
15615  i436 = h*al2*(sy/8.0+cy*al/12.0)
15616  i446 = h*al*(al2*sy/12.0+(sy-al*cy)/(ky2*8.0))
15617  i26 = i12*h
15618  end if
15619  ! MATRIX T(i,j,k), TRANSPORT SLAC R-75 table VIa
15620 
15621  t(1, 1, 1) = a*h3*i111 + 0.5*kx2**2*i122*h
15622  t(1, 1, 2) = 2.0*a*h3*i112 - kx2*h*i112 + h*sx
15623  t(1, 1, 6) = b*h2*i11 + 2.0*a*h3*i116 - kx2*h2*i122
15624  t(1, 2, 2) = a*h3*i122 + 0.5*h*i111
15625  t(1, 2, 6) = b*h2*i12 + 2.0*a*h3*i126 + h2*i112
15626  t(1, 3, 3) = beta*h3*i133 - 0.5*ky2*h*i10
15627  t(1, 3, 4) = 2.0*beta*h3*i134
15628  t(1, 4, 4) = beta*h3*i144 - 0.5*h*i10
15629  t(1, 6, 6) = b*h2*h*i27 + a*h3*i166 + 0.5d0*h3*i122 - h*i10
15630 
15631  t(2, 1, 1) = a*h3*i211 + 0.5*kx2**2*h*i222 - h*cx*cpx
15632  t(2, 1, 2) = h*spx + 2.0d0*a*h3*i212 - kx2*h*i212 - h*(cx*spx+cpx*sx)
15633  t(2, 1, 6) = b*h2*i21 + 2.0*a*h3*i216 - kx2*h2*i222 - &
15634  h*(cx*dpx+cpx*dx)
15635  t(2, 2, 2) = a*h3*i222 + 0.5*h*i211 - h*sx*spx
15636  t(2, 2, 6) = b*h2*i22 + 2.0*a*h3*i226 + h2*i212 - h*(sx*dpx+spx*dx)
15637  t(2, 3, 3) = beta*h3*i233 - 0.5*ky2*h*i20
15638  t(2, 3, 4) = 2.0*beta*h3*i234
15639  t(2, 4, 4) = beta*h3*i244 - 0.5*h*i20
15640  t(2, 6, 6) = b*h2*i26 + a*h3*i266 + 0.5*h3*i222 - h*dx*dpx - h*i20
15641 
15642  ! VALUE OF "B" IS CHANGED.
15643 
15644  b = beta - fieldn
15645 
15646  t(3, 1, 3) = 2.0*b*h3*i313 + kx2*ky2*h*i324
15647  t(3, 1, 4) = h*sy + 2.0d0*b*h3*i314 - kx2*h*i323
15648  t(3, 2, 3) = 2.0*b*h3*i323 - ky2*h*i314
15649  t(3, 2, 4) = 2.0*b*h3*i324 + h*i313
15650  t(3, 3, 6) = ky2*i33 + 2.0*b*h3*i336 - ky2*h2*i324
15651  t(3, 4, 6) = ky2*i34 + 2.0*b*h3*i346 + h2*i323
15652 
15653  t(4, 1, 3) = 2.0*b*h3*i413 + kx2*ky2*h*i424 - h*cx*cpy
15654  t(4, 1, 4) = h*spy + 2.0*h3*b*i414 - kx2*h*i423 - h*cx*spy
15655  t(4, 2, 3) = 2.0*b*h3*i423 - ky2*h*i414 - h*sx*cpy
15656  t(4, 2, 4) = 2.0*b*h3*i424 + h*i413 - h*sx*spy
15657  t(4, 3, 6) = ky2*i43 + 2.0*b*h3*i436 - ky2*h2*i424 - h*dx*cpy
15658  t(4, 4, 6) = ky2*i44 + 2.0*b*h3*i446 + h2*i423 - h*dx*spy
15659 
15660  t(5, 1, 1) = h4*(bn1*j1xl-bn2*kx2*j4xl) + .5*kx4*j1l
15661  t(5, 1, 2) = h4*2.0*bn2*j5xl - kx2*j3l + h*dx
15662  t(5, 1, 6) = h5*j11xl + h3*j12xl + h*kx2*j3xl + h5*2.0*bn2*j4xl + &
15663  2.0*beta*h5*j10xl - h*kx2*j1l
15664  ! Carey eq. 7.45 p.143
15665  t(5, 1, 6) = t(5, 1, 6) - r(5, 1)/sgam2
15666 
15667  t(5, 2, 2) = .5*(h2*j1xl+h4*2.0*bn2*j4xl+j2l)
15668  t(5, 2, 6) = -2.0*beta*h5*j13xl + h5*j14xl + h3*j15xl + h*kx2*j2xl + &
15669  h*j3l
15670  ! Carey eq. 7.45 p.143
15671  t(5, 2, 6) = t(5, 2, 6) - r(5, 2)/sgam2
15672 
15673  t(5, 3, 3) = .5*(h4*(bn3*j1xl-2.0*beta*ky2*j7xl)+ky4*j4l)
15674  t(5, 3, 4) = 2.0*beta*h4*j9xl - ky2*j6l
15675  t(5, 4, 4) = beta*h4*j7xl - .5*(h2*j1xl-j5l)
15676  t(5, 6, 6) = (1.0-beta)*h6*j16xl + h4*j17xl - h2*j3xl + .5*h2*j1l
15677  ! Carey eq. 7.45 p.143
15678  t(5, 6, 6) = t(5, 6, 6) - r(5, 6)/sgam2
15679  t(5, 6, 6) = t(5, 6, 6) + al*((1./sgam2)**2+1.5*sbet*sbet/sgam2)
15680  ! Carey eq.7.46 p.143
15681  t(5, 5, 6) = -1./sgam2
15682 3334 continue
15683  ! RESTORE H
15684  h = sah
15685  return
15686  end subroutine secord
15692  subroutine syrout(ii)
15693  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
15694  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
15695  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
15696  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
15697  common /bloc11/r(6, 6), t(6, 6, 6)
15698  common /radia/trt, rmoy, xintf, crae
15699  ! ********************************************************************
15700  !*****************
15701  ! Synchrotron radiation
15702  ! COMMON/RADIA/TRT,RMOY,XINTF,CRAE
15703  ! TRT : t.o.f in sec for a particle crossing the bending magnet
15704  ! RMOY : average radius of the bending magnet in the magnetic plane
15705  ! XINTF : integral of (u/uc) * S(u/uc) where S(u/uc) is the spectral
15706  ! function
15707  ! ( see Synchrotron radiation in DYNAC)
15708  ! CRAE : classical electron radius (cm)
15709  ! ********************************************************************
15710  !*******************
15711  ! PGAM : Instantaneous radiation power (MeV/sec)
15712  ! ETA : eta=u/uc
15713  ! uc : critical quanta energy (eV)
15714  ! u : quanta energy (eV) considered
15715  ! the most significant quanta are assumed emitted between: 0.1<eta<3.
15716  e4ii = f(7, ii)**4
15717  gpaii = f(7, ii)/xmat
15718  cgam = (4.*pi/3.)*crae/(xmat**3)
15719  pgam = vl*cgam*e4ii/(2.*pi*rmoy*rmoy)
15720  ! ELOST : Total energy lost due to radiation (MeV)
15721  elost = xintf*pgam*trt
15722  ! variation of the momentum (only available for relativistic
15723  ! electrons)
15724  dmo = -elost/f(7, ii)
15725  ! change the total energy (MeV)
15726  f(7, ii) = f(7, ii) - elost
15727  ! change f(2,ii) and f(3,ii)
15728  ! dmo*r(1,6) is given in m and dmo*r(2,6) in rad, convert in cm and
15729  ! mrad
15730  f(2, ii) = f(2, ii) + dmo*r(1, 6)*100.
15731  f(3, ii) = f(3, ii) + dmo*r(2, 6)*1000.
15732  return
15733  end subroutine syrout
15739  subroutine syref
15740  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
15741  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
15742  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
15743  common /radia/trt, rmoy, xintf, crae
15744  common /dyn/tref, vref
15745  common /bloc23/h, devi, nb, bdb, l
15746  common /itvole/itvol, imamin
15747  common /tofev/ttvols
15748  logical itvol, imamin
15749  real *8 l, nb
15750 
15751  beref = vref/vl
15752  gamref = 1./sqrt(1.-beref*beref)
15753  ener = xmat*gamref*beref
15754  trt = l/vref
15755  e4 = ener**4
15756  cgam = (4.*pi/3.)*crae/(xmat**3)
15757  pgam = vl*cgam*e4/(2.*pi*rmoy*rmoy)
15758  ! ELOST : Total energy lost due to radiation (MeV)
15759  ! change vref and tref of the reference
15760  elost = xintf*pgam*trt
15761  fener = ener - elost
15762  fgam = fener/xmat
15763  fberef = sqrt(1.-1./(fgam*fgam))
15764  vref = fberef*vl
15765  tref = tref + l/vref
15766  if (itvol) ttvols = tref
15767  write (16, 250) elost, ener, fener
15768 250 format (//, ' REFERENCE AFTER RADIATION EXITATION*****', /, &
15769  ' ENERGY LOST (MeV): ', e12.5, /, ' OLD ENERGY (MeV): ', &
15770  e12.5, /, ' NEW ENERGY (MeV): ', e12.5)
15771  return
15772  end subroutine syref
15778  subroutine sextu(imk2, arg, xlsex, rg)
15779  use randlux
15780  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
15781  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
15782  common /fene/wdisp, wphas, wx, wy, rlim, ifw
15783  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
15784  common /dyn/tref, vref
15785  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
15786  common /rigid/boro
15787  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
15788  common /etcom/cog(8), exten(17), fd(iptsz)
15789  common /qmoyen/qmoy
15790  common /dcspa/iesp
15791  logical iesp
