15792  common /sc3/beamc, scdist, sce10, cplm, ect, apl, ichaes, iscsp
15793  logical ichaes
15794  common /tapes/in, ifile, meta
15795  common /pltprf/sprfx(3000), sprfy(3000), sprfl(3000), sprfw(3000), &
15796  sprfp(3000), sprng(3000), iprf
15797  common /davcom/dav1(maxcell1, 40), davtot, iitem(maxcell1), idav
15798  common /shif/dtiph, shift
15799  logical shift
15800  common /compt/nrres, nrtre, nrbunc, nrdbun
15801  common /rander/ialin
15802  logical ialin
15803  common /qskew/qtwist, iqrand, itwist, iaqu
15804  logical itwist
15805  common /femt/iemgrw, iemqesg
15806  logical iemgrw
15807  common /cgtof/charm(20), cgtdv(20), nbch(20), netac
15808  common /qsex/l, kq2, ks2
15809  real *8 l, kq2, ks2
15810  character *1 cr
15811  dimension trans(2)
15812 
15813  ilost = 0
15814  write (16, *) ' ******SEXTUPOLE*********'
15815  ! statistics
15816  if (iprf==1) call stapl(davtot*10.)
15817  nrtre = nrtre + 1
15818  cr = char(13)
15819  ! print out on terminal of transport element # on one and the same
15820  ! line
15821  write (6, 8254) nrtre, nrres, cr
15822 8254 format ('Transport element:', i5, ' Accelerating element:', i5, &
15823  a1, $)
15824  len = 1
15825  ! if itwist=.true. skews the sextupole before misalignments
15826  sqtwist = 0.
15827  if (itwist .and. arg/=0.) then
15828  if (iqrand==0) then
15829  qtwrad = qtwist
15830  sqtwist = qtwrad
15831  call zrotat(qtwrad)
15832  else
15833  rdcf = .5
15834  call rlux(trans, len)
15835  if (trans(1)<=rdcf) sign = -1.
15836  if (trans(1)>rdcf) sign = 1.
15837  call rlux(trans, len)
15838  qtwrad = qtwist*sign*trans(1)
15839  sqtwist = qtwrad
15840  call zrotat(qtwrad)
15841  end if
15842  end if
15843  if (ialin) call randali
15844  fh0 = fh/vl
15845  write (16, *) 'TOF at input:', tref*fh*180./pi, ' deg'
15846 
15847  gpa = 0.
15848  do ii = 1, ngood
15849  gpa = gpa + f(7, ii)/xmat
15850  end do
15851  gpa = gpa/float(ngood)
15852  l = xlsex
15853  bpa = sqrt(1.-1./(gpa*gpa))
15854  xmco = xmat*bpa*gpa
15855  ri = 33.356*xmco*1.e-01/qst
15856  if (imk2/=0) then
15857  ! arg: field B (kG)
15858  fb = arg
15859  b = arg/(rg*rg)
15860  ks2 = b/ri
15861  else
15862  ! arg: KS2 (cm-3)
15863  ks2 = arg
15864  b = ks2*ri
15865  fb = b*(rg*rg)
15866  end if
15867  write (16, 3300) xlsex, rg, fb, ks2, b, ri
15868 3300 format (' LENGTH = ', e12.3, ' cm APERTURE RADIUS= ', e12.5, ' cm', &
15869  /, ' FIELD = ', e12.5, ' kG KS2 = ', e12.5, ' cm-3', &
15870  ' GRADIENT = ', e12.5, ' kG/(cm*cm)', /, ' MOMENTUM = ', e12.5, &
15871  ' kG.cm', /)
15872  call clear
15873  call elsex
15874  ! print transport matrix (c.o.g.)
15875  call matrix
15876  ! start daves
15877  idav = idav + 1
15878  iitem(idav) = 10
15879  dav1(idav, 1) = xlsex*10.
15880  dav1(idav, 2) = b
15881  dav1(idav, 3) = fb
15882  davtot = davtot + xlsex
15883  dav1(idav, 4) = davtot*10.
15884  dav1(idav, 5) = ks2
15885  dav1(idav, 6) = rg
15886  dav1(idav, 7) = ri
15887  ! first half sextupole
15888  l = xlsex/2.
15889  do ii = 1, ngood
15890  call clear
15891  gpai = f(7, ii)/xmat
15892  bpai = sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
15893  xmco = xmat*bpai*gpai
15894  ri = 33.356*xmco*1.e-01/f(9, ii)
15895  ks2 = b/ri
15896  call elsex
15897  call cobeam(ii, l)
15898  ! the evolution of the t.o.f is made in routine cobeam)
15899  ! omment f(6,ii)=f(6,ii)+l/(bpai*vl)
15900  end do
15901  ! Charge space effect (if dl >0)
15902  if (ichaes .and. l>0.) then
15903  if (sce10==1 .or. sce10==3.) then
15904  iesp = .true.
15905  write (16, *) 'space charge at the middle '
15906  call cesp(xlsex)
15907  iesp = .false.
15908  end if
15909  end if
15910  bcour = 0.
15911  do i = 1, ngood
15912  gpai = f(7, i)/xmat
15913  bcour = sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai)) + bcour
15914  end do
15915  bcour = bcour/float(ngood)
15916  gcour = 1./sqrt(1.-bcour*bcour)
15917  wcg = (gcour-1.)*xmat
15918  ! ----- convert wdisp in dp/p (window control)
15919  ! ---- ifw = 0 ===> wdisp = dW/W
15920  ! ---- ifw = 1 ===> wdisp = dW (MeV)
15921  if (ifw==0) dispr = gcour*gcour*wdisp/(gcour*(gcour+1.))
15922  if (ifw==1) dispr = gcour*gcour*wdisp/(gcour*(gcour+1.)*wcg)
15923  ! ---- Change the dispersion with the new energy
15924  do i = 1, ngood
15925  gpai = f(7, i)/xmat
15926  bpai = sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
15927  fd(i) = bpai/bcour*gpai/gcour
15928  end do
15929  ! Test window after the first half sextupole
15930  call cogetc
15931  call reject(nlost)
15932  ! Reshuffles f(i,j) array after window (now done in 'reject')
15933  ! call shuffle
15934  call shuffle
15935  ! second half sextupole
15936  do ii = 1, ngood
15937  call clear
15938  gpai = f(7, ii)/xmat
15939  bpai = sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
15940  xmco = xmat*bpai*gpai
15941  ri = 33.356*xmco*1.e-01/f(9, ii)
15942  ks2 = b/ri
15943  call elsex
15944  call cobeam(ii, l)
15945  end do
15946  ! Test window after the second half sextupole (only in transverse
15947  ! directions and phase)
15948  call cogetc
15949  call reject(ilost)
15950  ilost = ilost + nlost
15951  ! Reshuffles f(i,j) array after window (now done in 'reject')
15952  ! call shuffle
15953  ! Change the t.o.f of the reference
15954  tref = tref + xlsex/vref
15955  dav1(idav, 36) = ngood
15956  write (16, *) 'TOF at output:', tref*fh*180./pi, ' deg'
15957  write (16, *) ' particles lost in sextupole :', ilost
15958  ! returns coordinates to the initial orientation
15959  if (itwist .and. b/=0.) then
15960  qtwrad = -sqtwist
15961  call zrotat(qtwrad)
15962  end if
15963  if (iemgrw) call emiprt(0)
15964  call stapl(davtot*10.)
15965  return
15966  end subroutine sextu
15976  subroutine qalva(bquad, xlqua, rg)
15977  use randlux
15978 
15979  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
15980  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
15981  common /fene/wdisp, wphas, wx, wy, rlim, ifw
15982  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
15983  common /dyn/tref, vref
15984  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
15985  common /rigid/boro
15986  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
15987  common /etcom/cog(8), exten(17), fd(iptsz)
15988  common /qmoyen/qmoy
15989  common /dcspa/iesp
15990  logical iesp
15991  common /sc3/beamc, scdist, sce10, cplm, ect, apl, ichaes, iscsp
15992  logical ichaes
15993  common /tapes/in, ifile, meta
15994  common /pltprf/sprfx(3000), sprfy(3000), sprfl(3000), sprfw(3000), &
15995  sprfp(3000), sprng(3000), iprf
15996  common /davcom/dav1(maxcell1, 40), davtot, iitem(maxcell1), idav
15997  common /shif/dtiph, shift
15998  logical shift
15999  common /compt/nrres, nrtre, nrbunc, nrdbun
16000  common /rander/ialin
16001  logical ialin
16002  common /qskew/qtwist, iqrand, itwist, iaqu
16003  logical itwist
16004  common /femt/iemgrw, iemqesg
16005  logical iemgrw
16006  common /cgtof/charm(20), cgtdv(20), nbch(20), netac
16007  common /qsex/l, kq2, ks2
16008  common /tofev/ttvols
16009  common /itvole/itvol, imamin
16010  logical itvol, imamin
16011  real *8 l, kq2, ks2
16012  dimension trans(1)
16013  character *1 cr
16014  ! print out on terminal of transport element # on one and the same
16015  ! line
16016  nrtre = nrtre + 1
16017  cr = char(13)
16018  write (6, 8254) nrtre, nrres, cr
16019 8254 format ('Transport element:', i5, ' Accelerating element:', i5, &
16020  a1, $)
16021  ilost = 0
16022  ! B : GRADIENT IN kG/cm
16023  b = bquad/rg
16024  ! statistics
16025  if (iprf==1) call stapl(davtot*10.)
16026  write (16, *) ' ***QUADRUPOLE (magnetic) ***'
16027  fcpi = fh*180./pi
16028  if (itvol) write (16, 10) ttvols*fcpi, davtot
16029 10 format (' ** TOF (input of the lens): ', e12.5, ' deg at: ', e12.5, &
16030  ' cm in the lattice')
16031  ! if itwist=.true: skews the quadrupole before misalignments (if b ne
16032  ! 0)
16033  ! len = 1 level in rlux routine
16034  len = 1
16035  if (itwist .and. b/=0.) then
16036  if (iqrand==0) then
16037  qtwrad = qtwist
16038  sqtwist = qtwrad
16039  call zrotat(qtwrad)
16040  else
16041  rdcf = .5
16042  call rlux(trans, len)
16043  if (trans(1)<=rdcf) sign = -1.
16044  if (trans(1)>rdcf) sign = 1.
16045  call rlux(trans, len)
16046  qtwrad = qtwist*sign*trans(1)
16047  sqtwist = qtwrad
16048  call zrotat(qtwrad)
16049  end if
16050  else
16051  sqtwist = 0.
16052  end if
16053  if (ialin) call randali
16054  fh0 = fh/vl
16055  ! print transport matrix (cog)
16056  gpa = 0.
16057  do ii = 1, ngood
16058  gpa = gpa + f(7, ii)/xmat
16059  end do
16060  gpa = gpa/float(ngood)
16061  l = xlqua
16062  bpa = sqrt(1.-1./(gpa*gpa))
16063  xmco = xmat*bpa*gpa
16064  ri = 33.356*xmco*1.e-01/qst
16065  kq2 = b/ri
16066  call clear
16067  call elqua
16068  write (16, 3300) xlqua, rg, bquad, kq2, b, ri
16069 3300 format (' LENGTH = ', e12.5, ' cm APERTURE RADIUS= ', e12.5, ' cm', &
16070  /, ' FIELD = ', e12.5, ' kG K2 = ', e12.5, ' cm-2 ', &
16071  ' GRADIENT = ', e12.5, ' kG/cm', /, ' MOMENTUM = ', e12.5, &
16072  ' kG.cm', /)
16073  call matrix
16074  ! Daves start
16075  idav = idav + 1
16076  iitem(idav) = 2
16077  dav1(idav, 1) = xlqua*10.
16078  dav1(idav, 2) = bquad
16079  davtot = davtot + xlqua
16080  dav1(idav, 4) = davtot*10.
16081  dav1(idav, 3) = kq2
16082  dav1(idav, 5) = b
16083  dav1(idav, 6) = ri
16084  dav1(idav, 7) = rg*10.
16085  ! first half quadrupole
16086  l = xlqua/2.
16087  do ii = 1, ngood
16088  call clear
16089  gpai = f(7, ii)/xmat
16090  bpai = sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
16091  xmco = xmat*bpai*gpai
16092  ri = 33.356*xmco*1.e-01/f(9, ii)
16093  kq2 = b/ri
16094  call elqua
16095  call cobeam(ii, l)
16096  end do
16097  ! Charge space computations (if dl >0)
16098  if (ichaes .and. l>0.) then
16099  if (sce10==1 .or. sce10==3.) then
16100  iesp = .true.
16101  write (16, *) 'space charge at the middle '
16102  call cesp(xlqua)
16103  iesp = .false.
16104  ! Change the dispersion dE/E with respect to the C.O.G of the
16105  ! bunch
16106  call disp
16107  end if
16108  end if
16109  ! Test window after the first half quadrupole (after s.c.
16110  ! computations)
16111  call cogetc
16112  bcour = 0.
16113  do i = 1, ngood
16114  gpai = f(7, i)/xmat
16115  bcour = sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai)) + bcour
16116  end do
16117  bcour = bcour/float(ngood)
16118  gcour = 1./sqrt(1.-bcour*bcour)
16119  wcg = (gcour-1.)*xmat
16120  ! ----- window control
16121  call reject(nlost)
16122  ! Reshuffles f(i,j) array after window (now done in 'reject')
16123  ! call shuffle
16124  ! second half quadrupole
16125  do ii = 1, ngood
16126  call clear
16127  gpai = f(7, ii)/xmat
16128  bpai = sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
16129  xmco = xmat*bpai*gpai
16130  ri = 33.356*xmco*1.e-01/f(9, ii)
16131  kq2 = b/ri
16132  call elqua
16133  ! ********CONTROL :print matrix for particle number 1 (only for
16134  ! tests)
16135  ! omment if(ii.eq.1) then
16136  ! omment write(16,*) ' *****second half quadrupole'
16137  ! omment xkq2=sqrt(abs(kq2))
16138  ! omment xkql=xkq2*l*57.29578
16139  ! omment write(16,3300) ri,xkq2,xkql
16140  ! omment call matrix
16141  ! omment endif
16142  call cobeam(ii, l)
16143  end do
16144  ! Test window after the second half quadrupole
16145  call cogetc
16146  call reject(ilost)
16147  ilost = ilost + nlost
16148  ! Reshuffles f(i,j) array after window (now done in 'reject')
16149  ! call shuffle
16150  ! Change the t.o.f
16151  tref = tref + xlqua/vref
16152  if (itvol) ttvols = tref
16153  tcog = 0.
16154  do i = 1, ngood
16155  tcog = tcog + f(6, i)
16156  end do
16157  tcog = tcog/float(ngood)
16158  if (itvol) then
16159  write (16, 11) ttvols*fcpi, davtot, tref*fcpi, tcog*fcpi
16160 11 format (' ** tof: ', e12.5, ' deg at: ', e12.5, &
16161  ' cm in the lattice', /, 3x, 'tof of the reference: ', e12.5, &
16162  ' deg tof of the cog: ', e12.5, ' deg')
16163  else
16164  write (16, 12) tref*fcpi, tcog*fcpi
16165 12 format (' ** tof of the reference: ', e12.5, &
16166  ' deg tof of the cog: ', e12.5, ' deg')
16167  end if
16168  dav1(idav, 36) = ngood
16169  write (16, *) ' particles lost in quadrupole :', ilost
16170  ! returns coordinates to the initial orientation
16171  if (itwist .and. b/=0.) then
16172  qtwrad = -sqtwist
16173  call zrotat(qtwrad)
16174  end if
16175  if (iemgrw) call emiprt(0)
16176  ! envelope
16177  call stapl(davtot*10.)
16178  return
16179  end subroutine qalva
16194  subroutine qasex(iksq, args, argq, xlqua, rg)
16195  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
16196  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
16197  common /fene/wdisp, wphas, wx, wy, rlim, ifw
16198  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
16199  common /dyn/tref, vref
16200  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
16201  common /rigid/boro
16202  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
16203  common /etcom/cog(8), exten(17), fd(iptsz)
16204  common /qmoyen/qmoy
16205  common /dcspa/iesp
16206  logical iesp
16207  common /sc3/beamc, scdist, sce10, cplm, ect, apl, ichaes, iscsp
16208  logical ichaes
16209  common /tapes/in, ifile, meta
16210  common /pltprf/sprfx(3000), sprfy(3000), sprfl(3000), sprfw(3000), &
16211  sprfp(3000), sprng(3000), iprf
16212  common /davcom/dav1(maxcell1, 40), davtot, iitem(maxcell1), idav
16213  common /shif/dtiph, shift
16214  logical shift
16215  common /compt/nrres, nrtre, nrbunc, nrdbun
16216  common /rander/ialin
16217  logical ialin
16218  common /qskew/qtwist, iqrand, itwist, iaqu
16219  logical itwist
16220  common /femt/iemgrw, iemqesg
16221  logical iemgrw
16222  common /cgtof/charm(20), cgtdv(20), nbch(20), netac
16223  common /qsex/l, kq2, ks2
16224  real *8 l, kq2, ks2
16225  character *1 cr
16226  ! print out on terminal of transport element # on one and the same
16227  ! line
16228  nrtre = nrtre + 1
16229  cr = char(13)
16230  write (6, 8254) nrtre, nrres, cr
16231 8254 format ('Transport element:', i5, ' Accelerating element:', i5, &
16232  a1, $)
16233  rgorge = rg
16234  ilost = 0
16235  ! statistics
16236  if (iprf==1) call stapl(davtot*10.)
16237  ! if itwist=.true. skews the quasex before misalignments
16238  ! omment len=1
16239  ! omment if(itwist.and.b.ne.0.) then
16240  ! omment if(iqrand.eq.0) then
16241  ! omment qtwrad=qtwist
16242  ! omment sqtwist=qtwrad
16243  ! omment call zrotat(qtwrad)
16244  ! omment else
16245  ! omment rdcf=.5
16246  ! omment call rlux(trans,len)
16247  ! omment if(trans.le.rdcf) sign=-1.
16248  ! omment if(trans.gt.rdcf) sign=1.
16249  ! omment call rlux(trans,len)
16250  ! omment qtwrad=qtwist*sign*trans
16251  ! omment sqtwist=qtwrad
16252  ! omment call zrotat(qtwrad)
16253  ! omment endif
16254  ! omment endif
16255  ! misalignments
16256  if (ialin) call randali
16257  gpa = 0.
16258  do ii = 1, ngood
16259  gpa = gpa + f(7, ii)/xmat
16260  end do
16261  gpa = gpa/float(ngood)
16262  l = xlqua
16263  bpa = sqrt(1.-1./(gpa*gpa))
16264  xmco = xmat*bpa*gpa
16265  ri = 33.356*xmco*1.e-01/qst
16266  if (iksq/=0) then
16267  ! --- quadrupole: argq = field fq (kG)
16268  fq = argq
16269  bq = fq/rg
16270  ! kq2: strength (cm-2)
16271  kq2 = bq/ri
16272  ! --- sextupole: args = field fs (kG)
16273  fs = args
16274  bs = fs/(rg*rg)
16275  ! ks2 strength (cm-3)
16276  ks2 = bs/ri
16277  else
16278  ! --- quadrupole: argq is kq2 (cm-2)
16279  kq2 = argq
16280  fq = kq2*rg*ri
16281  bq = kq2*ri
16282  ! --- sextupole: args is ks2 (cm-3)
16283  ks2 = args
16284  bs = ks2*ri
16285  fs = bs*(rg*rg)
16286  end if
16287  call clear
16288  call elqsex
16289  write (16, *) ' *****LENS QUADRUPOLE+SEXTUPOLE ********'
16290  write (16, 3300) xlqua, rg, fq, kq2, bq, fs, ks2, bs, ri
16291 3300 format (' LENS: LENGTH = ', e12.5, ' cm APERTURE RADIUS = ', e12.5, &
16292  ' cm', /, ' QUADRUPOLE: FIELD = ', e12.5, ' kG KQ2 = ', e12.5, &
16293  ' cm-2 GRADIENT = ', e12.5, ' kG/cm', /, ' SEXTUPOLE: FIELD = ', &
16294  e12.5, ' kG KS2 = ', e12.5, ' cm-3', ' GRADIENT = ', e12.5, &
16295  ' kG/(cm*cm)', /, ' MOMENTUM = ', e12.5, ' kG.cm', /)
16296  fh0 = fh/vl
16297  write (16, *) 'TOF at input:', tref*fh*180./pi, ' deg'
16298  ! print transport matrix (c.o.g.)
16299  call matrix
16300  ! start Daves
16301  idav = idav + 1
16302  iitem(idav) = 12
16303  dav1(idav, 1) = xlqua*10.
16304  dav1(idav, 6) = rg*10.
16305  dav1(idav, 2) = fq
16306  dav1(idav, 3) = kq2
16307  ! gradient (quad) dav1(idav,5)=bq
16308  dav1(idav, 7) = fs
16309  dav1(idav, 8) = ks2
16310  ! gradient (sol) dav1(idav,9)=bs
16311  dav1(idav, 10) = ri
16312  davtot = davtot + xlqua
16313  dav1(idav, 4) = davtot*10.
16314  ! first half quasex
16315  l = xlqua/2.
16316  do ii = 1, ngood
16317  call clear
16318  gpai = f(7, ii)/xmat
16319  bpai = sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
16320  xmco = xmat*bpai*gpai
16321  ri = 33.356*xmco*1.e-01/f(9, ii)
16322  kq2 = bq/ri
16323  ks2 = bs/ri
16324  call elqsex
16325  ! ********CONTROL :print matrix for particle number 1 (only for
16326  ! tests)
16327  ! omment if(ii.eq.5) then
16328  ! omment write(16,*) ' *****first half quasex'
16329  ! omment xkq2=sqrt(abs(kq2))
16330  ! omment xkql=xkq2*l*57.29578
16331  ! omment xks=sqrt(abs(ks2))
16332  ! omment xksl=xks*l**(1.5)*57.29578
16333  ! omment write(16,3300) ri,xkq2,xkql,xks,xksl
16334  ! omment call matrix
16335  ! omment endif
16336  ! ********END CONTROL
16337  call cobeam(ii, l)
16338  end do
16339  ! Charge space effect (if dl >0)
16340  if (ichaes .and. l>0.) then
16341  if (sce10==1 .or. sce10==3.) then
16342  iesp = .true.
16343  write (16, *) 'space charge at the middle '
16344  call cesp(xlqua)
16345  iesp = .false.
16346  ! Change the dispersion dE/E with respect to the C.O.G of the
16347  ! bunch
16348  call disp
16349  end if
16350  end if
16351  ! Test window after the first half quasex (after s.c. computations)
16352  bcour = 0.
16353  do i = 1, ngood
16354  gpai = f(7, i)/xmat
16355  bcour = sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai)) + bcour
16356  end do
16357  bcour = bcour/float(ngood)
16358  gcour = 1./sqrt(1.-bcour*bcour)
16359  wcg = (gcour-1.)*xmat
16360  ! ----- window control
16361  call cogetc
16362  call reject(nlost)
16363  ! Reshuffles f(i,j) array after window (now done in 'reject')
16364  ! call shuffle
16365  ! second half quasex
16366  do ii = 1, ngood
16367  call clear
16368  gpai = f(7, ii)/xmat
16369  bpai = sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
16370  xmco = xmat*bpai*gpai
16371  ri = 33.356*xmco*1.e-01/f(9, ii)
16372  kq2 = bq/ri
16373  ks2 = bs/ri
16374  call elqsex
16375  ! ********CONTROL :print matrix for particle number 1 (only for
16376  ! tests)
16377  ! omment if(ii.eq.5) then
16378  ! omment write(16,*) ' *****second half quasex'
16379  ! omment xkq2=sqrt(abs(kq2))
16380  ! omment xkql=xkq2*l*57.29578
16381  ! omment xks=sqrt(abs(ks2))
16382  ! omment xksl=xks*l**(1.5)*57.29578
16383  ! omment write(16,3300) ri,xkq2,xkql,xks,xksl
16384  ! omment call matrix
16385  ! omment endif
16386  ! ********END CONTROL
16387  call cobeam(ii, l)
16388  end do
16389  ! Test window after the second half quasex (only in transverse
16390  ! directions and phase)
16391  call cogetc
16392  call reject(ilost)
16393  ilost = ilost + nlost
16394  ! Reshuffles f(i,j) array after window (now done in 'reject')
16395  ! call shuffle
16396  ! t.o.f of the reference
16397  tref = tref + xlqua/vref
16398  dav1(idav, 36) = ngood
16399  write (16, *) 'TOF at output:', tref*fh*180./pi, ' deg'
16400  write (16, *) ' particles lost:', ilost
16401  ! returns coordinates to the initial orientation
16402  ! omment if(itwist.and.b.ne.0.) then
16403  ! omment qtwrad=-sqtwist
16404  ! omment call zrotat(qtwrad)
16405  ! omment endif
16406  if (iemgrw) call emiprt(0)
16407  call stapl(davtot*10.)
16408  return
16409  end subroutine qasex
16418  subroutine quasex
16419  implicit real *8(a-z)
16420  common /qsex/l, kq2, ks2
16421  common /bloc11/r(6, 6), t(6, 6, 6)
16422  common /secdr/iseor
16423  logical iseor
16424  entry elqua
16425  ! PURE QUADRUPOLE FIELD, MATRIX R AND T ARE IN (M,RD)
16426  akq2 = kq2*1.e04
16427  al = l*1.e-02
16428  akq = sqrt(abs(akq2))
16429  if (akq<1.e-13) akq = 1.e-13
16430  arg = akq*al
16431  csin = sin(arg)
16432  ccos = cos(arg)
16433  hsin = sinh(arg)
16434  hcos = cosh(arg)
16435  if (akq2>0.0) then
16436  ssok = csin/akq
16437  sc = ccos
16438  bsok = hsin/akq
16439  bc = hcos
16440  else
16441  ssok = hsin/akq
16442  sc = hcos
16443  bsok = csin/akq
16444  bc = ccos
16445  end if
16446  r(1, 1) = sc
16447  r(1, 2) = ssok
16448  r(2, 1) = -akq2*ssok
16449  r(2, 2) = sc
16450  r(3, 3) = bc
16451  r(3, 4) = bsok
16452  r(4, 3) = akq2*bsok
16453  r(4, 4) = bc
16454  if (.not. iseor) return
16455  ! T116=AMAT(12,1)
16456  t(1, 1, 6) = al*akq2*ssok/2.0
16457  ! T126=AMAT(17,1)
16458  t(1, 2, 6) = (ssok-al*sc)/2.0
16459  ! T216=AMAT(12,2)
16460  t(2, 1, 6) = akq2*(ssok+al*sc)/2.0
16461  ! T226=AMAT(17,2)
16462  t(2, 2, 6) = t(1, 1, 6)
16463  ! T336= AMAT(21,3) T346=AMAT(24,3)
16464  t(3, 3, 6) = -al*akq2*bsok/2.0
16465  t(3, 4, 6) = (bsok-al*bc)/2.0
16466  ! T436=AMAT(21,4) T446=AMAT(24,4)
16467  t(4, 3, 6) = -akq2*(bsok+al*bc)/2.0
16468  t(4, 4, 6) = t(3, 3, 6)
16469  ! T511=AMAT(7,5) T512=AMAT(8,5) T522=AMAT(13,5) T533=AMAT(18,5)
16470  t(5, 1, 1) = akq2*(al-sc*ssok)/4.0
16471  t(5, 1, 2) = -akq2*ssok*ssok/2.0
16472  t(5, 2, 2) = (al+sc*ssok)/4.0
16473  t(5, 3, 3) = -akq2*(al-bc*bsok)/4.0
16474  ! T534=AMAT(19,5) T544=AMAT(22,5)
16475  t(5, 3, 4) = akq2*(bsok*bsok)/2.0
16476  t(5, 4, 4) = (al+bc*bsok)/4.0
16477  return
16478  entry elsex
16479  ! PURE SEXTUPOLE FIELD, MATRIX R AND T ARE IN (M,RD)
16480  aks2 = ks2*1.e06
16481  al = l*1.e-02
16482 1000 continue
16483  akl1 = aks2*al
16484  akl2 = akl1*al
16485  akl3 = akl2*al
16486  akl4 = akl3*al
16487  r(1, 2) = al
16488  r(3, 4) = al
16489  if (.not. iseor) return
16490  ! T522=AMAT(13,5) T544=AMAT(22,5)
16491  t(5, 2, 2) = al/2.0
16492  t(5, 4, 4) = al/2.0
16493  if (aks2==0.0) return
16494  ! T111=AMAT( 7,1) T112=AMAT( 8,1) T122=AMAT(13,1)
16495  t(1, 1, 1) = -akl2/2.0
16496  t(1, 1, 2) = -akl3/3.0
16497  t(1, 2, 2) = -akl4/12.0
16498  ! T133=AMAT(18,1) T134=AMAT(19,1) T144=AMAT(22,1)
16499  t(1, 3, 3) = akl2/2.0
16500  t(1, 3, 4) = akl3/3.0
16501  t(1, 4, 4) = akl4/12.0
16502  ! T211=AMAT( 7,2) T212=AMAT( 8,2) T222=AMAT(13,2)
16503  t(2, 1, 1) = -akl1
16504  t(2, 1, 2) = -akl2
16505  t(2, 2, 2) = -akl3/3.0
16506  ! T233=AMAT(18,2) T234=AMAT(19,2) T244=AMAT(22,2)
16507  t(2, 3, 3) = akl1
16508  t(2, 3, 4) = akl2
16509  t(2, 4, 4) = akl3/3.0
16510  ! T313=AMAT( 9,3) T314=AMAT( 10,3) T323=AMAT(14,3) T324=AMAT(15,3)
16511  t(3, 1, 3) = akl2
16512  t(3, 1, 4) = akl3/3.0
16513  t(3, 2, 3) = akl3/3.0
16514  t(3, 2, 4) = akl4/6.0
16515  ! T413=AMAT(9,4) T414=AMAT( 10,4) T423=AMAT(14,4) T424=AMAT(15,4)
16516  t(4, 1, 3) = akl1*2.0
16517  t(4, 1, 4) = akl2
16518  t(4, 2, 3) = akl2
16519  t(4, 2, 4) = akl3*2.0/3.0
16520  return
16521  entry elqsex
16522  ! QUADRUPOLE FIELD + SEXTUPOLE FIELD
16523  aks2 = ks2*1.e06
16524  al = l*1.e-02
16525  akq2 = kq2*1.e04
16526  akq = sqrt(abs(akq2))
16527  arg = akq*al
16528  csin = sin(arg)
16529  ccos = cos(arg)
16530  hsin = sinh(arg)
16531  hcos = cosh(arg)
16532  if (akq2>6.*0) then
16533  ssok = csin/akq
16534  sc = ccos
16535  bsok = hsin/akq
16536  bc = hcos
16537  else
16538  ssok = hsin/akq
16539  sc = hcos
16540  bsok = csin/akq
16541  bc = ccos
16542  end if
16543  if (akq2==6.*0) then
16544  r(1, 2) = al
16545  r(3, 4) = al
16546  else
16547  r(1, 1) = sc
16548  r(1, 2) = ssok
16549  r(2, 1) = -akq2*ssok
16550  r(2, 2) = sc
16551  r(3, 3) = bc
16552  r(3, 4) = bsok
16553  r(4, 3) = akq2*bsok
16554  r(4, 4) = bc
16555  end if
16556  if (.not. iseor) return
16557  ! omment IF(KS2.EQ.0.0)RETURN
16558  if (akq2==6.*0) go to 1000
16559  ! T111=AMAT( 7,1) T112=AMAT( 8,1) T116=AMAT(12,1)
16560  t(1, 1, 1) = -aks2*(ssok*ssok+(1.0-sc)/akq2)/3.0
16561  t(1, 1, 2) = -2.0*aks2*(ssok*(1.0-sc)/akq2)/3.0
16562  t(1, 1, 6) = al*akq2*ssok/2.0
16563  ! T122=AMAT(13,1) T126=AMAT(17,1)
16564  t(1, 2, 2) = -aks2*(2.0*(1.0-sc)/akq2-ssok*ssok)/(3.0*akq2)
16565  t(1, 2, 6) = (ssok-al*sc)/2.0
16566  ! T133=AMAT(18,1) T134=AMAT(19,1) T144=AMAT(22,1)
16567  t(1, 3, 3) = aks2*(bsok*bsok+3.0*(1.0-sc)/akq2)/5.0
16568  t(1, 3, 4) = 2.0*aks2*(bsok*bc-ssok)/(5.0*akq2)
16569  t(1, 4, 4) = aks2*(bsok*bsok-2.0*(1.0-sc)/akq2)/(5.0*akq2)
16570  ! T211=AMAT( 7,2) T212= AMAT( 8,2) T216=AMAT(12,2)
16571  t(2, 1, 1) = -aks2*(2.0*ssok*sc+ssok)/3.0
16572  t(2, 1, 2) = -2.0*aks2*(sc*(1.0-sc)/akq2+ssok*ssok)/3.0
16573  t(2, 1, 6) = akq2*(ssok+al*sc)/2.0
16574  ! T222=AMAT(13,2) T226=AMAT(17,2)
16575  t(2, 2, 2) = -aks2*(2.0*ssok-2.0*ssok*sc)/(3.0*akq2)
16576  t(2, 2, 6) = t(1, 1, 6)
16577  ! T233=AMAT(18,2) T234=AMAT(19,2) T244=AMAT(22,2)
16578  t(2, 3, 3) = aks2*(2.0*bsok*bc+3.0*ssok)/5.0
16579  t(2, 3, 4) = 2.0*aks2*(bc*bc+bsok*bsok*akq2-sc)/(5.0*akq2)
16580  t(2, 4, 4) = 2.0*aks2*(bsok*bc-ssok)/(5.0*akq2)
16581  ! T313=AMAT(9,3) T314=AMAT(10,3) T323=AMAT(14,3)
16582  t(3, 1, 3) = 2.0*aks2*(bc*(1.0-sc)/akq2+2.0*ssok*bsok)/5.0
16583  t(3, 1, 4) = 2.0*aks2*(2.0*ssok*bc-bsok*(1.0+sc))/(5.0*akq2)
16584  t(3, 2, 3) = 2.0*aks2*(3.0*bsok-2.0*bsok*sc-ssok*bc)/(5.0*akq2)
16585  ! T324=AMAT(15,3) T336= AMAT(21,3) T346=AMAT(24,3)
16586  t(3, 2, 4) = 2.0*aks2*(2.0*bc*(1.0-sc)/akq2-ssok*bsok)/(5.0*akq2)
16587  t(3, 3, 6) = -al*akq2*bsok/2.0
16588  t(3, 4, 6) = (bsok-al*bc)/2.0
16589  ! T413=AMAT( 9,4) T414=AMAT(10,4) T423=AMAT(14,4) T424=AMAT(15,4)
16590  t(4, 1, 3) = 2.0*aks2*(bsok*(1.0-sc)+bc*ssok+2.0*sc*bsok+2.0*ssok*bc)/ &
16591  5.0
16592  t(4, 1, 4) = 2.0*aks2*(2.0*sc*bc+2.0*ssok*bsok*akq2-bc*(1.0+sc)+bsok* &
16593  ssok*akq2)/(5.0*akq2)
16594  t(4, 2, 3) = 2.0*aks2*(3.0*bc-2.0*bc*sc+2.0*bsok*ssok*akq2-sc*bc-ssok* &
16595  bsok*akq2)/(5.0*akq2)
16596  t(4, 2, 4) = 2.0*aks2*(2.0*bsok*(1.0-sc)+2.0*bc*ssok-sc*bsok-ssok*bc)/ &
16597  (5.0*akq2)
16598  ! T436=AMAT(21,4) T446=AMAT(24,4)
16599  t(4, 3, 6) = -akq2*(bsok+al*bc)/2.0
16600  t(4, 4, 6) = t(3, 3, 6)
16601  ! T511=AMAT(7,5) T512=AMAT(8,5) T522=AMAT(13,5) T533=AMAT(18,5)
16602  t(5, 1, 1) = akq2*(al-sc*ssok)/4.0
16603  t(5, 1, 2) = -akq2*ssok*ssok/2.0
16604  t(5, 2, 2) = (al+sc*ssok)/4.0
16605  t(5, 3, 3) = -akq2*(al-bc*bsok)/4.0
16606  ! T534=AMAT(19,5) T544=AMAT(22,5)
16607  t(5, 3, 4) = akq2*(bsok*bsok)/2.0
16608  t(5, 4, 4) = (al+bc*bsok)/4.0
16609  return
16610  end subroutine quasex
16615  subroutine solfield(bcret, intgr)
16616  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
16617  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
16618  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
16619  common /fene/wdisp, wphas, wx, wy, rlim, ifw
16620  common /dyn/tref, vref
16621  common /rigid/boro
16622  common /dcspa/iesp
16623  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
16624  common /etcom/cog(8), exten(17), fd(iptsz)
16625  common /qmoyen/qmoy
16626  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
16627  common /tapes/in, ifile, meta
16628  common /pltprf/sprfx(3000), sprfy(3000), sprfl(3000), sprfw(3000), &
16629  sprfp(3000), sprng(3000), iprf
16630  common /davcom/dav1(maxcell1, 40), davtot, iitem(maxcell1), idav
16631  common /shif/dtiph, shift
16632  common /rander/ialin
16633  common /femt/iemgrw, iemqesg
16634  common /cgtof/charm(20), cgtdv(20), nbch(20), netac
16635  common /compt/nrres, nrtre, nrbunc, nrdbun
16636  common /sc3/beamc, scdist, sce10, cplm, ect, apl, ichaes, iscsp
16637  common /spl/xspl(4000), yspl(4000), s(5000), p(5000), q(5000)
16638  common /bloc11/r(6, 6), t(6, 6, 6)
16639  dimension rs(6, 6), rcul(6, 6)
16640  logical iesp, ichaes, shift, ialin, iemgrw
16641  character *1 cr
16642  ! print out on terminal of transport element # on one and the same
16643  ! line
16644  nrtre = nrtre + 1
16645  cr = char(13)
16646  write (6, 8254) nrtre, nrres, cr
16647 8254 format ('Transport element:', i5, ' Accelerating element:', i5, &
16648  a1, $)
16649  ! read the magnetic field on the disk
16650  read (25, *) ncord
16651  if (ncord==0) then
16652  rewind(25)
16653  read (25, *) ncord
16654  end if
16655  ! *et*2013*may*24 fix printout of bcrest(=attenuation) and peak field
16656  crest = 0.
16657  do i = 1, ncord
16658  read (25, *) xspl(i), yspl(i)
16659  if (yspl(i)>crest) crest = yspl(i)
16660  end do
16661  zinf = xspl(1)
16662  zsup = xspl(ncord)
16663  call deriv2(ncord)
16664  npas = intgr
16665  dsol = (zsup-zinf)/float(npas)
16666  xlsol = (zsup-zinf)*100.
16667  write (16, 101) xlsol, crest, bcret
16668 101 format (5x, 'Field length =', f7.3, ' cm ', /, 5x, &
16669  'Crest of the field =', f10.4, ' kG', /5x, 'Attenuation factor =', &
16670  f10.4, /)
16671  fh0 = fh/vl
16672  ! random errors in alignment
16673  if (ialin) call randali
16674  ! test window
16675  ilost = 0
16676  ! PLOT
16677  if (iprf==1) call stapl(davtot*10.)
16678  ! start prints in file 'short.data'
16679  idav = idav + 1
16680  iitem(idav) = 5
16681  dav1(idav, 1) = xlsol*10.
16682  dav1(idav, 2) = crest
16683  davti = davtot
16684  davtot = davtot + xlsol
16685  dav1(idav, 4) = davtot*10.
16686  zc = zinf
16687  iesp = .true.
16688  do ia = 1, 6
16689  do ib = 1, 6
16690  if (ia==ib) rcul(ia, ib) = 1.
16691  if (ia/=ib) rcul(ia, ib) = 0.
16692  end do
16693  end do
16694  bisol = 0.
16695  bisol2 = 0.
16696  do i = 1, npas
16697  zcf = zc + dsol
16698  zcf2 = zc + dsol/2.
16699  bsol = bcret*spline(ncord, zcf2)
16700  ! omment write(70,110) i,zcf2,bsol
16701  dscm = dsol*100.
16702  call fldsol(bsol, dscm)
16703  write (16, 520) i, zc, zcf, bsol
16704 520 format (2x, '**STEP: ', i2, ' LIMITS: inf(m)= ', f7.5, &
16705  ' sup(m)= ', f7.5, ' AVERAGE FIELD(kG): ', e12.5)
16706  bisol = bisol + bsol*dsol
16707  bisol2 = bisol2 + bsol*bsol*dsol
16708  ! save equivalent transport matrix
16709  do ia = 1, 6
16710  do ib = 1, 6
16711  rs(ia, ib) = rcul(ia, ib)
16712  end do
16713  end do
16714  call mfordre(rcul, r, rs)
16715  ! ************TEST******************
16716  ! print first order matrix
16717  ! omment write(16,*) ' EQUIVALENT FIRST order MATRIX
16718  ! TRANSFORM (m-rad)'
16719  ! omment skl=0.5*acos(2.*r(1,1)-1.)*57.29578
16720  ! omment write(16,*) '**** K*LENGTH: ',skl,' degrees'
16721  ! omment DO IA=1,6
16722  ! omment write(16,100) (r(ia,ib),ib=1,6)
16723  ! omment ENDDO
16724  ! omment write(16,*) '*******cumul***************'
16725  ! omment DO IA=1,6
16726  ! omment write(16,100) (rcul(ia,ib),ib=1,6)
16727  ! omment ENDDO
16728  ! **********END TEST********************
16729  ! SPACE CHARGE
16730  if (.not. iesp) then
16731  iesp = .true.
16732  go to 720
16733  end if
16734  if (ichaes .and. xlsol>0.) then
16735  if (sce10==1 .or. sce10==3.) then
16736  dscm2 = dscm*2.
16737  call cesp(dscm2)
16738  iesp = .false.
16739  ! dispersion dE/E with respect to the C.O.G of the bunch
16740  call disp
16741  ! et*2015-04-25*test*s
16742  ! et call compress(360.)
16743  ! et*2015-04-25*test*e
16744  end if
16745  end if
16746 720 continue
16747  ! envelope sol
16748  write (16, *) 'distance', davti, dsol
16749  davti = davti + dsol*100.
16750  call stapl((davti)*10.)
16751  zc = zcf
16752  end do
16753  write (16, 922) zc, bisol, bisol2, bisol2/zc
16754 922 format (/, 'Field length (m): ', e12.5, /, &
16755  'Field integral (kG.m): ', e12.5, /, &
16756  'Field squared integral (kG**2.m): ', e12.5, /, &
16757  'Field squared integral/L (kG**2): ', e12.5, /)
16758  ! 110 format(2x,i5,2(2x,e12.5))
16759  ! print first order matrix
16760  write (16, *) ' EQUIVALENT FIRST order MATRIX TRANSFORM (m-rad)'
16761  skl = 0.5*acos(2.*rcul(1,1)-1.)*57.29578
16762  write (16, *) ' ******* K*LENGTH: ', skl, ' degrees'
16763  do ia = 1, 6
16764  write (16, 100)(rcul(ia,ib), ib=1, 6)
16765  end do
16766 100 format (6(3x,e12.5))
16767  ! **************************************************
16768  ! evolution of the t.o.f of the reference
16769  tref = tref + xlsol/vref
16770  dav1(idav, 36) = ngood
16771  ! plots
16772  call stapl(davtot*10.)
16773  if (iemgrw) call emiprt(0)
16774  write (16, *) 'particles lost in solenoid', ilost
16775  return
16776  end subroutine solfield
16777  subroutine fldsol(dbs, step)
16778  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
16779  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
16780  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
16781  common /fene/wdisp, wphas, wx, wy, rlim, ifw
16782  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
16783  common /etcom/cog(8), exten(17), fd(iptsz)
16784  common /femt/iemgrw, iemqesg
16785  common /cgtof/charm(20), cgtdv(20), nbch(20), netac
16786  common /sole/l, kl, ko
16787  real *8 l, kl, ko
16788 
16789  l = step
16790  b = dbs
16791  gpai = 0.
16792  do ii = 1, ngood
16793  gpai = gpai + f(7, ii)/xmat
16794  end do
16795  gpai = gpai/float(ngood)
16796  bpai = sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
16797  xmco = xmat*bpai*gpai
16798  ri = 33.356*xmco*1.e-01/qst
16799  ko = b/ri
16800  if (ko==0.) ko = 1.e-16
16801  kl = ko*l
16802  ! half step
16803  ! omment kl=kl/2.
16804  call clear
16805  call elsol
16806  do ii = 1, ngood
16807  ! **********
16808  ! omment call clear
16809  ! omment gpai=f(7,ii)/xmat
16810  ! omment bpai=sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
16811  ! omment xmco=xmat*bpai*gpai
16812  ! omment RI=33.356*XMCO*1.E-01/f(9,ii)
16813  ! omment KO = B /RI
16814  ! omment IF(KO .EQ. 0.) KO=1.E-16
16815  ! omment kl=ko*l
16816  ! omment call elsol
16817  ! ***************
16818  call cobeam(ii, l)
16819  ! evolution of the t.o.f has been made in the routine cobeam
16820  ! omment f(6,ii)=f(6,ii)+step/(bpai*vl)
16821  end do
16822  ! test window after the step (only in the transverse directions)
16823  call cogetc
16824  call reject(ilost)
16825  ! Reshuffles f(i,j) array after window (now done in 'reject')
16826  ! call shuffle
16827  return
16828  end subroutine fldsol
16839  subroutine solnoid(imks, arg, xlsol)
16840  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
16841  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
16842  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
16843  common /fene/wdisp, wphas, wx, wy, rlim, ifw
16844  common /dyn/tref, vref
16845  common /rigid/boro
16846  common /dcspa/iesp
16847  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
16848  common /etcom/cog(8), exten(17), fd(iptsz)
16849  common /qmoyen/qmoy
16850  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
16851  common /tapes/in, ifile, meta
16852  common /pltprf/sprfx(3000), sprfy(3000), sprfl(3000), sprfw(3000), &
16853  sprfp(3000), sprng(3000), iprf
16854  common /davcom/dav1(maxcell1, 40), davtot, iitem(maxcell1), idav
16855  common /shif/dtiph, shift
16856  common /rander/ialin
16857  common /femt/iemgrw, iemqesg
16858  common /cgtof/charm(20), cgtdv(20), nbch(20), netac
16859  common /compt/nrres, nrtre, nrbunc, nrdbun
16860  common /sc3/beamc, scdist, sce10, cplm, ect, apl, ichaes, iscsp
16861  common /bloc11/r(6, 6), t(6, 6, 6)
16862  common /itvole/itvol, imamin
16863  common /tofev/ttvols
16864  logical itvol, imamin
16865  ! dimension rs(6,6),rcul(6,6)
16866  logical iesp, ichaes, shift, ialin, iemgrw
16867  character *1 cr
16868  common /sole/l, kl, ko
16869  real *8 l, kl, ko
16870  ! print out on terminal of transport element # on one and the same
16871  ! line
16872  nrtre = nrtre + 1
16873  cr = char(13)
16874  ! print out on terminal of transport element # on one and the same
16875  ! line
16876  write (6, 8254) nrtre, nrres, cr
16877 8254 format ('Transport element:', i5, ' Accelerating element:', i5, &
16878  a1, $)
16879  write (16, *) ' ****** SOLENOID *********'
16880  ! PLOT
16881  if (iprf==1) call stapl(davtot*10.)
16882  ilost = 0
16883  fh0 = fh/vl
16884  fcpi = fh*180./pi
16885  ! random errors in alignment
16886  if (ialin) call randali
16887  ! print out transport matrix (cog)
16888  gpa = 0.
16889  do ii = 1, ngood
16890  gpa = gpa + f(7, ii)/xmat
16891  end do
16892  gpa = gpa/float(ngood)
16893  l = xlsol
16894  bpa = sqrt(1.-1./(gpa*gpa))
16895  xmco = xmat*bpa*gpa
16896  ri = 33.356*xmco*1.e-01/qst
16897  if (imks/=0) then
16898  ! ARG is the field B (kG)
16899  b = arg
16900  ! KO = 2 * K (see ELSOL)
16901  ko = b/ri
16902  if (ko==0.) ko = 1.e-16
16903  else
16904  ! ARG is the strength K (cm-1)
16905  ! KO = 2 * K (see ELSOL)
16906  ko = 2.*arg
16907  if (ko==0.) ko = 1.e-16
16908  b = ko*ri
16909  end if
16910  kl = ko*l
16911  call clear
16912  call elsol
16913  xkql = (kl/2.)*57.29578
16914  write (16, 101) xlsol, b, ko/2., ri, xkql
16915 101 format (' LENGTH = ', f7.3, ' CM ', /, ' FIELD = ', f10.4, ' KG', /, &
16916  ' K = ', e12.5, ' cm-1', /, ' MOMENTUM = ', e12.5, ' kG.cm', /, &
16917  ' TRANSVERSE COORDINATES ROTATION = ', e12.5, ' deg', /)
16918  call matrix
16919  write (16, 10) ttvols*fcpi, davtot
16920 10 format (' ** time of flight (input): ', e12.5, ' deg position: ', &
16921  e12.5, ' cm')
16922  ! start prints in file 'short.data'
16923  idav = idav + 1
16924  iitem(idav) = 5
16925  dav1(idav, 1) = xlsol*10.
16926  dav1(idav, 2) = b
16927  dav1(idav, 3) = ko/2.
16928  davtot = davtot + xlsol
16929  dav1(idav, 4) = davtot*10.
16930  dav1(idav, 5) = ri
16931  ! first half solenoid
16932  dg = xlsol
16933  l = xlsol/2.
16934  do ii = 1, ngood
16935  call clear
16936  gpai = f(7, ii)/xmat
16937  bpai = sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
16938  xmco = xmat*bpai*gpai
16939  ri = 33.356*xmco*1.e-01/f(9, ii)
16940  ko = b/ri
16941  if (ko==0.) ko = 1.e-16
16942  kl = ko*l
16943  call elsol
16944  call cobeam(ii, l)
16945  ! evolution of the t.o.f is made in routine cbeam
16946  ! omment f(6,ii)=f(6,ii)+l/(bpai*vl)
16947  end do
16948  ! space charge computations (only if l >0)
16949  if (ichaes .and. l>0.) then
16950  if (sce10==1 .or. sce10==3.) then
16951  iesp = .true.
16952  write (16, *) 'space charge at the middle '
16953  call cesp(xlsol)
16954  iesp = .false.
16955  ! Change the dispersion dE/E with respect to the C.O.G of the
16956  ! bunch
16957  call disp
16958  end if
16959  end if
16960  ! test window after the first half solenoid
16961  call cogetc
16962  bcour = 0.
16963  do i = 1, ngood
16964  gpai = f(7, i)/xmat
16965  bcour = sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai)) + bcour
16966  end do
16967  bcour = bcour/float(ngood)
16968  gcour = 1./sqrt(1.-bcour*bcour)
16969  wcg = (gcour-1.)*xmat
16970  ! ----- window control
16971  call reject(ilost)
16972  ! Reshuffles f(i,j) array after window (now done in 'reject')
16973  ! call shuffle
16974  ! second half solenoid
16975  do ii = 1, ngood
16976  call clear
16977  gpai = f(7, ii)/xmat
16978  bpai = sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
16979  xmco = xmat*bpai*gpai
16980  ri = 33.356*xmco*1.e-01/f(9, ii)
16981  ko = b/ri
16982  if (ko==0.) ko = 1.e-16
16983  kl = ko*l
16984  call elsol
16985  call cobeam(ii, l)
16986  end do
16987  ! t.o.f
16988  tref = tref + xlsol/vref
16989  if (itvol) ttvols = tref
16990  tcog = 0.
16991  do i = 1, ngood
16992  tcog = tcog + f(6, i)
16993  end do
16994  tcog = tcog/float(ngood)
16995  if (itvol) then
16996  write (16, 11) ttvols*fcpi, davtot, tref*fcpi, tcog*fcpi
16997 11 format (' ** tof for adjustments: ', e12.5, ' deg at position: ', &
16998  e12.5, ' cm in the lattice', /, 3x, 'tof of the reference: ', &
16999  e12.5, ' deg tof of the cog: ', e12.5, ' deg')
17000  else
17001  write (16, 12) tref*fcpi, tcog*fcpi
17002 12 format (' ** tof of the reference: ', e12.5, &
17003  ' deg tof of the cog: ', e12.5, ' deg')
17004  end if
17005  dav1(idav, 36) = ngood
17006  ! plots
17007  call stapl(davtot*10.)
17008  if (iemgrw) call emiprt(0)
17009  write (16, *) 'particles lost in solenoid', ilost
17010  return
17011  end subroutine solnoid
17018  subroutine elsol
17019  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
17020  common /sole/l, kl, ko
17021  common /rigid/boro
17022  real *8 l, kl, ko
17023  common /bloc11/r(6, 6), t(6, 6, 6)
17024  common /secdr/iseor
17025  logical iseor
17026  ! PURE SOLENOID FIELD, MATRIX R AND T ARE IN (M,RD)
17027  ! SAVE KO AND L
17028  sako = ko
17029  sal = l
17030  ! convert (cm,rd) ==> (m,rd)
17031  ko = ko*100.
17032  l = l*1.e-02
17033  sn = sin(kl)
17034  cs = cos(kl)
17035  r(4, 4) = 0.5 + 0.5*cs
17036  r(3, 3) = r(4, 4)
17037  r(2, 2) = r(4, 4)
17038  r(1, 1) = r(4, 4)
17039  r(1, 4) = (1.-cs)/ko
17040  r(3, 2) = -r(1, 4)
17041  r(4, 1) = 0.25*ko*(1.-cs)
17042  r(2, 3) = -r(4, 1)
17043  r(4, 2) = -0.5*sn
17044  r(3, 1) = r(4, 2)
17045  r(2, 4) = -r(3, 1)
17046  r(1, 3) = r(2, 4)
17047  r(3, 4) = r(1, 3)*2./ko
17048  r(1, 2) = r(3, 4)
17049  r(4, 3) = -0.25*ko*sn
17050  r(2, 1) = r(4, 3)
17051  ! see element 16; 3. in TRANSPORT USER MANUAL for SM (here: SM=0)
17052  ! omment R(5,6) = R(5,6) + L * SM**2/(RI**2 + SM**2)
17053  if (.not. iseor) go to 200
17054  temp = 0.5*ko*l*sn
17055  t(1, 1, 6) = temp
17056  t(2, 2, 6) = temp
17057  t(3, 3, 6) = temp
17058  t(4, 4, 6) = temp
17059  t(1, 2, 6) = sn/ko - l*cs
17060  t(3, 4, 6) = t(1, 2, 6)
17061  temp = -0.5*ko*l*cs
17062  t(1, 3, 6) = temp
17063  t(2, 4, 6) = temp
17064  t(4, 2, 6) = -temp
17065  t(3, 1, 6) = -temp
17066  t(1, 4, 6) = (1.0-cs)/ko - l*sn
17067  t(3, 2, 6) = -t(1, 4, 6)
17068  t(2, 1, 6) = 0.25*ko*(ko*l*cs+sn)
17069  t(4, 3, 6) = t(2, 1, 6)
17070  t(2, 3, 6) = 0.25*ko*(1.0-cs+ko*l*sn)
17071  t(4, 1, 6) = -t(2, 3, 6)
17072  t(5, 2, 2) = 0.5*l
17073  t(5, 4, 4) = 0.5*l
17074 200 continue
17075  ! RESTORE KO AND L
17076  ko = sako
17077  l = sal
17078 
17079  ! PATH LENGTH TERMS
17080  ! see element 16; 3. in TRANSPORT USER MANUAL for SM here one takes:
17081  ! SM=0
17082  ! omment T(5,6,6) = T(5,6,6) - L*(SM**2 + 1.5*RI**2)*SM**2/
17083  ! omment 1 (SM**2 + RI**2)**2
17084  ! omment T(5,5,6) = SM**2/(SM**2 + RI**2)
17085  return
17086  end subroutine elsol
17091  subroutine mfordre(rc, ra, rb)
17092  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
17093  dimension ra(6, 6), rb(6, 6), rc(6, 6)
17094 
17095  do i1 = 1, 6
17096  do i2 = 1, 6
17097  ghost = 0.0
17098  do i3 = 1, 6
17099  ghost = ghost + ra(i1, i3)*rb(i3, i2)
17100  end do
17101  rc(i1, i2) = ghost
17102  end do
17103  end do
17104  return
17105  end subroutine mfordre
17111  subroutine solquad(iksq, args, argq, xlsol, rg)
17112  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
17113  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
17114  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
17115  common /fene/wdisp, wphas, wx, wy, rlim, ifw
17116  common /dyn/tref, vref
17117  common /rigid/boro
17118  common /dcspa/iesp
17119  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
17120  common /etcom/cog(8), exten(17), fd(iptsz)
17121  common /qmoyen/qmoy
17122  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
17123  common /tapes/in, ifile, meta
17124  common /pltprf/sprfx(3000), sprfy(3000), sprfl(3000), sprfw(3000), &
17125  sprfp(3000), sprng(3000), iprf
17126  common /davcom/dav1(maxcell1, 40), davtot, iitem(maxcell1), idav
17127  common /shif/dtiph, shift
17128  common /rander/ialin
17129  common /femt/iemgrw, iemqesg
17130  common /cgtof/charm(20), cgtdv(20), nbch(20), netac
17131  common /compt/nrres, nrtre, nrbunc, nrdbun
17132  common /sc3/beamc, scdist, sce10, cplm, ect, apl, ichaes, iscsp
17133  logical ichaes
17134  logical iesp, shift, ialin, iemgrw
17135  character *1 cr
17136  common /slq/l, kso, kqo
17137  real *8 l, kso, kqo
17138  ! --IKSQ: IFLAG
17139  ! --ARGS: STRENGTH or FIELD OF SOLENOID
17140  ! If IKSQ = 0 then ARGS is the STRENGTH (cm-1), otherwise ARGS is the
17141  ! FIELD (kG)
17142  ! --ARGQ: STRENGTH or FIELD of QUADRUPOLE
17143  ! If IKSQ = 0 then ARGQ is the STRENGTH (cm-2), otherwise ARGQ is the
17144  ! FIELD (kG)
17145  ! SIGN CONVENTIONS:
17146  ! SOLENOID: ARGS positive = rotate the transverse coordinates about
17147  ! the z-axis in the clockwise direction.
17148  ! QUADRUPOLE: ARGQ positive = focusing in the plane (x,z)
17149  ! --XLSOL : EFFECTIVE LENGHT OF THE LENS(cm)
17150  ! --RG : APERTURE RADIUS OF THE LENS (cm)
17151  ! print out on terminal of transport element # on one and the same
17152  ! line
17153  nrtre = nrtre + 1
17154  cr = char(13)
17155  write (6, 8254) nrtre, nrres, cr
17156 8254 format ('Transport element:', i5, ' Accelerating element:', i5, &
17157  a1, $)
17158  fh0 = fh/vl
17159  ! PLOT
17160  if (iprf==1) call stapl(davtot*10.)
17161  ! random errors in alignment
17162  if (ialin) call randali
17163  ilost = 0
17164  ! magnetic rigidity (cog)
17165  gpa = 0.
17166  do ii = 1, ngood
17167  gpa = gpa + f(7, ii)/xmat
17168  end do
17169  gpa = gpa/float(ngood)
17170  l = xlsol
17171  bpa = sqrt(1.-1./(gpa*gpa))
17172  xmco = xmat*bpa*gpa
17173  ri = 33.356*xmco*1.e-01/qst
17174  if (iksq/=0) then
17175  ! argq: quadrupole field (kG), args:solenoid field:(kG)
17176  ! quadrupole
17177  fq = argq
17178  bq = fq/rg
17179  kqo = bq/ri
17180  strq = kqo
17181  ! solenoid (KSO = 2 * K, see ELSQ)
17182  bs = args
17183  kso = bs/ri
17184  strs = kso/2
17185  else
17186  ! argq: quadupole strength (cm-2), args: solenoid strength (cm-1)
17187  ! quadrupole
17188  kqo = argq
17189  strq = argq
17190  bq = argq*ri
17191  fq = bq*rg
17192  ! solenoid (KSO = 2 * K, see ELSQ)
17193  strs = args
17194  bs = 2.*strs*ri
17195  kso = bs/ri
17196  end if
17197  xks = kso/2.
17198  xksl = xks*l*57.29578
17199  write (16, *) '****SOLENOID+QUADRUPOLE*******'
17200  write (16, 101) xlsol, rg, bs, strs, xksl, fq, strq, ri
17201 101 format (' LENGTH =', f7.3, ' cm APERTURE RADIUS=', e12.5, ' cm', /, &
17202  ' SOLENOID: FIELD = ', f10.4, ' kG K = ', e12.5, &
17203  ' cm-1 ROTATING ANGLE = ', e12.5, ' deg', /, &
17204  ' QUADRUPOLE: FIELD =', f10.4, ' kG K2 =', e12.5, ' cm-2 ', /, &
17205  ' RIGIDITY = ', e12.5, ' kG.cm', /)
17206  ! print transport matrix (c.o.g.)
17207  ! For convenience, the matrix R and T are computed for a positive KQO
17208  ! = (B/r)*(1/BRO)
17209  ! if KQO is negative one has seting up 90 degree rotation on the beam
17210  call elsq
17211  write (16, *) ' The matrix R and T are shown for a positive strength'
17212  write (16, *) &
17213  ' For a negative strength set up 90 deg rotation on the beam'
17214  call matrix
17215  ! start prints in file 'short.data'
17216  idav = idav + 1
17217  iitem(idav) = 11
17218  dav1(idav, 1) = xlsol*10.
17219  dav1(idav, 2) = bs
17220  dav1(idav, 3) = fq
17221  dav1(idav, 5) = strq
17222  dav1(idav, 6) = kso/2.
17223  dav1(idav, 7) = rg*10.
17224  dav1(idav, 8) = ri
17225  davtot = davtot + xlsol
17226  dav1(idav, 4) = davtot*10.
17227  ! first half lens
17228  dg = xlsol
17229  l = xlsol/2.
17230  do ii = 1, ngood
17231  call clear
17232  gpai = f(7, ii)/xmat
17233  bpai = sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
17234  xmco = xmat*bpai*gpai
17235  ri = 33.356*xmco*1.e-01/f(9, ii)
17236  ! KSO =K/2, see ELSQ
17237  kso = bs/ri
17238  if (kso==6.*0) kso = 1.e-16
17239  kqo = bq/ri
17240  call elsq
17241  ! the matrix R and T are computed for a positive KQO =
17242  ! (B/rg)*(1/BRO)
17243  ! if KQO is negative set up 90 degree rotation on the beam
17244  if (kqo<6.*0) then
17245  irot = ii
17246  call rotat(irot)
17247  call cobeam(ii, l)
17248  ! return the coordinates to their initial orientation
17249  irot = -ii
17250  call rotat(irot)
17251  else
17252  call cobeam(ii, l)
17253  end if
17254  end do
17255  ! Charge space effect (if l >0)
17256  if (ichaes .and. l>0.) then
17257  if (sce10==1 .or. sce10==3.) then
17258  iesp = .true.
17259  write (16, *) 'space charge at the middle '
17260  call cesp(xlsol)
17261  iesp = .false.
17262  ! Change the dispersion dE/E with respect to the C.O.G of the
17263  ! bunch
17264  call disp
17265  end if
17266  end if
17267  ! test window after the first half solquad
17268  call cogetc
17269  bcour = 0.
17270  do i = 1, ngood
17271  gpai = f(7, i)/xmat
17272  bcour = sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai)) + bcour
17273  end do
17274  bcour = bcour/float(ngood)
17275  gcour = 1./sqrt(1.-bcour*bcour)
17276  wcg = (gcour-1.)*xmat
17277  ! ----- convert wdisp in dp/p (for window control)
17278  call reject(ilost)
17279  ! Reshuffles f(i,j) array after window (now done in 'reject')
17280  ! call shuffle
17281  ! beam after the second half lens
17282  do ii = 1, ngood
17283  call clear
17284  gpai = f(7, ii)/xmat
17285  bpai = sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
17286  xmco = xmat*bpai*gpai
17287  ri = 33.356*xmco*1.e-01/f(9, ii)
17288  kso = bs/ri
17289  ! KSO =K/2, see ELSQ
17290  if (kso==0.) kso = 1.e-16
17291  kqo = bq/ri
17292  call elsq
17293  ! the matrix R and T are computed for a positive KQO =
17294  ! (B/r)*(1/BRO)
17295  ! if KQO is negative set up 90 degree rotation on the beam
17296  if (kqo<6.*0) then
17297  irot = ii
17298  call rotat(irot)
17299  call cobeam(ii, l)
17300  irot = -ii
17301  call rotat(irot)
17302  else
17303  call cobeam(ii, l)
17304  end if
17305  end do
17306  ! t.o.f of reference
17307  tref = tref + xlsol/vref
17308  dav1(idav, 36) = ngood
17309  ! plots
17310  call stapl(davtot*10.)
17311  if (iemgrw) call emiprt(0)
17312  write (16, *) 'particles lost in solenoid', ilost
17313  return
17314  end subroutine solquad
17321  subroutine rotat(ii)
17322  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
17323  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
17324  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
17325  dimension ff(6)
17326 
17327  if (ii>=0) then
17328  ! 90 degree rotation
17329  ff(1) = f(2, ii)
17330  ff(2) = f(3, ii)
17331  ff(3) = f(4, ii)
17332  ff(4) = f(5, ii)
17333  f(2, ii) = ff(3)
17334  f(3, ii) = ff(4)
17335  f(4, ii) = -ff(1)
17336  f(5, ii) = -ff(2)
17337  else
17338  ! -90 degree rotation
17339  ii = -ii
17340  ff(1) = f(2, ii)
17341  ff(2) = f(3, ii)
17342  ff(3) = f(4, ii)
17343  ff(4) = f(5, ii)
17344  f(2, ii) = -ff(3)
17345  f(3, ii) = -ff(4)
17346  f(4, ii) = ff(1)
17347  f(5, ii) = ff(2)
17348  end if
17349  return
17350  end subroutine rotat
17360  subroutine elsq
17361  implicit real *8(a-z)
17362  common /rigid/boro
17363  common /slq/l, kso, kqo
17364  common /bloc11/r(6, 6), t(6, 6, 6)
17365  common /secdr/iseor
17366  logical iseor
17367 
17368  al = l*1.e-02
17369  akq = kqo*1.e04
17370  aks = kso*1.e02
17371  aks = aks/2.
17372  akq4 = akq*akq
17373  aks2 = aks*aks
17374  aks3 = aks2*aks
17375  aks4 = aks2*aks2
17376  q2 = dsqrt(akq4+4.0*aks4)
17377  q2i = 1.0/q2
17378  sk1 = sqrt(2.0*aks2+q2)
17379  sk3 = sqrt(abs(q2-2.0*aks2))
17380  ss = sin(sk1*al)
17381  sc = cos(sk1*al)
17382  bs = sinh(sk3*al)
17383  bc = cosh(sk3*al)
17384  skp = 0.5*(sk1+sk3)
17385  skm = 0.5*(sk1-sk3)
17386  skp2 = skp*skp
17387  skp3 = skp2*skp
17388  skm2 = skm*skm
17389  skm3 = skm2*skm
17390  r(1, 1) = q2i*(skp2*sc+skm2*bc)
17391  r(1, 2) = q2i*(skp*ss-skm*bs)
17392  r(1, 3) = q2i*aks*(skm*ss+skp*bs)
17393  r(1, 4) = q2i*aks*(bc-sc)
17394  r(2, 1) = q2i*(-skp3*ss-skm3*bs)
17395  r(2, 2) = q2i*(skp2*sc+skm2*bc)
17396  r(2, 3) = q2i*aks3*(sc-bc)
17397  r(2, 4) = q2i*aks*(skp*ss-skm*bs)
17398  r(3, 1) = q2i*aks*(skm*bs-skp*ss)
17399  r(3, 2) = q2i*aks*(sc-bc)
17400  r(3, 3) = q2i*(skm2*sc+skp2*bc)
17401  r(3, 4) = q2i*(skm*ss+skp*bs)
17402  r(4, 1) = q2i*aks3*(bc-sc)
17403  r(4, 2) = q2i*aks*(-skm*ss-skp*bs)
17404  r(4, 3) = q2i*(skp3*bs-skm3*ss)
17405  r(4, 4) = q2i*(skm2*sc+skp2*bc)
17406  if (.not. iseor) return
17407  daks = -aks
17408  dakq = -akq
17409  dakq4 = 2.0*akq*dakq
17410  daks2 = 2.0*aks*daks
17411  daks3 = 3.0*aks2*daks
17412  daks4 = 4.0*aks3*daks
17413  dq2 = 0.5*q2i*(dakq4+4.0*daks4)
17414  q2i2 = q2i*q2i
17415  dq2i = -q2i2*dq2
17416  dsk1 = (2.0*daks2+dq2)/(2.0*sk1)
17417  dsk3 = 0.0
17418  if (sk3/=6.*0) dsk3 = (dq2-2.0*daks2)/(2.0*sk3)
17419  dss = sc*dsk1*al
17420  dsc = -ss*dsk1*al
17421  dbs = bc*dsk3*al
17422  dbc = bs*dsk3*al
17423  dskp = 0.5*(dsk1+dsk3)
17424  dskm = 0.5*(dsk1-dsk3)
17425  dskp2 = 2.0*skp*dskp
17426  dskp3 = 3.0*skp2*dskp
17427  dskm2 = 2.0*skm*dskm
17428  dskm3 = 3.0*skm2*dskm
17429  t(1, 1, 6) = dq2i*(skp2*sc+skm2*bc) + q2i*(dskp2*sc+skp2*dsc+dskm2*bc+ &
17430  skm2*dbc)
17431  t(1, 2, 6) = dq2i*(skp*ss-skm*bs) + q2i*(dskp*ss+skp*dss-dskm*bs-skm* &
17432  dbs)
17433  t(1, 3, 6) = (dq2i*aks+q2i*daks)*(skm*ss+skp*bs) + &
17434  q2i*aks*(dskm*ss+skm*dss+dskp*bs+skp*dbs)
17435  t(1, 4, 6) = (dq2i*aks+q2i*daks)*(bc-sc) + q2i*aks*(dbc-dsc)
17436  t(2, 1, 6) = dq2i*(-skp3*ss-skm3*bs) + q2i*(-dskp3*ss-skp3*dss-dskm3* &
17437  bs-skm3*dbs)
17438  t(2, 2, 6) = t(1, 1, 6)
17439  t(2, 3, 6) = (dq2i*aks3+q2i*daks3)*(sc-bc) + q2i*aks3*(dsc-dbc)
17440  t(2, 4, 6) = (dq2i*aks+q2i*daks)*(skp*ss-skm*bs) + &
17441  q2i*aks*(dskp*ss+skp*dss-dskm*bs-skm*dbs)
17442  t(3, 1, 6) = -t(2, 4, 6)
17443  t(3, 2, 6) = -t(1, 4, 6)
17444  t(3, 3, 6) = dq2i*(skm2*sc+skp2*bc) + q2i*(dskm2*sc+skm2*dsc+dskp2*bc+ &
17445  skp2*dbc)
17446  t(3, 4, 6) = dq2i*(skm*ss+skp*bs) + q2i*(dskm*ss+skm*dss+dskp*bs+skp* &
17447  dbs)
17448  t(4, 1, 6) = -t(2, 3, 6)
17449  ! omment AMAT(17,4,MATADR)=-AMAT(21,1,MATADR)
17450  t(4, 2, 6) = -t(1, 3, 6)
17451  t(4, 3, 6) = dq2i*(skp3*bs-skm3*ss) + q2i*(dskp3*bs+skp3*dbs-dskm3*ss- &
17452  skm3*dss)
17453  t(4, 4, 6) = t(3, 3, 6)
17454  aisssc = 0.0
17455  if (sk1/=0.0) aisssc = ss*ss/(2.0*sk1)
17456  aibsbc = 0.0
17457  if (sk3/=0.0) aibsbc = bs*bs/(2.0*sk3)
17458  aissbc = q2i*(sk3*ss*bs-sk1*sc*bc+sk1)
17459  aiscbs = q2i*(sk3*sc*bc+sk1*ss*bs-sk3)
17460  aiss2 = 0.0
17461  aisc2 = al
17462  aibs2 = 0.0
17463  aibc2 = al
17464  if (sk1/=0.0) aiss2 = 0.5*(al-ss*sc/sk1)
17465  if (sk1/=0.0) aisc2 = 0.5*(al+ss*sc/sk1)
17466  if (sk3/=0.0) aibs2 = 0.5*(bs*bc/sk3-al)
17467  if (sk3/=0.0) aibc2 = 0.5*(al+bs*bc/sk3)
17468  aissbs = q2i*(sk3*ss*bc-sk1*sc*bs)
17469  aiscbc = q2i*(sk1*ss*bc+sk3*sc*bs)
17470  aks5 = aks4*aks
17471  aks6 = aks5*aks
17472  skp4 = skp3*skp
17473  skp5 = skp4*skp
17474  skp6 = skp5*skp
17475  skm4 = skm3*skm
17476  skm5 = skm4*skm
17477  skm6 = skm5*skm
17478  q4i = q2i*q2i
17479  t(5, 1, 1) = q4i*0.5*(skp6*aiss2+skm6*aibs2-2.0*skp3*skm3*aissbs+aks6* &
17480  (aisc2+aibc2-2.0*aiscbc))
17481  t(5, 1, 2) = q4i*(-skp5*aisssc-skp3*skm2*aissbc-skm3*skp2*aiscbs-skm5* &
17482  aibsbc-aks4*(-skm*aisssc-skp*aiscbs+skm*aissbc+skp*aibsbc))
17483  t(5, 1, 3) = q4i*aks3*((skp3-skm3)*(aissbc-aisssc)+(skp3+skm3)*(aibsbc &
17484  -aiscbs))
17485  t(5, 1, 4) = q4i*(aks*(-skp4*aiss2-(skp3*skm+ &
17486  skm3*skp)*aissbs+skm4*aibs2)+aks3*(-skm2*aisc2-(skp2- &
17487  skm2)*aiscbc+skp2*aibc2))
17488  t(5, 2, 2) = q4i*0.5*(skp4*aisc2+2.0*skp2*skm2*aiscbc+skm4*aibc2+aks2* &
17489  (skm2*aiss2+2.0*skp*skm*aissbs+skp2*aibs2))
17490  t(5, 2, 3) = q4i*(aks3*(skp2*aisc2-(skp2-skm2)*aiscbc-skm2*aibc2)-aks* &
17491  (-skm4*aiss2+(skm*skp3-skp*skm3)*aissbs+skp4*aibs2))
17492  t(5, 2, 4) = q4i*aks*((skp3-skm3)*aisssc-(skp2*skm+skp*skm2)*aiscbs+( &
17493  skm2*skp-skm*skp2)*aissbc-(skm3+skp3)*aibsbc)
17494  t(5, 3, 3) = q4i*0.5*(aks6*(aisc2-2.0*aiscbc+aibc2)+skm6*aiss2-2.0* &
17495  skm3*skp3*aissbs+skp6*aibs2)
17496  t(5, 3, 4) = q4i*(aks4*(skp*aisssc-skm*aiscbs-skp*aissbc+skm*aibsbc)- &
17497  skm5*aisssc-skm3*skp2*aissbc+skp3*skm2*aiscbs+skp5*aibsbc)
17498  t(5, 4, 4) = q4i*0.5*(aks2*(skp2*aiss2-2.0*skp*skm*aissbs+skm2*aibs2)+ &
17499  skm4*aisc2+2.0*skm2*skp2*aiscbc+skp4*aibc2)
17500  return
17501  end subroutine elsq
17509  subroutine fdrift(xl, npart, imit)
17510  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
17511 
17512  dl = xl/float(npart)
17513  do i = 1, npart
17514  call drift(dl)
17515  if (imit/=0.) call emiprt(0)
17516  end do
17517  return
17518  end subroutine fdrift
17526  subroutine drift(dl)
17527  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
17528  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
17529  common /rigid/boro
17530  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
17531  common /dyn/tref, vref
17532  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
17533  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
17534  common /tapes/in, ifile, meta
17535  common /davcom/dav1(maxcell1, 40), davtot, iitem(maxcell1), idav
17536  common /etcom/cog(8), exten(17), fd(iptsz)
17537  common /sc3/beamc, scdist, sce10, cplm, ect, apl, ichaes, iscsp
17538  common /fene/wdisp, wphas, wx, wy, rlim, ifw
17539  common /dcspa/iesp
17540  common /pltprf/sprfx(3000), sprfy(3000), sprfl(3000), sprfw(3000), &
17541  sprfp(3000), sprng(3000), iprf
17542  common /shif/dtiph, shift
17543  common /femt/iemgrw, iemqesg
17544  common /posc/xpsc
17545  common /cgtof/charm(20), cgtdv(20), nbch(20), netac
17546  common /tofev/ttvols
17547  common /itvole/itvol, imamin
17548  logical iesp, ichaes, shift, iemgrw, itvol, imamin
17549 
17550  ilost = 0
17551  fh0 = fh/vl
17552  fcpi = fh*180./pi
17553  write (16, *) '*** DRIFT of length ', dl, ' cm'
17554  if (itvol) write (16, 10) ttvols*fcpi, davtot
17555 10 format (' ** tof for adjustments at input: ', e12.5, &
17556  ' deg at position: ', e12.5, ' cm in the lattice')
17557  ! STATISTICS
17558  if (iprf==1) call stapl(davtot*10.)
17559  ! random error in position only if dl is positif
17560  ! Beam at the half drift
17561  dg2 = dl/2.
17562  do i = 1, ngood
17563  ! conversion mrad ===> rad
17564  f2 = f(3, i)*.001
17565  f4 = f(5, i)*.001
17566  f(2, i) = f(2, i) + dg2*tan(f2)
17567  f(4, i) = f(4, i) + dg2*tan(f4)/cos(f2)
17568  gpai = f(7, i)/xmat
17569  bpai = sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
17570  vpai = vl*bpai
17571  ! old f(6,i)=f(6,i)+dg2/vpai
17572  f(6, i) = f(6, i) + dg2/(vpai*cos(f2)*cos(f4))
17573  end do
17574  ! ENVEL
17575  ! start prints in file 'short.data'
17576  davtot = davtot + dl
17577  if (dl>0.) then
17578  ! nlength=nlength+1
17579  idav = idav + 1
17580  iitem(idav) = 7
17581  dav1(idav, 1) = dl*10.
17582  dav1(idav, 4) = davtot*10.
17583  end if
17584  ! Charge space (if dl >1.e-04)
17585  if (ichaes .and. dl>=1.e-04) then
17586  ! 11.03.2010 if(sce10.eq.2..or.sce10.eq.3.) then
17587  if (sce10==3.) then
17588  iesp = .true.
17589  write (16, *) ' space charge at the middle'
17590  call cesp(dl)
17591  iesp = .false.
17592  ! Change the dispersion dE/E with respect to the C.O.G of the
17593  ! bunch
17594  call disp
17595  end if
17596  end if
17597  ! Test window after the first half drift
17598  call reject(ilost)
17599  ! Reshuffles f(i,j) array after window (now done in 'reject')
17600  ! call shuffle
17601  il = ilost
17602  ! Beam for the second half drift
17603  do i = 1, ngood
17604  f2 = f(3, i)*.001
17605  f4 = f(5, i)*.001
17606  f(2, i) = f(2, i) + dg2*tan(f2)
17607  f(4, i) = f(4, i) + dg2*tan(f4)/cos(f2)
17608  gpai = f(7, i)/xmat
17609  bpai = sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
17610  vpai = vl*bpai
17611  ! old f(6,i)=f(6,i)+dg2/vpai
17612  f(6, i) = f(6, i) + dg2/(vpai*cos(f2)*cos(f4))
17613  end do
17614  ! Test window after the second half drift (only in transverse
17615  ! directions and phase)
17616  ! TEST *****
17617  call reject(ilost)
17618  ! Reshuffles f(i,j) array after window (now done in 'reject')
17619  ! old call shuffle
17620  il = il + ilost
17621  ! change the reference and the TOF
17622  tref = tref + dl/vref
17623  if (itvol) ttvols = tref
17624  if (dl>0.) then
17625  dav1(idav, 36) = ngood
17626  ! envelope
17627  call stapl(davtot*10.)
17628  end if
17629  tcog = 0.
17630  do i = 1, ngood
17631  tcog = tcog + f(6, i)
17632  end do
17633  tcog = tcog/float(ngood)
17634  if (itvol) then
17635  write (16, 11) ttvols*fcpi, davtot, tref*fcpi, tcog*fcpi
17636 11 format (' ** tof for adjustments : ', e12.5, ' deg at position: ', &
17637  e12.5, ' cm in the lattice', /, 3x, 'tof of the reference: ', &
17638  e12.5, ' deg tof of the cog: ', e12.5, ' deg')
17639  else
17640  write (16, 12) tref*fcpi, tcog*fcpi
17641 12 format (' ** tof of the reference: ', e12.5, &
17642  ' deg tof of the cog: ', e12.5, ' deg')
17643  end if
17644  write (16, *) 'particles lost in drift: ', il
17645  if (iemgrw .and. dl>0.) then
17646  if (iemqesg==2) call emiprt(0)
17647  end if
17648  return
17649  end subroutine drift
17651  subroutine clear
17652  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
17653  common /bloc11/r(6, 6), t(6, 6, 6)
17654  common /secdr/iseor
17655  logical iseor
17656  ! CLEAR R
17657  do ia = 1, 6
17658  do ib = 1, 6
17659  r(ia, ib) = 0.
17660  if (ia==ib) r(ia, ib) = 1.
17661  end do
17662  end do
17663  ! CLEAR T
17664  if (iseor) then
17665  do ia = 1, 6
17666  do ib = 1, 6
17667  do ic = 1, 6
17668  t(ia, ib, ic) = 0.
17669  end do
17670  end do
17671  end do
17672  end if
17673  return
17674  end subroutine clear
17676  subroutine cobeam(ii, xl)
17677  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
17678  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
17679  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
17680  common /bloc11/r(6, 6), t(6, 6, 6)
17681  common /etcom/cog(8), exten(17), fd(iptsz)
17682  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
17683  common /radia/trt, rmoy, xintf, crae
17684  common /secdr/iseor
17685  logical iseor
17686  dimension sf(6), ssf(6)
17687  ! MATRIX R AND T ARE IN M-RD
17688  ! beam conversion: CM ===> M MRD ==> RD
17689  sf(1) = f(2, ii)*1.e-02
17690  sf(2) = f(3, ii)*1.e-03
17691  sf(3) = f(4, ii)*1.e-02
17692  sf(4) = f(5, ii)*1.e-03
17693  sf(5) = xl*1.e-02
17694  sf(5) = sf(5)/(cos(sf(2))*cos(sf(4)))
17695  sf(6) = (fd(ii)-1.)
17696  ! FIRST order COMPUTATION (M-RD)
17697  do ia = 1, 6
17698  ssf(ia) = 0.
17699  do ib = 1, 6
17700  ssf(ia) = r(ia, ib)*sf(ib) + ssf(ia)
17701  end do
17702  end do
17703  if (.not. iseor) go to 10
17704  ! SECOND order COMPUTATION (M-RD)
17705  do ia = 1, 6
17706  do ib = 1, 6
17707  do ic = 1, 6
17708  ssf(ia) = ssf(ia) + t(ia, ib, ic)*sf(ib)*sf(ic)
17709  end do
17710  end do
17711  end do
17712 10 continue
17713  do ia = 1, 4
17714  f(ia+1, ii) = ssf(ia)
17715  end do
17716  ! CONVERT RD ==> MRD M ==> CM
17717  f(3, ii) = f(3, ii)*1000.
17718  f(5, ii) = f(5, ii)*1000.
17719  f(2, ii) = f(2, ii)*100.
17720  f(4, ii) = f(4, ii)*100.
17721  gpai = f(7, ii)/xmat
17722  bpai = sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
17723  vpai = vl*bpai
17724  trt = 100.*ssf(5)/vpai
17725  f(6, ii) = f(6, ii) + trt
17726  return
17727  end subroutine cobeam
17731  subroutine disp
17732  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
17733  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
17734  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
17735  common /etcom/cog(8), exten(17), fd(iptsz)
17736  common /mcs/imcs, ncstat, cstat(20)
17737  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
17738 
17739  gcog = 0.
17740  do i = 1, ngood
17741  gcog = f(7, i)/xmat + gcog
17742  end do
17743  gcog = gcog/float(ngood)
17744  bcog = sqrt(1.-1./(gcog*gcog))
17745  do i = 1, ngood
17746  gpai = f(7, i)/xmat
17747  bpai = sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
17748  fd(i) = bpai/bcog*gpai/gcog
17749  end do
17750  return
17751  end subroutine disp
17752  ! old do ist=1,ncstat
17753  ! old gcog=0.
17754  ! old nii=0
17755  ! old do ii=1,ngood
17756  ! old if(f(9,ii).eq.cstat(ist)) then
17757  ! old gcog=gcog+f(7,ii)/xmat
17758  ! old nii=nii+1
17759  ! old endif
17760  ! old enddo
17761  ! old gcog=gcog/float(nii)
17762  ! old bcog=sqrt(1.-1./(gcog*gcog))
17763  ! old DO II=1,NGOOD
17764  ! old if(f(9,ii).eq.cstat(ist)) then
17765  ! old gpai=f(7,ii)/xmat
17766  ! old bpai=sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
17767  ! old fd(ii)=(gpai*bpai)/(gcog*bcog)
17768  ! old endif
17769  ! old enddo
17770  ! old enddo
17771  ! old return
17772  ! old end
17782  subroutine zrotat(zrot)
17783  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
17784  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
17785  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
17786  common /grot/rzot, izrot
17787  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
17788  common /davcom/dav1(maxcell1, 40), davtot, iitem(maxcell1), idav
17789  logical izrot
17790  dimension rs(6, 6), ff(6), fc(6)
17791 
17792  write (16, 100) zrot
17793 100 format (/, 20x, 'BEAM ROTATION ', f10.4, &
17794  ' degrees ABOUT THE POSITIVE Z-AXIS', /)
17795  if (.not. izrot) then
17796  izrot = .true.
17797  rzot = zrot
17798  go to 500
17799  end if
17800  if (izrot) izrot = .false.
17801 500 continue
17802  ! Daves start
17803  idav = idav + 1
17804  iitem(idav) = 20
17805  dav1(idav, 1) = zrot
17806  ! Conversion DEG ==> RAD
17807  zrot = zrot*pi/180.
17808  rs44 = cos(zrot)
17809  rs(4, 4) = rs44
17810  rs(3, 3) = rs44
17811  rs(2, 2) = rs44
17812  rs(1, 1) = rs44
17813  rs24 = sin(zrot)
17814  rs(2, 4) = rs24
17815  rs(1, 3) = rs24
17816  rs(4, 2) = -rs24
17817  rs(3, 1) = -rs24
17818  do ii = 1, ngood
17819  ff(1) = f(2, ii)
17820  ff(2) = f(3, ii)
17821  ff(3) = f(4, ii)
17822  ff(4) = f(5, ii)
17823  do ia = 1, 4
17824  fc(ia) = 0.
17825  do ib = 1, 4
17826  fc(ia) = fc(ia) + ff(ib)*rs(ia, ib)
17827  end do
17828  end do
17829  f(2, ii) = fc(1)
17830  f(3, ii) = fc(2)
17831  f(4, ii) = fc(3)
17832  f(5, ii) = fc(4)
17833  end do
17834  ! 110 continue
17835  return
17836  end subroutine zrotat
17846  subroutine zrotap(zrot)
17847  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
17848  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
17849  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
17850  common /grot/rzot, izrot
17851  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
17852  logical izrot
17853  dimension rs(6, 6), ff(6), fc(6)
17854 
17855  write (16, 100) zrot
17856 100 format (/, 20x, 'BEAM ROTATION ', f10.4, &
17857  ' degrees ABOUT THE POSITIVE Z-AXIS', /)
17858  rzot = zrot
17859  ! Conversion DEG ==> RAD
17860  zrot = zrot*pi/180.
17861  rs44 = cos(zrot)
17862  rs(4, 4) = rs44
17863  rs(3, 3) = rs44
17864  rs(2, 2) = rs44
17865  rs(1, 1) = rs44
17866  rs24 = sin(zrot)
17867  rs(2, 4) = rs24
17868  rs(1, 3) = rs24
17869  rs(4, 2) = -rs24
17870  rs(3, 1) = -rs24
17871  do ii = 1, ngood
17872  ff(1) = f(2, ii)
17873  ff(2) = f(3, ii)
17874  ff(3) = f(4, ii)
17875  ff(4) = f(5, ii)
17876  do ia = 1, 4
17877  fc(ia) = 0.
17878  do ib = 1, 4
17879  fc(ia) = fc(ia) + ff(ib)*rs(ia, ib)
17880  end do
17881  end do
17882  f(2, ii) = fc(1)
17883  f(3, ii) = fc(2)
17884  f(4, ii) = fc(3)
17885  f(5, ii) = fc(4)
17886  end do
17887  return
17888  end subroutine zrotap
17889  subroutine aliner
17890  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
17891  ! ..................................
17892  ! ALIGNMENT errors:
17893  ! HORIZONTAL : XL(cm) XLP(mrad)
17894  ! VERTICAL : YL(cm) YLP(mrad)
17895  ! ..................................
17896  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
17897  common /alin/xl, yl, xpl, ypl
17898  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
17899 
17900  write (16, 100) xl, yl, xpl, ypl
17901 100 format (/, 5x, ' KICK x(cm) y(cm) : ', 2(e12.5,2x), /, 5x, &
17902  ' KICK xp(mrad) yp(mrad): ', 2(e12.5,2x), //)
17903  ! CALCUL DES COORDONNEES DES TRAJECTOIRES
17904  ! UNITES = CM-MRD
17905  do ii = 1, ngood
17906  f(2, ii) = f(2, ii) + xl
17907  f(4, ii) = f(4, ii) + yl
17908  f(3, ii) = f(3, ii) + xpl
17909  f(5, ii) = f(5, ii) + ypl
17910  end do
17911  return
17912  end subroutine aliner
17913  subroutine randali
17914  use randlux
17915  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
17916  ! ..................................
17917  ! RANDOM ALIGNMENT errors :
17918  ! HORIZONTAL PLANE : XL(cm) XLP(mrad)
17919  ! VERTICAL PLANE : YL(cm) YLP(mrad)
17920  ! ..................................
17921  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
17922  common /alin/xl, yl, xpl, ypl
17923  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
17924  common /apel/iapel
17925  dimension trans(1)
17926 
17927  write (16, *) ' random error in alignment with:'
17928  write (16, 100) xl, yl, xpl, ypl
17929 100 format (/, 5x, ' KICK x(cm) y(cm) : ', 2(e12.5,2x), /, 5x, &
17930  ' KICK xp(mrad) yp(mrad): ', 2(e12.5,2x), //)
17931  len = 1
17932  rdcf = .5
17933  call rlux(trans, len)
17934  if (trans(1)<=rdcf) sign = -1.
17935  if (trans(1)>rdcf) sign = 1.
17936  call rlux(trans, len)
17937  xla = xl*sign*trans(1)
17938  call rlux(trans, len)
17939  if (trans(1)<=rdcf) sign = -1.
17940  if (trans(1)>rdcf) sign = 1.
17941  call rlux(trans, len)
17942  yla = yl*sign*trans(1)
17943  call rlux(trans, len)
17944  if (trans(1)<=rdcf) sign = -1.
17945  if (trans(1)>rdcf) sign = 1.
17946  call rlux(trans, len)
17947  xpla = xpl*sign*trans(1)
17948  call rlux(trans, len)
17949  if (trans(1)<=rdcf) sign = -1.
17950  if (trans(1)>rdcf) sign = 1.
17951  call rlux(trans, len)
17952  ypla = ypl*sign*trans(1)
17953  write (16, 100) xla, yla, xpla, ypla
17954  do ii = 1, ngood
17955  f(2, ii) = f(2, ii) + xla
17956  f(4, ii) = f(4, ii) + yla
17957  f(3, ii) = f(3, ii) + xpla
17958  f(5, ii) = f(5, ii) + ypla
17959  end do
17960  return
17961  end subroutine randali
17963  subroutine matrix
17964  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
17965  common /bloc11/r(6, 6), t(6, 6, 6)
17966  common /secdr/iseor
17967  logical iseor
17968 
17969  write (16, *) ' TRANSPORT MATRIX (m-rd)'
17970  write (16, *) ' FIRST ORDER TRANSPORT********'
17971  do ia = 1, 6
17972  write (16, 100)(r(ia,ib), ib=1, 6)
17973  end do
17974 100 format (6(3x,e12.5))
17975  write (16, *) ' *************************************************'
17976  if (iseor) then
17977  write (16, *) ' SECOND ORDER TRANSPORT (m-rd)********'
17978  do ia = 1, 6
17979  do ib = 1, 6
17980  do ic = 1, 6
17981  if (t(ia,ib,ic)/=6.*0) write (16, 101) ia, ib, ic, &
17982  t(ia, ib, ic)
17983  end do
17984  end do
17985  end do
17986  write (16, *) ' *************************************************'
17987  end if
17988 101 format (' T', 3(i1), 3x, e12.5)
17989  return
17990  end subroutine matrix
17999  subroutine egun(fmult, indp)
18000  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
18001  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
18002  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
18003  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
18004  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
18005  common /azlist/icont, iprin
18006  common /dyn/tref, vref
18007  common /rigid/boro
18008  common /etcom/cog(8), exten(17), fd(iptsz)
18009  common /qmoyen/qmoy
18010  common /tapes/in, ifile, meta
18011  common /pltprf/sprfx(3000), sprfy(3000), sprfl(3000), sprfw(3000), &
18012  sprfp(3000), sprng(3000), iprf
18013  common /davcom/dav1(maxcell1, 40), davtot, iitem(maxcell1), idav
18014  common /femt/iemgrw, iemqesg
18015  common /cgtof/charm(20), cgtdv(20), nbch(20), netac
18016  common /compt/nrres, nrtre, nrbunc, nrdbun
18017  common /sc3/beamc, scdist, sce10, cplm, ect, apl, ichaes, iscsp
18018  common /dcspa/iesp
18019  common /spl/xspl(4000), yspl(4000), s(5000), p(5000), q(5000)
18020  dimension gam(3000), xe(3000), xpe(3000), ye(3000), ype(3000)
18021  character *1 cr
18022  logical flgsc, iesp, ichaes, iemgrw
18023  ! print out on terminal of transport element # on one and the same
18024  ! line
18025  nrres = nrres + 1
18026  cr = char(13)
18027  write (6, 8254) nrtre, nrres
18028 8254 format ('Transport element:', i5, ' Accelerating element:', i5)
18029  write (6, *) 'EGUN calculation started'
18030  ! energy at the entrance
18031  we = 0.
18032  do i = 1, ngood
18033  we = we + f(7, i)
18034  end do
18035  we = we/float(ngood) - xmat
18036  ! indp: define the number of space charge computations
18037  ! indp = 1 : 8 space charge computations. The EGUN field is divided in
18038  ! 16 elements
18039  ! indp = 2 : 16 space charge computation. in
18040  ! 32 elements
18041  ! indp = 3 : 32 space charge computation. in
18042  ! 64 elements
18043  if (indp>3) indp = 3
18044  if (indp==1) ipart = 16
18045  if (indp>=2) ipart = 32
18046  if (indp==3) ipart = 64
18047  ! research the number of steps w.r.t. the input energy
18048  ! convert energy: MeV --> eV
18049  we = we*1.e06
18050  weinf = 19.99
18051  if (we<=weinf) then
18052  write (6, *) ' Energy at the cathode: ', we, &
18053  ' eV is below the lower limit of 20 eV '
18054  stop
18055  end if
18056  ! read egun field on the disk
18057  e0 = xmat
18058  vlm = vl*1.e-02
18059  read (22, *) npt
18060  do i = 1, npt
18061  read (22, *) xspl(i), yspl(i)
18062  end do
18063  zinf = xspl(1)
18064  zsup = xspl(npt)
18065  egl = zsup - zinf
18066  call deriv2(npt)
18067  elgun = egl*100.
18068  ! PLOT
18069  if (iprf==1) call stapl(davtot*10.)
18070  ! start prints in file 'short.data'
18071  idav = idav + 1
18072  idavs = idav
18073  iitem(idav) = 13
18074  dav1(idav, 1) = egl*1000.
18075  dav1(idav, 2) = fmult
18076  davtot = davtot + elgun
18077  dav1(idav, 4) = elgun*10.
18078  ! divide the length in ipart partitions
18079  ! the space charge computations are made at the middle of each
18080  ! partition
18081  eglp = egl/float(ipart)
18082  ! eglsc :space charge acting lenght (cm) (of each part)
18083  scl = float(ipart)/2.
18084  eglsc = egl*100./scl
18085  ! compute the EGUN field (MV)
18086  npas = 200
18087  xpas = eglp/float(npas)
18088  xnhf = 0
18089  dcfld = 0.
18090  do i = 1, npas
18091  fpos = xnhf*xpas
18092  tspl = spline(npt, fpos)*fmult
18093  dcfld = dcfld + qst*tspl*xpas
18094  xnhf = xnhf + 1.
18095  end do
18096  ! 4443 format(2x,i5,3(2x,e12.5))
18097  dav1(idav, 3) = dcfld*1000.
18098  write (16, 101) elgun, fmult, dcfld*1000.
18099 101 format (5x, ' FIELD LENGTH =', f7.3, ' CM ', /, 5x, ' FIELD CREST=', &
18100  f10.4, ' MV/m', /5x, ' FIELD STENGTH= ', e12.5, ' kV', /)
18101  ! omment write(49,5557)
18102  ! omment5557
18103  ! format(6x,'z(m)',14x,'x(m)',14x,'xp(rad)',11x,'y(m)',14x,
18104  ! omment * 'yp(rad)',11x,'energy(MeV)')
18105  ! **** demarrage sur 0.5 mm (?) soit 0.5 e-03 m
18106  ! thresold of energy
18107  swe1 = 19.99
18108  swe2 = 79.99
18109  npas = 200
18110  if (we<swe1) npas = 400
18111  if (we<swe2) npas = 300
18112  xlstart = 0.5e-03
18113  xpas = xlstart/float(npas)
18114  npas1 = npas + 1
18115  iflg = -1
18116  xnht = 0.
18117  ! *et*2012*Jun*s
18118  flgsc = .false.
18119  ! *et*2012*Jun*e
18120 501 continue
18121  if (iflg==ipart) go to 500
18122  do j = 1, ngood
18123  xnh = xnht
18124  qc = f(9, j)
18125  gam0 = f(7, j)/e0
18126  gam(1) = gam0
18127  tof = f(6, j)
18128  ! the tranverse coordinates are converted in (m,rad)
18129  x0 = f(2, j)*1.e-02
18130  y0 = f(4, j)*1.e-02
18131  t0 = f(3, j)*1.e-03
18132  p0 = f(5, j)*1.e-03
18133  ! Pitch transformation
18134  xe0 = x0*(gam0*gam0-1.)**0.25
18135  xpe0 = t0*(gam0*gam0-1.)**0.25
18136  ye0 = y0*(gam0*gam0-1.)**0.25
18137  ype0 = p0*(gam0*gam0-1.)**0.25
18138  fpos = xnh*xpas
18139  tspl = spline(npt, fpos)*fmult
18140  dgam = (qc/e0)*tspl
18141  dgami = dgam
18142  xpe0 = xpe0 + .5*xe0*gam0*dgam/(gam0*gam0-1)
18143  ype0 = ype0 + .5*ye0*gam0*dgam/(gam0*gam0-1)
18144  a1 = qc*qc/(4.*e0*e0)
18145  a2 = qc/(e0*vlm)
18146  xe(1) = xe0
18147  xpe(1) = xpe0
18148  ye(1) = ye0
18149  ype(1) = ype0
18150  do i = 2, npas1
18151  i1 = i - 1
18152  fpos1 = xnh*xpas
18153  fpos2 = (xnh+0.25)*xpas
18154  fpos3 = (xnh+0.5)*xpas
18155  fpos4 = (xnh+0.75)*xpas
18156  fpos5 = (xnh+1.)*xpas
18157  tspl1 = spline(npt, fpos1)*fmult
18158  tspl2 = spline(npt, fpos2)*fmult
18159  tspl3 = spline(npt, fpos3)*fmult
18160  tspl4 = spline(npt, fpos4)*fmult
18161  tspl5 = spline(npt, fpos5)*fmult
18162  cw = (qc/e0)*xpas/90.
18163  tspl = 7.*tspl1 + 32.*tspl2 + 12.*tspl3 + 32.*tspl4 + 7.*tspl5
18164  gam(i) = cw*tspl + gam(i1)
18165  gam1 = gam(i1)
18166  gam5 = gam(i)
18167  dgam1 = (qc/e0)*tspl1
18168  cof1 = (gam5-gam1)/(xpas*xpas)
18169  cof2 = dgam1/xpas
18170  cof = cof1 - cof2
18171  gam2 = gam1 + dgam1*xpas/4. + cof*xpas*xpas/16.
18172  gam3 = gam1 + dgam1*xpas*0.5 + cof*xpas*xpas/4.
18173  gam4 = gam1 + dgam1*xpas*0.75 + cof*9.*xpas*xpas/16.
18174  gams1 = gam1*gam1
18175  gams2 = gam2*gam2
18176  gams3 = gam3*gam3
18177  gams4 = gam4*gam4
18178  gams5 = gam5*gam5
18179  ! omment bgt1=(gams1-1.)**1.5
18180  bgt2 = (gams2-1.)**1.5
18181  bgt3 = (gams3-1.)**1.5
18182  bgt4 = (gams4-1.)**1.5
18183  bgt5 = (gams5-1.)**1.5
18184  tslpt = 8.*tspl2/bgt2 + 6.*tspl3/bgt3 + 24.*tspl4/bgt4 + &
18185  7.*tspl5/bgt5
18186  dt = a2*xpas*xpas*tslpt/90.
18187  bet = sqrt(1.-1./gams1)
18188  tof = tof + xpas/(vlm*bet) + dt
18189  f(7, j) = gam(i)*e0
18190  f(6, j) = tof
18191  bg1 = (gams1+2.)/((gams1-1.)*(gams1-1.))
18192  bg2 = (gams2+2.)/((gams2-1.)*(gams2-1.))
18193  bg3 = (gams3+2.)/((gams3-1.)*(gams3-1.))
18194  bg4 = (gams4+2.)/((gams4-1.)*(gams4-1.))
18195  bg5 = (gams5+2.)/((gams5-1.)*(gams5-1.))
18196  bgts1 = bg1*tspl1*tspl1
18197  bgts2 = bg2*tspl2*tspl2
18198  bgts3 = bg3*tspl3*tspl3
18199  bgts4 = bg4*tspl4*tspl4
18200  bgts5 = bg5*tspl5*tspl5
18201  ! gtpm=bgts1+3.*bgts2+3.*bgts3+bgts4
18202  gtpm = 7.*bgts1 + 32.*bgts2 + 12.*bgts3 + 32.*bgts4 + 7.*bgts5
18203  ! gtm=bgts1+2.*bgts2+bgts3
18204  gtm = 7.*bgts1 + 24.*bgts2 + 6.*bgts3 + 8.*bgts4
18205  ! gtpz=bgts2+2.*bgts3+bgts4
18206  gtpz = 8.*bgts2 + 6.*bgts3 + 24.*bgts4 + 7.*bgts5
18207  gtm1 = 2.*bgts2 + 3.*bgts3 + 18.*bgts4 + 7.*bgts5
18208  de = -a1*xpas*xpas*gtm/90.
18209  de1 = -a1*xpas*xpas*xpas*gtm1/90.
18210  dpe1 = -a1*xpas*gtpm/90.
18211  dpe2 = -a1*xpas*xpas*gtpz/90.
18212  dxpe1 = dpe1*xe(i1)
18213  dype1 = dpe1*ye(i1)
18214  dxpe2 = dpe2*xpe(i1)
18215  dype2 = dpe2*ype(i1)
18216  dxe = de*xe(i1) + de1*xpe(i1)
18217  dye = de*ye(i1) + de1*ype(i1)
18218  xpe(i) = xpe(i1) + dxpe1 + dxpe2
18219  ype(i) = ype(i1) + dype1 + dype2
18220  xe(i) = xe(i1) + dxe + xpe(i1)*xpas
18221  ye(i) = ye(i1) + dye + ype(i1)*xpas
18222  ! back to the real variables and convert to (cm,mrad)
18223  gamm1 = (gams5-1.)**0.25
18224  gamm2 = (gams5-1.)**1.25
18225  dgam = (qc/e0)*tspl5
18226  xi = xe(i)/gamm1
18227  xpi = xpe(i)/gamm1 - xe(i)*gam(i)*dgam/(gamm2*2.)
18228  yi = ye(i)/gamm1
18229  ypi = ype(i)/gamm1 - ye(i)*gam(i)*dgam/(gamm2*2.)
18230  ! convert in cm and mrd
18231  f(2, j) = xi*1.e02
18232  f(4, j) = yi*1.e02
18233  f(3, j) = xpi*1.e03
18234  f(5, j) = ypi*1.e03
18235  ! ***** follow prtcl ifpt not active ************
18236  ! omment if(j.eq.ifpt)
18237  ! omment * write(49,4445)
18238  ! fpos5,xi,xpi,yi,ypi,e0*(gam5-1.)
18239  ! omment4445 format(6(2x,e12.5))
18240  xnh = xnh + 1.
18241  end do
18242  end do
18243  iflg = iflg + 1
18244  xnht = xnh
18245  if (iflg==0) then
18246  if (indp==1) npas = 96
18247  if (indp==2) npas = 48
18248  if (indp==3) npas = 24
18249  npas1 = npas + 1
18250  xlres = egl - xlstart
18251  xpas = xlres/(float(npas)*float(ipart))
18252  xnht = fpos5/xpas
18253  flgsc = .true.
18254  dav1(idavs, 7) = tspl5
18255  dav1(idav, 5) = xlstart*1000.
18256  call disp
18257  ! v29/06/2010 call emiprt(0)
18258  go to 501
18259  end if
18260  if (iflg==1) then
18261  if (indp==1) npas = 48
18262  if (indp==2) npas = 24
18263  if (indp==3) npas = 12
18264  npas1 = npas + 1
18265  xlres = egl - xlstart
18266  xpas = xlres/(float(npas)*float(ipart))
18267  xnht = fpos5/xpas
18268  end if
18269  if (.not. flgsc) then
18270  flgsc = .true.
18271  call disp
18272  go to 501
18273  end if
18274  if (flgsc) then
18275  if (ichaes) then
18276  ! Charge space
18277  iesp = .true.
18278  call cesp(eglsc)
18279  iesp = .false.
18280  ! Change the dispersion dE/E with respect to the C.O.G of the
18281  ! bunch
18282  end if
18283  call disp
18284  flgsc = .false.
18285  ! reference ( c.o.g. of the bunch)
18286  tref = 0.
18287  gref = 0.
18288  do ij = 1, ngood
18289  tref = tref + f(6, ij)
18290  gref = gref + f(7, ij)/e0
18291  end do
18292  tref = tref/float(ngood)
18293  gref = gref/float(ngood)
18294  bets = sqrt(1.-1./(gref*gref))
18295  vref = bets*vl
18296  ! omment call emiprt(0)
18297  write (16, 562) fpos5*1000, tref, bets, tspl5
18298  write (6, 1562) fpos5*1000, bets, cr
18299 562 format (' ref.(c.o.g.) at ', e12.5, ' mm of the cathode', /, 5x, &
18300  ' tof: ', e12.5, ' sec beta: ', e12.5, ' field (MV/m) ', &
18301  e12.5)
18302 1562 format (' EGUN: at ', e12.5, ' mm from the cathode; beta: ', &
18303  e12.5, a1, $)
18304  go to 501
18305  end if
18306 500 continue
18307  write (6, *)
18308  write (6, *) 'EGUN calculation finished'
18309  ! reference ( c.o.g. of the bunch)
18310  tref = 0.
18311  gref = 0.
18312  do i = 1, ngood
18313  tref = tref + f(6, i)
18314  gref = gref + f(7, i)/e0
18315  end do
18316  tref = tref/float(ngood)
18317  gref = gref/float(ngood)
18318  bets = sqrt(1.-1./(gref*gref))
18319  write (16, 561) tref, bets
18320 561 format (' ref. at output of the DC gun', /, 5x, ' tof: ', e12.5, &
18321  ' sec beta: ', e12.5)
18322  vref = bets*vl
18323  ! new magnetic rigidity of the reference
18324  xmor = xmat*bets*gref
18325  boro = 33.356*xmor*1.e-01/qst
18326  dav1(idavs, 6) = bets
18327  dav1(idavs, 36) = ngood
18328  ! plots
18329  call stapl(davtot*10.)
18330  call emiprt(0)
18331  return
18332  end subroutine egun
18368  subroutine cpardyn(pib)
18369  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
18370  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
18371  common /rf1ptq/tvolt, avolt, fph, mlc, nceltot
18372  common /rf2ptq/rfq1(500), rfq2(500), rfq3(500), rfq4(500), rfq6(500), &
18373  rfq7(500), rfq8(500), rfq9(500)
18374  common /rf5ptq/tdvolt, rfq10(500), rfq11(500)
18375  common /rfq3ptq/itype(500), ipari(500), evens, evenr
