20882  common /mode/eflvl, rflvl
20883  common /aerp/vphase, vfield, ierpf
20884  common /tofev/ttvols
20885  common /elec/jelec
20886  common /step/istep
20887  logical iesp, ichaes, irstay, iavp, ispcel, ifield, iemgrw
20888  logical shift, chasit, itvol, imamin, dave, jelec
20889  character *1 cr
20890  ! ************************************************************
20891  ! XESLN : NEGATIVE LENGHT OF THE DRIFT FOLLOWING THE GAP
20892  ! IF XESLN N.E.0 THEN THE CHARGE SPACE EFFECT IMPLIES THE
20893  ! LENGTH (YLG-XESLN)
20894  nrres = nrres + 1
20895  ncavnm = ncavnm + 1
20896  ! allow for print out on terminal of gap# on one and the same line
20897  cr = char(13)
20898  write (6, 8254) nrtre, nrres, cr
20899 8254 format ('Transport element:', i5, ' Accelerating element:', i5, &
20900  a1, $)
20901  write (16, *) ' CAVITY N :', nrres
20902  ilost = 0
20903  aqst = abs(qst)
20904  qmoy = aqst
20905  ! --- the frequency fh may be changed with delfh
20906  oldfh = fh
20907  ! IDUM : dummy variable (indicate in input file the number of the
20908  ! cavity)
20909  read (in, *) idum
20910 
20911  ! ielec = 0 acceleration for non relativistic particles with erest < 1
20912  ! MeV (e.g. non-relativistic electrons)
20913  ! otherwise acceleration for hadrons
20914  ! dphase (deg): phase offset from the phase crest (giving the maximum
20915  ! of energy gain)
20916  ! FFIELD : in percent;
20917  ! (electric field)=(initial electric field)*(1.+FFIELD/100)
20918  jelec = .false.
20919  read (in, *) dielec, dphase, ffield, istep, ielec
20920  if (ielec==0) jelec = .true.
20921  ffield = 1. + ffield/100.
20922  if (ffield==0.) ffield = 1.e-12
20923  if (ifield) then
20924  ! --- The field is read on the disk in the form:
20925  ! z (cm) E(z) MV/cm
20926  ! fhc: frequency of the cavity (Hertz) (read in the file
20927  ! 'field.txt' )
20928  fh = fhc*2.*pi
20929  ncel = ncell
20930  atte = att
20931  ye0 = atte
20932  ! flength : length of the field (cm)
20933  flength = xspl(npt) - xspl(1)
20934  ylg = flength
20935  else
20936  ! --- The field is read on the input list in the form of a Fourier
20937  ! series
20938  ncell = ncel
20939  oldfh = fh
20940  ! atte: factor acting on the amplitude of the field (read in the
20941  ! input list)
20942  ye0 = atte
20943  end if
20944  dphete = dphase
20945  if (itvol .and. imamin) then
20946  ! --- adjustment of the phase offset w.r.t. the t.o.f. (deg)
20947  ottvol = fh*ttvols*180./pi
20948  attvol = ottvol
20949  xkpi = ottvol/360.
20950  ixkpi = int(xkpi)
20951  xkpi = (xkpi-float(ixkpi))*360.
20952  dphase = dphase - xkpi
20953  end if
20954  write (16, 150) fh/(2.*pi), ylg, atte, ffield, ncel, istep
20955 150 format (4x, 'FREQUENCY :', e12.5, ' Hertz', /, 4x, 'FIELD LENGTH :', &
20956  e12.5, ' cm', /, 4x, 'FIELD FACTOR (UNITS CONVERSION) :', e12.5, &
20957  /, 4x, 'FIELD FACTOR (ATTENUATION) :', e12.5, /, 4x, &
20958  'FIELD DIVIDED IN: ', i4, ' CELLS STEPS BY CELL ', i5)
20959  if (.not. imamin) write (16, *) ' PHASE OFFSET: ', dphete, ' DEG'
20960  if (imamin) write (16, 1501) dphete, dphase, xkpi
20961 1501 format (4x, 'PHASE OFFSET (before adjustment): ', e12.5, ' deg', /, &
20962  4x, 'PHASE OFFSET (after adjustment): ', e12.5, ' deg', /, 4x, &
20963  'ADJUSTMENT ON THE PHASE OFFSET: ', e12.5, ' deg')
20964  fh0 = fh/vl
20965  beref = vref/vl
20966  ! --- ttvol: time of flight at entrance (sec)
20967  ttvol = 0.
20968  if (itvol) ttvol = ttvols*fh
20969  ! start file 'short.data'
20970  ! --- dav1(idav,3)=0: the particle reference and the cog coincide at
20971  ! the input
20972  ! --- dav1(idav,3)=1: the particle reference and the cog are
20973  ! independent
20974  dav1(idav, 3) = 0.
20975  idav = idav + 1
20976  iitem(idav) = 1
20977  dav1(idav, 1) = ylg*10.
20978  dav1(idav, 2) = ye0*100.
20979  davtot = davtot + ylg
20980  dav1(idav, 24) = davtot*10.
20981  dav1(idav, 40) = fh
20982  if (iprf==1) call stapl(dav1(idav,24))
20983  iarg = 1
20984  call cdg(iarg)
20985  enold = cog(1)
20986  encog = enold
20987  gcog = enold/xmat
20988  bcog = sqrt(1.-1./(gcog*gcog))
20989  tcog = cog(3)
20990  if (shift) then
20991  ! --- the reference particle and the cog are independent
20992  beref = vref/vl
20993  gamref = 1./sqrt(1.-(beref*beref))
20994  enref = xmat*gamref
20995  trefdg = tref*fh*180./pi
20996  dav1(idav, 3) = 1.
20997  else
20998  ! --- the reference particle and the cog are coinciding
20999  beref = bcog
21000  vref = bcog*vl
21001  tref = tcog
21002  gamref = gcog
21003  enref = cog(1)
21004  dav1(idav, 3) = 0.
21005  end if
21006  if (dav1(idav,3)==1.) write (16, *) &
21007  ' ****reference and cog evolve independently'
21008  if (dav1(idav,3)==0.) write (16, *) ' **** the reference is the cog '
21009  write (16, 178)
21010 178 format (/, ' Dynamics at the input', /, 5x, &
21011  ' BETA GAMMA ENERGY(MeV) ', &
21012  ' TOF(deg) TOF(sec)')
21013  write (16, 1788) bcog, gcog, encog - xmat, tcog*fh*180./pi, tcog
21014 1788 format (' COG ', f7.5, 3x, e12.5, 1x, e12.5, 3x, e12.5, 3x, e12.5)
21015  enrprin = enref - xmat
21016  write (16, 165) beref, gamref, enrprin, tref*fh*180./pi, tref
21017 165 format (' REF ', f7.5, 3x, e12.5, 1x, e12.5, 3x, e12.5, 3x, e12.5)
21018  iprint = 0
21019  call statis
21020  xk1 = fh/vref
21021  ! --- transit time factors TK and SK based on the velocity at the
21022  ! entrance
21023  tk = tta0(beref)/2.*ffield
21024  sk = tsb0(beref)/2.*ffield
21025  ! --- prediction of PCREST (phase of RF giving the maximum of energy
21026  ! gain in the cavity)
21027  pcrest = atan(-sk/tk)
21028  ddwc = aqst*(tk*cos(pcrest)-sk*sin(pcrest))
21029  if (ddwc<0.) pcrest = pcrest + pi
21030  ! --- first correction of pcrest based on an average beta
21031  call phcrest(pcrest, ylg, ncell, zcrest)
21032  ! avbet: average value of beta
21033  avbet = fh/(zcrest*vl)
21034  tk = tta0(avbet)/2.*ffield
21035  sk = tsb0(avbet)/2.*ffield
21036  pcrest = atan(-sk/tk)
21037  ddwc = aqst*(tk*cos(pcrest)-sk*sin(pcrest))
21038  if (ddwc<0.) pcrest = pcrest + pi
21039  ! final correction of the phase crest PCREST
21040  call phcrest1(pcrest, ylg, ncell)
21041  ! phase at the entrance of the cavity
21042  dphase = dphase*pi/180.
21043  phi0 = pcrest + dphase + ttvol
21044  ! --- compute energy and TOF of reference
21045  call dwref(phi0, ylg, ncell, gams, ts)
21046  enrs = gams*xmat
21047  ddw = enrs - enref
21048  trefs = ts + tref
21049  bets = sqrt(gams*gams-1.)/gams
21050  ! old bets=b5
21051  tredg = fh*trefs*180./pi
21052  ! dynamic of the bunch
21053  call bcnum(phi0, ylg, ncell)
21054  ! ----- window control
21055  gcg = 0.
21056  do i = 1, ngood
21057  gcg = gcg + f(7, i)/xmat
21058  end do
21059  gcg = gcg/float(ngood)
21060  bcg = sqrt(1.-1./(gcg*gcg))
21061  wcg = (gcg-1.)*xmat
21062  call cogetc
21063  ! omment twind=0.
21064  do i = 1, ngood
21065  gpai = f(7, i)/xmat
21066  bpai = sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
21067  fd(i) = bpai/bcg*gpai/gcg
21068  ! omment twind=twind+f(6,i)
21069  end do
21070  ! omment twind=twind/float(ngood)
21071  ! ---- window control
21072  call reject(ilost)
21073  ! Reshuffles f(i,j) array after window (now done in 'reject')
21074  ! call shuffle
21075  write (16, *) ' PARAMETERS RELATING TO THE REFERENCE PARTICLE '
21076  write (16, *) '***********************************************'
21077  write (16, *) ' ENERGY GAIN(MeV) ', ddw, ' TOF ', tredg, ' DEG'
21078  write (16, *) ' PHASE OF RF AT ENTRANCE(DG) ', phi0*180./pi
21079  write (16, *) ' CREST PHASE OF RF (DEG) ', pcrest*180./pi
21080  iarg = 1
21081  call cdg(iarg)
21082  encog = cog(1)
21083  gcog = encog/xmat
21084  bcog = sqrt(1.-1./(gcog*gcog))
21085  tcog = cog(3)
21086  call ext2d(1)
21087  ! print in file 'short.data'
21088  ! 3.12.09 phnew=-(int(tcog*fh/pi+0.5)-tcog*fh/pi)*180.
21089  ! 3.12.09 dav1(idav,6)=encog-xmat
21090  ! 3.12.09 dav1(idav,7)=phnew
21091  if (itvol) then
21092  dav1(idav, 38) = dphete
21093  dav1(idav, 39) = dphase*180./pi
21094  else
21095  dav1(idav, 38) = dphete
21096  end if
21097  write (16, 3777)
21098 3777 format (/, ' Dynamics at the output', /, 5x, &
21099  ' BETA dW(MeV) ENERGY(MeV) ', ' TOF(deg) TOF(sec)' &
21100  )
21101  engain = encog - enold
21102  write (16, 3473) bets, ddw, enrs - xmat, fh*trefs*180./pi, trefs
21103 3473 format (' REF ', f7.5, 3x, f10.6, 3x, e12.5, 3x, e12.5, 3x, e12.5)
21104  write (16, 1789) bcog, engain, encog - xmat, tcog*fh*180./pi, tcog
21105 1789 format (' COG ', f7.5, 3x, f10.6, 3x, e12.5, 3x, e12.5, 3x, e12.5)
21106  testca = exten(1)*exten(2)*exten(3)
21107  ! epsil=1.E-20
21108  epsil = 1.e-40
21109  if (abs(testca)>epsil) then
21110  qdisp = 2.*sqrt(exten(1))
21111  qmd = exten(1)*exten(3) - exten(2)**2
21112  sqmdv = 4.*pi*sqrt(qmd)
21113  surm = 4.*pi*sqrt(qmd)*180./pi
21114  qdp = 2.*sqrt(exten(3))
21115  cor12 = exten(2)/sqrt(exten(1)*exten(3))
21116  ! omment PENT12=SQRT(exten(1)/exten(3))/COR12
21117  ! omment PENT21=SQRT(exten(1)/exten(3))*COR12
21118  qdpde = qdp*180./pi
21119  else
21120  qdisp = 0.
21121  qmd = 0.
21122  sqmdv = 0.
21123  surm = 0.
21124  qdp = 0.
21125  cor12 = 0.
21126  pent12 = 0.
21127  pent21 = 0.
21128  qdpde = 0.
21129  end if
21130  trqtx = exten(4)*exten(5) - exten(8)**2
21131  trqpy = exten(6)*exten(7) - exten(9)**2
21132  qditax = 2.*sqrt(exten(4))
21133  qdiant = 2.*sqrt(exten(5))
21134  qditay = 2.*sqrt(exten(6))
21135  qdianp = 2.*sqrt(exten(7))
21136  surxth = 4.*pi*sqrt(trqtx)
21137  suryph = 4.*pi*sqrt(trqpy)
21138  if (shift) then
21139  vref = bets*vl
21140  tref = trefs
21141  else
21142  vref = bcog*vl
21143  tref = tcog
21144  end if
21145  if (itvol) ttvols = tref
21146  call statis
21147  ! ENVEL
21148  call stapl(dav1(idav,24))
21149  ! old WRITE(16,9998) SQMDV
21150  ! old 9998 FORMAT(2X,' EMITTANCE (norm): ',
21151  ! old * E12.5,' PI*MEV*RAD')
21152  dav1(idav, 16) = bcog*surxth*10./(pi*sqrt(1.-bcog*bcog))
21153  ! 3.12.09 dav1(idav,17)=surxth*10./pi
21154 
21155  dav1(idav, 21) = bcog*suryph*10./(pi*sqrt(1.-bcog*bcog))
21156  dav1(idav, 25) = nrres
21157  dav1(idav, 30) = ngood
21158 
21159  ! print in the file: 'dynac.dmp':
21160  ! gap number, phase offset(deg), relativistic beta, energy(MeV), horz.
21161  ! emit.(mm*mrd,norm), vert. emit.(mm*mrd,norm),long. emit(keV*sec)
21162 
21163  ! --- dav1(idav,16): Emittance(norm) x-xp (mm*mrad)
21164  ! --- dav1(idav,21): Emittance(norm) y-yp (mm*mrad)
21165  emns = 1.e12*sqmdv/(pi*fh)
21166  ! et2010s
21167  trfprt = fh*tref*180./pi
21168  tcgprt = fh*tcog*180./pi
21169  ! TEST n2kp=int(tofprt/360.)
21170  ! TEST tofprt=tofprt-float(n2kp)*360.
21171  ! TEST if(tofprt.gt.180.) tofprt=tofprt-360.
21172  ! cavity number, z (m), transmission (%), synchronous phase (deg),
21173  ! time of flight (deg) (within 180 deg and 180 deg),
21174  ! COG relativistic beta (@ output), COG output energy (MeV), REF
21175  ! relativistic beta (@ output), REF output energy (MeV),
21176  ! horizontal emittance (mm.mrad, RMS normalized), vertical emittance
21177  ! (mm.mrad, RMS normalized),
21178  ! longitudinal emittance (RMS, ns.keV)
21179  trnsms = 100.*float(ngood)/float(imax)
21180  if (ncavnm==1) write (50, *) '# cavnum.dmp'
21181  if (ncavnm==1) write (50, *) '# cav Z trans ', &
21182  'PHIs TOF(COG) COG Wcog TOF(REF) ', &
21183  ' REF Wref Ex,RMS,n Ey,RMS,n El,RMS'
21184  if (ncavnm==1) write (50, *) '# # (m) (%) ', &
21185  '(deg) (deg) beta (MeV) (deg) ', &
21186  ' beta (MeV) (mm.mrad) (mm.mrad) (ns.keV)'
21187  write (50, 7023) nrres, 0.001*dav1(idav, 24), trnsms, dphete, tcgprt, &
21188  bcog, encog - xmat, trfprt, bets, enrs - xmat, &
21189  0.25*dav1(idav, 16), 0.25*dav1(idav, 21), 0.25*emns
21190 7023 format (1x, i4, 1x, e12.5, 1x, f6.2, 1x, f7.2, 1x, &
21191  2(e14.7,1x,f7.5,1x,e14.7,1x), 3(e12.5,1x))
21192  ! et2010e
21193  fh = oldfh
21194  ! new magnetic rigidity of the reference
21195  gref = 1./sqrt(1.-bets*bets)
21196  xmor = xmat*bets*gref
21197  boro = 33.356*xmor*1.e-01/aqst
21198  write (16, *) ilost, ' particles lost in cavity ', nrres
21199  call emiprt(0)
21200  return
21201  end subroutine cavnum
21207  subroutine phcrest(phi0, ylg, ncell, zcrest)
21208  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
21209  common /cavnum1/xnh, xpas, fmult, npt
21210  common /cavnum2/b0, b1, b2, b3, b4, b5
21211  common /cavnum3/bgt0, bgt1, bgt2, bgt3, bgt4, bgt5
21212  common /cavnum5/tspl0, tspl1, tspl2, tspl3, tspl4, tspl5
21213  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
21214  common /spl/xspl(4000), yspl(4000), s(5000), p(5000), q(5000)
21215  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
21216  common /dyn/tref, vref
21217  ! ylg(cm) length of cavity, xpas(cm): step length
21218  ! 8 steps over a cell
21219  npas = ncell*10
21220  xpas = ylg/float(npas)
21221  e0 = xmat
21222  b0 = vref/vl
21223  b1 = b0
21224  b2 = b0
21225  b3 = b0
21226  b4 = b0
21227  b5 = b0
21228  t0 = 0.
21229  gam0 = 1./sqrt(1.-b0*b0)
21230  xnh = 0.
21231  estop = xpas/10.
21232 20 continue
21233  ! cc if(xnh*xpas.ge.ylg) go to 10
21234  xpat = xnh*xpas
21235  if (xpat<(ylg-estop)) then
21236  call fposb
21237  ! --- enegy gain over the step
21238  ! predictor of energy gain
21239  b1 = b0
21240  b2 = b0
21241  b3 = b0
21242  b4 = b0
21243  b5 = b0
21244  dgam = xi1(phi0, t0, t5)*qst/e0
21245  gam5 = gam0 + dgam
21246  ! corrector of energy gain
21247  xpas2 = xpas*xpas
21248  dgdz = qst/e0*tspl0
21249  d2gdz2 = dgam/xpas2 - dgdz/xpas
21250  d2gdz2 = 2.*d2gdz2
21251  gam1 = gam0 + dgdz*xpas/5. + d2gdz2*xpas2/50.
21252  gam2 = gam0 + dgdz*xpas*2./5. + d2gdz2*xpas2*4./50.
21253  gam3 = gam0 + dgdz*xpas*3./5. + d2gdz2*xpas2*9./50.
21254  gam4 = gam0 + dgdz*xpas*4./5. + d2gdz2*xpas2*16./50.
21255  b1 = sqrt(gam1*gam1-1.)/gam1
21256  b2 = sqrt(gam2*gam2-1.)/gam2
21257  b3 = sqrt(gam3*gam3-1.)/gam3
21258  b4 = sqrt(gam4*gam4-1.)/gam4
21259  b5 = sqrt(gam5*gam5-1.)/gam5
21260  dgam = xi1(phi0, t0, t5)*qst/e0
21261  gam5 = gam0 + dgam
21262  b5 = sqrt(gam5*gam5-1.)/gam5
21263  b0 = b5
21264  t0 = t5
21265  gam0 = gam5
21266  xnh = xnh + 1.
21267  go to 20
21268  end if
21269  ! *et*2013 10 continue
21270  ! compute an average k: zcrest
21271  zcrest = fh*t5/ylg
21272  return
21273  end subroutine phcrest
21279  subroutine phcrest1(phi0, ylg, ncell)
21280  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
21281  common /cavnum1/xnh, xpas, fmult, npt
21282  common /cavnum2/b0, b1, b2, b3, b4, b5
21283  common /cavnum3/bgt0, bgt1, bgt2, bgt3, bgt4, bgt5
21284  common /cavnum5/tspl0, tspl1, tspl2, tspl3, tspl4, tspl5
21285  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
21286  common /spl/xspl(4000), yspl(4000), s(5000), p(5000), q(5000)
21287  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
21288  common /dyn/tref, vref
21289  dimension stx(400), sty(400), sts(400), stp(400), stq(400)
21290  dimension phc(100), wph(100)
21291  ! ylg(cm) length of cavity, xpas(cm): step length
21292  npas = ncell*10
21293  xpas = ylg/float(npas)
21294  e0 = xmat
21295  rad = pi/180.
21296  dph = rad
21297  dph1 = rad
21298  dplim = rad*0.01
21299  pmax = phi0 + 10.*rad
21300  pmin = phi0 - 10.*rad
21301  ibcl = 1
21302  phi = pmin
21303 30 continue
21304  if (phi>=pmax) go to 50
21305  phc(ibcl) = phi
21306  b0 = vref/vl
21307  b1 = b0
21308  b2 = b0
21309  b3 = b0
21310  b4 = b0
21311  b5 = b0
21312  t0 = 0.
21313  gam0 = 1./sqrt(1.-b0*b0)
21314  wwref = (gam0-1.)*e0
21315  xnh = 0.
21316 20 continue
21317  if (xnh*xpas>=ylg) go to 10
21318  call fposb
21319  ! --- enegy gain over the step
21320  ! predictor of energy gain
21321  b1 = b0
21322  b2 = b0
21323  b3 = b0
21324  b4 = b0
21325  b5 = b0
21326  dgam = xi1(phi, t0, t5)*qst/e0
21327  gam5 = gam0 + dgam
21328  ! corrector
21329  xpas2 = xpas*xpas
21330  dgdz = qst/e0*tspl0
21331  d2gdz2 = dgam/(xpas2) - dgdz/xpas
21332  d2gdz2 = 2.*d2gdz2
21333  gam1 = gam0 + dgdz*xpas/5. + d2gdz2*xpas2/50.
21334  gam2 = gam0 + dgdz*xpas*2./5. + d2gdz2*xpas2*4./50.
21335  gam3 = gam0 + dgdz*xpas*3./5. + d2gdz2*xpas2*9./50.
21336  gam4 = gam0 + dgdz*xpas*4./5. + d2gdz2*xpas2*16./50.
21337  b1 = sqrt(gam1*gam1-1.)/gam1
21338  b2 = sqrt(gam2*gam2-1.)/gam2
21339  b3 = sqrt(gam3*gam3-1.)/gam3
21340  b4 = sqrt(gam4*gam4-1.)/gam4
21341  b5 = sqrt(gam5*gam5-1.)/gam5
21342  dgam = xi1(phi, t0, t5)*qst/e0
21343  gam5 = gam0 + dgam
21344  b5 = sqrt(gam5*gam5-1.)/gam5
21345  b0 = b5
21346  t0 = t5
21347  gam0 = gam5
21348  xnh = xnh + 1.
21349  go to 20
21350 10 continue
21351  wwpcr = (gam0-1.)*e0
21352  dwcpr = wwpcr - wwref
21353  wph(ibcl) = dwcpr
21354  phi = phi + dph
21355  ibcl = ibcl + 1
21356  go to 30
21357 50 continue
21358  ibcl = ibcl - 1
21359  ! save spline areas (partial save)
21360  do i = 1, 400
21361  stx(i) = xspl(i)
21362  sty(i) = yspl(i)
21363  sts(i) = s(i)
21364  stp(i) = p(i)
21365  stq(i) = q(i)
21366  end do
21367  ! padding spline areas
21368  do i = 1, ibcl
21369  xspl(i) = phc(i)
21370  yspl(i) = wph(i)
21371  end do
21372  call deriv2(ibcl)
21373  i = 1
21374  phi = xspl(1)
21375  yfb = slope(ibcl, phi)/100.
21376 70 continue
21377  if (phi>=xspl(ibcl)) go to 60
21378  if (dph1<=dplim) go to 60
21379  yf = slope(ibcl, phi)
21380  ! cccc if(abs(yf).lt.yfb) go to 60
21381  if (yf>0.) then
21382  phi = phi + dph1
21383  go to 70
21384  else
21385  phi = phi - dph1
21386  dph1 = dph1/2.
21387  phi = phi + dph1
21388  go to 70
21389  end if
21390 60 continue
21391  phi0 = phi
21392  ! restore spline areas (partial save)
21393  do i = 1, 400
21394  xspl(i) = stx(i)
21395  yspl(i) = sty(i)
21396  s(i) = sts(i)
21397  p(i) = stp(i)
21398  q(i) = stq(i)
21399  end do
21400  return
21401  end subroutine phcrest1
21410  subroutine dwref(phi0, ylg, ncell, gam5, t5)
21411  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
21412  common /cavnum1/xnh, xpas, fmult, npt
21413  common /cavnum2/b0, b1, b2, b3, b4, b5
21414  common /cavnum5/tspl0, tspl1, tspl2, tspl3, tspl4, tspl5
21415  common /cavnum7/sspl0, sspl1, sspl2, sspl3, sspl4, sspl5
21416  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
21417  common /spl/xspl(4000), yspl(4000), s(5000), p(5000), q(5000)
21418  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
21419  common /dyn/tref, vref
21420  ! TEST
21421  common /step/istep
21422  ! ylg(cm) length of cavity, xpas(cm): step length
21423  npas = ncell*istep
21424  xpas = ylg/float(npas)
21425  e0 = xmat
21426  xnh = 0.
21427  b0 = vref/vl
21428  b1 = b0
21429  b2 = b0
21430  b3 = b0
21431  b4 = b0
21432  b5 = b0
21433  t0 = 0.
21434  gam0 = 1./sqrt(1.-b0*b0)
21435  estop = xpas/10.
21436 20 continue
21437  xpat = xnh*xpas
21438  if (xpat<(ylg-estop)) then
21439  call fposb
21440  ! --- enegy gain over the step
21441  b1 = b0
21442  b2 = b0
21443  b3 = b0
21444  b4 = b0
21445  b5 = b0
21446  ! predictor
21447  dgam = xi1(phi0, t0, t5)*qst/e0
21448  gam5 = gam0 + dgam
21449  ! corrector
21450  xpas2 = xpas*xpas
21451  dgdz = qst/e0*tspl0
21452  d2gdz2 = dgam/xpas2 - dgdz/xpas
21453  d2gdz2 = 2.*d2gdz2
21454  gam1 = gam0 + dgdz*xpas/5. + d2gdz2*xpas2/50.
21455  gam2 = gam0 + dgdz*xpas*2./5. + d2gdz2*xpas2*4./50.
21456  gam3 = gam0 + dgdz*xpas*3./5. + d2gdz2*xpas2*9./50.
21457  gam4 = gam0 + dgdz*xpas*4./5. + d2gdz2*xpas2*16./50.
21458  b1 = sqrt(gam1*gam1-1.)/gam1
21459  b2 = sqrt(gam2*gam2-1.)/gam2
21460  b3 = sqrt(gam3*gam3-1.)/gam3
21461  b4 = sqrt(gam4*gam4-1.)/gam4
21462  b5 = sqrt(gam5*gam5-1.)/gam5
21463  dgam = xi1(phi0, t0, t5)*qst/e0
21464  gam5 = gam0 + dgam
21465  b5 = sqrt(gam5*gam5-1.)/gam5
21466  b0 = b5
21467  t0 = t5
21468  gam0 = gam5
21469  xnh = xnh + 1.
21470  go to 20
21471  end if
21472  ! *et*2013 10 continue
21473  return
21474  end subroutine dwref
21479  subroutine fposb
21480  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
21481  common /cavnum1/xnh, xpas, fmult, npt
21482  common /cavnum5/tspl0, tspl1, tspl2, tspl3, tspl4, tspl5
21483  common /cavnum6/fpos0, fpos1, fpos2, fpos3, fpos4, fpos5
21484  common /spl/xspl(4000), yspl(4000), s(5000), p(5000), q(5000)
21485  common /rfield/ifield
21486  logical ifield
21487 
21488  fpos0 = xnh*xpas
21489  fpos1 = (xnh+0.20)*xpas
21490  fpos2 = (xnh+0.40)*xpas
21491  fpos3 = (xnh+0.60)*xpas
21492  fpos4 = (xnh+0.80)*xpas
21493  fpos5 = (xnh+1.0)*xpas
21494  if (ifield) then
21495  ! --- the field is read from disk in MV/cm
21496  tspl0 = spline(npt, fpos0)*fmult
21497  tspl1 = spline(npt, fpos1)*fmult
21498  tspl2 = spline(npt, fpos2)*fmult
21499  tspl3 = spline(npt, fpos3)*fmult
21500  tspl4 = spline(npt, fpos4)*fmult
21501  tspl5 = spline(npt, fpos5)*fmult
21502  ! ****TEST
21503  ! old write(6,*) 'xnh fmult ',xnh,fmult
21504  ! c write(13,700) xnh,fpos0,tspl0
21505  ! c write(13,700) xnh,fpos1,tspl1
21506  ! c write(13,700) xnh,fpos2,tspl2
21507  ! c write(13,700) xnh,fpos3,tspl3
21508  ! c write(13,700) xnh,fpos4,tspl4
21509  ! c write(13,700) xnh,fpos5,tspl5
21510  ! c700 format(3(2x,e12.5))
21511  ! ***********************************
21512  go to 10
21513  else
21514  ! the field (MV/cm) is given in the form of a Fourier series
21515  tspl0 = fone(fpos0)*fmult
21516  tspl1 = fone(fpos1)*fmult
21517  tspl2 = fone(fpos2)*fmult
21518  tspl3 = fone(fpos3)*fmult
21519  tspl4 = fone(fpos4)*fmult
21520  tspl5 = fone(fpos5)*fmult
21521  ! ****TEST
21522  ! old write(6,*) 'xnh fmult ',xnh,fmult
21523  ! c write(70,700) fpos0,tspl0
21524  ! c write(70,700) fpos1,tspl1
21525  ! c write(70,700) fpos2,tspl2
21526  ! c write(70,700) fpos3,tspl3
21527  ! c write(70,700) fpos4,tspl4
21528  ! old write(70,700) fpos5,tspl5
21529  ! ***********************************
21530  end if
21531 10 continue
21532  return
21533  end subroutine fposb
21538  function xi1(phi0, t0, t5)
21539  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
21540  common /cavnum1/xnh, xpas, fmult, npt
21541  common /cavnum2/b0, b1, b2, b3, b4, b5
21542  common /cavnum5/tspl0, tspl1, tspl2, tspl3, tspl4, tspl5
21543  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
21544  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
21545 
21546  xi1 = 0.
21547  b01 = (b0+b1)/2.
21548  b12 = (b1+b2)/2.
21549  b23 = (b2+b3)/2
21550  b34 = (b3+b4)/2
21551  b45 = (b4+b5)/2
21552  t1 = t0 + xpas/(5.*b01*vl)
21553  t2 = t1 + xpas/(5.*b12*vl)
21554  t3 = t2 + xpas/(5.*b23*vl)
21555  t4 = t3 + xpas/(5.*b34*vl)
21556  t5 = t4 + xpas/(5.*b45*vl)
21557  xspl0 = cos(fh*t0+phi0)*tspl0
21558  xspl1 = cos(fh*t1+phi0)*tspl1
21559  xspl2 = cos(fh*t2+phi0)*tspl2
21560  xspl3 = cos(fh*t3+phi0)*tspl3
21561  xspl4 = cos(fh*t4+phi0)*tspl4
21562  xspl5 = cos(fh*t5+phi0)*tspl5
21563  tspl = 19.*xspl0 + 75.*xspl1 + 50.*xspl2 + 50.*xspl3 + 75.*xspl4 + &
21564  19.*xspl5
21565  xi1 = xpas/288.*tspl
21566  return
21567  end function xi1
21572  function xi2(phi0, t0)
21573  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
21574  common /cavnum1/xnh, xpas, fmult, npt
21575  common /cavnum2/b0, b1, b2, b3, b4, b5
21576  common /cavnum5/tspl0, tspl1, tspl2, tspl3, tspl4, tspl5
21577  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
21578  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
21579 
21580  b01 = (b0+b1)/2.
21581  b12 = (b1+b2)/2.
21582  b23 = (b2+b3)/2.
21583  b34 = (b3+b4)/2.
21584  b45 = (b4+b5)/2.
21585  t1 = t0 + xpas/(5.*b01*vl)
21586  t2 = t1 + xpas/(5.*b12*vl)
21587  t3 = t2 + xpas/(5.*b23*vl)
21588  t4 = t3 + xpas/(5.*b34*vl)
21589  t5 = t4 + xpas/(5.*b45*vl)
21590  ! old xspl0=cos(fh*t0+phi0)*tspl0
21591  xspl1 = cos(fh*t1+phi0)*tspl1
21592  xspl2 = cos(fh*t2+phi0)*tspl2
21593  xspl3 = cos(fh*t3+phi0)*tspl3
21594  xspl4 = cos(fh*t4+phi0)*tspl4
21595  xspl5 = cos(fh*t5+phi0)*tspl5
21596  tspl = 15.*xspl1 + 20.*xspl2 + 30.*xspl3 + 60*xspl4 + 19.*xspl5
21597  xi2 = xpas*xpas/288.*tspl
21598  return
21599  end function xi2
21604  function xj1(phi0, t0)
21605  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
21606  common /cavnum1/xnh, xpas, fmult, npt
21607  common /cavnum2/b0, b1, b2, b3, b4, b5
21608  common /cavnum3/bgt0, bgt1, bgt2, bgt3, bgt4, bgt5
21609  common /cavnum5/tspl0, tspl1, tspl2, tspl3, tspl4, tspl5
21610  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
21611  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
21612  ! --- the field is read on the disk
21613  xj1 = 0.
21614  b01 = (b0+b1)/2.
21615  b12 = (b1+b2)/2.
21616  b23 = (b2+b3)/2.
21617  b34 = (b3+b4)/2.
21618  b45 = (b4+b5)/2.
21619  t1 = t0 + xpas/(5.*b01*vl)
21620  t2 = t1 + xpas/(5.*b12*vl)
21621  t3 = t2 + xpas/(5.*b23*vl)
21622  t4 = t3 + xpas/(5.*b34*vl)
21623  t5 = t4 + xpas/(5.*b45*vl)
21624  xspl0 = -fh*sin(fh*t0+phi0)*tspl0/bgt0
21625  xspl1 = -fh*sin(fh*t1+phi0)*tspl1/bgt1
21626  xspl2 = -fh*sin(fh*t2+phi0)*tspl2/bgt2
21627  xspl3 = -fh*sin(fh*t3+phi0)*tspl3/bgt3
21628  xspl4 = -fh*sin(fh*t4+phi0)*tspl4/bgt4
21629  xspl5 = -fh*sin(fh*t5+phi0)*tspl5/bgt5
21630  tspl = 19.*xspl0 + 75.*xspl1 + 50.*xspl2 + 50.*xspl3 + 75.*xspl4 + &
21631  19.*xspl5
21632  xj1 = xpas/288.*tspl
21633  return
21634  end function xj1
21639  function xj2(phi0, t0)
21640  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
21641  common /cavnum1/xnh, xpas, fmult, npt
21642  common /cavnum2/b0, b1, b2, b3, b4, b5
21643  common /cavnum3/bgt0, bgt1, bgt2, bgt3, bgt4, bgt5
21644  common /cavnum5/tspl0, tspl1, tspl2, tspl3, tspl4, tspl5
21645  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
21646  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
21647 
21648  xj2 = 0.
21649  b01 = (b0+b1)/2.
21650  b12 = (b1+b2)/2.
21651  b23 = (b2+b3)/2.
21652  b34 = (b3+b4)/2.
21653  b45 = (b4+b5)/2.
21654  t1 = t0 + xpas/(5.*b01*vl)
21655  t2 = t1 + xpas/(5.*b12*vl)
21656  t3 = t2 + xpas/(5.*b23*vl)
21657  t4 = t3 + xpas/(5.*b34*vl)
21658  t5 = t4 + xpas/(5.*b45*vl)
21659  xspl1 = -fh*sin(fh*t1+phi0)*tspl1/bgt1
21660  xspl2 = -fh*sin(fh*t2+phi0)*tspl2/bgt2
21661  xspl3 = -fh*sin(fh*t3+phi0)*tspl3/bgt3
21662  xspl4 = -fh*sin(fh*t4+phi0)*tspl4/bgt4
21663  xspl5 = -fh*sin(fh*t5+phi0)*tspl5/bgt5
21664  tspl = 15.*xspl1 + 20.*xspl2 + 30.*xspl3 + 60.*xspl4 + 19.*xspl5
21665  xj2 = xpas*xpas/288.*tspl
21666  return
21667  end function xj2
21672  function xe21(phi0, t0)
21673  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
21674  common /cavnum1/xnh, xpas, fmult, npt
21675  common /cavnum2/b0, b1, b2, b3, b4, b5
21676  common /cavnum4/bge0, bge1, bge2, bge3, bge4, bge5
21677  common /cavnum5/tspl0, tspl1, tspl2, tspl3, tspl4, tspl5
21678  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
21679  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
21680 
21681  xe21 = 0.
21682  b01 = (b0+b1)/2.
21683  b12 = (b1+b2)/2.
21684  b23 = (b2+b3)/2.
21685  b34 = (b3+b4)/2.
21686  b45 = (b4+b5)/2.
21687  t1 = t0 + xpas/(5.*b01*vl)
21688  t2 = t1 + xpas/(5.*b12*vl)
21689  t3 = t2 + xpas/(5.*b23*vl)
21690  t4 = t3 + xpas/(5.*b34*vl)
21691  t5 = t4 + xpas/(5.*b45*vl)
21692  xspl0 = cos(fh*t0+phi0)*tspl0
21693  xspl1 = cos(fh*t1+phi0)*tspl1
21694  xspl2 = cos(fh*t2+phi0)*tspl2
21695  xspl3 = cos(fh*t3+phi0)*tspl3
21696  xspl4 = cos(fh*t4+phi0)*tspl4
21697  xspl5 = cos(fh*t5+phi0)*tspl5
21698  xspl0 = xspl0*xspl0*bge0
21699  xspl1 = xspl1*xspl1*bge1
21700  xspl2 = xspl2*xspl2*bge2
21701  xspl3 = xspl3*xspl3*bge3
21702  xspl4 = xspl4*xspl4*bge4
21703  xspl5 = xspl5*xspl5*bge5
21704  tspl = 19.*xspl0 + 75.*xspl1 + 50.*xspl2 + 50.*xspl3 + 75.*xspl4 + &
21705  19.*xspl5
21706  xe21 = xpas/288.*tspl
21707  return
21708  end function xe21
21713  function xe22(phi0, t0)
21714  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
21715  common /cavnum1/xnh, xpas, fmult, npt
21716  common /cavnum2/b0, b1, b2, b3, b4, b5
21717  common /cavnum4/bge0, bge1, bge2, bge3, bge4, bge5
21718  common /cavnum5/tspl0, tspl1, tspl2, tspl3, tspl4, tspl5
21719  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
21720  common /spl/xspl(4000), yspl(4000), s(5000), p(5000), q(5000)
21721  common /dyn/tref, vref
21722  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
21723  common /rfield/ifield
21724  logical ifield
21725 
21726  xe22 = 0.
21727  b01 = (b0+b1)/2.
21728  b12 = (b1+b2)/2.
21729  b23 = (b2+b3)/2.
21730  b34 = (b3+b4)/2.
21731  b45 = (b4+b5)/2.
21732  t1 = t0 + xpas/(5.*b01*vl)
21733  t2 = t1 + xpas/(5.*b12*vl)
21734  t3 = t2 + xpas/(5.*b23*vl)
21735  t4 = t3 + xpas/(5.*b34*vl)
21736  t5 = t4 + xpas/(5.*b45*vl)
21737  xspl1 = cos(fh*t1+phi0)*tspl1
21738  xspl2 = cos(fh*t2+phi0)*tspl2
21739  xspl3 = cos(fh*t3+phi0)*tspl3
21740  xspl4 = cos(fh*t4+phi0)*tspl4
21741  xspl5 = cos(fh*t4+phi0)*tspl5
21742  xspl1 = xspl1*xspl1*bge1
21743  xspl2 = xspl2*xspl2*bge2
21744  xspl3 = xspl3*xspl3*bge3
21745  xspl4 = xspl4*xspl4*bge4
21746  xspl5 = xspl5*xspl5*bge5
21747  tspl = 15.*xspl1 + 20.*xspl2 + 30.*xspl3 + 60.*xspl4 + 19.*xspl5
21748  xe22 = xpas*xpas/288.*tspl
21749  return
21750  end function xe22
21755  subroutine bcnum(phref, ylg, ncell)
21756  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
21757  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
21758  common /dyn/tref, vref
21759  common /sc3/beamc, scdist, sce10, cplm, ect, apl, ichaes, iscsp
21760  common /dcspa/iesp
21761  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
21762  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
21763  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
21764  common /cavnum1/xnh, xpas, fmult, npt
21765  common /cavnum2/b0, b1, b2, b3, b4, b5
21766  common /cavnum3/bgt0, bgt1, bgt2, bgt3, bgt4, bgt5
21767  common /cavnum4/bge0, bge1, bge2, bge3, bge4, bge5
21768  common /cavnum5/tspl0, tspl1, tspl2, tspl3, tspl4, tspl5
21769  common /rfield/ifield
21770  common /testref/trefs, ddw
21771  common /elec/jelec
21772  common /step/istep
21773  dimension gam(500), xe(500), xpe(500), ye(500), ype(500)
21774  dimension tcour(iptsz), phi(iptsz)
21775  logical ifield, flgsc, ichaes, iesp, jelec
21776  ! ylg(cm) length of cavity, xpas(cm): step length
21777  ! 8 steps over a cell (a voir!!!)
21778  beref = vref/vl
21779  gamref = 1./sqrt(1.-(beref*beref))
21780  enref = xmat*gamref
21781  e0 = xmat
21782  npas = ncell*istep
21783  xpas = ylg/float(npas)
21784  npas1 = npas + 1
21785  xnh = 0.
21786  ! flgsc = true ---> s.c. computation
21787  ! eglsc = 2*xpas : acting length of s.c. computation
21788  eglsc = 2.*xpas
21789  flgsc = .false.
21790  do i = 2, npas1
21791  i1 = i - 1
21792  ! --- seek the field E(z) values in the 6 positions in the step
21793  ! length xh
21794  call fposb
21795  do j = 1, ngood
21796  qc = f(9, j)
21797  gam0 = f(7, j)/e0
21798  gam(i1) = gam0
21799  if (i1==1) then
21800  tcour(j) = 0.
21801  tof = f(6, j)
21802  ! --- rphas: phase delay between the actual particle and
21803  ! the reference (entrance of the cavity)
21804  rphas = fh*(tof-tref)
21805  phi(j) = phref + rphas
21806  end if
21807  t0 = tcour(j)
21808  ddt = t0
21809  ! predictor (energy gain)
21810  b0 = sqrt(gam0*gam0-1.)/gam0
21811  b1 = b0
21812  b2 = b0
21813  b3 = b0
21814  b4 = b0
21815  b5 = b0
21816  dgam = xi1(phi(j), t0, t5)*qc/e0
21817  gam5 = gam(i1) + dgam
21818  ! corrector (energy gain)
21819  ! tspl0 = dE/dz (MV/(cm*cm)
21820  xpas2 = xpas*xpas
21821  dgdz = qst/e0*tspl0
21822  d2gdz2 = dgam/xpas2 - dgdz/xpas
21823  d2gdz2 = 2.*d2gdz2
21824  gam1 = gam0 + dgdz*xpas/5. + d2gdz2*xpas2/50.
21825  gam2 = gam0 + dgdz*xpas*2./5. + d2gdz2*xpas2*4./50.
21826  gam3 = gam0 + dgdz*xpas*3./5. + d2gdz2*xpas2*9./50.
21827  gam4 = gam0 + dgdz*xpas*4./5. + d2gdz2*xpas2*16./50.
21828  b1 = sqrt(gam1*gam1-1.)/gam1
21829  b2 = sqrt(gam2*gam2-1.)/gam2
21830  b3 = sqrt(gam3*gam3-1.)/gam3
21831  b4 = sqrt(gam4*gam4-1.)/gam4
21832  b5 = sqrt(gam5*gam5-1.)/gam5
21833  dgam = xi1(phi(j), t0, t5)*qc/e0
21834  gam5 = gam(i1) + dgam
21835  b5 = sqrt(gam5*gam5-1.)/gam5
21836  ! tranverse coordinates in (cm,rad)
21837  x0 = f(2, j)
21838  y0 = f(4, j)
21839  xt0 = f(3, j)*1.e-03
21840  yp0 = f(5, j)*1.e-03
21841  ! Picht transformation: xe0 and ye0 (cm) xpe0 and ype0 (rad)
21842  gamm0 = (gam0*gam0-1.)**0.25
21843  xe0 = x0*gamm0
21844  xpe0 = xt0*gamm0
21845  ye0 = y0*gamm0
21846  ype0 = yp0*gamm0
21847  xpe0 = xpe0 + .5*xe0*gam0*dgdz/(gam0*gam0-1.)
21848  ype0 = ype0 + .5*ye0*gam0*dgdz/(gam0*gam0-1.)
21849  xe(i1) = xe0
21850  xpe(i1) = xpe0
21851  ye(i1) = ye0
21852  ype(i1) = ype0
21853  ! transverse coupling terms
21854  gam00 = gam0*gam0
21855  gam11 = gam1*gam1
21856  gam22 = gam2*gam2
21857  gam33 = gam3*gam3
21858  gam44 = gam4*gam4
21859  bgt0 = (gam00-1.)**1.5
21860  xk1 = fh*fh/(4.*vl*vl*bgt0)
21861  red = sqrt(xe(i1)*xe(i1)+ye(i1)*ye(i1))
21862  red2 = red*red
21863  dred = 0.
21864  if (red>1.e-08) then
21865  dred = xe(i1)*xpe(i1) + ye(i1)*ype(i1)
21866  dred = dred/red
21867  end if
21868  rk1 = xk1*red2*xi1(phi(j), t0, t5)*qc/e0
21869  rk2 = red*dred*xk1*xi2(phi(j), t0)*qc/e0
21870  gam(i) = gam5 + rk1 + rk2
21871  gam55 = gam(i)*gam(i)
21872  bgt1 = (gam11-1.)**1.5
21873  bgt2 = (gam22-1.)**1.5
21874  bgt3 = (gam33-1.)**1.5
21875  bgt4 = (gam44-1.)**1.5
21876  bgt5 = (gam55-1.)**1.5
21877  bge0 = (gam00+2.)/((gam00-1.)*(gam00-1.))
21878  bge1 = (gam11+2.)/((gam11-1.)*(gam11-1.))
21879  bge2 = (gam22+2.)/((gam22-1.)*(gam22-1.))
21880  bge3 = (gam33+2.)/((gam33-1.)*(gam33-1.))
21881  bge4 = (gam44+2.)/((gam44-1.)*(gam44-1.))
21882  bge5 = (gam55+2.)/((gam55-1.)*(gam55-1.))
21883  ! ******************************************************
21884  ! compute the jump of phase over the step
21885  ! old dlt=(1.+red2*xk1)*xi3(phi(j),t0)
21886  ! old dlt=dlt+red*dred*xk1*xi4(phi(j),t0)
21887  ! old dlt=dlt*qc/(e0*vl)
21888  ! old tof=tof+xpas/(vl*b0)+dlt
21889  ! *******************************************************
21890  f(7, j) = gam(i)*e0
21891  tcour(j) = t5
21892  ddt1 = t5 - ddt
21893  f(6, j) = ddt1 + f(6, j)
21894  ! -- angular deviation
21895  ! 1) terms in dE/dt
21896  a1 = qc/(2.*e0*vl)
21897  ttt1 = xj1(phi(j), t0)
21898  ttt2 = xj2(phi(j), t0)
21899  ! old
21900  ! dxpe=xe(i1)*xj1(phi(j),t0)+xpe(i1)*xj2(phi(j),t0)
21901  ! old
21902  ! dype=ye(i1)*xj1(phi(j),t0)+ype(i1)*xj2(phi(j),t0)
21903  dxpe1 = xe(i1)*ttt1 + xpe(i1)*ttt2
21904  dype1 = ye(i1)*ttt1 + ype(i1)*ttt2
21905  xpe(i) = xpe(i1) + a1*dxpe1
21906  ype(i) = ype(i1) + a1*dype1
21907  ! --- 2) terms in E*E (only for no-relativistic electrons)
21908  if (jelec) then
21909  ae2 = qc/(2.*e0)
21910  ae2 = ae2*ae2
21911  stt1 = xe21(phi(j), t0)
21912  stt2 = xe22(phi(j), t0)
21913  dxpe2 = xe(i1)*stt1 + xpe(i1)*stt2
21914  dype2 = ye(i1)*stt1 + ype(i1)*stt2
21915  xpe(i) = xpe(i1) + a1*dxpe1 - ae2*dxpe2
21916  ype(i) = ype(i1) + a1*dype1 - ae2*dype2
21917  end if
21918  ! extension
21919  ! old dxe=xe(i1)*xj2(phi,t0)+xpe(i1)*xj3(phi,t0)
21920  ! old dye=ye(i1)*xj2(phi,t0)+ype(i1)*xj3(phi,t0)
21921  ! old xe(i)=xe(i1)+a1*dxe+xpas*xpe(i1)
21922  ! old ye(i)=ye(i1)+a1*dye+xpas*ype(i1)
21923  xe(i) = xe(i1) + xpas*(xpe(i1)+xpe(i))/2.
21924  ye(i) = ye(i1) + xpas*(ype(i1)+ype(i))/2.
21925  ! back to the real variables and convert to (cm,mrad)
21926  dgdzr = qc/e0*tspl5
21927  gamm1 = (gam(i)*gam(i)-1.)**0.25
21928  gamm2 = (gam(i)*gam(i)-1.)**1.25
21929  xi = xe(i)/gamm1
21930  xpi = xpe(i)/gamm1 - xe(i)*gam(i)*dgdzr/(gamm2*2.)
21931  yi = ye(i)/gamm1
21932  ypi = ype(i)/gamm1 - ye(i)*gam(i)*dgdzr/(gamm2*2.)
21933  ! convert in cm and mrd
21934  f(2, j) = xi
21935  f(4, j) = yi
21936  f(3, j) = xpi*1.e03
21937  f(5, j) = ypi*1.e03
21938  end do
21939  ! space charge computation (only odd step numbers)
21940  if (.not. flgsc) then
21941  flgsc = .true.
21942  call disp
21943  ! et endif
21944  else
21945  ! et if(flgsc) then
21946  if (ichaes) then
21947  ! Charge space (only SCHEFF is available)
21948  iesp = .true.
21949  call cesp(eglsc)
21950  iesp = .false.
21951  flgsc = .false.
21952  ! Change the dispersion dE/E with respect to the C.O.G of
21953  ! the bunch
21954  end if
21955  call disp
21956  end if
21957  xnh = xnh + 1.
21958  end do
21959  return
21960  end subroutine bcnum
21961  ! ************************************************************************
21962  !**********
21969  subroutine reject(ilost)
21970  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
21971  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
21972  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
21973  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
21974  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
21975  common /cgtof/charm(20), cgtdv(20), nbch(20), netac
21976  common /mcs/imcs, ncstat, cstat(20)
21977  common /etcom/cog(8), exten(17), fd(iptsz)
21978  common /fene/wdisp, wphas, wx, wy, rlim, ifw
21979 
21980  ! COMMON/DYN/TREF,VREF
21981  ! common/tapes/in,ifile,meta
21982  ! COMMON/DAVCOM/dav1(maxcell1,40),davtot,iitem(maxcell1),idav
21983  ! COMMON/SC3/BEAMC,SCDIST,SCE10,CPLM,ECT,APL,ICHAES,ISCSP
21984  ! COMMON/DCSPA/IESP
21985  ! COMMON/SHIF/DTIPH,SHIFT
21986  ! common/femt/iemgrw,iemqesg
21987  ! common/posc/xpsc
21988  ! common/tofev/ttvols
21989  ! COMMON/ITVOLE/ITVOL,IMAMIN
21990  ! logical iesp,ichaes,shift,iemgrw,itvol,imamin
21991  ilost = 0
21992  fh0 = fh/vl
21993  fcpi = fh*180./pi
21994  ! Test window
21995  write (16, *) 'Check if the ', ngood, ' particles are within window'
21996  write (16, *) 'Number of charge states: ', ncstat
21997  if (ncstat>1) call cogetc
21998  bcour = 0.
21999  cgtv = 0.
22000  do i = 1, ngood
22001  gpai = f(7, i)/xmat
22002  bcour = sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai)) + bcour
22003  cgtv = cgtv + f(6, i)
22004  end do
22005  cgtv = cgtv/float(ngood)
22006  bcour = bcour/float(ngood)
22007  bcg = bcour
22008  gcour = 1./sqrt(1.-bcour*bcour)
22009  gcg = gcour
22010  wcg = (gcour-1.)*xmat
22011  do i = 1, ngood
22012  gpai = f(7, i)/xmat
22013  bcour = sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
22014  fd(i) = bcour/bcg*gpai/gcg
22015  end do
22016  ! fd(i)=(gpai*bpai)/(gcog*bcog)
22017  ! ---- select wdisp according to ifw
22018  ! ---- ifw = 0 ===> wdisp = dW/W
22019  ! ---- ifw = 1 ===> wdisp = dW (MeV)
22020  if (ifw==0) then
22021  dispr = gcour*gcour*wdisp/(gcour*(gcour+1.))
22022  else
22023  dispr = gcour*gcour*wdisp/(gcour*(gcour+1.)*wcg)
22024  end if
22025  write (16, 3927) rlim, wx, wy, wphas, wdisp
22026  ! * ,dispr,f6i*fh*180./pi,f(7,i)-xmat,int(f(9,i))
22027  f6i = 0.
22028  do i = 1, ngood
22029  ray = f(2, i)*f(2, i) + f(4, i)*f(4, i)
22030  ray = sqrt(ray)
22031  if (ray>rlim) f(8, i) = 0
22032  if (abs(f(2,i))>wx) f(8, i) = 0
22033  if (abs(f(4,i))>wy) f(8, i) = 0
22034  if (ncstat>1) then
22035  ! ---- each charge state has its own COG in phase
22036  do istc = 1, ncstat
22037  if (f(9,i)==charm(istc)) then
22038  f6i = f(6, i) - cgtdv(istc)
22039  ! tmp=cgtdv(istc)
22040  end if
22041  end do
22042  else
22043  f6i = f(6, i) - cgtv
22044  end if
22045  if (fh*abs(f6i)>=wphas) then
22046  f(8, i) = 0
22047  ! write(16,*) "Test1:",fh*abs(f6i),wphas,tmp,f(6,i)
22048  end if
22049  if (abs(fd(i)-1.)>=dispr) then
22050  f(8, i) = 0
22051  ! write(16,*) "Test2:",abs(fd(i)-1.)
22052  end if
22053  if (f(8,i)==0.) then
22054  write (16, 3928) i, int(f(1,i)), f(2, i), f(3, i), f(4, i), &
22055  f(5, i), f6i*fh*180./pi, f(7, i) - xmat, f(9, i)
22056  ilost = ilost + 1
22057  end if
22058  end do
22059  ! Reshuffles f(i,j) array after window
22060  call shuffle
22061  ! cccc cstat=1
22062  ncstat = 1
22063  cstat(1) = f(9, 1)
22064  do j = 2, ngood
22065  mcstat = 0
22066  do k = 1, ncstat
22067  if (f(9,j)==cstat(k)) then
22068  mcstat = 1
22069  end if
22070  end do
22071  if (mcstat==0) then
22072  ncstat = ncstat + 1
22073  cstat(ncstat) = f(9, j)
22074  end if
22075  end do
22076  netac = ncstat
22077  write (16, *) 'Number of good particles left: ', ngood
22078  write (16, *) 'Number of charge states left : ', ncstat
22079  write (16, 4030)(cstat(j), j=1, ncstat)
22080  imcs = 0
22081  if (ncstat>1) imcs = 1
22082 3927 format (' LIM R,X,Y ', 3(f10.2,9x), 'P,W ', e12.5, 9x, e12.5)
22083 3928 format (' # ', i5, 1x, i5, 1x, 6(f10.2,1x), 1x, f5.2)
22084 4030 format ('Charge state(s): ', 20(f5.1,1x))
22085  return
22086  end subroutine reject
22087  ! ************************************************************************
22088  ! FIRST AND SECOND order Bending Magnet *
22089  ! ************************************************************************
22090  subroutine aimalv(angl, rmo, baim, xn, xb, ek1, ek2, pent1, rab1, sk1, &
22091  sk2, pent2, rab2)
22092  ! ....................................................................
22093  ! Bending magnet
22094  ! ....................................................................
22095  ! WEDGE BENDING MAGNET
22096  ! ANGL : DEG bend angle of the central trajectory
22097  ! RMO : CM radius of curvature of the central trajectory
22098  ! BAIM : KG field of the bending magnet
22099  ! BAIM = 0 the field is computed from the momentum of the reference
22100  ! otherwise the momentum is computed from the field
22101  ! XN : FIELD GRADIENT (dimensionless,TRANSPORT: n)
22102  ! XB : NORMALIZED SECOND DERIVATIVE OF B (TRANSPORT : beta)
22103  ! AP(1) = AP(2) CM vertical half aperture (only if IPOLE = 0)
22104  ! ENTRANCE FACE
22105  ! PENT1 EK1 EK2 RAB1
22106  ! PENT1: DEG angle of pole face rotation (deg)
22107  ! RAB1 : CM radius of curvature
22108  ! EK1 : integral related to the extent of the fringing field
22109  ! (TRANSPORT K1)
22110  ! EK2 : integral related to the extent of the fringing field
22111  ! (TRANSPORT K2)
22112  ! AP(1) : CM vertical half aperture
22113  ! EXIT FACE
22114  ! PENT2 SK1 SK2 RAB2
22115  ! PENT2: DEG angle of pole face rotation
22116  ! RAB2 : CM radius of curvature
22117  ! SK1 : integral related to the extent of the fringing field
22118  ! SK2 : integral related to the extent of the fringing field
22119  ! AP(2) : CM vertical half aperture
22120  ! ********************************************************************
22121  !********
22122  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
22123  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
22124  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
22125  common /sc3/beamc, scdist, sce10, cplm, ect, apl, ichaes, iscsp
22126  common /fene/wdisp, wphas, wx, wy, rlim, ifw
22127  common /davcom/dav1(maxcell1, 40), davtot, iitem(maxcell1), idav
22128  common /tapes/in, ifile, meta
22129  common /dyn/tref, vref
22130  common /rigid/boro
22131  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
22132  common /femt/iemgrw, iemqesg
22133  logical iemgrw
22134  common /etcom/cog(8), exten(17), fd(iptsz)
22135  common /qmoyen/qmoy
22136  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
22137  common /bloc23/h, devi, nb, bdb, l
22138  real *8 l, nb
22139  common /poro/irot1, irot2
22140  logical irot1, irot2
22141  common /bloc11/r(6, 6), t(6, 6, 6)
22142  common /bloc21/be, apb(2), layl, layx, rabt
22143  real *8 layl, layx
22144  common /pltprf/sprfx(3000), sprfy(3000), sprfl(3000), sprfw(3000), &
22145  sprfp(3000), sprng(3000), iprf
22146  common /rander/ialin
22147  common /cgtof/charm(20), cgtdv(20), nbch(20), netac
22148  common /compt/nrres, nrtre, nrbunc, nrdbun
22149  common /radia/trt, rsync, xintf, crae
22150  common /rayshy/iraysh
22151  logical iraysh
22152  common /itvole/itvol, imamin
22153  common /tofev/ttvols
22154  common /mcs/imcs, ncstat, cstat(20)
22155  ! nsprint: control
22156  common /isector/nsector, nsprint
22157  ! --------------------------------------
22158  logical itvol, imamin, ichaes
22159  character *1 cr
22160  logical ialin
22161  dimension xmoy(20), ymoy(20), rmoy(20), rig(20), ncs(20)
22162  dimension xpmoy(20), ypmoy(20)
22163  dimension xcl1(20), xcl2(20), alp(20), sxeb1(20), charge(20)
22164  dimension xsa1b1(20), baims(20)
22165  ! *et*2013*Apr*1
22166  dimension sbeta(20)
22167 
22168  write (16, 100)
22169 100 format (' ****** BENDING MAGNET: input list ****** ')
22170  if (baim==0.0) then
22171  ! BORO: momentum of reference (kG.cm)
22172  ri = boro
22173  ! --- BAIM: bend field (KG)
22174  baim = abs(ri/rmo)
22175  write (16, '(A,F4.1,A,F12.5,A)') ' Based on reference charge ', &
22176  qst, ' momentum ', boro, ' (kG.cm)'
22177  else
22178  ! --- RI momentum kG.cm
22179  ri = baim*rmo
22180  end if
22181  devi = angl
22182  nb = xn
22183  bdb = xb
22184  rsync = rmo
22185  gap = wy
22186  ! print out on terminal of transport element # on one and the same
22187  ! line
22188  nrtre = nrtre + 1
22189  cr = char(13)
22190  write (6, 8254) nrtre, nrres, cr
22191 8254 format ('Transport element:', i5, ' Accelerating element:', i5, &
22192  a1, $)
22193  ! old IF(IROT1) WRITE(16,1010) PENT1,RAB1,EK1,EK2,APB(1)
22194  if (ichaes) then
22195  write (16, *) '***** beam current: ', beamc, ' mA'
22196  end if
22197  write (16, 1010) pent1, rab1, ek1, ek2, apb(1)
22198 1010 format (' ENTRANCE FACE ******', /, &
22199  ' ANGLE OF POLE FACE ROTATION ', e12.5, ' DEG', /, &
22200  ' RADIUS OF CURVATURE ', e12.5, ' CM', /, &
22201  ' FRINGE FIELD CORECTIONS K1 K2', 2(2x,e12.5), /, &
22202  ' VERTICAL HALF-APERTURE ', e12.5, ' CM')
22203  write (16, 1020) rmo, devi, baim, nb, bdb
22204 1020 format (' WEDGE MAGNET************', /, ' BENDING RADIUS: ', &
22205  e12.5, ' CM ', /, ' BEND ANGLE: ', e12.5, ' DEG', /, &
22206  ' FIELD: ', e12.5, ' KG', /, ' FIELD GRADIENTS: N ', &
22207  e12.5, ' BETA:', e12.5)
22208  ! old IF(IROT2) WRITE(16,1030) PENT2,RAB2,SK1,SK2,APB(2)
22209  write (16, 1030) pent2, rab2, sk1, sk2, apb(2)
22210 1030 format (' EXIT FACE******', /, ' ANGLE OF POLE FACE ROTATION ', &
22211  e12.5, ' DEG', /, ' RADIUS OF CURVATURE ', e12.5, 'CM', &
22212  /, ' FRINGE FIELD CORRECTIONS K1 K2', 2(2x,e12.5), /, &
22213  ' VERTICAL HALF-APERTURE ', e12.5, ' CM')
22214  ! start prints in file 'short.data'
22215  idav = idav + 1
22216  iitem(idav) = 4
22217  dav1(idav, 2) = devi
22218  dav1(idav, 3) = rmo*10.
22219  dav1(idav, 5) = apb(1)*10.
22220  dav1(idav, 6) = pent1
22221  dav1(idav, 7) = ek1
22222  dav1(idav, 8) = ek2
22223  dav1(idav, 9) = rab1*10.
22224  dav1(idav, 10) = pent2
22225  dav1(idav, 11) = sk1
22226  dav1(idav, 12) = sk2
22227  dav1(idav, 13) = rab2*10.
22228  dav1(idav, 14) = nb
22229  dav1(idav, 15) = bdb
22230  dav1(idav, 16) = baim*.1
22231  dav1(idav, 17) = apb(2)*10.
22232  fh0 = fh/vl
22233  ! Conversion deg--->rad
22234  radia = pi/180.
22235  pent1 = pent1*radia
22236  devi = devi*radia
22237  devr = devi
22238  l = devr*rmo
22239  dav1(idav, 1) = l*10.
22240  sdavtot = davtot
22241  davtot = davtot + l
22242  dav1(idav, 4) = davtot*10.
22243  pent2 = pent2*radia
22244  devtot = devi
22245  ! ----------------------------
22246  ! define the bending angle of the synchronous particle over each
22247  ! sector
22248  devit = devi/float(nsector)
22249  ! --- devit must be different from pent2
22250  if (devit==pent2) nsector = nsector + 1
22251  ! --- space charge computation: nsector must be g.t. 1
22252  if (ichaes .and. (nsector==1)) nsector = 2
22253  devi = devi/float(nsector)
22254  devr = devr/float(nsector)
22255  ! ----------------------------------------------------------
22256  ! -- scl effective length for space charge computation
22257  ! scl is the path length of the C.T. over two following sectors
22258  scl = 2.*devi*rmo
22259  ! save pent1 , pent2 , devi, ek1, ek2 ,sk1 , sk2 ,
22260  pent1s = pent1
22261  pent2s = pent2
22262  devis = devi
22263  devrs = devr
22264  ek1s = ek1
22265  ek2s = ek2
22266  sk1s = sk1
22267  sk2s = sk2
22268  ! --------------------
22269  do ist = 1, ncstat
22270  xcl2(ist) = 0.
22271  rmoy(ist) = 0.
22272  rig(ist) = 0.
22273  baims(ist) = baim
22274  end do
22275  ! -------------------
22276  ! ---- nsector: number of sectors in the bending magnet
22277  do nsec = 1, nsector
22278  ! write(6,*) '********'
22279  ! write(6,*) ' BENDING MAGNET sector ',nsec
22280  devi = devis
22281  devr = devrs
22282  xlsy = devi*rmo
22283  sdavtot = sdavtot + xlsy
22284  if (nsector>1) then
22285  if (nsec==1) then
22286  pent1 = pent1s
22287  pent2 = 0.
22288  ek1 = ek1s
22289  ek2 = ek2s
22290  sk1 = 0.
22291  sk2 = 0.
22292  end if
22293  if (nsec==nsector) then
22294  pent1 = 0.
22295  pent2 = pent2s
22296  ek1 = 0.
22297  ek2 = 0.
22298  sk1 = sk1s
22299  sk2 = sk2s
22300  end if
22301  if ((nsec>1) .and. (nsec<nsector)) then
22302  pent1 = 0.
22303  pent2 = 0.
22304  ek1 = 0.0001
22305  ek2 = 0.
22306  sk1 = 0.0001
22307  sk2 = 0.
22308  end if
22309  end if
22310  ! ------------------------------------------------------------
22311  ! --- nsctat: number of charges in the beam
22312  do ist = 1, ncstat
22313  charge(ist) = cstat(ist)
22314  devi = devis
22315  devr = devrs
22316  xcl1(ist) = pent1 - xcl2(ist)
22317  xmoy(ist) = 0.
22318  xpmoy(ist) = 0.
22319  ymoy(ist) = 0.
22320  ypmoy(ist) = 0.
22321  ncs(ist) = 0
22322  rig(ist) = 0.
22323  ! *et*2013*Apr*1
22324  sbeta(ist) = 0.
22325  do i = 1, ngood
22326  if (f(9,i)==charge(ist)) then
22327  xmoy(ist) = xmoy(ist) + f(2, i)
22328  ymoy(ist) = ymoy(ist) + f(4, i)
22329  xpmoy(ist) = xpmoy(ist) + f(3, i)
22330  ypmoy(ist) = ypmoy(ist) + f(5, i)
22331  gpai = f(7, i)/xmat
22332  bpai = sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
22333  ! *et*2013*Apr*1
22334  sbeta(ist) = sbeta(ist) + bpai
22335  xmco = xmat*bpai*gpai
22336  rip = 33.356*xmco*1.e-01/f(9, i)
22337  rig(ist) = rip + rig(ist)
22338  ! old rmoy(ist)=rmoy(ist)+rip
22339  ncs(ist) = ncs(ist) + 1
22340  end if
22341  end do
22342  ! *et*2013*Apr*1
22343  sbeta(ist) = sbeta(ist)/float(ncs(ist))
22344  xmoy(ist) = xmoy(ist)/float(ncs(ist))
22345  ymoy(ist) = ymoy(ist)/float(ncs(ist))
22346  xpmoy(ist) = xpmoy(ist)/float(ncs(ist))
22347  ypmoy(ist) = ypmoy(ist)/float(ncs(ist))
22348  rig(ist) = rig(ist)/float(ncs(ist))
22349  ! old rmoy(ist)=rig(ist)/baim
22350  rmoy(ist) = rig(ist)/baims(ist)
22351  ! eq.14
22352  ctan = cos(devi-pent2)/sin(devi-pent2)
22353  xep = rmo*(sin(devi)*ctan-cos(devi))
22354  xepc = xep + rmo - rmoy(ist) + xmoy(ist)
22355  ! eq.15 and eq.16
22356  argu = -xmoy(ist)*tan(pent1)/xepc
22357  ! eq.16
22358  omga = atan(argu)
22359  ! eq.15
22360  thet = omga + devi - pent2
22361  ! eq.18
22362  eo1 = xepc/cos(omga)
22363  ! eq.17
22364  arg1 = eo1*sin(thet)/rmoy(ist)
22365  eta = asin(arg1)
22366  ! eq.13
22367  xeb1 = xepc*cos(thet)/cos(omga) + rmoy(ist)*cos(eta)
22368  sxeb1(ist) = xeb1
22369  ! eq.12
22370  xk2b1 = -xmoy(ist)*tan(xcl1(ist)) + xeb1*sin(devi-pent2)
22371  ! eq.11 (bend angle)
22372  alp(ist) = asin(xk2b1/rmoy(ist))
22373  ! eq.18
22374  xeo1 = xepc/cos(omga)
22375  ! eq.19 (angle of inclination exit)
22376  argu = eo1/rmoy(ist)*sin(thet)
22377  xcl2(ist) = asin(argu)
22378  sa1b1 = -rmo*sin(devr)
22379  sa1b1 = sa1b1/sin(devr-pent2)
22380  xsa1b1(ist) = sa1b1 + sxeb1(ist)
22381  ! --- field
22382  ! first order
22383  baims(ist) = baim*(1.-nb*xsa1b1(ist)/rmo)
22384  ! second order
22385  rih = 1./(rmo*rmo)
22386  baims(ist) = baims(ist) + xb*rih*xsa1b1(ist)*xsa1b1(ist)
22387  ! -----------------------------------------------------
22388  ! ---- Transport matrix
22389  sbet = sbeta(ist)
22390  devi = alp(ist)
22391  ailong = devi*rmoy(ist)
22392  write (16, 101) charge(ist), nsec, nsector, baims(ist), &
22393  xsa1b1(ist), rmoy(ist), devi*180./pi, ailong, rig(ist)
22394 101 format (/, ' **************************************', /, &
22395  ' *CENTRAL TRAJECTORY for charge: ', f4.1, ' *', /, &
22396  ' **************************************', /, &
22397  ' SECTOR: ', i4, ' SECTORS NUMBER: ', i5, /, &
22398  ' BENDING FIELD: ', e12.5, ' kG at: ', e12.5, ' cm', &
22399  /, ' BENDING RADIUS: ', e12.5, ' CM ', /, &
22400  ' BENDING ANGLE: ', e12.5, ' DEG', /, ' length: ', &
22401  e12.5, ' cm rigidity: ', e12.5, ' kG.cm')
22402  l = ailong
22403  h = 1./rmoy(ist)
22404  ! ENTRANCE FACE OF THE BENDING MAGNET
22405  ! CLEAR R AND T
22406  call clear
22407  gap = apb(1)
22408  be = xcl1(ist)
22409  layl = ek1
22410  layx = ek2
22411  rabt = 0.
22412  if (abs(rab1)>6.*0) rabt = 1./rab1
22413  ! -----------------------------------------
22414  gcog = 0.
22415  nii = 0
22416  do ii = 1, ngood
22417  if (f(9,ii)==charge(ist)) then
22418  gcog = gcog + f(7, ii)/xmat
22419  nii = nii + 1
22420  end if
22421  end do
22422  gcog = gcog/float(nii)
22423  bcog = sqrt(1.-1./(gcog*gcog))
22424  fdtot = 0.
22425  do ii = 1, ngood
22426  if (f(9,ii)==charge(ist)) then
22427  tbe = tan(be)
22428  f(2, ii) = f(2, ii) - xmoy(ist)
22429  gpai = f(7, ii)/xmat
22430  bpai = sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
22431  f(6, ii) = f(6, ii) + xmoy(ist)*tbe/(bpai*vl)
22432  fd(ii) = (gpai*bpai)/(gcog*bcog)
22433  fdtot = fdtot + fd(ii)
22434  end if
22435  end do
22436  ! TEST
22437  fdtot = fdtot/float(nii) - 1.
22438  ! --------------------------------------------------
22439  call pofar1(gap)
22440  write (16, 4502) be*180./pi, charge(ist)
22441 4502 format (' ****INPUT FACE*** SLOPE: ', e12.5, ' deg ', &
22442  'CHARGE: ', f4.1)
22443  call matrix
22444  xll = 0.
22445  do ii = 1, ngood
22446  if (f(9,ii)==charge(ist)) then
22447  call cobeam(ii, xll)
22448  end if
22449  end do
22450  ! *******************************************************
22451  ! WEDGE BENDING MAGNET
22452  ! CLEAR R AND T
22453  call clear
22454  call benmag(sbet, fdtot)
22455  ! --- :print the transport matrix
22456  write (16, 4101) charge(ist)
22457 4101 format (' ****BENDING MAGNET for charge ', f4.1)
22458  call matrix
22459  r51 = r(5, 1)
22460  ! ---- transport of particles
22461  do ii = 1, ngood
22462  if (f(9,ii)==charge(ist)) then
22463  call cobeam(ii, l)
22464  end if
22465  ! synchrotron radiation (only for electrons, i.e. erest =
22466  ! 0.511 Mev)
22467  if (iraysh .and. xmat==0.511) call syrout(ii)
22468  end do
22469  ! *******************************************************
22470  ! --- EXIT FACE OF THE BENDING MAGNET
22471  ! CLEAR R AND T
22472  call clear
22473  xll = 0.
22474  gap = apb(2)
22475  be = xcl2(ist)
22476  layl = sk1
22477  layx = sk2
22478  rabt = 0.
22479  if (abs(rab2)>1.e-10) rabt = 1./rab2
22480  call pofar2(gap)
22481  ! ---- :print the transport matrix
22482  write (16, 4501) be*180./pi, charge(ist)
22483 4501 format (' ****EXIT FACE*** SLOPE: ', e12.5, ' deg CHARGE: ', &
22484  f4.1)
22485  call matrix
22486  ! transport of particles
22487  xll = 0.
22488  do ii = 1, ngood
22489  if (f(9,ii)==charge(ist)) then
22490  call cobeam(ii, xll)
22491  end if
22492  end do
22493  ! ------------------------------------------------------------
22494  !-------------
22495  ! --- get back the particles coordinates in the coordinates
22496  ! system of the synchronous particle
22497  sa1b1 = -rmo*sin(devr)
22498  sa1b1 = sa1b1/sin(devr-pent2)
22499  ttt = xcl2(ist) - pent2
22500  ttt = ttt*1.e03
22501  do ii = 1, ngood
22502  if (f(9,ii)==charge(ist)) then
22503  ! EQ.29
22504  a1b1 = sa1b1 + sxeb1(ist)
22505  ! EQ.28
22506  f(2, ii) = (a1b1+f(2,ii)/cos(xcl2(ist)))*cos(pent2)
22507  ! EQ.30
22508  f(3, ii) = f(3, ii) - ttt
22509  ! EQ.31
22510  gpai = f(7, ii)/xmat
22511  bpai = sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
22512  f(6, ii) = f(6, ii) + r51*xmoy(ist)/(bpai*vl)
22513  ! cc
22514  ! f(6,ii)=f(6,ii)-r51*xmoy(ist)/(bpai*vl)
22515  ! **** allow plotting the beam after the sector number
22516  ! nsprint in file 13 (see the MAIN)
22517  ! cc if(nsec.eq.nsprint) then
22518  ! cc write(13,2587)
22519  ! nsec,ist,charge(ist),f(2,ii),f(3,ii),f(4,ii),
22520  ! cc *
22521  ! f(5,ii),xmoy(ist),ymoy(ist),rmoy(ist)
22522  ! cc2587 format(2x,i3,2x,i3,8(2x,e12.5))
22523  ! cc endif
22524  ! ****************************************************
22525  !***********************
22526  end if
22527  end do
22528  ! enddo for ist (number of charges in the beam)
22529  end do
22530  ! --------------------------------------------------------------
22531  ! Space charge computation
22532  if (ichaes) then
22533  ! --- check the parity of nsec
22534  pnsec = float(nsec)/2. - nsec/2
22535  ! nsec is odd:---> space charge computation
22536  if ((pnsec/=0.) .and. (nsec<nsector)) then
22537  call cesp(scl)
22538  write (16, *) ' space charge after sector: ', nsec
22539  end if
22540  end if
22541  ! ------------------------------------------------------------
22542  ! synchronous radiation (only for electrons i.e. erest = 0.511
22543  ! Mev)
22544  if (iraysh .and. xmat==0.511) call syref
22545  ! The routine SYREF changes vref and tref (reference)
22546  ! envelope
22547  call stapl(sdavtot*10.)
22548  ! enddo for nsec (sectors numbers)
22549  end do
22550  ! ------------------------------------------------------
22551  ! random error in alignment
22552  if (ialin) call randali
22553  ! Change the dispersion dE/E with respect to the C.O.G of the bunch
22554  call disp
22555  call cogetc
22556  ! --- Test window after the bending magnet
22557  tcog = 0.
22558  gcog = 0.
22559  do i = 1, ngood
22560  gcog = gcog + f(7, i)/xmat
22561  tcog = tcog + f(6, i)
22562  end do
22563  tcog = tcog/float(ngood)
22564  gcog = gcog/float(ngood)
22565  bcog = sqrt(1.-1./(gcog*gcog))
22566  wcg = (gcog-1.)*xmat
22567  ! ----- window control
22568  call reject(ilost)
22569  ! Reshuffles f(i,j) array after window (now done in 'reject')
22570  ! old call shuffle
22571  ! ---------------------------------------------------
22572  dav1(idav, 37) = ngood
22573  ! devtot: total angle of the bending magnet(computation of tref)
22574  devi = devtot
22575  ailong = devi*rmo
22576  if (iraysh .and. xmat==0.511) go to 2561
22577  tref = tref + ailong/vref
22578  if (itvol) ttvols = tref
22579 2561 continue
22580  beref = vref/vl
22581  gamref = 1./sqrt(1.-beref*beref)
22582  xmco = xmat*beref*gamref
22583  boro = 33.356*xmco*1.e-01/qst
22584  tlong = tref*vref
22585  write (16, 256) beref, gamref, tref, tlong, boro, ngood
22586 256 format (//, 3x, ' *** REFERENCE AT THE EXIT :', /, ' BETA :', e12.5, &
22587  ' GAMMA :', e12.5, /, ' T.O.F (SEC): ', e12.5, &
22588  ' T.O.F (CM): ', e12.5, /, ' RIGIDITY(KGAUSS.CM) :', e12.5, /, &
22589  ' NUMBER OF PARTICLES :', i6, /)
22590  if (itvol) write (16, *) ' tof for adjustments: ', ttvols, ' sec'
22591  if (iemgrw) call emiprt(0)
22592  ! old CALL STAPL(davtot*10.)
22593  return
22594  end subroutine aimalv
22609  subroutine deflect(fdtot)
22610  implicit real *8(a-z)
22611  common /bloc11/r(6, 6), t(6, 6, 6)
22612  common /edef/avb, drad, kx2, ky2, l
22613  ! --- convert drad, kx2 , ky2 in m
22614  h = 100./drad
22615  h2 = h*h
22616  al = l*1.e-02
22617  kx2 = kx2*1.e04
22618  ky2 = ky2*1.e04
22619  kx = sqrt(abs(kx2))
22620  ky = sqrt(abs(ky2))
22621  argx = kx*al
22622  argy = ky*al
22623  avb2 = avb*avb
22624  avg = sqrt(1.-avb2)
22625  avg = 1./avg
22626  avg2 = avg*avg
22627  dx = (2.-avb2)*h/kx
22628  dxp = (2.-avb2)*h/kx2
22629  ! ***** variante:(???)
22630  ! dx=h/kx
22631  ! dxp=h/kx2
22632  ! ************************
22633  ! kx2 < 0
22634  if (kx2<6.*0) then
22635  cx = cosh(argx)
22636  sx = sinh(argx)/kx
22637  sxp = sinh(argx)*kx
22638  ! ---------------------------------
22639  ! First order Matrix R (plane (X,XP)
22640  r(1, 1) = cx
22641  r(1, 2) = sx
22642  r(1, 6) = dxp*(1.-cx)
22643  r(2, 1) = sxp
22644  r(2, 2) = cx
22645  ! *et*2013*Mar
22646  ! R(2,6)=DX*SX
22647  r(2, 6) = dx*sx*kx
22648  ! *et*2013*Mar
22649  ! R(5,1)=-H*SX
22650  r(5, 1) = -dx*sx*kx
22651  ! *et*2013*Mar
22652  ! R(5,2)=(CX-1.)*H/KX2
22653  r(5, 2) = -dxp*(1.-cx)
22654  r(5, 5) = 1.
22655  ! *et*2013*Mar
22656  ! R(5,6)=AL/avg2-DXP*H*(AL-SX)
22657  ! R(5,6)=AL/avg2-(2.-avb2)*DXP*H*(AL-SX)
22658  ! ALT 5/28
22659  r(5, 6) = fdtot*al/avg2 - (2.-avb2)*dxp*h*(al-sx)
22660  r(6, 6) = 1.
22661  end if
22662  ! kx2 > 0
22663  if (kx2>6.*0) then
22664  cx = cos(argx)
22665  sx = sin(argx)/kx
22666  sxp = sin(argx)*kx
22667  ! First order Matrix R (plane (X,XP)
22668  r(1, 1) = cx
22669  r(1, 2) = sx
22670  r(1, 6) = dxp*(1.-cx)
22671  r(2, 1) = -sxp
22672  r(2, 2) = cx
22673  ! *et*2013*Mar
22674  ! R(2,6)=DX*SX
22675  r(2, 6) = dx*sx*kx
22676  ! *et*2013*Mar
22677  ! R(5,1)=-H*SX
22678  ! R(5,1)=-DX*SX*KX
22679  ! ALT 5/28
22680  r(5, 1) = dx*sx*kx
22681  ! *et*2013*Mar
22682  ! R(5,2)=(CX-1.)*H/KX2
22683  ! R(5,2)=-DXP*(1.-CX)
22684  ! ALT 5/28
22685  r(5, 2) = dxp*(1.-cx)
22686  r(5, 5) = 1.
22687  ! *et*2013*Mar
22688  ! R(5,6)=AL/avg2-DXP*H*(AL-SX)
22689  ! R(5,6)=AL/avg2-(2.-avb2)*DXP*H*(AL-SX)
22690  ! ALT 5/28
22691  r(5, 6) = fdtot*al/avg2 - (2.-avb2)*dxp*h*(al-sx)
22692  r(6, 6) = 1.
22693  end if
22694  ! kx2 = 0
22695  if (kx2==6.*0) then
22696  r(1, 1) = 1.
22697  r(1, 2) = al
22698  r(1, 6) = 0.
22699  r(2, 1) = 0.
22700  r(2, 2) = 1.
22701  ! *et*2013*Mar
22702  ! R(2,6)=L*H
22703  r(2, 6) = l*h*(2.-avb2)
22704  ! *et*2013*Mar
22705  ! R(5,1)=-L*H
22706  r(5, 1) = -l*h*(2.-avb2)
22707  r(5, 2) = 0.
22708  r(5, 5) = 1.
22709  r(5, 6) = al/avg2
22710  end if
22711  ! ky2 < 0
22712  if (ky2<6.*0) then
22713  cy = cosh(argy)
22714  sy = sinh(argy)/ky
22715  syp = sinh(argy)*ky
22716  r(3, 3) = cy
22717  r(3, 4) = sy
22718  r(4, 3) = syp
22719  r(4, 4) = cy
22720  end if
22721  ! ky2 > 0
22722  if (ky2>6.*0) then
22723  cy = cos(argy)
22724  sy = sin(argy)/ky
22725  syp = sin(argy)*ky
22726  r(3, 3) = cy
22727  r(3, 4) = sy
22728  r(4, 3) = -syp
22729  r(4, 4) = cy
22730  end if
22731  ! ky2 = 0
22732  if (ky2==6.*0) then
22733  cy = 1.
22734  sy = al
22735  syp = 0.
22736  r(3, 3) = cy
22737  r(3, 4) = sy
22738  r(4, 3) = syp
22739  r(4, 4) = cy
22740  end if
22741  return
22742  end subroutine deflect
22743  subroutine e_deflec
22744  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
22745  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
22746  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
22747  common /sc3/beamc, scdist, sce10, cplm, ect, apl, ichaes, iscsp
22748  common /fene/wdisp, wphas, wx, wy, rlim, ifw
22749  common /davcom/dav1(maxcell1, 40), davtot, iitem(maxcell1), idav
22750  common /tapes/in, ifile, meta
22751  common /dyn/tref, vref
22752  common /erigid/edr0
22753  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
22754  common /femt/iemgrw, iemqesg
22755  logical iemgrw
22756  common /etcom/cog(8), exten(17), fd(iptsz)
22757  common /qmoyen/qmoy
22758  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
22759  common /edef/avb, drad, kx2, ky2, l
22760  real *8 l, kx2, ky2
22761  common /bloc11/r(6, 6), t(6, 6, 6)
22762  common /pltprf/sprfx(3000), sprfy(3000), sprfl(3000), sprfw(3000), &
22763  sprfp(3000), sprng(3000), iprf
22764  common /rander/ialin
22765  common /cgtof/charm(20), cgtdv(20), nbch(20), netac
22766  common /compt/nrres, nrtre, nrbunc, nrdbun
22767  common /itvole/itvol, imamin
22768  common /tofev/ttvols
22769  common /secdr/iseor
22770  logical iseor, sseor
22771  common /mcs/imcs, ncstat, cstat(20)
22772  logical itvol, imamin, ichaes
22773  character *1 cr
22774  logical ialin
22775  dimension xmoy(20), ymoy(20), rmoy(20), rig(20), ncs(20)
22776  dimension xpmoy(20), ypmoy(20), avbt(20), charge(20), alp(20)
22777  ! -----------------------------------------------------------------
22778  ! print out on terminal of transport element # on one and the same
22779  ! line
22780  nrtre = nrtre + 1
22781  cr = char(13)
22782  write (6, 8254) nrtre, nrres, cr
22783 8254 format ('Transport element:', i5, ' Accelerating element:', i5, &
22784  a1, $)
22785  ! ------------------------------------------------------------------
22786  ! characteristics of the deflector (central trajectory)
22787  ! input parameters
22788  ! nsector: nombre of sectors in the deflector
22789  ! rm0: radial radius (cm)
22790  ! devtot: bend angle (deg)
22791  ! radii: vertical (radial) radii of curvature (cm)
22792  ! elecf: nominal electric field
22793  ! characteristics of the synchronous particle
22794  ! wt0 :total energy (MeV)
22795  ! qst: electric charge
22796  ! --------------------------------------------------------------------
22797  !--
22798  ! ---- save iseor in sseor
22799  sseor = iseor
22800  ! iseor = false ---> second ordre transport matrix not available for
22801  ! the deflector
22802  iseor = .false.
22803 
22804  read (in, *) nsector
22805  read (in, *) rm0, devtot, radii, elecf
22806  bd0 = vref/vl
22807  gd0 = sqrt(1.-bd0*bd0)
22808  gd0 = 1./gd0
22809  wt0 = gd0*xmat
22810  wt0c = (wt0-xmat)
22811  ! edr0: electric rigidity (kV)
22812  edr0 = wt0*bd0*bd0*1.e03/qst
22813  ! efd0: radial electric field (in kV/cm)
22814  efd0 = edr0/rm0
22815  edfnom = efd0
22816  if (elecf>=0.) efd0 = elecf
22817  write (16, 1020) rm0, devtot, radii, edr0, edfnom, efd0, wt0c
22818 1020 format (' ELECTROSTATIC DEFLECTOR************', /, &
22819  ' BENDING RADIUS: ', e12.5, ' cm ', /, ' BEND ANGLE: ', &
22820  e12.5, ' deg', /, ' VERTICAL RADII OF CURVATURE: ', e12.5, ' cm', &
22821  /, ' RIGIDITY: ', e12.5, ' kV ', /, &
22822  ' RADIAL ELECTRIC FIELD (nominal): ', e12.5, ' kV/cm', /, &
22823  ' RADIAL ELECTRIC FIELD (applied): ', e12.5, ' kV/cm', /, &
22824  ' INPUT ENERGY: ', e12.5, ' MeV', /)
22825  if (ichaes) then
22826  write (16, *) '***** beam current: ', beamc, ' mA'
22827  if ((iscsp<3) .and. (ncstat>1)) then
22828  write (6, *) '****************************'
22829  write (6, 2748)
22830 2748 format (' CAUTION: In the case of multiple charge states', /, '&
22831  & HERSC and SCHERM can not be used for electrostatic &
22832  &bends')
22833  end if
22834  end if
22835  ! start prints in file 'short.data'
22836  findex = 1. + rm0/radii
22837  idav = idav + 1
22838  iitem(idav) = 21
22839  dav1(idav, 2) = devtot
22840  dav1(idav, 3) = rm0*10.
22841  dav1(idav, 5) = radii*10.
22842  dav1(idav, 6) = findex
22843  dav1(idav, 7) = edr0
22844  dav1(idav, 8) = efd0*0.1
22845  ! convert bend angle in rad
22846  devtot = devtot*pi/180.
22847  l = devtot*rm0
22848  dav1(idav, 1) = l*10.
22849  sdavtot = davtot
22850  davtot = davtot + l
22851  dav1(idav, 4) = davtot*10.
22852  ! --- space charge computation: nsector must be g.t. 1
22853  if (ichaes .and. (nsector==1)) nsector = 2
22854  devi = devtot/float(nsector)
22855  devr = devtot/float(nsector)
22856  ! ----------------------------------------------------------
22857  ! -- scl effective length for space charge computation
22858  ! scl is the path length of the C.T. over two following sectors
22859  scl = 2.*devi*rm0
22860  do ist = 1, ncstat
22861  rmoy(ist) = 0.
22862  rig(ist) = 0.
22863  ! *et*2015-May-13-s
22864  alp(ist) = devi
22865  ! *et*2015-May-13-e
22866  end do
22867  ! -------------------
22868  ! ---- nsector: number of sectors in the deflector
22869  do nsec = 1, nsector
22870  write (6, *) '********'
22871  write (6, *) ' deflector sector ', nsec
22872  xlsy = devi*rm0
22873  sdavtot = sdavtot + xlsy
22874  ! ------------------------------------------------------------
22875  ! --- nsctat: number of charges states in the beam
22876  do ist = 1, ncstat
22877  charge(ist) = cstat(ist)
22878  xmoy(ist) = 0.
22879  xpmoy(ist) = 0.
22880  ymoy(ist) = 0.
22881  ypmoy(ist) = 0.
22882  ncs(ist) = 0
22883  rig(ist) = 0.
22884  avbt(ist) = 0.
22885  do i = 1, ngood
22886  if (f(9,i)==charge(ist)) then
22887  xmoy(ist) = xmoy(ist) + f(2, i)
22888  ymoy(ist) = ymoy(ist) + f(4, i)
22889  xpmoy(ist) = xpmoy(ist) + f(3, i)
22890  ypmoy(ist) = ypmoy(ist) + f(5, i)
22891  gpai = f(7, i)/xmat
22892  bpai = sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
22893  avbt(ist) = avbt(ist) + bpai
22894  ! electric rigidity (kV)
22895  rip = f(7, i)*bpai*bpai/f(9, i)*1.e03
22896  rig(ist) = rip + rig(ist)
22897  ncs(ist) = ncs(ist) + 1
22898  end if
22899  end do
22900  xmoy(ist) = xmoy(ist)/float(ncs(ist))
22901  ymoy(ist) = ymoy(ist)/float(ncs(ist))
22902  xpmoy(ist) = xpmoy(ist)/float(ncs(ist))
22903  ypmoy(ist) = ypmoy(ist)/float(ncs(ist))
22904  rig(ist) = rig(ist)/float(ncs(ist))
22905  rmoy(ist) = rig(ist)/efd0
22906  avbt(ist) = avbt(ist)/float(ncs(ist))
22907  ! write(16,*) 'Debug ED=',ist,cstat(ist),rmoy(ist),rig(ist)
22908  ! dispersion in dp/p relative to the cog of the bunch
22909  gcog = sqrt(1.-avbt(ist)*avbt(ist))
22910  ! ALT 5/28
22911  fdtot = 0.
22912  nii = 0
22913  ! ALT --
22914  do i = 1, ngood
22915  if (f(9,i)==charge(ist)) then
22916  gpai = f(7, i)/xmat
22917  bpai = sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
22918  fd(i) = (gpai*bpai)/(gcog*avbt(ist))
22919  ! ALT 5/28
22920  fdtot = fdtot + fd(i)
22921  nii = nii + 1
22922  ! ALT --
22923  end if
22924  end do
22925  ! ALT 5/28
22926  fdtot = fdtot/float(nii)
22927  ! --- local deflector
22928  ! alp(ist): angle of the local deflector
22929  ! parametres kx2 and ky2
22930  ! eq.11
22931  oo1 = rm0 - rmoy(ist) + xmoy(ist)
22932  ! write(16,*) 'Debug ED2=',oo1,rm0,rmoy(ist),xmoy(ist)
22933  ! eq.10
22934  ! *et*2015-May-13-s
22935  ! abet=oo1*sin(devi)/rmoy(ist)
22936  abet = oo1*sin(alp(ist))/rmoy(ist)
22937  ! *et*2015-May-13-e
22938  abet = asin(abet)
22939  ! eq.12 (angle of the local central trajectory)
22940  ! *et*2015-May-13-s
22941  ! alp(ist)=devi+abet
22942  alp(ist) = alp(ist) + abet
22943  ! *et*2015-May-13-e
22944  ! write(16,*) 'Debug ED3=',abet,devi,alp(ist)
22945  ! eq.14 (field index)
22946  findex = 1. + rmoy(ist)/radii
22947  ! eq.15 (parameters kx, ky)
22948  kx2 = 3. - findex - avbt(ist)*avbt(ist)
22949  rmoy2 = rmoy(ist)*rmoy(ist)
22950  kx2 = kx2/rmoy2
22951  ky2 = (findex-1.)/rmoy2
22952  ! -----------------------------------------------------
22953  ! ---- Transport matrix
22954  devi = alp(ist)
22955  ailong = devi*rmoy(ist)
22956  l = ailong
22957  ! drad: horizontal deflector radius (cm)
22958  ! l: length of the central trajectory (cm)
22959  ! kx2, ky2: DIMENSIONLESS coefficients depending on the field
22960  ! indice
22961  ! avb: average relativistic beta
22962  avb = avbt(ist)
22963  drad = rmoy(ist)
22964  ! --- deflector matrix
22965  write (16, 4101) charge(ist), nsec, nsector, efd0, rig(ist), &
22966  findex, kx2, ky2, rmoy(ist), devi*180./pi, ailong
22967 4101 format (/, ' **************************************', /, &
22968  ' *CENTRAL TRAJECTORY for charge: ', f4.1, ' *', /, &
22969  ' **************************************', /, &
22970  ' SECTOR: ', i4, ' SECTORS NUMBER: ', i5, /, &
22971  ' RADIAL FIELD: ', e12.5, ' kV*cm-1: ', /, &
22972  ' RIGIDITY: ', e12.5, ' kV ', /, ' FIELD INDEX: ', &
22973  e12.5, ' PARAMETER Kx: ', e12.5, ' cm-2 PARAMETER Ky: ', &
22974  e12.5, ' cm-2', /, ' BENDING RADIUS: ', e12.5, ' cm ', &
22975  ' BENDING ANGLE: ', e12.5, ' deg', /, ' LENGTH: ', &
22976  e12.5, ' cm', /)
22977  ! CLEAR R AND T
22978  call clear
22979  ! ALT 5/28
22980  call deflect(fdtot)
22981  ! CALL deflect
22982  ! --- :print the transport matrix
22983  call matrix
22984  r51 = r(5, 1)
22985  ! ---- transport of particles
22986  do ii = 1, ngood
22987  if (f(9,ii)==charge(ist)) then
22988  call cobeam(ii, l)
22989  end if
22990  end do
22991  ! ------------------------------------------------------------
22992  !-------------
22993  ! --- get back the particles coordinates in the coordinates
22994  ! system of the synchronous particle
22995  ! eq.33
22996  ec = -rmoy(ist)*cos(abet) - oo1*sin(devi) + rm0
22997  do ii = 1, ngood
22998  if (f(9,ii)==charge(ist)) then
22999  ! eq.36
23000  f(2, ii) = f(2, ii)*cos(abet) - ec
23001  ! eq.41
23002  f(3, ii) = f(3, ii) - abet*1.e03
23003  ! eq.45
23004  gpai = f(7, ii)/xmat
23005  bpai = sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
23006  f(6, ii) = f(6, ii) + r51*xmoy(ist)/(bpai*vl)
23007  end if
23008  end do
23009  ! enddo for ist (number of charges in the beam)
23010  end do
23011  ! --------------------------------------------------------------
23012  ! Space charge computation
23013  if (ichaes) then
23014  ! --- check the parity of nsec
23015  pnsec = float(nsec)/2. - nsec/2
23016  ! nsec is odd:---> space charge computation
23017  if ((pnsec/=0.) .and. (nsec<nsector)) then
23018  call cesp(scl)
23019  write (6, *) ' space charge after sector: ', nsec
23020  end if
23021  end if
23022  ! ------------------------------------------------------------
23023  ! enveloppe
23024  call stapl(sdavtot*10.)
23025  ! enddo for nsec (sectors numbers)
23026  end do
23027  ! ------------------------------------------------------
23028  ! random error in alignment
23029  if (ialin) call randali
23030  ! Change the dispersion dE/E with respect to the C.O.G of the bunch
23031  call disp
23032  call cogetc
23033  ! --- Test window after the bending magnet
23034  tcog = 0.
23035  gcog = 0.
23036  do i = 1, ngood
23037  gcog = gcog + f(7, i)/xmat
23038  tcog = tcog + f(6, i)
23039  end do
23040  tcog = tcog/float(ngood)
23041  gcog = gcog/float(ngood)
23042  bcog = sqrt(1.-1./(gcog*gcog))
23043  wcg = (gcog-1.)*xmat
23044  ! ----- window control
23045  call reject(ilost)
23046  ! Reshuffles f(i,j) array after window (now done in 'reject')
23047  ! old call shuffle
23048  ! ---------------------------------------------------
23049  dav1(idav, 36) = ngood
23050  ! devtot: total angle of the deflector (computation of tref)
23051  devi = devtot
23052  ailong = devi*rm0
23053  tref = tref + ailong/vref
23054  if (itvol) ttvols = tref
23055  if (itvol) write (16, *) ' tof for adjustments: ', ttvols, ' sec'
23056  if (iemgrw) call emiprt(0)
23057  ! old CALL STAPL(davtot*10.)
23058  ! ---- restore iseor (from sseor)
23059  iseor = sseor
23060  return
23061  end subroutine e_deflec
23062  ! SPECIAL SHEFF (bunches are separated)*******************************
23067  subroutine cesp(xlqua)
23068  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
23069  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
23070  common /sc3/beamc, scdist, sce10, cplm, ect, apl, ichaes, iscsp
23071  common /cdek/dwp(iptsz)
23072  common /dcspa/iesp
23073  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
23074  common /mcs/imcs, ncstat, cstat(20)
23075  logical ichaes, iesp, isepa
23076 
23077  do i = 1, ngood
23078  dwp(i) = 0.
23079  end do
23080  ! Space charge
23081  scdist = 0.
23082  if (.not. ichaes) return
23083  ! XLQUA: length of space charge effect
23084  if ((iscsp/=3) .and. (ncstat>1)) then
23085  write (6, *) '****************************'
23086  write (6, 2748)
23087 2748 format (' ERROR: Wrong space charge model chosen', /, &
23088  ' With multiple charge states in the beam', /, &
23089  ' only the SCHEFF routine should be used')
23090  write (16, 2748)
23091  stop
23092  end if
23093  scdist = xlqua
23094  write (16, *) 'space charge length(cm): ', scdist
23095  iesp = .true.
23096  if (iscsp<=1) then
23097  ini = 1
23098  call hersc(ini)
23099  ini = 2
23100  call hersc(ini)
23101  end if
23102  if (iscsp==2) call schermi
23103  if (iscsp==3) then
23104  if (ncstat==1) call scheff1(1)
23105  ! --- otherwise: ncstat > 1 check if the bunches are separated or
23106  ! not
23107  if (ncstat>1) then
23108  isepa = .false.
23109  call b_sep(isepa)
23110  ! isepa = true call special scheff --->scheff_sep
23111  ! isepa = false call usual scheff ----> scheff1(1)
23112  if (isepa) call scheff_sep
23113  if (.not. isepa) call scheff1(1)
23114  end if
23115  end if
23116  return
23117  end subroutine cesp
23124  subroutine sizer(ist, xrms, yrms, zrms)
23125  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
23126  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
23127  common /part/xc(iptsz), yc(iptsz), zc(iptsz)
23128  common /cgrms/xsum, ysum, zsum
23129  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
23130  common /mcs/imcs, ncstat, cstat(20)
23131 
23132  xsum = 0.
23133  ysum = 0.
23134  zsum = 0.
23135  xsqsum = 0.
23136  ysqsum = 0.
23137  zsqsum = 0.
23138  ngist = 0
23139  do i = 1, ngood
23140  if (f(9,i)==cstat(ist)) then
23141  ngist = ngist + 1
23142  xsum = xsum + xc(i)
23143  ysum = ysum + yc(i)
23144  zsum = zsum + zc(i)
23145  xsqsum = xsqsum + xc(i)*xc(i)
23146  ysqsum = ysqsum + yc(i)*yc(i)
23147  zsqsum = zsqsum + zc(i)*zc(i)
23148  end if
23149  end do
23150  xsum = xsum/float(ngist)
23151  ysum = ysum/float(ngist)
23152  zsum = zsum/float(ngist)
23153  xsqsum = xsqsum/float(ngist)
23154  ysqsum = ysqsum/float(ngist)
23155  zsqsum = zsqsum/float(ngist)
23156  xrms = sqrt(xsqsum-xsum*xsum)
23157  yrms = sqrt(ysqsum-ysum*ysum)
23158  zrms = sqrt(zsqsum-zsum*zsum)
23159  return
23160  end subroutine sizer
23168  subroutine pintim1(ist)
23169  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
23170  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
23171  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
23172  common /qmoyen/qmoy
23173  common /part/xc(iptsz), yc(iptsz), zc(iptsz)
23174  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
23175  common /sc3/beamc, scdist, sce10, cplm, ect, apl, ichaes, iscsp
23176  common /azlist/icont, iprin
23177  common /mcs/imcs, ncstat, cstat(20)
23178 
23179  grmoy = 0.
23180  trmoy = 0.
23181  xbax = 0.
23182  ngist = 0
23183  do i = 1, ngood
23184  if (f(9,i)==cstat(ist)) then
23185  ngist = ngist + 1
23186  grmoy = grmoy + f(7, i)/xmat
23187  trmoy = trmoy + f(6, i)
23188  xbax = xbax + f(2, i)
23189  end if
23190  end do
23191  trmoy = trmoy/float(ngist)
23192  grmoy = grmoy/float(ngist)
23193  brmoy = sqrt(1.-1./(grmoy*grmoy))
23194  xbax = xbax/float(ngist)
23195  ! ccc apl=0.
23196  ! Isochronism correction (bending magnet) only with SCHERM
23197  ! does not work with with SCHEFF (iscsp=3)
23198  ! ccc if(iscsp.eq.2) then
23199  ! ccc xb2x=0.
23200  ! ccc xb2z=0.
23201  ! ccc xbxz=0.
23202  ! ccc do np=1,ngood
23203  ! ccc gpai=f(7,np)/xmat
23204  ! ccc bpai=sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
23205  ! ccc zc(np)=(trmoy-f(6,np))*bpai*vl/100.
23206  ! ccc xc(np)=(f(2,np)-xbax)/100.
23207  ! ccc xb2z=xb2z+zc(np)*zc(np)
23208  ! ccc xb2x=xb2x+xc(np)*xc(np)
23209  ! ccc xbxz=xbxz+zc(np)*xc(np)
23210  ! ccc enddo
23211  ! ccc xb2z=xb2z/float(ngood)
23212  ! ccc xb2x=xb2x/float(ngood)
23213  ! ccc xbxz=xbxz/float(ngood)
23214  ! ccc apl=atan(-2.*xbxz/(xb2x-xb2z))/2.
23215  ! ccc write(16,*) 'slope of the bunch in plane(Oz,Ox):',apl,'
23216  ! radian'
23217  ! ccc endif
23218  do np = 1, ngood
23219  if (f(9,np)==cstat(ist)) then
23220  gpai = f(7, np)/xmat
23221  bpai = sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
23222  ! iscsp = 3 Lorentz transformation (only with scheff)
23223  ! omment if(iscsp.eq.3)
23224  ! znp=(trmoy-f(6,np))*bpai*vl*grmoy
23225  ! omment if(iscsp.eq.2) znp=(trmoy-f(6,np))*bpai*vl
23226  znp = (trmoy-f(6,np))*bpai*vl
23227  xnp = f(2, np)
23228  zc(np) = znp*cos(apl) + xnp*sin(apl)
23229  xnp = xnp*cos(apl) - znp*sin(apl)
23230  ! convert from mrad to rad
23231  f3 = f(3, np)*1.e-03
23232  f5 = f(5, np)*1.e-03
23233  ! convert from cm to m
23234  xc(np) = (xnp+zc(np)*f3)/100.
23235  yc(np) = (f(4,np)+zc(np)*f5)/100.
23236  zc(np) = zc(np)/100.
23237  end if
23238  end do
23239  xbar = 0.
23240  ybar = 0.
23241  zbar = 0.
23242  do np = 1, ngood
23243  ! evaluate xbar , ybar , zbar
23244  if (f(9,np)==cstat(ist)) then
23245  xbar = xbar + xc(np)
23246  ybar = ybar + yc(np)
23247  zbar = zbar + zc(np)
23248  end if
23249  end do
23250  xbar = xbar/float(ngist)
23251  ybar = ybar/float(ngist)
23252  zbar = zbar/float(ngist)
23253  ! Translate distribution by center of mass coordinates to shift
23254  ! coordinate origin to (0,0,0)
23255  do np = 1, ngood
23256  if (f(9,np)==cstat(ist)) then
23257  xc(np) = xc(np) - xbar
23258  yc(np) = yc(np) - ybar
23259  zc(np) = zc(np) - zbar
23260  end if
23261  end do
23262  return
23263  end subroutine pintim1
23270  subroutine b_sep(isepa)
23271  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
23272  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
23273  common /part/xc(iptsz), yc(iptsz), zc(iptsz)
23274  common /cgrms/xsum, ysum, zsum
23275  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
23276  common /mcs/imcs, ncstat, cstat(20)
23277  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
23278  dimension d11(2), d22(2), d12(2), rp12(2), xpint(2), xint(2)
23279  logical isepa
23280 
23281  csmax1 = 0.
23282  icms1 = 0
23283  do i = 1, ncstat
23284  if (cstat(i)>csmax1) then
23285  icsm1 = i
23286  csmax1 = cstat(i)
23287  end if
23288  end do
23289  csmax2 = 0.
23290  do i = 1, ncstat
23291  if (i/=icsm1) then
23292  if (cstat(i)>csmax2) then
23293  csmax2 = cstat(i)
23294  end if
23295  end if
23296  end do
23297  xg1 = 0.
23298  xpg1 = 0.
23299  xg2 = 0.
23300  xpg2 = 0.
23301  imax1 = 0
23302  imax2 = 0
23303  ! COG over state charges csmax1 and csmax2
23304  do i = 1, ngood
23305  if (f(9,i)==csmax1) then
23306  xg1 = xg1 + f(2, i)
23307  xpg1 = xpg1 + f(3, i)
23308  imax1 = imax1 + 1
23309  end if
23310  if (f(9,i)==csmax2) then
23311  xg2 = xg2 + f(2, i)
23312  xpg2 = xpg2 + f(3, i)
23313  imax2 = imax2 + 1
23314  end if
23315  end do
23316  xg1 = xg1/float(imax1)
23317  xpg1 = xpg1/float(imax1)
23318  xg2 = xg2/float(imax2)
23319  xpg2 = xpg2/float(imax2)
23320  ! ------------------------------------
23321  d11(1) = 0.
23322  d22(1) = 0.
23323  d12(1) = 0.
23324  d11(2) = 0.
23325  d22(2) = 0.
23326  d12(2) = 0.
23327  do i = 1, ngood
23328  if (f(9,i)==csmax1) then
23329  d11(1) = d11(1) + (f(3,i)-xpg1)**2
23330  d22(1) = d22(1) + (f(2,i)-xg1)**2
23331  d12(1) = d12(1) + (f(3,i)-xpg1)*(f(2,i)-xg1)
23332  end if
23333  if (f(9,i)==csmax2) then
23334  d11(2) = d11(2) + (f(3,i)-xpg2)**2
23335  d22(2) = d22(2) + (f(2,i)-xg2)**2
