23336  d12(2) = d12(2) + (f(3,i)-xpg2)*(f(2,i)-xg2)
23337  end if
23338  end do
23339  d11(1) = d11(1)/float(imax1)
23340  d22(1) = d22(1)/float(imax1)
23341  d12(1) = d12(1)/float(imax1)
23342  d11(2) = d11(2)/float(imax2)
23343  d22(2) = d22(2)/float(imax2)
23344  d12(2) = d12(2)/float(imax2)
23345  rp12(1) = d12(1)/sqrt(d11(1)*d22(1))
23346  rp12(2) = d12(2)/sqrt(d11(2)*d22(2))
23347  xpint(1) = sqrt(d11(1)*(1.-rp12(1)))
23348  xint(1) = sqrt(d22(1)*(1.-rp12(1)))
23349  xpint(2) = sqrt(d11(2)*(1.-rp12(2)))
23350  xint(2) = sqrt(d22(2)*(1.-rp12(2)))
23351  ! ------------------------------------------------------------
23352  elip1 = xpg1 + xpint(1)
23353  elip2 = xpg2 - xpint(2)
23354  if (elip1<elip2) isepa = .true.
23355  ! TEST*********
23356  ! old write(6,*)'xpg1 xpint(1) elip1 ',xpg1,xpint(1),elip1
23357  ! old write(6,*)'xpg2 xpint(2) elip2 ',xpg2,xpint(2),elip2
23358  ! old write(6,*)'isepa ',isepa
23359  ! old write(6,*) ' ************************************'
23360  ! ***************************************************************
23361  return
23362  end subroutine b_sep
23395  subroutine schefini
23396  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
23397  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
23398  common /dyn/tref, vref
23399  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
23400  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
23401  common /sc3/beamc, scdist, sce10, cplm, ect, apl, ichaes, iscsp
23402  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
23403  logical ichaes
23404  ! common modifiés *********************
23405  common /stsc/beami, wavel, freq, btazero, frrms, fzrms, nr, nz
23406  common /stsc1/beams, im1, im2, im3, nr1, nz1, nq
23407  common /fldcom/rp, zp, pl, opt, nip
23408  ! ***********************************
23409  common /rcshef/sce(20)
23410  common /conti/irfqp
23411  logical irfqp
23412 
23413  gmoy = 0.
23414  do np = 1, ngood
23415  gmoy = f(7, np)/xmat + gmoy
23416  end do
23417  gmoy = gmoy/float(ngood)
23418  bgmoy = sqrt(gmoy*gmoy-1.)
23419  beams = beamc/1000.0
23420  wavel = 2.*pi*vl/fh
23421  freq = fh/(2.*pi)
23422  frrms = sce(2)
23423  fzrms = sce(3)
23424  nr = idint(sce(4))
23425  nz = idint(sce(5))
23426  nip = idint(sce(6))
23427  opt = sce(9)
23428  pl = bgmoy*wavel
23429  if (irfqp) pl = pl/2.
23430  ! sce(7)=pulse length, if not beta lambda.(transport studies), units
23431  ! are cm
23432  if (sce(7)>0.) pl = sce(7)*gmoy
23433  nr1 = nr + 1
23434  nz1 = nz + 1
23435  im1 = nr*nz
23436  im2 = nr1*nz1
23437  im3 = nr1*nz
23438  na = 1
23439  nb = ngood
23440  nq = nb - na + 1
23441  return
23442  end subroutine schefini
23483  subroutine scheff1(idum)
23484  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
23485  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
23486  common /dyn/tref, vref
23487  common /cmpte/iell
23488  common /part/xc(iptsz), yc(iptsz), zc(iptsz)
23489  common /dimens/zcp(iptsz), xcp(iptsz), ycp(iptsz)
23490  common /hermt/afxt(22), afyt(22), afzt(22)
23491  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
23492  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
23493  common /sc3/beamc, scdist, sce10, cplm, ect, apl, ichaes, iscsp
23494  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
23495  common /cdek/dwp(iptsz)
23496  common /beamsa/fs(7, iptsz)
23497  common /dcspa/iesp
23498  common /compt/nrres, nrtre, nrbunc, nrdbun
23499  common /posc/xpsc
23500  logical ichaes, iesp
23501  common /bg/bsc, gsc, phis, wsync
23502  common /stsc/beami, wavel, freq, btazero, frrms, fzrms, nr, nz
23503  common /stsc1/beams, im1, im2, im3, nr1, nz1, nq
23504  common /fldcom/rp, zp, pl, opt, nip
23505  common /spacech1/rm(21), zm(41), rs(20), ers(16800), ezs(16800), &
23506  ez(861), aa(800), rssq(20), zzs(41), er(861), rss(20), ismax(40), &
23507  iemax(41)
23508  common /rcshef/sce(20)
23509  common /conti/irfqp
23510  ! §§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§
23511  ! v28/04/2015
23512  common /fcont/ifcont
23513  logical ifcont
23514  ! §§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§
23515  logical irfqp
23516 
23517  idm = idum
23518  ! set up field tables with int=0
23519  ! omment beami=beamc/1000.0
23520  ! §§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§
23521  ! v28/04/2015
23522  if (ifcont) then
23523  pib = 180.
23524  call compress(pib)
23525  end if
23526  ! §§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§
23527  gmoy = 0.
23528  do np = 1, ngood
23529  gmoy = f(7, np)/xmat + gmoy
23530  end do
23531  gmoy = gmoy/float(ngood)
23532  beami = beams/gmoy
23533  if (beami==0. .or. scdist==0.) return
23534  iell = iell + 1
23535  ! write(16,*) ' *call SCHEFF ',iell
23536  call pintim
23537  ! write(16,*) ' *after pintim '
23538  call sizrms(0, xrms, yrms, zrms, zz)
23539  ! write(16,*) ' *after sizrms ',zz
23540  write (16, 6875) iell, xrms, yrms, zrms
23541  ! write the size rms in the output file 17
23542  ! omment write(17,25) iell,xrms,yrms,zrms
23543  ! omment25 format(2x,i5,3(2x,e12.5))
23544 6875 format (' Cell ', i4, ' RMS size(m)', e12.5, 2x, e12.5, 2x, e12.5)
23545  rrms = sqrt(xrms*xrms+yrms*yrms)
23546  ! change unit: m==>cm
23547  zrms1 = zrms*100.
23548  rrms = rrms*100.
23549  dr = rrms*frrms/float(nr)
23550  dz = zrms1*fzrms/float(nz)
23551  rmax = float(nr)*dr
23552  ! load rm, zm, rs, zs
23553  rm(1) = 0.0
23554  do i = 2, nr1
23555  rm(i) = float(i-1)*dr
23556  rssq(i-1) = .5*(rm(i-1)**2+rm(i)**2)
23557  rss(i-1) = 0.5*(rm(i-1)+rm(i))
23558  rs(i-1) = sqrt(rssq(i-1))
23559  end do
23560  zs = .5*dz
23561  do i = 1, nz1
23562  zm(i) = float(i-1)*dz
23563  zzs(i) = zm(i) + zs
23564  end do
23565  hl = float(nz)*zs
23566  ! load ers and ezs
23567  ! mesh dimensions are in cm. ers and ezs are in 1/cm.
23568  ! c1, c2 and c3 are in cm., and c4 is in mev-cm.
23569  ! q=coulombs/point. (2/pi)*e/(4*pi*epsilon)=572167 cm mev/coul.
23570  q = beami/(freq*float(nq))
23571  c1 = 572167.*q/xmat
23572  l = 0
23573  do k = 1, nr
23574  rfac = (rm(k+1)**2-rm(k)**2)*dz/2.
23575  if (opt==0.) rfac = 1.
23576  do j = 1, nz
23577  zp = zm(j+1)
23578  do i = 1, nr1
23579  rp = rm(i)
23580  if (opt==0.) call flds(rs(k), zs, er1, ez1)
23581  if (opt==0.) go to 35
23582  call gaus(rm(k), rm(k+1), zm(1), zm(2), opt, er1, ez1)
23583 35 l = l + 1
23584  ers(l) = c1*er1/rfac
23585  ! cc write(16,*) ' ersl ',ers(l),' er1 ',er1,' l ',l
23586  ! cc write(16,*) ' rsk ',rs(k),' k ',k,' zs ',zs
23587  ! cc pause
23588  ezs(l) = c1*ez1/rfac
23589  end do
23590  end do
23591  end do
23592  if (beamc==0. .or. scdist==0.) return
23593  dz1 = scdist/100.
23594  dist = scdist
23595  ! sup WRITE(16, *) ' fields acting length(cm): ',DIST
23596  ! evaluate and apply space charge effects.
23597  ! phimc=phi of mesh center.
23598  ! Shifts particle coordinates to a single point in time. Uses
23599  ! a linear shift
23600  ! Beam c.g.
23601  xbar = 0.
23602  ybar = 0.
23603  zbar = 0.
23604  brmoy = 0.
23605  trmoy = 0.
23606  do np = 1, ngood
23607  gpai = f(7, np)/xmat
23608  brmoy = brmoy + sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
23609  trmoy = trmoy + f(6, np)
23610  end do
23611  trmoy = trmoy/float(ngood)
23612  phimc = trmoy*fh
23613  pbar = phimc
23614  beta = brmoy/float(ngood)
23615  gsc = 1./sqrt(1.-beta*beta)
23616  bg = beta*gsc
23617  c3 = dist/bg
23618  c4 = dist*xmat
23619  ! evaluate ng, xbar, ybar, and pbar.
23620  c2 = beta*wavel/(2.*pi)
23621  gmsq = 1. + bg**2
23622  gam = sqrt(gmsq)
23623  ! evaluate ng, xbar, ybar
23624  ng = 0
23625  xbar = 0.
23626  ybar = 0.
23627  xsq = 0.
23628  ysq = 0.
23629  do np = 1, ngood
23630  ng = ng + 1
23631  x = f(2, np)
23632  y = f(4, np)
23633  xf = f(3, np)
23634  yf = f(5, np)
23635  xbar = xbar + x
23636  ybar = ybar + y
23637  xsq = xsq + x**2
23638  ysq = ysq + y**2
23639  end do
23640  eng = float(ngood)
23641  xbar = xbar/eng
23642  ybar = ybar/eng
23643  ! the mesh center is phi*syn
23644  xsq = xsq/eng
23645  ysq = ysq/eng
23646  epsq = sqrt((xsq-xbar*xbar)/(ysq-ybar*ybar))
23647  epsqi = 1./epsq
23648  xfac = 2./(epsq+1.)
23649  yfac = epsq*xfac
23650  ! clear and load bins
23651  ng = 0
23652  do i = 1, im1
23653  aa(i) = 0.0
23654  end do
23655  do np = 1, ngood
23656  rsq = (f(2,np)-xbar)**2*epsqi + (f(4,np)-ybar)**2*epsq
23657  ! i=sqrt(rsq)/dr+1.
23658  r = sqrt(rsq)
23659  halfdr = dr*0.5
23660  i = idint(r/dr+1.0)
23661  if (i>nr) go to 120
23662  zph = f(6, np)*fh
23663  z = -c2*(zph-phimc)
23664  if (abs(z)>=hl) go to 120
23665  ! ------distribute charge among adjacent bins.
23666  ng = ng + 1
23667  zz = z + hl
23668  jm1 = idint(zz/dz+1.)
23669  i1 = i + 1
23670  ! if (rsq.lt.rssq(i)) i1=i-1
23671  if (rsq<rss(i)) i1 = i - 1
23672  if (i1<1) i1 = 1
23673  if (i1>nr) i1 = nr
23674  j1 = jm1 + 1
23675  if (zz<zzs(jm1)) j1 = jm1 - 1
23676  if (j1<1) j1 = 1
23677  if (j1>nz) j1 = nz
23678  a = 1.
23679  ! if (i1.ne.i) a=(rsq-rssq(i1))/(rssq(i)-rssq(i1))
23680  if (i1==i) then
23681  a = 1.
23682  else
23683  rdr2 = rsq/dr**2
23684  sqr = sqrt(4.*rdr2-1.)
23685  rminsq = (halfdr*(sqr-1.))**2
23686  rmaxsq = (halfdr*(sqr+1.))**2
23687  if (i1<i) then
23688  a = (rmaxsq-rm(i)**2)/(rmaxsq-rminsq)
23689  else
23690  a = (rm(i1)**2-rminsq)/(rmaxsq-rminsq)
23691  end if
23692  end if
23693  ! omment if (r.gt.halfdr)then
23694  ! omment rminsq=(r-halfdr)**2
23695  ! omment rmaxsq=(r+halfdr)**2
23696  ! omment if (i1.lt.i) then
23697  ! omment a=(rmaxsq-rm(i)**2)/(rmaxsq-rminsq)
23698  ! omment else
23699  ! omment a=(rm(i1)**2-rminsq)/(rmaxsq-rminsq)
23700  ! omment endif
23701  ! omment endif
23702  b = 1. - a
23703  cc = 1.
23704  if (j1/=jm1) cc = (zz-zzs(j1))/(zzs(jm1)-zzs(j1))
23705  d = 1. - cc
23706  k = (jm1-1)*nr + i
23707  aa(k) = aa(k) + a*cc
23708  k = k + i1 - i
23709  aa(k) = aa(k) + b*cc
23710  k = (j1-1)*nr + i
23711  aa(k) = aa(k) + a*d
23712  k = k + i1 - i
23713  aa(k) = aa(k) + b*d
23714 120 end do
23715  eng = float(ng)
23716  ! find ismax for each j
23717  ! v02/04/2010 do 140 j=1,nz
23718  ! v02/04/2010 l=(j-1)*nr
23719  ! v02/04/2010 k=nr
23720  ! v02/04/2010 do 130 i=1,nr
23721  ! v02/04/2010 m=l+k
23722  ! v02/04/2010 if (aa(m)) 130,130,140
23723  ! v02/04/2010 130 k=k-1
23724  ! v02/04/2010 140 ismax(j)=k
23725  do j = 1, nz
23726  l = (j-1)*nr
23727  k = nr
23728  do i = 1, nr
23729  m = l + k
23730  if (aa(m)<=0.00) then
23731  k = k - 1
23732  go to 130
23733  else
23734  go to 140
23735  end if
23736 130 continue
23737  end do
23738 140 ismax(j) = k
23739  end do
23740  ! find iemax for each j
23741  iemax(1) = 1 + ismax(1)
23742  do j = 2, nz
23743  iemax(j) = 1 + max0(ismax(j-1), ismax(j))
23744  end do
23745  iemax(nz1) = 1 + ismax(nz)
23746  ! set er and ez to zero
23747  do i = 1, im2
23748  er(i) = 0.0
23749  ez(i) = 0.0
23750  end do
23751  ! sum up fields
23752  do js = 1, nz
23753  js1 = js + 1
23754  ism = ismax(js)
23755  if (ism==0) go to 220
23756  do is = 1, ism
23757  l = (js-1)*nr + is
23758  a1 = aa(l)
23759  if (a1==0.) go to 210
23760  l = (is-1)*im3
23761  do je = 1, js
23762  k1 = l + (js-je)*nr1
23763  n1 = (je-1)*nr1
23764  iem = iemax(je)
23765  if (iem<=1) go to 180
23766  do ie = 1, iem
23767  n = n1 + ie
23768  k = k1 + ie
23769  er(n) = er(n) + a1*ers(k)
23770  ez(n) = ez(n) - a1*ezs(k)
23771  end do
23772 180 end do
23773  do je = js1, nz1
23774  k1 = l + (je-js1)*nr1
23775  n1 = (je-1)*nr1
23776  iem = iemax(je)
23777  if (iem<=1) go to 200
23778  do ie = 1, iem
23779  n = n1 + ie
23780  k = k1 + ie
23781  er(n) = er(n) + a1*ers(k)
23782  ez(n) = ez(n) + a1*ezs(k)
23783  end do
23784 200 end do
23785 210 end do
23786 220 end do
23787  ! evaluate and apply impulse
23788  rrmax = 0.
23789  zzmax = 0.
23790  zzmin = 1000.
23791  npz = 0
23792  npr = 0
23793  do np = 1, ngood
23794 
23795  ! Transforming to the bunch reference frame
23796 
23797  dwc = f(7, np) - xmat
23798  gm1 = dwc/xmat
23799  ! convert xp an yp from mrad to rad
23800  f3np = f(3, np)*1.e-03
23801  f5np = f(5, np)*1.e-03
23802  ! omment
23803  ! gm1*(2.+gm1)=(gam-1)*(gam+1)=gam*gam-1=beta*beta*gam*gam
23804  bgz = sqrt(gm1*(2.+gm1))
23805  bgx = bgz*f3np
23806  bgy = bgz*f5np
23807  gamma = 1. + gm1
23808  ! Particle momentum in the bunch frame
23809 
23810  bgzstar = gam*(bgz-beta*gamma)
23811 
23812  ! Particle energy in bunch frame
23813 
23814  gstar = gam*(gamma-beta*bgz)
23815 
23816  r = sqrt((f(2,np)-xbar)**2*epsqi+(f(4,np)-ybar)**2*epsq)
23817  if (r>=rrmax) rrmax = r
23818  if (r==0.) r = .000001
23819  xor = (f(2,np)-xbar)*xfac/r
23820  yor = (f(4,np)-ybar)*yfac/r
23821  if (r>rmax) then
23822  npr = npr + 1
23823  go to 230
23824  end if
23825  zph = f(6, np)*fh
23826  z = -c2*(zph-phimc)
23827  if (z>=zzmax) zzmax = z
23828  if (z<zzmin) zzmin = z
23829  if (abs(z)>hl) then
23830  npz = npz + 1
23831  go to 230
23832  end if
23833  ! interpolate impulse within mesh.
23834  rb = r/dr
23835  i = idint(1.+rb)
23836  a = rb - float(i-1)
23837  b = 1. - a
23838  zb = (z+hl)/dz
23839  j = idint(1.+zb)
23840  c = zb - float(j-1)
23841  d = 1. - c
23842  l = i + (j-1)*nr1
23843  m = l + nr1
23844  cbgr = c3*(d*(a*er(l+1)+b*er(l))+c*(a*er(m+1)+b*er(m)))
23845  cbgzs = c3*(d*(a*ez(l+1)+b*ez(l))+c*(a*ez(m+1)+b*ez(m)))
23846  ! *******************
23847  ! cc write(14,5755)np,cbgr,cbgzs,c3,a,b,c,d
23848  ! cc write(14,5755)np,l,m,er(l+1),er(l),er(m+1),er(m)
23849  ! cc5755 format(2x,i5,7(2x,e12.5))
23850  ! cc5755 format(3(2x,i5),4(2x,e12.5))
23851  ! *******************
23852  ! different space charge in the bunch (valero)
23853  cbgr = cbgr*abs(f(9,np))
23854  cbgzs = cbgzs*abs(f(9,np))
23855  go to 260
23856  ! estimate impulse based on point charge at xbar,ybar,pbar.
23857  ! estimate impulse based on point charge at xbar,ybar,pbar.
23858 230 continue
23859  d = sqrt(z**2+r**2)
23860  rod3 = r/d**3
23861  zod3 = z/d**3
23862  if (nip==0) go to 250
23863  ! include neighboring bunches.
23864  do i = 1, nip
23865  xi = i
23866  do j = 1, 2
23867  s = z + xi*pl
23868  d = sqrt(s**2+r**2)
23869  rod3 = rod3 + r/d**3
23870  zod3 = zod3 + s/d**3
23871  xi = -xi
23872  end do
23873  end do
23874  ! Evaluate impulse.
23875 
23876 250 cbgr = eng*c1*c3*rod3*pi/2.
23877  cbgzs = eng*c1*c3*zod3*pi/2.
23878  ! different charges in the bunch (valero)
23879  cbgr = cbgr*abs(f(9,np))
23880  cbgzs = cbgzs*abs(f(9,np))
23881 
23882  ! Apply impulse and transform back to lab frame.
23883 
23884 260 bgx = bgx + cbgr*xor
23885  bgy = bgy + cbgr*yor
23886  pbgzstar = bgzstar
23887  bgzstar = bgzstar + cbgzs
23888  gstar = 1. + 0.5*bgzstar**2
23889  bgzf = gam*(bgzstar+beta*gstar)
23890  f3 = bgx/bgzf
23891  f5 = bgy/bgzf
23892  dww = f(7, np) - xmat
23893  dws = dww*((gamma+1.)/gamma)*(bgzf-bgz)/bgz
23894  ! cc write(14,5755)np,pbgzstar,cbgzs,bgzstar
23895  ! cc5755 format(2x,i5,3(2x,e12.5))
23896  ! ********************
23897  if (.not. iesp) then
23898  ! load the entrance beam parameters for cavities or gaps
23899  do js = 1, 7
23900  f(js, np) = fs(js, np)
23901  end do
23902  ! dxp and dyp are the jumps of xp and yp (in rad) at the
23903  ! position dz1*xpsc (in m)
23904  dxp = f3 - f3np
23905  dyp = f5 - f5np
23906  ! correction of xp and yp ( in rad)
23907  f(3, np) = f(3, np) + dxp*1000.
23908  f(5, np) = f(5, np) + dyp*1000.
23909  f(2, np) = f(2, np) - dz1*100.*dxp*xpsc
23910  f(4, np) = f(4, np) - dz1*100.*dyp*xpsc
23911  dwp(np) = dws
23912  else
23913  f(3, np) = f3*1000.
23914  f(5, np) = f5*1000.
23915  f(7, np) = f(7, np) + dws
23916  end if
23917  end do
23918  return
23919  end subroutine scheff1
23958  subroutine scheff_sep
23959  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
23960  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
23961  common /dyn/tref, vref
23962  common /cmpte/iell
23963  common /part/xc(iptsz), yc(iptsz), zc(iptsz)
23964  common /dimens/zcp(iptsz), xcp(iptsz), ycp(iptsz)
23965  common /hermt/afxt(22), afyt(22), afzt(22)
23966  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
23967  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
23968  common /sc3/beamc, scdist, sce10, cplm, ect, apl, ichaes, iscsp
23969  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
23970  common /cdek/dwp(iptsz)
23971  common /beamsa/fs(7, iptsz)
23972  common /dcspa/iesp
23973  common /compt/nrres, nrtre, nrbunc, nrdbun
23974  common /posc/xpsc
23975  logical ichaes, iesp
23976  common /bg/bsc, gsc, phis, wsync
23977  common /stsc/beami, wavel, freq, btazero, frrms, fzrms, nr, nz
23978  common /stsc1/beams, im1, im2, im3, nr1, nz1, nq
23979  common /fldcom/rp, zp, pl, opt, nip
23980  common /spacech1/rm(21), zm(41), rs(20), ers(16800), ezs(16800), &
23981  ez(861), aa(800), rssq(20), zzs(41), er(861), rss(20), ismax(40), &
23982  iemax(41)
23983  common /rcshef/sce(20)
23984  common /mcs/imcs, ncstat, cstat(20)
23985  common /conti/irfqp
23986  logical irfqp
23987  ! set up field tables with int=0
23988  if (beams==0. .or. scdist==0.) return
23989  ! isepa true ---> the ncstat bunches are separated
23990  iell = iell + 1
23991  write (16, *) ' ****SCHEFF ', iell
23992  write (16, *) ' states charges ', ncstat
23993  do isp = 1, ncstat
23994  ngisp = 0
23995  gmoy = 0.
23996  do np = 1, ngood
23997  if (f(9,np)==cstat(isp)) then
23998  ngisp = ngisp + 1
23999  gmoy = f(7, np)/xmat + gmoy
24000  end if
24001  end do
24002  gmoy = gmoy/float(ngisp)
24003  ! old beamc=beams/ncstat
24004  beamc = beams*ngisp/ngood
24005  beami = beamc/gmoy
24006  call pintim1(isp)
24007  call sizer(isp, xrms, yrms, zrms)
24008  write (16, 6875) cstat(isp), beamc, xrms, yrms, zrms
24009  ! write the size rms in the output file 17
24010  ! old write(17,25) iell,xrms,yrms,zrms
24011  ! old25 format(2x,i5,3(2x,e12.5))
24012 6875 format (' charge: ', f8.0, ' bunch intensity: ', e12.5, ' amp', /, &
24013  ' with RMS size(m)', e12.5, 2x, e12.5, 2x, e12.5)
24014  rrms = sqrt(xrms*xrms+yrms*yrms)
24015  ! change unit: m==>cm
24016  zrms1 = zrms*100.
24017  rrms = rrms*100.
24018  dr = rrms*frrms/float(nr)
24019  dz = zrms1*fzrms/float(nz)
24020  rmax = float(nr)*dr
24021  ! load rm, zm, rs, zs
24022  rm(1) = 0.0
24023  do i = 2, nr1
24024  rm(i) = float(i-1)*dr
24025  rssq(i-1) = .5*(rm(i-1)**2+rm(i)**2)
24026  rss(i-1) = 0.5*(rm(i-1)+rm(i))
24027  rs(i-1) = sqrt(rssq(i-1))
24028  end do
24029  zs = .5*dz
24030  do i = 1, nz1
24031  zm(i) = float(i-1)*dz
24032  zzs(i) = zm(i) + zs
24033  end do
24034  hl = float(nz)*zs
24035  ! load ers and ezs
24036  ! mesh dimensions are in cm. ers and ezs are in 1/cm.
24037  ! c1, c2 and c3 are in cm., and c4 is in mev-cm.
24038  ! q=coulombs/point. (2/pi)*e/(4*pi*epsilon)=572167 cm mev/coul.
24039  q = beami/(freq*float(nq))
24040  c1 = 572167.*q/xmat
24041  l = 0
24042  do k = 1, nr
24043  rfac = (rm(k+1)**2-rm(k)**2)*dz/2.
24044  if (opt==0.) rfac = 1.
24045  do j = 1, nz
24046  zp = zm(j+1)
24047  do i = 1, nr1
24048  rp = rm(i)
24049  if (opt==0.) call flds(rs(k), zs, er1, ez1)
24050  if (opt==0.) go to 35
24051  call gaus(rm(k), rm(k+1), zm(1), zm(2), opt, er1, ez1)
24052 35 l = l + 1
24053  ers(l) = c1*er1/rfac
24054  ezs(l) = c1*ez1/rfac
24055  end do
24056  end do
24057  end do
24058  dz1 = scdist/100.
24059  dist = scdist
24060  ! sup WRITE(16, *) ' fields acting length(cm): ',DIST
24061  ! evaluate and apply space charge effects.
24062  ! phimc=phi of mesh center.
24063  ! Shifts particle coordinates to a single point in time. Uses
24064  ! a linear shift
24065  ! Beam c.g.
24066  xbar = 0.
24067  ybar = 0.
24068  zbar = 0.
24069  brmoy = 0.
24070  trmoy = 0.
24071  do np = 1, ngood
24072  if (f(9,np)==cstat(isp)) then
24073  gpai = f(7, np)/xmat
24074  brmoy = brmoy + sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
24075  trmoy = trmoy + f(6, np)
24076  end if
24077  end do
24078  trmoy = trmoy/float(ngisp)
24079  phimc = trmoy*fh
24080  pbar = phimc
24081  beta = brmoy/float(ngisp)
24082  gsc = 1./sqrt(1.-beta*beta)
24083  bg = beta*gsc
24084  c3 = dist/bg
24085  c4 = dist*xmat
24086  ! evaluate ng, xbar, ybar, and pbar.
24087  c2 = beta*wavel/(2.*pi)
24088  gmsq = 1. + bg**2
24089  gam = sqrt(gmsq)
24090  ! evaluate ng, xbar, ybar
24091  ng = 0
24092  xbar = 0.
24093  ybar = 0.
24094  xsq = 0.
24095  ysq = 0.
24096  do np = 1, ngood
24097  if (f(9,np)==cstat(isp)) then
24098  ng = ng + 1
24099  x = f(2, np)
24100  y = f(4, np)
24101  xf = f(3, np)
24102  yf = f(5, np)
24103  xbar = xbar + x
24104  ybar = ybar + y
24105  xsq = xsq + x**2
24106  ysq = ysq + y**2
24107  end if
24108  end do
24109  eng = float(ngisp)
24110  xbar = xbar/eng
24111  ybar = ybar/eng
24112  ! the mesh center is phi*syn
24113  xsq = xsq/eng
24114  ysq = ysq/eng
24115  epsq = sqrt((xsq-xbar*xbar)/(ysq-ybar*ybar))
24116  epsqi = 1./epsq
24117  xfac = 2./(epsq+1.)
24118  yfac = epsq*xfac
24119  ! clear and load bins
24120  ng = 0
24121  do i = 1, im1
24122  aa(i) = 0.0
24123  end do
24124  do np = 1, ngood
24125  if (f(9,np)==cstat(isp)) then
24126  rsq = (f(2,np)-xbar)**2*epsqi + (f(4,np)-ybar)**2*epsq
24127  ! i=sqrt(rsq)/dr+1.
24128  r = sqrt(rsq)
24129  halfdr = dr*0.5
24130  i = idint(r/dr+1.0)
24131  if (i>nr) go to 120
24132  zph = f(6, np)*fh
24133  z = -c2*(zph-phimc)
24134  if (abs(z)>=hl) go to 120
24135  ! ------distribute charge among adjacent bins.
24136  ng = ng + 1
24137  zz = z + hl
24138  jm1 = idint(zz/dz+1.)
24139  i1 = i + 1
24140  ! if (rsq.lt.rssq(i)) i1=i-1
24141  if (rsq<rss(i)) i1 = i - 1
24142  if (i1<1) i1 = 1
24143  if (i1>nr) i1 = nr
24144  j1 = jm1 + 1
24145  if (zz<zzs(jm1)) j1 = jm1 - 1
24146  if (j1<1) j1 = 1
24147  if (j1>nz) j1 = nz
24148  a = 1.
24149  ! if (i1.ne.i) a=(rsq-rssq(i1))/(rssq(i)-rssq(i1))
24150  if (i1==i) then
24151  a = 1.
24152  else
24153  rdr2 = rsq/dr**2
24154  sqr = sqrt(4.*rdr2-1.)
24155  rminsq = (halfdr*(sqr-1.))**2
24156  rmaxsq = (halfdr*(sqr+1.))**2
24157  if (i1<i) then
24158  a = (rmaxsq-rm(i)**2)/(rmaxsq-rminsq)
24159  else
24160  a = (rm(i1)**2-rminsq)/(rmaxsq-rminsq)
24161  end if
24162  end if
24163  b = 1. - a
24164  cc = 1.
24165  if (j1/=jm1) cc = (zz-zzs(j1))/(zzs(jm1)-zzs(j1))
24166  d = 1. - cc
24167  k = (jm1-1)*nr + i
24168  aa(k) = aa(k) + a*cc
24169  k = k + i1 - i
24170  aa(k) = aa(k) + b*cc
24171  k = (j1-1)*nr + i
24172  aa(k) = aa(k) + a*d
24173  k = k + i1 - i
24174  aa(k) = aa(k) + b*d
24175  end if
24176 120 end do
24177  eng = float(ng)
24178  ! find ismax for each j
24179  do j = 1, nz
24180  l = (j-1)*nr
24181  k = nr
24182  do i = 1, nr
24183  m = l + k
24184  if (aa(m)<=0.00) then
24185  k = k - 1
24186  go to 130
24187  else
24188  go to 140
24189  end if
24190 130 continue
24191  end do
24192 140 ismax(j) = k
24193  end do
24194  ! find iemax for each j
24195  iemax(1) = 1 + ismax(1)
24196  do j = 2, nz
24197  iemax(j) = 1 + max0(ismax(j-1), ismax(j))
24198  end do
24199  iemax(nz1) = 1 + ismax(nz)
24200  ! set er and ez to zero
24201  do i = 1, im2
24202  er(i) = 0.0
24203  ez(i) = 0.0
24204  end do
24205  ! sum up fields
24206  do js = 1, nz
24207  js1 = js + 1
24208  ism = ismax(js)
24209  if (ism==0) go to 220
24210  do is = 1, ism
24211  l = (js-1)*nr + is
24212  a1 = aa(l)
24213  if (a1==0.) go to 210
24214  l = (is-1)*im3
24215  do je = 1, js
24216  k1 = l + (js-je)*nr1
24217  n1 = (je-1)*nr1
24218  iem = iemax(je)
24219  if (iem<=1) go to 180
24220  do ie = 1, iem
24221  n = n1 + ie
24222  k = k1 + ie
24223  er(n) = er(n) + a1*ers(k)
24224  ez(n) = ez(n) - a1*ezs(k)
24225  end do
24226 180 end do
24227  do je = js1, nz1
24228  k1 = l + (je-js1)*nr1
24229  n1 = (je-1)*nr1
24230  iem = iemax(je)
24231  if (iem<=1) go to 200
24232  do ie = 1, iem
24233  n = n1 + ie
24234  k = k1 + ie
24235  er(n) = er(n) + a1*ers(k)
24236  ez(n) = ez(n) + a1*ezs(k)
24237  end do
24238 200 end do
24239 210 end do
24240 220 end do
24241  ! evaluate and apply impulse
24242  rrmax = 0.
24243  zzmax = 0.
24244  zzmin = 1000.
24245  npz = 0
24246  npr = 0
24247  do np = 1, ngood
24248  ! Transforming to the bunch reference frame
24249 
24250  if (f(9,np)==cstat(isp)) then
24251  dwc = f(7, np) - xmat
24252  gm1 = dwc/xmat
24253  ! convert xp an yp from mrad to rad
24254  f3np = f(3, np)*1.e-03
24255  f5np = f(5, np)*1.e-03
24256  ! omment
24257  ! gm1*(2.+gm1)=(gam-1)*(gam+1)=gam*gam-1=beta*beta*gam*gam
24258  bgz = sqrt(gm1*(2.+gm1))
24259  bgx = bgz*f3np
24260  bgy = bgz*f5np
24261  gamma = 1. + gm1
24262  ! Particle momentum in the bunch frame
24263 
24264  bgzstar = gam*(bgz-beta*gamma)
24265 
24266  ! Particle energy in bunch frame
24267 
24268  gstar = gam*(gamma-beta*bgz)
24269 
24270  r = sqrt((f(2,np)-xbar)**2*epsqi+(f(4,np)-ybar)**2*epsq)
24271  if (r>=rrmax) rrmax = r
24272  if (r==0.) r = .000001
24273  xor = (f(2,np)-xbar)*xfac/r
24274  yor = (f(4,np)-ybar)*yfac/r
24275  if (r>rmax) then
24276  npr = npr + 1
24277  go to 230
24278  end if
24279  zph = f(6, np)*fh
24280  z = -c2*(zph-phimc)
24281  if (z>=zzmax) zzmax = z
24282  if (z<zzmin) zzmin = z
24283  if (abs(z)>hl) then
24284  npz = npz + 1
24285  go to 230
24286  end if
24287  ! interpolate impulse within mesh.
24288  rb = r/dr
24289  i = idint(1.+rb)
24290  a = rb - float(i-1)
24291  b = 1. - a
24292  zb = (z+hl)/dz
24293  j = idint(1.+zb)
24294  c = zb - float(j-1)
24295  d = 1. - c
24296  l = i + (j-1)*nr1
24297  m = l + nr1
24298  cbgr = c3*(d*(a*er(l+1)+b*er(l))+c*(a*er(m+1)+b*er(m)))
24299  cbgzs = c3*(d*(a*ez(l+1)+b*ez(l))+c*(a*ez(m+1)+b*ez(m)))
24300  cbgr = cbgr*abs(f(9,np))
24301  cbgzs = cbgzs*abs(f(9,np))
24302  go to 260
24303  ! estimate impulse based on point charge at
24304  ! xbar,ybar,pbar.
24305  ! estimate impulse based on point charge at
24306  ! xbar,ybar,pbar.
24307 230 continue
24308  d = sqrt(z**2+r**2)
24309  rod3 = r/d**3
24310  zod3 = z/d**3
24311  if (nip==0) go to 250
24312  ! include neighboring bunches.
24313  do i = 1, nip
24314  xi = i
24315  do j = 1, 2
24316  s = z + xi*pl
24317  d = sqrt(s**2+r**2)
24318  rod3 = rod3 + r/d**3
24319  zod3 = zod3 + s/d**3
24320  xi = -xi
24321  end do
24322  end do
24323  ! Evaluate impulse.
24324 
24325 250 cbgr = eng*c1*c3*rod3*pi/2.
24326  cbgzs = eng*c1*c3*zod3*pi/2.
24327  cbgr = cbgr*abs(f(9,np))
24328  cbgzs = cbgzs*abs(f(9,np))
24329 
24330  ! Apply impulse and transform back to lab frame.
24331 
24332 260 bgx = bgx + cbgr*xor
24333  bgy = bgy + cbgr*yor
24334  bgzstar = bgzstar + cbgzs
24335  gstar = 1. + 0.5*bgzstar**2
24336  bgzf = gam*(bgzstar+beta*gstar)
24337  f3 = bgx/bgzf
24338  f5 = bgy/bgzf
24339  dww = f(7, np) - xmat
24340  dws = dww*((gamma+1.)/gamma)*(bgzf-bgz)/bgz
24341  ! ********************
24342  if (.not. iesp) then
24343  ! load the entrance beam parameters for cavities or
24344  ! gaps
24345  do js = 1, 7
24346  f(js, np) = fs(js, np)
24347  end do
24348  ! dxp and dyp are the jumps of xp and yp (in rad) at
24349  ! the position dz1*xpsc (in m)
24350  dxp = f3 - f3np
24351  dyp = f5 - f5np
24352  ! correction of xp and yp ( in rad)
24353  f(3, np) = f(3, np) + dxp*1000.
24354  f(5, np) = f(5, np) + dyp*1000.
24355  f(2, np) = f(2, np) - dz1*100.*dxp*xpsc
24356  f(4, np) = f(4, np) - dz1*100.*dyp*xpsc
24357  dwp(np) = dws
24358  else
24359  f(3, np) = f3*1000.
24360  f(5, np) = f5*1000.
24361  f(7, np) = f(7, np) + dws
24362  end if
24363  end if
24364  end do
24365  ! big enddo of isp
24366  end do
24367  return
24368  end subroutine scheff_sep
24389  subroutine rfkick(v, dp, harm, nvf)
24390  implicit real *8(a-h, o-z)
24391  parameter(iptsz=100002, maxcell=3000, maxtnk=10, maxcell1=3000)
24392  common /rigid/boro
24393  common /consta/vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
24394  common /dyn/tref, vref
24395  common /davcom/dav1(maxcell1, 40), davtot, iitem(maxcell1), idav
24396  common /etcha1/dav2(maxcell1, 33), ichas(iptsz), chasit
24397  common /ttfc/tk, t1k, t2k, sk, s1k, s2k, fh
24398  common /faisc/f(10, iptsz), imax, ngood
24399  common /etcom/cog(8), exten(17), fd(iptsz)
24400  common /fene/wdisp, wphas, wx, wy, rlim, ifw
24401  common /corec/tref1
24402  common /qmoyen/qmoy
24403  common /aerp/vphase, vfield, ierpf
24404  common /itvole/itvol, imamin
24405  common /compt/nrres, nrtre, nrbunc, nrdbun
24406  common /shif/dtiph, shift
24407  common /tofev/ttvols
24408  character *1 cr
24409  ! dimension vecx(1)
24410  logical chasit, itvol, imamin, shift
24411  ! ENVELOPE
24412  call stapl(davtot*10.)
24413  ! xx ilost=0
24414  twopi = 2.*pi
24415  freq = fh/twopi
24416  wavel = vl/freq
24417  fcpi = fh*180./pi
24418  ! print out on terminal of transport element # on one and the same
24419  ! line
24420  cr = char(13)
24421  write (6, 8254) nrtre, cr
24422 8254 format ('Transport element:', i5, a1, $)
24423  if (harm<=0.) harm = 1.
24424  ! test window
24425  call reject(ilost)
24426  ! Calculate tof, beta, gamma, k.e. for c.o.g.
24427  tcog = 0.
24428  bcog = 0.
24429  do np = 1, ngood
24430  tcog = tcog + f(6, np)
24431  gpa = f(7, np)/xmat
24432  bcog = sqrt(1.-1./(gpa*gpa)) + bcog
24433  end do
24434  tcog = tcog/float(ngood)
24435  bcog = bcog/float(ngood)
24436  gcog = 1./sqrt(1.-bcog*bcog)
24437  encog = xmat*gcog - xmat
24438  ! adjustement of the phase of RF w.r.t. the T.O.F.
24439  xkpi = 0.
24440  if (imamin) then
24441  ttvpi = harm*ttvols*fcpi
24442  xkpi = ttvpi/360.
24443  ixkpi = int(xkpi)
24444  xkpi = (xkpi-float(ixkpi))*360.
24445  write (16, *) ' *** TOF correction:', -xkpi, ' deg'
24446  dp = dp - xkpi*pi/180.
24447  write (16, *) ' ***phase of RF adjusted : ', dp*180./pi, ' deg'
24448  end if
24449  ! start of write to file '.short' for kicker
24450  idav = idav + 1
24451  iitem(idav) = 22
24452  dav1(idav, 1) = v
24453  dav1(idav, 2) = dp*180./pi
24454  dav1(idav, 3) = nvf
24455  dav1(idav, 4) = davtot*10.
24456  ! if(itvol) dav1(idav,5)=-xkpi
24457  dav1(idav, 5) = harm
24458  ! end
24459  write (16, 178)
24460 178 format (/, ' Longitudinal parameters', /, 5x, &
24461  ' BETA GAMMA ENERGY(MeV) ', &
24462  ' TOF(deg) TOF(sec)')
24463  write (16, 1788) bcog, gcog, encog, tcog*fcpi, tcog
24464 1788 format (' COG ', f7.5, 3x, e12.5, 1x, e12.5, 3x, e12.5, 3x, e12.5)
24465  e0t = harm*v/(bcog*wavel)
24466  cay = harm*twopi/(bcog*gcog*wavel)
24467  caysq = cay**2
24468  con = twopi*e0t*qmoy/xmat
24469  rad = pi/180.
24470  ! shift=true => reference and COG seperated, otherwise reference=COG
24471  ! --- save the reference
24472  ovref = vref
24473  otref = tref
24474  ! --- shift = false: the reference particle is the cog
24475  if (shift) then
24476  ovref = vref
24477  beref = vref/vl
24478  gamref = 1./sqrt(1.-beref*beref)
24479  older = xmat*gamref
24480  else
24481  tref = tcog
24482  vref = bcog*vl
24483  ovref = vref
24484  beref = bcog
24485  gamref = 1./sqrt(1.-beref*beref)
24486  older = xmat*gamref
24487  end if
24488  ! --- if imamin = false: phase setting has been forced equal to dp,
24489  ! otherwise phase setting has been adjusted
24490  enrprin = older - xmat
24491  write (16, 165) beref, gamref, enrprin, tref*fh*180./pi, tref
24492 165 format (' REF ', f7.5, 3x, e12.5, 1x, e12.5, 3x, e12.5, 3x, e12.5)
24493  wsync = 0.
24494  bcour = 0.
24495  tcog = 0.
24496  do np = 1, ngood
24497  a = harm*(f(6,np)-tref+ttvols)*fh + dp
24498  s = sin(a)
24499  w = f(7, np) - xmat
24500  gpai = f(7, np)/xmat
24501  bg = sqrt(w/xmat*(2.+w/xmat))
24502  bpai = bg/gpai
24503  const = (gpai/(gpai*gpai-1.))*f(9, np)
24504  disp = const*v/xmat*s
24505  bcour = bcour + bpai
24506  tcog = tcog + f(6, np)
24507  if (nvf==0) then
24508  f(3, np) = f(3, np) + disp
24509  else if (nvf==1) then
24510  f(5, np) = f(5, np) + disp
24511  else
24512  write (6, *) 'Invalid parameter NVF in RFKICK'
24513  end if
24514  wsync = wsync + w
24515  end do
24516  wsync = wsync/float(ngood)
24517  bcour = bcour/float(ngood)
24518  tcog = tcog/float(ngood)
24519  ! Test window
24520  call reject(ilost)
24521  ! dave start for kicker
24522  dav1(idav, 36) = ngood
24523  call emiprt(0)
24524  return
24525  end subroutine rfkick
24526 
24527
